reviews.comments:
phòng ốc rất oke, nhưng nên thay bộ chăn nệm mới để trông đảm bảo hơn.
bác bve thân thiện, dễ mến.
địa chỉ rõ ràng, an ninh xung quanh rất tốt
bạn chủ phản hồi nhanh, siêu cẩn thận còn hỏi h check in
4.9/.5.0
Phòng ở sạch sẽ, phản hồi nhanh chóng, có máy sấy trong phòng thì 10 điểm

신속한 응대와 게스트를 배려하는 마음이 전달되었습니다. 아마 다른 모든 고객에게도 똑같이 대할것이기에 추천하기 충분합니다.
다시 방문 하겠습니다.
The place was clean and fit the description. The lake within walking distance is a great plus. The host was responsive.
helpful host. thank you

Thanks you so much for your nice stay, it is decent place with good cozy vibe to stay !
Highly recommend and host very nice and helpful 😍🥰
日常好的房間
Friendly and supportive host

A peaceful location, but extremely close to a beautiful lake, surrounded by cafes.
The host was responsive and helpful, and the building staff were on hand and friendly.
Would recommend.
非常好
Great, quiet place.

We had a great time staying at the place. Anh is very friendly and always responsive. The place is so clean and cozy. The kitchen is shared but if you stay at the 2nd floor room, it’s directly outside of the room.
The place is in the centre of the city, so you can visit a lot of tourist attractions easily. If not, you can watch Netflix all day.

Phòng thoáng đãng và đẹp hơn trong ảnh, không gian sạch sẽ, gọn gàng tạo cảm giác thoải mái và dễ chịu. Lối vào hơi nhỏ một chút nhưng đó không phải vấn đề. Tuy nhiên phải mở 2 lần cửa, lúc đầu mình lúng túng nên hơi mất thời gian.
Chủ nhà chủ động hướng dẫn, luôn hỗ trợ nhiệt tình.
căn hộ rộng rãi, ban công view hồ, ngõ vào căn hộ cũng đẹp, gần các nhà hàng ăn ngon, Lan cho tôi gửi hành lý ở lại và chúng tôi đã có kì lưu trú thoải mái, và thật sự yên tĩnh.
Chỗ ở xinh xắn, yên tĩnh và sạch sẽ

It is located in Hồ Tây, which is nearby the airport. For some couple last days in Ha Noi, I recommend you guys book here for convenience to get to the airport. Everything in this room is clean and nice. The host is very helpful as well 😊

We were so lucky to book Lans place, it’s so peaceful and in what has to be the best area of Hanoi. We loved the local cafes and it’s right next door to the intercontinental to go to the sunset bar. It was very handy to have use of the washing machine and to have a break from hotels on our tour of Vietnam.
Place was exaclty same as shown in the pictures, peaceful surrounding and so close to west lake, Lan was a good host and very responsive, will surely recommend to others.

Grear host (very responsive and kind) amazing location with restaurants, lake very close by, and all around very comfortable stay. The room is very clean, and very fast internet. I will highly recommend for both long and short stay. a great choice you wont regret.

كانت إقامة رائعة والصور كانت حقيقه
مكان مميز والنظافة ممتازه
كان هناك امر تمنيته في السكن وهو ان تكون غرفتي في اعلى دور لكي اتمتع أكثر بالاطلاله
ولكن هذه ليست مشكله ممكن انه لم يكن متاحا في ذلك الوقت
اتمنى ان يعوضني في المرة القادمة
شكرا لكم
Very clean apartment. Quiet surroundings and very peaceful. Lan was very responsive with messages and went above and beyond to accommodate me. Would definitely return.

It was great time to be in LAN’s place. My wife and me and our baby stayed there for 3 nights and it was such amazing experience as the house is clean, the location quite good and convenient for us to go to some tourist places. Will definitely book again when we are back in Hanoi.

Absolutely fantastic stay and could not ask for nicer hosts, the place Is even better than it looks in the pictures (big area) and Westlake is a fantastic area to stay.
We also loved the big modern TV on days we stayed home :)

Das wird mein Zuhause, wenn ich in Hanoi bin. So ruhig und friedlich - Haus, Gegend und Nachbarschaft. Geräumiges Appartment, sehr bequemes Bett, gute Klimaanlage. 30 Sekunden zum See mit herrlicher Skyline. 2-10 Minuten zu hochwertigen Spas, Geschäften, Cafes und Restaurants. Mit Grab Bike für 1 Euro ins Old Quarter, zu Sky Lounges und Rooftop Bars etc. - ich habe es wirklich geliebt, war 6 Nächte da und konnte Hanoi richtig gut genießen. Ein echter Geheimtipp für Menschen, die es eher ruhig und friedlich mögen und auf Specials wie besondere Aussicht von Zimmer aus auch mal verzichten können.
Nice studio in a quiet area of Hanoi, if you don't want to be in the hustle and bustle nice place to stay.
Last Minute Buchung für 2 Nächte - absoluter Glücksgriff. So ruhig und friedlich - und das im quierligen, lauten Hanoi. Hab direkt nochmal 4 weitere Nächte gebucht.
Der Aufenthalt war super angenehm. Die Gastgeber waren zu jeder Zeit hilfsbereit und sehr freundlich. Ich kann diese Unterkunft nur weiterempfehlen!
Great place at the center of Hanoi
Amazing host with a nice place. Feels like home.
很不错的入住体验，便捷勿扰。
Very nice place, large space, very good value for money, I recommend.
good day for us
Pleasant stay
Nice place
Great
好

Nhung was a lovely host and the apartment was a quaint, cosy and cute home away from home! Definitely a beautiful place to stay for anyone visiting Hanoi, and very walkable to and around the Old Quarter!

Un séjour parfait à Hanoï ! L'appartement était impeccable, très propre, confortable et bien situé, à deux pas des meilleurs cafés, marchés et lieux à visiter. L’hôte a été incroyablement accueillant et réactif, avec plein de bonnes recommandations locales. La climatisation fonctionnait parfaitement (indispensable à Hanoï !), et le lit était super confortable. Un vrai havre de paix après les journées bien remplies dans cette ville fascinante. Je recommande à 100 % et je reviendrai avec plaisir.
Căn hộ tầng 26, view xéo hồ, gọn gàng, sạch sẽ, có Netflix. Giao tiếp với chủ nhà dễ dàng và phản hồi nhanh. Dưới chân toà nhà có mini mart, thuận tiện mua bán.

Chủ nhà phản hồi nhanh chóng. Toà nhà ở vị trí tiện lợi, có nhiều quán ăn bên đường đối diện, cũng có thể đi bộ ra chỗ 2 con rồng hồ tây tận hưởng không khó trong lành. Căn hộ ở tầng cao khá mát mẻ, ban công hướng ra hồ Tây ngắm cảnh vào buổi sáng rất đẹp. Nếu có dịp mình sẽ book lại.

Staying at Quyen’s place was an amazing experience! The balcony view was absolutely astonishing, the perfect spot to relax and take in the vibe of Hanoi from above.
The location was also incredibly convenient, with shopping, cafes, and everything I needed just a short walk away.
Super friendly and helpful host, made everything easy and stress free.
Highly recommended. I’d definitely stay here again!

숙소 위치도 좋고 뷰도 좋았습니다.
주인이 신속하게 응대해주셔서 좋았습니다.
다음에 하노이 오면 또 머무르고 싶습니다.

이것은 내 에어비앤비 첫 경험입니다. 숙소의 위치가 이곳저곳 다니기에 적합했습니다. 집은 청결했고 벌레가 없어서 좋았습니다.
침대 매트리스가 편해서 나오기가 힘들었습니다. 세탁기가 있어서 좋았습니다.

We had an amazing stay at Quyen's place. Everything was great - clean apartment, fresh bed linen and big comfy bed and also all amenities that one would need. Quyen is super friendly and assisted us for the whole stay. You should definitely consider the place when you're planning your Hanoi trip.

I had a wonderful stay at this apartment in the El Dorado building in Hanoi. The unit is on a high floor, so the view is truly stunning—especially during sunset. Everything was perfect: the space was clean, well-maintained, and exactly as described. The host was responsive and made the whole experience smooth and enjoyable. I would definitely stay here again and highly recommend it to anyone visiting Hanoi.
Clean, elegant and roomy place. Its on the 26th floor which gives you a good view of the city. the host was very accommodating and attentive. Would definitely come back to stay here.

The landlord is super responsive and helpful, catering to all my needs instantly. The room is clean and tidy. The neighborhood is peaceful and close to the lake and all sorts of cute cafes. Enjoy your inner peace here.

I had a wonderful stay at the studio on the 26th floor, and I can’t praise the host enough for making everything so comfortable and enjoyable. The apartment not only offered breathtaking views from high up, but it was also in a fantastic location. Just steps away, you’ll find Highlands Coffee for your morning brew, a nearby hair salon for a quick refresh, and a mart to cover any essentials you might need. Highly recommend !

Tôi đã có một trải nghiệm tuyệt vời tại căn hộ này. Mặc dù nhận phòng lúc gần 12h đêm nhưng chủ nhà phản hồi siêu nhanh và hướng dẫn vô cùng chi tiết. Rất dễ dàng tìm đc toà nhà vì nó nằm ở vị trí vô cùng đắc địa, ngay ngã tư đường và nhìn thẳng ra hồ tây. Dù muộn nhưng lễ tân vẫn rất niềm nở và tôi có thể nhận phòng nhanh chóng và dễ dàng. Xung quanh có rất nhiều quán ăn, cafe và chỉ cách hồ tây 20m, cách lotte 3p đi bộ, giao thông xung quanh vô cùng thuận tiện. Căn hộ nhỏ xinh, sạch sẽ, thoáng mát và đầy đủ tiện nghi.  Tôi nhận phòng vào buổi đêm nên chưa thấy đc tầm nhìn của căn hộ ngay lúc nhận phòng, sáng ra tôi vô dùng bất ngờ với view của căn hộ này. Ban công đc thiết kế bàn ghế vô cùng xinh xắn và view đc cả hồ tây và sông. Ngồi uống cafe buổi sáng gió mát và rất chill. Căn hộ phù hợp nếu đi 1-2 ng. Chủ nhà luôn sẵn sàng hỗ trợ và trả lời rất nhanh kể cả là buổi đêm. Giá phòng rất phù hợp và chất lượng thì trên cả tuyệt vời. Tôi chắc chắn sẽ trở lại và giới thiệu cho bạn bè

Quyen est tellement gentille est serviable, j’ai eu plusieurs soucis dans mon voyage au vietnam et elle m’a toujours aidé très rapidement. Je recommande à 100%, les appartements sont parfaits et on a pas tout le bruit du vieux quartier de hanoï

편의성. 청결도등 만족
제가 베트남어를 못해서 그렇치
번역기로 의사소통 하려는 모습이 좋았음

Отличное жильё, есть всё, что нужно. С балкона открывается очень красивый вид. В пешей доступности торговый центр Lotte Mall. Постельное белье и сама квартира были чистыми. Хозяин очень дружелюбен. Не хватает полочки в душевой :)

숙소는 사진과 똑같고 청결합니다.
매트리스와 침구가 푹신하고 아주 편합니다.
1 층에 까페와 작은 슈퍼마켓이 있고, 롯데몰이 가까워서 걸어서 갈 수 있습니다.
호스트는 늦은 시간에도 요청사항을 신속하고 친절히 해결해주었습니다.
서호 근처에 숙소를 찾으시면 추천합니다.

Quyens  was a home from home, so cosy and welcoming.  A sanctuary in a busy city...we really looked forward to coming back and relaxing after our explorations in Vietnam.  a wonderful experience for us ... everything we could possibly need was there..modern,  spotless with  every amenity. Bright and comfortable, great views of the cityscape, very accessible. We loved our stay and hope to be back. Quyen made our stay fantastic.

We stayed at this cozy studio hosted by Quyen for a week, and it was a fantastic experience. The location is unbeatable - just a minute away from West Lake, which made for peaceful mornings and lovely evening walks.
The sunrise from the balcony is also extremely beautiful, and we loved having our coffee with that view.
The studio itself was clean, well-furnished, and exactly as described. It had everything I needed for a comfortable stay, including strong Wi-Fi, a comfy bed, and great air conditioning - much appreciated in the summer heat. The large window with a view of the lake was definitely a highlight!
Quyen was a thoughtful and responsive host, always quick to answer any questions and make sure everything went smoothly.
Would highly recommend this place for solo travelers or couples looking for a relaxing, scenic stay in Hanoi.
The apartment was clean and located in a nice area. Great views from the balcony. The host was friendly and helpful.
깔끔하고 편해서 좋았습니다.친절한 응대와모든것이 구비되어 있어서 잘 지냈어요

A very Good place to stay when in Hanoi.Wonderful view from 26th floor.The city lights is awesome. Walking distance to Lotte Mall.With coffee shop and salon around the premises as well.A very responsive host.Highly recommended!

It was a good place but kinda far from the main city, good view overlooking the lake. We just wasn’t given instructions about the hot water in the shower, it was the big switch by the door. We couldn’t watch tv as the remote has only 1 battery. The sheet we used to cover in sleeping was a comforter cover. The place was nice though. Our stay was still good.
great living experience, the view is good and the agent respond is efficient and nice.
호스트와 소통은 매우 좋았으나 주변에 편의점이 없어 불편했음

とても素敵な場所。
スムーズなチェックイン。
ありがとうございました！

Homestay giống y như trên ảnh, sạch sẽ thoáng mát và sử dụng ánh sáng đèn vàng nên trông có cảm giác như đang ở nhà. Hơi tiếc một chút là trong phòng ngủ lại không có gương huhu 😅 mọi thứ còn lại gần như là perfect ✨ thêm một điểm cộng lớn nữa là 2 anh host support siêu nhiệt tình và reply siêu nhanh siêu dễ thương hehehe 💞 nếu có cơ hội quay lại Hà Nội mình sẽ lại ghé homestay để lưu trú. Cảm ơn home đã góp phần cho trải nghiệm ở Hà Nội tuy ngắn nhưng lại thêm tuyệt vời của mình 🫶🏻

1 địa điểm tuyệt vời, sau chuyến đi chơi vào ngày coutndown chúng tôi đã chọn quay lại đây cho dịp nghỉ lễ. Tôi cũng đã lựa chọn Cloud house cho dịp cầu hôn của tôi, host đã hỗ trợ tôi rất nhiều. 1 nơi đáng để quay lại nhiều lần

Chủ nhà nhiệt tình
Nhà sạch sẽ giống hình, thơm
Có nước hoa mẫu test cho khách
Khăn đệm thơm

写真の通りのインテリアでどのスペースも綺麗だった。WiFiの記載がなかったが、リビングにちゃんとしたパンフレットが置いてありそこにインスタグラムのアカウント名の記載があったのでメッセージを送ると迅速に対応してくれた。終始ホストの対応が素晴らしかった。また階段のそばに置いてある香水を試した時すごく素敵だったので購入可能か聞くと、購入手段も柔軟に対応してくれ、購入した後は予備で置いてるものを取っていいとのこと。外国人なのでshoppeeを利用できない人からするととても有難いことだった。何よりもこれだけのサービスを安い価格で提供していることはとても感動に値する。Netflixをテレビでもみれるし、寝室のプロジェクターでも見れる。友達が歯ブラシを持ってくるのを忘れたが、アメニティの箱の中に歯ブラシもあったので問題なく過ごせた。エアビでアメニティを用意しているところは珍しいので素晴らしいサービスだと思う。機会があればもう一度泊まりたい

The stay was pretty good overall! The place matched the photos, and the host was super friendly, responsive, and easy to communicate with. The only downside was some construction noise during my nap, but everything else was great.

Totally a great stay. This house located so convinient to going to all best spot you wanna go, also quite enough for your relax. Everything exactly like in pics and describe. The owner so helpful and try his best to make your stay better. Totally recommend!!!

I had an absolutely magnificent stay! The space was beautiful, clean, and exactly as described—if not better. The host ( Ken) went above and beyond to make sure I was comfortable and had everything I needed throughout my visit. Communication was prompt and friendly, and I truly felt welcomed. The location was also perfect—convenient, quiet, and close to everything I wanted to explore. I would 100% stay here again and highly recommend it to anyone looking for a wonderful Airbnb experience

Absolutely amazing stay! The place was spotless, cozy, and had everything we needed. The host was super friendly and quick to respond. Perfect location, too. Couldn’t ask for more—5 stars all the way!
1 nơi tuyệt vời để dành thời gian cho bản thân cùng người quan trọng của mình. Tôi rất vui vì mình đã chọn nơi đây làm địa điểm khởi đầu cho năm mới.

I really enjoyed my stay at Cloud House – it truly felt like home. The location is fantastic, tucked away in a quiet street so I always had a peaceful sleep, which I really appreciated. The space is cozy, well-designed, and has everything you’d need for a comfortable stay, even a lovely little perfume shop which was a nice touch.
The only thing I wish it had was a washer and dryer, especially for longer stays (a week or more). Being able to do laundry on-site would make the place absolutely perfect. I hope Ken considers adding that in the future.
Overall, I had such a pleasant experience and would definitely stay again the next time I’m in Hanoi. Highly recommend!

The place offers an experience of living with locals, providing a peaceful atmosphere that is not crowded, yet easily accessible to tourist hotspots within 10 to 20 minutes by vehicle. The host is very supportive, enthusiastic, and responsive. Definitely a great place for the trip to Hanoi!
Very good stay at the cloud house! Very nice and clean. Got in super late and Ken was very accommodating for us and let us have a late checkout. Would recommend staying here!
Căn hộ thiết kế đẹp, đúng như ảnh. Chủ nhà nhiệt tình giúp đỡ
Eine tolle Unterkunft! Ken ist ein toller Gastgeber und die Unterkunft war extrem sauber und gut strukturiert. Es hat an nichts gehellt und wir hatten eine tolle Zeit. Absolute Empfehlung!

Cloud House was stylish, with a minimalist aesthetic and perfect for or exploring the local area.
Ken was incredibly welcoming and helpful when we have a trouble. he is a super host.
I was particularly intrigued by the selection perfumes they had on display. Unfortunately, I didn't have the chance to purchase any, which I now regret!
I highly recommend!
This place is hi tech futuristic and reminds me of space with planet shapes. Very clean and fresh, big tv, secure , walkable to market and restaurants. Responsive host!
Great place to stay. The host is very responsive and kind. Large clean space.
位置很方便 房間很乾淨 設備很齊全
Great place!! ☺️☺️
Super nice stay! Really spectacular, stylish and comfy. Outstanding host too!

Phòng ở dễ thương, host thân thiện và support nhanh chóng. Tuy nhiên, 1 điểm trừ hơi nhỏ là độ cách âm ko tốt lắm nên nửa đêm vẫn nghe tiếng ồn nói chuyện khá lớn dưới đường vọng lên. Nhưng tổng thể chung vẫn rất ổn.
Mình đã đi trải nghiệm rất nhiều căn hỗ khác nhau. Nhưng khi đến căn hộ này mk có cảm giác khác hoàn toàn các căn hộ khác. Tạo cho mình cảm giác như ở nhà. Và quanh đây rất nhiều quán ăn ngon.

Nice location, the home was a little dated - few bits of damage on the walls and ceiling - with damp patches. The instructions to check in weren’t very clear - we told the Air BnB we’d be arriving very late - which meant when we arrived we found the shutters were down. Would have been good to have known this before as we were unsure if you needed a key to remove the shutters. Little expensive for the state of the property too but overall OK.

It was so kind and helpful that we could store in the lockers completely safe  our luggage for more than one night after check out for free when we went to Ha Long Bey Cruise.       Really good location walkable to all main points of Hanoi. Many places for great street food, Banh Mi, Coffee shops Craft beer etc. everything you need you can find just out there 🫶

Had a great 1 night stay here. Everything was as seen and described on the advert. spacious and clean. Great tv, comfortable bed, range of cooking utensils and a nice shower. The host was also very friendly and responsive. Would definitely reccomend. Thanks

the stay was great, apart from minor things like the shower area was a bit smaller than the photos. room was clean, spacious and good ambience with balcony and view towards localities. the way was great, friendly with clear instructions and available over text anytime required. located in old quarters with locations accessable by foot with nearby cute and good ambience local cafes. overall experience was great, had fun staying there.
정말 좋았어요 방도 넓고 위치도 아주 좋았습니다 필요한것들은 전부 있었구요. 다음에 갈때도 머무를거에요! 다만 레이트 체크인을 할때, 설명에 셔터가 내려져 있을때 올리면 된다는 이야기도 추가해 주세요. 밖에서 30분정도를 기다렸습니다

The host is very responsive and that's the reason for everyone to book this stay.
When you travel to another country and have no idea how things work there it's comforting to have a responsive host.

The room is comfortable and spacious, the hosts very accommodating, friendly, kind, responsive and pro-active to support through anything that you might need during your stay. They offered free laundry service which was a great bonus :). The only thing that was a little less than ideal was shower temperature as it was either too hot or not hot enough - but that wasn’t too much of an issue and I would definitely recommend. Also the entry is at a flower shop which I found to be charming with a nice fragrance inviting you into your trip.

Fijne, ruime plek om te verblijven in Hanoï. Lieve schoonmaakster Loan hielp me mijn was te doen. En de bloemenwinkel onderaan waren zo vriendelijk om mijn boarding pass af te drukken. Ik zou terugkeren!

Die Wohnung ist super und die Kommunikation mit dem Gastgeber war auch sehr gut.
Das Einzige, was zu Beginn ein bisschen befremdlich war, ist, dass man immer durch einen Blumenladen laufen muss, um zur Wohnung zu gelangen. Ich finde, das müsste mit in die Beschreibung aufgenommen werden.
Location of airbnb was good- near touristy area but in a more quiet area. Check in was fuss-free. Aircon and TV worked well. Toilet cleanliness can be improved upon.
Easy to check in and out. Large room with everything you need. A couple of things that could be better, like the shower, but overall it's a good place to stay in a very convenient location.

The location is great, very close to the scenic spots around the hoan kiem Lake, making it easy to explore the area. Despite being in a convenient location, the place is quiet at night, ensuring a good night’s rest. There are also many great coffee shops nearby—I highly recommend this stay!
very cozy and well-furnished. The cleaning lady name BUI LOAN (not sure i remember her name correctly) is very pleasant and courteous.
Super responsive host, messaging back to all my questions instantly. Clean and tidy stay. Everything you need for a trip to Hanoi!
临近街边 非常吵闹 房间门窗不隔音 窗帘不遮光 如果你需要一个安睡的环境 这里不适合 但优点在于位于市区内 出行方便

Die Unterkunft ist wirklich sehr gut gelegen und bietet die perfekte Möglichkeit um Tagestrips in die Stadt zu machen und auch um abends auszugehen. Ha Giang hat sehr schnell und zuverlässig geantwortet und hat bei allen Fragen geholfen. Ich kann die Unterkunft definitiv empfehlen!
Great location as it is near old quarter yet quiet and walkable
Good location, Clean and quiet apartment, Great and helpful team ❤️
Love the place. There is lots of bustle in the morning but it clears up
Really spacious and beautiful flat, we loved it. And the host was extremely responsive and proactive.
Great stay with a really responsive host and even let us store our luggage in a locker the next day when we wait for our bus - thank you :)
nice place and very nice location. supportive host

Tôi rất hài lòng với đêm nghỉ ở OMai. Nhà rất đẹp, đầy đủ tiện nghi. Chủ nhà cung cấp dịch vụ tuyệt vời. Nhà nằm ở khu vực yên tĩnh nên tôi đã có 1 đêm ngon giấc. Rất thuận tiện đi chuyển đến trung tâm.

Absolutely perfect stay with Omai! I had a short trip outside of Hanoi for a few days, and Omai was kind enough to keep my luggage while I was away—which I truly appreciated. The service and communication were spot-on, just like always. The apartment was sparkling clean, cozy, and felt like a home away from home. The location is fantastic—super close to the Old Quarter and just a short walk to train street. Highly recommend to everyone!

Die Wohnung war makellos sauber, geschmackvoll eingerichtet und hatte eine warme, einladende Atmosphäre. Die Waschmaschine war ein großes Plus, besonders für längere Aufenthalte. Sie war einfach zu bedienen und es war super praktisch, während der Reise Kleidung waschen zu können.
Die Lage ist perfekt – mitten im Herzen von Hanoi, nur wenige Gehminuten von der Altstadt, der Train Street und vielen lokalen Highlights entfernt. Trotz der zentralen Lage war die Wohnung ruhig und bot einen erholsamen Rückzugsort nach einem langen Tag voller Erkundungen.
Omai ist eine außergewöhnliche Gastgeberin. Die Kommunikation war schnell und klar, und an jedes Detail wurde gedacht. Ich fühlte mich während meines gesamten Aufenthalts wirklich gut umsorgt 🙂
体验超级好，小姐姐也很温柔，我们到这里想去的地方，她都会跟我们说在哪里，房间很干净

I really enjoyed my stay at Little An Room. The place is in a very strategic location—close to the main road but still quiet and peaceful. It’s also very aesthetic, nicely decorated and visually pleasant. The room felt super cozy, just like being in my own bedroom.
The amenities were complete, including a small kitchen where I could prepare instant meals when I was hungry or didn’t feel like going out. The host was also very helpful and responsive, which made the stay even more enjoyable.
I highly recommend this place, especially for solo travelers or those traveling with friends. Thank you for the warm and lovely stay!
Chủ homestay hướng dẫn nhiệt tình và chủ động hỏi chuyện khách hàng. Phòng đẹp và tiện nghi. Đi lại dễ dàng và không gian yên tĩnh. Mình rất thích!

Nhà đẹp lắm. Tiện nghi đầy đủ. Vị trí thuận tiện và ở khu vực yên tĩnh. Chủ nhà nhiệt tình, rất hỗ trợ khách. Xin cảm ơn
À chủ nhà có tặng mỳ chua cay ngon quá. Vui

This is one of the nicest rooms I’ve stayed in on Airbnb! It was immaculately clean and I felt very safe there. It was tucked in off the street so it was nice and quiet at night. The room had everything I needed. The washing machine was a huge plus to have in the room too. I would 100% stay here again!
Rất thíchh và sẽ quay lại! Sạch sẽ và mọi thứ đều giống như trên hình 😍

We had a great stay here in Hanoi. Everything was perfect; easy self check-in with clear instructions, the team super responsive and gave us all info we need. The place is clean, bright and modern with all amenities we need. The location is near all popular spots and still quiet and private. We are very glad to find this lovely place n would highly recommend it! :)

I stayed in this beautiful apartment for one night as I arrived to Hanoi a day earlier than originally planned. The space was clean and comfortable, and the location is wonderful — close to the old quarter, but quiet at night. I appreciated being able to do my laundry before heading to my next accommodation. Communication and check in were also very smooth.  I would definitely stay here again on a return trip to Hanoi.

We had a last minute Ha Long Bay cancellation so we had to reroute to Hanoi quickly, but we’re so glad Brian’s place was available! He was extremely helpful getting us the check-in instructions early, and was kind enough to give us a late check out for our late-night flight. We would absolutely recommend staying here if you’re coming to Hanoi!

I always love staying at Omai’s place! The apartment is clean, stylish, and super cozy. Being so close to Hanoi’s train street made the stay even more special—it’s such a cool spot to experience local life. Omai is always helpful and kind, with great communication and thoughtful details. I wouldn’t stay anywhere else in Hanoi!
The host of the place was very kind, responsive and helpful. I would stay more if i can; it’s a place that is comfortable and complete of basic necessities. Even location is good.

Loved my stay here! The place is clean, comfy, and has all the basics. It’s on the ground floor but still quiet and private, which was great.
Location is awesome too, just a short walk to the train street and night market. Would def come back!
Not many reviews yet, but I saw the host has other high-rated listings — glad I gave it a shot! Also thank you for letting me leave my luggage until my evening flight. Really appreciated that!
A very clean, comfortable and nice apartment that’s walking distance to the Old Quarter. Checking in was seamless and host was very responsive!
perfect as always! :)
i had a wonderful time

Had a great stay here for a few days. Phuong Anh was always responsive and attentive plus she also gave us some great local recommendations. The place was clean and tidy and we even got a free clean during our stay. We personally spent more time in central Hanoi and the old quarter so we had to get grabs most days but other than that the location was good and so was our overall stay. Would definitely recommend to others :)

Thời gian lưu trú tuyệt vời. Nhận phòng thoải mái linh hoạt, không phải qua lễ tân. Hỗ trợ nhận phòng sớm hơn theo nhu cầu khách. Hỗ trợ ngay khi có vấn đề xảy ra. Hỏi han và phản hồi gần như ngay lập tức. Tiện đi lại và sạch sẽ. Có dịp sẽ ghé thăm lại. Đánh giá cao với giá tiền bỏ ra.

Phòng ở sạch sẽ. Có thể cải thiện  chiều dài rèm che (căn Lafluer), rèm cho vách kính và rèm phòng tắm riêng tư hơn (căn Lapensse tầng 2). Nhưng nhìn chung, phòng của Langmandi rất tốt, giá cả phù hợp.

the flat is exactly as in the photos, but what struck me was the proactivity and availability of the owner, every time I needed her, the response was quick. my stay was peaceful, comfortable and safe/ and the kitchen has everything you need honestly, the bed is so comfortable that I lost the time two days in a row, for me who was travelling alone, I would stay here again without thinking twice.
Một trải nghiệm tuyệt vời. Cảm ơn Phương Anh
great host, location ok, near bus station, also very noisy neighbors collecting metal rubbish... room could be cleaner, when I checked in there was water everywhere on the flooring
Phòng đẹp và sạch sẽ, giường êm. Gần nhiều quán ăn và cà phê.
Chỗ ở sạch và thơm, chủ nhà nhiệt tình, vệ sinh sạch sẽ

Nhà đẹp, đẹp y hình và dễ tìm. Hướng dẫn cũng dễ hiểu.
Nên thay dao cho dụng cụ bếp hoặc cung cấp thêm kéo. Mình nghĩ nên để thêm giấy ăn thay vì để mỗi cuộn giấy vệ sinh. Thùng rác thì nên lót nilon trước. Duy nhất là lúc bọn mình tới nhà vẫn chưa khô hẳn nên không thích điều đó lắm. Còn lại mọi thứ đều rất tuyệt vời.
Luôn luôn hài lòng

Great deal! Phuong was very responsive to my inquiry. I stayed for a week and it’s great. There are nearby coffee shop and park. It’s far from the busy Old quarter but grab is always cheap and if you want peaceful environment then, this is a good deal.
Thank you for letting me stay. :)

Я заселилась немного раньше времени, поэтому уборщица не успела убрать жилье, но ничего страшного, потому что как мы связались с владельцем, он тут же ответил и приехала уборщица и все убрала. Были несколько вопросов по поводу жилья, но когда нам нужна была помощь, то владелец очень быстро отвечал. Жилье находится 7-10 минутах езды от центра города, нужно лишь пересечь мост. Вначале я немного беспокоилась о том что дома нет стиральной машины, но буквально в 10 минутах ходьбы рядом расположено химчистка, поэтому можно не переживать о грязной одежде. Рядом есть платная парковка, где можно оставить арендованный мопед. Единственный минус это освещение в туалете, если кто-то красится, то довольно сложно будет сделать хороший макияж, так как освещение желтое и не предает все недостатки, а в целом хорошее жилье для недолгого проживания.
please fixed the wifi, beside of it, everything is good
People around are very friendly, the place was very clean. Will recommend it to friends who will plan to visit Hanoi. Will rate it 10/10
Phòng đầy đủ tiện nghi, giá cả siêu hợp lý, phòng xinh lung linh luôn, thoáng mát, rộng rãi.
Very good stay! The apartment is so cute and also the host is very nice. Thank you!
Not great, but acceptable for the low price

可愛くて綺麗、静かで過ごしやすいお部屋でした。写真通りの見た目です。エアコンや冷蔵庫、Wi-Fiも問題なく使用できました。ハノイの中心エリアや旧市街にはタクシーで10分ほどで行くことができます。Grabデリバリーが使用できる範囲も広く、部屋にいながら様々な料理を楽しむこともできます。暑すぎる日はほとんどの時間を部屋で過ごしました。
たまにクラクションや工事の音が聞こえてきますが、基本的には閑静です。鍵が固かったりシャワーがぬるかったりするので、細かいことを気にしない方にオススメします。
This place is very affordable and cute! Phuong Anh was very accommodating, friendly and helpful with all of my inquiries. I highly recommend her place. 💯

This place is THE BEST Airbnb I've ever stayed at. They really take things to the next level. They sent clear instructions with pics, including shots of the location from the street, so you can easily find it. I instantly/confidently knew I was there when I arrived. I think every host should do that.
The place itself is so well kept, comfy and feels like home. If you're working remotely (like me) the wifi is reliable and super fast. I was hitting 300Mbps there.
In case you're still on the fence, book this place. you'll thank me later! :)

Thanks so much! You saved us! We were at another Airbnb that did not live up to our expectations and we were fortunate to find Tungs hidden gem VERY last minute! We booked at 7pm and were in the unit by 8pm. Fridge stocked with cold waters and beer. A beautiful room with a nice big TV and a perfect laundry set up. The staff brought us extra pillows and the welcome booklet provided us with some great food recos ! Thanks so much. Saved our evening!
역시 새로 지어진 집이 좋네요. 골목 사이에 이렇게 좋은 아파트가? 싶을정도로 신축건물이 있고, 직원분들도 항상 상주해있는거같아 믿음이 갑니다. 집이 사진과 똑같고 수건또한 청결해서 다음에 하노이오면 또 여기로 올거같아요:)

Our best stay in Vietnam, very affordable and clean. In a quiet area, located 15 minutes from the old town. The host was very helpful and brought fresh towels every 2 days.
The facilities were great. There are free washers in the basement that guests can use.
I would highly recommend!

I really enjoyed my stay at the unit. The apartment is new, clean, and has all the facilities I need. The staff were helpful and friendly. There’s a small balcony that lets in a bit of sunshine and fresh air — though I mostly enjoyed the comfort of the AC!

It’s a great place to chill in the bus Hanoi, still center is very close with Grab.
It’s a new apartment with great design.
There are many stores/restaurants around.
It was super easy to communicate with the host, everything was smooth. I highly recommend the place.
We had a lovely stay, everything was perfect. The studio is really comfortable and quiet. And the location near the lake is very nice.
الشقة فاخرة ومجهزة بكل ماتحتاجه من ادوات و حديثة البناء و الاثاث راقي وتمتاز بالهدوء والامان
The place was amazing- we extend our stay!
좋아요
Địa điểm rất tiện di chuyển và nhiều hàng quán gần kế bên. Chị Hương rất thân thiện, vui vẻ và luôn sẵn sàng giúp đỡ.
Hi vọng lần tới ghé Hà Nội tôi vẫn chọn Về Quê để nghỉ ngơi trong chuyến đi của mình.Mọi thứ gọn gàng,sạch sẽ,thuận tiện và nhiệt tình 💕
Cảm ơn c Hương và Em Vy đã giúp đỡ mình rất tận tình. Hy vọng nếu có cơ hội sẽ gặp lại mn trong tgian tới

The owner and Huong was very sweet and helpful! Out of all my Airbnb trips, this is probably the best one! Great location too! Although it's in the Old Quarter, it's tucked in an alley that's very quiet. You can park your motorbike inside too. I will definitely stay here again and will recommend to friends and family.

Loved our stay at Veque Villas ! The apartment was very clean and exactly as seen in the pictures. It’s also in a good location, where you can easily walk to the main attractions in Hanoi. Hương however is the highlight of this place - she’s so lovely and so friendly and couldn’t do enough for us. Can’t recommend the apartment and Hương enough.
Vị trí thuận tiện di chuyển, gần trung tâm. Phòng sạch sẽ. Mình đã có trải nghiệm rất tuyệt cùng bạn tại đây

Phòng rộng, sạch sẽ, có cửa sổ khá thoáng.
Chị Hương rất nhiệt tình, thân thiện, quan tâm tới tụi mình.

Mình có nhận phòng và dc 1 chị quản gia tên là Hương hay Phương gì đó mình quên mất tên huhu c ý rất nhiệt tình hỗ trợ mình khi check in, khi gặp sự cố trục trặc về kỹ thuật c cũnh rất nhiệt tình và nhanh chóng khắc phục cho mình. 🥰 10d service

Huong is a great host , take care of my need . She is very helpful and caring. Her sincerity is very impressive. She has a clean house and the location is great , nice residential area . Huong deserves a 5*.
If I ever come back to Ha Noi , I will definitely stay in her place . I wish her all the best .

The host received us very warmly and took our luggage to the second floor. There is also laundry service here, which I think is very convenient. The facilities in the room are all complete. I think the cost performance is very high. I will recommend this place to everyone.
如果您正在尋找河內一個家外之家，那就對了！一踏進這家旅館，浴室有浴缸，在胡志明待了幾天的疲憊頓時煙消雲散，我感到無比輕鬆自在。房東Huong總是笑容滿面，熱情周到。她笑容滿面、積極向上的態度讓我們的住宿體驗無比溫暖！地理位置優越，同一條街上有很多餐飲和休閒場所，真是太棒了。我在這裡住了三天，推薦給大家！

Had a wonderful time at Veque. We got room 204 and it was exactly how it was in the photos. The host was very friendly and responsive in the chats. Love the face there is a dedicated space to keep your luggage and a sofato rest in case you reach early or want to explore the city after check out and don't need to carry it around. There is also a washing machine and dryer available to use which came in very handy for us. Having Netflix is a great touch to relax at the room after a long day of exploring Hanoi.  Overall great experience!

I can give them 100 stars if possible. They are very accommodating. The room and public area are clean. They even let us to use a room where we can stay after our tour in Halong Bay and even use the bathroom on 2nd floor in last building. Very generous. They have drop off luggage where you can store your luggages before or after your check in. The host helped us to carry our luggages too.

worth every penny we spent on this booking. Host was very proactive helped us on smooth check in process the property was approiate with the given description. Overall had a wonderful experience with stay and my time at this place!!

We had an amazing stay at Veque Villa Hanoi! The place was aesthetic, super clean, with cold aircon and just a short walk to all the main spots. But what truly made our stay special was the warm hospitality of Huong. She was always so pleasing, sweet, and helpful, making sure we felt welcome and at home from the moment we arrived. Her genuine kindness added a personal touch that made all the difference! Highly recommended to anyone visiting Hanoi!

My stay at Veque Villa was awesome! Miss Huong , my host, went beyond helpful in making my stay an enjoyable experience! Actually I wanted to stay longer but her room was booked! I highly recommend staying at Veque Villa a beautiful French Colonial villa! Beautiful section of Hanoi too!!
Stay was very comfortable. Huong was very helpful and always had a smile on her face. She made us feel at home even though there was language barrier between us. She took really good care of us.
Thank you for a fantastic stay, it was just what we needed after we arrived in Hanoi, a real piece of calm and quiet. Hueng was so helpful and even did our laundry which was much appreciated.

2階の部屋で、周りもうるさくなかったのでリモートワークにも集中できたし、夜もぐっすり休めた。
ベッドとバスルームは十分な広さだが、それ以外のスペースは広くない。冷蔵庫とキッチンは部屋の外に3部屋共同のものがあった。
Huongさんは、チェックイン時の水の用意、洗濯のサービス、タオルの交換など熱心に対応してくれた。笑顔と声掛けも、とても好印象だった。総合的にとてもよいステイだった。機会があれば、また利用したい。
phòng rất đẹp và yên tĩnh. dịch vụ rất tốt, nhiệt tình

Very clean and comfortable room in a great area of Hanoi, around a 10/15 minute walk from the lake. Friendly staff and on site washing facilities was a big plus. Felt safe and secure,  had filtered water available and there are some really good food places nearby. Fully reccomend and would definitely stay again, thanks!

We hadden een erg fijn verblijf tijdens onze eerste stop in Vietnam. Op voorhand kregen we al wat tips voor Hanoi en kregen we duidelijke instructies over de check-in. Dat was erg handig, want we kwamen laat op de avond aan. Toen we aankwamen waren we aangenaam verrast. Huong had voor ons de kamer klaargemaakt. Alles was heel proper en netjes. Het appartement was erg rustig gelegen. Op 20 minuuutjes wandelen stonden we in Old Quarter. Dankjewel voor het aangename verblijf!

Veque Villa was such a calm and lovely place to stay. It’s in a quieter part of Hanoi but still close enough to the Old Quarter to get around easily. The instructions to reach the place were super clear, and it was very easy to find. Ms. Huong and the host was amazing - so responsive even before check-in and throughout my stay. She helped with everything, from an early check-in to connecting me with a great local for bike rentals. The space itself was exactly as described, and I really felt at ease here. They were also kind enough to be flexible with my checkout. Total recommendation if you want a smooth, peaceful stay that's still well-connected to the city

Nous ne pouvions pas imaginer mieux pour notre premier séjour à Hanoï.
Huong a été très agréable, et répond très rapidement à nos messages.
Elle très arrangeante et attentionnée.
Nous ne pouvons que recommander cet endroit!
Merci encore

chỗ ở tuyệt vời, vị trí trung tâm và rất tốt
phòng nằm trên tầng 4 và có thể hơi khó di chuyển nếu bạn mang nhiều hành lý

Trevi’s place was great, very clean and accessible. He was very responsive and always had suggestions on what to explore in the area. He was also kind enough to accommodate late check-in and early check-out. Thanks, Trevi!

I had a pleasant stay at Trevi's place. The accommodation was as described and overall okay to stay in. The location was convenient, and I was able to get around easily.
Trevi was a friendly and responsive host, always quick to communicate and helpful throughout my visit. I appreciated the smooth check-in and clear instructions.
第一次来越南，房东是个很友善的新朋友。居住环境不差，而且就在老城区闹市区。吃的玩的喝的都跟便捷，因为是新房东虽然有一点点不足。但不妨碍房东的工作非常迅速以及友好，顺便说一下，房东是个很帅的小伙子
一个优秀的住宿体验使我对越南的印象深刻，我推荐该住宿，如果我下次来到河内还会再来，房主的早餐很棒，精致美味。
Great location and friendly host. Slightly noisy surroundings.
很好的房东
好
Phòng sạch sẽ, chủ home hỗ trợ nhiệt tình
Very cosy room with all you need for a few days. Very close to everything. Would recommend and would come back!
Very cute space! It was just what I needed. Check-in was easy and communication with the host was also good. No complaints!
The place is near to good places and the room is really good, will definitely book again if ever im coming back to Hanoi!!
Best hospitality the host is supper supportive for guest for any request
It was an awesome staycation☺️👌
좋았어요
Not thing

Chỗ ở nhỏ xinh, decor có gu và rất sạch sẽ. Chủ nhà dễ thương, hỗ trợ nhanh chóng khi cần. Ở đây đi bộ ra khu phố cổ hay hồ Gươm đều tiện, khá lý tưởng cho mấy bạn thích khám phá Hà Nội kiểu chậm rãi.

Dzung and Tahy’s place is beautifully designed with a very aesthetic interior. It was spotless and located right in the heart of the bustling Hanoi Old Quarter super convenient! They were very responsive and provided a detailed, helpful guide that made finding the place easy, even with the small alley walk. The home feels like a hidden gem tucked right into the city. I’ll definitely stay here again when I come back to Vietnam! Highly recommend. 🌟

The apartment was nice. It has enough space for us and was walkable to Hoàn Kiem lake and many attractions in the Old quarter. The instructions on how to find the apartment was easy to follow. Comfy bed and strong WiFi signal.
We had a storm with torrential rain in that caused a leak in the roof. The host was quick to respond to our message and sent someone over the next morning to fix it.

We stayed here for 4 days and really enjoyed the Airbnb. Its got a nice location and you can walk everywhere or take a grab if you need. The apartment is very homey- we were impressed with the intelligent way the interior design was done. It has a loft for extra people and a good table for working (we had to work remotely full time during our stay). The shower is great and the bathroom corner is cleverly integrated in the apartment. They also had a washing machine :) I recommend this place and will definitely try to return !

Hanoi Soul Stay on Hang Bai Street is honestly the perfect spot if you’re visiting Hanoi. The location is unbeatable, right in the city center with cafes, shops and famous sights just a short walk away, yet the place itself feels calm and cozy. The room was super clean, well-designed and had lovely little details that made it feel like home. I especially appreciated how much natural light it had. The host was incredibly welcoming and helpful with great local tips, which made exploring the city so easy. If you want a comfortable, charming stay in the heart of Hanoi, I highly recommend this place.

Самый главный плюс - расположение жилья. Рядом с Old Quarter, но при этом в стороне от шума и суеты. Жилье подойдет тем, кто хочет окунуться в местную жизнь и прочувствовать вьетнамский колорит. Удобные кровати, стиральная машинка и кухня. Хозяин был всегда на связи и дал очень четкие инструкции по заселению

I had a truly lovely stay. The location is perfect—right in the center of the Old Quarter, I can actually get a peaceful night’s sleep (a rare find in Hanoi!). You’re just steps away from amazing street food, cafes, and all the energy of the city, yet the apartment itself is calm, clean, and incredibly comfortable.
What really made the experience special was the warm hospitality of the couple who run the place. They were so kind, thoughtful, and genuinely caring—always ready to help with tips, recommendations, or just a friendly chat. You can feel that they put their heart into every detail.
If you want to experience the soul of Hanoi while having a quiet, cozy retreat to come back to, this is the place. I’d stay here again in a heartbeat.

Merveilleux séjour ! L’appartement de Dzung et Thy est parfait : il est en plein cœur d’Hanoi mais permet tout de même un séjour calme et paisible, au milieu de l’effervescence de la ville. Il est également propre et soigné, de bon goût et très bien agencé : on s’y sent vraiment comme chez soi !
Malgré tous ces points déjà forts positifs, le point fort du séjour a été la gentillesse de Dzung et Thy, qui sont là pour vous à chaque étape du séjour, de l’arrivée au départ. Nous avons même eu la chance de boire un café avec eux, nous permettant d’échanger et de mettre un visage sur cette gentillesse ! Ils n’hésiteront d’ailleurs pas à vous donner tous leurs conseils et recommandations pour le reste de votre voyage au Vietnam, ce qui est très précieux ☺️
Une merveilleuse expérience, j’espère avoir la chance de revenir chez eux un jour
N’hésitez pas : si vous passez par Hanoï, c’est ici que vous devez séjourner ! Merci pour tout :)
入职提示简洁明了
Chỗ ở khá ổn, căn phòng được trang hoàng và dọn dẹp khá sạch sẽ, ngăn nắp. Phòng phù hợp cho cặp đôi và thích hợp cho 2 người trở xuống. Chủ nhà thân thiện, hỗ trợ nhiệt tình.

phòng sạch sẽ, gọn gàng, giống ảnh
anh chủ thân thiện nhiệt tình

Great deal for its price! The room looks like in an old building but when you enter, it’s modern and well maintained. It got everything you need for a short stay and I love how clean it was.
Bathroom is a bit small but room is just right size for two people for a short stay. Quyet gave clear instructions to how to get in and is very responsive. Definitely recommended.
giá tốt mà gần trung tâm, dễ đi chuyển vào hoàn kiếm

A well managed place to stay. Clean and tidy place. No free water available and a bit far from old quarter but you will get bus / grab right outside of the street.
Mattress is not very comfortable but they might replace it.
Place have some cutlery as well as cooking utensils.
I wish they could have a door on their bathroom

Quyet was very helpful from the moment I booked the room. The place was properly clean and also quiet. I guess the latter was the case cause it was 25mins walk from the city centre but that was totally fine with me as I had the chance to experience the local way of life on my way back and forth from the city center when not using a bike driver.
Quyet’s place is very close to the City center and is very affordable. It was spotless and loved the concept of having the tiny kitchen in the room :) found that very useful!

Sehr gute Preis Leistung, gute Kommunikation. Man bekommt was einem versprochen wird :) ich habe hier 3 Nächte Zwischenstopp gemacht und dafür war es super geeignet. Vor allem die authentische Umgebung ohne jeden Tourismus hat mir sehr gut gefallen!
Phòng rất tuyệt so với giá tiền. Cực kỳ sạch sẽ.

The location is peaceful. Accessible and near the city center. The room is bright, spacious, and has all amenities mentioned. It's such a great deal!
Quyet is very accommodating and responds right away. Thank you for letting us check in early! We're looking forward to check out your other listings when we go back to Hanoi 😊
Ok con dê

The place looks exactly like on the pictures . Beautiful morning sun, very comfortable matrace, strong ac, hot water. A market street in just 5min walking, where you can buy many things. Not far from the center, nice and quiet side street. I would definitly stay again. (Only downside, for people with light sleep, the fridge is pretty loud, so I used earplugs, and I could not manage the stove which was very strong and burnt some of my food, so cooking was a bit limited)

Lit un peu inconfortable
Location a 30 minutes de marche des coins plus touristiques
Quyet nous a permis de laisser nos sacs après le check out
ありがとうございました
Good place to stay when you visit hanoi
Quyet is a nice host. He responds quickly and gives clear instructions. It was a good stay.
Very clean place, all the amenities are there, great pricing compare to nearby places, highly recommend
Nơi ở thoải mái, sạch sẽ, c Quỳnh và c Hiền thân thiện hỗ trợ nhiệt tình, dọn dẹp sạch sẽ take care mình liên tục trong 2 ngày ở đây, không có gì để chê, mình sẽ quay lại ❤️

Đây là lần đầu tiên mình tự đặt phòng và đi một mình tại Hà Nội và cảm thấy rất an tâm. Chị Quỳnh (host) rất chủ động và nhiệt tình. Vì mình có việc nên bay sớm, và đáp trước giờ nhận phòng, chỉ định ghé qua để cất vali thôi mà may đúng lúc chị vừa dọn dẹp phòng xong nên cho mình nhận phòng để tiện nghỉ ngơi luôn. Rất chu đáo ạ. Phòng sạch sẽ và yên tĩnh, mát mẻ nữa, rất hợp gout mình. Lần sau lại đi HN chắc chắn mình sẽ tìm đến Veque đầu tiên. Cảm ơn chị Quỳnh nhiều.

I had a great 2-day stay in Hanoi at this lovely Airbnb. The location is fantastic—just a short walk to the Lake, Market and surrounded by plenty of restaurants and hotels. The host was extremely responsive and helpful, assisting us with booking our trips to Ha Long Bay and Ninh Binh. The room was clean, comfortable, and exactly as shown in the pictures. Overall, a smooth and pleasant stay. Highly recommend!
Phòng siêu xinh, y như hình, ở trong hẻm nhưng cũng rất dễ tìm. Phòng sạch sẽ đầy đủ tiện nghi giá thành lại phải chăng so với vị trí, mình sẽ ở đây nếu có dịp quay lại HN

Very nice staffs and specially Anna very kind and responsive and they tooked the responsibilities to finish our laundry. And thanks for the salt hehe until nexttime
-anz ph

Anna and suny made our stay amazing , they provide filtered water constantly so you don’t have to buy bottles and they did our laundry and ironed for us …without us asking , there was Netflix and the pillows were so comfy! The location is the best it can be and we knew our way around after three days it was so central!
Loved our stay and they are amazing lovely hosts ❤️🥰
Thank you …I will be back 😂
Phòng ốc sạch sẽ giống như mô tả, tất cả đều rất tốt tuy nhiên phòng có vẻ k cách âm tốt lắm nên hơi ồn 1 chút
phòng sạch sẽ rộng nhưng vệ sinh chung bên ngoài, trước sân đang làm nên khá bụi và không đc để xe, chủ nhà nhiệt tình phòng ổn

가격은 진짜 저렴하고 좋았습니다
호스트도 친절하고 주변에 관광지가 많아서 두루두루 잘 즐기다 갑니다

Des hôtes aux petits soins ! Une bonne localisation, tout es parfait
Vous avez de l’eau tous les jours à disposition! + un service de lavage inclus
Ils se tiennent toujours à disposition et vous recommandent des excursions !
Je cherchais également une SIM, ils ont fait venir le monsieur à l’hôtel pour qu’il me le fasse
Vraiment des amours 🥰
Je recommande
Luna 😊

We really enjoyed our stay at Veque. The apartment looked exactly like the photos and the bathroom was perfect (and cleaned throughout the day). A HUGE thank you to Anna for all of her kindness during our stay, including suggestions of what to do. We would stay here again in a heartbeat!

Me and my partner loved staying at Veque homestay, everything was exactly as advertised and we wouldn’t have changed anything. The location was great, and everything was within walking distance. The room we had booked looked amazing and was super comfortable. As well as this, our host was very accommodating and helped us out so much. We felt right at home.
This accommodation made a great start to our Vietnam adventure and we could not recommend it enough!!
Thank you for having us!!!

Very nice stay within walking distance to all the main areas of the old quarter. Very helpful hosts who let us check in early and also assisted with laundry which was very helpful for us as only had 1 full day! Would stay again!

The place is so beautiful and clean. The room - love it, the kitchen- love it. The place looks just like the pictures. Whole place is super comfy. Veque was very helpful throughout our stay. We needed to leave our luggage for two days, he was kind enough to keep the luggage at their place. We will surely stay there next time for longer period. Overall an 11/10 stay.
chủ nhà thân thiện, vị trí chỗ ở trung tâm mà giá cả phải chăng
very great place to stay. very supportive host Mr Vaque and Anna! free water refill and use of washing machine at urgent requirement! very positive host! Just go for it.

Here is the 6th star :⭐️
Great service , great location, great accommodation.
I got the free opportunity of a late check-out so a big +++
Lovely place to stay, well worth the money! Bathroom is always super clean. Would stay again.

Es war ein sehr schönes Zimmer. Etwas versteckt in der dritten Reihe aber gut zu finden. Wir haben einen Flughafentransport dazugebucht. Das hat auch super geklappt.
Das einzige manko ist die Hellhörigkeit im ersten Stock sowie die Helligkeit. Das Bad war sehr klein. Wir dachten es wäre mit auf dem Zimmer was leider nicht der Fall ist.
Die Kommunikation ging schnell und uns wurde jede Frage schnell beantwortet.
Im Ganzen hat es uns sehr gut gefallen vor allem für den kurzen Aufenthalt war die Lage sehr gut und es war alles zu Fuß zu erreichen.

Wenn ihr in Hanoi seid… die Beste Wahl überhaupt. Die Wohnung sieht genau aus wie auf den Bildern, alles ist super schön eingerichtet und sauber. Die Lage ist perfekt, in Zentrumsnähe und doch umgeben von der Einheimischen Kultur. Jederzeit wieder!!!

Absolutely perfect value for the price. Room was super clean and the bed smelled good. Host was very communicative and thoughtful. The only downside was that the room has no natural light. Great stay overall!

Just like the photos, the room is very clean with a comfy bed. About 20 mins walk to main old town area, so many cafes and restaurants nearby. This room is located on the first floor by the reception so are exposed to more noise and traffic compared to the other rooms. Good communication with the host and was able to assist when needed

I stayed for one night. It was a very clean and comfortable stay. Quanyh and Linh were both very helpful and kind. I did check in very late at night and it was a little hard to find in the dark, but Veque was very responsive 😊
Cần báo trước phòng wc ở ngoài

Một trải nghiệm khá hay ho!!!
Bạn chủ home luôn hỗ trợ nhiệt tình trong việc check in và giờ check out cũng rất linh động. 10 điểm cho bạn chủ home nha!!!
Home mình ở khá yên tĩnh, lối đi riêng nên thấy rất thoải mái.

Second time back to Olive, everything is still great. Perfect location you can go to the old town easily. The hosts are very enthusiastic to support me with flexible check-in. If you are looking for a place to rest after a long day visiting the old town, this will be the perfect choice. Highly recommended

this airbnb was totally worth the money spent. it was a duplex with huge living room on the ground floor and bedroom at 1st flr. Most importantly it was a 5 minutes walk to the Train street and old quarter. I loved it and will definitely visit again. The hosts were also very helpful in providing list of things to do nearby.

Afløbet i badet var tilstoppet og der var ikke noget hjælp at hente hos vært.
Aircondition var meget højlydt. Sov med ørepropper
Kunne bruge en affugter til afdeling for soveværelse

We had an excellent time staying at Olive Garden. We actually extended our stay twice. The surroundings were a peaceful sanctuary in an otherwise noisy and manic place. We walked to many of the attractions in Hanoi. There is a street market within a few minutes walk. We could buy tofu, vegetables and fruits.
The house is spacious. We were happy to have separate living and sleeping spaces. We used the kitchen to make meals. The television is large and good quality. The bathroom has two fans and the water heated very quickly. We had plenty of towels. The air conditioning was effective and kept us cool.
This was a great place to stay in Hanoi. Highly recommended if you like peace and quiet!

really beautiful place, had the perfect four nights here. the host was lovely and very responsive and helpful as it was quite a last minute booking. def recommend staying here, such a beautiful property in a peaceful street. ✨

Thank you so much Olive Garden! We had the most incredible stay, for our first time in Hanoi 😍🇻🇳 The location is impeccable - 5 minute walk to the iconic train street & also make sure to try the this hidden gem two doors down from Olive Garden - Bánh Mì Ngọc Thuốc! We loved everything & the host was so helpful, lovely & responsive. Thank you we will be back!!

Das Apartment ist superschön eingerichtet. Es ist in einer ruhigen kleinen Straße mitten in Hanoi!! Sehr liebevoll eingerichtet und super ausgestattet. Direkt nebenan gibt es ein supergutes kleines Restaurant mit einer fantastischen Reisnudelbowl "Bun bo nam bo" und gutem Cappuccino! Wir haben den Aufenthalt sehr genossen und denken dass das Apartment für 2 Personen sehr comfortabel ist, aber für ein paar Nächte auch zu viert funktioniert. Es war die ruhigste Straße die wir in 2 Wochen Hanoi erlebt haben... 😊
Had a wonderful stay at Olive Garden! Host was very responsive, helpful and proactive. Love this beautiful home. Very spacious, beautiful yet cozy. Will definitely be back.

We enjoyed our stay here. It was conveniently located and walkable to many attractions. (Prison, Train Street, lots of restaurants) There was some construction noise in the morning but the host warned us about that, and it wasn't a big deal because we got up early anyways. There is a market on the street and they also have the outdoor workout equipment right outside the apartment which we made use of. I feel like the kitchen and bathroom areas could use a better clean. The hosts were very responsive and friendly and my boyfriend had fun feeding the fish haha.

I had a real good stay in the Olive Garden apartment. The place is really well located and in the evening it is nice and quiet. The apartment is very well equipped and communication with the hosts very quick and easy.
I really recommend this place if you are looking for a central but quiet place in Hanoi.

A nice place to enjoy your weekend. I love the garden view and feeding the fish. The homestay is near by city center and the famous train road street. However, it quite private so I really enjoy my business trip and finish my job smoothly. Thank Tung for supporting me and your warm welcome gift. I’ll come back wth my boyfriend on our next trip to Hanoi ^^
Không gian thoải mái, chủ nhà thân thiện support nhiệt tình

Hidden gem in a bustling city of Hanoi, close to the Old Quarter and Hoan Kiem lake but still private during the night.
House had yard view very beautiful in the morning and chill vibe, i love to feed the gold fish they are lovely. Tung was super nice and accommodating host and when I need help he answered me immediately, ensured my stay was perfect. Feel like home when i stay here
Highly recommended staying here while in Hanoi!
Phòng rất chill đặc biệt là khoảng sân trước nhà.
The location is very good. Although there was a small problem, I am grateful to the host who dealt with it quickly!
Very nice location and large spacious place. Very close to all the main attractions, but tucked away in a quiet side street
The place is very comfortable, clean, the space is extremely luxurious and comfortable. Highly recommend

Fint sted i midten af Hanoi. Gå afstand til mange ting.
Stedet var beskidt og ikke rengjort da vi kom, men det skrev vi med det samme til værten og de fiksede det inden for en time. De sagde at det var et problem med rengørings firmaet, men ærgerligt at ankomme til en bolig der ikke var ren.
Ellers et okay ophold.

This appartment is nicely decorated, very well situated, the bed is confy and we had a great communication with the host who was very responsive. The bathroom needs a little update but appart of that, we had a nice stay.
We loved the location of OliveGarden. Really close to train street and old town but really quiet though. Nice coffee shops and restaurants around. We would recommend Olive Garden anytime
중심지에 위치하면서도 저녁에는 조용해서 좋았습니다. 인근에 시장과 식당 까페 등이 가깝습니다. 하지만 청결하고 깨끗한 화장실을 원한다면 추천하지 않습니다. 1층 공간에서는 작은도마뱀새끼를 보았습니다. ㅠㅠ 머무는 동안 불안했고 편안하지 않았습니다.
Chỗ ở tốt, gần trung tâm

Cozy and very calm place for weekend getaway! Still walkable to everything in old quarter (museum, food street, train street) but quiet at night good to relax.
The space is aesthetic with chill vibe, all hosts are very quick to respond my message.
Highly recommend !!!
Chỗ ở sạch sẽ, đẹp và yên tĩnh, rất an ninh, thuận tiện di chuyển đến trung tâm, có hỗ trợ giữ hành lí. Cảm ơn chị chủ nhà vì nơi ở tốt ạ 🫶🏻

I live in Australia and had a surprise visit home, but for personal reasons I needed a place to stay. And this is the beautiful place for you to choose, everything is great and I would like to thank the host (Mrs.Phuong) and her husband (Mr.Tung) for accepting me to stay for 2 nights and their enthusiastic help.
非常喜欢这里，去往河内著名景点也很方便，Phuong非常热情，有疑问随时解答，每天的早餐也超棒🫶🏼

超级喜欢的一处住宿，走出去非常多卖水果的小摊，去老城区步行就很方便，周围也有随处可见的咖啡店
Phuong特别好，非常漂亮，超级热情，入住第一天就继续续住了，朋友如果要来旅游一定会推荐
The place was great! Phuong was super helpful with check in and communicating throughout the stay!
L'emplacement est très bien, pas de touristes, familial et pour autant, très proche du centre-ville
Mình rất thích ở đây, sẽ đặt lại trong lần sau
Phòng nhỏ nhắn xinh xắn, đầy đủ tiện nghi, phù hợp với giá tiền ♥️
Bạn quản lý hỗ trợ rất nhiệt tình. Phòng mới, đầy đủ tiện. Tuy nhiên cần cải thiện nhiều hơn về mùi hương. Với giá cả như vậy thì mình đánh giá cao❤️
Phòng mới còn nghe mùi mới luôn. Phòng như hình, đi lại thuận tiện. Lần sau ra vẫn book lại hihi

I had a very quick selection bcoz I could not contact to the host of what I chose before. It turned out to be very good.
A small room but full equipment and tidy. The host was fast and there is a maid who was friendly and willing to help.
Tốt
Tốt

Thank you so much for an amazing stay! Your place was incredibly clean and well-maintained. The room was so clean and spotless, and I could see that you put a lot of effort into keeping everything fresh and tidy.
I also felt very safe during my stay. The home had all the necessary safety features, and the neighborhood was peaceful and secure. It made my trip even more comfortable and enjoyable.
This is truly the best place to stay in Hanoi! Your care and attention to detail are outstanding. You are an excellent host, and I would highly recommend your place to others!

I had a wonderful stay at The Little Hanoi Apartment! It was located near the central malls in the Cau Giay district. The room was clean, spacious, and beautifully decorated with artwork as the picture on the app. The host was helpful and went above and beyond to ensure my comfort. I would highly recommend this place to anyone visiting Hanoi.

The apartment is incredibly clean and well-organized. The host is super friendly, thoughtful, and accommodating. The view of the street is amazing, and the location is unbeatable—right in the center with cafes, restaurants, and supermarkets all around. It’s very convenient for sightseeing in Hanoi. I’ll definitely come back and recommend it to my friends!
房间设计很美，房东热情友善，推荐，wifi很快，推荐

Die Lage der Unterkunft ist nicht besonders gut. Die Altstadt zum Beispiel ist ungefähr 30 Minuten mit dem Auto entfernt. Im Apartment war ein undefinierbarer Geruch der störte. Außerdem ist das Bett sehr durchgelegen und fällt in die Mitte ein und ist deshalb nicht bequem. Die Dusche ist sehr unpraktisch verbaut, sodass das
gesamte Bad (Waschbecken, Toilette) nass wird und der Abfluss war verstopft. Das Interior ist veraltet und die Wände weisen Flecken auf. Wir können die Unterkunft leider nicht weiterempfehlen.

I stayed here for 4 days and it was the great experience! The room is clean, kitchen has every amenity you want to cook, lighting is good, getting sunlight is a plus!
The A/C also includes heating mode and it works every well in cold weather.
Safety is also worth mentioning since everyone needs a passcode to enter into the apartment building.
Parking inside the apartment is also available.

This can be your pick if you would like an accommodation away from Old Quarter, yet close to good restaurants and cafes. I suggest the guest to plan your timing wisely as peak hours can take you a longer travel time into the Old Quarters.
We personally liked the privacy and quietness at night, that it allowed us enough rest and sleep as needed.

The apartment was clean, cozy, and in a great location, close to everything I needed. What made the experience even better was the host—they were so kind and upgraded my room for free, which was such a nice surprise! They were super responsive and helpful, always making sure I was comfortable and had everything I needed. It really felt like a home away from home. I would definitely stay here again and recommend it to anyone visiting Hanoi!

Super worth every penny! The host is amazing and understanding. It’s so convenient to go up because of elevator. The apartment is so clean and it feels like we’re the first people who stay there 😍 Everything feels new! I love the bathroom the most ❤️
Chỗ ở mới, sạch sẽ, đủ tiện nghi, giờ giấc linh hoạt…

Dear Reader,
Our experience with The Little Hanoi Airbnb apartment was a success.
The room was peaceful and comfortable. The window helped to make the space feel open. There were food spots near by and we were a 20 min taxi to the old town area.
The host was responsive and proactive while we were there.
This was a great experience. And I would recommend this Little Hanoi apartment.
Phòng ốc xinh xắn dễ thương, ấm cúng. Rất đáng trải nghiệm
I had an amazing stay, the place was clean and the hosts were always there for me to help.
The location is central, place is very comfortable and it was a great experience. When I back in HANOI I will consider this Airbnb again. 😊
Clean and warm design, walking distance with a lot of restaurants, coffee. easy to check in

Great air bnb with everything you need. Very friendly owner, good bed. The room smelled a bit funny, but the owner did place air freshener so I guess they're working it. Very far from the old quarter which is not great. Everything together great place though!
Đỉnh đỉnh đỉnh :)))
Một căn hộ nhỏ, gọn gàng và vô cùng riêng tư. Nằm vị trí rất thuận tiện để đi bộ, chỉ mất vài phút để đến Nhà Hát Lớn. Chủ nhà thân thiện và nhiệt tình. Rất đáng để trải nghiệm

The apartment is beautifully designed, cozy, centrally located, within walking distance to places like the Opera House, Hoan Kiem Lake, the museum, and there are many delicious restaurants and nice cafes around the apartment. The host is very welcoming and quickly answers questions about sightseeing and travel. We will come back if we have any chance to visit Hanoi.

The apartment is centrally located, next to the Opera House. The balcony overlooks a beautiful street, you can see the beautiful city of Ha Noi. Amenities include Netflix TV, washing machine, and strong wifi. Thank you, we will be back soon.
The place is centrally located, next to many attractions within walking distance. But it is very quiet and private. We had a wonderful tour of Ha Long recommended by the host. Thank you very much

The apartment is very beautiful, the design style is imbued with the old Hanoi style. We enjoyed our vacation wonderfully. The apartment location is very central, wherever you go, the washing machine is also a very good facility. The kitchen can cook simply. The host is very enthusiastic in advising delicious and beautiful restaurants around the apartment. Highly recommended!!!

View phòng thấy được tàu chạy ngang cũng phải gần chụp lần/ngày ah. Chị Lan quản lí stay thân thiện lắm ạ huhu, chỉ tụi e quán ăn ngon gần đó với siêu siêu supportive, check in check out alo 1c là c có mặt giúp tụi e liền lun. Siêu siêu rec!!

1 căn phòng với đầy đủ tiện nghi, với bộ cửa sổ rộng chúng ta có thể ngắm nhìn những đoàn tàu hỏa đi ngang qua. Rất phù hợp với việc nghỉ dưỡng, tìm lại bản thân sau những bận rộn đời sống.
Chị Lan, ng đón tiếp thực sự chu đáo và quan tâm đến việc lưu trú của bạn.
Điểm 100 cho tất cả

Ngay từ lúc bước vào, mình đã biết quyết định chọn chỗ này là quá đúng đắn. Dù phải leo mấy tầng cao (may mà có anh đẹp trai tốt bụng giúp bê hành lý), nhưng căn phòng hoàn toàn xứng đáng. Siêu sạch sẽ, cảm giác mới tinh như vừa khai trương. View nhìn thẳng ra đường tàu, đúng chuẩn “đỉnh của chóp”, ngồi trong phòng vẫn có thể chill và ngắm nhìn Hà Nội theo một cách rất riêng. Xung quanh thì khỏi nói, quán xá nhiều vô kể, từ cà phê đến đồ ăn địa phương đều đủ cả. Một trải nghiệm Airbnb không thể nào quên!
Phòng sạch đẹp, Chị Lan làm việc rất nhiệt tình, tận tâm và chu đáo. Mình rất hài lòng.

Tuyệt vời, xứng đáng với số tiền bỏ ra.
Không chỉ khu vực ở mà khu vực xung quanh cũng rất nên thơ

I had a wonderful stay at Veque, although the room is high up with lots of stairs, the downside stops there. Everything else about a stay is as perfect it can be, especially with the help of Lan, the cleaner who make sure to help us with everything I can possibly need and beyond. She also took care of our laundry pretty swiftly as requested.
房源在一个人咖啡厅的楼上，阁楼比较高，如果有非常沉重的行李可能需要三思，是一个很可爱的阁楼。入住时候接到了非常热情的招待，房间整洁，住处附近也有很丰富的活动和吃食，出入非常方便。
後悔只住了三晚，如果可以，真想多住一段時間，在河內最愉快最美好的住宿體驗，lan的服務真的很親切和貼心，每天幫我們洗衣服，還有提供純淨水給我們！熱情好客，還送我們離開！房間比圖片還要漂亮和乾淨！地理位置絕佳，可以步行打卡周圍景點！十分方便，房間的床非常舒服，空調太棒了，制冷效果非常棒，雖然火車經過的時候有點噪音，但是也是一道很美的風景線，在房間就可以看到小火車，很棒的體驗！

our stay was wonderful. they were very responsive and always checked we were doing well. Lan did an amazing job and had the place very clean. it was also very walkable and a great location to stay. would book it again

My partner and I had an amazing stay here. The apartment is truly beautiful and well worth the money. It was extremely clean thanks to the lovely Lan. Lan was so helpful and took great care of us. We highly recommend this apartment.
非常好的一次住宿体验，就在火车旁，别具风情，并且不是很吵。房间设计很有品味，Lan是个非常热情友好的人，她详细地介绍了房间入住规则，并且把房间打扫得非常干净。希望能多住几天！

We had a lovely stay at Veque. Ms. Lan was so welcoming and made sure we had everything we needed. She was always available and responsive and even offered us complimentary laundry services. The apartment is centrally located, well decorated and very clean. The apartment is a bit noisy due to its location but we slept very well and sleep masks and earplugs are available if needed. Highly recommended !

This apartment was the perfect place for our cozy time in Hanoi. It was so beautiful, clean and a special and cozy place. Perfect for a couple wanting to be in the middle of everything. The owners even helped us with laundry and were helpful with everything we need. 10/10 would stay there again!! <3

It was a fantastic stay! Super proactive hosts who were always checking in on us, really appreciate all the help as well. Lan was great help too, making sure we were comfortable and that the place spotless :") thank you so much to everyone and we hope to get another stay when we're back! ☺️

This place was more than amazing Lan the host was the sweetest lady I’ve ever met, she left water in the fridge cleaned my clothes for me and the room was spotless. Air conditioner worked perfectly and there was a fan too plenty of space to leave clothes, there was soap and everything you need to cook a nice meal. If this place was priced at £100 I would pay it. Couldn’t have asked for more and the next time I’m in Hanoi I will make sure to stay here.

Excellent location, wonderful host that is so sweet. Home is really comfortable and clean. All the sheets, pillows and towels smelled like soap.
One thing to note though- the streets and trains can get noisy and the room doesn’t get pitch dark. They provide eye masks and ear plugs for this — which is great. But if you’re a sensitive sleeper, and don’t like using aforementioned, you may not be as comfortable as we were.

My partner Jack and I absolutely loved our stay here it was perfect, best shower we have had in Vietnam and super comfy bed. Cafe staff very helpful and make great coffee, easy walk to everywhere in the old quarter. A highlight was Lan she was so friendly and helpful a special new friend for us. We were sad to leave and will definitely be back next time we are in Hanoi. Thanks so much for having us definitely worth booking and very well priced. Lots of love Ella and Jack from New Zealand 🫶🏼 🇳🇿

My stay here is superb and phenomenal. I actually love my view from the window overlooking the train and don’t mind the noise. Downside are the stairs (LOL) since my room is at the 4th floor and its kind of a struggle when the weather is HOT and the frequent power interruption at night (literally just 2 seconds) but maybe not their fault since they explained it was due to the hot weather and the hanoi power system getting overloaded.
My stay here is superb because of LAN. She’s sooo kind and caring like a mother. She greets you with a smile and happily helps you on whatever you need. She deserves HUGE praises and she deserves a raise too :)) She even carried my luggage.

Helt fantastiskt boende. Hur fint som helst, bra läge med gångavstånd till ett flertal populära turistattraktioner. Lan har varit oerhört trevlig och hjälpsam under vår vistelse. Hit kommer vi definitivt komma tillbaka vid given möjlighet.

Wir haben uns in der stilvoll eingerichteten Einzimmerwohnung super wohl gefühlt. Alles war super sauber und besonders Lan, die uns am Anfang wahnsinnig herzlich begrüßt hat, hat unseren Aufenthalt versüßt! Sie hat immer super schnell auf unsere Nachrichten geantwortet,  hat sogar ein Restaurant für uns reserviert und uns, als es geregnet hat, einen Regenschirm hingestellt. Sehr aufmerksam und umsichtig :) Vielen Dank, wir können diese Unterkunft sehr weiterempfehlen! Auch wegen der super Lage.

Veque Maison is an excellent choice for Hanoi, central to the Old Quarter but just far enough away you don't deal with the same volume of traffic, pedestrians, and excessive noise. It's within walking distance to many of Hanoi's top attractions and has every type of food, clothing, electronic, and service/product offering imaginable.
Lan the housekeeper should have her name engraved over the door, this place wouldn't run half as well without her. The owners were very prompt and helpful with recommendations, local info, help with SIM, transport, and anything else you can think of as well.
If I could give it 10 stars I would, but 5 would be for Lan

Comfortable, stylish and well located (for those wanting to experience the Old Quarter and more local experience). The view is stunning, with the sunrise right in front of your window. Bed is large and comfortable, brilliant white towels are changed every day, there’s always a water, the air conditioner is new and well maintained. It’s all I needed — on top of that an amazing surprise, a laundry service which was very helpful on this trip. Cleaning lady is taking care of you with a lot of intention and the host checked in with me multiple times if I feel comfortable. The building is in front of train railway so it is noisy — you’re provided the earplugs and eye mask. My sleep is deep, so I personally had no problem, but you must be aware of this fact.  Plus — Lots of stylish and interesting coffee shops around. Thank you for everything!

It is a nice place, modern and clean. The cheerful cleaner Lan greeted us personally for check-in and made us feel welcome from the start. To reach the appartment, you need to walk through 3 floors of Kafa Coffee and then two more floors, which can be a little challenging with big lugagge.

This was a beautiful room, and Lan was amazing. She was so helpful and responsive.
The train goes by the room and it's quite loud, although we both slept straight through any noise on all 4 nights we stayed.
Would definitely stay again!

I really enjoyed my stay here. The room looked exactly like the pictures and everything was very clean. Nam was very friendly and helpful, as was the housekeeper. Great location with lots of Japanese restaurants in the area.

We loved our stay here! It was so great we ended up extending!!
Super clean and comfortable, love the layout of the space.
The housekeeping lady is absolutely lovely, so friendly and sweet.
Good location - super walkable to some nice cafes and beautiful restaurants. But also quiet and tucked away from the chaos.
We highly recommend Nam’s place!
(Check out the Japanese restaurant downstairs beside the entry, you won’t be disappointed!)

Honestly nothing bad to say about this place. Very clean, great minimal decor and very comfortable. The only thing is that the location is a bit far from the old quarter but grab is king and is very cheap anyway so we didn't really mind. Would wholeheartedly recommend this place!
Sạch sẽ và yên tĩnh. Nội thất tối giản, tiện nghi.

部屋はとても清潔で、立地も非常に良かったです。周りには美味しい日本食レストランやカフェが充実していて、過ごしていて飽きない場所でした。
また、Namさんにはとても親切な対応をしていただき、とても感謝しています。
ありがとうございました。
Hài lòng với căn hộ
Chỗ ở sạch sẽ, ấm cúng, đầy đủ tiện nghi, rất dễ tìm. Xung quanh có nhiều hàng đồ Nhật

honestly love this place! booked it last minute but it’s perfect for 2 people. clean rooms, only issue was the door was abit loose so abit hard to close but other than that everything was great! check in was quick & smooth, they even offer free laundry which is amazing for my long stay in Hanoi. It’s a 15min drive to Old Quarter on bike. And there’s a few convenient stores within walking distance. No complains! Would def stay here again~
Hỗ trợ nhiệt tình, phòng thoải mái ạ
Chủ nhà luôn phản hồi nhanh. Chị quản gia dễ mến và vui vẻ. Căn hộ gọn gàng, sạch sẽ, riêng tư. Tuy nhiên, có 1 lưu ý là nếu cần support mọi người phải nhắn tin order với chủ nhà.
La chambre paraissait plus grande en photo et les draps n’avaient pas été changés, le prix reste correct.
今回も快適に過ごせました、ありがとうございます。
コストパフォーマンスに優れており非常に快適です。
Phòng thoải mái lắm ạ
Như ngôi nhà thứ 2 ạ 🥰
ハウスキーパーの方がとても親しみやすかったです。質問があった際はすぐに回答をしてくれました。何度も延泊をさせてもらいましたが、丁寧にご対応をいただきありがとうございました。また利用させてください。
Trải nghiệm rất tuyệt
Very cozy accomodation. Wonderful host and housekeep, would definitely stay again!
하노이에 있는 숙소 중에 상당히 좋은 축에 속하는 숙소입니다.

아담하지만 깔끔한 숙소 입니다.
근처 맛있는 먹거리가 많습니다.
친절한 호스트
입니다.

Excelente lugar para estar, Hien fue muy amable con nosotras y nos ayudó mucho en nuestra estancia. El departamento tiene todo y está cerca de restaurantes y centros comerciales. Recomiendo este lugar el check in fue muy flexible y la comunicación excelente.

Great place but abit old, could use some renovation. But overall good quality.
The host answers straight away and the service is great!
Cozy room.
房东非常友善，我的航班比较早，在可能的情况下允许我提早入住了。房子是在居民区里，每次一从楼里出去的时候都有很多本地的居民坐在楼外面聊天休息，很local的感觉，相较于老城区这里会更安静没有那么多游客和商业氛围，更有本地人生活的气氛。这个房子的卧室窗户正好是一棵树，有红色的花，很好看。对于不想住在吵闹人杂的地方的人是很好的选择。
Ômai Homestay is a wonderful place for whoever looking for a “home” in a strange location. I have nothing to complain and definitely will come back to this “home” if I go to Hanoi 🧡

This Japanese style appartement was perfect, my girlfriend and I felt really confortable inside.
It’s close to major point of interest in the city and there is some nice cafe and restaurant nearby.
Everything was as mentioned in the description, don’t hesitate to book there.
Brian is a great host! He gave clear instructions about the apartment and his response to questions was quick and helpful. I would recommend this apartment to everyone who visits Hanoi! ;)

Omai’s place was perfect. Beautiful, clean and in a great location - only a 10min walk to old town.
They helped us with organising airport transfer and we had the most lovely driver. He even helped us with our bags to the room.
While we were staying, we arranged late check out due to having an overnight bus. They were nothing but accommodating and helpful to make this possible, my partner and I could not recommend this stay and the Omai’s team more.

Excellent Air BnB—the best one I’ve stayed at.  For the price I paid, it was worth every penny.  Clean, comfortable bed, cold ac, immaculately clean bathroom, good location, easy to get to.  Wonderful property.
