建物自体はいかにも地元の人の集合住宅で、ちょっとびっくりしますがそれはそれで味があって好きでした。中は本当に写真の通りで、清潔だし、エアコンも２台あってよかったです。
４階表記なのですが、日本人のカウントだと実際倍の階数上りますので、荷物が大きかったり重かったりすると大変かもしれません。

Clean, serene & perfect apartment. Thank you so much. Will definitely stay again! Recommend to anyone visiting Hanoi, especially who wants a little bit of peace, calm & comfort in such a vibrant busy city. ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

I had an amazing stay at this Airbnb! The apartment was exactly as pictured—beautiful, clean, and incredibly comfortable. Brian was super helpful and thoughtful throughout our stay. They were always quick to respond to any questions and even provided earplugs due to some construction going on outside. While we ended up sleeping just fine without them, it was a kind and considerate gesture that made us feel very cared for. Highly recommend this place for anyone looking for a smooth, stress-free stay!

Me and my friend loved our stay. The place was above perfect, it looked exactly like the photos (if not better), spotlessly clean, and super comfortable.
Brian, our host, went above and beyond to make sure we had everything we needed. He was incredibly helpful, attentive and kind throughout our stay. I’ll definitely be coming back the next time I’m in Hanoi.
Highly recommend! 🥰💛
Thanks Brian!
외부 건물과 방까지가는 환경이 낡아서 놀랬습니다 하지만 숙소는 리모델링을 해서 깔끔하고 정말 좋습니다
Omai’s air b n b was great! It was clean and comfortable. It was also in a perfect location. We have already booked to stay again. Thank you!
普通の住民が住む集合住宅の一角。荷物を持って階段を上がるのは苦労したが、部屋の中はきれいで設備も新しい。

Stayed here for a few nights whilst in Hanoi and really enjoyed it.
The apartment is located in the French Quarter (which is just slightly south of the Old Quarter). It looks exactly as pictured and described, we were satisfied with the overall cleanliness also. The host even messaged beforehand to inform us of construction in the building next door and provided ear plugs, however although the next door building was a construction site, construction was not active during our stay - so we had no noise complaints!
Only thing to be mindful of is there are a few flights of stairs to go up to access the apartment (and no elevators), which may make it difficult for some people to carry luggage up. But I would definitely recommend!

Loved this gem in old quarter. It soon became our oasis. Beautiful aesthetics and so close to everything. This cute apartment is in an old Vietnamese building.
The only pain point is the ongoing construction... but it was ok. Thankyou so much Brian for lending us your space.

Amazing place. There is a big change in perception of the staircase/hallway and the apartment. The place is fresh and well looked after. Modern, comfortable, clean. The host provided few necessities - drinking water, earplugs, toothbrush, sweets etc.
Highly recommend.

This was a perfect spot for us! The photos match the unit perfectly and Omai was very accommodating with us booking so late in the day around 7pm after we cut our trip short in another area of Vietnam. They had the space ready for us within an hour. Other reviews mention the noise levels, but we didn’t feel that it was that bad in comparison to other parts of Hanoi. We played some white noise just in case and had no issues! We would definitely stay again and would recommend to family and friends.

Beautiful apartment, close to Hoan Kiem lake. Omai provided very good instructions on how to find the apartment, it is on the 4th floor. We loved this place! Very comfortable bed, great shower, very zen. The bedroom has a beautiful tree in front of it. There is a bit of traffic noise, but I presume it is hard to find a quiet place in bustling Hanoi. Would recommend 100%.

Brian’s (Omai’s) apartment was a lovely place to stay in Hanoi. It’s centrally located to Hoan Kiem lake and many other attractions. The apartment is modern, stylish, comfortable and the spacious bathroom was particularly appealing. Brian was very helpful and responsive and his assistance was greatly appreciated in booking an airport taxi for us. I would happily stay there again.
Very clean and aesthetically pleasing. Good air conditioning, very calm oasis feeling in a fun city.
We had a great stay at Omai’s place! The flat was gorgeous and clean. The bed was so comfortable too! Hosts were really helpful and friendly too.

Ich würde immer wieder kommen. Die Wohnung ist total geräumig (Schlaf-und Wohnbereich) und es gibt eine Waschmaschine und Dampfbügeleisen. Die Möbel sind minimalistisch und super schön und auch die Klimaanlagen funktionieren super.

Nous avons passé un agréable séjour chez Omai. Très bien situé et propre. Omai était très accueillant.
Seul petit bémol, un sèche-linge qui ne fonctionne ou alors nous n'avons pas su l'utiliser (une documentation serait la bienvenue pour le sèche-linge).
Merci Omai!

Omai’s place was very comfortable. The places was nicely decorated and located in a really cool building in Hanoi. We also enjoyed the location, as it’s walking distance from the old part of the city, but it feels a bit calmer. If you struggle with sleeping, bring ear plugs, as it can be a bit noisy at night.
Phòng rất ngăn nắp và đầy đủ tiện nghi, cái bạn hỗ trợ rất chu đáo 😍

Great place.. Spacious, clean and beautiful... Interior window, no view outside... Its walled apartment.... Veiled everything.... But interior is beautiful and have almost everything.... But energy, fengshiu and geomancy seems have some issues with an apartment,4 nights we could not sleep at all...looks like some rituals needed... Just a my thought.. May be we are wrong.... Hope anyway who stays good luck n good stay.... Om mà nè pad me hum...

번잡한 올드시티를 벗어나
조용하고 깨끗한 레지던스입니다.
다시 방문하고 싶은지를 묻는다면
다시 방문하고 싶다고 말 할께요.
편안하고 모든것이 좋았어요.
The apartment was even better in person. Super clean, comfortable and all the needed ammenities.
Wonderful stay! everything was exactly as described, the host was responsive and resolved every issue we had and the place was clean and comfortable
The house was clean and all was in good condition
像回到家的感覺。寧靜。乾淨。舒服的環境

Tung’s place was beautiful! It was well-lit, aesthetically pleasing, and pristine clean. I would stay here again when I visit Vietnam. Although it is a bit far from well-know tourist spots, the entirety of the stay was worth it.

Rw a căn hm trc: Căn hộ dành cho 4 người rất tốt, đẹp hơn trong ảnh thực tế, tôi thấy phòng ban công rất tuyệt có thể  đóng lại khi mưa, khu vực này ngay cạnh ga tầu để đi đến sapa hay các tỉnh lân cận và có thể đi xe bus lên sân bay, tôi thik buổi tối đi dạo khu phố cạnh đây với văn hoá truyền thống và phố đi bộ đêm , tôi sẽ trở lại

Tôi đặt phòng vào phút chót nhưng chủ nhà phản hồi rất nhanh và nhiệt tình. Căn hộ nằm trong một ngõ nhỏ tuy nhiên căn hộ được trang trí đơn giản và hợp lý. Tôi và bạn tôi rất thích ban công trước phòng đặc biệt vào buổi tối gió rất mát. Tiện lợi ở gần có nhiều quán ăn vì ở gần chợ Đồng Xuân và chợ hoa quả Long Biên tôi mua được rất nhiều trái cây tươi và ngon. Rất khuyên dùng

Căn hộ được trang trí đơn giản nhưng rất ấm cúng. Nó nằm trong một toà nhà ở giữa Hà Nội!!  Chúng tôi rất thích thời gian lưu trú và nghĩ rằng căn hộ rất thoải mái cho 2 người, nhưng cũng phù hợp với bốn người trong vài đêm. Đó là con phố yên tĩnh nhất mà chúng tôi trải nghiệm trong 2 tuần ở Hà Nội😊

Phải nói là căn hộ này quá ưng ý cho gia đình 4 người bọn mình! Mọi thứ đều rất ổn, đặc biệt là vị trí đắc địa ngay gần Phố Cổ và phố đi bộ Hà Nội. Đi lại, ăn uống, khám phá đều tiện vô cùng. Chắc chắn sẽ quay lại nếu có dịp!
Lần thứ hai quay trở lại, mọi thứ đều ổn. Chủ nhà rất nhiệt tình đưa rất nhiều đề xuất về món ăn và các địa điểm du lịch. Anh ấy còn giúp tôi đặt xe giao tiếp rất tốt.
Thật tuyệt vời khi đặt phòng tại đây

Awesome stay. Location within walking distance to Train Street and Hoan Kiem Lake. Lots of food and coffee options nearby.
Vincent was very helpful with checking in and out, even carrying my luggage up the stairs. They also have a lot of recommendations with food, coffee, activities, etc. and are very responsive when I have questions. Best Airbnb host I’ve had so far!

The room is good—clean, comfortable, and spacious. The locker on the first/ground floor at the entrance was helpful. The stairs are a bit narrow, but it’s not a big deal; just be mindful of your steps if carrying luggage. The neighborhood is perfect, with great proximity to food, attractions, and coffee shops. The host’s response to any concerns was quick, and he is very helpful with pretty much anything.
Our stay in this apartment was amazing! Communicative host, great area walking distance from everything in old town, and so clean! The bed was comfortable and the mini fridge was great!
Our stay here was short but very very sweet thanks to this wonderful AirBnB! Awesome central location, clean room and very helpful and responsive host. Great value - highly recommend!

Lovely, cosy room within the heart of Hanoi! The bed was comfortable and it was decorated tastefully, with lots of space for luggage. The recommendations from the book in the room were amazing!
It’s located up a narrow staircase but don’t let it put you off because that’s the norm in a lot of Hanoi properties.

Perfect on essentially all fronts. Room was nice, location was great and the host had a good system for checking in and checking out. Not much to fault other than the sewage smell from the bathroom that seeped into the apartment at times. Wasn't too bad for us as we left the balcony door open to keep the apartment ventilated, but something to be wary of before booking.
Overall everything was Great, 4 stars just for the smell in toilet because of humidity. But on the other Hand there was SOOO much information provided about city places etc. so that was great!
i had a great stay. the location is perfect, you are close to almost everything. convenience store right next to the entrance and everything else very accessible.
Host is very helpful and accommodating during our stay in Hanoi. Guides (where to eat, shop, etc) is really helpful.
Cosy little apartment very well located with everything you need for a great stay in Hanoï. Moreover, the host has a lot of great recommendations all around Hanoï!
The stay was very clean and easy to find, and the host was communicative and helpful. I definitely recommend!

Old quarter war perfekt zu erlaufen und trotz dürftiger Schallisolierung, haben wir gut geschlafen, da es nicht wirklich laut war abends. Klima war auch leise :) Internet hat manchmal ein bisschen geruckelt, aber sonst alles ok :)
The place is very ideal. Key places are nearby and walkable. The host are very responsive, and helpful and easy to deal with. Thank you

Mon séjour a été exceptionnel grâce à mon hôte Airbnb, qui a fait preuve d’une écoute et d’une disponibilité rares. Toujours prêt à m’aider, même en pleine nuit si besoin, il a pris le temps de répondre à chacune de mes questions avec beaucoup de patience et de gentillesse. Il avait également préparé un guide sur mesure, extrêmement utile, qui a rendu mon voyage encore plus agréable. Grâce à son accueil chaleureux et attentionné, je reviendrai avec grand plaisir. C’est vraiment un hôte formidable que je recommande vivement !

Die Unterkunft ist sehr schön. Ich mag die Einrichtung. Sie hat einen kleinen Balkon, was für Frischluft gut ist. Die Unterkunft ist sauber. Ich könnte mir vorstellen, wieder zu kommen. Optimale Lage. Probleme sehe ich in der fehlenden Belüftung des Badezimmers. Dort sind verdächtige Flecken an Wand und Decke vorhanden. Leichte Schwierigkeiten bei der Codeeingabe. Es fehlte der Hinweis, das danach die Rautetaste zu drücken ist. Das Treppenhaus bzw. die Treppe ist sehr schmal. Also, Vorsicht mit dem Gepäck..

The owner was very nice and helpful. The room was clean and spacious situated in the Old Quarter so we could walk everywhere. The bed was very comfortable and the sheets were clean. The bathroom had a smell sometimes from the buildings pipe system so it's not the owner's fault. But if you close the bathroom door it's okay. Everything else was perfect.

Overall great location in heart of old quarter. Easy walking distance to restaurants, shops, coffeehouses. Clean place and accurate instructions. The stairs are narrow but it seems this is the nature of apartment in old quarter. So highly recommended 👍

location is really good and hosts are super caring. i had the misfortune of falling ill for sometime and they dropped off isotonic drinks and checked up on me! the only things to note are that the stairs arent really luggage friendly, and u can hear ur neighbours. but other than that, really clean and convenient place, w hosts who are there for u and are super responsive! thank u guys :-)
Bon logement, bien placé avec un hôte très à l’écoute et dévoué. On m’a aidé à trouver un transport pour ninh binh ce qui m’a fortement aidé. Top
The host is very accommodating. Nice place to stay in old quarter
Great experience with Hanoi Stay With Us during my time in Hanoi. However, the internet is a bit unstable. But overall good. Highly recommend

very nice place to stay, the host was very responsive and helpful, you can walk to anywhere because its located in strategic location. But, one thing that you need to be careful if you bring big luggage because the stairs was small. Beside that, everything’s great, thank you

The Tung was a great host. I would definitely recommend this place to everyone visiting Hanoi. He was very responsive and helpful throughout the stay and event before we reached Hanoi. He made the stay a very good experience.
The location is great and easy to reach by foot or taxi/cab. All international travellers can stay here (currency exchange office close by, SIM card help is easy, food and cafe are all walkable, all tour buses pick up available).
The place looks exactly like the photo and everything mentioned is there in the stay.
Amazing experience.
하룻밤만 묵을거라 급하게 잡았는데 숙소도 생각보다 넓고 너무 귀여웠어요. 무엇보다 호스트님 응답이 빠르고 잘 대처해줘서 너무너무 편하게 이용할 수 있었습니당!!! 너무 감사히 잘 놀다가요 😄

The co-hosts were extremely responsive and provided multiple contact sources. The apartment itself was extremely close to train street, and walkable to many shops, restaurants and cafes. Most things including linen and towels were very clean. The co hosts were also flexible about check-in and luggage storage which was super helpful. Would recommend!

Wonderful place! It's clean, elegant, and exactly like the photos. It's also right in the midst of Old Quarter, by a pedestrian walkway with great restaurants and the famous train street. Not far from other cool sightseeing locations either. It's also above a nice little cafe, if you need a quick breakfast or coffee! Also, the host is so communicative and helpful--he was able to set up a car for us to transfer to and from the airport with ease! Highly recommended!
We stayed here twice in one week and it was a great choice! Right by tons of good restaurants and sightseeing locations! The host is super friendly and helpful as well. Very much recommend!

I really enjoyed my stay at Phuong's place, its located above a coffee shop (which I really liked the salted coffee) and we really enjoyed the space. It was like we got a little escape from the busy and bustling Hanoi (train street) and had our bohemian cute spot to relax after a long day of walking and exploring town. It was on a big road at the intersection so it was also really easy to call a grab to get to places.

We really liked our stay here. The location was perfect for us, easy to access and overall a really nice apartment. We loved the cafe downstairs as well. Phuong and the staff downstairs were an added bonus. They were all extremely friendly and accomodating, Phuong super responsive and easily contacted.

Phuong was the perfect host, helpful, and responsive and made us feel right at home. the apartment was exactly as described and the location was perfect!! it is right in the heart of old quarter and train street is only a few hundred metres away. beautiful and private place to stay. would highly recommend anyone to stay here if you are travelling to Hanoi!

This was an incredible spot - perfect central location but still peaceful and surprisingly quiet! The room was gorgeous and great design. Bed was really comfortable and the tub was lovely! Best of all was our hosts - super attentive and very kind. They checked in with us several times to ensure we had a wonderful stay, and we did! Thank you!!
had a wonderful stay this airbnb that's just walking distance away from train street and old quarter. it has all the amenities we need. When I go back to hanoi I'll definitely try to check in again.

Toan was the main person who communicated with me as the co-host and he was very responsive and had met my husband and I at the space when we arrived. We arrived before check in, so they had warmly allowed us to leave our luggage while we went to explore. It was just next to the train street, but once you got to the room you just shut out all the noise. There was a projector in the room and a bathtub, 2 things that are not common so that was really enjoyable for us. Bed was really comfortable too, and they had filtered water in the room so you could really stay all day in here. Definitely recommend this stay.

Outstanding Host and Exceptional Service! I had an amazing stay! The host went above and beyond—when my baggage was lost at the airport, Mr. Toan immediately stepped in to help, offering support and guidance despite the late hour. Communication was excellent from start to finish, and he even arranged a taxi from the airport for me, making everything as smooth and stress-free as possible given the circumstances. Truly outstanding hospitality. If you're considering booking—don’t hesitate! This place (and the host) is top-notch.

Stayed here 4 nights, was meant to stay 3 but we liked it so much we wanted to stay an extra night. The host was very friendly with quick response time. An amazing, stylish, quirky little apartment.
Very clean, good location in Old quarter. It’s a busy road but you can’t hear much noise at all. Very lovely cafe at the bottom with delicious egg coffee. The only thing we’d suggest is more storage space for large travel rucksacks but no big issue at all.
An excellent place to stay in the heart of the French quarter in Hanoi. We loved it and would book again in a heartbeat. Beautiful, clean apartment and walkable to so many sites!

Phuong’s Air BnB is a cosy space which is well maintained and has an excellent atmosphere. It is in a great location and sits above a cafe that sells amazing food. The free use of washing machines is a great touch for travellers.

We had a very enjoyable experience at Phuong’s place, the location was great, and all the people we ran into were friendly and helpful. Felt like our own apartment for a few days! Bathroom was beautiful!!! Washer/dryer was very helpful to have there as well!

The interior of the place is delicate with class, the location can’t be any more convenient, but the bedsheet and bed curtains feels a little dusty, I have a sensitive nose and the bed curtains made me really allergic for one night. Try not to touch the curtains is my advise for any future guests, or please wash it regularly for the host.

Highly recommend staying here if you are visiting Hanoi. Amazing location, walkable distance to the old quarter and right next to train street but quiet enough that you don’t hear anything at night. Was very clean and comfortable, super easy to check in and the hosts were very responsive :)

I absolutely love the city of Hanoi now and staying here made our time here all much better. Such a lovely apartment, wish I could move in! And not only was the room amazing, so was the rooftop, free laundry, and cafe all in the building! Couldn’t have been more convenient and perfectly located near Train St.
We love the layout, cleanliness and the vibe here. Host was very nice and responsive. Close to all the attractions and regional street foods. Highly recommended to everyone.

Phuong’s place in the old quarter is amazing. Right in the heart of everything in Hanoi, this place is clean and convenient. Phuong made checkin incredibly easy and even arranged for a car service because we arrived so late. The room has a comfy bed, great entertainment options, and a relaxing tub in the bathroom.  I highly recommend staying in Phuong’s place.
Beautiful place, very clean. Responsive and helpful host. Loved being able to walk to the cafe right below the apartment in the mornings. Good location. Apartment was a bit smaller than expected.

You don’t need to look anywhere else this is the best air b & b in Hanoi! The location is incredible!!! Minute walking to  train street! The place is sooooo clean. The bed is soooo comfortable. The communication of the host was the best I have ever had with an air b and b!! Everyone was so extremely helpful. They helped store our luggage, arrange airport pick up & drop off. I was even so exhausted and left my purse in the drivers car the host responded immediately and got my purse back to me with in 10 minutes. I am so so thankful for this place & the host and the entire team. Thank you so much!!!!! When I come back I will book This again every time!!

Thank you for everything Phuong, amazing clean place, super cute and comfortable bed. One of the most interesting bathrooms that I've seen. The room was spotless, smelled good, cold water in the fridge, a nice projector where you can watch movies. Thanks for everything once again

This is in a very convenient location. We were moved to a larger room due to the air conditioning not working in this room. It looked almost identical.  Beautiful accommodation and great location. would highly recommend.

This place was so nice that we decided to book a different property in the same building with the same hosts. It was just a floor up. Perfect location. The bathroom is awesome as well. The hosts even booked me a private driver from the airport to the Airbnb that was super affordable. The cafe that’s in the building is extremely good as well. The staff is very nice. I’m coming back here to this place on my next visit back to Hanoi. Thank you!
Phòng rất ấm cúng, sạch sẽ. Vị trí không quá đông đúc, khá yên tĩnh. Tuy nhiên, nếu có thêm móc treo quần áo trong toilet thì ok hơn ạ.
Phòng mới và sạch sẽ, bạn chủ cũng thân thiện và hỗ trợ nhiệt tình. Kì nghĩ tuyệt vời. Recommend mọi người trải nghiệm thử về nơi này

The space was great. Lots of room, with a comfy bed and couch to relax on after a long day exploring the city. The balcony was a nice extra as well. It was in a great location 10 minutes by car to Hanoi's Old Quarter, so away away from the loud and busy city but close enough that it was easy to get back and forth if needed.

Beautiful homely flat, very clean and spacious with a large balcony, comfortable couch and modern bathroom. Elevator to all floors. Located in a quiet local neighbourhood far less chaotic than more touristy areas with lots of authentic affordable restaurants nearby - about 10 min drive to Old Town. Can’t recommend enough!

Location is the standout!! Place is compact but comfortable with everything I needed. I booked for 3 nights and was impressed so booked another 4.
Love the balcony that let's you soak in the streets cape, great position with lots of shops, cafes and eateries. I usually stay around old quarter but this area beats it hands down, more of a local experience. Bahn mi and great cafe just across road where I had breakfast every morning. Reccomend

Phuong Ann’s AirBnb was incredible. I absolutely love the Bahamas and Manhattan places in Long Bien, I felt right at home upon arriving and simply very comfortable. It’s also exactly my vibe with the art, decorations, lighting. It’s very clean. I would recommend anyone to stay in here if they want a little oasis in Hanoi.
The only thing abt Long Bien is that it’s a drive away from Old Quarter. Which I didn’t mind doing as Grab Bikes are easy and it only takes 10 mins crossing the bridge.
I am considering staying next time maybe for one month in Hanoi and I will definitely book her AirBnbs if I do so.

Wonderful home and host. We had a seamless stay. Phuong Anh was always responsive and friendly. The property was perfect. Clean, stylish, just like the photos. We may return when back in Hanoi. Couldn’t recommend enough.

Great location if you want to be close to old town but not in the hustle and bustle .
The host was responsive and check in was easy.
Loved staying here! Exactly as it looks in pictures and the place is very close to most of the things you'd wanna do in the city. Will be staying here next time too :)

Imo one of the better Airbnb in the area, with a nice kitchen and decent bathroom
Its worth every pẹny
Easy checkin, spacious, has balcony. Decent price for weekend
Dịch vụ tốt, phản hồi nhanh, chỗ ở sạch sẽ, không gian đúng ý.
A chủ hỗ trợ rất nhiệt tình, bát đĩa cốc rất đầy đủ, phù hợp cho những người thích nấu ăn như mình. Chắc chắn sẽ quay lại
Chủ nhà siêu nhiệt tình và căn nhà tuyệt vời .

Modern 1 bedroom with fully stocked kitchen and washer dryer. I had a nice stay.
Note - there is no sunlight because the buildings are very close together. Poor phone reception but room has its own wifi network.
My third stay here - it’s always comfortable and easy. Great host!

Great location and the place was very good, clean and equipped with all necessary appliances and items.
The only downside was that based on the pictures, I was expecting to see a balcony with some view, but it was completely blocked by a wall. I don’t know if it is construction or a new building located very inconveniently, but there was very little natural light coming into the apartment.

Second stay here - awesome place. thanh replies quickly to all messages and is very helpful. Room is so modern and nice - it has minimal natural light but I love that as it’s very quiet and chill and easy to sleep. Would definitely recommend

This space was a good size and had all the needed amenities to make it feel like home such as a full kitchen, bath tub, and washer/dryer. The location was off the Main Street but still very easy walk to the store and the bus stops. Overall we enjoyed our stay very much and would come back again!
didn't stay
Tốt

Thanh’s place was great. Really nice and clean apartment with everything you could want for a short or extended stay. Finding the apartment was a little tricky but getting into the building and room were safe and secure. The room had plenty of dishes, pots, pans, and utensils to use. The bathroom was big and clean. The bed and bedroom were comfy and had plenty of space. The only thing was that my room was on the side of the building that didn’t have windows with sunlight and that made the room very dark all the time. I wish I knew which room I had so I could pick the one with more sunlight. On the bright side (haha), it was nice and dark to sleep in when I wanted. Overall, a great few days stay.
nice area but very closed up no open window area meaning no outdoor view ac is very direct and cold fast paste on communication love it but because of the closed up room felt very stuffed
The property was well equipped and extremely modern. The host was very responsive and friendly. I would definitely book again!
Great location in the West Lake area convenient to many places in walking distance.

Our stay is generally stay. The location is right next to West Lake, and located inside a quiet alley. The apartment itself is very clean and all equipments are new and modern. There is only 1 thing that our 3rd-floor apartment doesn't have any direct light (the balcony is blocked by a wall or something), so it's not very bright.
Great place in a great location by West Lake.

Great place for the value. Easy access to plenty of good places to eat. If you want to stay in and cook, no problem. You can find the kitchen in the roomvery well-equipped. I would come back when I have the chance to.
mọi thứ đều tuyệt vời hơn kỳ vọng
Mọi thứ đều hoàn hảo nhưng ga giường vệ sinh chưa sạch lắm
Everything was so nice
Nice service
tuyệt vời
Phòng rất sạch sẽ, dễ tìm. Phòng ở gần phố nhưng rất yên tĩnh. Rất thích cảm giác yên bình ở đây.

Great price and great location. The apartment itself is also great, it has everything you need and it all works really well. Phuong Anh responds very quickly to all messages and is a great host. Would recommend to anyone!
하노이 구시가지와 걸어서 10분거리라 접근성이 뛰어납니다! 가성비가 아주 좋은 숙소입니다. 문제가 발생했는데 적극적으로 해결해주셨습니다 감사합니다 🌼

I really enjoyed my stay at this homestay. The place feels cozy, quiet, clean, and smells fresh. You’ll feel comfortable the moment you walk in from the gate. It’s also conveniently located near the city center, making it easy to get around. Just one small thing — the painting of a man in the bathroom made me feel a bit uneasy, especially when staying alone. Everything was fine, but it did give me a slight chill during showers. I hope this can be taken into consideration. Overall, a great experience and I would definitely come back!

Like to be in the Old Quarter of Hà Nội yet wake up to the soothing sound of birds chirping? Yeah, me too. That's just one of the things I loved about my stay here. Felt like the home I'd like to have :) And as a bonus, staying in the rabbit warren of alleyways behind street shopfronts was fascinating. The room? A delight to step into and exactly like the photos. Excellent air conditioner which was important to me due to the intense heat in Hà Nội right now. And what a funky shower. Been travelling for nearly 90 days yet this is the first time I've seen a shower quite like the shower in this place. Works wonderfully well. Highly recommend.
Great place, quiet, but still close enough to walk to central locations.

Căn phòng nhỏ nhắn xinh xắn, có máy chiếu phim rất là chill ạ.Địa điểm thuận tiện đi lại . Quy trình tự nhận phòng nhanh và dễ dàng. Chủ nhà phản hồi rất nhanh nếu có vấn đề gì ạ, nói chung là mình rất hài lòng và muốn giới thiệu cho các bạn về căn phòng này🥰

Fantastic apartment with everything you need. It feels really new and is very comfortable, and was also very quiet. Communication with hosts was great and very fast, and location is great too. It was also great having the washing machine and drier on the first floor have fee was very cute too. Highly recommend if you are visiting to stay here. 10/10!!
Chủ nhà thân thiện ,sẽ quay lại vào lần sau

I loved this place , I had no issues with the host who was always ready to help and was always quick to reply. The place felt very secure and safe. No major issues and problems whatsoever.
The only issue was and to be honest it’s really not that big of a deal but if you want to explore old quarter and for myself I ended up going there most days - it’s a drive away which makes it annoying. There isn’t much to do around the place either however it is a place to sleep and a good one for that.

Nous avons passé un super séjour dans ce logement. Il était extrêmement agréable, très propre et la décoration est vraiment soignée. On s’est tout de suite sentis très bien, comme à la maison. La literie est confortable, ce qui a rendu nos nuits encore plus agréables. Notre hôte a été très réactif par message dès que nous avions besoin de quelque chose. Je recommande ce logement sans hésiter !

I had a great stay here, very close to all the interesting restaurants and places to go. The room was very nice, very cozy and clean. The host was very enthusiastic and replied to messages very quickly.

Would totally recommend the Langmandi Experience if you plan to have a quick lounge yet affordable stay at the beautiful city of Vietnam.
Necessities are provided by the host and they are really responsive and very helpful too.
I super appreciate Langmandi and making sure we are comfortable during our stay. Good place and humble host and our last days were quite memorable as the area is near all needed places we needed to go to. Until then once again. ✨

I had a wonderful stay! The place was exactly as described, comfortable, clean, and well-located. The host was incredibly responsive and made sure everything went smoothly from start to finish. The staff were also lovely, always friendly, polite, and helpful whenever I had a question.
The neighborhood is great, very close to the city center, so there’s always something to do nearby. But at night, it becomes peaceful and quiet, and I felt completely safe walking around. It was the perfect balance between convenience and comfort. I’d definitely stay here again and highly recommend it to anyone visiting!

I had a fantastic stay at Langmandi’s place! The space was nice, cozy, and spotless, making it feel like a home away from home. The location was perfect—close to everything, with great restaurants, shops, and public transport just a short walk away.
Langmandi was an excellent host, super friendly and always quick to respond to any questions. Check-in was a breeze, and he provided clear instructions that made everything hassle-free.
If you’re looking for a comfortable and well-located stay with a thoughtful and responsive host, this is the place. Highly recommend and would definitely book again!
Host siêu supportive luôn, nhà cũng gần phố nên lên phố rất tiện

Chủ nhà phản hồi nhanh chóng
View đẹp
Tiện nghi trong phòng đầy đủ
Không gian sạch sẽ, tiện nghi, ngay cạnh hồ tây nên rất tiện đi lại , view đẹp lắm luôn . Sẽ quay lại ủng hộ ạ
View đẹp, phòng sạch sẽ, thoải mái.
Phòng sạch sẽ, view hồ đẹp, phòng giống trong hình và chủ nhà nhiệt tình
Phòng sạch sẽ, như ảnh, view 1000 điểm sẽ còn quay lại nhiều lần nữa.
Tốt
Love this accommodation, host is quick to respond and very helpful, the view is beautiful, the water is hot, and the space is clean.
Was only there for one night, arrived late at night and left early in the morning, but had a great stay!
Stayed for a week. We had a pleasant stay and very comfortable. The view of the lake is beautiful. Highly recommend if you are in Hanoi.
Arrivée flexible, aucun problème rencontré, très bonne appartement ayant une vue magnifique, merci !
Friendly and supportive hosts. I like the view, pretty good.
Great location overlooking the lake. We loved the bustling evening activity of the street below. It was quiet with the door closed easy to relax. Highly recommend.
房间拥有非常美丽的风景，房东很热情
Lovely stay

Một căn hộ nằm ở phố Lê Ngọc Hân. Chỉ mất 5p di chuyển là tới Hồ Gươm. Xung quanh nhiều tiện như quán ăn, mua sắm, giải trí. Hơn nữa phòng thiết kế rất đẹp, có máy chiếu, ga giường thơm sạch sẽ, đặc biệt là sàn nhà, không có chút bụi bẩn nào. Chủ nhà đã chăm sóc căn hộ của mình rất tốt.

Langmandi Experience have a great team of hosts who replied to us within minutes. The place was clean and spotless and every detail was thought of in both their instructions of how to find the place - they sent a youtube video! - to the amenities they provided. A lot of thought and care was put into this apartment and we, as guests, we're very grateful for that . Have a lot of cafes and restaurants nearby.

Very satisfied with our visit. Staff were polite and caring. They helped with everything we asked of them.
Everything was clean and well taken care of.
Premium location for those who want to walk and explore Hanoi old quarters and other well know tourist attractions.
Great little western cuisine place (S-Box) down the road as well as local street food options just next door.

I had such a great time staying here! The place is tucked right above a Laundry shop, so I almost missed it at first, but the host was already waiting and came out to greet me as soon as I reached out. She was incredibly welcoming and took time to walk me through everything in the room. The space itself is a bit smaller than I thought, but it’s really clean, well-organized, and the balcony has a charming view of the street. The neighborhood is lively and walkable with plenty of local spots to explore. Would absolutely recommend!

One of my favourite Airbnb's. The host has incredible decorating taste. Each room is a quirky unique design with vintage French doors. She is highly communicative and always answered within ten minutes, accommodating about switching rooms, helping me with laundry. It's near enough to the city activities without being on a main road. Please note the building is stairs only, and I found lower floors has too much noise from the street but upper floors are more quiet. I will stay here again! ⭐

Langmandi was very responsive and helpful and all the instructions were clear. I loved the apartment! - it's furnished and decorated in a beautiful manner, to be honest, I truly imagine myself living in it for life! (and I loved the balcony)! Apart from the looks, it has everything you need. The only way it could be improved would be the availability of a water purifier (or at least a bottle of water in the fridge), but apart from that it was almost perfect and I highly recommend! It's beautiful :)

Lovely little Parisian style apartment. Was really cozy and exactly what we needed for 2 nights in Hanoi. We loved walking around the area and exploring the cafes.
It’s on a fairly busy road and single pane glass so it can be a bit noisy in the morning but pretty quiet at night.
Clean, convenient, and amazing value for money.

Homestay xinh xắn, mới và tiện nghi. Vị trí thuận tiện còn có view hồ mê nha. Mình có chút thay đổi về lịch trình nên có liên hệ để hỗ trợ, may mắn bên homestay đã đồng ý đổi lịch để mình có đc trải nghiệm tốt trong chuyến đi. Lần sau có dịp mình sẽ vẫn book ở đây nhé.
Chỗ ở tuyệt vời

Die Wohnung war perfekt für uns. Sie liegt an einem super Standort und hat eine atemberaubende Sicht auf den See. Sie liegt etwas abgelegen und doch Zentral. Es war ruhig und wir konnten gut schlafen.
Auch die Kommunikation mit dem Host war perfekt und sehr freundlich. Wir würden wieder kommen!
아래층에 카페가 있어 늦게까지 소음은 다소 있었으나 신속한 대응으로 체크인도  쉽게 가능했음
Very great place and very friendly host! They were very accommodating to our needs such as late check out

I had an amazing stay at this brand new apartment! Even before booking, the host was incredibly helpful, they sent over a detailed video tour and additional photos since the unit was newly listed, which really helped me feel confident about my decision. The apartment looks exactly like the pictures! Bright, stylish, and thoughtfully designed.
The host was also very accommodating and responsive, providing extra items I requested like a clothes iron and cleaning supplies. Everything was ready and set up upon arrival. The cleaning staff were also very friendly.
The space itself was perfect for working remotely, with good natural light, a comfortable workspace, and beautiful views of the lake, especially at sunset. I highly recommend this unit for anyone looking for a quiet, cozy, and elegant place to stay in Hanoi. Would definitely come back!
The owner is very friendly and prompt to reply us. Highly recommended
It was amazing as how they have posted, definitely will repeat again
Clean and nice.
Lovely stay! Thanks so much
Home rất dễ thương, đồ nấu bếp khá đầy đủ để các bạn có thể tự nấu ăn nếu thích! Phù hợp để nghỉ lại khi đến du lịch hoặc có một đêm nghỉ ngắn thay đổi không khí! Home gần quán ăn rất tiện lợi!

This is a lovely spot right in the very middle of Trúc Bạch. It’s a cosy studio apartment that has great taste and beautiful lights through the large windows. The furnitures are comfy with a big TV for relaxing at the end of the night.
Vivian, Nghĩa, and other co-hosts are incredibly responsive and helpful. I’d definitely stay again.

I loved staying here! the location was amazing. there were so many bars, restaurants and cafes to walk to and only a short Grab to Old Quarter or Tay Ho. if i stay in the area again, i will definitely choose this place again. the apartment was very cozy and i loved the bed and linen.
Nhà xinh dễ tìm mát mẻ decor xinh chủ dễ thương lắm ạ rất là recommand lun á mn

Vivian’s place was perfectly located, close to the Old Quarters and had lots of cafes around.
She was incredibly responsive and reached out to make sure our stay was comfortable and if we had any concerns.
The room was spacious and nice.
The only point of improvement could be the shower in the washroom.
But overall we had a great stay! Would definitely recommend
The neighborhood can access both directions of the city. The host was very helpful and responsive, she even helped me receive my online order stuff. Very nice ! Will book again if I’m in town.

This apartment is a dream-beautifully designed, cozy, and effortlessly stylish. The natural light, chic decor, and calming ambiance make it the perfect space to unwind or create. Every detail is thoughtfully curated, giving it main character energy in the best way. Special mention on Ms. Vivian such an amazing host!!! However the washroom could use a little renovation and if you are a light sleeper, the lively streets can be a challenge. But the overall vibe is still amazing, would stay again! 💖🏡
Tôi đã có 1 ngày nghỉ dưỡng tuyệt vời tại HN.

I stayed at this air bnb for 3 days. Vivian was helpful & friendly. She was prompt with her replies. Location is beautiful, near the lake & cute cafes. Walkable anywhere & everywhere. Place was clean & tidy. Highly recommend 10/10

Ich hatte einen großartigen Aufenthalt. Die Unterkunft war super hübsch eingerichtet und man hatte vom Fenster aus Blick auf einen buddhistischen Tempel. Die Gastgeber waren super freundlich, proaktiv, jederzeit erreichbar und haben mir auch hilfreiche Tipps gegeben. Die Unterkunft liegt in der Nähe von einem See und die direkte Umgebung ist lebendig, doch im Vergleich zum Rest von HaNoi eher ruhig, da es weniger Straßenverkehr gab, was sehr angenehm war. Das Zentrum war von der Unterkunft aus zu Fuß erreichbar. Klare Empfehlung!

Wir hatten einen schönen Aufenthalt. Die Unterkunft ist perfekt für einen Stopp in Hanoi. Direkt unten gibt es tolle Restaurants und leckeres Essen. Man kommt prima zu Fuß in die Altstadt und zu den Sehenswürdigkeiten. Das einzige was man wissen sollte ist, dass es abends sehr laut auf der Straße ist und man im Zimmer alles mitbekommt (besonders am Wochenende). Uns hat das aber nicht gestört :)

Die Unterkunft bietet eine schöne und gemütliche Atmosphäre, ideal zum Entspannen nach einem ereignisreichen Tag. Die Kommunikation verlief reibungslos, was den Aufenthalt noch angenehmer machte. Sehr empfehlenswert! :)

The host is super nice and helpful. Also the street is really cool as its on a Sweet Little island and has a really nice vibe. The Building and the apartment are sweet, too. the only thing was that it easy way too loud unfortunately, only between 12 am and 6am it got a Little more quiet (so if you only need silence at this time then it’s good :) ) it would have been nice to know this in advance.
Phòng đẹp, sạch, mỗi cái bất tiện là không có thang máy
The host is really kind and the house is very beautiful, It was all perfect!

정말 편안한 숙소였습니다.
찾아가기도 편하고 안전한곳이었습니다
Coóy flat with lots of food nearby
Все очень понравилось. Уютная, светлая квартира; приятный, чистый район.
좋았습니당 깔끔했는데 이불이랑 수건에서 물비린내가 너무 심했어요… ㅠㅠ 그것만 빼면 괜찮았어요 ㅎㅎ
Sehr kulant und super Kommunikation!
Vivian ist eine äußerst freundliche und zuvorkommende Vermieterin!
i love this airbnb so much. the room giving me princess vibe🌷 Its very clean and organized. good price and located not far away from everything

This is my first time in an airbnb so I'm unable to compare this to others.
Firstly, nice and cosy accommodation suitable for 1 or 2 person. Located at the eastern tip of West Lake. Close by to alot of the monuments, ie the pagoda, imperial citadel and mausoleum to name a few.
Entrance is next to the back of a restaurant so it is a little bit dirty but the apartment itself is clean. When you're inside the apartment you will constantly get a whiff of food being prepared in the kitchen next door.
Place is noisy even during late night on weekdays(plenty of dog barking). No curtain for the windows to fully block the sunlight and no shower curtain in the toilet so floor might get a bit slippery.
Vivian herself is polite and helpful. Fast to reply and accommodating.
All in all, I believe it is more than worth the price. Thank you for having me, Vivian.
it's close to everything, nice restaurant, easy to find and get into. the best

Phòng siu thích, sạch sẽ ấm áp, anh chủ cũng siu cool, siu đáng yêu. Giá phòng oke so với mặt bằng chung, không gian cũng thiệt là thoải mái. Hông hiểu sao mà nằm xuống cái ngủ liền =)))
Lần đầu đến HN mà ở được ở chỗ này thiệt may mắn hết chỗ nói. Lúc tạm biệt còn được tặng bịch sấu ăn dính khỏi bàn =)) Sau mình lại ở tiếp 😁

Home ẩn giấu trong con ngõ nhỏ với thiết kế phong cách độc đáo, phòng sạch sẽ đầy đủ tiện nghi đúng như mô tả, vị trí cách phố cổ chỉ 10 phút đi xe, host rất nhiệt tình và chu đáo, chắc chắn sẽ quay lại!

Phòng chính xác như hình ảnh và mô tả.
Phòng tắm riêng sạch sẽ thiết kế khép kín thông với phòng ngủ.
Vị trí trung tâm xung quanh đầy đủ tiện ích: cửa hàng tiện lợi 24/7, siêu thị, quán ăn, cafe, mua sắm…
Căn nhà gần đường lớn, khá dễ tìm.
Giá cả hợp lý và chủ nhà có tâm.
Cực kỳ hài lòng!
Phòng siêu cute và ấm áp ạ, anh chủ nhiệt tình và thân thiện lắm ạ 🫶🏻❤️
Yêu nhắm
Ở ok Lắm
Ok nha, book đi mấy đuỹ
Ở ổn áp

A rather interesting room. I don’t usually like having too many things in a room, but it felt like everything was in its place. I love minimalism. :) However, as an experience, it’s an excellent option in terms of price/quality. The owner thought of everything you might need, including laundry—perfect service! 👍
Relaxing and easy to go around
Had a good time
Thanks
Great host

Abbiamo trascorso un soggiorno davvero piacevole in questa piccola ma accogliente casa. Sebbene le dimensioni siano contenute, l’appartamento è perfettamente organizzato e dispone di tutto il necessario per un soggiorno confortevole. La posizione è ideale, a soli 30 minuti a piedi dal centro, in una zona tranquilla e silenziosa, perfetta per rilassarsi dopo una giornata di esplorazione. Inoltre, l'host è stato molto gentile e disponibile, sempre pronto a darci consigli e a risolvere qualsiasi richiesta. Un'ottima esperienza che consiglio vivamente a chi cerca un luogo tranquillo e ben posizionato per visitare la città!
It’s a very private building in an alley. Lovely decor and the host is super responsive. Great value for money
Ok la
Nuce
Sehr gemütliches Zimmer und es ist nicht wirklich laut. Sehr gute Preis Leistung und sehr zu empfehlen!
Nơi ở rất tiện nghi, đầy đủ, đặc biệt cô Hoa quản gia là một người rất ân cần và chu đáo khiến mình rất ấn tượng

Phòng sạch đẹp đầy đủ tiện nghi, highly recommend. Chị quản lý take care rất tốt và siêu nhiệt tình. Duy nhất có điểm tụi mình chưa ưng ý là nệm quá mềm nên nằm bị đau lưng và gửi xe mắc. Tóm lại nếu lần sau quay lại HN thì Veque sẽ nằm trong top list của mình.

A great find, not only did we get a cosy room accessible to many places within old quarter, Hoa, our host for the stay was extremely welcoming and reliable. Even when we had a problem with the door lock, she was fast to respond and check on the issue.
There are some popular spots in the area that requires a bit of walking, but this unit is great if you want to observe and experience the authentic part of Hanoi while still being comfortable!
It was great to stay in the apartment with city view! Special thanks to Ms. Hoa, warm welcome and help us do laundry for free. The room is very spacious and comfortable, fully equipped for long stay.

The place is at the heart of Hanoi, walking distance to everywhere. We were greeted by Hoa and her service given is above and beyond, she offered to do our laundry for our convenience and was surprised it’s free of charge. She also returned a bracelet we accidentally left in the apartment. To top with that she gave me a spa voucher for discount. She made me feel Vietnam a home away from home. Will surely recommend the place to friends and family.

Big thanks to Hoa for being very responsive, accommodating, and friendly! I'd love to come back here in the future. The apartment was beautiful, accessible, and safe. The nearby restaurants are also very convenient. Thank you!

Nice, cosy stay with everything you need and well located in a safe area, easy to find. The host was super responsive and helpful. They even arranged an airport shuttle service for me. The place was spotless and kept clean. Despite other reviews of noisiness from outside, yes you can hear occasional cyclists beeping but I slept very well here and didn't even need the provided ear plugs. All round a great stay
Home có chị Lan rất đáng yêu và nhiệt tình 💛💛 lần tới mình chắc chắn quay lại 🫶

We were assisted by Hoa, the person in charge for the stay. Hoa was very helpful, helping us with our laundry (was able to get the clothes back in the same day), give us clean towel every 2 days. The place is just like in the picture, spotless, amenities in

We enjoyed our short stay so much! It felt just like home. I wish we could have stayed longer! The room is spacious, clean, and very pretty!
Ms. Hoa helped us a lot and was so accommodating! We love her! Thank you so much! We will be back soon!

Veque was a very pleasant stay in Hanoi, and the apartment was very well maintained and tidy. Best part is the wonderful host I had in Hoa, she was so proactive in offering help and services like laundry:) Would reccomend this to anyone keen on staying in Hanoi

was hella friendly. place was super clean, all the hotspots are quite nearby so the location was great. only thing i recommend is anything to keep mosquitoes out as we kept getting stung. but when asked for insect repellent, it was immediately received and given. thank you! hope to visit again!

Hoa did a great job and made us feel right at home from the get go. The apartment is well situated in the old quarter but when you are inside and the windows are closed you are away from the noise and buzz of the city.

The apartment’s location is perfect—right in the heart of the city and close to all the main attractions. The service was exceptional, making the stay even more enjoyable. Easily one of the best Airbnbs I’ve experienced on this trip!

I had great time when I was in Hanoi, but I well equipped nice clean place..
Thanks to Hoa she always responded my questions and demands. Well definitely stay again in the future. Highly recommended!

Fantastic stay. I recommend it! Hoa was so helpful and always willing to help. Hoa was a great cleaner and was evening willing to provide clean towels outside room when we wanted privacy. Thank you for such a nice time in Hanoi.

The host was very helpful. Easy check in and the housekeeper Hoa was so sweet and nice. She helped us with the hot water, laundry, and gave us water too. It was a bit noisy at times but did die down at night.

Hoa thank you for the lovely stay. We had an amazing time. The apartment was very clean and spacious. Had all the amenities very well organised, checkin was very easy and clear. The location was perfect close to all the markets, the train station and all popular restaurants. Hoa is very kind and welcoming, she also helped us wash all our clothes. A very responsive host who is always ready to help. We have already planned to stay at Hoa's place for our next visit.. Would definitely recommend her place. Her place definitely helped us relax.

El apartamento  es muy céntrico, cómodo, amplio y agradable. Hemos pasado unos días estupendos en él, con la atención permanente de Hoa, que ha estado siempre muy dispuesta y pendiente de nosotros. Nos ha lavado la ropa cada vez que lo hemos necesitado y nos han limpiado, también, la habitación cuando se lo hemos pedido. Hemos estado una semana entera y no hemos sentido más ruido que el del siempre abundante tráfico de esa ciudad caótica que es Hanoi.

Veque Apartment has a pretty good location to explore Hanoi Old Quarter, we had a really good time there. Hoa and the apartments staff were very helpful during our time and they really did their best to make our stay as comfortable as possible! :)

We had a great time during our stay, Hoa hade been very helpful and informative.
We enjoy our room that had been cleaned everyday along with fresh towel and free unlimited filtered water.

Ms Hoa did a good job to clean my room also been so helpful with my laundry, Hoa also been sending me towels and water even i ddnt ask for it. so kind. just had difficulties w the touch stove but overall everything was great! will recommend this room and agency. can be trusted!!
A fantastic stay in a good location, the host communicated well with us and assisted with washing clothes, while we enjoyed a nice view from the window, large space and kitchenette. Thanks again!
This is a lovely little studio apartment in a quiet corner of the Old City.   The hosts are really together,   responsive,  and friendly.   I will definitely return next time I am in Hanoi.

Căn hộ ấm cúng và tiện nghi, rất trung tâm, tôi có thể đi bộ dọc theo các con phố xung quanh, khám phá phố cổ, rất nhiều hàng ăn uống và cafe tuyệt vời.
Ban công rộng đón ánh sáng tự nhiên tốt, tôi rất yêu thích điều này.
My và Mei thân thiện, đưa chỉ dẫn hữu ích.
Nhìn chung, đây là một nơi đáng để lựa chọn khi lưu trú tại Hà Nội
BEST AIRBNB IN HANOI EVER!!! các c hosts rất đáng iu và nhiệt tình ạa 🥰🫶🏻 very very recommended ✨

Đã rất lâu mình mới có dịp quay lại hà nội , nét văn hoá , con người khu vực phố cổ luôn là những ấn tượng ko thể quên .
"Mình có trải nghiệm homestay 2 đêm và cực kỳ hài lòng . Cứ nghĩ homestay thì xoàng lắm nhưng sau những gì mình đã trải nghiệm thì chắc phải thay đổi khái niệm đó từ đây . Phòng sạch sẽ, được trang trí decor tinh tế mang tính nghệ thuật cao . Có đầy đủ tiện nghi như máy lạnh, nước nóng, wifi tốc độ cao vì đều là đồ mới các bạn ạ . Vị trí rất thuận tiện cho việc di chuyển tới những khu vực vui chơi giải trí như ( đào duy từ - tạ hiện - chợ đêm đồng xuân..v...v và các điểm tham quan nổi tiếng gần khu vực trung tâm . Và đặc biệt nhất là có 2 bạn gái là quản lý Homestay này là bạn Linh & My các bạn vừa xinh xắn , tốt bụng và dịch vụ cskh tốt . Xin cảm ơn hai bạn nhiều và hẹn gặp lại vào một dip gần nhất nhé 😍

Clean and tidy with an excellent Airconditioner so ticked my boxes.
Mei was kind enough to run things up when I needed them(dropped the toilet paper into water).
I was on the fouth floor so very little noise from the street except the friday which had a big street event but it finished by 10:30- 11pm and its the middle of old quarter in the best location so thats why you stay there
Great location in the Old Quarter. They are incredibly kind. If you need help with a ride to the airport they will assist. The ac was great! Modern accommodations that reminded me of home.

The host was very supportive , answered all my concerns/ questions during the time we stay, providing best help ever . The location was excellent, right in the center , can walk around to explore the Old Quarter.
The room is same as photos . Love the balcony, can sit there and chill . Definitely come back 💯

An absolute nice place if you are visiting Hanoi for a lil trip. The place is right in the center of everything within walking distance. I didn't even bother calling a taxi or grab to go anywhere. The host communicates very quick and supported me all along 👍🏻

This was a great place to stay! The area is busy but our street was quieter than most. It was a clean apt with a great porch to watch the action. The hosts were helpful with everything! Highly recommend!

Super séjour à Hanoï, appartement très propre (et la clime était bien appréciée), super mobilier et bien spacieux. Instructions très clair et une hôte super sympa, je recommande et je reviendrais avec plaisir!
beautiful place. clean, new and fresh👌. I was so comfortable I wish I found more gems like this one ❤️.

I only stayed for one night but honestly wish I had more time here. The space is super cozy and peaceful — it instantly made me feel relaxed after a long travel day. It’s tucked away from the noise but still close enough to walk to everything. Perfect spot to recharge.
The host was incredibly kind and thoughtful. It didn’t feel like just a place to crash — more like staying at a friend’s house who actually cares if you’re having a good time. They gave great local tips and made sure I had everything I needed, which I really appreciated.
It’s one of those places that quietly makes your trip better without trying too hard. I left feeling rested, grateful, and already planning to come back next time I’m in Hanoi.
great communication! very helpful when I needed to adjust the reservation
Nice place

Staying at Jun’s Guest House has been wonderful. I felt completely at home and I truly hope to come back. I wish I could have stayed longer, but unfortunately there were no more rooms available. Next time I’m in Hanoi, I will definitely return to this place.
The location is perfect: quiet, bright, well-connected, with great cafés and restaurants nearby… and beautiful views of lakes and green spaces. The room was tastefully decorated, clean, and had a lovely fresh scent.
They told me they had just opened and were very attentive to every detail, which I truly appreciated. Plus, there’s an adorable and friendly little cat wandering around:) . I wish them all the best with their Guest House and I look forward to returning.
great place! it was neat and clean. I would love come back sometime  or recommend it to my friend.

Cozy, clean, and full of charm. Loved the traditional vibe mixed with modern touches. The tub was amazing — super spacious and ideal for a quiet evening. The host was incredibly responsive and helpful, made everything feel easy and welcoming.
Great location right in the Old Quarter! The wooden decor feels warm and authentic, and the bathtub with the city view was a highlight. Perfect spot to relax after a long day exploring Hanoi.

Đầu tiên, tôi rất ấn tượng bởi bạn quản lý rất nhiệt tình,  hướng dẫn nhận phòng rõ ràng giúp tôi nhận phòng rất dễ. Phòng ở đây mới sạch sẽ và khá thơm. Phòng rất xứng đáng với số tiền tôi đã bỏ ra, tôi đã có trải nghiệm tuyệt vời tại đây. Xin cảm ơn

Chỗ này xịn thật sự! Phòng sạch hơn nhà mình nữa, sắp xếp gọn gàng, vô là muốn ở mãi. Chủ nhà dễ thương, nói chuyện duyên ghê. Vị trí thì đắc địa, bước chân ra là có đồ ăn ngon. Tóm lại, đáng đồng tiền bát gạo

Căn hộ xịn xò lắm nha! Sạch sẽ, gọn gàng, bước vô là ưng liền. Chủ nhà thì siêu dễ thương, nhiệt tình hết nấc. Vị trí đỉnh của chóp, đi đâu cũng tiện. Ai mà còn lăn tăn thì quẹo lựa ngay, không hối hận đâu!
Vị trí dễ tìm và trung tâm, tuy nhiên vệ sinh căn hộ thì ko tốt. Sàn nhà và thảm trải sàn ướt sũng làm bạn nhỏ bị trượt ngã. Căn hộ mùi hôi khó chịu.
Host và cô trông home dễ thương, responsive và chuyên nghiệp. Location tiện lợi, ngõ rộng rãi, dễ tìm và nhiều tiện ích xung quanh.
Host rất nhiệt tình, hỗ trợ nhanh, phòng giống ảnh luôn xinh lắm, m sẽ giới thiệu và quay lại nhiềuuu
Mọi thứ đều hoàn hảo so với giá tiền. Chủ nhà rất hỗ trợ, nhận phòng đơn giản. Vị trí thuận tiện, dễ tìm.
Giá quá tuyệt với chất lượng, ngay trung tâm rất tiện lợi. Phòng sạch sẽ mà tiện lợi hơn khách sạn

One of the best stays I’ve had! The apartment is spotless, stylishly furnished, and full of natural light. The view is absolutely beautiful, and the location in central Hanoi is ideal. The host is super accommodating and friendly. Plus, the place is fully stocked with everything you need. Would stay again in a heartbeat

Absolutely loved this apartment! Super clean, tidy, and well-organized. The space is bright with lots of natural light, and the view is amazing. Perfect location in the heart of Hanoi, making it easy to explore. The host is really friendly and helpful. Plus, the furniture is stylish and everything you need is provided. Would definitely stay here again!
sạch sẽ, mới, chủ nhà nice <3
phòng hơi nhỏ còn lại ok, hài lòng
A perfect place for travelers! Clean, comfortable, and fully equipped. So many great food options around. Convenient location with easy access to the airport. The host is amazing—always ready to help
Chỗ ở rất tốt, cô quản lý rất thân thiện

Gorgeous little quite place! Looked just like the photos and was exactly what we needed for a quiet space outside the busy centre. Room could have a been a little bit cleaner however we got our moneys worth and had a lovely stay!

Loved this place! Spotless, neatly arranged, and designed with both style and convenience in mind. Everything works perfectly, and it’s got all the essentials for a hassle-free stay. Would definitely book again

Very nice and relaxing space with a good view. Not too much street noise. Warm light fixtures set a calming ambience. Good if you are looking for a place to rest and settle in at Hanoi. Not very close to the touristy spots but has plenty of convenience stores, cafes and pharmacies around.

Very nice appartment far from all the touristy places of Hanoi. We had a lovely stay and really took advantage of the kitchen. I recommend this airbnb for couples, it's cozy and the daylight is amazing. There's a local market right next, you realky find everything you need within walking distance. We already booked this accomodation for when we come back to Hanoi! :)

Absolutely loved my stay! The place was spotless, beautifully decorated, and had all the amenities I needed. The host was incredibly responsive and went above and beyond to make me feel welcome. The location was perfect, close to everything . I highly recommend staying here and would love to return in the future

This apartment in central Hanoi was a perfect choice for my stay. It’s spotlessly clean, well-organized, and comes with all the necessary amenities. The host was welcoming and provided exceptional service. Despite being in the city center, the apartment is quiet and offers a restful sleep on a very comfortable bed. The interior is beautifully designed, creating a sophisticated and cozy ambiance. I thoroughly enjoyed my stay!

This is one of the best Airbnbs I’ve ever stayed in. The place is immaculately clean, thoughtfully decorated, and so comfortable to live in. The check-in process was seamless, and the apartment was easy to locate. Being in a central location, it was super convenient to get around, and there were so many great local food spots nearby. The host was incredibly welcoming and helpful throughout my stay. Highly recommend
Great cosy space to stay in , kitchen was good and had everything I needed . The host was very quick to respond.

Really nice place, quiet and clean
The location is not central you have to ride about 15-30 minutes to get to more central areas

There were some issues with check-in and cleanliness. However, all my western expectations and requests were addressed promptly. The sweet old lady that does the cleaning and lives on premises is one of the sweetest people I've ever met. She gave me a hug and made me feel at home. I was only there for a night and wanted to extend my stay but they were booked up. After checkout, they helped me use the WiFi and held my bags for me while I figured out my next moves. Host and all team members were very nice and helpful. While the room is not exactly as pictured on the listing, it's cozy and the A/C & heater works really well. I like my room to be on the warmer side and it delivered on the cooler, rainy Hanoi nights. Overall a very good stay.
Mình đã rất hài lòng với trải nghiệm lưu trú lần này. Mọi thứ hoàn toàn giống với mô tả và hình ảnh. Nếu có cơ hội chắc chắn mình sẽ book lại các bạn. Cảm ơn các bạn rất nhiều.
Chủ nhà phản hồi rất nhanh chóng, phòng và các phương tiện đều rất sạch sẽ, ngăn nắp. Mình hơi gặp khó khăn trong việc gửi xe do mấy hầm gửi xe ở các toà nhà đều giống nhau nên bị gửi nhầm ở toà khác

Nhà sạch và bày trí đáng yêu, bạn chủ nhà cũng hướng dẫn nhiệt tình khi mình hỏi về chỗ ăn buổi tối. Đi bộ xuống dưới nhà có công viên và phố đi bộ rất chill, ngắm vịt và cả ngắm thiên nga đen,... Sẽ quay lại khi có dịp ^^

Nhà đẹp, hiện đại, dễ thương và xinh xắn. Nằm trong tòa S-Premium nên sử dụng được nhiều tiện ích chung của tòa nhà. Vườn Sky Garden ở tầng 41 rất đẹp. 1 trải nghiệm rất tuyệt cho ai muốn thử sống tại Ecopark
House quá cute trải nghiệm tuyệt vời

amazing place and amazing host/co hosts!! bon and family were super helpful when it came to recommendations or needing anything during my stay! very lovely location very peaceful and beautiful, easy to grab to main hanoi- about 30mins-1hr depending on traffic! lots of great coffee shops nearby and lots of marts! very much recommend this place, most definitely would stay again if i come back to area!

I had a great experience staying here. The apartment was clean and felt like home. Even if I had a bit of trouble in finding the lobby entrance, but everything went smoothly afterwards. Overall, it’s definitely worth visiting this area!
Nhà đẹp,sạch sẽ, đầy đủ tiện nghi

If i could leave 6 stars, i would! Everything was excellent from start to finish! Super clear check-in instructions and communication. The place is beautiful with stunning views from the bedroom.
Amazing rooftop view at night and a huge pool (60k per use)
I wasnt able to use the gym unfortunately as they dont do weekly passes, only monthly, which was a shame but cant be helped.
There are loads of shops, restaurants and cafes around the complex and the area is super peaceful - a world away from the insane business of Hanoi and a welcome repreive! Beautiful walks and all in all an excellent stay. 1000% recommend.
Nhà xinh!
Lovely place with supportive host
Nice place to stay very comfortable and peaceful location recommended for family
very beautiful place we can get everything thing we need nice host nice location
Nice place with good price! The host is very supportive. Thanks Bon and the family.
very comfortable
It’s good place for a trip

Phòng xinh xắn lắm ạ, mà sạch bong, mình vào nhà tắm thấy khô ráo là ưng lắm rồi. Mình muốn check in sớm mà bạn host cũng hỗ trợ hết mình nữa. Phòng cũng dễ tìm thui, chỉ dẫn okila lắm. Nói chung là ko có gì để chê.
Phòng sạch, đẹp, chỗ để xe thuận tiện, ngõ rộng chứ không bé xíu như nhiều homestay khác ☺️
Chỗ ở mới, vị trí đẹp. Nhiều sinh viên hay người đi làm mà tôi biết cũng chọn khu vực này
phòng đẹp, sạch sẽ
Sau này mình vẫn sẽ chọn home mỗi khi có dịp quay lại HN

Highly recommend! The apartment is tidy, fresh, and bright. Close to West Lake, so the air is really pleasant. It’s super central and easy to travel from the airport. Big thanks to the host for the awesome Ha Long Bay tour!
Wonderful place to stay in Hanoi. Close to the lake, easy walk to cafes, and just minutes from major tourist sites. Very quiet inside and the bed was super comfortable. Host was very helpful too!

Hatten einen tollen Aufenthalt! Einziger Verbesserungsvorschlag: mehr als zwei Handtücher zur Verfügung stellen und andere Kissen, weil diese eher unbequem waren, aber das ist ja bekanntlich Geschmacksache.

Really good value for money, a bit outside the usual touristy locations, worth it if you want to experience more of a local experience, getting around with taxis is dirt cheap either way. The apartment building is mostly rooms from this host, so which room you get is probably random (floor and size). There is a free to use laundry machine in the roof top of the building which is nice. Wi-fi is pretty good to work from the room if you have to like I did and there's a smart TV you can connect to if you want to watch something.
nice and cosy flat well located closer to the west lake, tons of shops and food options nearby .

Gut erreichbare Gastgeber, wunderschöne saubere Wohnung mit ausreichend Platz.
Eher in einer lokalen Gegend gelegen, aber mit dem Roller ist man in 20min überall und man hat direkt einen Markt vor der Tür, wo man allerlei Früchte erwerben kann.
Wir würden definitiv wiederkommen!
I had a great stay here! Room was clean and very comfortable. The hosts were communicative with any questions I had. Thanks for a wonderful stay!
This is located in a local and quiet neighborhood. The host is responsive and friendly.
I love the place, would comeback again
Place was clean and cozy, nothing was missing
一樓能停租來的摩托車，對面有理髮、藥局，巷口出去有當地攤販，不遠處還有商場。
Great place very clean and easy
房间很干净。
Super Preis- Leistungs Verhältnis.
Nice stay!
Very nice apartment thank you !
Great choice for your stay in Hanoi
Great place and great host! Good views of the city
I had a great stay! the place looks nice and clean!
Phòng rất xứng đáng với số tiền tôi bỏ ra, nó mới, rộng và đầy đủ mọi thứ tôi muốn.  Ngoài ra bạn quản lý rất nhiệt tình thân thiện. Tôi rất hài lòng khi trải nghiệm dịch vụ ở đây

Căn hộ này thực sự là một không gian sống lý tưởng. Tôi đặc biệt ấn tượng với tầm nhìn thoáng đãng từ ban công. Thiết kế nội thất hiện đại và tinh tế, tạo cảm giác ấm cúng và sang trọng. Các tiện nghi trong căn hộ đều đầy đủ và hoạt động tốt. Nhân viên ở đây rất nhiệt tình và chu đáo, luôn sẵn sàng hỗ trợ khi tôi cần. Tôi chắc chắn sẽ giới thiệu căn hộ này cho bạn bè và người thân của mình.

I had a great stay! The bed was very comfortable, and I really enjoyed the AC and the view from the room. The neighborhood is authentic and was non-touristy, which I truly appreciated. Having access to a fridge in the room and washing machines + dryer and drying line was a big plus (on the 8th floor). The host was consistently responsive and kind. Overall, it was excellent value for the price, highly recommended!

Highly recommended property and host. For travellers looking to immerse themselves in Hanoi away from the tourist areas like the Old Quarter. Still a short ride if you want to go there. Tucked in a tight alleyway, this property is easy to find and just minutes from West Lake. Tons of things to do around. Check-in was easy and the place was very clean. Thank you very much! ❤️

The place is alright, clean but not super comfortable of you want a nice rest. The alarm of the gate goes of everytime someone opens te door, and only get turned off when someone shuts it. Every night I got woken up by the alarm because someone left the building and forgot to close to door, which was very frustrating.
Rất đẹp, rất sạch sẽ, phòng mới tinh, chủ nhà hỗ trợ rất tốt

Great value for money stay in hanoi. Close to the calmer side of west lake. Best if you wanna be away from the hustle of old quarter. Cabs are easy to get. Venture into the smaller streets in the area around the accommodation for more local food, fruits and pagodas
Chỗ ở tốt

Very comfortable place. Great location, near transportation. Close to marketplace and supermarkets. We loved being able to look out the balcony and watch the ladies practicing their dance in the courtyard nearby.
Tuyệt

This apartment is a gem! Super clean and relaxing. Being near West Lake made it feel calm and cool. Location is perfect for exploring Hanoi. The host was really helpful and set us up with an amazing Halong Bay tour.

Great vibes here! The apartment is clean, modern, and has a really fresh feel. It’s in a perfect spot near the lake and close to everything in the city. Our Ha Long Bay trip was amazing – thanks to the host!
Hỗ trợ nhiệt tình dù đêm muộn

I knew I made the right decision to stay here, the location is perfect! Not so close to the tourist spots which is perfect if you wanna explore Hanoi outside of those touristy places. Met nice people and there are really good underrated shopping places nearby (5 min walking distance)

Nous avons bien aimé notre nuit, II manquait de rien. C’était propre, simplement à l’arrivée personne était capable de vraiment nous aider sur notre chambre, mais en fait on avait simplement pas reçu le guide d’arrivé. Autrement nous n’avons rien a dire c’était super 😊
The apartment is new and clean. Kitchen was well equipped. Walking distance from grocery stores and restaurants.

Le logement était très propre et l’entrée dans les lieux simple.
Chambre très agréable pour un prix raisonnable.

Stayed here for three nights, I self checked in after midnight and it was an easy process to figure out. The building is very secure, didn't feel unsafe at all.
Location - I loved the location, I was amongst where the locals live, not the tourists. The studio flat is over an hour walk from Hanoi Old Quarter, Taxi/Bike is 15/20minutes.
Building - Please note this is a new building, there is currently work going on - until completed, you will hear banging.
Washing Machine - is located on the 7th floor, I messaged the owner as I didn't know where it was at the time (no details on AirBnB profile) the owner got back to me over 24hours later late at night, I was leaving the following morning.
Please note you will need to buy your on washing machine detergent etc.
Studio Room - Was perfect, nice clean bathroom, shower was lovely, comfortable bed, air con was a blessing and having a fridge to put my water in, couldn't go wrong.
Overall, I highly reccomend.
Schöner Aufenthalt, sehr einfacher Check in durch die klare Anleitung
잘 쉬었다가 갑니다
happy with my stay. worth what i payed.
Great host! Love the cute place, this is a gem and always will stay here

Great host and a nice place.
tnx
A great place to stay

I stayed in Hanoi for 4 days, this was a great place to stay about a 15-20 muinite walk from the central tourist attractions, and the apartment itself self was immaculate. Met with basic needs and more including amenities like Netflix and a clothes steamer. Overall a very comfortable stay and I enjoyed it a lot!

A wonderful place to stay for both short and long-term visits. The location is near West Lake, with plenty of dining and entertainment options nearby. The room is clean, spacious, and fully equipped with all necessary amenities. Everything in the room works perfectly. The staff are friendly and always ready to help.

Nice location if you want to be a bit away from the business of old town. Room is spacious and staff is friendly. I checked out at 11 am, but my flight home was at 11pm. They allowed me to store my luggage during the day, and when I came to pick up my luggage I was able to shower as well before my flight, which was very convenient after a long day of sweating in hanoi.
真是一家宝藏旅店，我可以说有点后悔没有早点选择这家旅店，我在河内的这段旅行时光因为这家店而更加值得回忆。因为不管是服务态度还是居住环境，我都可以称之为一流，最重要的是价格也非常合适，倘若让我再次前往越南河内，我想我还是会选择这里居住！

This place is very comfortable. The location is peaceful, close to major tourist attractions, and great coffee shops nearby. I loved staying here. This place was recommended by a friend of mine and I want to recommend this place to all of you. It's located inside of a spa where you can get massage services while you stay here at a discounted rate. There is also a great hair salon in front of the airbnb. I look forward to staying here again.

- Quite big room with comfortable bed and sofa.
- the kitchen was not really good, we had problem with hot water in the kitchen sink.
- no kitchen towels or napkins, i had to go to the front desk for them, water pressure in thr bathroom was a bit low.
- anyway, it was good to stay

Cozy apartment , looked exactly as described and was comfortable.
Location is quite central overall most of the Old Quarter is reachable by foot.
Overall the apartment was clean but unfortunately we encountered a cockroach in the bathroom.
The price is really fair, would recommend.
Tuyệt vời

This was one of the best accommodations we had in Vietnam. The location is quiet and very central. The place is spacious, beautifully furnished, clean, and the bed is incredibly comfortable. Christine and the rest of the staff are very friendly and helpful.

A very relaxing and private apartment with all the amenities you could need.
The staff were extremely friendly and accomodating and I had a lovely time' I would definitely recommend this stay.

The place was large and very comfortable. Everything was described but the key storage is a little sketchy at night. But everything else was great.
The locations 5 min scooter away from the nightlife and that was stated. I would stay here again if I come back
Super friendly and helpful host! When one of my friends thought she left her passport the staff immediately responded and checked the room to see if it was there.
We had a truly relaxing time at Christine's place. The peace and quiet was just what we needed. The kitchen was great, and the staff were incrediblely helpful!

We had a great stay! While it’s not super close to Hoan Kiem Lake or the internet-famous cafes like Giang, the location is still good—peaceful and quiet.
Check-in was very convenient, even with our late-night arrival. The place was spotless, the aircon was nice and cold, and the pillows and towels were all set—super comfy! Plus, the staff at the spa were really nice, which added to the experience.
We also loved the thoughtful touch of having a garment steamer and a hairdryer in the room—it felt more like a hotel than just an Airbnb!
The host was very responsive and accommodating. We loved our stay and would definitely recommend it!

Pour ce prix-là, c'est un super appartement dans le centre de Hanoï, où tout est quasiment accessible à pieds !
Christine est très réactive et à l'écoute, je recommande fortement !
また泊まりたいです！チェックアウト後の手荷物も預かっていただきありがとうございました😆

A Wonderful Stay in a Cozy and Stylish Space!
I had an amazing experience staying at this place! The room was spacious, beautifully designed, and incredibly clean. The decor had a warm and modern touch, making it feel both comfortable and stylish. The bed was large and super comfortable, ensuring a restful sleep after a long day travel.
The host was very accommodating and responsive, making check-in and check-out a breeze

I had an amazing stay at Christine’s Airbnb! The apartment was spotless, beautifully decorated, and exactly as described in the listing. The location was perfect—just a short walk to the main attractions and surrounded by great cafes and shops. The thoughtful touch like cozy blankets made the stay even better.
I would definitely recommend this Airbnb to anyone visiting the area and look forward to staying again in the future!
房子挺不错的，干净整洁，设备齐全。只不过厕所经常有蟑螂
Room was really cozy, clean & smells really nice! I felt safe too!
a great place for both tourists and people who would seek for a private and quiet place for staycation. Highly recommended

The space is very minimalist, but well maintained.
I arrived after hours for their spa, which is downstairs. Following the self check in notes got me inside just fine. It sort of felt like doing an escape room, but in a secure way.
The elevator is a nice touch for this space.
The bathroom shower is wet room style, so expect to squeegee the floor once you finish showering.
I rented a scooter during my stay and the hosts had secure parking available.
The area is nice with restaurants and services in walking distance. Decent location. Old Quarter is still 18 minutes walk or short taxi ride.
The view out the window is the neighboring building. The bed is comfortable. WiFi works fine. The kitchen had one hot plate burner, but that was good for our needs.
After hours check out was also easily managed.
Overall, a nice stay. Thanks so much!
Staff was very kind and welcoming. Beautiful area filled with good places to eat and drink coffee. Easy walking distance to the best parts of the city.
We had a great time! The room was clean, everything was in walking distance and the communication was easy. Big recommendation :)
Mình có việc ở lại Hà Nội tương đối lâu và mình chọn ở đây. Host thân thiện nhiệt tình, chị dọn dẹp rất vui tính. Mình check out và có quên đồ chị ý giúp mình giặt và cất giúp mình
