Căn phòng được trang trí đẹp và ấm cúng, phòng vệ sinh khô ráo, đệm mềm mại và mình vô cùng thích chăn ga gối của home. Tuy nhiên phòng hơi nhỏ, sẽ bất tiện cho khách nào nhiều hành lí, còn lại thì rất tuyệt vời. Khu vực yên tĩnh, phù hợp để nghỉ ngơi, đi bộ vào trung tâm rất tiện

This is a great place to stay if you are in Hanoi! It is in a great location, and super easy to check in and out of! The decorations are also adorable, making it feel super homey! Would definitely recommend this place!
Phòng đẹp
Phòng sạch sẽ

El alojamiento está nuevo y es la decoración es bonita, pero es demasiado pequeño, además no tiene luz natural y está en una planta baja no en una primera planta (confusión idiomática). Es bastante agobiante  al no tener ventanas y no tiene perchas ni espacio para colocar tu equipaje. El anfitrión no tenía un espacio adecuado para colocar la jabonera y al estar sobre el váter se cayó y me hizo pagarla. Cuando estaba cogiendo mis cosas para irme llamó a la puerta para echarme de malas formas (eran las 11.01 am).
Very nice apartment near the lake. Very clean and comfortable. Worth the money.
Logement très bien placé ! Très bon rapport qualité-prix ! Je recommande à 100% à tous les voyageurs passant par Hanoï :)
Phòng sạch sẽ, đồ đầy đủ. Chủ nhà rất tận tâm, sẵn lòng hỗ trợ khách và vui tính. Mình nhất định sẽ quay lại khi có dịp.
Phòng nội thất gọn gàng sạch sẽ, đầy đủ các vật dụng cơ bản để nấu ăn, trải nghiệm 1 ngày ở đây rất tuyệt vời, nhẹ nhàng và yên bình!

Home rất xinh, nội thất trong nhà đều mới, tv phòng khách có netflix. Điểm cộng lớn so với các nơi khác là bếp được trang bị đầy đủ gia vị, có cả bột canh, mì chính, đường,… bạn có thể nấu ở đó mà không cần mang gia vị lỉnh kỉnh theo. Sàn nhà sạch bóng không có bụi (điều mình rất quan tâm khi đánh giá nơi ở). Chị host rất dễ thương và rep tin nhắn nhanh. Check in thuận tiện. 5 sao cho trải nghiệm tuyệt vời!

Quynh’s place was great.  Everything was well designed and clean.  Communication was great.  The vinhomes  ocean park community is filled with happy and friendly people.  I was shocked the apartment had two bathrooms which was nice.  The only thing missing from the apartment was an armoire or place to store your luggage.   Although overall excellent.
Mình đã có 1 trải nhiệm tuyệt vời, phòng rất đẹp và đầy đủ tiện nghi

“I was truly impressed by the apartment — spacious, airy, and filled with natural light. I especially loved the room with the sunset view; it was absolutely stunning. If I have the chance to come back, I would definitely love to stay here again.”

I had such a wonderful stay! The place was super clean, cozy, and felt just like home. Quynh Anh was so kind and responsive, which made everything even better. I’d happily stay here again—thank you for everything!

Appt is in a new residential area, very walkable. The appt is awesome! Has everything you need and more. That projector in the room was a very nice touch. Internet is really good. The host is amazing and helpful.
But it is 30 mins on taxi to old quarter. So, choose this appartment if you are ok with the distance.
Homestay rộng rãi, có 2 phòng tắm khá tiện lợi, đồ dùng đầy đủ, sạch sẽ. Chị chủ thân thiện và hướng dẫn chi tiết. 🥰

깨끗하고 정돈된 숙소 너무 감사해요! 아이들이 있어서 청결한것에 민감하기도 하고, 저도 원래 비위가 약해서 더러우면 견딜수가 없는데 이곳은 제가 묵었던 에어비엔비중에 거의 최고로 깨끗했습니다. 벌레도 없고요! 정말 세심하게 관리하고있다는것을 느낄수있어요. 호스트는 역대급으로 친절합니다!! 이렇게 응답이 빠르고 적극적으로 지원하는 호스트를 본적이없어요. 자기일처럼 나서주고 저희의 바베큐를 위해 함께 나와서 불을 피우는것까지 도와주었습니다. 그녀가 임신중이라 너무 힘들까봐 걱정이 될정도였습니다😂 저희를 위해 이렇게 애써주셔서 너무 감사합니다!❤️ 오션파크에 머무르는 사람이있다면 이 숙소를 강력 추천합니다!!!
Host cực kì nhiệt tình, nhà sạch sẽ, decor đẹp và nệm dễ ngủ. Ở dài ngày rất thoải mái.

Lần đầu tiên mình được trải nghiệm 1 homestay xinh xắn và đầy đủ tiện nghi như vậy. Căn hộ siêu ấm cúng, thoải mái, view đẹp thoáng và khiến mình có cảm giác như ở nhà. Bạn chủ nhà rất thân thiện, nhiệt tình, chủ động hỗ trợ mình trong suốt quá trình ở đây. Mình sẽ quay lại đây khi có cơ hội và highly recommend cho các cặp đôi/nhóm bạn ạ!

> decoration was a nice touch
> clean and fully equipped
> host was just right
> the view wasn’t much but then again it was not a problem
> 10/10 would recommend
Căn hộ rộng, đẹp, thoáng… chủ nhà cực kỳ thân thiệt.!

We stayed at Quỳnh Anh's place for a week and enjoyed the comfortable apartment.  The location is good with lots of shops and restaurants along with buses that will take you around the area and into Hanoi.  The apartment looked like the photos and the kitchen was well equipped. Some perks were the clothes washer, all the windows and natural light, and of course our great host. She made us feel very welcome and was always available to answer our questions.
Chủ nhà dễ thương, phòng siêu thơm và sạch sẽ 😘

Mình đã chọn Lamer Homstay để có một trải nghiệm khác biệt và mình thật sự thấy thực sự đáng hơn những gì mình mong đợi. Không gian sống trong chung cư rất hiện đại và tiện nghi. Cảm giác như đang ở trong chính căn nhà của mình đã mang đến cho mình cảm giác ấm cúng và thoải mái. Một sự lựa chọn đúng đắn khi muốn những buổi trip ngắn.

The interior was so tasteful and made us feel so calm. The apartment was very clean and the details were thought out.
Internet connection is great and the cupboard has everything for a longer stay, like spices, oil, salt and pepper.
The Quýnh Anh is very responsive and helpful. The recommendations were very insightful.
All-in-all our stay was excellent.
The place is located a bit further away from Hanoi but that ensures the peaceful atmosphere and good sleep.
나 혼자만 알고 싶을 정도로 너무 편안하고 내 집같은 편안한 숙소였습니다. 숙소주인분도 매우 친절했어요! 다음에 하노이 오면 반드시 다시 오고 싶은 숙소 입니다. 감사합니다. 😀

Chúng mình đã có 1 kỳ nghỉ ngắn nhưng vô cùng vui vẻ vị tại La Mer của Quỳnh Anh. Con trai mình cực kỳ thích vì có nhiều điểm vui chơi thú vị gần nơi ở: Vịnh Paradise, Hồ Ngọc Trai… Cảnh quan đẹp và sạch sẽ, thoáng đãng.
Căn hộ vô cùng đáng yêu với tông màu nhẹ nhàng & những trang trí xinh xắn, đặc biệt sạch sẽ và thơm. Chủ nhà đã tinh tế để ý từng góc nhỏ trong ngôi nhà, tạo cảm xúc dễ chịu cho khách lưu trú. Hơn thế nữa, Quỳnh Anh rất nhiệt trình phản hồi & hỗ trợ những thắc mắc của khách, với phong thái lịch sự. Thật sự biết ơn vì điều đó!
Hẹn trở lại La Mer một ngày gần nhất!🌿
Cảm ơn vì đã mang đến cho mình 1 trải nghiệm tuyệt vời khi ở tại đây. Mang lại cảm giác như chính ngôi nhà của mình, điều mà chưa bao giờ mình cảm nhận được. Mọi thứ đều hoàn hảo.

Die Unterkunft ist unfassbar schön und es war alles genauso beschrieben wie in dem Inserat. Alles war sauber und der Check-In war super flexibel.
Leider mussten wir unseren Aufenthalt verkürzen, da gegenüber eine Großbaustelle im vollen Gange war, bei der selbst am Sonntag die komplette Nacht durchgearbeitet wurde. Das fanden wir sehr schade, da wir wirklich gerne länger in der Unterkunft geblieben wären. Die Kommunikation mit Quynh war aber wirklich super! Sie hat uns sofort Hilfe angeboten, da der Baulärm wohl nicht üblich ist. Sie hat sich um eine neue Unterkunft gekümmert und wollte sogar unser Taxi zu der Unterkunft übernehmen. Außerdem hat Sie nun direkt in der Anzeige ergänzt, dass aktuelle Lärm von der Baustelle gegenüber entstehen kann. Aus diesen Gründen geben wir der Unterkunft trotzdem 5 Sterne!

I spent a wonderful three weeks at Quynh Anh's apartment. Check-in and check-out were easy. The accommodation has everything you may need for a long stay and it is very clean, cozy and nicely decorated. The surrounding area feels safe and well-maintained, with lots of shops, cafes, restaurants and places to have a walk.
Quỳnh Anh is a truly wonderful host and was very helpful. She proactively provided an extra blanket when it got colder and treated me to some delicious homemade food before the New Year. And when I accidentally locked myself out of the apartment she was able to resolve it very quickly. :)
Thank you for a great stay and I hope to be back again one day!
The flat was in a great location for what I needed. It was really clean and the owner was very communicative. Check in was really easy. Thank you for a great stay.
Phòng như trên ảnh, sạch đẹp và thiết kế có gu. Chủ nhà nhiệt tình phản hồi và hỗ trợ nhanh. Vị trí ngay trung tâm đi lại thuận tiện.

I had an amazing stay at My and Mei Mei’s place. The location was absolutely perfect with everything I needed just around the corner, and it was only a short walk to the lake. The apartment itself felt like a true home, cozy and comfortable from the moment I arrived. What really made the experience special were the hosts. My and Mei Mei were incredibly helpful and kind, making me feel more like a local than a guest. I’d absolutely recommend staying here to anyone visiting the area.

Fantastic safe clean space in the Old Quarter. You can pick up a Grab or walk anywhere. The AC is fantastic! This is a great place with fresh linens. The family and host are incredibly kind people. There is a laundry downstairs which is incredibly convenient. My host helped me get a car to the airport at 4 AM and helped me get a cab when I arrived the second time. This is a great place if you’re traveling solo or as a couple. I’ve stayed here twice and love it.

The best air bnb in Hanoi. I had an amazing stay here and the hosts were exceptionally friendly and helpful. The room was spotless and the bed was comfortable. I would stay here again without question

My is an excellent host. I booked past minute and wrong date but she was really helpful and accepted my request quickly which helped a lot.
Lovely space with everything we needed.
I appreciate the recommendations and help with booking transportation too.

Wonderful place to stay and just as the images showed! The hosts were super responsive and fast to reply to any questions also were flexible for us which I really appreciate! Thank you so much and maybe see you again soon

I had a wonderful stay at this homestay! The location is perfect - just a short walk to the Old Quarter and Hoan Kiem Lake, which made exploring the city super convenient. The apartment itself was clean, beautifully decorated, and fully equipped with everything I needed, from a comfy bed and modern bathroom and fast Wi-Fi. The host was very welcoming and responsive, offering great recommendations for local food and attractions. This place really felt like a peaceful retreat right in the heart of Hanoi. Highly recommended for both short and long stays!

This Airbnb is perfectly located in the heart of the Old Quarter. I could easily walk everywhere without needing Grab or taxis. There’s a mini mart, pharmacy, and coffee shop right downstairs, which was super convenient. A washing machine is also available on the first floor.
My very first impression was how fresh and pleasantly scented the room always was. What impressed me the most was how kind and responsive the host was. They even replied to my messages at 1 AM to help me order food. I truly appreciated their warm hospitality. We had a wonderful and relaxing stay here, and I would definitely recommend this place to others.
Great central location. Washing machine on 1st floor. Friendly host.
großartige Lage, unter der Wohnung kommt gleich ein 24/7 Waschsalon rein, dann ist es insbesondere perfekt für Backpacker.

I just returned to Vietnam for the first time in 5 years, and this Airbnb truly made my trip memorable. The location is unbeatable — right in the Old Quarter and just a short walk to Hoan Kiem Lake. The area is full of life, with so many famous and delicious traditional food spots around every corner. It was exactly the atmosphere I had missed.
The apartment was clean, stylish, and very comfortable. Even though it’s in the center of everything, it was surprisingly quiet at night, which I really appreciated after a long day out. The host was welcoming, responsive, and made sure I had everything I needed.
And honestly, for such a prime location, the price was more than reasonable. It’s rare to find a place that combines great location, comfort, and value so well.
Highly recommend this place if you want to experience the real Hanoi!
Was woken up before 7am to angle grinding and drilling in the building that lasted all day. Seems money more important than guests comfort.

it was a great place, small studio in a city center, enough space though to stay for a while. The location is amazing, very close to all the atraction and amazing restaurants. the owner us super friendly and responding within minutes! Super heplful! One thing to have in mind is that there is no daylight coming in, but thats very common in Hanoi, there is no window but overall really great place!

Amazing place and the hosts were so helpful with checking in and the photos they provided helped a lot! Great location for a great price. Would definitely stay again, the place was spacious and the bed was great!

Uyen and Nhung are so helpful starting from the check-in process until check out. Even though we just stayed for just an overnight, we had a great stay!
You have everything else you need and its not that super tiny, its just perfect for solo and couple travellers. Will recommend this to my friends!

J’ai passé un excellent séjour ! Le logement était vraiment bien, propre et confortable, et surtout très bien situé, à proximité de tout. Les hôtes ont été adorables, très gentils et toujours réactifs en cas de besoin. Je recommande vivement !
숙소 위치가  대부분 명소를 도보로 갈수 있을정도로 좋았고 무엇보다 청결도가 최상입니다 다음에도 꼭 다시 방문하고 싶습니다

Hello, thank you so much for hosting me. Even though I encounter a very minimal issues, you were able to address it on time. You guys are amazing! I do really appreciate it!! I would certainly recommend this to my friends that will be traveling to Hanoi! ❤️❤️

De loin un des meilleurs hôtes Airbnb que j’ai pus rencontrer, aimable, gentil, accueillant, m’ont permis d’arriver à une heure flexible, le service et la bienveillance, ainsi que la générosité de ces hôtes est omniprésente ; je recommande fortement, j’ai passé un très agréable moment, le logement est propre, fonctionnel, il y a tout ce dont vous avez besoin, un 10/10 plus que mérité ; merci encore !

The place is very strategic and close to the cathedral and maison centrale and old quater and in front of many foods, coffee shops, and supermarkets.. the place is very clean and very very fragrant! love it 🫶 they don't have a tv but they have a very amazing projector tv.. and free laundry.. and very fast and friendly response.. very comfortable.. soon, when I come back I will come back to this place again
The place was incredibly clean and homey, in an amazing location in the old quarter, right near train street. The host’s were very responsive and helpful!

very sweet host
helped us to change towels timely and also provided free laundry also gave us a whole list of good food places to eat at !!! genuinely sweeet
Amabilidad espectacular por parte de los anfitriones. Una ubicación y todo lo necesario que garantiza una comodidad absoluta. Gracias!
Beautiful place, close to the locals and the host is helpful
chỗ ở sạch sẽ , ấm cúng

I had an amazing experience staying at Uyen's place! From the moment I arrived, Uyen was incredibly welcoming and made sure I had everything I needed for a comfortable stay. The check-in process was very easy and seamless, which made the arrival even more stress-free.
Nice place for visiting the city. The host was very reactive

Amazing place. Really nice to stay.
Bed was comfortable and you can use the projector
Great location. The place is on the smaller side but we'll designed. Easy check in. Attentive host.
nice place to stay😊
We had a good stay and felt very comfortable throughout. The accommodation provided everything we needed, from essential amenities to a welcoming atmosphere.
We stayed for 2 nights and it was cozy, close to train station and old quarters. We would love to book again but it says it is not available. Highly recommended
Nous avons réservé 30 minutes avant d’arriver ! Super cocon !
Clean and comfortable
Clean and comfortable

Wonderful, quiet, and very clean place to stay in Ha Giang. 24hr reception for when we got in during the middle of the night was much appreciated. The host was so friendly and always helped with luggage and all questions. Would definitely stay again!
Great for a quick stay. Friendly and responsive staff.
Je recommande !
Very beautiful location. absolutely loved staying there even for only a single night. it was a bit difficult to reach as the path up there was very steep in some places.
We hebben uiteindelijk in een andere ruimte geslapen. Maar het personeel was super vriendelijk en hielp ons goed. Ze spreken goed Engels en we hebben een mooie ha giang loop gedaan van 2 dagen.

Комфортный домик на возвышенности
Всё показали, рассказали
Есть большой бассейн
В городе очень много хороших ресторанов, в сравнении с остальными городами вокруг
Super vriendelijk personeel! Mooie en ruime kamer. Mooi en leuk zwembad.

Der Bungalow war so wie beschrieben. Der Pool war auch super. An dem Drumherum kann noch gearbeitet werden. Das Badezimmer, welches wir uns mit den anderen Bungalows geteilt haben wurde wenig gereinigt. Die Leute haben dort alles liegen lassen, gebrauchte Handtücher und Einwegzahnbürsten. Das Frühstück war okay. Essen im "Restaurant" auch. Wenn man etwas Fußweg auf sich nimmt könnte man auch im Ort essen. Viel los ist dort aber nicht. Es kommen alle nur für die Loop Touren, die für manche auch eine Party Tour sind denke ich.
Wir haben auch eine Tagestour gemacht die wirklich schön war. Ein Tag war für und ausreichend.
great place, excellent communication from host Johnny - would stay again!
Highly recommend this place, we loved it here and enjoyed the beautiful view and pool. Staff were very helpful with many things and always happy to help.

정말 친절한 호스트와 멋진 풍경이 어울러진 곳입니다
특히 호스트님이 굉장히 친절하시며 답장이 굉장히 빠르며
영어도 잘하시고 투어 관련하여 문의도 감사하게도 직접 다 알아봐주셨습니다
디너도 한번 즐겨보시는거 추천드립니다
셰프님의 음식도 아주 훌륭했습니다
짧은 하장 여행이였지만 굉장히 특별한 시간이였고
짧은 시간이라 아쉬움이 많아
다시 방문할 예정이며 다시 방문시에도 꼭 다시 이용할 예정입니다

The place was beautiful and so peaceful. Was supposed to stay only a couple nights but ended up extending my stay every day, just couldn’t get enough of this place. Anh was very friendly and welcoming, always available if in need. His family also!
It was a pleasure staying here and will definitely be back when in Vietnam🇻🇳😁

Worth every penny and more. This is a beautiful sanctuary for a night or two if you’re heading to do the loop.
We felt right at home thanks to the sweetest host. Enjoyed lazing in the hammock, riding the bikes into town and exploring the waterfalls and swimming holes on our own before coming back to a delicious dinner and homemade happy wine with great company.
I stayed here after my sister had stayed here years ago. Highly recommend if you want to enjoy a home stay experience :)

Airbnb donnez une sixième étoile à Anh !!! Accueil exceptionnel,aux petits soins pour ses hôtes, généreux,solaire ! Très beau logement tout en bois et pierres de la rivière,on s'y sent tout de suite très bien, très belle atmosphère. Repas copieux et excellents partagés avec Anh qui a le don de rassembler les gens autour de la tablée comme si nous étions une grande famille de voyageurs. Bref ,vous l'aurez compris : j'ai adoré. Cam on Anh.
Peaceful and quiet, my only issue was the dinner was the same every evening, and not hot, so if you want variation and/or a hot meal you’ll need a taxi or 40 minute walk into town.  Nice walk though.

J’y ai passé une nuit avant de commencer le circuit, et tout s’est super bien passé.
L’ambiance était très agréable, l’accueil vraiment chaleureux, et le repas du soir était excellent.
Je recommande sans hésiter !

Eine sehr tolle Unterkunft, die Menschen sind alle sehr nett und das Essen war richtig gut. Die beste Unterkunft auf unser bisherigen Reise. Hilfsbereit und eine sehr nette Familie die das Homestay betreibt.

From the moment I arrived at Ha Giang, I was picked up by taxi, felt immediately warmly welcomed by The Anh and his entire staff and family 🙏🤗. Super clean bungalow, with a hammock overlooking a rumbling stream, super comfortable bed, no bugs, super hot shower, amazing dinners with healthy home grown and cooked food, even as a vegetarian!  I would absolutely recommend!💯

Had an absolute lovely time here! The dinners were always delicious and a really mellow way to meet other people. The surroundings are everything you look for and the tranquility is tangible in every corner! Absolute recommendation!

Anh and Linh were great and welcoming hosts. I really felt like home, they are a family, were really nice and we had dinner together. The food was delicious and the Home Stay is beautifully located in peaceful nature at a river a little outside of Ha Giang. They were very fast answering questions live or digitally and helped to organize stuff for me. Would definitely stay there again. Thanks for your family’s hospitality!

Really a nice Place
Away from the center in a very peaceful location
The surrounding is very beautiful
I really enjoyed to stay here

I really loved it here! The family is amazing, had great tips. The waterfall hike was amazing and the food is really really good.
I got sick while being there and they were so helpfull, bringing food to my room!! Thanks so much!

Very nice place to stay outside the city. They prepare lovely food for dinner. The host is very helpful with arranging for your next bus or whatever you want to do.
The showers are very good and warm. Which was very nice because in wintertime it can be cold out there

The best part of The Anh's place was  the hospitality of the host, I arrived very late at night (almost at 3 am!) and was able to squeeze in 4.5 hour sleep. The hot water shower helped shake some stress off. The host helped arrange a tour in no time and also coordinated with my bus driver so that I would have a taxi available to get to the AirBnB at 3 am, he even coordinated at that time with the bus driver although arrangements had been made at 7 pm in the evening! Much appreciated!

If you ever go to Ha Giang don’t bother staying in the city centre and stay at The Anh’s. It’s quiet, there are beautiful views overseeing the river, friendly staff and great food (breakfast pankackes!!).

Une maison très accueillante. Un cadre magnifique. Nous avons pris un bungalow qui donnait sur la rivière et nous avons dormi au son de celle-ci pendant 3 jours.
Beaucoup de choses à faire aux alentours. M. Tré Anh est très attentif. Il donne d’excellents conseils sur quoi voir et comment s’y rendre ayant été guide pendant des années.
Nous avons aussi beaucoup aimé discuter avec lui lors du délicieux souper le soir.
Nous recommandons fortement!

Nous avons adoré notre séjour avec The Anh et lihn. Nous étions mêle un peu triste de repartir. La cuisine est très bonne. Les chambres super chouettes. L’ambiance trés conviviale. Ils sont adorables. Ils aiment leur métier. Les balades à pied autour : un festival pour les yeux! Les bains dans la piscine en pierre, revigorant et rafraîchissant! Nous espérons revenir!  Nous vous recommandons ce lieu, vivement!

Super stay, enjoyed the refreshing pool.
🏊‍♀️. Food was super nice as was the cook Ling.
Nice evening with other guest at the dinner table. Good tips regarding the journey.
This place is very beautiful and the host is such a nice person. Also the Dinner was absolutely delious, even though i am vegan he cooked a super tasty Dinner. I really enjoyed the stay! Thanks a lot

Wir waren sehr zufrieden hier. Schöne Unterkunft, angenehme und zuvorkommende Inhaber. Hier konnten wir richtug gut abschalten. Das gane ist einwenig außerhalb ( man braucht eine Stunde Weg ins Zentrum) aber man hat auch die Möglichkeit sich ein Taxi kommen zu lassen. Wir haben hier zu Abend gegessen und das essen war einfach aber gut ;) Wir waren sehr zufrieden hier uns würden nochmal kommen ;)
Sehr zu empfehlende Unterkunft mit sehr freundlichen und sympathischen Vermietern, die sich um alle Bedürfnisse kümmern.

Nous avons passé un séjour merveilleux chez Anh et son neveu Linh. Le lieu est un petit paradis dans la nature ou l'on peut s'endormir avec pour fond sonore la bruit de la rivière. Anh et Linh nous ont très bien accueillis et ont été très volontaires pour nous aider et nous conseiller. Ils ont également partagé avec nous les produits de leur ferme, c'était un régal. Merci à eux pour leur hospitalité et leur générosité, ce fut notre plus belle rencontre humaine lors de notre voyage au Vietnam. Nous recommandons les yeux fermés leur logement pour une parenthèse calme et paisible.
extremely nice people.. Book the loop with them it's cheaper and thé money goes to local. WE had thé best Time ever❤️
I came back After I finished the loop because the stay was so Great. Good food, nice room, best Host. I can highly recommend the Place!

An’s stay was one of the highlights of our Vietnam trip! The staff there is soo friendly, it’s run by a family so it actually feels like a home! The food was lip smacking and hearty made by An’s mother. We had booked a hike with them and they were so fun! We went to a serene valley spot for hiking and swimming. It was the most mesmerising experience!!
An and her family are incredible people with such warmth and love. We left with our hearts and tummies full! An also gifted a with the cutest souvenir! Very grateful for that.
Would strongly recommend An’s house for a comfy and memorable stay!

We stayed only night there before going for the loop. It was really perfect. The view is amazing.
But most importantly we trust Anh for the 3 days loops and that was an amazing trip ! We left with Ban and Long and we enjoyed every part of it !
We were just together and no tourist group ! They chose some hidden space away from any tourist and we loved it !
Thank you for this trop ! We will never forget about it !
See you again !

Leuk verblijf in een zeer mooi kader.
prijs/ kwaliteit: top
We hebben gekozen om S'avonds te dineren bij An en dit was zeker geslaagd.
Goede communicatie over de locale activiteiten en hulp bij het boeken van verder transport.

An’s place was very beautiful and comfortable for our one night stay. The dinner was excellent, one of the best meals I have had in Vietnam. An also reserved another hut for two other folks I was traveling with which was greatly appreciated. The hut walls are very thin so there is little audio privacy between accommodations and our taxi driver did get lost attempting to find the place but overall it was a very nice stay and I would stay again.
Thank you An

Ans place was great! We stayed before and after doing the ha giang loop. Beautiful views from the rooms , close to the bus stop and An was so lovely. Made us an amazing dinner on the  first night we stayed and kept our big bags safe for us while we did the loop. Highly recommend
Super liebe Gastgeberin, leckeres Dinner und Frühstück, toller Ausblick aus dem Bungalow, sehr cooles Badezimmer mit Outdoorfeeling. Nach oder vor einer Tour sehr zu empfehlen :)
Merveilleux endroit avec une vue a faire tombé!! dans les rizières et les montagnes au coeur de Ha giang. Une hôte très aimable et attentionnée je le recommande fortement !!

Prachtig gelegen.
Warm en hartelijk onthaald.
Fijn contact met eigenares.
Ondanks dat we 2uur later arriveerden owv busvertraging, werd er nog een heerlijke maaltijd voor ons bereid.

A great experience from start to finish! An's House is in a quiet location and you have a great view of the mountains and fields.
An is super open and makes you feel comfortable at all times. The organisation of tours via An also runs smoothly - the tour guides that An provided us with were also wonderful!
We had a great time here and can only recommend it. ✨

The most amazing stay! The bungalow is super clean, has all essentials, the bed is so so comfortable and the view is beautiful ! But most importantly it has an amazing host and people ❤️ we got delicious dinner cooked and got told everything we needed to know - we also left our bag here for when we did the loop and when we came back tired we got lovely dinner again before getting on a bus ! The location is super good if you doing the loop yourself. Thank you so much we can’t wait to return one day

An’s house is beautiful. It’s outside the chaos and surrounded by the nature.
You can easily walk to many restaurants or everything you may need.
She was very helpful and also booked the transport from Hanoi to Ha Giang.
Dinner and breakfast are very good and you can enjoy the common areas
She also organised 4 days loop with the motorbike for us, very attentive to what we liked or not.

An’s House is an amazing place to stay. It’s centrally located in Ha Giang, yet surrounded by nature, offering the best of both worlds. The cottages are exceptionally clean and beautifully decorated, making it the best accommodation I’ve stayed at in this area during the past week.
An herself is incredibly kind and even offered us a meal, which was a lovely touch. I highly recommend staying here—an absolute gem!
An was an amazing host and helped us with all our questions. Amazing dinner and awesome location with a great view and a very comfortable bed!

AMAZING stay at An’s House. Probably the best we got in Vietnam!
She took care of everything for us, from the bus to get to Ha Giang (that we almost missed due to a wrong departure indication, but that we finally got thanks to her as she called a driver to take us and bring us to the bus which was already on the road. Unbelievable how reactive she’s been!), to the Ha Giang loop we did in 3 days, to the final bus from Ha Giang to Ninh Binh. I’ve never seen a host as kind and professionnel as her. We know we could be 100% safe with her.
The place is magical, surrounded by rice Fields and nature. Ecolodge style.
Ha Giang loop is definitely a tour you should do with An as her drivers and guides are local and know exactly how to avoir big groups so that you have an intimacy feeling. They are also very kind and excellent drivers.
Huge thanks Lady An’s again and the whe team!

An was so helpful and accommodating. I felt right at home, she had some great recommendations and always responded quickly to any queries I had. An had some good recommendations for what to do on the Ha Giang loop.
The bungalow I stayed in was so peaceful, the location is a few mins walk from the main road in town and so it’s very quiet and peaceful but easy to access restaurants and shops close by.
I’d definitely stay here again ❤️ thank you An

Wow! I am so glad and thankful of that I stayed 2 nights in this beautiful bungalow at An's House! An and her Staff are super friendly, kind, pro-active and welcoming. I really felt like being at home. Is is such a quiet and safe place, every night and morning the staff cooked super delicious food for everybody and even glutenfree for me! What a service and such a variety of meala and dishes. In the evening we sat together and An shared a lot of insights and history about the area and people living there. If you want An can modify and book your perfect Ha Giang Loop experience

An was very communicative and kind. We had a sweet tooth one night and she so graciously gave us chocolate bars and choco pies! She also is an incredible cook and made us a delicious meal our first night. The place is beautiful and it was an absolutely wonderful experience. Highly recommend!

This place is amazing! Super friendly and helpful people, beautiful place and the best beds we have had so far in Vietnam.
10/10 would recommend! If you go to Ha Giang, this is where you should stay.

An est une hôte très chaleureuse et aux petits soins. Le lieu est à son image.
Nous avons fait le tour sur 3 jours et ce fut de beaux moments et de belles découvertes.

An is the most lovely host/person we have met in Vietnam, she welcomed us right before starting the Ha Giang loop. Her kindness is amazing, her home cooked food was absolutely beautiful. The bungalow rooms were perfect with a view of the rice field/ lake filled with lotus flowers. An went out of her way and setup the room for me and my partner as I had just proposed, An surprised us with roses, wine and sweet treats. An let us keep our bags there while we did the ha giang loop and gave us a map on where to stay/ go on the loop (as we did it by ourselves) and supplied us with bike rental.  would highly recommend this beautiful home stay.
Host was very accommodating. Thank you so much
We cannot speak highly enough of An’s House! The space is so beautiful and An is an incredible host. She made us delicious food and was very responsive!

We had a lovely stay here! He was very helpful in getting us a bike to rent and letting us leave our big luggage there while we do the Ha Giang Loop :)
Would recommend!
Beautiful place

Mình đã có một trải nghiệm tuyệt vời không thể nào quên tại đây. Khung cảnh đón bình minh tuyệt đẹp, lều mới sạch sẽ tiện nghi, vợ chồng Ali tiếp đón bọn mình nhiệt tình, chu đáo. Một nơi tuyệt vời như vậy xứng đáng được nhiều người biết đến hơn nữa , nhất định quay lại khi có dịp

Incredible place! Best one we’ve been in Vietnam so far, looks like a Avatar movie.
Food was homemade by the guest’s wife and also was the best one we had here in Vietnam.
Really worth it to go there

This is a truly wonderful place with a magnificent view. A Li and Dinh took great care of us. They transported us with luggage on the motorbike from main road and offered us tasty dinner. Would recommend to anyone who wants privacy and tranquility, great value for money!
Có lần sau sẽ ghé lại

We hebben een geweldige overnachting gehad. De tent staat op het prachtige terrein van A Li en zijn vrouw Zihn. Het uitzicht is spectaculair! Hier kom je echt tot rust tijdens de Ha Giang loop. Alles is netjes en schoon. A Li en Zihn zijn erg vriendelijk en hebben een lekker diner en ontbijt voor ons gemaakt. We hebben genoten en zullen deze ervaring nooit meer vergeten. Dankjewel!

Es war ziemlich schwierig die Unterkunft zu finden, vor allem hatten wir auch keinen guten Empfang und es war nicht gut angeschrieben. Die Aussicht und die Gastfreundlichkeit haben das aber alles wieder wett gemacht. Die Aussicht ist unglaublich und das Essen war fantastisch! Die Gastgeber sind sehr freundlich und wir haben uns rundum wohl gefühlt. Grosses Plus war auch die Heizdecke im Bett, so haben wir wahnsinnig gut geschlafen.

Eine super schöne Unterkunft! Mitten in der Natur und mit spektakulärer Aussicht.
Dir Gastgeber sind sehr nett und kümmern sich rührend um einen. Wir hatten ein sehr leckeres gemeinsames Abendessen mit den Gastgebern.
Vielen Dank für alles!

Probabilmente uno dei posti più belli mai visti su questa piattaforma. Se passate da queste parti consiglio vivamente di fermarvi perché non rimarrete delusi..inoltre abbiamo potuto cenare con A Li e sua moglie Zinh un tipico pasto vietnamita passando una serata bellissima. Top top top🤙🏻

Séjour d’un nuit chez A Li durant notre trip en moto à Ha giang. Que dire… ce fut une soirée et une nuit exceptionnelle.
Nous avons pu dîner avec A Li et sa femme, le repas était très bon et nous avons échanger avec eux ( via un traducteur mais l’essentiel est de se faire comprendre ).
La tente possède tout le confort nécessaire et surtout la vue est a coupé le souffle.
La salle de bain et les toilettes sont très propres.
Une de mes meilleurs expérience sur Airbnb et autre…
Merci encore à A Li.

Dinh et Li sont des hôtes incroyables. Nous avons passé une soirée et une nuit magique perchés au milieu des montagnes. La nourriture qui nous a été proposée était délicieuse. Le lit est extrêmement confortable. Une expérience magique à vivre absolument !

Könnte ich alle Sprachen dieser Welt sprechen, hätte ich immer noch nicht die Worte um zu beschreiben wie fantastisch dieser Ort ist. Mit großem Abstand das beste und besonderste Airbnb in dem ich je untergekommen bin. Neben der unfassbar schönen Aussicht bekommt man zudem einen Einblick in die regionale Küche und Kultur. Das gemeinsame Abendessen mit den beiden Gastgebern war so herzlich schön und lecker, dass allein diese Erfahrung es wert gewesen wäre dort hinzukommen. Ich gebe gern gute Bewertungen ab, aber so gerechtfertigt wie diese hier war wirklich noch keine. Eine ingesamt fantastische Erfahrung, die wir nie vergessen werden. cảm ơn!
Absolutely beautiful location, clean and lovely tents and facilities. We were treated like family by the kind owners and ate like Champs. Overall amazing experience. Cannot recommend enough!
Very good place to stay. The dinner and breakfast were great. The food was very fresh
Absolutely beautiful and the hosts are very friendly
Li was very accommodating. Lovely place to stay.

Beautiful, secluded homestay in village near Ha Giang. We had initial trouble finding homestay as it is located in the back of the driveway and host didn't communicate instructions, but we were able to locate and get in contact after a bit. Regardless, Dung and his family treated us well and offered dinner and breakfast. Breakfast in their kitchen was delicious. The house itself is beautiful with great views and everything you need. We would recommend to anybody visiting Ha Giang!

Dung is a very friendly guy who will provide everything you need. You can trust him, you will be well taken care of! We decided to spend 2 nights at Dung's lake house and then go to Ha Giang Loop. If you're not in a hurry, I definitely recommend it.

Es war sehr angenehm bei Dung. Tolles Ambiente und eine sehr saubere Unterkunft.
Er war sehr zuvorkommend und es gab leckeres Essen und Tee. Ich kann es weiterempfehlen!
Thanks so much for the stay - place was lovely and meals were delicious!

A great spot to stay before and after the Ha Giang loop. The apartment is brand new and super nice, the family were so friendly and helped with transfers and renting a bike. Liem’s cooking was delicious. Would love to stay again

Great host, from assistance with transportation to food, everything was great! Thank you so much! Will definitely be back whenever I visit Ha Giang again.
10/10 would recommend.
Dung house is beautiful and immersed in the Nature. It might be a bit hard to reach if you don't have a Car, but Dung came to pick me up in Ha Giang and helped me moving around!

Dung hat sich gut um uns gekümmert und war sehr bemüht uns einen angenehmen Aufenthalt zu ermöglichen. Die Unterkunft ist sehr modern eingerichtet und lässt keine Wünsche offen. Dung war immer zur Stelle und hat uns auch in die Stadt gebracht.
Wir würden die Unterkunft auf jeden Fall weiterempfehlen!

The airbnb looks just like in the pictures; modern, with a great view, clean, and spacious. We felt very comfortable in the space and hope to be back sometime.
Dung is a great host. From before our arrival in Ha Giang he got in contact with our bus driver to find out where we were arriving at and organised a taxi to pick us up. He also gave us some great tips regarding completing the loop, and was happy to sit down with us to discuss helpful details.
Although the airbnb is slightly outside of the centre, Dung was so kind as to allow us to borrow one of his motorbikes before we managed to hire our own.
The host and the space are great, and I thoroughly recommend it :)
The place is pretty quiet and neat but it is almost like we are walking through a secret place in the forests. And breakfast is delicious in a big spacious.
Erg prettig verblijf! Er wordt goed voor je gezorgd!
A small, new, and spotlessly clean room with an amazing view. The host family was very friendly, and they prepared wonderful dishes for dinner.

I am so honored to be seemingly the first official guest in this new addition to the property here. Hosts and contractors worked continuously on the guest houses while I was completing my visit in the shared space and I was lucky to see both the artistic vision come to fruition, and to extend my stay to experience the finished product.
The strikingly modern addition within the powerfully authentic setting is a beautiful duality that must be experienced. The brand new technological amenities were luxurious and helpful. The family hospitality, cooking, and conversation were absolutely wonderful and contributing to what will be lifelong memories.
The town is quaint yet vibrant with a fun night life. The location is stunning, and centrally located for exploring the northern end of the Ha Giang province. I can't recommend this lovely homestay enough for the beauty, hospitality, and delicious delicious meals.
Great place

Stayed at Ha Giang Donkey Backpackers for one night before going on the Ha Giang loop. Organised the trip with Von at the hostel and had an incredible time, amazing scenery, friendly and experienced drivers, great stops along the way - 10/10. The hostel itself is basic but clean, secure, and exactly what you need from a base before hitting the road.
The location was a bit difficult to find as the address listed is wrong, but everything else was perfect. The host was very friendly and helpful and the room was very clean. I recommend it.

It's an okay place to spend a night before or after you do Ha Giang loop. Be careful, the location is not what's shown on Airbnb, and will be a bit of a walk from pretty much everything. The room is nice though!

Die Unterkunft lag an einer befahrenen Straße gegenüber eines Media Markt, der rund um die Uhr über einen Lautsprecher wirbt. Trotz das nachts der Verkehr zu hören war und man viel Helligkeit im Zimmer hatte, konnten wir gut schlafen.
Das Frühstück war oke, der Gastgeber und die Angestellten sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit!
Ingesamt stimmt das Preis-Leistungsverhältnis.
我预订的旅馆住满了，旅馆帮我安排了另一个旅馆，大家都很好。
Great room for a good price! Can really recommend!

It was a good place to stay in the centre of Ha Giang. The people speak Englisch and can help you with some advise for riding the loop. If you want you can book a tour in the hostel, but that’s up to yourself.
We had a good breakfast in the morning and you are directly on the right road for entering the loop.

Everything was great. We are so happy that we found this place. Everybody was so friendly and helpful. Thank you for this experience. A host was amazing. He was really interested in us. He gave us a good advices. Good communication.

Good cheap rooms, really good cheap food, bad organisation, booked two times one time we got the wrong room the other time there was not even a room free for us so we had to leave and search another place to sleep.
If everything goes well it's a nice place to stay.

Dit is een zeer goeie plek om je Ha Giang Loop te starten en eindigen. De kamer was basic, maar de gastvrijheid was zeer goed! We hebben hier ook onze scooters gehuurd, die van hele goeie kwaliteit waren. We hebben de Loop zelf gereden, maar we konden altijd whatsappen als we tips nodig hadden. Ze hebben ook voor ons de nachtbus naar Cat Ba geregeld, die ons bij het hostel ophaalde. Zo konden we na afloop van de loop meteen door! De Ha Giang Loop is prachtig om te rijden, het mooiste van onze reis door Vietnam! En ik raad dit hostel zeker aan als begin- en eindpunt. Veel plezier!

The people who work at Chopai Hostel are just great and super helpful; Lo organized an Easyrider to Dong Van for me and was very responsive via messages; the girls from the reception are super sweet and had some good suggestions for Ha Giang, helped me with organizing a bus to Hanoi, etc
I stayed two times at the same hostel in different rooms. I must say that the pictures look a little better than what the rooms really are. The room on 2nd floor was in better shape than 3rd floor which had an AC that was rattling too loud to sleep with (luckily there was a fan).
But apart from that everything was clean, there was hot water and towels. Breakfast was also included (i preferred the eggs over the overly sweet banana pancakes)
Considering the great service and hospitality, I would always come back. Thank you guys so much!

Super freundliches Personal, uns würden viele Tips gegeben und bei der Suche nach einem Bikeverleih geholfen. Die Zimmer sind vollkommen in Ordnung!
Das Frühstück war auch lecker :)

Communication a little bit bumpy at the beginning but turned out to be satisfying for both sides.
Basic rooms, cool balcony, breakfast & water on the go. Ok, cool.
Very cool hostel. The hosts were very helpfull, and the familly dinner was awesome. A good place to stay in Ha Giang.
Chambre basique correcte et propre. Le personnel est très sympa et réactif pour organiser les tours qu’ils proposent !
Great!! Helped us a lot with the Ha Giang loop, we rented bikes and left our bags there.
Cheap room and food, nice motorbike rental, good tips for the loop.
Very helpful. Even acted as our translator whilst we were riding the loop via phone.

Tolle Unterkunft, super nette Gastgeber mit hilfreichen Tipps zur Route von Ha Giang aus! Motorbikeverleih im Hostel ebenfalls top!
Leckeres Frühstück!
Nice and welcoming hostel, hosts have been really helpful!
Very friendly stuff and nice banana pancakes!
Auberge de jeunesse très conviviale où l’hospitalité est garantie!

Une chambre propre et bien située à côté de la gare de bus.
Par contre pas de petit frigo dans la chambre.
Et attention à bien prévenir si vous partez très tôt le matin car je me suis retrouvé avec une grille fermée pour sortir de l'hôtel.
편안하고 좋았습니다. 하장 첫날에도 이용하고 마지막날에도 이용하였습니다.
Tres bon rapport qualité prix !
Apartamento decente, colchón muy duro y no del todo limpio. El dueño amable
Très bon emplacement, logement très confortable et hôte très sympa. Je recommande !
늦게까지 기다려주시고 감사합니다.

We needed a place to stay near the bus stop before the Ha Giang loop. It was easy, convenient, clean, and very responsive. We got in late at night and it was no problem. The bed was quite hard. Other than that everything was great! Would recommend to anyone neeeding a place to stay after busing into ha giang.

Nous sommes restés deux nuits non consécutives, car nous avions réservé un tour de 3 jours en moto.
Dung nous a permis de laisser nos bagages pendant notre tour.
Nous avons aussi demandé d’avoir une chambre de l’autre côté pour la 2e nuit, afin de ne pas être côté rue.
Dung a été très compréhensif.
Merci pour tout
Élisabeth et Zoé
This place saved us when we didnt like our other place to stay. We booked it really late and got confirmed just few minutes after. Dong was very helpful and responsive :)

Das Zimmer war sehr sauber. Die Matratzen der Betten sind jedoch steinhart. Wir alle 4 hatten am nächsten Morgen Schmerzen in Hüften, Schultern und Rücken. Ebenfalls war es sehr laut von der Strasse und das Fenster konnte man nicht richtig schliessen daher hörte man jede Hupe und jedes Wort. Mann konnte nur sehr schlecht einschlafen.

Dung and his wife are great hosts. Very flexible. The motel is just next to the Ha Giang Bus station and so is the best place to stay… amazing people. Very good hosts, very cheap and reasonable. The perfect place for commute to different parts of Ha Giang.

Wir waren eine Nacht in der Unterkunft bevor wir den ha giang Loop gemacht haben. die Unterkunft liegt am Anfang des Orts direkt an der Straße dadurch ist es gut zu erreichen aber leider relativ laut durch den Verkehr. Die Zimmer sind sehr groß. Die Matratzen sind relativ hat also wenn man das nicht mag sollte man das beachten. ansonsten war die Unterkunft ausreichend für unsere Bedürfnisse. Dung war sehr freundlich und hat immer schnell geantwortet wir konnten freundlicherweise auch schon vor den Check in in die Unterkunft.

Bardzo dobra lokalizacja dla osób zaczynających pętle Ha Giang. Bardzo blisko do przystanku autobusowego. Gospodarze bardzo mili i pomocni, zgodzili się przechować bagaże na czas przejazdu pętli, za co jestem bardzo wdzięczna. Polecam!
I can recommend. But there was no pool table as in pictures. Very nice and clean place. Shower was amazing😄
Good place to stay a night. There was construction and lots of bus stops nearby so it was very loud, but that is out of the hosts control. Very clean and very nice host
Stayed for a night and was a nice stay. Everything was clean and nice to have the coffee shop downstairs!
Appartement was directly next to the bus stop. We arrived during the night and check in was no problem. very convenient :)
Great spot to spend a quick night. Dung was very responsive and checkin was a breeze!
Very nice motel. One of the nicest I’ve stayed at in Vietnam

Es war sehr gut. Die Lage des Zimmers ist sehr schön.
Der Raum ist sauber und geräumig.
Zudem dürfen wir unsere Taschen in dem Hotel lagern.
Wir kommen wieder :)
Dung’s place was good and clean. Good location, close to everything.

If you plan on doing any Ha Giang Loop tours, this is the place to stay the night before/after your tour! We stayed here the night before we started our tour and it was so easy and nice. The bus stop where we were dropped off after departing from Hanoi was within walking distance from this place. Perfectly walkable to some other restaurants and such, but it also has a cafe built into it for your coffee needs :)

Be careful when booking, there was 6 beds listed but the booking only included 1 room with 2 beds. 2 of our group chose to find other arrangements to comfortably accommodate us, there was also some confusion with the payment, i dont think this host is very familiar with the app. Set that aside and it was a very clean and great room for cheap.
Makkelijk te vinden goeie host!
Very nice place with a great staff

I can't say enough great things about this stay.  Lovely, genuine, welcoming, generous, interesting, talented, wonderful people.  The food available for purchase on-site was out of this world and intimate.  The location is of course stunning and nicely situated for exploring further north.  The town is cozy yet vibrant with plenty to do.  Karaoke and other merriment blasted into the mountains gives an unexpected music festival vibe at brief  times.  A magical and timeless experience, with this as a home base at its core.

Vans home is in a beautiful location surrounded by mountains and rice fields. Her and her family are welcoming and kind, and made us delicious banana pancakes in the morning. It's a basic accommodation but it felt very authentic and enjoyable.
simple and probably traditional homestay. hosts were very nice. communication only via Google translate. the homemade food was very delicious. no air conditioning but a fan.
A really nice homestay in front of beautiful rice fields. Good for a small get away
I felt like they are my family, van is good chef 🧑‍🍳, i recommended to stay with this family they have big heart ❤️
Perfect, serene place for holidays. The host is very responsive and always willing to help with suggestions on where to visit in and around Ha Giang. Great food too. Smiles.

Our stay with Van was great. Van even picked us up in town as we couldn’t find her place at first. Would definitely recommend the dinner as well, it was delicious. Her and Chung’s hospitality made our stay feel like home.

Beautifully authentic home stay with a very lovely family. Great location and cozy sleeping arrangements. Definitely take them up on the dinner option, the food, corn wine, and company  was amazing. Would definitely stay again.

Wir hatten einen tollen Aufenthalt bei Van‘s Familie. Das Haus ist sehr einfach, dadurch sehr authentisch und gemütlich. Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt. Am Abend haben wir ein Family-Dinner mit Van‘s Familie gemacht. Van hat alles frisch gekocht und es gab sogar selbstgebrannten Reisschnaps. Das Family-Dinner können wir sehr empfehlen. Die Aussicht und die umliegende Natur sind wunderschön und es gibt sehr süße Hunde und Katzen. Wer in Du Già übernachtet, sollte die Nacht auf jeden Fall in dieser Unterkunft verbringen. In fast 4 Wochen Vietnam war das das Authentischste, was wir erleben durften und das zu einem günstigen Preis :) Vielen Dank, gerne wieder!!
P.s: das Haus ist offen und einfach - es gibt zwar ein großes Moskitonetz, dennoch sollte man sich auf den Besuch von Insekten einstellen
Wir hatten einen sehr schönen Aufenthalt bei der gastfreundlichen Familie mit einem fantastischen Abendessen und einem tollen Ausblick!
Beautiful place. They cooked us some lovely dinner too
Nice family and Nice food

it's a very nice place. real home stay with the family.wonderful food in the evening.a little hard to find.don't get confused. the red Spot on the map is not where it actually is at the time writing. you have to look on Gugel maps for vanchung homestay doesntletmeputgugel/bfbsnvqWZnvzAtzt6
. otherwise you will end up in the middle of nowhere without Internet. but once you made it it's very nice.

We stayed one night at Van's homestay and it was a great decision. She, her husband, the whole family are superlovely people, the house is nicely located with beautiful views and a large terrace. We took the chance to have dinner with them and it's 100% worth it and very delicious. Afterwards we sang several rounds of karaoke with them and had some corn  liquor. We strongly recommend to stay at this place if you want to have a bit of distance to the partying biker groups. Thank you Van and Chung. All the best!

Die Unterkunft ist wirklich traumhaft. Mitten im Grünen gelegen hat man sein eigenen kleinen Raum zum Schlafen. Abends gab es Essen mit der Familie, was unfassbar lecker war. Es war ein sehr schöner Aufenthalt, ich würde wieder buchen. Die Familie ist sehr herzlich und aufmerksam <3

Logement avec système de dortoir privatisé, les parois sont très fines, mais cela ne gâche absolument rien. Le cadre est magnifique avec une vue splendide sur les rizières et les montagnes. Des petits animaux mignons comme tout, et un super accueil. Je recommande !

Van og hennes familie tok oss veldig godt i mot, og vi fikk et lite innblikk i hvordan hverdagslivet i Du Gia er. Huset ligger veldig fint til i vakre omgivelser. Dette er et ekte homestay og vil absolutt anbefale å ta del i familiemiddagen om man har mulighet.

Ich habe den Aufenthalt sehr genossen. Die Familie ist sehr nett und freundlich. Ich habe es nicht gleich gefunden aber Van hat mich sogar abgeholt. Ich kann die Unterkunft sehr empfehlen und würde gerne wiederkommen!
If you want an authentic experience with a friendly family, this is the place. Make sure to take them up on dinner.
What a lovely family, beautiful surroundings. Thank you for having me.
On a passé un excellent moment chez Van. On a eu le droit à un délicieux dîner en famille ! Je recommande vivement !
Ma famille et moi avons passé un très bon moment ! Merci pour tout ! 🫶
lovely night. The host was very welcoming and kind

Rifugio per motociclisti lontano dal rumore e dai turisti. L’alloggio è spartano e bisogna essere abituati a condividere gli spazi. È stato difficile trovare il posto ma ne valeva la pena. I dintorni sono splendidi. Abbiamo cenato con piatti tipici preparati dalla famiglia di Van e chiacchierato con altri ospiti. Una piacevole serata!

2 ngày tại Su's villa thật sự rất tuyệt vời. Mọi thứ đều hoàn hảo, từ không gian, dịch vụ cho đến những trải nghiệm mà anh chủ đã gợi ý cho mình. Chắc chắn thời gian tới khi trở về Hà Giang mình sẽ quay lại Su's villa.
Tôi đã đặt phòng cho một người bạn của tôi. Và họ cũng nói rằng dịch vụ rất tốt

We had a great stay at this location! Everything was very clean and comfortable. Văn Chung was responsive and kind; he was able to accommodate us checking in an hour earlier than I initially thought we’d be there. The bed was quite firm (which I like)! Would definitely stay here again!

The bed was the best bed in which I slept for the past few months and the rooms was spacious and super nice. Apart from that Van Chung went above and beyond to help me with a personal matter in which I needed assistance during my stay. My messages were always replied quickly and promptly and I received all the help I needed to solve matters quickly. I am so so grateful for that. Highly recommend Su’s Villa

We had a good stay at Van’s place. Very convenient location to stay before and after the Ha Giang loop. The host is great at communicating and helped us book a taxi early in the morning. Check in was easy and the apartment is quiet.
Only things were there were still a few hairs on the floor from previous guests and the aircon didn’t work very well. However, there is a fan to use.
Is a good place to stay for convenience!
Stayed for one night before doing the Ha Giang loop and it was very comfortable. Location was quiet at night and the room was very large. The shower had plenty of hot water too. Would recommend.
Wonderful host very responsive and helpful. This place was very clean. Great value I will look for this place in the future. Very easy.
Good value for money. The one downside worth mentioning was the wifi being too weak for me to work with. (Online meetings kept disconnecting, and I had to rely on mobile data.)

Fantastische Unterkunft, großartiges Preis-Leistungs-Verhältnis!
Die Leute sind sehr freundlich, die Kommunikation klappt dank Google Translate sehr gut.
Uns hat es so gut gefallen, dass wir wieder gekommen sind und wir wurden erkannt und haben sogar genau das selbe Zimmer wieder bekommen.
Während des Loops konnten wir unsere Rucksäcke in der Unterkunft lassen, kostenlos und sicher.
Ich kann diese Unterkunft nur empfehlen!
Good stop before starting the loop. The staff was really flexible about our late check in. Thanks!!

I stayed here for one night before continuing on to Du Gia, and this was a perfect place for that! The staff was very friendly and helpful, even helping me to book a local bus to Du Gia, which I never would have managed on my own. There’s a delicious pho spot nearby and the room is just like the pictures. Overall satisfied with my stay and grateful for the helpful staff!
super helpful people let us shower after we had checked out before we got on our sleeper bus which was amazing and more than expected.
Stayed here on my way going and back from Ha Giang loop and will stay again when I go back to Ha Giang city.
I stayed one night before doing Ha Giang loop, it was comfortable and they were accommodating of me arriving very late.
깨끗하고 잘 정리 되어 좋았습이다. 직원이 친절하게 주변 지역 안내도 해줬습니다. 다음에도 이용하고 싶어요.

Clean simple rooms. Beds are kinda hard. Indoor parking for scooters. They allowed us to store our luggage there for free while doing the Ha Giang Loop for 3 days. For the price it is great option for first and last night stop while doing the loop.
The hosts were great, they helped us with our bags because my boyfriend was a little injured. The room was luxury, and very very affordable. Thank you. Highly recommend. No issues
Great stay before taking off for the loop, beds are very comfy. We rented our motorbike from them and it was great the whole loop, they also offered luggage storage for us!

Amazing host! We stayed for one day before venturing to see the Ha Giang loop, host was responsive and allowed us to leave our luggage for safekeeping and even gave us contacts to book a bus back to Hanoi. 5/5

청결하고,친절한 숙소입니다.태풍 야기로인해 외출할수없어,5박6일동안 편안한 휴식을 취할수있었읍니다.태풍이 지난후,하장 모토바이크 트래킹을 하기위해 3일연장하였고 연장숙소가격.모토바이크 가격등 게스트를위한 편의를생각해주는 성의가 여행을 가볍게해주었읍니다.발코니객실 강추.
아쉬움은 객실내 테이블 의자가 있으면 흠잡을데없는 숙소라 하겠읍니다.
재방문시 다시 찿고싶읍니다.
Es war alles wie auf den Bildern beschrieben. Es war vor allem alles sehr sauber!

Chambre spacieuse et très propre !
Elle est également bien située, je recommande.
We kregen een hele ruime kamer die zeer netjes was. Goede plaats op te overnachten in Ha Giang.
別墅型的住宿豪華有回到家的感覺櫃檯親切價格親民

The apartment was modern and well-equipped. Communication with Thai was excellent, and she was very accommodating, especially with our late check-in. Although our stay was brief, it was a pleasant one. I’d definitely recommend this place for a short visit!
Thai was a great help starting our loop journey. Comfortable stay with everything you need.
A great-value place to spend the night. Clean and modern. Location instructions were slightly confusing, but I realised after that it's actually on Google Maps.
Thai es muy simpática y siempre estuvo al pendiente de mi llegada, la habitación es muy linda.. la cama súper confortable. Un excelente lugar para llegar en Hà Giang.

Die Wohnung ist sehr schön und mit Liebe eingerichtet. Es war sehr sauber und Thai ist wirklich nett. Sie war jederzeit erreichbar um Fragen zu klären.
Ich kann es sehr weiterempfehlen.
Jederzeit gerne wieder! Thai hat und super unterstützt und sogar unser Gepäck 2 Tage aufbewahrt

Thai’s place was extremely clean and comfortable. More than anything, Thai was so helpful and communicative even before we got there. She booked our buses and private Easyriders for the Ha Giang loop. She also cooked a delicious dinner for us (at a cost) which was a perfect way to end the motorcycle tour. I would recommended her stay to everyone.
She is awesome! Very nice and responds right away. Gave awesome recommendation for motorbikes

Couldn’t recommend more!
Thai is so lovely. We stayed before and after the Loop and felt like we were coming home!
Thai kept our luggage safe for us whilst we did the Loop which was such a help.
Thai’s home is in a quiet area way from all the crowds. We slept so well. The bed is comfortable with good quality linen. A fridge in the room. Clean bathroom and hot shower. We could use the kitchen to cook our breakfast too.
It’s about a 15/20 min walk into the centre but if you want to have a chilled start and end to the Loop away from the tours then Thai’s place is perfect. Thank you Thai and to your daughter for making us feel right at home ❤️
Second time staying with Thai .. everything was great and she’s more than helpful
Thai was very friendly and responsive. She kindly allowed us to check in at 5 AM, which was a huge help. We really appreciated her flexibility and hospitality!

An amazing family homestay! The hosts were endlessly nice from the start, were always available for help, and even let us store our bags in their house after we left. They had a fully equipped kitchen and all other amenities you could need. I totally recommend this place to anyone stopping in Ha Giang!

Great stay! Thai was super communicative and went out of her way to answer questions and help m e sort out of my plans for the area. The room was spotless and modern with, with a great attached bathroom. Perfectly comfortable and quiet for resting - I had the strong impression that if I had had more time in the area, Thai would have set me up with some great ideas for things to do!

Nous avons passé un séjour très agréable chez Thaï ! Nous avons séjourné 2 nuits en tout. Nous avons fait la Ha giang Loop. Elle nous a permis de laisser nos sacs à dos chez elle et de les récupérer plus tard.
Thaï est une très gentille personne et de bons conseils. Allez-y les yeux fermés.

Thaï et sa maman m’ont très bien accueilli et même si on voit peu Thaï car elle travaille elle a toujours été réactive et aidante. Chez Thaï on vit directement chez la famille. Les plats préparés par la mère de Thaï sont délicieux. Merci pour tout.

Deuxième séjour chez Thai après avoir parcouru la région en faisant le ´Ha Giang loop’. On retrouve les bagages laissés en toute sécurité chez Thai pendant les quatre jours de notre absence; on retrouve son sourire, ses petits plats délicieux, son logement calme, son aide précieuse pour nous trouver une limousine pour Ha Noi. Elle nous accompagne jusqu’au lieu de départ, court pour nous rapporter un guide de voyage oublié. Quelle hospitalité et amabilité! Une adresse et une personne précieuses!

Communication with Thai was easy. Instructions about check-in were clear. She responded quickly to our questions.
We liked the location, as it is in a more quiet street. You can hear some roosters in the morning, but this didn't bother us much, as we were getting early in the morning.
The house is modern and nicely decorated.
Thai was really nice to keep our luggage safe till we were doing the Ha Giang Loop, which was very helpful to us.
Although we are used to a different, higher standard of clean, overall the rooms were clean.
If you prefer a more quiet, modern and private location, Thai's place is a very good choice.

If you’re coming to Ha Giang and you are not looking to stay in Hostels there is honestly no other place to stay then at Thai’s Homestay. I have been several times and she has just built a beautiful new home that makes you feel like home when you’re there. Not only is her place beautiful but the location is amazing and she is beyond helpful as she speaks great English. She organized our taxi pick up for an amazing price from Hà Nội airport and took care of arranging renting us motorbikes for the Ha Giang Loop. She also organized us to go with her friend to see the ancient tea forest. She is such a cool lady that has become a great friend to me and my family. I am so grateful the universe put her on my path and it was all from reading AirBnB reviews. If you’re looking for a a beautiful home to stay in with comfortable beds and all the amenities you could ask for before or after your Ha Giang Loop stay, this is the place. Much Love to you Thai for everything. She is also a wonderful cook

Deuxième séjour chez Thai. Je ne peux que renouveler les éloges: Thai est une perle. Elle est très réactive et ne ménage pas ses efforts pour aider ses hôtes. Elle nous a réservé les billets pour accéder à Ha Giang et pour y repartir, a pris en charge l’organisation et les réservations pour le célèbre tour en moto (Ha Giang Loop), nous a trouvé un guide super sympa parlant anglais pour nous accompagner. De plus,son logement est très agréable, confortable et bien situé dans un endroit calme. Sa table familiale accueille aussi ses hôtes à dîner. En un mot, un modèle d’accueil Airbnb. Je recommande sans hésitation et chaudement!

Merci beaucoup à Thai pour l’accueil et sa disponibilité. Merci de nous avoir à organiser notre séjour et à louer des scooters.
Je recommande fortement 👌🏻

Thai was very responsive to our messages and many questions.  She also organised a very comfy mini van for the trip from Hanoi to Ha Giang.  Unfortunately my husband was sick on arrival and we had to go to the hospital and spend the night but was very caring and checked up on us and offered us any assist we needed. Thai is very lovely and kind

Thai was extremely helpful, she helped hire a moped, booked accommodation around the loop and explained where to go & what to see. Thai made us breakfast before we left on our 5 day loop trip. She booked limo bus from ha giang back to Hanoi and then on to Ha Long! Way above & beyond our expectations and very much appreciated, thank you Thai!

Thai’s homestay was incredible and I highly recommend as a lift off point for Ha Giang loop. Thai was incredibly hospitable, had great communication, and was extremely helpful in helping us with a variety of logistical questions. She even booked us a sleeper bus to Ninh Binh and organized a taxi to help get us to hotel following sleeper bus arrival. We can’t thank Thai enough for helping make our trip so special.

We seriously recommend staying at Thai’s place in Ha Giang, especially if you want to do the Ha Giang motorbike loop. Thai and her daughter made us feel right at home. Her place is very clean and quiet. Thai helped us rent a motorbike that was delivered to her place the night we left before the loop. She helped us plan out our trip and booked our stays on the loop. Also, it was so nice to have a point of contact in Ha Giang while on the loop. She is so responsive and helpful. We will definitely stay here again when returning to Ha Giang.
chủ nhà thân thiện, chỗ ở tốt so với giá cả.

The homestay is located in Ha Giang town, the host is friendly and helpful, I was doing Ha Giang Loop without any plan and Thai help me arrange motorbike and the recommendation of the route.
I was recommended this place if you wanna do a loop.
Thank you Thai !

Host was really kind and helpful.
Room was clean and comfortable.
Cute cats, which is always a bonus.
Only downside was the noise from the street and neighbours from around 6am onwards. Made it hard to sleep.

This is the second time we stayed with at Thai Homestay.
They looked after our bags whilst we did the Ha Giang loop and we're very appreciative of that. Made our trip much more comfortable and kept our minds at ease.
Would happily recommend this place to anyone doing the loop.

Thai a été une excellente hôte, très acceuillante. Elle m'a donné toutes les informations nécessaires pour accéder à la chambre même si elle n'était pas présente à l'heure de mon arrivée. Elle a aussi organisé pour moi une loop de Ha Giang sur mesure avec un easy rider, merci beaucoup, c'était incroyable!

Spend just one night there (actually half of the night because our bus arrived at 3am and in the morning we started the loop). Room was just fine. Thai was EXTREMELY helpful. She organized bike rent for us so we could start our loop just from her Homestay without spending any time. Also she supported us  throughout the trip and helped a lot with information. She’s not even answered questions but suggested that we would need in advance. Best host ever!
Beautiful surroundings and affordable prices. Common area is very relaxing. We stayed at the second floor with many beds but still had privacy curtains.
Beautiful camp and carefully arranged furniture. Clean and comfortable.
Comfortable and clean.
Clean and comfortable

Nous avons adoré notre sejour chez Thé Anh.
L’endroit est paradisiaque, tout est fait pour que l’on se sente comme chez soi.
Thé Anh et sa famille sont d’une gentillesse rare, toujours souriants et de très bon conseil.
Nous reviendrons avec grand plaisir !

merci ā Thé Anh pour sa disponibilité, sa gentillesse et son efficacité....très belle région...
très beau gîte et excellent moment lors du partage du dîner avec sa famille.

Nice bungalow in a beautiful environment (overlooking a river). The bungalow was very spacious and the balcony featured a hammock, a tropical setting with a direct view on the river below. The host was very helpful with our questions and he even kept our luggage while we left for the Ha Giang Loop.

One of my favourite Airbnb experiences so far! The place is located relatively close to Ha Giang, but far enough to be considered remote. It's peaceful and quiet. We stayed there for one night to wind down after doing a four day Ha Giang loop. It was exactly what we needed. The bungalows are very spacious and have beautiful views. The food is all made from local produce as Nd with love by the family managing the property. It's not just an accomodation, it's a unique experience I'd recommend to everyone visiting Ha Giang.

Anh’s place is very nice. Remote from the city but close at the same time. He helps us with motor bike rental, taxis, and everything that we were needed. We also had dinner there, which was very good and nice, with valuable exchanges. We really had a good time. Unfortunately it was a bit cold due to the season and we were not prepare for this. Overall, we really enjoy our time there and could go back again.

We fell in love with the space that we decided to stay an extra day. The Anh was extremely hospitable. He stayed awake until we arrived, late. We were so hungry that he reopened the kitchen and served us such a delicious meal for free. The space was peaceful, perfectly situated close to town, but so quiet. We were able to walk and bike everywhere. Highly recommended!

C’est un endroit magnifique au bord de la rivière, le bungalow est spacieux et propre. Nous avons très bien mangé, les hôtes sont très aimables.
Je recommande, merci beaucoup !!
Thien est vraiment proactif et va au devant de nos besoins. Il nous a aidé à réserver notre retour en bus de nuit et à profiter des environs dans le village Tay.

The Anh ist einer der liebsten Menschen, den wir bisher in Vietnam begegnet sind. Es ist ihm eine Herzensangelegenheit, dass sich seine Gäste wohl und wie Zuhause fühlen. Er half uns mit dem Verleih eines Motorrads für den Loop (das echt top war!) und hätte auch mit der Transfer-Buchung für die Weiterfahrt danach geholfen, aber wir hatten leider schon selbst gebucht. Das Essen, dass seinen Neffen zaubert, ist absolut köstlich und der Preis dafür ist fair. Die Unterkünfte sind in liebevoller Handarbeit selbst gebaut inmitten der Natur. Wir würden jederzeit hier wieder übernachten! Lieben Dank für den sehr schönen Aufenthalt. 😍
Amazing homestay. Anh was extremely helpful the entire stay. Delicious local food and central to Ha Giang. Thanks Anh!
great place to stay! the room is beautiful, overlooking the river and very quiet, we fell asleep with the sounds of nature!
The host was supernice and helpful. The food was great. We could stay there for a month and rest our souls :)
Grate peacefull place. Greate host. Greate diner. Very helpfull and kind.

L’hostel est vraiment paisible, on entend la rivière dans laquelle on peut se baigner juste à côté. Les chambres sont de qualité et climatisées, on y dort bien.
Thê Anh et sa famille sont super accueillant, très réactif pour m’aider et répondre à mes questions, ils m’apportait régulièrement des fruits frais de son jardin pour m’ouvrir l’appétit.
Je vous conseille vivement cet endroit si vous cherchez un cadre reposant.

We had a lovely stay! Place is exactly as the photos. We also had a wonderful dinner prepared for us which we thought was amazing food. We were only there one night before we started the Ha Giang loop but Anh gave us great recommendations and discussed our route with us. We found this really helpful and thought it was very generous of him. He also had maps and books which we were also able to use.

Great location, next to the river, in the forest. Absolutely beautiful and so quiet. Diner was amazing. And The Anh very reactive, kind, and very helpful. He helped us out for any of our request. I highly recommend.

Thanks for a nice stay. The place is very beautiful and quiet. Very comfortable, large beds.
The bungalow is gorgeous you can open lots of windows and hear the waterfall.
Host is very friendly and cooked us a delicious dinner.
Wish I could stay longer - we will stay again next time in Ha Giang.

Najlepszy nocleg na jaki mogliśmy się zdecydować. Bungalow w środku natury, bardzo blisko do rzeki, w której można się kąpać. Właściciel niesamowicie uprzejmy i bardzo pomocny - zamówił nam taksówkę która o 3 rano przyjechała po nas na przystanek autobusowy, a sam czekal na nas w ośrodku, żeby przekazać domek. Pod domkiem możliwość kąpania się w rzece co było idealne w trakcie pobytu ze względu na upał.  Jedzenie pyszne. Zdecydowanie polecam

This is a hidden gem! I loved the bamboo bungalow and the peaceful setting up above the river. The highlight was having dinner with the host. Great food and great conversation. Don’t miss out on the opportunity if you stay here!

excellent emplacement dans la nature et proche de la rivière, très calme. excellent contact avec l'hôte qui nous beaucoup aidé dans nos démarches taxi ou bus et conseillé sur quoi faire,  il est guide

Tellement beau !! Nous avons adoré notre séjour. Le logement était propre et vraiment joli. Une expérience unique. De plus le propriétaire nous a donné des suggestions d’activités et nous avons souper avec lui et son neveu. Je conseille fortement ce logement.

Der Aufenthalt bei The Anh war unser Highlight der Vietnamreise bis jetzt. Wir hatten ein privates Bungalow, welches direkt am Fluss liegt, zu dem ein wunderschöner Weg runterführt. Außerdem liegt die Unterkunft super auch für diejenigen, die Ha Giang nicht nur mit dem Motorrad erkunden möchten. Man kann loslaufen und ist direkt auf einer schönen Route, besonders empfehlenswert ist es, von der Unterkunft aus nach rechts zu laufen, über einen Bach hinweg und dann die erste Abzweigung zu nehmen, die nicht asphaltiert ist. Man gelangt zu Reisfeldern mit Wasserbüffeln und Häusern.
An dem Family Stay ist The Anhs gesamte Familie beteiligt, wodurch man sich direkt zuhause fühlt. Samstags essen alle beim Family Stay zu abend und es macht super viel Spaß. Zudem ist das Abendessen jeden Tag wirklich unglaublich lecker und besteht nur aus regionalen Produkten.
Die Gastgeber waren sehr freundlich. Sie haben uns eine tolle eintägige Motorradtour organisiert.

We had a wonderful night at this accommodation. We were prepared lunch and dinner which were both delicious and we had access to the river at the bottom of the hill. The property was peaceful and the hosts were very helpful in aiding us with whatever we needed, as well as arranging our ride upon our departure. We highly recommend staying here!

We had a great stay! The cabin is comfortable and the surrounding nature is beautiful. It was nice to have a few relaxing days during our busy holiday. The walk up the mountain is breathtaking, definitely recommend!
We had dinner at the homestay which was yummy and nice to meet the others staying there. Thê Ahn is a very friendly and helpful host :)

L’hôtel se divise entre une auberge de jeunesse au 1er et quelques bungalows au 2 eme étage accessibles par des escaliers très escarpés. La chambre était très bien, la salle de bain impeccable mais dommage que nous n’ayons pas de possibilité d’occulter la lumière qui entre par la porte fenêtre, il serait souhaitable de mettre au moins un rideau.

Good stay. Clean and modern. Quiet location. Slightly outside of main city center. Great customer service. Firm bed, but great shower heat and pressure. Great A/C. Good breakfast and restaurant.
Only surprise was finding out that the stay is actually the third floor of a hostel. Three flights of steep stairs through a makeshift building. No daily cleaning service in the room. Also bright light in the room through the front door at night and morning.
숙소뷰가 좋은곳이었지만 안개가많아서 못보고가서 아쉽네요. 다음엔 날씨가좋기를 바래봅니다. 의사소통에 문제가없고 친절합니다.
Merci pour cette parenthèse d’une nuit. Le logement était à la hauteur de nos attentes : confortable, pratique et reposant.
Amazing place to just chill and hang out after doing the Ha Giang Loop, would definitely recommend!

Friendly, Clean, Helpful, Beautiful.
That's all you need to know.

Sehr kurzfristig für eine Nacht gebucht um am nächsten Morgen mit dem Bus weiter zu fahren.
Sehr sauberes Zimmer. Nah am Busbahnhof gelegen. Super Aufenthalt.

Wir hatten einen sehr angenehmen Aufenthalt, die Gastgeber waren sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit. Als wir mit dem Roller abgereist sind haben Sie uns sogar geholfen den Roller richtig zu beladen, da wir mit 2 grossen Rucksäcke unterwegs waren.
Everything was great
Amazing stay, would recommend

This was the perfect homestay for our family of 5. We had trouble finding the location, because Airbnb lists the address at a different location, but Tai was easy to reach and gave us directions. We would have had them in advance, but we arrived early. The family was very friendly. The food for dinner and breakfast was delicious. We would definitely stay again when we drive the loop next time.
Bon séjour d’une nuit dans ce homestay convivial. Nous avons partagé le dîner avec tout le monde et avons beaucoup apprécié le repas. Le logement était conforme à nos attentes. Merci !

We kwamen vroeg aan en mochten alvast inchecken. Al meteen bij aankomst was het lawaaierig door werken op de site maar dat was nog te doen. 's avonds hebben we enorm lekker gegeten. Maar dan is de karaoke begonnen... de grote groep jonge lui waren extreem luid en hebben ook 's nachts in de kamer boven ons nog veel lawaai gemaakt. Wij reizen met twee kinderen en dit was voor ons suboptimaal. Wij hadden graag in de advertentie gelezen dat er hier veel gedronken en gezongen ging worden. Om 7u 's ochtends begonnen de werken alweer. Wij raden het dus niet aan voor families, wel voor mensen die hier naar op zoek zijn.
