Great communication and clean spot managed by a friendly team of husband and wife. If you’re looking for a peaceful & quiet spot and not the noisy partying homestay then this is for you! Highly recommend and would stay here again!
Wir hatten einen Perfekten Aufenthalt! Die Gastfreundschaft, Essen und Unterkunft waren einfach Perfekt!
Great spot! Lovely family that treats you really well- so so kind!

Such a lovely place! The room was so beautiful and comfortable. It is super clean and the food at the restaurant was great as well. Everyone who worked there was so kind and helpful. We loved chatting with Chau and all her recommendations. They also arrange tours which are great as well. Highly recommend!

Ans Home is the Place to be. Es war so eine Erleichterung hier anzukommen in diesem schönen Ambiente getaucht in Holz und Atmosphäre. Die Zimmer sind wunderschön, sauber und der Service verdient 10 Sterne. Ich habe meine Tage hier verlängert weil es so schön war und ich die Ruhe auch gebraucht habe. Danke für die Zeit hier. Alles Liebe, Shah-Mo

We were just passing through before starting our Ha Giang Loop adventure, and everything was absolutely perfect! The staff were incredibly kind and always smiling. The rooms were spotless, comfortable, and well-equipped. We slept very well, which allowed us to start our journey feeling refreshed and ready to go!

Tout était parfait du début à la fin ! La chambre magnifique et très confortable, le personnel incroyablement gentil et serviable et la nourriture excellente (avec beaucoup d’options végétariennes !). Nous avons séjourné une nuit à l’hôtel puis sommes partis pour 3 jours de moto sur la Ha Giang Loop, nous avons pu laisser nos bagages à l’hôtel et au retour nous avons même pu y prendre une douche avant de partir. Merci infiniment !
Def one of the best airbnbs i got to stat in. The place is very fashionable , nice , cozy , plus the staff is very helpful and nice.

Wunderschöne Unterkunft!! Die Mitarbeiter können alle super englisch sind nett und zu vor kommend. Essen ist lecker. Die Zimmer sind der Hammer: schön, sauber und ordentlich. Mit die beste Unterkunft wenn nicht sogar die beste auf unserer Vietnamreise!!!

My boyfriend and I enjoyed our stay a lot!
We stayed here the night before our trip at the Ha Giang Loop and the night after.
We were able to drop some of our bags off here, while we were doing the Ha Giang Loop.
We also lent some motor bikes here - they were really nice!
The team also gave us some protectors and rain coats because it was raining this days.
They ware so so nice! And it’s so beautiful here!
Thanks a lot!
The host was so helpful and helped us organise the loop and travels 🙏🏼❤️

Best place to stay in Ha Giang! We finished the loop and decided to stay in town for the night after 4 long days of touring and this place was perfect. The reception ladies were super friendly and incredibly helpful, we could book a bus to Hanoi that picked us up from the hotel, and the complimentary breakfast was fantastic! We will definitely send our friends and family your way come back to stay when we return to Ha Giang. It isn’t in the centre of town but they do provide bicycle and motorbike rentals and offer tours of the loop themselves anywhere from 1-5 days. The ammenities are beautiful, the soaps they use are natural and made by locals using natural ingredients and smell outstanding, plenty of towels and spare toothbrush/paste packets. They offer currency exchange here and are always available for assistance. Can’t say enough how wonderful this place is, thank you very much!!

The staff are so kind and warm! They helped us arrange for local drivers and provided extra accomodations for us! Plus this is a wonderful and beautiful place to stay! We highly recommend it to everyone to check it out 🩷

10/10
We loved it here, it is like living in a small paradise 🥰
If you visit the Ha Giang Loop, you HAVE TO stay here 🫶🏼

great place beautiful design and kind staff
definitely recommend
fantastisch verblijf in alle rust

We truly recommend staying at this place when coming to Ha Giang. It's super nice and very good quality. It definitely was the most luxurious accommodation of our while stay, but at the same rate we shall per per night. The staff is extremely friendly and helpful, rooms are great and food is delicious. We also booked our 3 day motorcycle tour with them and can highly recommend! It was an amazing trip.
The homestay is slightly outside of Ha Giang, but we saw the village when driving through and prefer a million times this beautiful and peaceful place.

Definitely would recommend to stay here. Room is very clean and the communal area is super cute and cozy.
The food is also great and they offer a wide variety of services. It was a great stay!
Beautiful room and beautiful stuff. Exceptionally clean. One of the nicest places I’ve ever stayed in. Highly recommend!

Highly recommended place for those who love the nature and landscape. An and her family makes me feel at home. Accommodating and welcoming. Those who want a more private tour, away from the large tour crowds, An can provide that for you! Will definitely come here again and recommend to my friends and family.

An House is perfect for relaxing in the nature. you are directly next to the rice fields, it's amazing. You should order Vietnamese dinner, the food is very good! You can also tell An if you don't like or can't eat something.
Furthermore you can book a private tour with Ans House, which we can highly recommend. it's so much better than being in a big group.
Minh was such a good guide & told us lots about the surroundings, history and made wonderful pictures & videos of and with us.
We really recommend staying here… the staff was so nice and helped us with everything. The place was perfect to recover from a long travel day. Also, the breakfast i loved..
This was a great location. We stayed in the bungalow style small house. The house was clean, in a great location and the views are beautiful! We had dinner on site and it was delicious!

Amazing bungalow looking over the rice fields in a quiet corner of Ha Giang 🇻🇳 perfect if you like nature!
The food is also amazing! We are vegetarian and it was absolutely no issue, food was fresh and delicious 🥢
Furthermore we did our Ha Giang motorbike loop with An’s house as well and it was just incredible!🏍️
It was not a group, it was a private tour! Just the two of us with two very good and safe drivers staying in local village Homestay and avoiding the big groups and crowds.
We can’t recommend Ans house and those enough! ❤️
An’s house was gorgeous - with a stunning view and amazing food! An also gave us helpful advice for our trip to Cao Bang. Highly recommend this spot.

Great spot! An was SO helpful in making recommendations for our Ha Giang loop
trip!

Arrivé tard et repartis tôt.
Merci pour l’accueil
Chỗ ở tốt, nhân viên nhiệt tình

La chambre était propre. Nous avons aimé que l'hôtel soit situé près de la gare d'autobus, car nous quittions pour Hanoï ensuite. Nous avons aussi mangé notre meilleure pho dans un restaurant tout près. Merci de l'accueil!
Super séjour d’une nuit dans ce logement. Très belle chambre moderne et propre. Bon accueil et localisation idéale à côté de la station de bus et non loin de toute commodité. Merci !
Great place for a night—we stayed there before the Ha Giang loop. Clean and everything was in order!
Stay was really good but it was hard to find good restaurants and other amenities.
Pas cher, proche du centre et SURTOUT avec une vue magnifique sur les montagnes !
All good no complaints for a night stay
Nice and modern, was very clean too
Zeer aangenaam rustig verblijf

숙소를 인수해서 리모델링 하는 것 같았어요
수건부터 샤워기까지 전부 새거였습니다
너무 친절해서 고마웠습니다
숙소 또한 너무 깨끗했습니다
시장 앞 꼬치집도 너무 좋아요
이곳에 또 오고싶습니다
sehr nett, neue Unterkunft, sehr später Check in möglich , bequeme Betten und gute Split-Klimaanlage, gerne wieder

Nous avons passé deux jours et deux nuits très reposantes. La vue est à coupé le souffle, il y a de belles balades à faire et des villages authentiques autour. Nous avons été très bien reçus, les repas étaient très bons. Les hôtes ont été très gentils, nous vous recommandons cet hébergement loin de l’effervescence du tourisme.

Un très beau logement, dans un environnement incroyable. Un marché dans le village juste au dessus tous les dimanches. Ils propsent des repas sur place avec cusine locale.
Je vous recommande vivement un passage chez Nam Ly !

Huyen’s place is lovely and she is the loveliest host! Incredibly kind.
She and her family stayed up and waited for us to check in and make us pizzas as we arrived into Ha Giang later than expected. So hospitable!
They also have the cutest dogs. Rooms were spacious and clean. Huyen also called a taxi for us in the morning to get to our hostel ahead of the Ha Giang loop. If you want to get a private room before this trip I recommend staying here.

Had a very strange experience at this air bnb/hotel. At 10:45 pm (shortly after arriving) we tried to leave to grab dinner (we had just gotten off a 7 hour bus from Hanoi and were hungry). We realized the hotel's front gate had been locked! We were locked in!! After contacting the host, a young woman appeared who tried to talk us out of leaving, saying she has class early in the morning. After stressing we needed to eat something, she told us we must be back by 12. We said we'd do our best. She finally unlocked the gate, and said regardless if we've returned or not, she will lock the front gate at 1.  Never before have I been given a curfew at an airbnb or hotel before!! Very strange and uncomfortable experience.

Great hotel right in the center of ha Giang, not to far from the tourist area but also far away enough where it is quite and you are away from the city. The garden and court yard is very nice! The room itself is lovely as well.
Great hotel and restaurant. The included breakfast was nice and her little dogs were great host as well
Staying with Huyên's was a pleasure. The location was perfect, the room was cozy and clean, and Huyên was always available to answer any questions. Highly recommended!
This place was comfortable, and Huyền ensured that the express bus picked me up! Overall, a good experience.

Huyen est une hôtesse incroyable. Toujours disponible, extrêmement sympathique. Elle a répondu à toutes nos demandes et organiser toutes nos excursions. Son homestay est magnifiquement arrangé avec une piscine a débordement superbe dont nous avons largement profité. C'est un havre de paix que je recommande chaudement comme base pour visiter cette magnifique région. Merci Huyen pour ta gentillesse et ton magnifique sourire.
Just what we were after. Lovely hosts and extremely helpful when we needed it.

This is a perfect location to stay in Ha Giang. It’s peaceful yet easily accessible to the city and the loop. The host is wonderful .. so helpful and nothing is too much trouble. The rooms are extremely clean and comfortable; the food is delicious .. we loved our pizzas and pancakes for breakfast. We enjoyed our stay so much we are going back! This is a must stay place you will love it I’m sure.
Great stay! Lovely and welcoming hosts

Huyen is a great host, her place is beautiful! the room was clean and beautifully decorated, she made us pizza and we had great conversations through the night, she made us breakfast in the morning and got is a cab efficienly. I wish we could stay longer, and if we do go back we'll definitely stay with her again!
Loved the stay. She was very friendly and helpful. Their wine (happy water) was the best I’ve had in Vietnam. Thank you so much for the great stay. Highly recommend . It’s quiet .

Stayed here for two nights. The place felt like home. We had a restful stay. Ms. Huyen was so kind and arranged everything for us from our bus rides to our tour around Ha Giang. She also prepared great food: the honey and banana pancakes at breakfast and the pizza at dinner. Mr. Cong, her friend and our driver for the tour, was also very kind and put in every effort to make us feel safe, comfortable, happy, and well-informed. We learned a lot from him and had the best time. Definitely worth coming back to!

Oh my goodness!
Love this place so much. Huyen was amazing. We got in really late from our travels around 11pm and she was making us homemade pizza since we were so starving. She helped us pick out a motorbike that would be good for us for the loop, arranged our transportation from Ha Giang to Sapa, and adjusted our dates of staying when we had to finish the loop a day early. She is so warm and friendly. She’s amazing. I would not want to stay anywhere else.
Also! Have her banana pancakes in the morning. Soooo good!
This place was pleasant to stay at! I loved her dogs and the information she gave about the ha giang tours. It was clean and the room looked exactly like the photos. She was a nice lady!
Skvělé

Superbe homestay avec beaucoup de charme. Les chambres sont grandes et les lits très confortables. Huyen et sa famille ont été très accueillants et nous avons loué nos motos avec elle pour faire la loop. Nous y avons également séjourné à la fin du parcours.

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay with Huyen. She was proactive from the start, helping us book transportation from Sapa to Ha Giang. Once we were there, she helped us arrange a loop tour via car and we had an awesome time with our local guide and driver! We chose the 4D3N option and would highly recommend this, the second half of the loop has the most incredible views. We also did some trekking, visit local villages and businesses during our loop! We tried her pizza, which was delicious and were even treated with some of her other cooking - amazing tofu dish, sweet potato, stir fried mushroom and salad. If this is on offer, do not pass on it! It has was one of our favourite meals thus far during our months of travel. She suggested and booked us massages on our final night too, which was just the cherry on top. Staying with Huyen was beyond expectations. The hotel is lovely and peaceful. Ha Giang is more than just a motorbike loop, do not hesitate to visit and explore the region!
Huyen ist eine tolle Gastgeberin und äußerst freundlich! Sie war sehr hilfsbereit und hat uns Roller zum mieten angeboten. Die Zimmer sind modern und sehr sauber. Wir kommen definitiv zurück!
Nice room, a bit pricey for the room. The western style food (pasta and pizza) was very expensive
Huyen and her family are incredibly sweet. They helped us with our pickup and drop off and with booking excursions for the loop. Felt right at home here.

We had a fantastic stay. Even before we arrived it was a 5-star experience. Huyen booked our transfer door-to-door from our Hanoi Airbnb right to her place!
We enjoyed home made pizza, delicious ginger tea, and banana pancakes.
There is a short hike up the hill behind the hotel to stretch your legs that we appreciated
We walked to town several times. It's maybe a 10 minute walk and very enjoyable. Easy to get to a small shop or find dinner if you're eating out of the hotel one night.
Huyen also booked us a 7-night tour around the Ha Giang loop by car.
A special shout-out to her daughter who was very helpful with recommendations, translating, and just generally a wonderful, friendly person and her husband who also assisted with planning. A great family!

The best place to stay in Ha Giang! Besides that the hotel is beautiful and feels like home, Ms. Huyen's service is beyond superb. She arranged everything for us from the bus to and from Hanoi, to a customized private car tour of the Ha Giang loop. Mr. Cong, the driver, is very kind and puts in the effort to make sure that we are enjoying and we are safe. He found ways to talk to us and tell us histories and facts about the places we visited. We learned a lot from him. He doesn't lack anything in service. And Ms. Huyen and her family are very welcoming and accommodating from start to finish. The food she prepared for us at breakfast (like banana pancake with honey) and dinner (her famous pizza) are very delicious. She and Mr. Cong made our visit to Vietnam very special indeed. They make us want to come back soon. Highly recommended! Thank you very much again!

I loved staying at Huyen’s hotel! She greeted me herself upon check in and offered to show me around. Immediately once I was showered and ready she made a delicious pizza for me and offered beer! There is also a small hiking trail attached to the back of the property with some great views of Ha Giang.
Amazing family and Airbnb hosts! Would highly recommend to anyone!
Me and my parents love our staying here🥰🥰🥰

Staying with Bikki and her family was one of my most memorable experiences in Vietnam. You won't find many homestays that are like this, perfect for travellers who are keen to visit a beautiful, off-the-beaten track area, and see a different way of life.
If you are making your own transport to Bikki's Jungle Homestay, don't rely on the instructions from Google Maps! But Bikki can give good directions and she's a great communicator.

It's been a pleasure to guest in the Bikky's homestay, it was an experience in a real life in Vietnam to know  how they live, what they cook and how they work despite in this time the rice lands are dry and the tea harvest has to wait to the next month. Highly recommended for tea lowers and those people who seek hotel amenities should abstain. Bikky's family was very friendly with us and Bikky was always  looking out for us. A pleasant experience that we'll always have in our memory.

une expérience merveilleuse, bien que je suis resté que 1 nuit ça été l’une des meilleures expériences de ma vie, l’endroit est magique et les gens sont très accueillant, on mange très bien et bikky est super gentille et réactive pour répondre.
je recommande vivement ce airbnb si vous voulez sortir des sentiers battus !

Bikki is truly the sweetest, most thoughtful and present host we have ever stayed with. You actually become part of the family's everyday life and you feel so welcome and comfortable. Bikki is so wise and thoughtful and she shares all her knowledge about the nature and culture of the area. It is definitely the most authentic homestay experience we have ever tried. The food is amazing, the nature is amazing and above all the company is amazing. We can highly recommend staying at Bikki's jungle homestay and we will definitely come back again

Nous avons passé un excellent séjour chez Bikki. Dépaysement garanti! Les paysages sont magnifiques et Bikki et sa famille sont adorables.
Le repas sont également délicieux!
Petit conseil, demandez à Bikki de réserver pour vous le taxi depuis Ha Giang car elle demande à une personne qui connaît bien la route.

Bikki is a wonderful person. She arranged a taxi for me from the bus and even called the bus driver to help make the journey easy for me. I arrived in the night and when I woke up I was amazed by the rich landscape, warm and kind people, delicious food, and peaceful atmosphere. Bikki is doing something really special by offering guests a chance to live in her village and follow the incredible cultural traditions of the Red Dao Tribe. It was truly an honor. We went on break-taking hikes in the jungle, swam in stunning waterfalls, made tea from ancient tea trees, learned about local artisanal goods (jewelry, clothing, paper, chopsticks), and encountered the rich plant medicine of the land. Bikki is so helpful with anything you need and will create an unforgettable experience for you. I am in love with this stay. I hope I can visit Bikki and her family again soon, they have become part of my heart <3

incontestablement le moment le plus agréable et le plus authentique de mon séjour au Vietnam ( 1 mois) . Partager le quotidien de Bikki et sa famille pendant 4 jours était un vrai bonheur. Mon seul regret ne pas être resté plus longtemps .. j'y reviendrai sûrement...
Loïc

bich has been the best host we've ever stayed at. you really live with her and her family, eat together, sometimes help with cooking or else if you like. she did not once hesitate to include us in her life in the village and introduced us to festivities and customs of her culture. even though the accommodation is far outside of ha giang it is worth the travel! you can totally rely on bich's instructions how to get there, she will arrange everything for you. if you're standard is to sleep in hotels you should reconsider staying in bikki's jungle homestay but if you are interested in having an intense experience with local culture while being surrounded by beautiful nature you should definitely stay at bikki's!

We had a great time. Its a beautifull place up in the mountains far away from the busy life in the cities.
Bikki took us too many places and showed us wonderfull waterfalls. The food was the best we had in vietnam. We even caught our own fish by hand. If you want you can help bikki with the cooking and learn a lot of the vietnamese kitchen.
Fantastic homestay, we had an great time with an awesome dinner cooked by Bich's family.  ** Google maps directions are not correct.  Contact the host for proper directions

Staying at Bik’s homestay in the heart of the Ha Giang jungle was an unforgettable experience! Nestled near a serene river and surrounded by lush forests, the location is nothing short of magical. Bik, our incredible host from the Doaz tribe, made us feel like family from the moment we arrived.
The accommodations was cozy and beautiful, reflecting the rich culture of the area. Each morning, we were treated to delicious meals made from locally sourced ingredients—Bik’s cooking is truly a highlight! We enjoyed fresh herbs, vegetables, and meats, all bursting with flavor.
Exploring the nearby trails and listening to the sounds of nature was a perfect way to unwind. Bik’s knowledge of the area added so much to our experience; she guided us through hidden gems and shared stories about her culture.
If you’re looking for an authentic experience in Vietnam, this is it. I can’t recommend Bik’s homestay enough! We left with our hearts full and memories

Staying at Bik’s homestay in the jungle of Ha Giang was an extraordinary experience! The location is breathtaking, situated near a tranquil river and surrounded by a beautiful bamboo forest. The atmosphere is peaceful, making it the perfect escape into nature.
Bik, our wonderful host from the Doaz tribe, was incredibly welcoming. Her hospitality and warmth made us feel right at home. The meals she prepared were exceptional, featuring fresh, locally sourced ingredients that truly showcased the flavors of the region. Each dish was a delightful journey for the taste buds!
A standout experience was Bik’s expertise in tea-making. She introduced us to the art of brewing the highest quality tea from the locally sourced tea leaves in the nearby ancient Tea Tree forest. The flavors were exquisite, and her passion for tea was evident in every sip.
The homestay itself was comfortable peaceful and reflecting the local culture. We spent our days exploring the surrounding landscapes and enjoying

Vous voulez sortir des chemins battus, alors pour plonger dans la vie de la communauté Dzaho voici l’adresse qu’il faut choisir.
La route jusqu’à la maison est quelques fois difficile mais vous serez récompensés en vivant une véritable expérience avec cette charmante famille Dzaho.
Thj Bich peut vous faire parcourir la superbe montagne qui entoure sa maison et vous expliquer les plantations de thé et de cannelle et toutes les plantes que la famille récolte pour elle et pour les animaux. Avec elle vous pourrez atteindre une jolie cascade .
Vous connaîtrez leur façon de cuisiner et vous partagerez de délicieux repas avec eux.
Vous pourrez admirer leur costume et faire de superbes photos.
Nous sommes très heureux d’avoir vécu avec la famille de Thj Bich qui est toujours prête à répondre à toutes vos attentes.
Really comfortable place to stay with some very friendly and helpful hosts that helped us map out our Ha Giang loop for the next few days. Would definitely recommend this place to all travellers.

Nhân viên phục vụ tận tình, chuyên nghiệp và luôn sẵn lòng hỗ trợ khi cần. Từ khi làm thủ tục nhận phòng cho đến khi trả phòng, tôi cảm thấy được chăm sóc rất chu đáo, đã quay lại đây từ lần công tác trước và chắc chắn sẽ lại quay lại mỗi khi có dịp công tác ở Hà Giang

A lovely AirBNB! The location was great, and the building was beautiful. The rooms were nice and comfortable and the host was very accommodating when the AC was not working, we were able to easily switch rooms was was very appreciated.
The bathrooms were very clean (which is important to me!)
I would highly recommend for a short stay☺️

The hotel exceeded our expectations. The location is not in the most interesting part of Ha Giang, but you can reach the city by foot or taxi pretty easy.
We enjoyed our stay 😊
Wir haben uns wohl gefühlt in der Unterkunft und das Personal war immer freundlich und hilfsbereit. Wir können die Unterkunft weiterempfehlen!
Ein schönes Zimmer in einen sehr gepflegten Haus. Wir waren nur eine Nacht hier, haben uns aber sehr wohlgefühlt.

Wir haben eine Nacht in der Villa übernachtet. Sind etwas spät angekommen (20:30) check-in war jedoch problemlos dank der 24h reception. Es war sauber und zweckmässig für uns. Wir würden wieder kommen.

I really enjoyed my stay at this hotel. To be honest, the room was even better than it looked in the pictures. It was spacious, comfortable, and clean. The workspace and Wi-Fi connection were excellent. The bathroom is inside the room, and there’s a kitchen where you can prepare your own meals. However, do bear in mind that only one of the three hob rings was working. That said, it wasn’t an issue at all.
The two young gentlemen responsible for housekeeping were polite and attentive. I truly appreciated their efforts to make me feel as comfortable as possible.
I highly recommend this place for both short and long stays.

Un accueil très sympathique, la chambre et le matelas étaient confortables.
Possibilité de louer des motos sur place, et de garder nos sacs pour plusieurs jours : ceci est très confortable.
Nous reviendrons très bientôt

Abbiamo passato una notte tranquilla qui :) gli host sono gentilissimi e il posto é davvero pulito e confortevole, oltre che essere bellissimo!
Lo consiglierei a tutti!
Grazie per l’ospitalità :)
Nice little hotel. We could rent a motorbike for 180/day for the loop. cam be recommended.
amazing!!!
Great spot to stay for a night or two before jumping on the Ha Giang loop.

Excellent place to stay! Also booked the Ha Giang loop through them with Hai as my guide and he was phenomenal! The best guide I've had on this 7 month trip.  Rooms are large and spacious and clean, staff is super helpful with anything you need. I stayed here before and after I did the loop. They offer good prices for the loop, single or easy rider, and Hai was incredible. I would be happy to stay here again.
thanks for your disponibility and your kidness

Despite having a little miscommunication about the location of the house ( he explained that he can’t fix on airbnb just yet, so pay attention on the correct address that he will message you) everything else was great. Chung and her brothers made you feel right at home. This is a beautiful house right at the main road. There is plenty of food options. He also has motobike for rent for the Ha Giang Loop. According to my partner Tej those are good bikes, as he can see the way they took care of their bike. Thanks Chung and especially his brother for the pleasant stay. Thanh and Tej

What a great stay we had here! The place is very clean, spacious and the staff are so helpful. They sorted us out with a motorbike, protective pads, waterproofs and helped us tie the bags onto the bike. We organised the bus with them and the were great. The internet speed was extremely fast- good enough to do video calls which is what I needed. The location is also very central- only a few minutes work from the Main Street. Definitely recommend! Thank you!
훌룡한 숙소.좋은 호스트.친절한 직원.숙소가 깨끗함.커피포트,TV,에어컨.매일 물과수건,욕실  용품을 가져다줌.지하1층에 주차시설 있음.

Villa rất sạch sẽ, anh chị chủ nhiệt tình. Ai đến Hà Giang lần đầu có thể hỏi anh chị về địa điểm và phương thức đi lại. Mọi người có thể dùng ứng dụng bản đồ tìm đúng tên Villa để thấy vị trí dễ dàng hơn
Great stay!
Great place to stay
siamo stati una notte, posto ok per toccata e fuga.

Der Aufenthalt an sich war sehr gut, wir konnten uns trotz keinen Englisch Kenntnissen von ihnen mit der Google Übersetzer App verständigen. Im Badezimmer hat die Duschtür nicht ganz geschlossen und der Wasserdruck war nicht extrem hoch. Man kann direkt dort Motorräder mieten für den Ha Giang Loop mit Regenschutz und Helmen inklusive für 180k pro Tag wenn man selber fahren kann, was ein sehr fairer Preis ist.

Wow! After a long and scary drive in a van from Hanoi, I was so happy to arrive to such a spacious & gorgeous room. I loved it so much I wish I could have stayed more than one night.  The young man that greeted me was very friendly and helpful. Thank you for the lovely stay.

Great place to stay before you start the Ha Giang loop! We stayed here as we arrived late on the bus. Was the perfect place to rest and base ourselves before we set off.
We rented a bike too and it was spot on, no issues at all. We used it for 4 days and it was perfect for what we needed. We were also able to leave our bigger bags safely with them and collected when we dropped the bike off.
Host is responsive and the young lad at the reception was helpful and accommodating.
Simple place but perfect for what we needed. Recommend this place if your plans are similar to ours!
Nice and easy
Dung was very responsive and provided loads of help in navigating and checking in
Todo perfecto, cerca de la estación de autobús lo cual fue muy conveniente. Todo genial

Hostel bien placé. Pratique car proche du terminal des bus. Chambre et salle de bain propres.
Seul bémol, les chambres placées côté route sont très bruyantes, je recommande celles côté montagne.
perfect place for overnight, especially if coming late night by bus. accomodation is next to drop of buss stop. host was kindly waiting for our late arrival.
Great place to stay after completing the loop!
Great and clean stay!
The room is clean and the hotel location is very convenient!
Chambre très propre et identique aux photos.

The minute i entered the house I felt at home. Mi is such a incredible nice person. Always friendly and listening. We had such good conversations and shared dinner together that was cooked by her staff which was more then amazing. More then recommended to stay there. 10/10
Top verblijf met een hele lieve gastvrouw. Gezellig samen een traditionele maaltijd gegeten waarbij Mi verhalen vertelde over de omgeving en cultuur.

Der Aufenthalt war bisher mein absolutes Highlight in Vietnam. Man fühlt sich wie zu Hause, denn alles ist liebevoll und gemütlich eingerichtet. Es gibt einen Kamin, einen wunderschönen Garten und niedliche Hunde. Mi ist super freundlich und lustig und hilft einem bei allem. Man kann wirklich spüren, dass sie ganz viel Liebe in diesen Ort steckt. Das Essen hier ist ebenfalls fantastisch. Ich kann jedem Menschen empfehlen hier her zu kommen!!!
Mi ist eine ganz herzliche und fürsorgliche Gastgeberin. Das Haus und der Garten sind mit viel Liebe zum Detail gestaltet. Und das Essen war auch ganz hervorragend.

The room here is super clean and chill, really gives off that relaxed vibe the second you step in. It’s quiet and peaceful, perfect for unwinding and finding some peace of mind. Everything’s been taken care of down to the smallest details, from the decor to the overall atmosphere, making it feel like you're in the perfect healing space. Big thanks to chị “Mị” for always being there to chat, share, and stick with us throughout the trip. It’s because of her that I could find some calm in the middle of all the hustle. Wishing Mực and the two pups nothing but happiness and good vibes! I’ll definitely recommend this place to my friends ạaa
Eine richtig tolle Unterkunft!
Every effort was made to ensure a comfortable and relaxing stay. Would return.
Bạn chủ nhà thân thiện, nhiệt tình, phòng ở sạch sẽ, đầy đủ tiện nghi

Mi was a.wonderful host. She upgraded me free of charge after the room I was looking for was booked. The dinner was delicious and her brother gave me helpful hints on the local market. It was a great stay overall!
Alles top, sehr nett, kostenloses Essen bekommen
Struttura nuovissima, praticamente ancora in costruzione, le camere sono molto belle e funzionali.
The room was comfortable and fresh, the internet work great for working and space where you can do it too, and the kitchen was great too. The host was always responsive and really helpful.

Thai was so friendly and helpful. The room is lovely and clean and located in a great spot. She kindly let us leave our bag there whilst we did the Ha Giang loop and then when we came to pick it up she even let us shower and wait at her house for free.

Airbnb mum Thai was very friendly and helpful.
She is a busy full time working mum but helped me with booking the ha giang loop as I was totally confused with so much on offer. She was also happy to change the date of the second day of Airbnb booking to when I got back from the loop. And lastly she booked my van to Sapa and walked with me to the road to send me off. For breakfast she would pick up a lovely Bahmi every morning. It is an easy walk over the bridge to the other side where the restaurants are.

Wir sind Abends mit dem Bus aus Hanoi angekommen und konnten per Code selbstständig ins Haus. Alles war sauber und vorbereitet. Thai hat uns immer geschrieben oder persönlich Tipps gegeben und uns zu einem Moped verholfen. Wir durften unser Gepäck was wir nicht für den Loop mitnehmen konnten bei ihr stehen lassen, worüber wir sehr dankbar sind. Wir sind sehr zufrieden und können die Unterkunft nur weiterempfehlen.

Insgesamt war der Aufenthalt in Ordnung für den Preis. Das Zimmer ist halt etwas muffelig und teilweise nicht ganz sauber, das Fenster geht in einen kleinen Hof hinaus und bietet nicht viel Licht. Der Check-in was easy und es wurde Wasser bereitgestellt, was toll war.
Thai’s place is in pristine condition and she is a very friendly and helpful host. Definitely recommended!

A quiet, clean and nice room in a decent location from the center.
Thanks Thai for being a great host and helping me out so much!
This was just what we needed. Easy to find, great check in and super comfortable. We walked to nearby restaurants and Thai helped with recommendations whilst also giving us our own space.

Thai was very communicative and had a convienient, modern place. I stayed here after a late night arrival by bus and she had everything prepared. I missed out on more interaction with her (which seems to be a highlight for most) but it was still a solid stay.

Ich habe mich bei Thai super wohl gefühlt. Die Unterkunft war sehr modern und sauber. Mein Zimmer mit eigenem Badezimmer hat mir so gut gefallen, ich blieb insgesamt drei Nächte. Ich konnte sogar das Fahrrad von Thai benutzen, es gab immer Wasser und auch heißes Wasser für Tee 🥰 Sie hat mir viel geholfen, von Restaurantempfehlungen bis Planungen meiner Loop Tour und meiner Busfahrt zurück nach Hanoi. Ich würde sofort wieder kommen.
Great rest stop in Ha Giang. Thai was very nice and accommodating!
Thai est une personne dévouée et très aidante pour ses clients. Un grand merci à elle pour son aide précieuse et ses attentions.
Very kind host who helped us with whatever we needed! Very clean space. I highly recommend.

Thai war uns eine grosse Hilfe! Sie konnte alles was wir brauchten innert kürzester Zeit organisieren. Zudem war sie und auch ihre Tochter sehr sympathisch und wir haben uns wohl gefühlt. Bei unser nächsten Ha Giang Befahrung werden definitiv wieder zu Thai gehen!
lovely stay to get stalled in Ha Giang!
Thai was perfect with everything. I trusted her completely to book us a 3 days tour for the loop and it was the highlight of our trip. Thank you again!!!
Thaï nous a organisé notre roadtrip de 2 jours 3 nuits pour le Ha Giang Loop qui a été plus que parfait!

The host was amazing and the place was spotless clean as well. She helped me to booked the motorbike tour for me and it was one of the best experiences I had in Vietnam. Thank you for preparing breakfast for me when I had an early day and checking in on me when I fell sick. Will definitely recommend this place to my friends if they ever come to Ha Giang. Thank you for being so friendly and kind :)

This was a lovely place to stay. We felt very comfortable with the location, host and accommodation! The Homestay is tastefully designed and a welcoming atmosphere! Thai was very helpful with information about the Ha Giang Loop and allowed us to leave our luggage while going for 3 days. Great place!

Thai’s place was great. Room is spacious, clean and comfortable. Thai’s food was delicious. She helped us sort out all our tours around Ha Giang. Was always responsive and had some very good suggestions for the local area. Highly recommend if you are visiting this region. Thank you for everything Thai :)

Clean, comfortable, modern apartment within walking distance of good restaurants and cafes in Ha Giang. This homestay was wonderful!
Thai was an incredibly helpful host, and helped me arrange a private tour of the Ha Giang Loop, laundry, and a bus back to Hanoi. My trip would not have been the same without her help.
Highly recommended for your time in Ha Giang!!

Thai went above and beyond to help us on our trip to Ha Giang and going on a private Ha Giang Loop Tour. She helped arranged the tour and our transport to and from Ha Giang. She brought us traditional Vietnamese cake to try and took us out for a local dinner on our last night. The house was very clean and easy to find, and a good location close  to supermarkets and shops (incl great Banh Mi places). Could not recommend highly enough!

Lovely stay with Thai, go good that I came back after the Ha Giang loop and stayed another night here! Room was modern and clean and Thai was the best host! She had excellent recommendations for food and activities and helped me book my bus back to Hanoi, we shared a wonderful dinner and lunch and it was great getting to know Thai and her family! Highly recommend! Great way to find out more about the local way of life, I will be back ❤️❤️❤️
Very nice and modern place, can fully recommend

Special homestay outside of Hà Giang city, a convenient distance to the local market, bus station, restaurants, and pharmacies (walkable, although there are also bicycles available to borrow) but nestled in a quiet, lush village. The whole family is very sweet and earnest, and chú Anh in particular is very knowledgeable and connected within the community. The river behind the house is a favorite swimming spot amongst the local kids. Don't miss out on the communal dinners, a generous spread of vegetarian, fish, and meat dishes, accompanied by homegrown rice. Filtered mountain spring water on tap was a blessing. Truly the perfect place for relaxation and exploration; I look forward to returning.

what a wonderful find. Was looking for somewhere to relax and exceeded all expectations. lovely room overlooking the river. swam in both the swimming pool and river. enjoyed a wonderful meal with host and other travellers, then fell asleep to the sound of the river. As a solo female traveller felt very safe and welcomed. highly recommend.
We had a very pleasent stay. The place is quiet and view to nature is wonderful. The host is very kind and helpful. We enjoyed a great food as well. Thank you

Die gesamte Unterkunft und die Umgebung ist einfach nur wunderschön. Ob zum abhängen, zum wandern, Motorrad- oder Fahrrad fahren, hier bekommt man alles geboten. Ich selbst war schon im November 2023 hier, jetzt wieder und ich würde immer wieder hierher kommen.

Such amazing family so kind and beautiful homestay where you can see the water and nature all around. Out of the city crowns but still only 5 minutes to any place. Great food and dinner in the night so delicious and sweet animals live near by, all local food and fruits grow near the home. Very special place I will always remember and come back!

A lovely cabin, with a gorgeous view over a calm river, which was a delight to swim in.
The owner, The, lives onsite, and his family owns most of the agricultural land nearby. They were extremely friendly, welcoming, and excellent cook too. Their home made happy water was particularly delicious.
I highly recommend, either for short or longer stays.

Don't miss out on this place! After a long journey on our motorbike we felt so lucky to have found Anh's accommodation, it was simply perfect. Pictures don't give justice to the beautiful, private view you get from the cabin's balcony. You can swim in the river right next to your cabin or in the natural private pool. Their hospitality was fantastic, we got lots of useful tips about the area and we were prepared dinner as soon as we arrived which we shared with one the owners, it was really tasty. Thanks again!

I almost cried when I left Ahn's place. Ahn and his family run the homestay. The food is delicious, the surroundings are beautiful and peaceful. My cabin had a balcony overlooking the river and the mountain. Ling, his nephew took me out in the nearby countryside to swim in waterfalls and hike in rice fields. we also had quite the crazy bike ride in the mountains.
But most of all, it's their kindness, hospitality that made the stay even more valuable. I had a meal with the whole family on Freedom day. I met everyone.
They made me feel very welcome and always very very helpful.
My trip until then was complicated but they made everything seem so easy. Will recommend to all my friends.

C’était un grand plaisir de venir dans ce merveilleux endroit.
L’accueil a été fabuleux, tout en gentillesse et tout au long du séjour, nous n’avons plus qu’apprécier l’attention et les conseils prodigués par notre hôte … extrêmement bienveillant et accueillant, il nous a facilité la découverte en moto que nous avons faite grâce à ses amis qui nous a emmené loin des sentiers battus, une vraie découverte.
Il nous a également bien aidé pour le départ qui était un peu compliqué et qu’avec lui a été particulièrement facile.
Merci également pour ses belles attentions, la nourriture proposée le soir était délicieuse et variée !!!
Merci beaucoup !
Ce séjour est dans notre ❤️

We loved this homestay so much that we came back and stayed again! Both hosts are such wonderful people and so genuine. The food here that you can have for breakfast , lunch and dinner is the best that we have had in Vietnam ! You should truly book this homestay as you won’t regret it. The land is so beautiful and there are some very friendly kittens. It’s so peaceful and again , swimming in the river is heavenly. The price can’t be matched and it’s easy enough to get a cab to the homestay and back or even to walk ! You can walk to town amongst farm land and animals.
Wir hatten eine sehr nette Zeit.

We had an amazing stay at Anh's place. The accommodation is fantastic and very quiet, with great views and a lovely river behind it.
Anh was incredibly helpful, assisting us in booking the Easy Riders for the Ha Giang loop, which is a must-do if you're in the area.
He even let us use the room for free for a few hours after we returned from the loop and had to wait for our bus to Sa Pa.
The food was delicious, and the overall service was excellent.
Definitely check out this place if you're around Ha Giang—you won't regret it!
Everything is perfect - nearly have beautiful river I swimming in the morning. Pancakes in breakfast with banana and honey. Dinner is delicious. Thanks my mountain brother 🙏

Anh’s was such a great place to stay. It was outside of Ha Giang in a peaceful place on the river. We had dinner there one night and the food was delicious, everything was fresh from the land. Our motorbike had some issues before doing the loop and we ended up staying a few extra nights. His Nephew even helped us out to take the motorbike to town to get a new battery. The bed has also been the most comfortable bed since we have been in Vietnam. Definitely recommend this place to anyone going to Ha Giang!

Unser Aufenthalt im Bungalow war traumhaft! ❤️ Wir waren im Fluß schwimmen, haben mit der Familie zusammen gegessen und hatten eine wunderschöne Zeit! In der Gegend kann man sehr schön wandern, die Gastgeber haben tolle Tips und ihr Essen war super!
It was a beautiful place to stay for a few nights, we swam in the river and walked into town. Anh and his nephews are very lovely and very keen to help.
We had a very pleasant stay. The rooms are very clean and the food is excellent. Very nice staff☺️
Very glad I chose this homestay—worth every penny. Linh’s cooking and hospitality were incredible. Highly recommend!

Anh, I miss you already! What a homestay you have! It was a wonderful place to stay, so close to the river with a wonderful balcony view. It was the perfect spot to play my flute.
Being with you for more than a week, was really relaxing for me and my girlfriend. Till we meet again! Cảm ơn bạn.
For people scrolling the reviews: the accomodation is clean and wel maintained. You will find comfort there. The rooms can be noisy, but because of Anh personality he attracts guests that are respectfull to, and mindfull of each other. Very good vibes!
Everyday there is the possibility of new people arriving that are planning to loop. That makes it a nice place to meet new people.
Regardless of the duration of your stay, Anh will treat you with just a wonderful hospitality. While his and his nephew’s service are always on point, they respect your privacy and personal choices at all times.
Last but not least: the food, my goodness, what a load of delicacies!
Beautiful place with nice views. The room was really well kept too! Thanks for the wonderful stay!
Endroit idéal, au calme sur la rivière, en retrait du centre ville d'Ha Giang. Accueil, chambre, repas, tout était parfait, merci Anh et Linh pour toutes vos attentions.

Nous avons vécu une magnifique expérience humaine et culturelle dans cet havre de paix. Thê a été un hôte extraordinaire, d'une gentillesse inconditionnelle. Il a partagé avec passion la culture et les coutumes de la région.
Il nous a également généreusement aidé à organiser toutes nos aventures et déplacements. Grâce à lui, nous avons pu vivre un moment inoubliable lors la boucle d'Ha Giang, pour laquelle il nous a confié à 2 super Easy Riders, issus de minorités ethniques et habitant à quelques pas de chez lui (nous vous conseillons d'ailleurs de lui demander ces deux chauffeurs, Kam et Zong ;-))
Si vous souhaitez vivre une expérience 100%, nous vous encourageons à loger chez lui! Vous vivrez un moment inoubliable et authentique, bercé par un esprit très touchant de solidarité et de communauté.

A great location in Ha Giang with a mountain stream flowing by and magnificent views of the countryside. The rooms were a teensy small with the bed taking up most of the space. However, the balcony was great as it has far reaching views of the countryside. Wonderful to hear the sound of the mountain stream gurgling past.

Petite cabane au dessus de la rivière en bambou et feuille de palmier…. Très bel environnement….possibilité de prendre le petit déjeuner et le repas le soir sur place… des ballades à faire à pieds autour….
Il vaut mieux être motorisé pour arriver jusque chez faithien homestay car autrement on met 20 bonnes minutes pour arriver à Ha Giang à pieds… mais peut être qu il y aura des vélos la prochaine fois…

Я жил в 200+ отелей. Могу сказать точно что у этого самый красивый вид из всех, что я видел.
В апартаменты попасть не так легко. Особенно последние 300 метров до самих палаток. Но для меня это наоборот дополнительное приключение!)
Мне всё понравилось!
Posto incredibile. Tutto perfetto. Cibo stupendo e host fantastico. Se passate di lì andateci assolutamente!
Wat een magische plek. Fantastisch uitzicht, lieve en gastvrije mensen, en heerlijk eten! Wauw wat een plek dit!

Excellent séjour dans ce logement ! Très propre et bien entretenu, il est également facile d’accès, ce qui rend l’arrivée très pratique. La flexibilité pour l’arrivée et la possibilité de laisser nos affaires le temps de faire la loop ont été un vrai plus. Parfait pour un séjour sans stress. Pas proche du centre mais pas loin du tout, surtout si vous louez un scooter. Je recommande vivement !

Had a lovely stay here before starting our journey on the Ha Giang loop.
It’s in a great spot, in the middle of the Ha Giang town - a short walk to restaurants and places where you can rent motorcycles etc.
Everything was as described, hosts were lovely and we were given clear and easy instructions.
Thanks very much!

Perfect price/quality & communication. We slept there for one night after we arrived from Hanoi. Next day we started the Ha Giang Loop. There was a night guard that made the check-in (around 9pm) easy & made us feel safe.
A tip: try the Coconut Coffee in the morning. 100% recommend!

Parfait pour une nuit pour commencer ou finir la Ha Giang Loop. Nous avons pu laisser nos affaires chez eux en toute tranquillité.
Si vous partez très tôt le matin, prévenez l’hôtel avant afin qu’il vous ouvre la porte et que vous ne restez pas enfermés comme nous ahaha.
Lit un peu dur mais ça va encore. L’eau chaude est sans limite ce qui est génial.

Dung was super helpful. We were on a sleeper bus due to arrive at 1.30am. It was super delayed till 4am and dung was around to let us in, and help make us comfortable. A great place to stop before starting the ha Giang loop.

I arrived in Ha Giang City at 3 am and Dung was responsive and woke up to let me in at that hour. The room was simple, quiet, and clean, the perfect place to rest before waking up to do the loop. He also let me store my bags there for the few days I’m gone.

Dung as well as family and staff were incredibly kind and helpful during my stay. I arrived around 3am from Hanoi, yet he still woke up to let me into the hotel. I was able to get inside and get a good night’s rest. The room was very comfortable and had everything needed. The bed and blankets were cozy and I slept well. ^^ I ordered coffee here a couple of times and it was so delicious! In addition, he was extremely helpful as I prepared for the Ha Giang loop: he let me store my bags for the days I was gone and when I returned helped me find a bus back to Hanoi. You do have to walk a bit into town for food, stores, gyms, etc., but it’s not too bad. I had a great stay here and recommend!

Excellente nuit chez Dung. La chambre était propre et fournissait tout ce dont on avait besoin. Il y a de l’eau chaude et du chauffage pour les moments froids. La nuit a pu être reposante car il n’y avait pas un bruit. Très jolie sur la montagne le matin en se réveillant.

Logement très propre, avec une salle de bain spacieuse. Petits bémols, le logement n’est pas très bien situé et le matelas est très rigide. Ceci dit les hôtes ont été accueillants et toujours très souriants. Je recommande pour 1 ou 2 nuits.
Merci, et bonne continuation ☺️

Sehr zufrieden. Entspricht der Beschreibung, die Gastgeber sind sehr freundlich.
Ich konnte meine Wäsche waschen lassen und es war sehr schnell fertig! Ich war sehr zufrieden.
Good location, close to the bus station and motorbike rentals. The staff was very friendly.
Easy location, cheap place, clean & efficient place. Kind hosts and accommodating
très propre, près des autobus et quelques restaurants. Bonne douche chaude au retour de la Ha Giang loop :)

Hôtel sympathique, très propre, avec un excellent rapport qualité prix.
Je recommande le temps d’une nuit !

nice and lovely place, close to the city
i csn recommend it
Mooie, propere kamer. Vriendelijk personeel. Heel voordelige prijs voor deze accomodatie!
Good private place to rest before doing the Ha Giang loop.
Very nice and easy place

Dung was very helpful with checking in and keeping our bags for us while we did the Ha Giang loop. The room was clean, comfortable and worth the cost as it is right in town and a good place to take a rest before starting the loop- would definitely recommend!
Super séjour passé ici ! Nous avions besoin de repos avant de commencer la boucle en moto et la chambre était très calme ! Petit café dans l’hôtel très sympa  et personnel adorable ! Merci beaucoup
Alles gut!

La chambre est propre et confortable. L’hôtel est de plus très bien placé. L’hôte nous a permis d’arriver en pleine nuit et de laisser nos gros sacs à l’accueil pendant que nous faisions le Ha Giang Loop. Il y a tout ce qu’il faut pour passer un bon séjour.
Je recommande cette chambre, elle était très propre et le personnel est très professionnel
Très bien !
Everything was great! Can totally recommend 😊
It was a pleasure for us to stay in Su's Villa. They have done so much more service then expected. recommendations, luggage holding and perfect service at the scooter trip we made.
great place. good service
It was such a wonderful stay! Beautiful arrangement and super clean and roomy! We would definitely recommend everyone to give them a try!
اشكرهم
Very flexible with check in & even got us a taxi to the homestay! Very beautiful place, a little out from the main strip but easy 10 minute taxi ride! We loved staying here

Les hôtes étaient vraiment gentilles avec nous! L'hôtel est charmant, et avec beaucoup de belles plantes. L'emplacement n'est pas directement dans la ville d'Ha Giang, donc nous nous sommes déplacés en taxi. Merci pour tout!

Très bon logement, les chambres sont propres et confortables, les hôtes sont très accueillants. Nous avons pû également laver notre linge facilement.
Nous avons dû repasser à Ha Giang city et nous sommes dont revenu dormir ici.
C'est loin du centre de la ville mais on trouve facilement des taxis pas chers avec l'appli "xanh sm".

The stay was lovely and the property is so beautiful.
The staff was so caring and respectful to us.
Lovely little spot on the edge of town. Family was very seer and welcoming and the views were great.
Lovely guesthouse and the hosts were very so kind and friendly
The family was super nice and gave me good tips for food. Would come back for sure
Had a good time staying in Ha Giang town before the ride, host was really helpful with various recommendations and anything else. Thanks you!

Great homestay and host
Highly recommend!!!

Had a great stay here, the family is so kind and the area is absolutely stunning.  A great place for a retreat into nature.  The whole village was welcoming, exceedingly nice and eager to say hello.  The food cooked by the family was also fabulous with all natural ingredients right from the local area.  It was a truly special experience and a huge thanks to Xoi and her family for making it possible.  Thank you!

Xoi's farmstay was one of my best on my three months journey throughout Việt Nam, her family was so welcoming and warming, it was such a peaceful spot to recharge before my journey back to Hanoi, the dinner with the family was another highlight she always trys to make the food from local ingredients from the farms in the area, and she also does a great coffee in the morning 🌄.
trust this review and just book it 😁

Xoi and her family were the most incredible hosts and we could not have asked for a better experience at her farmstay. Staying here was truly one of a kind, and the views and people in the area were incredible. I highly recommend anyone who wants an authentic Northern Vietnamese experience to stay here.

Hands down the most beautiful landscape I've ever seen, and Xoi and her family were equally amazing and made us feel like family. We ate and drank and even celebrated a new addition to the family together! We made lifelong memories, and riding bikes to the waterfall and the pool were special highlights.
If you're even slightly considering this amazing farm stay, just do it!

I loved Xoi's homestay. The village is a beautiful and peaceful place, and Xoi has organised the accommodation very well. I definitely recommend eating with the family, it was some of the best food I ate in Vietnam!

Xoi’s homestay was the perfect place for us to relax after the Ha Giang loop! It’s beautifully decorated and has a lovely garden. We had great fun cycling round the local villages, saying hello to everyone, visiting waterfalls and going on a raft down the river. Xoi and her family were extremely friendly and welcoming and Xoi was very helpful with our transport and dietary requirements! Highly recommend if you want to see a less touristy side of Vietnam :)

Xoi’s place is well-run, simple, and authentic. Probably our favorite stay in Vietnam, due to the privacy and serenity of the area. Everything was clean, and daily meals (for purchase) with the family were delicious and sweet. Loved biking around the village and wandering around the hills. Not much to do but lean into the peace - totally off the beaten path!

An amazing stay! Staying at Xoi's Farmstay was the highlight of my Vietnam trip. Xoi's family was so welcoming and helpful in recommending activities to do in the village. The food was also delicious. I hope to come back again in the future!

If I could put more than 6 stars I would do it cause this place is definitely one of the best experiences I have had with Airbnb especially as I arrived during a traditional ceremony ! Locals were great !
I had a flat tires and everybody helped me.
Their breakfast was included and really good.
I will never forget this experience, thank you so much to the team and everyone present that night !

Notre région préférée du Vietnam! Paisible, chaleureux comme la famille de Xoi. très beau et se belles choses a voir et à faire comme du vélo, baignades, Ballade dans de magnifiques Rizières et Village.
Notre coup de coeur! De belles personnes a rencontrer !

Xoi var en virkelig god vært sammen med hele hendes familie. Omgivelserne er smukke og man får et indblik i det autentiske Vietnam.
Maden der bliver lavet er fremragende og hele familien er meget hjælpsom.
Beautiful location in the mountains. Very kind and hospitable host. Lots of great destinations nearby. Five star stay.

We had a really wonderful time staying here. The house was a charming and peaceful place to be in. The food (we had vegetarian) was truly delicious and it was really nice to have home-cooking. We enjoyed cycling around the lanes and seeing the landscape and everyday life unfold around us - and watching the fireflies by the stream in the evening. it was quite hot (38 C), so we also did a lot of sitting around and reading in the house, and it was a lovely place to be. We particularly appreciated that it was a quiet area and not touristy. Xoi was warm and super helpful. We were especially grateful for her help with transport to this fairly rural location.

Xoi has built up a great homestay where we as a family of 4 felt at home rightaway. We loved the spirit and the communal atmosphere - buzzing with live, yet thougtful and with care. The surroundings are beautiful, you can easily go around by bicycle and there is a nice public pool nearby. It is far from Hanoi, and in our experience the luxury minivan is 10x better than getting there by sleeperbus. I can recommend for those who are keen to enjoy a few days in a rural setting.

Je recommande Lam Thuong si on veut s'écarter des sentiers battus, au contact avec une communauté accueillante, pour passer du temps au calme dans la nature. Xoi et sa famille vous accueilleront avec le sourire et une disponibilité merveilleuse. On y mange sainement, des plats délicieux cuisinés maison, avec les produits de la maison ou du village.

Xoi est un personnel très réactive et attentive aux besoins de ses hôtes. L’échange était très naturel et j’ai adoré l’endroit, l’ambiance. Tout le monde a été super et j’aimerai y retourner un jour!
Vous pouvez y aller les yeux fermés vous ne serez pas déçus!
Merci encore à Xoi et à toute sa famille pour leur hospitalité et gentillesse❤️

We had an amazing stay at Xoi’s Homestay. Xoi was extremely responsive and helpful with any and all questions we asked. Xoi’s family is so warm and welcoming, we were included in so many fun activities! Family meals were our favorite, so delicious (and accommodating for vegetarians). The rooms were beautiful and comfortable, with a nice bathroom and shower as well.

Such a beautiful stay! Me and my partner did the Ha giang loop, and Xoi arranged a private car for us to her farm stay. she also helped get us a bus to Hanoi. We had breakfast and lunch made for us which was lovely. We also hired a motorbike for the day, got coffee, found our way to an awesome waterfall and drove around the village taking in the scenery. It’s lovely to be here as there aren’t any tourists around every corner!!

Séjour fantastique chez Xoi et sa famille ! L’auberge est décorée avec beaucoup de goût et en respectant l’habitat local traditionnel, les repas sont vraiment excellents, mention spéciale pour les meilleures Nems que nous avons mangées . Le village est fantastique, très paisible et préservé du tourisme de masse, on y est accueillis comme des invités partout. Nous avons beaucoup aimé les balades et visites possibles à pied ou à vélo, faciles à organiser et la piscine municipale est top surtout avec les fortes chaleurs que nous avons eu. Un grand merci à Xoi et sa famille pour l’accueil et bravo à eux d’avoir fait ce lieu exceptionnel ! Je recommanderai cette adresse à mes amis qui prévoient de partir au vietnam !
I confirm all the 5 stars reviews written by other travellers. A unique experience, to not miss.

This place was a highlight for our family on our three week travels through Vietnam. After we arrived on our very long sleeper bus ride (not recommended) we were escorted by the family to our peaceful room with a river view. An absolutely delicious local menu meal was served using all of their organic farmgrown vegetables and meat. They also had wonderful vegetarian food available too. They served a huge variety of food and some of the tastes were definitely new and delicious to our palette. We took the bikes for many rides through the neighbouring towns where the locals were quick to smile. A very beautiful and peaceful people where all of the families care about one another and live in close community. It was not hard to feel very much at home. The Homestay was a great refuge after our adventures to unwind and chill with a beer or refreshment. The local cashew nuts were incredible. We ate all of their supply and were gifted the last bag as we left.

Cet endroit est l’un des plus incroyables que j’ai jamais vu. Tout est unique.
Vous êtes perdu dans un paradis.
Les locaux, les repas avec la famille, la gentillesse, le calme, les paysages.
Vous êtes admiratif de tout ce qui vous entoure. 1 semaine de calme et d’apaisement. Merci infiniment

This place was very remote but it’s like anything you’ve ever experienced before the sense of community and family at this little gem of the world is unmatched. They cooked home made Vietnamese food every night and it was some of the best food I’ve ever had. They welcomed you in like you were family and it truly was an amazing experience would definitely recommend staying here.

The Xoi Farmstay was far and out the highlight of our month in Vietnam. Quoc and his family made us feel very comfortable and apart of the family. Eating home cooked meals (feasts) with the family was incredible at the end of every day. The home we stayed in was just so beautiful, and very clean.
It was so fantastic that we want to come back to Vietnam just to see our new friends/family in Lam Thuong again. Couldn’t recommend more!
Chị chủ thân thiện, phòng đẹp ấm áp và đầy đủ tiện nghi, đồ ăn sáng ngon và cafe rất ngon. Cần cải thiện phòng vệ sinh kín gió hơn để đỡ lạnh
Mi was an amazing host.  Very kind and helpful.  The location is great, just off the main road.  The room was cozy, we really enjoyed the electric blanket after a cold day on motorbikes.

I stayed at 3 different homestays in Hà Giang, but I have to say, this one was my favorite! The place is super cozy and feels just like home. The room was spotless, the bed was comfy, and the hot water was always ready—such a relief after a long day! And the host, she's just the sweetest! Really made me feel so welcome. I'll definitely be back to visit again! Thanks so much for such a lovely stay!
Em của chị
Thanh

Chị chủ Nhà cực kỳ nhiệt tình và thân thiện. Nếu bạn tìm kiếm một địa điểm vừa ở gần Đồng Văn và có sự riêng từ và yên tĩnh thì nhất định không thể bỏ qua Nhà được.
Lựa chọn Nhà là 1 trải nghiệm đáng nhớ cho chuyến đi Hà Giang lần này.10 điểm cho phòng và 10 điểm cho chị chủ <3

One of the best stays I’ve ever had! Super beautiful room and building, lovely decoration, stunning views. Mi is really nice and I was feeling at home since the first second. I highly recommend to stay a few nights! :) thank you so much!
Great stay with Mi for a couple of days. We were well taken care of. The dinner and breakfasts were good. Loved the decor and the dogs.
Mi has created a beautiful home in the mountains. Such a welcoming space to come back to after exploring, great food, delicious happy water, highly recommend!
Frienly host, Nice house

It is hard to find the words to describe how much we loved our stay at Xoi's house. The location is magical, authentic and peaceful. The family are welcoming, friendly and kind. The atmosphere was warm and homely. The food was simply delicious. We are totally blessed to have spent this time in Xoi's home and recommend for anyone to do the same. We hope to be back to visit again.

Fantastic accommodation and fantastic surroundings. I spontaneously extended my stay by one night. The communication with Xoi is great and the whole family is very nice. You should definitely book the hike, which is also a unique experience.

First of all, this is the place to be! <3
Beginning from the booking, Xoi and her family made us feel like home and helped us with everything. Xoi’s farm is like heaven, the food is more than authentic and sooo delicious - we had dinner with the family everyday and enjoyed every second of our stay. There is plenty to do and see, the neighborhood is heartwarming and lovely.
We learned traditional hat making, went to the Nam Chan waterfall and did a tour with Eric to Pu lung Trang mountain - he cooked for us on the mountain, showed us eatable plants and watched over us every second. We thank everyone for this unforgettable time and we will definitely be back - cảm ơn family 🧡

The most magical place we stayed in Vietnam!
The bungalows perfectly combine authentic Vietnamese living with modern amenities - shower with hot water and good pressure, which is definitely not to be taken for granted in Vietnam.
The bungalow is situated above a stream, so throughout the day we enjoyed the soothing sound of flowing water.
Additionally, the internet connection was exceptionally stable and fast, which allowed us to work without interruptions.
Xoi is the perfect host - she helped us with everything we needed. When we weren't feeling well, she accompanied us to the nearest pharmacy and doctor.
She even arranged bus tickets for us, including personal communication with the bus driver to ensure we wouldn't miss anything. We had the privilege of dining with her and her wonderful family, enjoying authentic local food.
In short, an experience we will never forget.

This place is a MUST see. Xoi and her family were fantastic hosts. Their communication and hospitality were some of the best I’ve ever seen. They fed us 3 spectacular meals every day and the area is even more beautiful than the pictures. We did a 14 km trek one day guided by one of the hosts and enjoyed a delicious picnic at the summit. Plenty of local food and shops, but there was little to no reason to ever leave the resort. Thank you so much to Xoi and the whole crew, 10/10 would recommend to anyone looking for a great place to stay!

Xoi, her family and the accommodation was absolutely perfect! They welcomed you as a part of the family, with a great hospitality. We also went to hikes and met locals who were super nice, inviting you to their houses, and offering local delicacies. All in all super nice environment with stunning views of the mountains, barley any tourists so it feels like a very local experience. We would recommend this stay to everyone, thank you again Xoi! / Vilhelm & Simona

We had a lovely time with Xoi and her beautiful family. We were given very clear instructions on how to get there and how to get to our onward destination after leaving. We ate dinner with the family all 4 nights and it was great fun to be eating with them. I would highly recommend to do this. The area is absolutely beautiful, the people are lovely, and Xoi makes everything so easy for you. This has been the highlight of our travels so far. Anyone thinking about coming here, my suggestion is Yes. Without hesitation.

thank you so so much,
magic experience
Xoi's home was so lovely that it is where I asked my girlfriend to marry me

Xoi en haar familie hebben ons een onvergetelijk cadeau gegeven met het verblijf bij hen op de boerderij. Hier ontdek je het echte Vietnam en de mensen in Luc Yen zijn stuk voor stuk ontzettend aardig en hartelijk. We hebben genoten van de rust, de mooie natuur, de lekkere maaltijden en het contact met de locals. De bungalow is op palen gebouwd, zoals alle traditionele huizen van de Tai bevolking. Het is eenvoudig maar goed. Xoi helpt je bij het regelen van de busreis en eventuele activiteiten. De waterval is zeker een bezoek waard, maar het meest bijzondere is het contact met de mensen en de kinderen in de buurt. We hopen dat de boerderij en het dorp zijn authenticiteit en hartelijkheid altijd zullen behouden. We zullen Xoi en haar familie erg missen!
nice, Clean, confortable beds. all we needed

Simple
Nice hotel in good location
Khách sạn rất sạch sẽ thoáng mát, đồ ăn sáng chu đáo và ngon . Chị Chủ rất chu đáo và hiếu khách
The room was very nice and clean. It had a balcony and the bathroom and kitchen were very clean! Many restaurants and shops in walking distance. Would definitely recommend staying there!
parfait hôt réactif et sympa logement  impeccable  et facile à trouver  parfait !merci

Un peu étonnant la chambre tout en longueur et les lits sur estrade. Mal insonorisée cependant. On entend tout de la cage d'escalier. Accueil très chaleureux et très aimable. Bonnes recommandations pour les restaurants autour.
Dame à l’accueil au petits soins si nécessaire.
Great place to be at, the place is clean and spotless. I live the place and its amenities. Great host
This was a lovely room and we were very happy with our choice to stay here. It was a short 8minute walk to Kim Dong street and the local markets. We’d stay here again.

Dan a été plus que parfait ! Toujours aux petits soins, il nous a cuisiné des délicieux repas pendant tout notre séjour.
Merci encore
Merci :)
Great value, nice meals, fantastic views from the rooms. Great hospitality and endless trekking routes from the house, highly recommended.

Mình book căn hộ dù chưa có đánh giá nào nhưng vì có ưu đãi nên mình quyết định thử trải nghiệm. Căn hộ có nét rất unique. Chúng mình đi chơi nhóm bạn nên book cả căn để có sự thoải mái riêng cho sự thoải mái. Chị Lý và Mint hỗ trợ nhóm mình rất nhiều và tặng mình quà cho mình trước khi check out khỏi căn hộ, mình rất thíc món quà này. Căn hộ rộng rãi đầy đủ tiện nghi, căn hộ rộng rãi và sạch sẽ, đầy đủ tiện nghi, căn hộ có cả phòng đơn và phòng dorm đủ cho 16 người nhưng mình chỉ có 10 người nên không sử dụng hết căn hộ. Đệm thoải mái và không gian trong lành. Rất may mắn vì đã chọn căn hộ của chị Lý và Mint. Recomend tới mọi người khi tới Cao Bằng trải nghiệm
Really Awesome place to stay at , in Cao Bang

Great place to stay in the centre of Cao bang, room was clean and modern, check in was super easy and you’re in walking distance to everything you need. We used this place as a base during our Cao Bang loop - they even allowed us to store our bags when we stayed at other home stays.

La dame à la réception nous à beaucoup aidé avec nos besoins divers (restaurant, transport). Elle ne parlais pas anglais mais faisait beaucoup d’efforts pour nous comprendre,
L’appartement est propre et le ménage est fait à chaque jour.
Nous étions au 2e étage, en haut de la réception, et c’était un peu bruyant le matin lors des allés et venus des gens,.
Nous y retournerions sans hésitation!
Un excellent hôtel calme et propre, et en plus j'ai pu faire garder mes bagages durant mon tour de la région à moto. Je reviendrai ici l'année prochaine.
Great place to stay in Cao Bang
Parfait! Merci beaucoup
Great room and location. All went well, thank you!

Perfect place to escape in the nature. this place is truely a hidden gem. the bungalows are facing a little stream and the rive fields, absolutely charming and peaceful !
The host are so careful and you will definitely love their food 🙂
The owner was very helpful , and was fast to respond with anything i needed . Place is what i need to have a homestay for my loop trip.

The place was ok, well located, the communication with the host was also ok once the reservation started. However I had a couple of problems, one related to enter the building as I didn’t receive one extra password I required to enter. Secondly, once there, the room I booked was not available, besides the host gave me a different one, it was a bit uncomfortable the experience of being advised just until you arrive.
Amazing owner and great communication! They help us a lot to rent motorcycles, buying bus tickets and giving advices about the city.
Everything was great.
Mein Zimmer war sauber und nett eingerichtet ich kann die Unterkunft nur weiterempfehlen. Lý antwortet schnell und ist hilfsbereit:)
We had a good stay here.  The host gave us good suggestions on things to do.  We would stay again

I absolutely loved my stay here! The place was beautiful with a lovely view, and the neighborhood was peaceful and relaxing. Our host was incredibly friendly and went above and beyond to make us feel welcome—she even helped us park our bikes inside for the night and took them out for us the next morning. The homemade breakfast was a wonderful touch and really made the stay feel special. Would definitely recommend and hope to come back again!
Such a nice room with small cute details which made the stay lovely. You also have a Beamer in the room and a really comfortable bed. 5/5

Simply put, one of the best homestays I’ve ever stayed at. The space is clean, cosy, and beautifully decorated — it immediately feels like home.
What truly sets it apart is the host family. They are warm, welcoming, and genuinely kind. I arrived a stranger and left feeling I'd made real friends. We even shared a few meals together — moments I’ll genuinely treasure. I fully intend to keep in touch.
Even with just a few days, Lihn made sure I got the most out of my time. She even found ways to help me save money while still giving me richer, more authentic experiences than any standard tour could offer. I highly recommend asking her about the nearby blacksmithing, incense, and paper-making villages — absolutely unforgettable.
I only wish I’d had more time there. I can’t wait to return… after all, I think it’s definitely my turn to cook dinner next!
Great hosts, location, and room.

Spectacular location - right next to a beautiful pristine river and the room is extremely clean with amazing lighting features. The room service is amazing and the staffs are very memorable. Coffee/ reception staffs are young guys who always welcomed us with big smiles, excellent coffees and deserts as well as able to communicate well and suggested us things to explore while in the area. We are very pleased with the experience and would definitely recommend this place to everyone!

Logement très agréable et bien situé.
Le personnel est très sympathique et toujours ravi d'aider!
Merci pour ce bon séjour

De kamer en badkamer waren perfect, heerlijk bad (vooral na een lange rit met de motor die we konden huren via de accommodatie, dit voelde erg betrouwbaar).
Het was een beetje gek dat we onze sleutel elke keer moesten inleveren als we weggingen en om 11:00 pm binnen moesten zijn. De accommodatie zelf (het eten wat je kon kopen en het contact met de mensen) was niet erg persoonlijk. Wel een hoop eettentjes op loopafstand
We stayed on 1 night here and it was nice. Good location, large space in room, everything was good
Great location and helpful hosts! Our room had the biggest bed I’ve ever seen. Highly recommend!

Ich hatte einen fantastischen Aufenthalt bei Airbnb! Die Unterkunft war einfach perfekt und ich kann sie jedem empfehlen. Besonders beeindruckt hat mich die atemberaubende Aussicht auf die Berge. Jeden Morgen konnte ich den Sonnenaufgang über den Gipfeln genießen, einfach wunderschön. Die Lage war ideal, um die umliegende Natur zu erkunden und ich habe die Ruhe und Erholung sehr genossen. Die Gastgeber waren äußerst freundlich und hilfsbereit und haben meinen Aufenthalt zu einem unvergesslichen Erlebnis gemacht. Ich freue mich schon auf meinen nächsten Besuch!

+ Ly is great host!
She speaks great english.
She arranged us some beds, since we wanted really early check in (5:00)
Helped us with trips around the Cao Bang (drove us herself, explained local culture and showed us authentic vietnamese experience - we were even invited for family dinner with her :) )
She gave us recommendations about local restaurants
+ great location - place is in the middle of Cao Bang
+ everything was according to photos and descriptions
+ good wifi - no problems with Teams calls or streaming
- really bad smell from toilet
- sometimes lack of hot water/pressure
Beautiful place.  Fun drive out there. Kinda expensive but worth it.

Harry's family are very friendly and made us feel very welcome! The place is very peaceful and relaxing, with beautiful scenery around the lake and the boat trip with Harry's father is really great! We were welcomed as if we were part of the family. A special mention to Harry's father, with whom we exchanged a few shots ;)

Harry and his family were awesome hosts. Ba Be is such a beautiful spot. The boat tour with Harry's dad Mr. Soa was absolutely fantastic and well worth the money. Harry also did a great job helping us organize transport to and from Hanoi.

We had difficulty with Google Maps getting us to Harry’s place. We called him and he immediately resolved the issue. Accommodation was great and we had dinner and breakfast and both were delicious. He even organized for us, a boat ride. I highly recommend his place.

Harry parle très bien anglais ce qui a été pratique pour la communication. Le logement est propre et la nourriture délicieuse (prix additionnel mais tarif très raisonnables).
Merci à notre hôte pour son aide dans l’organisation, cela a été particulièrement appréciable pour réserver le trajet de retour à Hanoi.
Babe Lake est un endroit paisible et calme c’est très appréciable. Attention un peu de musique forte le soir, il y a très souvent une petite fête locale le soir. Cependant ça ne finit pas trop tard et l’ambiance est « bon enfant »
Harry est très gentil et communicatif, il m’a particulièrement bien aidé pour mon trajet jusqu’à Cao Bằng ! J’ai passé un très bon séjour chez lui et je le remercie.
