Staying with Harry’s family was lovely. We arrived after some hours of riding our bikes through the dark. Arriving all cold to the bone the greeted us with a going fireplace and delicious food. We had a great time. Thank you!!

Superbe hôte très accueillant et serviable, possibilité de manger avec la famille contre un peu d’argent et les repas sont très bon !
La famille peut aussi vous transportez à certaines activités !

Hoanh is a great host, he booked the bus for us, and we arrived directly in front of his place. He was also kind enough to upgrade our rooms because we were the only guests.
Most of the activities around are provided by Hoanh's family. One important tip: since there is not many shops around this part of the lake, remember to take some cash with you before going there. In case of emergency, Hoanh accepts online payment.
The family dinner was interesting, the happy water always breaks down the language barrier ;)
Stayed here again after finding it last year. Great way to relax after a moto trip from Hanoi

Had a great stay. Room was nice and family dinner was awesome. Be prepared for shots though 😉. Breakfast view was nice over the fields and lake in distant view. Nice little store next door for some snacks.

Hoanh war extrem hilfreich und nett. Ba Be ist eine wunderschöne sehr abgelegene und sehr ruhige Region die perfekt ist um ein paar Tage zu entspannen und auszuschalten. Nur dort hin- und wieder wegzukommen ist etwas schwierig.
Außerdem lohnt es sich die Preise für die von der Familie angebotene Bootstour, das Essen oder auch Roller mieten vorher zu erfragen - wir waren etwas überrascht da es dann doch nicht ganz so günstig wurde wie erwartet.

Der Aufenthalt war super! So ein großer Flecken Natur in der absoluten Idylle und Ruhe.
Man kommt - wenn man keinen persönlichen Driver engagieren möchte - mit dem öffentlichen Bus zu der Anlegestelle der Boote und fährt mit dem Boot circa 15 Minuten auf die andere Seite (einfach dem Bootfahrer Hoanhs Namen sagen). Von dort läuft man circa 1 Kilometer, es ist das dritte oder vierte Homestay nach einer kleinen Kurve.
Es wurden viele Freizeitaktivitäten angeboten, wir waren zum Beispiel einen 3/4 Tag Kayak fahren, wobei uns Hoanhs Vater (gegen Bezahlung natürlich) die ganze Zeit begleitet hat, wir konnten auf dem See mit ihm frühstücken und sind dann zu einer schönen Höhle gepaddelt/gefahren worden und anschließend zum Mittagessen Nahe eines Wasserfalls bei einer reizenden alten Dame, die das Essen günstig und frisch zubereitet - und in Fülle :D
Abends haben wir (gegen Aufpreis) mit Hoanhs Vater/Mutter und weiteren Reisenden auf der Terrasse gegessen und getrunken, was unfassbar lecker und lustig war. Eine Karaoke-Maschine gab es auch für diejenigen, denen der Reisschnaps gut geschmeckt hat :P
Man konnte sich immer Wasser, Tee und Kaffee holen, nebenan gab es auch einen kleinen Laden, in welchem man sich mit Essen und Trinken versorgen konnte. Auch wenn Hoanh selbst nicht da war und seine Eltern kein Englisch gesprochen haben, war er immer hilfsbereit und erreichbar - mit den Eltern hat man sich (mit Hoanh am Handy) und Händen und Füßen trotzdem gut verständigen können und sie sind unfassbar gastfreundlich und lustig.
Wir haben den Aufenthalt sehr genossen und wären gerne länger geblieben, da alles so schön naturnah und schlicht war :)

Super beautiful spot and lovely family.
We felt very looked after.
Highly recommend the boat tour.
Thank you Hoanh and family for your hospitality
killer place!! so kind. great food. lots of good advice and adventures
A fantastic place to stay!
Everything is perfect

Lan was very helpful in securing us transport back to Hanoi. Her Homestay was perfect for transitioning into and out of Cao Bang. The room was clean and had comfy beds, which was not always the case in Vietnam. She has lots of tours available at her homestay as well as scooter rentals.

Check in hat gut geklappt und alles war sauber
Keine große Auswahl zum Frühstück aber war gut
It was ok for 2 nights. The heater wasn’t working and it was very cold (the windows were opened when we arrived).
Wir hatten einen schönen Aufenthalt bei Lan. Leider sind die Wände nicht sehr schalldicht.

Ok place...
very cheap and worth the price alot..
sadly our room is on 3rd floor with no elevator, but they helped us carry one of our luggage..
We are driving a car, and it is not hard to find a park in front, unlike other places.
The place is suprisingly quite not that noisy, perfect for having a rest after long drive from hanoi.

Beautiful place for a short or long-term stay! Lan is really friendly and she got us a 2-day tour riding a bike with a private guide (Tien) who was just amazing, he made for us the best tour we had in Vietnam so far. They have transpo options for different places, their breakfast is good, and the location is near from everything in Cao Bang.
100% Recommended.
좋은숙소,좋은호스트.방이 넓고,인테리어가 깔끔.에어컨,커피포트,커피.물 무료.다만 욕실이 방음이 안됨.

Très beau séjour chez Lan. Lan était très gentille, positive et à répondu à toutes nos questions. Le lieu est idéalement situé et vous aurez aussi la possibilité de : louer un scooter sur place, booker des tickets pour voyager... Nous vous recommandons fortement.
Phòng ở cực sạch sẽ và rộng rãi, di chuyển thuận tiện, chị Lan cực kỳ dễ thương 👌🏻

Spacious place.
Lan has been great help for us during our stay , communicating on behalf to our driver, giving us food recommendations and helping us to get to the bus-station in time and with ease.
Besides, she was patiently helping us with our itinerary and giving us good recommendations for meals and foresee our needs such as understanding menus in Vietnamese etc.
Her place is also near many nice cafe and pastry places which you could try out.
Despite having no lift, her staff helped to carry our luggage up the narrow stairs which we are grateful for.
Highly recommend her place.
Beautiful stay! You can book breakfast. With motobikes very easy.
Great
Clean. Nice location. I would stay again.

This place is awesome! Host was great, food was great, view was great, room was great. We noticed we had a flat tyre on our bike when we were leaving and they organised it to be fixed for us! Stay here it is awesome!
Super quiet and surrounded by incredible nature. Totally recommend if you want to get away from all the noise. Staff was super nice and the food 5/5

Prachtige plek! Lieve mensen en heerlijk eten. We sliepen er 3 nachtjes, wat misschien wel ietsje te lang was voor ons aangezien er niet heel veel faciliteiten zijn zoals staat aangegeven, maar we kwamen goed tot rust!
De communicatie was ook soms wat lastig maar het is goed gekomen!
Er komen veel Franse tour-groepen in de avond slapen haha, elke avond zat het (toen wij er waren) helemaal vol! Blijkbaar is er een Franse documentaire gemaakt over dit dorpje ☺️
Rất đáng để trải nghiệm, dịch vụ tốt

De loin un des meilleurs Homestay de notre voyage..
Calme et sérénité au rendez-vous.. La rencontre des Lolo noir est une belle expérience à faire avec respect de cette communauté hors du commun.
Merci infiniment à Thuyết et son bébé et Đèn qui nous ont accueilli avec une grande générosité.
Merci aussi à leur aide qui est charmante et qui cuisine aussi bien que Đen..😄

Chambre fidèle aux photos.
Le lit est très dur mais pour une nuit ça passe.
Les hôtes sont accueillants, le repas du soir est copieux. Il manquait juste des fruits.

Die perfekte Unterkunft, alles eine 10/10. Nette Gastgeber, super Essen und eine Tolle Umgebung.
Auch das Zimmer war perfekt und wunderschön.
Ich kann es nur empfehlen 🇩🇪🇻🇳❤️
Thuyet. Was a pleasure! We had the best time and would highly recommend
Perfekt zum entspannen

This place is truly amazing. Away from the busy street in the middle of the nature - a very calm and peaceful area. The host and his family are incredible kind and welcoming. We had dinner together with them and other guests which was amazing! Would highly recommend it :)

Would recommend this place to anyone. I tell everyone I meet during my travel in Vietnam about this place as it’s a great experience!
Only thing is that the bed is firm. Some love firm bed and it’s more traditional. But I’m a soft bed kinda guy. However they have very soft blankets and putting one of those under you did the trick for me.
The host will go out of their way to make sure you are comfortable.
An easy must see and experience.
You won’t be disappointed if you book.

Ce fut tout simplement notre meilleur séjour au Vietnam, l’environnement est incroyable, le logement très agréable et propre, la cuisine excellente et j’en passe. Nous remercions fortement Thuyet, son frère et son mari ! Nous reviendrons sans hésiter.

We were absolutely astounded by the beauty of this homestay, as well as the amazing friendly attitude of the host! The road up to the homestay is such a fun ride but sadly has been affected by the recent landslides. Our host let us know this in advance and came out to make sure we made it up alright. We had dinner and breakfast there and the portions were very decent and delicious! We couldn’t believe how spacious and well-decorated it was and loved every second of our stay. Communal bathrooms were spotless and had everything you could need. One of our best stays in Vietnam so far!
Un lloc meravellós amb una gent fantàstica. No perdeu l'oportunitat de descansar uns dies a Khuoikhon. El menjar de la Phai és deliciós, servit sobre una fulla de plataner.

Nous avons passé un excellent moment ici ! La chambre vu montagne était incroyable 😍
Le repas et le petit déjeuner étaient très bon. Le lendemain matin nous avons été nous promener dans le village des lolos (ethnies minoritaires du Vietnam). Ce fut une expérience extraordinaire.
Très bon séjour dans ce très bel endroit! Un énorme merci à Tan qui a été une très belle rencontre et un excellent hôte ! Un grand merci à lui 💙

This was an extremely special and unforgettable place to stay. The views were stunning and the surrounding community was amazing to be immersed in. The hosts at the homestay were so friendly and helpful during our stay. The food was absolutely fantastic as well. You need to stay here if you plan on visiting the area!

Unfortunately the weather was really foggy and cold on top of the hill, so we couldn't enjoy the view. The rooms were cold, since everything is kept open, but with the provided blankets we had a wonderful night in bed. Our hosts were so friendly and welcoming and made us a great vegetarian dinner. With the right weather it would be a real gem!

The location is fantastic, the view is breathtaking and the food is excellent, everything was freshly prepared and the portions were huge. The host family is very friendly and helpful, we were even allowed to wash our clothes after we extended the Ha Giang Loop unplanned. We were allowed to go to the rice field and try to harvest the rice ourselves. This was super exciting. Thank you for the hospitality, we felt very comfortable all around.
Very nice view and kind staff.
Amazing place, definitely worth it.
Endroit paisible et repas délicieux. Seule ombre au tableau, l' insonorisation.

Super chambre dans un endroit magnifique. les vues sur les rizières sont superbes. Thuyet a été une hôte très sympathique et la nourriture est excellente! C'est vrai que le haut des chambres est ouvert mais c'était très tranquille quand nous y étions! Nous avons passé un super séjour et regretté de ne pas être restés plus longtemps.

J’ai adoré cet endroit , c’était vraiment le final de notre roadtrip à scooter dans le nord et j’ai eu un coup de coeur pour ce bel endroit, la vue est magnifique c’est très paisible, tout est bien pensé . La nourriture super bonne et le pdj avec des crêpes au top , je recommande à milles pourcent ça vaut la peine de faire la route

Su war sehr freundlich, einfach & schnell zu erreichen.
Er konnte uns helfen bei der Wahl der Restaurants, bei der Vermietung von Rollern und hat sich nach einer Busfahrt am Abreisetag erkundigt. Er hat uns wirklich sehr geholfen.
Cao Bang ist ein Besuch wert, besonders der Wasserfall Ban Gioc!
Danke für deine Hilfe, Su & weiterhin alles gute!

Great place to stay for the price. The host was really responsive and helpful. Good air conditioner in each room, and great to have a bathroom for each room.
The beds are very firm, which maybe a problem for some people. Stair access only to the bedrooms.
The host sleeps upstairs which was a surprise for us as we thought we had booked the whole house.
A chủ thân thiện, chỗ ở sạch sẽ gần trung tâm
Beautiful campsite with a great view of God’s Eye Mountain. Everything was setup for us and the food was very good
We had a wonderful time here, appreciated by the warm welcome from Thuan and Huy.  Future seasons will surely bring us back here <3
Great view of the Gods Eye Mountain from the campsite. The staff were very friendly and the BBQ dinner was amazing!

The space was nice, comfortable bed and nice bath. It would be good to have own transport if you stay here as there is not much available nearby and minimal food available on site. There is a karaoke bar near enough to be noisy at night until quite late so it was not as peaceful as we had hoped.
A tranquil spot just out of the city. The rooms are lovely and the staff very helpful.

We really enjoyed our stay at Tô’s Homestay. She went above and beyond to make us comfortable. The room had the comfiest bed and linens that I’ve experienced since arriving in Vietnam. Tô had great restaurant recommendations and even helped us rent a motorbike.

Amazing stay at Sen’s Homestay. Host was very welcoming and also gave amazing local recommendations. Extremely responsive as well. Room was very cozy and comfortable to be in. Will definitely choose this homestay in the future when I come back to cao bang!

Staying in this Homestay for 8 nights was a wonderful experience. The family were very welcoming and had lots of recommendations for us during our stay. We were able to rent motorbikes, use the shared kitchen, and they offered same day laundry service to us. Super friendly, very clean (honestly, for us it has been the cleanest in all of our Vietnam accommodations), and in a great location. The projector screen in the room is such a wonderful touch!

Cool place walking distance to the centre. Helped book transport and tours. Only odd thing, they kind of lock the front door at 11pm at night for "safety reasons". something I've never had before. especially considering its suh a safe town. I think everywhere does this though.

Tô a fait de notre séjour à Cao bang une merveille. Elle nous a recommandé des restaurants et événements, nous a aider à louer un scooter sur place et nous a proposés sont aide dans de nombreuses situations où nous en avions besoin comme lorsque ma copine est tombé malade a l’œil.
La chambre est conforme à la description, en réalité, rapport-qualité prix, il s’agit sans doute du meilleur logement que j’ai pu avoir depuis mes 2mois au Vietnam, sans exagération! La chambre est jolie, cozy, le rétroprojecteur donne vraiment un sentiment de confort supplémentaire, l’impression d’être dans un cocon!
La cuisine commune est un plus à ne pas négliger.
Merci pour tout Tô!

I would rate this room five stars because the bed was the most comfortable one I've been in in vietnam, unfortunately it is on an extremely busy road that has heavy traffic from about 5:30 a.m. until 10:00 p.m. I was specifically told , that the room would be very quiet before booking. after the first noisy night , they did offer to change my room.  the hotel is very small and I could not imagine there being a quieter place to stay so I did not change rooms.   if you want to sleep on an extremely comfortable bed and don't mind the sound of semi trucks honking their horns, this place is for you
Great place to stay when visiting Cao Bang. Rooms are great and spacious - very friendly host and there local shops nearby.

Such a lovely little homestay! The family were so friendly and really helpful, they helped us book a bus, recommended a really nice cafe and gave us anything we asked for! The projector in the room was really cool, they even provided Netflix and gave us some crisps 💗 we would recommend to anyone coming to the area in the night before going to the waterfalls to stay here, it was so cosy and homely and a great place to rest after a long journey 🥰

Schöne Unterkunft,  der projektor ist eine super Idee. Flexibler Check-In. Die Gastgeberin ist eine super nette Seele! Hat schnell auf nachichten geantwortet und mir bei allem möglichen geholfen. Sie hat meinen Aufenthalt sehr angenehm gemacht. Vielen Dank^^
I've 3 days staycation here, the host very friendly, kindly and support quickly. Room very nice, fresh and comfortable.
Nice room, spacious and clean. The host is responsive, friendly and speaks good English. Offers bike rental if you need that.
Homestay is so nice and peaceful.

Nous avons passé une belle soirée et une bonne nuit. Le logement de la famille est très joli et bien entretenu. Situé à moins d'une minute à pieds du village. Les repas sont super bons et copieux, il y a une option végétarienne.

Très belle chambre dans un cadre reposant😌
La vue est très jolie (même si ce n’est pas la bonne saison, pas de rizières et ciel gris)
Douches et toilettes communes mais bien entretenues (et il y a de l’eau chaude 🚿)
Seul petit bémol : le manque d’isolation sonore…
Le petit-déjeuner est très bon mais attention, il n’est pas compris dans le prix de la chambre 😉

Thuyêt et sa famille ont été des hôtes très gentils, nous avons partagée repas avec eux, la chambre avait une vie magnifique et le homestay était isolé dans la montagne a proximité du village de Khuoi Khon

Nous avons passé un super séjour dans ce homestay, la chambre dispose d’une vue imprenable sur les rizières alentours. Le bâtiment est spacieux, très beau, et très ouvert sur le bel environnement alentour. Le dîner était délicieux, et Tan très généreux. Il nous a fait visiter le village des black lolo à proximité après la projection du film !
Nous espérons y retourner un de ces jours, et plus longtemps ! Encore merci pour tout !
Very nice place, friendly staff, clean, great food, stunning views. Little tricky to get to but definitely worth it. Would definitely recommend and would stay again. Thank you!!

It was an amazing stay! The place offers a stunning view from the room, the staff is incredibly friendly, and the food is delicious and diverse. I highly recommend this place to anyone looking for a relaxing atmosphere and a great view.
it was great place.  definitely recommend to order also dinner woth breakfast. food is delicious.

It’s quite the climb from the main road but worth it. Very peaceful with awesome views if you get a room with one. Sleeping areas are basic and you will hear others but that’s a homestay if you didn’t already know. Property is beautiful and people were very friendly. Food was excellent as well. Definitely will come back if the opportunity presents itself.

Wir haben die Gastfreundschaft und die Aussicht sehr genossen. Das Abendessen war super gut, das Frühstück ok. Die Aussicht und die Fenster sind einfach grandios und die Gastgeberin sehr nett. Ja, die Straße ist die letzten 400m etwas schwierig, aber machbar (auch mit Moped) - dafür wird man dann eben mit der Aussicht belohnt. Wie so häufig finde ich, dass es nicht mehr wirklich ein Homestay ist, sondern eine Art Hostel/Hotel, aber dennoch eine Reise wert wer in der Nähe ist :)
A beautiful place, delicious food, very nice people. We enjoyed our stay very much.

Un accueil extraordinaire
Une famille très chaleureuse
Un emplacement fantastique
Ideal for a large company. 5 beds with curtains, normal shower, balcony. The mattresses are hard, like everywhere in Vietnam. Everything is clean and tidy. Definitely worth the money.
Le logement était incroyable et spacieux parfait pour quelque soirée !

Great place to stay in Cao Bang. Phi and his family were very welcoming. The neighborhood was peaceful and safe and saw many families interacting outside late into the night. Restaurants are 1 block over into the main street which is walkable if you do not have transportation.
Wir hatten einen schönen Aufenthalt. Die Kommunikation war sehr gut und das Zimmer wirklich schön. Wir konnten unser Gepäck nach dem Check Out noch stehen lassen, was sehr praktisch war, danke :)

Nous étions super bien chez Phi et sa famille. Ils nous ont fait sentir à l'aise, puis Phi nous a aussi donné de bons conseils pour explorer Cao Bang. C'était aussi pratique d'être situé tout près d'une compagnie qui loue des motos et donne des conseils pour organiser un roadtrip.

Nous avons passé un bon séjour. La chambre est jolie, lumineuse et confortable, la douche aussi. Les environs sont très sympas pour une balade au coucher du soleil. Prévoyez des bouchons d'oreille car les joueurs de pickleball commencent très tôt. Le loueur de scooter d'en face est top.
Nice room. Cosy homestay. Love it.
big clean place good shower

Beautiful room with ceiling to wall windows. Modern but private. Host helped us with rides to and from Hanoi as well as arranged a private car that took us to Ban Gioc, a cave, Paper Village, and Angel Eye Mountain. A wonderful stay.
I had a very comfortable stay at Phi's place, even a home feeling :-) The family is helpful and welcoming, still discret so you feel at ease to do your life freely :)) Thank you Mơ Homestay !

Nice and pleasant stay. The location is perfect although, if address is from airbnb linked to google map, the location can misrepresent the actual location of Khuoi ky Stone village. The locals can provide the location of the homestay, especially if pictures are shown. Helpful locals.

I think you really need a mosquito net to be installed over the bed. It is listed as having one but there is not and there were lots of large mosquitoes in our room - this meant we didn’t sleep well which is a shame as the bed was very comfy.

Great place to stay near the waterfalls. The hosts do not speak English but we were able to easily communicate via google translate. The hosts also accommodated for my girlfriend’s allergies when cooking the food.

die Familie war sehr gastfreundlich und zuvorkommend. Es war alles super sauber und sehr schön. Die Kommunikation mit der Familie vor Ort funktioniert problemlos über eine Übersetzer-App. Bei den AirBnB Nachrichten hatte ich leichte Probleme da manche Nachrichten falsch bzw verwirrend übersetzt wurden, und daher die Kommunikation erschwert war
Die Lage ist traumhaft schön und fußläufig zu den Höhlen in der Nähe gelegen. Es ist sehr abgelegen und ich würde nächstes Mal ein Fahrzeug/Motorrad in Cap Bang mieten, da der Bus sehr sehr lange braucht und es sonst schlecht zu erreichen ist

Superbe expérience, nous avons eu des difficultés pour trouver mais notre hôte a tous mis en œuvre et nous a récupéré en scooter. Location de moto sur place petit déjeuner. Dîner du soir. Merci à vous l’endroit est superbe 😻

We had a good time at Tay Homestay.
Beautiful location and cozy rooms.
Host was very responsive and helpful.
There was a small miscommunication regarding included breakfast.
But, luckily, it got resolved positively in the end with suggestion for the future guests - to make a list of breakfast options which are for free and which has to be paid for.

Very beautiful and peaceful surroundings.
Walking distance to the Tiger cave, which is an amazing site to visit.
The ladies at the reception are great and they’re the ones handling the check in, cooking and barista. They make amazing food with fresh ingredients from their gardens at a generous portion. Communication with them is through translation app but do look for them if you need any help.
Room is beautiful and comes with water heater.
Overall an amazing stay. Will recommend to others!

Best place we stayed so far in Vietnam. Big confy bed. Stable hot shower. Excelent localy made food. Very authentic suroundings. Working very warm AC. Good cheap massage. Don't know what else to say, we got everything we needed and more !

Huy's place is a great spot to spend your time near the Ban Gioc Waterfalls. Huy was quick to respond and proactive. The place is just like the images - clean, comfortable and made me feel right at home.
una stanza bella come un quadro.  consiglio a chiunque di dormire qui

Lovely Stay in a Beautiful Village
We had such a great experience staying here! The room was clean, cozy, private, and just beautiful — a perfect place to relax. The staff were amazing, especially the two sisters who worked there. They were so lovely and took great care of us during our stay.
The village itself is charming with gorgeous surroundings, and we enjoyed exploring the area. Communication was mostly through Google Translate, but that wasn’t a problem for us.
The only thing that could be improved is the check-in instructions. Once we figured it out, everything else was perfect!
We loved our stay and would definitely recommend it.
Excellent stay. Clean, quiet, and comfortable
The lacation is super nice! The people are also friendly.
Really comfy beds in spacious, cosy rooms with a high quality shower. Beautiful surroundings and close to the waterfall and caves.
Very cute homestay with the best hosts. The views and environment was amazing! Would highly recommend to stay here! 🤩

This is one of those spots where the photos really don't do it justice. Absolutely beautiful area; picturesque. Ideal place for a relaxing get-away. I recommended a bot ride through the lake system (Le Tuyen can arrange). Le was extremely responsive, helpful, and friendly. Would definitely book again if in the area.
Very beautiful stay and kind, gracious, and helpful hosts.  Perfect light meals to start and end peaceful travel days and recharge.
Really lovely place. Amazing location with lovely hosts. The food was excellent, the room was clean and bright.

The best possible hosts, friendly, attentive, moved us to a nicer room they had available, recommended local places to eat and even offered to help organise our bus to Hanoi. Would definitely stay again
Un super logement, pas cher, et très accueillant !
Nice place, excellent location 100% recommend.

Schönes Zimmer und vor allem alles sauber. Wir haben hier nur eine Nacht verbracht, da wir am nächsten Tag weiter gefahren sind. Tolle Stadt mit vielen Essens und Einkaufsmöglichkeiten. Kommunikation war leider nur per Übersetzerapp möglich, aber hat super funktioniert. Wir haben den Wäscheservice in Anspruch genommen und für uns würde für den nächsten Tag zur Weiterreise ein Taxi organisiert. Hat alles super geklappt. Wir würden hier wieder übernachten.
This is a Hotel on Airbnb platform. Quiet location within walking distance to markets and center. Would stay again anytime.

Un séjour à Cao bang splendide
une hote accueillante et flexible puisqu'elle nous a accueillit à 4h30 en nous donnant une chambre provisoire pour nous doucher et récupérer du trajet. Elle propose une location de scooter et un trajet en jeep ( nous vous conseillons de faire votre visite en scooter pour découvrir les paysages splendides de Cao Bang)
merci encore de votre accueil !
We really loved staying here! Comfy beds, clean room, great atmosphere. Felt like home. Thank you!

Die Unterkunft entsprach voll und ganz unseren Erwartungen. Darüberhinaus konnten wir uns ohne Probleme einen Roller über die Unterkunft leihen und für zwei Tage unser Gepäck bei Hien lagern. Für diesen hervorragenden Service reichen 5 Sterne nicht aus. :)
The host was nice and warm, the tour guide we were provided tan was really cool. The bathroom cleanliness could be better. Overall i recommend this place very nice place to stay.

Die Unterkunft war schön und es war auch super flexibel. Wir haben eine tour durch Cao bang gemacht und konnten unser Gepäck vorab abgeben, Roller mieten und haben dann 3 Tage später dort übernachtet. Alle waren super lieb und der Aufenthalt hat uns sehr gefallen! :)

El lugar es ordenado y tiene una buena ubicación.
Te ayudan con informacion eficiente y clara. Los toures son buenos. Buen personal y muy personalizado... el trato humano es excelente. Muy buenos anfitriones...
Recodaremos la hospitalidad y el buen trato.
Muchas gracias

Our host was very helpful with information and all easy booking service. We were given a big room, which was cold because AC didn’t work. But she gave us a small extra heater and it was perfect for winter time.

Staying at Lans Homestay was super, great location, close to everything you need, and super clean room with perfectly working facilities. Hien made us feel like home, and was very helpful from the beginning, even helping us with booking transport etc. In the end.  I highly recommend the visit☺️

Tout était parfait. À notre arrivée très tôt du au bus de nuit couchette nous avons pu avoir la chambre prête à l’avance. Puis nous avons pu rester, aller et venir dans le homestay à notre guise qui d’ailleurs est très bien placé pour visiter la région.
Possibilité de louer scooter là bas si besoin.
Je recommande.
Die Gastgeber waren super hilfsbereit und die Unterkunft sehr angenehm

Merci beaucoup, service chaleureux,
Petit bémol pour le jour qui passe dans la chambre.. pas de rideaux adéquats !
Merci pour ce moment
ok für eine Nacht, hatte ein Zimmer ohne Fenster, die Bezahlung über Palpal war anscheinend auch noch nicht notiert....sollte nochmal zahlen....wir konnten das klären, aber ein bisschen anstrengend

Grundsätzlich vollkommen ausreichend für einen Zwischenstopp, Preis Leistung ist gut. Lediglich das Frühstück war etwas kläglich. Die Kommunikation war auch herausfordernd, es gibt allerdings punktuelle eine Englischsprachige Ansprechpartnerin.

nous avons passés un excellent séjour, si vous avez la moindre question, vous aurez la réponse en quelques minutes, de plus vous pouvez réserver des visites dans la région directement avec eux, que ce soit en jeep, moto/scooter. je recommande fortement
Homestay très joli et chambre mignonne, central et instructions claires :)

Lan war jederzeit erreichbar, auch als wir mit dem Nachtbus um 4Uhr angekommen sind. Wir wussten leider nicht das man extra für das frühe Einchecken zahlen muss. Es war für uns auf jeden Fall okay, wir hätten es nur gerne früher gewusst. Es gibt eine Küche die man mitbenutzen kann und immer frisches Trinkwasser, was super war. Wir würden die Unterkunft von Lan auf jeden Fall weiterempfehlen.
Wir haben eine Trekking Tour gebucht, durch die haben wir eine andere Seite von Vietnam kennengelernt, dörflich und sehr freundlich. Sie war leider etwas lang. Aber man kann bestimmt auch eine kürzere nehmen :)

Chambre très spacieuse et très bonne accueille ! Je vous le recommande !
Proche du centre à 5 min à pied et assez l'écart pour bien dormir. Parfait
We hebben een fijn verblijf gehad. Lan reageerde super snel op onze vragen en hielp ons met het regelen van tours en bus tickets.
המארחת מאוד מזמינה וידידותית.  עזרה לי עם הזמנה של נהג למקום שרציתי להגיע אליו בסביבה. היו לה טיפים שימושיים ועצות שעזרו לי
Nice place to stay. Helpful people.
We had a great time. Thank you!
It was a wonderful stay at Hien's place. The staff is exceptionally friendly and professional, offering fantastic services that truly help guests make the most of the surrounding area.

I love this place, the street is pretty. I love my balcony. Could leave the window open and have some real fresh air and it was wonderful to listen the kids playing in the street and the neighbours laughing. Little traffic. The staffs are so beautiful and friendly.
It was a great stay. The location was great too and the hosts were incredibly kind and accommodating.
Anh chủ nhà rất nice, reply rất nhanh, nhà dễ tìm, gần trung tâm, giá rẻ

Amazing place, spacious rooms, everything you need. The Host himself was so so very helpful with all my complicated plans. He gave me tips how to plan my travels, was flexible and had many options for everything. I also could book a scooter via him to go to Vinh Quy Grass Hills and to the stunning God's Eye Mountain Valley. He stored my luggage for free for three days while I was traveling around. Absolutely to recommend!
The room had more space than expected. Grateful for the stay and your much appreciated.

Localisation pratique, l'entrée se fait facilement.
Chambre spacieuse et confortable.
Su est très réactif pour répondre à nos demandes.
A recommander !

réactif, répond à nos questions et très sympathique
je recommande!

very responsive and helpfull host! nice cute room, nice kitchen, safe building !
excellent deal ! 👍
Alles super. Schöne Unterkunft und sehr gute Kommunikation.
tout était parfait!
Gracias a su comunicación. La habitación está muy limpio y grande. Facil de encontrar
A good place with a great host! The host responded to all my messages lightning fast, and tried to help me out in every way possible! 100 % recommended 🙏🏻

Căn hộ với vị trí đắc địa, rất hợp với nhóm gia đình bạn bè nghỉ dưỡng, không gian rộng rãi thoáng mát, có nhiều không gian sống ảo, rất thích ở đây và sẽ quay lại trong thời gian tiếp theo, cô chủ rất thân thiện nhiệt tình và chu đáo, cảm ơn chị Trang và anh Việt.

Trang’s place was a great stay. We arrived in Cao Bang from Ha Noi at 5am and Trang was able to accommodate which was a huge plus. The apartment is centrally situated, clean, and had a beautiful balcony view. Trang was also very helpful in helping us book a limousine to go back to Ha Noi. Great host, highly recommend this stay!

We hadden een fantastische tijd (7 dagen) in het appartement! Onze zoon van 2 jaar vond de speeltuin op het dak geweldig. Trang heeft ons enorm geholpen met goede tips om de omgeving van Cao Bang te ontdekken en heeft een privé chauffeur voor ons geregeld. Het appartement heeft alles wat je nodig hebt om je thuis te voelen. Tegenover het appartement is een lokale markt waar je groenten en fruit kunt kopen en om de hoek zit een goede supermarkt voor de andere dingen. Een wandeling langs de rivier was erg leuk en natuurlijk de hoogtepunten Angel's Eye mountain, Ho Thang Hen lake en de Ban Gioc watervallen. Bedankt Trang!

het appartement is van alle gemakken voorzien, super schoon en comfortabel. Trang helpt je met alles en reageert snel. vanuit het appartement kan je leuke dingen doen in de omgeving. wij hebben een scooter gehuurd bij eco homestay (super verhuur!) en zij hebben ons geholpen waar we heen konden.
Great place. Very cozy and had everything we needed!
Très belle Homestay. Nous avons été tres bien accueilli, avons bien mangé également. Je recommande fortement, l’endroit est vraiment chouette en plein milieu de la nature

Tout est parfait et nous avons eu un dîner très très bon
Merci

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay with the family. We were treated like family and loved having meals with the mom and kids. She made sure we were comfortable and she was really nice to talk to. She told us about her culture which we were very interested in. Highly recommend staying here for a peaceful and cultural experience.

Don't follow GPS. follow the host directions or you will go down a very steep dirt trail.
I arrived with my friend and we booked 2 different rooms. he lead us to one room and I had to explain we paid for 2 separate rooms. he then threw me in a less appealing room near the kitchen with no view. kind of a bummer but I didn't care much because all I did in there was sleep. The host made an excellent dinner with beers and happy water. the following morning we woke up to beautiful views and were invited to swim in the stream. it was very refreshing. I would stay here again.
We had a great time. Thanh and Thom were amazing hosts. Very kind and helpful. The dinner was delicious. Looking forward to come back another time :)

Tolles Homestay in einem ursprünglichen Dorf. Einzigartige Lage ! Es war eine wunderschöne Zeit bei euch! Liebenswerte Menschen, super Stimmung, exzellentes Essen. Die kleinen Bungalows und die Toiletten / Dusche sehr sauber.
Absolute Empfehlung!

Nous avons passé un moment incroyable dans ce homestay. Un accueil chaleureux au cœur d’une famille très souriante. Un peu difficile d’accès si vous êtes véhiculés mais l’hôte est très réactif et est venu nous aider de suite.
Nous avons eu un dîner incroyable c’était délicieux ainsi qu’un petit déjeuner copieux.
Merci pour tout
Camille et John
Great Stay, in a beautiful location.

Room was exactly as photo. Mix up at check in as given a double room rather than twin, but this was immediately corrected. Room was comfortable and as described.
Very central location.
Génial en tous points !

Pour le prix payé, le logement était tout à fait correct. Attention cependant à la saleté des draps et des sanitaires/salle de bain. L’hôte n’était pas fiable et la communication difficile, malheureusement. Le prix des services proposés tels que le petit déjeuner ou la location de scooters était également excessif. Recommandé si vous cherchez un logement peu cher et bien situé pour un court séjour.

Nous avons été enchanté par les deux nuits chez Nong. L’environnement est paisible, les chambres sont confortables et Nong est un hôte particulièrement gentil et attentif au bien-être des voyageurs. Il nous a facilité notre séjour et s’est toujours montré prêt à nous apporter de l’aide. Nous avons eu le plaisir de profiter du petit déjeuner et du dîner qui étaient très bons.  C’est un super Homestay !

Nong was a very friendly host, welcoming and fast to reply on chat. His pretty and quiet house is up a hill, with a beautiful terrace from which you can enjoy the view of the city and the sunset. City centre within walking distance, about 20min. I recommend
Es ist ein schöner Ort! Die Gastgeber war sehr freundlich und haben mir ihre Hilfe angeboten! Zu empfehlen :)

Nous avons passés 3 nuits dans cette homestay et tout était comme sur la description. Nous avons également utilisé leurs services pour la location de scooters pour 2 jours le temps de faire un tour jusqu'au Nord Est du Vietnam. Nong nous a permis de laisser nos bagages pendant notre absence. Le gestionnaire a été très attentionné, nous apportant son aide à chaque étape et restant toujours disponible. Les chambres et les sanitaires étaient excellents.
Nous avons également partager un dîner pour notre dernière soirée.
Je recommande vivement cette homestay

Séjour authentique et parfait chez Nong !
Je recommande à chaque voyageur de passage à Cao Bang de s’arrêter dans sa maison traditionnelle 👌
La description était conforme aux attentes, très beau salon et belle vue sur Cao bang depuis la terrasse
Nong est un hôte très accueillant qui s’est démené pour répondre à toutes nos demandes.
Nous avons partagé avec lui un excellent petit déjeuner et repas préparé par ses soins 🤤
Il loue aussi des scooters (très pratique pour aller visiter les alentours)
On recommande à 100%, merci pour tout 👍🏻

Great homestay and ever greater host in Nong. He not very good with english but all you need is a translate app and he will arrange whatever you want. Place is clean and has everything that you’ll need. Allowed me to checkin and checkout flexibly.
Great stay overall

Très bon Airbnb et hôte très accueillant. Location de moto possible. Idéal pour se balader dans la région et profiter des supers paysages. Grâce à un précédent commentaire nous avons facilement trouvé le homestay : Homestay Kha Ban sur maps. Au panneau, prendre à droite la pente puis tourner dans la première petite rue à gauche.
PS : prévoir vos cachets les allergiques aux acariens.

Séjour sympa dans une région magnifique à voir absolument !
Nong et sa femme sont très gentils, à l'écoute, reactifs et serviables.
Le logement est bien situé, dans un environnement très calme, parfait pour se détendre. La maison a une belle vue sur toute la ville. La chambre est confortable, basique, mais avec la clim en cas de besoin et une moustiquaire sur la fenêtre.
Le seul point un peu négatif pour moi a été le manage limite dans la salle de bain et la poussière très présente, notamment sur le ventilateur du plafond. Par contre, la literie et les serviettes étaient nickel et propres.
Un excellent séjour en résumé!

Nong var meget sød og imødekommende, men vi havde svært ved at forstå hinanden, trods mobil apps til oversættelse. Han var utroligt sød til at hjælpe os, og arrangerede bil og chauffør til Ban Gioc Falls og tog os selv på tur til en lille landsby, hvor vi kunne se Tay Brocade Vævning. Det var vi meget glade for!
Værelser og badeværelser var fine, men kunne godt trænge til mere rengøring og sengen var meget fast, og nok for hård for de fleste turister.
Smuk udsigt over byen og huset lå trukket tilbage fra den travle gade. Det var dejligt.
Utroligt billigt ophold, som sagtens kunne have kostet mere, hvis rengøringen også var helt gennemført.

Nous avons premièrement eut de la difficulté à trouver le homestay de Nong, car l’adresse ne nous envoyait pas au bon endroit. Mais une fois que vous connaissez le nom, impossible de se tromper : Kha Bàn Homestay (reconnu par le GPS)
Nong a été très réactif par message, il est venu nous chercher à l’endroit où nous étions pour nous conduire chez lui.
Le logement est le plus propre que nous ayons eut depuis notre arrivée au Vietnam, il est chaleureux, on s’y sent très bien. Tout est à disposition : chambre avec salle de bain privée, cuisine, salle à manger typique. Le lieu est beau et reposant.
Nous avons pu laver notre linge pour un prix très raisonnable (moins cher que les laundry) et y louer des scooters. Il nous a même gardé nos gros sacs 24h (sans compensation) pour que nous puissions aller à Ban Gioc.
Pour couronner le tout, Nong et son ami sont très gentils. Bref, 10/10, PARFAIT !
Merci infiniment

Spacious room, comfortable bed, hot shower and quiet at night.
Reception helped with booking a one day motorbike tour which was great value.
We only struggled to find a restaurant in the evening but that was down to our own criteria.
Super équipe, très bon emplacement, possibilité de louer des scooters et la literie était excellente. On y retourne dans deux jours 😉

Best place to stop at when you're visiting Cao Bang. Friendly, English-speaking, always available staff at the café downstairs. The café itself has a really tasty selection of coffee, sweets fresh juices and  lunches. We enjoyed the open rooftop with a spectacular view on the river, town and some mountains. The room is spacious and clean, with a comfy bed and minibar. The whole space is esthetically pleasing.

There was a misunderstanding when we first got there so our room hadn’t been cleaned yet. But our host fixed the problem quickly and went above and beyond to make it right. The location is nice and quiet. Thank you!
Lovely place, I definetly recommend this place for anyone looking for a nice stay, staff so welcoming and kind!

Lugar increíble con vista de la montaña. La habitación con panorama.
El anfitrión es muy amable, cocina super buena. Lo recomendó 100%

This was hands down the best AirBnb we have ever stayed in! It was remote and took awhile to get there but the host helped with that and went over and above in so many ways! The food was amazing, nothing was too much trouble.

Die Unterkunft ist eine kleine Oase. Die Zimmer sind wir auf den Bildern. Das Essen war super lecker! Nur zu empfehlen. Aktuell ist der Weg etwas schwierig durch Regen, man kann aber auch nach Hilfe fragen.
Am liebsten hätten wir gerne noch 1-2 Übernachtungen dran gehängt.
Kann es also jedem nur empfehlen!
La stanza che avevamo era magica con una vista spettacolare sulle risaie, davvero un oasi di pace ! Abbiamo cenato con un pasto preparato in casa che era davvero ottimo! Lo consiglio vivamente !!!

El trato es genial. Las vistas espectaculares. La cena y el desayuno muy buenos y servidos al instante! aunque un poco mas caro para lo que estas acostumbrado en el país.
Hablan ingles asi que la comunicación es fluida .

Khuoi Khon was not only a place I was passing by during my journey, it was truly a Homestay and a wonderful one where I felt at home more than anywhere I have been in Vietnam.
The room was as described if not more beautiful when you see it with your own eyes ! Bed was comfy, bathroom were spotless and filled with all necessities.
Tan was the one to welcome me during Thuyet and Nghia absence. He made this stay exceptional, took me to the market and with other people we also made a trek and actually survived !
Food was delicious, Pheng and Mon family meals were so great that I’m already missing it …
On the last day I finally met Thuyet and Nghia. Such amazing people they are. They shared with us the Lô Lô culture while eating in a traditional house of the village and took us to see the rice fields ! Thuyet also helped me for the bus back to Hanoi !
Thank you so much for everything. I will definitely come back 😊

We stayed two nights at this beautiful homestay. we had no idea it is going to be that beautiful, heartwarming and astonishing. the staff was super friendly, the food was amazing and the rooms as well as the showers were nice.
Only one thing to be noted is that the food is more expensive than one is used to in the north of vietnam.
anyways I would say it is worth every penny. :)
very friendly people.  We had a very good time!

Magnifique séjour, vue plongeante imprenable et splendide sur les rizières en étages. Accueil exceptionnel et adorable. Chambre charmante et qui correspond tout à fait aux photos. Cuisine incroyable : le dîner est fantastique et tellement copieux (le meilleur repas qu'on ait mangé en 3 semaines au Vietnam!) et le déjeuner succulent également ! Un grand merci !

Both Tan and his sister are friendly. They smile and are very helpful with everything. Tan help me communicate with our driver for the next destination and sent me to the car as the road to the homestay is partly rocky.
I also use their day tour to Meo Vac and Tan accompany me and help in translation.
The staff also nice. You can try the black Lo Lo traditional dress and take photo without charge.
The dinner is delicious even too much for a solo traveler like me.
The place is a bit far from town but you can walk around and the newly construct culture house is up in the mountain.

Our stay was really welcome, nice and peaceful during our intense trip. The view is as described and seen on pictures. We had a nice dinner and breakfast that is worth asking for. Thanks Thuyet for everything, and hopefully we’ll be able to visit again one day.

Einer der nettesten Homestays, das wir auf unserer Reise erlebt haben. Wir wurden sofort herzlich begrüßt und haben uns sehr willkommen gefühlt. Das Zimmer hat einen unglaublich schönen Ausblick auf die Reisterrassen und die umliegende Natur und die Badezimmer sind blitzsauber. Abends gab es herrliches vegetarisches Abendessen - wirklich unglaublich lecker. Ebenso das Frühstück. Zudem waren die Hosts total lieb, plauderten mit uns und gaben uns Tipps. Wir würden sofort wieder kommen, wenn wir je wieder in der Umgebung sind! DANKE für die tolle Zeit!
Achja - und sowohl Netz als auch Internet gibt es vor Ort :) (Also für alle die aufgrund von Arbeit etc erreichbar sein müssen - man ist auch dort gut erreichbar).
The most beautiful Airbnb I’ve ever had. Beautiful location in the middle of nowhere and the Airbnb itself is so lovely with amazing views.

Gorgeous views.
Lovely and attentive hosts.
Very comfortable room.
Surprisingly warm room even though it's basically outside.
The breakfast you can get for a small additional fee was really good and plentiful.
Note: They recently installed WiFi! It's pretty solid, too.
The only downsides I can think of were the location is a bit treacherous to get to, especially on a motorbike. They offer a service where you can be picked up from the main road though (it's not so bad really, just the last stretch of road going up the mountain is incomplete and rough).
Also I can only imagine it could get a little noisy if there were loads of people staying because the divisions between rooms are not complete, so above the walls but below the ceiling there is open space, which makes the rooms feel a bit open.
Other than that I really enjoyed my stay and would not hesitate to go there again.
It was really nice stay, hosts are great and always smiling, views are beautifull.
Het was een zeer leuk verblijf, mooi uitzicht van uit de kamer en zeer lekker eten savonds.

Fantastische homestay met prachtig uitzicht over de rijstvelden.
Lieve behulpzame mensen die alles doen om je een aangenaam verblijf te geven. Het eten is geweldig!

Très déçu par le logement, et par l'accueil reçu.
Il n'y avait pas d'eau chaude, personne ne parlait anglais.
Il n'y avait pas de lampe de chevet, j'ai été obligé d'en réclamer une et j'ai eu beaucoup de mal à me faire comprendre.
Et surtout emplacement très bruyant : chien qui aboient toute la nuit, pont métallique en contre bas très bruyant, musique électronique à fond les ballons.
Je venais me changer les idées et trouver le silence, c'est raté.

The place was really nice and quiet. Also the room was new and clean. Unfortunately, they didn’t have a nice breakfast menu. Lots if stuff we liked on the menu was not available. Thats why we always ate in town.
Nous avons passé un super moment ! Le personnel était super ! L’endroit très agréable ! Et les activités proposées au top !

This is a beautiful hotel for a great price. Mr. Trứ is very helpful and had a lot of knowledge about the Ba Be area. The dining options in the area are a bit limited but we were able to find places to eat nonetheless. Would recommend 👍👍👍👍👍

the stay at PIA's was a delight, nice rooms with comfortable beds hosted by a lovely family who makes you feel at home. short walk to downtown restaurants and they assisted with motorbike rentals and also let us store our travel packs while out of town for some exploring of the loop.  this is a must stay if visiting coa bang!

We absolutely loved staying here. Our hosts were so kind to us and had amazing local recommendations. The place was even nicer than we expected, with a beautiful bathroom and such a comfy bed. They even refilled our water when we were out for the day!
It’s a great location next to cafes, a bakery, and near the main road but not noisy at all. We were also helped with our laundry, which was left for us in a perfect neat pile. Thank you so much, we wish we had stayed longer!
prima verblijf, is zoals beschreven. een beetje oud en een grote kakkerlak, terwijl het raam van de badkamer niet dicht kon
Si lo que buscas es descansar y dormir, el sitió está bien, pero para comer,cenar o desayunar recomendaría ir a otro sitio.  Hay varios sitios en los alrededores para comer mucho mejor

The host; Le Nam, was very welcoming and reached out to us even before we arrived at their guest house. The host helped us get to their location, easily. The place itself is very charming and is exactly as described on air bnb, just by the lake. The property is well kept and beautiful. The food the host served us was delicious and he also gave us vegetarian food as per request, he was kind enough to share their local wine with us. We enjoyed our stay here, we also went on hikes with the host’s guide and it was the best hike till date. Good kayaking fun very good recommendations given by the host.
Die Unterkunft war ordentlich und sehr schön gelegen. Die Aussicht morgens auf die Berge ist fantastisch! Wir waren sehr zufrieden und würden die Unterkunft empfehlen!
Wonderful view with great food from the cook. Tiam handled a small misunderstanding gracefully. Recommended place!
Great meet up location with many foreign friends
Definitely recommend this place!

We loved staying here - Thuan and her family are lovely and made us feel right at home. Rooms are great, the view of the lake and rice fields is beautiful and they provide delicious meals for dinner and breakfast.
Fully recommend staying here!

Sehr schöne Unterkunft mit schönem Blick Richtung See.
Die hinterlegten Google-Koordinaten stimmen leider gar nicht. Am besten die Koordinaten nochmals schicken lassen, falls eine individuelle Anreise ansteht.
Das Essen, welches von Thuan‘s zubereitet wird, ist einfach sensationell. So lecker und schmackhaft!! Überhaupt ist die Frau die gute Seele des Hauses. Immer ansprechbar, hilfsbereit und so liebevoll!
Ein eigenes Badezimmer gibt es nicht, das sollte man schon wissen. Und wenn alle Zimmer belegt sind, wird es schon eng.
Ich würde auch Abstand davon nehmen, bei so vielen Zimmern noch von Homestay zu sprechen. Aber das mag Ansichtssache sein.
Ich habe ja trotzdem die fünf Sterne gegeben, weil es eine schöne Zeit war.
Vielen Dank 🙏🏽 dafür!

Had a really good stay at the Ba Be lake in the Minh Quang homestay. The family is cheerful, nice and always looking for you to spend the best stay as possible. The food is really nice and cheap and so are the rooms. They also propose bike ride, hike, boat tour and kayak renting !
They even helped us with the bus on the way back.
I really recommend this homestay !

Nice stay, room was quite and the AC worked well. The host was able to pick us up from the harbor port in his boat since we arrived late at night which was very helpful. If you need a pick up, make sure you let him know in advance. He and his family were very sweet and accommodating.

Nice comfortable room, lovely surroundings and view, nice waether when we were there. Thuan and the other locals at the place were all friendly, flexible and helping. Thank you so much for hosting us!

Très bel endroit, hôte accueillant et très à l’écoute! Le lieu est peut être difficile à atteindre mais l’hôte est très réactif et l’environnement est si reposant que ça en vaut la peine. La nourriture était aussi excellente.
Nice homestay next to the leak. Offers basic but good dinner and breakfast as well.
Nice clean place and a great view.
Very nice homestay with a stunning view. kind family, excellent food! for only a small prize you can rent bikes and do a full day boat trip on ba be lake. Definitely recommend this place!
Logement très beau, paisible avec une très belle vue !

La vue du Homestay est extraordinaire ! Les chambres sont très corrects et il y a de l’eau chaude. La nourriture est plutôt bonne même si à mon sens un peu trop adaptée aux touristes. On a plus ou moins le choix de manger sur place puisqu’il y a presque seulement des homestay dans le coin.  Seul  bémol, on nous a servi les déjeuners tous les matins, sans nous poser de question, comme si c’était inclus. Au final, nous avons dû payer pour. Avoir su, nous aurions fait d’autres choix certains matins. L’hôte n’est pas particulièrement communicatif et clair, donc il est préférable de bien clarifier les repas et les activités sur place.

Thuan's place overlooks the valley and lake with an amazing balcony restaurant.  Our room was very adequate and I must have gotten used to hard beds as I had a great night's sleep.  We loved our day on the lake and cycling round the villages. Thuan was very helpful with this organisation.  Especially good was the breakfast and evening meals prepared by KaSa.  An unforgetable experience, especially the ride over the mountains to the village
Bel emplacement face au lac et aux rizières.  Gentillesse des hôtes et nourriture délicieuse.  On se sent bien ici. Tout est calme et paisible.
The view was amazing and we couldn’t stop eating the food!!
Sehr hilfsbereite Menschen, angenehme Atmosphäre.

Ba Be lake exceeded my expectations with its natural beauty surounded by mountians the village is so quiet and the homestay nicely located with views over looking one of the streems running to the lake and rice fields and close to a sports area for badminton and volleyball witch i joinded in with the locals and other visitors for games each afternoon. The homestay was clean and comfortable the food great and more than i could eat and the local rice wine was pretty tasty compared to the comercil stuff. Did a boat cruise down one of the rivers feeding into the lake that flows through a cave under a mountain befor entering the lake where they stopped the boat to let us swim over to a small island. With barriers set up on the roads to keep trucks off the roads in and around the area its a great place to walk cycle or hire a moto to explore the other small villages creeks caves. When i left after 3 days i was thinking this is a place id like to spend a week or two at.

Nous avons passé un excellent séjour chez Thuan qui nous a accueillis très gentiment et s’est montré attentif pendant les 2 jours complets que nous avons passé dans son homestay. Le lieu est idéal, juste au bord du lac, au dessus des rizières. La chambre à l’étage est très confortable et propre ainsi que la salle de bain partagée. Les repas son bon marché, copieux et savoureux.
Nous recommandons chaudement.

Camera nel complesso pulita, bagno in comune accettabile.
Vista sulle risaie stupenda, cibo molto buono, escursione sul lago piacevole.
Famiglia gentile anche se l’host non fa assolutamente nulla per farti sentire a casa. Nonostante la barriera linguistica ci saremmo aspettati una maggiore inclusione da questo tipo di homestay , al contrario siamo stati trattati solo da turisti.
Nel complesso una buona esperienza a prezzo contenuto in una location molto tranquilla.

A view from the balcony over rice fields with the lake in the distance with surrounding green surrounding green hills , with traffic sounds in the background. Very nice local food. Was able to rent bicycles and kayaks to explore the lake  .The  host kindly took us on a lake tour and ongoing bus travel to our next destination.
Beautiful relaxing place. If you live nature and need a break with some nice food far from any cities than this is the place.

Beautiful and peaceful place for a nice reset experience.
Traditional wooden house with a. View on the mountains, very close to Ba Be lake by foot.
The family is very friendly and helpful with anything you need to know.
I highly recommend ❤️

Très beau cadre, peu connu des touristes!
Petit soucis de communication avec manque d’information concernant les activités proposées et leur organisation (kayak, tour en bateau, …)
Très bons repas cuisinés par la famille (mais nous n’avions pas été informé des prix avant de devoir payer la totalité à la fin du séjour)
Nous recommandons le lieux si vous êtes à la recherche du calme et de la beauté de la nature !

Les repas proposés par l'hote sont excellents, bien que le logement se trouve dans leur maison nous avons bien notre intimite et notre espace personnel.
Ils proposent differents services tel que location de velo et tour en bateau ainsi que des boissons frainches.

Vi hadde en veldig god tur til Ba Be. Thuan og familien hans var gode og behjelpelige verter. Vi tok en fin båttur til hulen og en nydelig kjøretur i området på mopeder som vi leide. Maten var også god. Alt i alt anbefaler vi å dra hit.
Ich war für 4 Tage hier und alles war gut. Nette Gastfamilie schöne umgebung.

Un moment hors du temps, le lac est magnifique, environnement très calme. Quelqu’un de la maison doit venir vous chercher à l’embarcadère si vous arrivez par le bus, il faut traverser le lac. Étant seule et non motorisée la seule option pour moi a été de louer un kayak pour découvrir le lac. Il y une route qui longe une partie du lac qui passe devant le home stay mais pas de sentier le long du lac à cet endroit. Au home stay, les dîners sont vraiment délicieux ! La chambre en bois est charmante. Je regrette de n’avoir pu vraiment communiquer avec la famille sur leur culture, je ne parle pas vietnamien et ils ne parlent pas anglais. Cette pause loin de l’agitation de la ville était vraiment relaxante.
nice place

L’un des plus beaux endroits que j’ai pu voir. Le logement est situé en face d’un lac et de montagnes paradisiaques et est entourée d’une aura de sérénité de paix. Les hôtes sont attentionnés, clairs. Les repas étaient délicieux. En bref, un passage obligatoire pour une voyage au Vietnam.
Great location. Very secluded and beautiful. Charming place with a very nice staff of hosts. Great food as well. Would definitely recommend.

Extremely good value for money. Exceptional host. Delicious food. Incredible views. Really relaxing with a great vibe.
10/10 would highly recommended.
Très bel endroit pour passer quelques jours à Ba Be Lake. Une vue lointaine du lac mais magnifique entre les montagnes. Dîner et petits déjeuners excellents et copieux.

I have a pleasant stay there. Good view good room. Walking distance to the pier for boat trip. The bus from Hanoi dropped me in front of the homestay and they are helpful with the luggage.
The only unpleasant thing is the loud karaoke at night which we cannot control.
Not many guests so it is like a private homestay for me.

I absolutely loved it. The nature and surrounds are totally breathtaking, the photos don’t do it justice. I felt looked after by Thuan and his family. Beautiful food, Thuan offers tours on his boat around the national park. The meals were so yum and 50,000 vdn which is so reasonable for how fresh and yum they were. My room was comfy, with air con and a fan. They helped me book my transport to my next place. Use translate to talk with them as they mostly speak Vietnamese. They were warm and kind to me during my stay, I felt rejuvenated and relaxed. Thanks you Thuan and family!

Nous avons loué une chambre chez Thuan pendant 2 nuits et nous y étions très bien. La vue est magnifique, nous sommes en pleine nature et le logement est propre, les chambres suffisamment grandes avec moustiquaires.
Thuan propose des tours de bateau, la location d'un scooter ou de vélo. Le montant est par contre très élevé (800k le bateau pour 2h30 de balade et 150k pour le scooter pour 2 heures uniquement...)
Super fijn verblijf. Hele aardige mensen. Prachtige plek.

We really enjoyed our stay. The family was super nice and helpful. We rented a kajak to discover the lake, which I can recommend.
The view from the homestays terrace and landscape are beautiful.
The food was really good as well.

Très bon séjour. Plus confortable que prévu et surtout très propre. Toute la famille est vraiment gentille. On y mange très bien, la maman cuisine vraiment très bien. Plats végétarien avec de délicieuses frites de citrouille !!
L'hôte s'est arrangé pour venir nous chercher au Lac de Ba Be. Le village est très paisible. Kayak disponible.
Penser à être bien équipés pour l'hiver, les couvertures ne sont pas très chaudes.
Tout le monde se rend disponible pour que vous passiez un bon séjour.

de locatie is mooi: Ba Bé
Een in een vallei gelegen drop met een groot natuurlijk meer.
Het is er erg rustig, een goede plek om bij te komen
de accommodatie is groot, mooi en is makkelijk te vinden, zeker een aanrader.
als je er bent, ga ook eten bij de homestay. het eten is ontzettend lekker en gemaakt met locale producten, echt een aanrader!
lekker avondeten en ontbijt. hier wordt tijd en aandacht aan besteed om je het naar je zin te maken. zeer vriendelijke eigenaren en een toffe trekking gedaan in het nationaal park.
Delicious food, both breakfast and dinner. There was entertainment at night which was great to get involved in. Thank you.

Hi 👋🏼
So, we generally went to Ba Be for the cave visits and had an absolute blast! The location of the apartment was very close and easy for us to get picked up by the tour company.
The women at the AirBnb were extremely friendly and cute, went out of their way to accommodate for our needs including cooking for us a bunch.
Amenities wise, the pool was nice but wasn’t the cleanest. But again, I just took the net and just cleaned it quickly myself and then all was good. You can also rent bikes directly from them.
In terms of the rooms, black painted walls… why?! Room was sometimes warmer inside than outside (and that’s saying something as it was 35C outside). Rooms were very clean but had to change room due to the first night the room had a big gap in the ceiling on the 2nd floor and we got soooo many bugs that we literally couldn’t sleep all night
The second room, the 2nd floor A/C wasn’t working so the room got very warm.
Generally the experience was pleasant but nothing WOW!

The room is spacious and had clean sheets. the TV was a bonus as it kept us entertained even in the room. It has a beautiful view and is very near to the nearby attractions like the cave and lake. Bumpy roads to reach this place so have to be good in biking and be careful. Top up your fuel too as there are no gas stations nearby. food places are accessible from the local stalls/homestays around. this place can provide decent meals too if required. Host is super helpful and friendly, going all out to help us and being really responsive. he can help arrange for boat tours or kayaking plans too. It was a pleasant stay here ☺️
Very nice views and perfect and very fast communications in english! Would definitely recommend.
Super Airbnb avec un hôte super accueillant qui pourra vous cuisiner de super plat traditional je le recommande vivement

The terrasse offers a really great view on the lake! The rooms are big and bright!
It is possible to do a boat tour with the tenant, rent kayaks they also offer dîner (110) and breakfast sometimes (60), both very delicious. We are also mixed with other guests for meals so it gives a nice convivial atmosphere.
On a lesser nice note, there was no hot water, and prior to our visit we were exchanging messaged with the Airbnb host which was really helpful, but once there, the tenant and his family do not speak English at all and even with the translator it was a struggle, which lead to misunderstandings (regarding bus bookings for example) and that made us a lil uncomfortable.
Die Gastfamilie ist sehr nett, hilfsbereit und gastfreundlich. Wir hatten eine tolle Zeit, trotz des schlechten Wetters. Vielen Dank für alles!

Ich hatte eine ganz wunderbare Zeit bei Than Nam. Die Familie ist sehr freundlich und zuvorkommend. Die Unterkunft hat eine große Terrasse mit Blick auf den Ba Be See, der perfekte Ort um morgens seinen Kaffee zu genießen. Ich habe mich wie zuhause gefühlt.
Ich kann auch einen Bootsauflug mit Thanh Nam empfehlen, es gibt sehr viel in der Umgebung zu erkunden!
Peacefull and silent place to recover. very friendly family. good dinner for extra fee. sadly the boat trip prices were to expensive to join.

Thanh nam ons mee over het water en door het bos. Op het water was hij er niet altijd zo bij met zijn gedachten, maar door het bos was hij een geweldige gids! Hij weet veel over de omgeving en de natuur.
Er was niet altijd bereik, dus het is handig om een translate app te downloaden zodat je altijd goed met hem kunt communiceren!
Het terras was prachtig met een geweldig uitzicht; heerlijk:-)
Beautiful view of the Ba Be lake! Very friendly and welcoming! Delicious dinner with the family. Little bit hard to get there, but it was worth it
Great place and great family! Would stay again :) beautiful view of the lake and great food.
The view from terrace is very nice and bed is not very hard which I really liked.

Beautiful location! Very communicative and helpful. Quick responses. The highlight was the boat tour. I highly suggest the full package that includes the cave stop.  It is the only way to truly take in the park. We also kayaked and trekked to a cave close by. Both wonderful experiences. I also highly recommend breakfast and dinner. Wonderful food, wonderful hosts, wonderful park.

Really lovely place. Right on the lake and hosts (Van and Nam) super accommodating on logistics, plans, places to go (they let us use their motorbike one day), special cooking requests, and more. Van’s spring rolls were best we’ve ever had and she taught us to roll them our second night. Be aware food is not included in cost of visit, runs about 200k/meal, well worth the price.

They were all kind and generous and the dinners were fantastic. Sitting on the veranda for breakfast was beautiful.
Loved and highly recommend. Hope to return and will stay here again.

It is difficult to describe Ba Be quickly. However, my girlfriend and I found it...gorgeous. If you're contemplating whether to visit, well we can tell you it is probably the most memorable part of our trip.
Our stay with Mr. Son and his family was lovely - they go out of their way to make you feel at home, Mrs. Son is a wonderful cook and I strongly recommend her cooking - we ate dinner with them every night and it was some of the best food I ate in Vietnam. Otherwise, this is not a state of the art 5star hotel - it is a comfortable home. The aircon is good, wifi is good, there's hot water.
You can also ask Mr. Son to take you exploring the lake and visit several sites, he more or less goes at your pace, and the price is very reasonable. It's definitely worth it. There are also motorcycles available for rent, and the traffic is nothing like the cities, so you can confidently explore the area, which is another great adventure by itself. You will see farms, rivers, mountains, waterfalls. Ask Mr. Son or Mrs. Son for advice on where to explore and they will guide you.
Un endroit idéal pour visiter le parc du lac Ba-Bê. On a passer un très bon séjour dans cet homestay.
Fantastic food, lovely family,  scenic location.
The stay was amazing and the family was amazing. View overlooking the lake and true cultural elements. Thank you so much

Der Aufenthalt bei Thanh war sehr schön. Neben einer kleinen Farm in mitten der Natur kann man toll zur Ruhe kommen. Thanh und seine familie waren sehr freundlich und wir wurden lecker bekocht.  Auch veganes essen war kein Problem. Definitiv empfehlenswert!

Nous avons été déçus, par rapport aux photos et aux commentaires. on a plus trouvé un style auberge de jeunesse, extrêmement bruyante. Des français insupportables! On a changé  après une nuit blanche. Le repas était moyen. On n’a pas compris la nomination Superhote.

Die Unterkunft hat einen malerischen Ausblick, die Zimmer sind ordentlich, aber eher spartanisch, denn es fehlt ein Kleiderschrank. Leider wollte sich Thuan das Frühstück bezahlen lassen, obwohl das laut AirBnB inklusive ist. Außerdem war das Abendbrot unverschämt teuer, 240.000 Đống. Zum vergleich: eine große Schüssel phố kostet in Hanoi 40.000 Đống.

Very friendly & helpful family is living here. Very beautiful view from the house
They they offer tasty food and cozy boat tours.
just check the weather and temperature before, it can get cold ;)
Sehr liebe Menschen, sehr schöne Aussicht/Unterkunft und sehr sehr sehr leckeres Essen! Danke :)

I stayed for 4 nights and 5 days.  Thuan arranged a boat tour with other guests staying at the homestay.  The guests are very kind people, so they took care of me, who is not natural in English, and I had dinner with them, and it was a very pleasant experience. Thuan also introduced me to a professional local guide named Tuoi, so I could tour pac ngoi village and hua ma cave.  It was the most enjoyable time I had in Vietnam. Meals served at the homestay were plentiful. It was unfortunate that there was noisy during the day due to road construction near the homestay.  Also, it is easy to see the nearby area only by bicycle or motorcycle. Before making a reservation, the bicycle was said to be free, but when I went there, I had to pay 50k vnd to rent it for a day.  I wanted to go directly from the homestay to Noi Bai Airport, and I was grateful that the host responsibly booked the bus.  The nature around the homestay is very beautiful and peaceful, so I was able to heal.

Luan is such a great host. 10/10 would recommend anyone to stay at his place when you head to Ba Be. It was clean, spacious and the food was amazing as well.
Not only that, you can also arrange any kind of tours that you’ll like and Luan will cater to your needs. He speaks great English therefore there was an easy communication between us!

Our stay was an absolute delight! The view from the room is worth it all on its own! But more Luan was a most kind and helpful host. He went out of his way to make our stay enjoyable and arrange activities for us even though it overlapped with a local holiday. He took time to talk with us and explain about local customs and the holiday. The lake is a quick motorbike ride and we enjoyed kayaking and a boat trip he arranged for us. I would highly recommend! He also has excellent English so if you don’t speak Vietnamese there won’t be an issue.

We had a nice time at Ba Be Legend Hotel. Luan is a very communicative, friendly and helpful host who speaks good English. He organized arrival & departure for us and had suggestions what to do in the area. For example, he organized a boat trip to cave and waterfall for us.
In Ba Be and the surrounding area, it is probably recommended to be able to drive a motorcycle, otherwise you are very tied to the hotel area (by foot you can reach small shops and do some hiking / walking) or you have to make "supervised" day trips. A tour to the national park costs 30-60$ / person depending on the type of activity.
Luans wife, Nhi, cooked us tastefull and extensive vegetarian dinner for around 8$ per person, even though we were partly the only guests there.
The room was clean and spacious, just the couch lacked a bit of comfort. So we would recommend this accommodation for people who are mobile and on the search for outdoor activities or as a stopover on a trip through the north.

A lovely clean hotel situated opposite rice paddies with views of the mountains. The hotel is excellent value and I couldn't find fault in anything.  The food is all home cooked local cuisine and you will not go hungry. There is plenty of food for breakfast and dinner.  What made the visit special was Luan's warm and welcoming manner.  He arranged my tour on the lake and advised me on a walk to take through local villages. I wish I had been able to stay longer.
The room was clean and comfortable with beautiful moutain view. We had a great time here. The host was wonderful with great tips to travel around. Thank you so much!

It is a great quiet place
Luan is full of attention with his guests
Thank you

The property was beautiful and Vi was lovely! She was so helpful with recommendations and accommodations. The stay was great, we had 3 nights here and it was so serene and calm. The bed was comfy, the coffee and tea were delicious, and the breakfast was so refreshing! I usually don’t write reviews, but this spot earned its 5 stars!!

The location is great for a look around and the garden and room were unbelievably good. Our room was completely beautiful!
The ambience was divine and Vi was helpful with suggestions and transport.

Vi and the teamTrang, huyen, quynh each with their own roll at the homestay made the stay pleasant and comfortable, very peaceful place if you are wanting to just get away and relax or do some undisturbed work.

We chose to travel to Yen Bai when we discovered Vi's place and enjoyed a wonderful 4 nights stay there. The place is absolutely beautiful,  with a dreamy garden that looks stunning at sunset! Loved the fruit bowls at breakfast and the smoothies! Best coconut coffee I had while in Vietnam! Dinner was lovely too and we particularly loved eating on the terrace while the fire burnt close by. We recommend this little piece of heaven to anyone who's in the area.

Vi ist eine sehr besondere Gastgeberin. Wir haben uns dort unglaublich wohl gefühlt, vor allem auch wegen Vi und ihren Mitarbeitern und den Katzen. Vi hat uns super versorgt, war immer sehr freundlich und lustig und ist uns absolut ins Herz gewachsen. Die Unterkünfte sind sehr originelle Bambus Bauten. sehr bequemes Bett, schöner Garten.
vielen Dank Vi!!! wir werden dich vermissen

it was ... MAGICAL.
the place is breathtaking,
the host are sweethearts ...
thank you for everything !
Amazing place, genuinely beautiful homestay. Also lots of extremely cute cats just roaming around the homestay, one even entered our room which was incredible.

Que dire ?
Tout était absolument incroyable,
Vi vous accueille dans un endroit apaisant, décoré avec beaucoup de goût.
La gentillesse et l’hospitalité qu’ils sont eu à notre égard étaient incroyables.
Elle nous a arrangé tous nos transferts de bus pour arriver et pour partir.
Allez y les yeux fermés, vraiment.
Elle loue des scooters, pleins de jolies choses à visiter à proximité, cascade, le lac de Thac Ba…
Le seul regret ? Ne pas être rester assez longtemps.
Merci mille fois pour tout 🤍
On s’en rappellera pendant très longtemps
Petit bonus : les petits chats trop mignons.

As soon as you step in you can feel positive energy. Then you meet the smiley and welcoming face of Vi (who speaks english fluently) and the sweet kindness of Trang and you definetely fell in love with this place. The room is bright, spotlessy clean, with a big king size bed, free Wi-Fi, a big new bathroom, airconditioning (for cooling and heating), kettle, hair dryer and all necessary toiletries. Again you feel so welcomed, confortable and relaxed. They can provide meals, a laundry service on demand and free bikes to discover the city. This homestay is the essence of Vietnam itself: beauty of semplicity, recycling, honesty, welcome, respect for people and nature, artcraft, hard work, strong mind, joy and gratitude for life, positive energy, good food, friendship, relaxed mood, family values, wisdom. You enter as a guest, you (sadly) leave as a friend.

5/5 and better!
Vi is an amazing host, the food was superb and the whole vibe in this place was magic (beautiful cats). ✨️

We stayed at Vi's towards the end of our trip in Vietnam and everything was just what we needed. Calm, quiet, relaxing, it's a little oasis in a busy strip. The room was perfect, comfy, super clean and private, we loved the yoghurt and fruit breakfast here we ate it 3 days in a row! Vi is super helpful, she arranged our transfers to and from, she helped us hire scooters to get around Yen Bai, helped us make a reservation for dinner, and answered all of my many questions. Very prompt, very good English, super kind - all of the staff here were really kind too.
The price was probably a bit higher than what we paid at other stays in Vietnam, but the quality was incredible, completely worth it in my opinion.
Oh and the cafe garden is home to a couple of very sweet kittens, we loved when they visited whilst we had coffee.
We will definitely return if we come back to Vietnam!

Un soggiorno perfetto.
Vin è una padrona di casa attenta e sempre presente per qualsiasi necessità.
Brava,brava,brava!!!❤️

We stayed for 4 nights, and it was simply perfect. Beyond the exceptional location, the magnificent accommodations and the delicious food, Vi was certainly the most memorable encounter of our trip. If we weren't separated by a 15-hour flight, we'd come every weekend! We were able to try out several rooms during our stay, and they were all perfect, quiet and comfortable. The place is extremely relaxing, and beautiful. We were able to stay long enough to enjoy it in all weathers, it was very contemplative, the garden is magnificent. The welcome was warm, kind and gentle, just like Vi who looked after us throughout our stay. The food was generous and delicious! This stay was perfect, thank you very much for everything, we hope to come back one day 🤞🏼bisous, Nolwenn and Etienne

Picturesque place!
Love it
Recommend!
Nice stay
We actually stayed at another place, as this accommodation was taken. But it was beautiful. The host - Moon - took great care of us. They also made yes delicious dinner and breakfast :)
The price advertised was “the old price”. Well what do you know…it’s double now. Waste of time.
