A perfect sanctuary to relax in quiet Yen Bai. We loved our time at Dinh Gia Trang, which offers the traditional feeling of a bamboo stilt house but includes all the modern luxuries. Everything was so clean and classy, and the garden and rooms are very well looked after. Vi was so friendly and helped us with our travel to and from Yen Bai, as well as local recommendations to visit nearby and a scooter we could hire to get around. The cafe also provides delicious food and drinks! We left feeling so refreshed and connected to nature. Cannot recommend this place enough :)
Stayed here on our drive to Ha Giang and the Homestay was perfect with a cute and zen coffee garden!
Amazing place amazing host amazing food. Really perfect place to stop and rest. Lovely cats. Thank you so much
Jamais vu un airbnb aussi beau, chaleureux, accueillant, exceptionnel. rien à dire de plus

I wouldn't recomend there are better places around, don't get me wrong the place looks great but we arrived after driving many hours from hanoi, we couldn't call him coz he kept send me invalid number and the person welcomed us there was rude and had no idea we booked a room instantly trying to charge us...
Bardzo miły gospodarz, miejsce okej najwyżej na jedną noc.
Everything was fine🙂
Treated us like family and is a beautiful place allready planning on going out of our way to go back !
Great place to stay Nam was a brilliant host spoke english and provided anything i needed at a moment’s notice. Highly recommend!

We had a perfect stay! Beautiful location and the host was very kind. We arrived pretty late but he made us an incredible diner. Also the breakfast and coffee were really good. We recommend this place!
Good for one night
We didn't expect this place to be so beautiful , it was a charm staying there. The host was very helpful and kind to us. I would give this place 10 Stars for the Value :)
Our stay here was perfect. We got delicious dinner and breakfast and Nam and his family were very friendly and welcoming. Very recommended!

We booked the place but never git any reply. multiple attempts to reach the host failed. he never provided an address so we had no chance finding the place. ended up booking somewhere else. Airbnb costumer service was similarly helpful as this host since I'm still waiting for their reply. don't book. seems like a scam

Der Besitzer war sehr freundlich. Er hat sich Beispielsweise Zeit genommen uns mehrere Stunden in die Stadt zu fahren. Außerdem zeigte er uns eine ruhige Stelle an einem nahegelegenen See.
Die Lage war ruhig und die Freizeitangeboten wie das Jetski Fahren waren ansprechend.
Für den Preis der Unterkunft also definitiv weiter zu empfehlen
the host did not respond. the location was inaccurate and after one hour looking for the place i gave up and got a hotel. bad experience!

We arrived when it was dark and the host wasn't expecting us, he simply didn't check the app he said. Apart from this curious checkin, we were welcomed with utmost hospitality in this beautiful resort-like place next to a lake. The food was very tasty and the rooms are more than decent.

Cozy Haven is a homestay that may not be overly luxurious, but it has everything I needed.
The surrounding space is spacious, airy, and filled with greenery. Every corner is decorated in a very artistic and unique way.
The host felt more like a friend than just a host.
I’d definitely recommend this place to other guests

We had such a lovely weekend here! The room was spacious, bright, and full of fresh air which is perfect for our little family. We especially loved waking up to the sunrise right by the bed and enjoying tea on the peaceful balcony. A quiet, beautiful spot to slow down and reconnect with nature. Thank you for the warm hospitality!

I only stayed for a short time, but it was truly a healing experience - both physically and emotionally.
The space is artistic, cozy, and full of character. Since the host is an artist, every corner of the home feels thoughtful and creative. The warm tones, combined with greenery and flowers around the house, create a peaceful atmosphere that feels both like a safe haven and a place deeply connected to nature.
The amenities were surprisingly complete and very well maintained. Everything was clean, neatly arranged, and far exceeded my expectations, especially for a home located in the city of Yen Bai.
What made the experience even more special was the host. I didn’t feel like just a guest. I felt like a friend, or even a part of the family! Their kindness and sincerity made me feel right at home, and it’s the kind of place that makes you want to come back again.

My family arrived at Vi's place after flying in from Huế and immediately felt soothed by the natural oasis tucked away from the town, with a library, affectionate cats, and a fire for company. Everyone there is very sweet; Vi especially is not only a responsive and enthusiastic host, but someone who genuinely connects with those who cross paths through her humor and conviction. The accommodations were very comfortable (although sound leaks easily) and Vi simplified our travels by arranging our transfers from the airport and to our next destination. Our spirits felt restored after just one night, and we would love to stay longer on our next visit.

From start to finish, our stay was perfect! Vi welcomed us like old friends into the most peaceful haven tucked away from the busy street. Vi sat and chatted with us, with lots of recommendations and things for us to do. She very easily provided us with mopeds to explore the beautiful surrounding areas and also booked us a head spa in the local area (which is a must)!
The room was very clean, bed linen so soft, amazing food and coffee but the stay was made by our amazing host Vi who went above and beyond to make our stay a very memorable one.
I will always carry her wise words with me and a little piece of the garden 🩷🌸🌺🌷🌼

This Place is just beautiful and georgeous, i really enjoyed the Stay. Also the food there is super tasty and the room was super clean and cozy and smelled Like cinnamon. Also Talking To vy was joy, she is super funny and the team is Friendly and attentiv. I didnt miss a thing, thank you so much!

Nous avons passé chez VI le meilleur séjour de tout le Vietnam. L’endroit est juste fabuleux. Nous avons même changé de chambre pour en avoir deux séparées car nous étions 3 voyageurs sans aucun frais. VI est une personne adorable, avec plein de recommandations et très amicale. Nous reviendrons sans aucun doute. Un grand merci pour cet accueil merveilleux ❤️

Es war wirklich wunderschön hier,
nach einem langen und herausfordernden Motorrad-Trip, war dieser Ort genau das was wir gebraucht haben.
Wir konnten uns sehr gut entspannen. Ein sehr hübscher gepflegter Garten,
Tolle kleine Holzhütten, ein sauberes Restaurant mit leckerem Essen.
Die Zimmer und das Bad war super sauber und man hat sich sehr sehr wohl gefühlt.
Vi ist super lieb und hat uns tolle Tipps für unsere weitere Reise gegeben.
leuk verblijf met lekker eten en drinken. alles was heel schoon en mooi ingericht. we hebben een fijn verblijf gehad
Thank you for the amazing stay, Vi was super friendly and helpful. Couldn’t of asked for a better host and accommodation! 😄
một trải nghiệm tuyệt vời ở yên bái. tôi rất hài lòng và hạnh phúc khi được nghỉ ở đây.

The best place I’ve stayed in Vietnam so far !! Absolutely gorgeous, a little oasis with fantastic rooms, good food and company!☺️ the rooms were clean and cozy and the entire place is so peaceful. The staff are the best, super friendly and welcoming, I 100% recommend!!

호스트는 세계 최고수준으로 친절하고 적극적입니다. 숙소는 정말 천국 같습니다. 맑은 공기가 그리워서 하노이 에서 이곳으로 일부러 숙소를 옮겼습니다. 옮기길 너무 잘했다는 생각이 듭니다. 산과 연결되어 있어서 공기가 맑아요. 신용카드도 됩니다. 다만 주변 상점들은 신용카드가 안됩니다. 한가지 다른 게스트방의 소음 차단이 아쉽습니다. 그래도 이곳을 나는 다시오고 싶습니다. 숲속의 천국에 있는 기분이 들기 때문입니다. 특히 호스트는 문제를 매우 적극적으로 해결해줍니다. 유료 식사도 따로 직접 요리해서 준비해줍니다.
We got a late start out of Hanoi and wanted a place about half way between Hanoi and Ha Giang. What a unique cool stay. Great time, serve food, coffe, and Tea amongst other things. Great stay for us

We stayed here one night on the trip between Hanoi and Sa Pa.
Lovely host and wonderful room. Very nice, cozy vibe. The town didn’t offer much for a tourist, but we didn’t need it, since they had everything we needed at the home stay!

Absolutely a amazing place to stay. The rooms look so cozy and authentic and veel luxurious.
The hosts are amazing, polite and you can have a good conversation with them.
Also the drinks and food that they serve are super tasty!
Thank you for having us!
Pobyt u Vi byl super. Vi vyniká v komunikaci, vše bylo naprosto bez problému. Ráno nám připravila skvělou snídani a pomohla s dalším cestováním. Jen doporučujeme!
great place and super nice host!
Nice stay
It was lovely stay
Nice stay. Amazing hosts. Very recommended. They gave us tips for local dishes.
guesthouse vraiment charmant,  literie de qualité. tout est fait avec goût.  a savoir pas de restauration sur place.

yen baiでこちらの宿でお世話になりました！
もともと予約した宿と連絡が取れず急遽当日に予約しましたが
ここを選んで大正解！
オーナー夫妻はとても素敵な方で
バス停までの送迎を手伝ってくれたり
一緒に夕食を食べないかと誘ってくれ、美味しいベトナム料理を振る舞って下さいました✨
お部屋も綺麗で旦那さんはアーティストなので建物中に沢山のアートが飾ってありとても素敵で居心地の良い空間です。地元の子供にアートを教えているみたいで近所の子供達も集まってとっても平和で穏やかな場所。
ベトナムの田舎町で最高のおもてなしを受けられてとても幸せです🤍
ご縁に感謝🫶🏻🙏🏻
またベトナムに来る際には
必ず戻ってきたいホームとなりました🫶🏻

We booked last minute and arrived at night. Still we were very warmly welcomed. The host spent time with us, we shared stories and even celebrated a birthday. We could see and buy beautiful artwork. The atmosphere is very friendly, place is wonderful and the host has a sense of humor! As a cherry on top they provided us perfect laundry service.
We came as guests and left as friends.
Thank you
Vanda and Jakub
친절한 호스트, 깨끗한 숙소입니다. 호스트가 영어도 잘하고 요리도 잘하고 매우 친절합니다. 가성비도 좋아서 강력추천해요.

I recently stayed at a homestay in Yên Bái, and it was one of the most peaceful and memorable experiences I’ve had in Vietnam. From the moment I arrived, I was welcomed with warmth and genuine hospitality by the host family. They made me feel like more than a guest — I felt like part of their home.
The location is surrounded by lush green mountains and morning fog that gives the whole place a magical feel. Every morning, I woke up to the sound of birds, the scent of wood fire, and the fresh mountain air. The scenery is breathtaking — it’s the kind of place where you just want to sit quietly, sip tea, and take in the beauty of nature.
The homestay itself was clean, cozy, and well-maintained. The wooden house has a traditional charm but is still comfortable, warm blankets, and even hot showers.
This place is perfect if you’re looking to escape the city, connect with nature, and experience authentic local life. It’s not luxury — it’s something better: real, grounded, and full of soul.

LeLe Haus war einfach ein wunderbares Zuhause. Wir wurden freundlich begrüßt und waren dirket erstaunt von all den süßen Details und den wunderschönen Malereien überall. Es ist ein Paradies für offene Geister, voller Inspiration und man merkt, dass die beiden mit viel Liebe und Hingabe arbeiten.
Sie hat wunderbar für uns gekocht und das Zimmer perfekt vorbereitet, er hat uns viele schöne Geschichten erzählt und uns sogar im Malen unterrichtet! Da hat einfach alles gepasst. Wer künstlerische Inspiration, Herzlichkeit und eine wunderschöne Erfahrung sucht, ist hier genau richtig!
Wir kommen auf jeden Fall wieder - mit noch mehr Zeit zum Reden, Malen, Essen, Erleben... Und auch das Zimmer und die ganze Anlage sind so schön und sauber und wunderbar bunt ... wir vermissen es jetzt schon, dort zu sein!
Absolutely great!
Nous avons adoré notre séjour. Le propriétaire était très gentil. Il nous a aidé a commander dans un café et il nous a donné des recommandations de chose à faire. C'était parfait comme endroit.

Owner of the hotel was super kind and helpful:)
Thank you very much🙏🏻

Dit was 1 van onze favoriete Home Stays in Vietnam. Hoan en zijn vrouw hebben ons ongelofelijk ontvangen en met van alles geholpen. We hebben heerlijk gegeten en zelfs een boottocht op het meer gekregen. We zouden er zo opnieuw naartoe willen gaan!

If you want the Vietnamese experience, look no further. Mr Hoan and his family provide an excellent place to stay, outstanding food, and great hospitality. With a choice between private rooms, or a shared larger room with individual beds separated by curtains, anyone can stay here on a budget or not. Dinner was excellent, and the home-made rice wine was to die for. His family is very welcoming, and you feel right home with them. I could not have asked for a better place to stay!
The host has good English and quick respond. Very friendly.
thanks for the stay, we had a good time.

Mon séjour chez Phuong a marqué mon voyage. Je suis profondément reconnaissante de la générosité et de l’accueil dont il a fait preuve. Il m’a beaucoup aidé pour me déplacer sachant que je n’avais pas de moyens de moto/vélo, en plus de me conseiller de super endroits. Sa famille est incroyable et les repas tous ensembles ont été d’une très grande qualité (autant pour la nourriture que pour les moments passés ensemble). Je le remercie encore de m’avoir montré la pratique de la méditation zen, un sujet qui le passionne. En résumé, mon séjour a été très riche, je recommande sans hésité !
great hosts, great villa and great surrounding. simply great.

We had a great time at Phuongs place. Very kind family and an amazing host. The most amazing home-cooked dinner and he gave us a bunch of tips on where to stop in and around the area and hidden gems.
Highly recommended!
Hard to find, but once you there totally worth the money
I really enjoyed my stay. Everyone was very helpful and nice. The viewpoint to the lakes is definitely a highlight!

Wir haben 5 ganze Tage bei Phuong und seiner Familie verbracht, und es war ganz wundervoll. Wir haben gemeinsam gefrühstückt und zu Abend gegessen. Ai hat großartig gekocht, zu unserer großen Freude vegetarisch. Phuong hat uns Vorschläge für Unternehmungen gemacht, die viel Spaß gemacht haben. Zum Beispiel sind wir mit seinem Schwiegervater über den See gefahren, es war eine richtig schöne Tour. Am besten war es, dass wir im Laufe der fünf Tage so viel über Vietnam und über das Leben hier erfahren haben - über die Sprache, über die Geheimnisse des vietnamesischen Straßenverkehrs und vieles mehr. Wir sind sehr dankbar, dass Phuong und Ai uns so freundlich aufgenommen haben, und uns so einen bemerkenswerten und schönen Aufenthalt geschenkt haben.

It’s a must to stay at Ai thi’s home stay . He is very polite and helping about everything you need to do . He can suggest the best places to visit and see :) I had a wonderful time with him and his family . Definitely I’ll come back again in the near future!!  Thank you for everything Ai thi’s for the unforgettable moments :))

Honestly, if I could give this place more stars I would. Thank you so much again for your bright and open minds, hearts and home! Thank you for welcoming me and having me as part of your beautiful family for a week! Time flew by in no time. This experience was incredible and the most loving and kind one I have made on my whole travels! I highly recommend this accommodation if you are looking for a peaceful, friendly and loving environment.

This is a great place, really lovely family, the owner has perfect english, their place is really clean and open and the whole family welcomes you to their house, we spent 5 days at there place and it was perfect.
Food 20/10

This a wonderfully quiet, modern homestay about 15 km outside of city of Yen Bai.  Here you will find quiet mountains with trails and panoramic lookouts once you reach the top.  The host family is wonderful and will take care of you.  Don't miss this gem in the mountains!

This was the best Homestay in Vietnam so far! The host-family was super nice and gave us great advice on what we could do in the surrounding area. The near lake and the viewpoint completed the experience. Totally worth spending a couple of days here!

Je recommande vivement. Une expérience incroyable on a était accueilli comme si nous étions de la famille.
Je vous conseille de manger avec eux le repas était délicieux et copieux
L’hôte parle très bien anglais
Il a pu nous conseiller des nombreuse choses à faire au alentour mais aussi pour la suite de notre voyage.
À la base nous avions réservé une seule nuit et nous somme resté une de plus tellement nous nous y sentions bien.
Je recommande, allez y les yeux fermés
Místo bylo krásné, čisté a s velmi rodinou atmosférou. Co mě však uchvátilo je terasa na střeše. Mít více času a zůstat déle, tak si ráda nahoře dám ranní kávu s krásným výhledem.
It’s a lovely place to stay there

Don’t let the cheap price fool you! Phuong’s homestay easily tops every 5-star hotel, with the nicest hosts ever, best food you’ll have on your trip and a cozy room :) We highly recommend staying at the breath mountain retreat for a few days and also taking a boat trip to the amazing Thac Ba Lake. Phuong also gave us a lot of wonderful tips for great things to explore in the area and also on our further trip.
Thanks for having us, we hope to see each other again!
Fantastisch verblijf gehad
Ubytování ve vile zařízené v evropském/US stylu, situované na krásném klidném místě. Děkujeme za vřelé přijetí, bohatou snídani a cenné cestovatelské rady!

An’s place was perfect for a peaceful getaway. The area was quiet, and the house had plenty of spaces to relax both inside and outside, with a stunning garden. The house had all the necessary amenities, and I felt right at home. An was very easy to communicate with. I would highly recommend this place.

This Airbnb is an absolute gem! Homestay is fully equipped, spotless, and well cared!
The privacy is unbeatable. With a beautiful garden and no immediate neighbors, we could relax, laugh, and enjoy ourselves without worry. The peaceful atmosphere made it feel like a true retreat.
The location is perfect, away from noisy main roads, offering pure tranquility. And the kitchen—wow! Spacious, airy, and perfect for cooking, especially with fresh organic vegetables from the garden and generous neighbors who share their delicious homegrown produce. The garden even has grapefruit and papaya trees, so we enjoyed fresh fruit straight from nature!
Finally, the host is beyond amazing—100 out of 10! Incredibly kind, always available, and quick to help with anything.
If you’re looking for a peaceful, well-equipped, and truly special place in Yen Bai, this is it. We’d absolutely stay again. Thank you for an unforgettable experience! ❤️

An is friendly and very supportive host, highly reccommend!
Room is well decoration and fresh garden around.
Very nice house in Yen Bai with a beautiful garden, we enjoyed 10 days there - working remotely and exploring the Yen Bai city. New, clean and perfect for us. Host very helpful and responsive.

Outstanding stay. If you want non-tourist Vietnam this is it. A was extremely responsive and helped every step of the way with local recommendations, transportation, and setting up a tour of the nearby lake. Tons of fresh fruit and vegetables. Highly recommended!
Super good and responsive host! Definitely recommend it to anyone who wants to stay away from the hustle and bustle of the city.

I'm happy with my stay at Hillside Haven. The host was extremely friendly, resourceful and welcoming. Felt right at home in a peaceful and tranquil place, surrounded by flowers, plants and fruit trees, authentic Vietnamese home with modern touch. Walkable distance for shopping needs. Thank you for a memorial stay!

My family and I had a peaceful weekend at Hillside Haven. The house is cozy and comfortable, surrounded by green trees. We love the feeling of waking up to sunshine and birdsong all around.
Ms. An was one of the best hosts I have ever met. She has a peaceful and happy energy. She was always ready to help whenever we need.
We absolutely wanna come back here in the future.
Parfait, vous ne le regreterez pas.
빈콤 시내와 가까워 편리하였으며 집은 새로 지은지 얼마 안 되어 깨끗하여 와이프가 좋아하였습니다 집 앞에 정원에서 야채도 직접 기르고 있어서 요리도 할 수 있었습니다. 옌바이에서 에어비앤비 구하기 힘든데 정말 좋은 기회였던것 같습니다. 즐거운 추억 남기고 감니다

We used this homestay like an in-between stop from Hanoi to Sa Pa. All I can say is I would highly recommend this location. The host is amazing, the food even better and the location at the lake is just wonderful. The host offered us a kayak to float around the lake. It was breathtaking. Furthermore the bungalow was perfectly clean, very modern and new.
This AirBnB is new, so don't be fooling yourself not to go here if you just read the lack of reviews. It's a hidden diamond! Go for it!

Recently constructed guesthouse in a heavenly location. Set right on the bank of a small lake, this spot is the quiet and peaceful getaway you need from the polluted, noisy Hanoi.
The rooms are well built with a modern standard, including a big TV, proper AC, and large windows letting in lots of light. Everything was clean and good as new.
The small rooms are on the ground floor and the views could have been nicer if the building was slightly nearer to the lake itself - climbing to the upper floors provides a proper vista.
The host, Dzung, was very friendly and welcoming, and it was enjoyable to hang out with him and learn about his life. He offers kayaking (free) and jetski rental (paid), as well as a dinner and breakfast made by his family.
All in all a wonderful place to stay with very few, if any, things to mind. Well worth the 3 hour trip from Hanoi, but slightly overpriced for Vietnamese standards.
Спасибо Muoi за гостеприимство и понимание! Все прошло хорошо!

Fui una experiencia increíble! Chau es una persona muy amable, he compartido una cena con el y su familia que voy a recordarme todo mi vida. Lo recomiendo 100%
Mil gracias a el para todo 🙏

Vi was a wonderful host! She would go above and a beyond to meet our enquiries and make our stay as pleasant as possible. Besides that, we appreciated the dedication in connecting with local people and networks in meeting our needs, such as organising bus rides, pickup taxis, and finding rain wear. The place was dreamy!
PS: the cinnamon scent in the rooms was amazing ✨✨

Vi is a very friendly and open host. She was always reachable and helped us with everything we wanted to know. The room was clean and looked like the pictures. There is an AC so that you can set the room temperature you want. The bathroom is very nice. It has no windows and is therefore open.
The property is very beautiful and has many traditional details. It is very easy to relax with the calm music, the green surrounding and the lovely decoration.
There is also a small restaurant on the property where you can book good breakfast and dinner, as well as coffee and snacks for reasonable prices. We really enjoyed our stay. Thank you very much, Vi! We definitely recommend this accomodation :)

If you need a Rest and Clean your mind....go for here, If you are open minded come. If you like the food,the Tea and the Juice im Vietnam you are right here.
If you can accept that around this area are Humans which have to live and work ,you will be right in this place.
It's Not far Out, No sect and not a thousend year old monastery, Just a small Oasis where you can BE for a while.
when you are satisfied with a small fire and some tiny Lights in the trees at night, this IS where you should be some day.
If you want Party, loud music and loads of Flatrate alcohol, you will be disapointed-please stay away fro this place.
Thank you Vi for the warmth, the dialoges, your ears and your eyes......all that will stay

The rooms are spacious and neat. We were able to rest well and chill. The place are ideal for family but without seniors because there are about 250 steep walk from the mainroad. We enjoy the place because of the mountain view. This is better than booking a hotel if you'll be exploring Catcat and Fansipan and come back to rest. Wifi is good, and they provide dribking water, coffee, tea and rice crackers as soon as you need something in the morning. The host is very responsive and he booked us a private car service for the wholeday for 700dong only. We went to Cat Cat Ville, Alpine Coaster, and Moana. We will be back and book again

I've booked this place in last minutes for my group and it did not make me dissappointed.
It's very new place with good location. Just 5 minutes walk to the bus station adn about 10 minutes to the centre. The AC and hot water worked so well, and I loved the most balcony on the 2nd floor where I can have the nice view of the town and mountain.
They also prepared snacks, coffee, tea at the guests room which is so realxing with sofas.
It was tottaly worth the money!!
good rooms with good views on the top

Great place! Though a bit difficult to climb up to so probably not recommended if you’re going with someone old or with mobility issues. But otherwise the house itself and the host is great!!!! Great view! We loved it so much

Mr and Mrs Trans’ place is worth every penny. It was at the center and within the  many restaurants. Very walkable. Also, the twin room that we booked was toooo big for the 2 of us. Very spacious and clean. I wish we couldve stayed a bit longer in Sa Pa. But we would def book this place again when in SaPa!

Amazing place to stay at the heart of sapa town. Walkable to everything but still quiet at night. Really good value and everything was perfect. Very comfortable bed and hot shower.  Host was lovely and easy to contact.

I had an amazing time at my stay I ended up booking another room with them for longer. They were super helpful and enjoyable to talk to. The room was clean and as described. I got amazing sleep. If I am ever in Sapa again, I would book my whole time with them!
We enjoyed our stay at this place. The host was very friendly and the trekking organised from this place was amazing. Great central location as well. Would definitely recommend.

2층 창문있는 트윈룸에 묵었었는데 냉장고는없었습니다.
위치좋습니다. 호수 가깝고 식당, 마사지샵 많습니다.
바로 앞 도로로 라오까이가는 버스 지나갑니다.
조용했고 에어컨 뜨거운 물 잘 나옵니다.
호스트 통해서 모든 티켓을 구매할 수 있습니다.
가격대비 강추합니다

the stay is in central part of the city and it's easy to get to different attactions from the stay. host (wife) was very sweet and helped is in many aspects like ticket booking, motorbike, recommendations, etc. although we visited only for 2 days we loved the stay. will definitely recommend this to others. Host knows English and thats a big plus. kindness of host made us fall in love with the city more.

Der Aufenthalt war sehr angenehm und der Beschreibung entsprechend:) Sie hatte uns bei unseren Freizeitaktivitäten geholfen und uns alles erklärt. Leider war die eine Seite meines Bettes schmutzig, aber sonst ein sauberes Zimmer und Unterkunft, in der man sich wohl fühlt☺️
Sollten wir Sapa ein weites mal bereisen, können wir uns vorstellen wieder dieses AirBnB zu buchen; danke😊
We have a lovely stay here. The accommodation was perfect for us. Great family which helped us plan our stay in Sapa so we had the best time. Would highly recommend to anyone coming to Sapa.

We had a nice stay for the 2 nights. shame the weather didn't play nice but that was also what added a mystical element to the journey. tons of restaurants within walking distance. Hosts were super friendly and helpful.
if you like a firm bed then it's decent for the price. nice hot shower.

Super lovely place to stay in such a great location! It was not loud at night, but there was still lots to do!
Would definitely recommend

Absolutely great host and place to stay, felt so welcomed it was shame had to leave.
Excellent place highly recommend to anyone. Can’t thank enough

Appartement idéalement placé pour visiter Sapa ( beaucoup de visites sont accessibles à pied). Dieu Tran donne de très bons conseils et est d' un abord super amicale.
Super séjour à Sapa.

سكنت أنا وصديقي محمد في نزل DieuTran كان منزل نظيف وانيق وهادئ وتقدم كثير من المساعدات والنصائح السياحيه . قبل ان يطلب منها سكنت عندها ليلتين واذا عدت إلى سابا سوف اسكن عندها مره ثانيه .
شكراً DieuTran

N’hésitez pas une seule seconde pour venir dormir dans cet hotel, on a été tellement bien accueilli, l’emplacement est plus que parfait, nos hôtes ont tellement bienveillants, adorables et nous ont aidé pour trouver les meilleures activités et conseils
Merci encore! C’était plus que parfait

Super bien, propre et emplacement idéal ! En plus la famille est très gentille
Je recommande
Host is very friendly and the place is also clean and spacious.
Dieu Tran was an amazing host, made me feel like i'm at home. Definitely will stay at his if im back at Sapa. Thank you!

very pleasant stay
Dieu's wife is very friendly and helpfull
I highly raccomend to stay here
Nice place
Great value!
We had a lovely stay!
Super homestay !
A great host!
The host was lovely and responded to messages quickly

La localisation du logement est idéale pour se reposer et profiter des paysages magnifiques
Difficiles d’accès si la pluie est trop présente ( tous les taxis n’y accèdent pas )
Hung est très réactif, présent et gentil.
Je recommande

We had the most AMAZING stay!!! What a great start to our trip. The views outside our window were stunning.  The room was so nice and relaxing.  The area was great, so many shops , little cafes and restaurants.  It was easy to get a taxi to the city. The host was also incredibly helpful and they provide meal options which were great.  Would love to stay again.

We had an amazing stay! The hosts were super friendly and the rooms very clean. The beds were also really good. They helped us with booking the rice field trekking. Finally the breakfast was delicious. Would recommend!

Lovely place and the people too! Note that this place is around 8km from the city centre, but it id definitely worth it! I rented a motorbike so it's easy to go around the area too. Definitely recommending this to people who want to escape from the busy city life. Will stay here again soon!

Loved how clean the place was. But, hard a hard time finding the place because the address indicated in the airbnb wasnt really accurate. I also got lost when i was on my way back and received a text that the dogs around the neighbourhood are aggressive at night. There are really a lot of big dogs, and they come in packs too. There were also a lot of female locals who will run after you to sell their items. Beautiful view, but i didnt rly have a peaceful mind being here.

The Airbnb had a beautiful view, and everything went smoothly during our stay. The reception staff was incredibly helpful with everything we needed from hotel-related matters to arranging taxis, tours, and more. We truly loved our visit and would definitely recommend it!

The Airbnb was very nice and unique with a comfortable bed. The views were amazing making the stay completely worthwhile. The hosts were also very helpful. However, be aware that the stay is approximately a 15 minute drive from Sapa main town.

Absolutely loved my stay at s plus bungalow. Especially after staying in the heart of Sapa the last 3 days. Very peaceful, away from the busyness and traffic. Had water buffalos, horses, and baby ducks to watch right off of our side porch. Close to some yummy restaurants that are part of homestays.
Just what I needed, some peace and quiet. And the shower was nice and hot with great water pressure.

This accomodation located in ta van village that required 20-30
Minutes drives from main sapa. The road was worth it with beautiful view. Even when you reach this village everything is beautiful. Completely nature is what we are looking for.
The accomodation was perfect. The reception lady was speaking english well and helping us alot with what we need. Thanks alot to her that make our trip become more beautiful.

S Plus was a wonderful place overall. Location was about 20minutes drive from the sapa town, we only went to town once as there are many food options around the accommodation. This place is peaceful both in the day and night.
The rooms were clean and looks newly renovated, the aircon is cold and the heated water is a plus.
The staff running this place were the best ! they helped me arranged everything from the motorbike rental/taxi rides as well as trekking tours starting from my arrival to my departure.
If you are looking for a beautiful, clean and comfortable place away from the sapa town but still within reach, this is the place you are looking for.
Amazing staff that helped us whenever we needed to head to sapa town. Loved their breakfast too and not to mention the superb views! Recommend for people to stay here for a nice relaxing experience.

Die Reise hierhin war ein Highlight unseres Vietnam Urlaubs. Die Kommunikation ist sehr gut und schnell. Man kann bequem über die Rezeption alles organisieren. Von Touren bis Taxen ist alles möglich. Die Bungalows sind wunderbar ausgestattet und haben einen tollen Blick in die spektakuläre Umgebung. Unbedingte Reiseempfehlung! Schnell und günstig mit dem Taxi oder Roller von sapa town erreichbar.

The host was very responsive and helpful. The place was serene and beautiful. The place is pretty far out from the town but it's easy to get taxi. Hoat and the team helps out a lot and patiently answers all the questions we throw at them at anytime. You will wake up to the most beautiful view.
Cabins have an amazing view of the surrounding rice fields. Peaceful place in a beautiful village. Host is very friendly and helpful

We stayed at S Bungalow during our trip to Sa Pa and absolutely fell in love with the place. The view of the rice fields was breathtaking.
The homestay was very clean, cozy, and had such a relaxing vibe. The host was incredibly accommodating, they even helped us book a taxi going to and from the homestay, which made our travel smoother. Plus, there was a free breakfast.
It’s a bit of a drive (around 30 minutes) from the main town of Sa Pa, so it’s best suited for those looking for a peaceful escape rather than city convenience. There aren’t many shops or restaurants nearby, but honestly, the tranquility and the warm hospitality made it all worth it.
Would definitely recommend this place for anyone wanting to unwind, be close to nature, and experience a more authentic side of Sa Pa. 💚
the place is the best. very beautiful and the staff are super nice!
great quiet place, great view of mountains and rice terraces
The place is very beautiful. The room is neat and clean, and the view from the balcony is stunning.

Der Aufenthalt in dem Bungalow war sehr schön und entspannend. Wir hatten leider schlechtes Wetter in Sapa, aber dafür war die Unterkunft perfekt! Durch die Klimaanlage, die auch als Heizkörper funktioniert, hatte man es angenehm warm im Zimmer. Die Lage war super und der Blick wirklich sehr schön, wir würden es definitiv weiterempfehlen!!
Lediglich die Lobby, wo man frühstückt, ist bei kaltem Wetter ungemütlich, da es dort genauso kalt ist wie draußen. Ebenfalls hat das warme Wasser für maximal 5 Minuten duschen gereicht, dann musste man wieder warten. Das war allerdings nicht schlimm und wir hatten eine wirklich schöne Zeit in dem Bungalow!!

숙소 밖 경치가 매우 좋습니다
직원분들은 매우 친절합니다
시내와 거리감이 있지만 라이딩 좋아하시는 분들이면 문제없다고 생각합니다
잘 배려해 주셔서 편안하게 머물다 갑니다
extremely serene place with a great view.
great place , host was proactive and very helpful ! a remote place with good little restaurants and nice people !!
It was a great place and host was very friendly and helpful guiding us directions. She also fetched us from the pick up.
Wonderful!!!
Great! Thank you:)

We had a great staying at Jungle! The place is beautiful with mountain view, breakfast included and they gave us a lot of local recommendations. A special thank to the young girl at the reception, because she spoke English and was always so kind and polite to us (sorry that I don’t know how to write your name).
Nice stay overall, accommodation is comfortable and its surrounded by lush vegetation, it really gives a peaceful atmosphere. Host was very friendly and helpful. Would definitely stay again.

very pleased with everything. location is near the town center, staff was great, the bungalow was cozy though the creaking of the trees the first night startled us 😂
We drove our pickup truck and the road is very narrow and steep. It was worrisome the first time up and down but after that it was no trouble 😅

The cabin was spacious, bathroom was clean and has good hot water. Host was also very accommodating and helpful, we have big suitcases and had to walk a bit to reach our cabin, and they were very kind to help us with everything. They also offer free breakfast which was enough before we start our day. The surroundings were very peaceful but not too far from the city center. Overall a really nice stay.

Tien is one of the best host, I’ve come across during my travel. She is responsive, helpful and will make sure you are at ease and have what you need. Good recommendations as per the situation. We tried the dinner which was great, she even allowed us to use the kitchen for a quick brekkie. Would highly recommend anyone coming to Sapa to stay here. The rooms were spacious, neat and tidy just as shown in the pictures. Very near to Sapa market yet very peaceful and quiet.

Sapa Jungle Homestay is a beautiful place to relax high above the Sapa township. Basic but comfortable it offers a unique opportunity to blend in with nature yet still be only a 5 or 10 minute walk into the township.
Not for the light hearted, the 300 step climb is a bit of a workout, but it’s well lit and stepped and not dangerous.
I’d recommend dining with the family to get a taste of the local foods for a very reasonable price.
Thoroughly recommend this place-

The place is great, surrounding nature. You can wake up outlooking the trees. Definitely for people who prefers some quiet and peace.
Host is very nice and accommodating. The staffs are also very lovely, especially Tien, she’s very friendly and willing to help. It was a great stay!

A beautiful place to stay at in Sapa. It reminds me of having my own treehouse but like on top of a mountain. The host is very responsive and fun to talk to. Ps: Give their menu a try and you will not disappoint!

Had a fairly good experience for an overnight stay. Location, as expected, near the wilderness and far from urbanisation, so expected less luxuries, like hot water and air-con. Impressed that there were 2 toilets, but discovered dead insects on the top floor. For hot shower, had to request owner to turn on hot water and wait 15min.

we reached very late at night but they were very helpful and responsive. throughout our stay they helped us transport wise and they provide free breakfast every morning. it was a really cozy and vibey place. the staff are super friendly and hospitable. would come back and stay again! 10/10!

loved our stay at Sapa jungle homestay.
great location close to town but far enough away to be peaceful.
The host was fantastic helped organise activities and had lots of great information.
we ended up staying extra nights.
The property is very charming and a bit rustic but with modern amenities.
We stayed with our 2 teenage sons and would definitely recommend staying at this wonderful property

This place made me say "i wish I could stay longer in Sa Pa". The place is lovely, and the host is friendly, kind and helpful. The loft is amazing with heated matters for the cold nights, it gives you the feeling of "cabin in the woods" but it's also very clean (spotless).
Overall perfect place to stay
Big bonus the doggos 🐶 that are running around, especially the brown retriever 🥰

It was one of the best places I have ever stayed! We highly recommend the place as it is magical with a lovely staff and atmosphere.  Everything was great, the food, the drinks, especially the coffee, the view, the rooms and the location. We will choose it again and we are going to suggest it to our friends for sure.

Une famille accueillante et souriante. Elle nous a organisé un trekk d’une journée dans les rizières avec la guide Zaazaa qui a vraiment été génial !
L’endroit est calme. La nourriture est bonne. Merci encore pour l’accueil

كان المضيف رائع و خدوم قدم لنا الكثير من النصائح ولديهم حجز لكل الانشطة في المدينه ( جوله في المدينة او التلفريك الى القمة او جوله في الطبيعة بين الجبال )وتم الحجز من خلالهم الى هانوي بواسطة باص النوم وقد طلبوا لنا تاكسي الى محطة القطار وهم من حاسبوه شكرا لهم .
المكان جميل و هادئ في وسط الغابة وعلى بعد دقائق مشي الى البحيرة في وسط سابا يجمع يبن العزلة و بين قربه من وسط المدينة الفطور كان لذيذ بان كيك للاطفال و اومليت للزوجين
كان لدي الكثير من الحقائب و السيارة لا تصل الى الاعلى ولاكن قاموا بأخذ الحقائب وايصالها الى الكوخ
اوصي بهم بشدة

Merci Jungle Homestay pour ce beau séjour. Je recommande vivement le bungalow qui offre un cadre paisible avec une vue sur la ville tout en étant au milieu des bambous. Mention spéciale pour notre hôte qui nous a guidé et vraiment aidé pour confectionner un séjour satisfaisant nos envies d’activités (réservation de nos billet pour Fansipan, réservation d’un trip dans les rizières en moto…). Super moment !

Staying at Jungle was the most amazing one I haven't had for a while. I felt right at home, the team is always very responsive, taking good care of us, even with vegan food which's not yet very popular in Sapa. I regret not booking tours with Jungle, as we didn't know they provide it. Ask a lots of things about tours as they offer the most authentic ones, from nighting out to trekking with locals or riding motobikes onto Hoang Lien Mountains. Try at least one of their home-cooking dinners and don't forget to have some shots from local ethnic cultures :)
Hope to be back soon!
An amazing experience — by far our best one in Vietnam. From the delicious meals to the tips from the host and the cozy bungalow, everything was just perfect. We couldn’t recommend it more!

Our stay at Jungle home stay was the most amazing experience we have ever had at an Airbnb. The team was amazing with their recommendations by setting up local taxis, trekking tours and giving recommendations for walking around. Furthermore they made one of the best dinners we had during our entire stay. We absolutely loved the space and the two little resident dogs running around truly made us feel right at home. We cannot recommend this place enough and would absolutely come back if we ever return to Sapa!
사파 정글에서 지낸 3일은 정말 아름다운 시간이었습니다 완벽한 위치, 자연에 둘러 싸인 풍광, 너무도 친절한 직원들 등 모든 요소가 긍정적인 경험이었습니다

Absolutely wonderful stay! The host was fantastic—always available, incredibly friendly, and made us feel right at home. The bed was super comfortable, and the location is perfect: close to the city yet surrounded by greenery. We highly recommend trying the meals prepared by the host; they were unbelievably delicious. We'd love to come back!

We really enjoyed our stay at Jungles Homestay and we would definitely return. The setting is lovely and is only a short walk from the city action but is a nice retreat room the city. Jungle is a lovely host and is very helpful as are the other staff. Breakfast was lovely in the lush green setting. The views are superb from the Cafe area.

The Sapa Jungle Homestay is a hidden oasis in the treetops of Sapa. It is an easy walk downhill to the town with lots of restaurants, bars and shops. Our host was friendly and spoke English and was available via Messaging for any questions. We had a Hot Pot dinner on the patio one night and it was delicious! For a rustic and beautiful stay in Sapa, I highly recommend Sapa Jungle Homestay. :)
We enjoyed staying here. looking forward to come back soon!! Thank you for being responsive and the room is top notch! We really enjoyed our vacation.

Wir haben unseren Aufenthalt bei Nga und ihrer liebevollen Familie sehr genossen - sie sind an Gastfreundlichkeit kaum zu übertreffen! Ich würde auf jeden Fall eine Trekkingtour mit ihr empfehlen um die schöne Natur dort zu entdecken, wir haben so viel über die Kultur und die Umgebung dort gelernt :) Wir kommen auf jeden Fall wieder um uns dort eine erholende Auszeit zu gönnen 🥰 Das Zimmer war auch top mit einer super Aussicht!

Nga is wonderful, and so is her homestay!! She really went out of her way to make sure I was comfortable and happy. 😊
- My room was very clean and had amazing views.
- I ate most of my meals here, all of which were very affordable and delicious. Nga provided generous portions with fresh ingredients.
- Nga booked a trekking tour for me. She asked me what I wanted to see/experience and organized just that (waterfalls for swimming, paths through bamboo forests, etc.).
- I met some of her family members during my stay, all of whom were warm and kind!
I'd recommend this homestay to anyone who wishes to have a memorable experience in Sapa!!
we really enjoyed our stay there, wish I had booked more days. Nga was so helpful and made wonderful meals for us. We plan to go back in the future.

Nga is superwoman! She is adorable and extremely polite. She helped us with EVERYTHING.
> Planning my itinerary week before my arrival.
> Picking me up in extreme rain conditions that too early morning.
> Providing delicious meals always.
> Great coffee by herself and Huan.
> She offered ride to explore town, market, cat cat village, fansipan, and more.
> Offered 24 x 7 support and she always ensure to be there and was proactive to ask us if we need anything.
The place is HEAVEN!
> The day I arrived it was raining which stopped in few hours.
> Next day cloudy.
> Next day sunshine.
I was lucky to see all three weather at Nga's place and believe me it was just outstanding. If you love nature, this place is all you need.
My favorite place on earth would be Nga's home.
I wish I hadn't booked my flight from Ha Noi to Da Nang before my arrival to Sa Pa else would have dropped my whole itinerary to LIVE here as much as I could. <3
My best regards to Nga & I hope to be back soon!

La casa de Nga es hermosa, tiene vistas muy lindas, el jardín es hermoso y con vistas a las terrazas de arroz y del río, que se escucha para dormir tranquilamente. La habitación y baño son bien confortables , el colchón es un poco duro para nuestro gusto, pero es cuestión de gustos. Todo estaba muy nuevo y limpio.
Nga nos hizo desayunos y comidas muy ricas, y con un precio súper accesible. Hicimos el trekking con ella como guía y fue una experiencia única. Recomendamos hacerla!
En el barrio Ta Van, que queda a unos 13 km (taxis entre 200.000 y 250.000 Dong) del centro de Sapa, hay vistas hermosas y varios mercados pequeños , bares e restaurantes donde se puede estar sin necesidad de ir al centro.
Nos encantó nuestra estadía, y volveríamos💛

Ngôi nhà thật tuyệt vời với khu vườn và khung cảnh. Phòng thật ấm cúng và giường thật êm ái, tôi đã có một giấc ngủ tuyệt vời khi ở đây. Căn phòng tôi ở rất thoải mái và thoáng mát, căn phòng trong một ngôi nhà thật tuyệt vời. Chủ nhà rất thân thiện và họ đã giúp chúng tôi rất nhiều trong mọi thứ, chúng tôi đã hỏi rất nhiều nhưng họ vẫn rất nhiệt tình với tôi. Thật là một trải nghiệm vô cùng đáng nhớ và hoàn hảo. Rất muốn giới thiệu nơi này với thật nhiều người hơn. Cảm ơn chủ nhà Yến vì những kỉ niệm nơi đây.

Chủ nhà rất đáng yêu và vui vẻ. Hướng dẫn đầy đủ nhiệt tình.
Chúng tôi đã có 3 ngày ở đây và cảm giác rất gần gũi. Không gian trong nhà rất thoải mái và ấm cúng.
Thuận tiện đi lại ngắm cảnh, đi chợ, nhà hàng.
Có thể ăn uống tại home luôn vì không gian bếp mở và rất xinh xắn.

This place was nothing short of incredible! I had a bit of trouble finding it in the first place, but that was at 6am after a long bus ride - once I found it, I was in paradise.
This place has such an amazing atmosphere and surroundings. I felt right at home and felt creative as soon as I walked in and looked around. There’s lots of open space and natural light.
100% recommend checking this place out.
I have the great time at this place. The host Ms. Yen is so friendly and the room was clean and pretty.
Amazing place for a retreat, Yen is a super host who can help you a lot. Rooms are clean with a large and comfy bed. The views are insane!!!

The place was better than the photos. The way to the homestay is rocky and you would need a taxi, grab, or green gsm or vinfast to get there. The place also has steep stairs when going around but it is all worth it for the view.
For the food, expect regular home cooking. We found it really good though

This is hands down the most beautiful place I’ve ever stayed in, the views are breathtaking. The host was lovely and made us feel right at home and always messaged to see how we were. Just be warned to drive is a little bumpy😂 however we had no problems with grabs getting there! Will 100% be staying there again <3
I had great stay at this homestay.the views are absolutely spectacular.The host was really kind & helpful.Overall its a Wonderful place to stay even quite far from town and the road a little bumpy..

Hoang Hai’s place is definitely worth the money if you’re looking for a peaceful time in nature. It was a perfect day for us to escape the hustle and bustle of the city. We loved the beautiful view, and the host was very friendly and responsive. We ordered pho from the on-site restaurant, and it was delicious! The staff were helpful and welcoming. I would definitely recommend this place. It was a lovely part of my Sapa trip.
Good views, reasonable prices, friendly staff, delicious meals were good, and the location was in the mountains. It is a satisfactory accommodation as a whole and goes well.

Unique, comfortable and a very relaxing spot away from everything. The rounded hut was spacious, had a nice shower and comfortable bed with your own balcony too. The view was stunning when you got it (Quite foggy when we went). The hut is located in a resort with a few different huts and the area is beautifully managed and feels private. The only downside is the location which is remote and away from the main attractions, Sa Pa and restaurants. Harder to get taxi/grabs because the road is pretty bumpy/bad to navigate as you'll find out. Hosts were very helpful and have a small menu for breakfast and dinner with veggie options. Thank you for letting us stay
I had a wonderful stay at here. The view was absolutely stunning. Waking up to that view was a real highlight of the stay. Would definitely stay again if I’m back in Sapa!

Deep in the countryside, but spoiled with stunning views. The road to get there is quite challenging. It’s fine during the day, but at night, going out is nearly impossible. Even Grab drivers won’t accept rides because it’s too far from the city . Overall its worth it with the view and price 🥰
We had the pleasure experience of staying at Rock Garden and were thoroughly impressed by the hospitality and service throughout our stay (the host was delivered our breakfast in a stormy morning).

Nagyszerű szállás, nagyszerű vendéglátóval. Hihetetlen természeti csoda közepén, nagyon csendes helyen fekszik, távol Sapa túristás zajától. Nagyon jól éretúk magunkat, a vendéglátó kivételesen kedves és segítőkész volt. A szállásra egy-két felújítási munka ráférne már, de a környezet és a vendéglátó hozzáállása feledteti ezt. Bármikor visszamennénk.

Very good homestay and preferably for those who want to be away from the city chaos. Very peaceful location though not to do much nearby which makes this place best for those who want to spent sometime in peace.
Staff is very helpful. Food is good. Rooms are neat and clean.
Must recommended place.
Such a beautiful stay! It’s a bit secluded and a bit far from Sapa town, but the view is unbeatable. We even can hear the birds singing and crickets chipping. Will surely come back.

Immaculate view. The food was so good. We ordered chicken and mushrooms brisket. Best thing ever. Big serving too. Very clean place and nice boulders. I’d climb them if I brought my shoes. The place has a great potential to be a rock climbing destination.
Staff was friendly and the transport service was seamless. We stopped by the Alpine Coaster and only added 50k VND on top. Pool was cold.
Will be back again when it is sea of clouds season.

This was one of the most stunning air BnB experiences we’ve had! The views from this place are sublime. We loved watching the mountains as they changed through the day. The people who run the Rock Garden Homestay are friendly and sweet and can’t do enough to accommodate. Their food is delicious and well priced too. We were sad to leave - what a memorable experience!

We had an incredible stay! it was rainy and cloudy when we arrived, but the view cleared up with the sunrise each morning. We used the taxi number the host provided. it's a rough ride up the mountain but that driver was excellent! delicious breakfast and dinner, and just a very cozy, welcoming vibe. there was heat in the cabin, but dress warm for everything else.
가는 길은 조금 험난했지만 뷰가 너무너무 아름다웠습니다! 조식도 좋았어요

El sitio es espectacular, las vistas inmejorables y a nosotros nos gustó que estuviera alejado de la ciudad porque te permite integrarte más con la cultura.
Todo genial muy buen sitio para quedarse.

The road to the place is a rough road. I think the room would be really nice if you go there during summer or dry weather. During our stay it was rainy and the view was just white with fog. The staff are accommodating. Appreciate them helping us out with our luggages since it’s a stairway path to the room. The food is okay too. You have the option to have it brought in the room. Was only disappointed that the pool was inaccessible. It was not even properly kept so we were not even able to take photos from that spot. Wish it was mentioned to us upon booking. All in all, if your timing is right and the weather bears with you, it’s worth the price for the view and peaceful vibe of the place.

Place with an Amazing view!
Host is responsive and helpful.
There are no restaurants nearby but there is an in-house menu to choose from.
Best to book the taxi provided on this list to avoid getting lost and being ripped-off by other taxi drivers.

Our stay was amazing! The views did not disappoint. The staff were friendly and very helpful, which made the experience even better. We truly enjoyed every moment and would definitely recommend this place to anyone :)

장점 : 뷰는 사진과 동일하고 식사 또한 만족했습니다. 직원들도 소통하려 하는게 느껴집니다.
단점: 욕실 및 시트 청결도가 아쉬웠고 숙소 위치가 좋질 못해 체크아웃시 GRAP이 오질않아 다른곳을 이동하려면 숙소에서 불러주는 택시 이용해야 하는데 그랩가격의 30프로가 더 가산되었습니다.
경험 많고 전문적인 관리인이 관리하지 않으면 도태될 가능성이 💯%

The whole area of the homestay is beautiful and peaceful, surrounded by lush greeneries and serving majestic views. The cabin itself also provides amazing panoramic views of the fields below – that is, if you’re lucky. During half of our stay the fog was too thick. Luckily it did clear up in the afternoon and the next morning. The room smelled weird but everything was clean. Hot water did not work.
We brought our own food and ordered white rice & omelette from the kitchen as they didn’t have halal option. But they accommodated our request and even advised us which of their breakfast menu contained pork/meat. Nice stay to just chill. We took the recommended taxi and as expected the ride was pretty rough but I’d say it was worth a stay for one night.
The roundhouse offered a beautiful mountain view of the the village below. It felt like looking at a widescreen tv and a breathtaking view of the surroundings and nature
I enjoyed the magnificent view during my stay, the weather was great. It’s worth to stay here and very rocemmended. The host is friendly and helpful too.

I’ve stayed here a couple of times now and always love coming back. The view is absolutely stunning, perfect for a relaxing getaway in Sapa. The host is incredibly friendly and helpful, making the stay even more enjoyable. The location is great too, close to Cat Cat Village and surrounded by the beauty of Sapa’s mountains and valleys. Just a heads-up: there are some stairs to reach the room

Nếu bạn đang tìm kiếm một nơi để tạm gác lại nhịp sống hối hả, thì trải nghiệm ở Pavi chắc chắn là một lựa chọn lý tưởng. Tôi đã có dịp lưu trú tại một homestay nhỏ xinh nằm cheo leo trên sườn núi, nơi mà mỗi sáng thức dậy là khung cảnh mây mù lững lờ trôi ngang hiên nhà, ruộng bậc thang xanh rì trải dài vô tận. Không khí ở đây trong lành, mát lạnh và tinh khiết đến mức chỉ cần hít thở thôi cũng đủ thấy dễ chịu. Người dân địa phương thì thân thiện và hiếu khách đến lạ – họ sẵn sàng chia sẻ bữa cơm, câu chuyện, và cả những tiếng cười. Điều khiến tôi ấm lòng nhất là sự xuất hiện của vài chú chó dễ thương luôn lẽo đẽo theo tôi mỗi lần đi dạo. Cảm giác như được trở về với thiên nhiên, với sự giản dị và chân thành hiếm có – một nơi đáng để quay lại thêm nhiều lần.
Ngoài ra Pavi còn 1 khu vườn nơi bạn có thể trải nghiệm vẽ tranh với sự hướng dẫn của cô chủ. Bạn có còn thể tự vẽ tranh và mang về. Rất cảm ơn vì trải nghiệm thú vị này

The place was amazing and the views were exactly like what was shown in the listing. The host spoke English and was a very kind and helpful person. He even arranged a cab for us at a very reasonable price. We were pleasantly surprised at the included breakfast.
The only con I had with the place was that it was a bit dusty. The room could have been maintained a little better.

We had the most incredible stay here. The location provided amazing views and a peaceful environment. Pavi was extremely kind and helpful, giving us plenty of recommendations and making sure we were always comfortable.
The food was made to order and was fantastic. We visited Pavi garden too, which again gave great views and food. I cannot recommend enough!!

amazing place to stay at. great locals, pavi’s food was amazing. motorcycle rental services and laundry services were really convenient. dogs and cat were really friendly. overall really amazing stay. thank you so much!
Pavi's Homestay is very peaceful and has a breathtaking view. The Host was very friendly and helpful. Had a great stay there.

One of the best Airbnb’s I had the pleasure to stay at :D The family was very welcoming and very proactive with helping us get to places by organizing a driver for us — since the place was a bit far from the center :) The place was just as described — a beautiful ambience with nature and peace. The breakfast was amazing and the view also (if it wasn’t foggy). The host was always so polite and chatty, recommending us things and telling us more things about Sapa :D I will always remember his hospitality and the conversation I had with him — definitely recommend this place if you need a local stay with nice people and nature!! Super clean, comfortable and welcoming!!
山の上なのでどうかなと思っていましたが、Wi-Fiも問題なく繋がり、シャワーの水圧や温度も問題なく、快適に過ごせました。私の滞在期間には、あまり天気が良くなかったのが残念でしたが、それでも綺麗で穏やかな景色に癒されました。

멋진전망과 평화로운 숙소.
살갑고 이쁜 고양이와 강아지들.
베트남 최고 요리사 잭이 만들어주는 최고의 조식 및 음식.
곰팡이 냄새가 나는 방이지만 위의 장점들로인해 용서됩니다.

It was a wonderful way to connect with the local culture. Pavi and the guy who runs the inn are extremely kind. The weather was bad and it was cold outside, but my room was very warm. There were some mosquitoes, and they immediately helped me with mosquito coils. Of course, it’s a very simple place, where you might find some insects (it’s right in the middle of the rice fields), but the view in the morning as soon as you wake up is truly refreshing.
I highly recommend it!

Host was very responsive, helpful and friendly throughout the stay. Thoroughly enjoyed our stay with Pavi Home. Amazing view and vibes. Special shoutout to the dogs and cats roaming the home. Slightly further from city centre but the serene and peaceful views more than make up for the distance. Will definitely recommend it to anyone looking for a homestay with great views!

Must VISIT . Amazing stunning view and the best part Was doggos there more than 10 - 15 including puppies ❤️
Definitely for a pet parent 😍
Nothing to say, dep vai lon, thats what my friends said. Send love to aunt May and sister Dinh. We will miss you, alot

Nous avons été échantés de notre séjour. Très bien reçu, hôte très réactif et gentil ainsi que sa famille.
Endroit paisible avec vue sur les montagnes dont on ne se lasse pas !
Les chiens et le chat sont très mignons et participent à la douceur du séjour.
Nous recommandons fortement !

Chambre à la hauteur de nos attentes, ras sur ce point.
par contre gros bémol sur l'emplacement qui est à 30 min du centre de Sapa, ducoup ça vous coûte environ 17€ aller/retour par jours, ce qui fait grimper le prix de la chambre et donc est a prendre en compte !

If you want to relax and unwind in Sapa this is the place to go. Also they offer Trekking adventure with a local guide, you will see spectacular views of mountains.  Jack the manager is very helpful and attentive to our needs. If you want to go to the city, he’ll arrange a transport for you. Also he prepares a good dinner bbq and hotpot as well!

Beautiful homestay about 30 minutes from Sapa town. We loved spending time with the sweet dogs and cats on the property—they were super friendly and always up for cuddles! The manager was very accommodating and quickly helped us switch to a room with air conditioning when we realized our initial room didn’t have it. Overall, a lovely and welcoming stay! Would highly recommend ordering the barbeque set for dinner. It was such a great experience.

Had a very pleasant time at Pavi House. Great location with serene and nice view surrounded by the hills and rice fields.
Host was very responsive and helpful. They also accomodate the pickup services to/from sapa city center.
Not forget to mention how are we having a good time for being able to play with Pavi House’s dogs and cat! ❤️🥰
Great customer review, very friendly with us, great accommodations and very scenic views
Super lieber Besitzer, war immer erreichbar und hat mir sehr weiter geholfen. Ich komme gerne wieder.

Staying at Pavi Home was one of the best decisions made for this trip to Sapa. The view is amazing and the room was extremely cosy. The cute pets there are an added bonus! The location is slightly out of the way as it’s in the mountains, but you can arrange a driver with the host Jack who is always responsive and helpful. He allowed us to check in early with a small fee, which was fine with us as we arrived at 6am and needed a space to freshen up.
Jack is also such a great chef and cooked amazing meals for us! He provides great tips on where to visit in Sapa, and facilitates private treks with the local Hmong villagers who are so kind and helpful.
Do note however that if you’re visiting in Summer, bugs are inevitable. There were a few that flew in but Jack kindly fitted some door stoppers to block them out. They also helped to clean our room when we requested for it. Overall, we truly enjoyed our entire experience at the homestay and I would definitely stay at Pavi Home again!
We had a great time at Pavi, the breakfast and diner are fabulous. Do try the vegetable curry from Jack. Their hospitality is so good.
Very cozy place to stay, around 20 mins by car from Sa Pa center. Very good food, a lot of dogs and cats to play with. 10/10 would recommend

Though we visited Sapa during winter and the weather was terrible, Pavi's home warmed us up and made the whole experience awesome. Will miss this place and all its furry friends. Will definitely visit again. Do try out their painting workshop, it was amazing!

Pavi Home is an amazing place to rest, take a deep breath and enjoy the beautiful views! The place has amazing scenery and its hosts are so so so helpful and very accommodating. They helped us with everything and we pretty much used every suggestion. The rooms are very nicely designed with a huge window looking out to the mountains and ricefields. This offer is for people who love very authentic experiences - from the tea to the trekking with the local tour guide and herbal bath! We absolutely loved it and we want to come back in summer time next time 💕 a big plus for the friendly dogs and cats 💕

Great host and beautiful tree house. We had dinner, which was delicious. Everything was very flexible, we arrived very early in the morning but the host offered us breakfast. We could also check in early and store our luggage. Would definitely recommend this place if you are planning on visiting sapa!

The accommodation offers a quiet retreat from the often lively and noisy Sapa City. Nevertheless, the center can be reached quickly and easily on foot. You can also simply hire a scooter from the accommodation. The host of the accommodation is always friendly and incredibly accommodating. It made our stay even sweeter. The accommodation is a clear recommendation for Sapa, especially if you want to stay in the "jungle".

What a great stay and service! The homestay is a gem, the trees surrounding the place give a very relaxing atmosphere. Beautiful and clean room. The highlight of the stay was the host, communication was amazing and the lady was beyond helpful, answering every question and providing everything we need, including activity bookings. would definitely recommend!

We had a great time at this Jungle Homestay! The view was incredible, and it was tucked away from the noise of the city without being a far walk. The room was clean and comfortable, and came with a mosquito net for bugs. Bathroom had real shampoo, and lots of extras in case you forgot anything.
Our Host was very welcoming and responsive, and helped us book a cheap cab when we left. Cheap scooter rentals as well! The homemade meals were some of the best we have had on our trip so far. 10/10 would stay here again!

absolutely beautiful place to stay.
Amazing views and such good value for money.
Everybody was welcoming, extremely friendly and very very helpful.
I can't recommend this place enough, it's truly wonderful!!
fantastic hosts!!

This was a little treasure in Sapa, nestled on the hill overlooking the city surrounded by trees and lush nature. The staff were friendly and kind and the space was spectacular. The only downside is the town square plays loud music until around 10pm at night, but afterwards it is peaceful and quiet. A lovely stay for a couple especially if you prefer being out of the main part of the city 🌿✨

Stayed here for two nights and were amazed by the treatment we received from the workers. They provided photos and map directions on how to get there by foot or by car. We were given an electric blanket and heater as it got cold at night. Any questions or concerns we had they were easily answered and taken care of for us! This is a great place to unwind and take in the beautiful views of Sapa, so highly recommend booking here for your travels 😊

A beautiful unique treehouse experience.
Fantastic location as the views were amazing and it was slightly away from the noise of the city.
Min was a delightful host and super helpful organising a tour and tickets for me.
All meals at the home were lovely and very generous.
I would highly recommend a stay here.

The tree house was a novelty experience. Unfortunately the weather was very poor and did impact the quality of our experience but i imagine that its fantastic when the weather is clear and you can enjoy the view and surroundings. Our host was friendly and it is nice that they include breakfast which we got to enjoy by the fire in the common room. Id like to stay again.

We had such a beautiful, magical stay here and loved our little jungle home!!! It was so sweet and cosy. Loved the familial atmosphere, everyone from all walks off like from all over the world gathering and hanging out together in the common spaces. The hosts were so accommodating and amazing chefs! And the DOGS and little kitty. So damn cute, I fell in love! Definitely wanted to take them home with me 😂 Overall a wonderful place and had a really lovely stay.

Wenn man sich ein Dschungelabenteuer wünscht, wird es hier definitiv geboten.
Der Gastgeber war sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit.
Die Umgebung und die Pflanzen sind großartig.
Liebe Grüße.
We hebben een heerlijk verblijf gehad in deze superfijne boomhut. Het bed was heerlijk en de douche was heel goed. Personeel is zeer vriendelijk en willen graag helpen. super bedankt!🌸

Environnement très agréable, proche de la nature et très reposant. Hôte très agréable et réactif.
Le moins est la nourriture, un peu décevante dommage au regard du site magnifique
Très bonne literie.

너무 좋아요
한번쯤 자볼만한 곳입니다.
여주인장의 친절함
그리고 베트남 가정식
서비스
친절도 최상입니다.
영어도 잘해서 의사소통 문제없어요

Our stay was wonderful. We were able to contact the hosts before our arrival and receive all the information we needed. The team was super friendly and helpful at all times. We can also highly recommend the dinner. The treehouse offers a great view and you really feel like you're in the jungle.

Wir hatten einen exzellenten Aufenthalt. Das Personal ist super freundlich und hat für uns eine Wandertour gebucht, die ich nur empfehlen kann. auch sonst wurden wir bei allem weiteren sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit unterstütz und konnten unser Gepäck sowohl als auch nach Check-in/Check-out dort lassen. die Baumhäuser haben einen super Ausblick über die Stadt und Berge. ich kann das Sapa Jungle jedem nur empfehlen
Cool place to stay amongst the trees! Staff were friendly and it was a short walk or bike into town. Only downside was after a cold rainy night, the floor inside was very wet. :)

I really enjoyed my stay! It was remote, comfortable with beautiful views of Sapa from the balcony. My only complaint was that it was a little noisy from other guests outside the room and coffee table want included with breakfast. I didn’t find that out until after when I was charged for it

stupenda location!! siamo rimasti una sola notte ma la nostra host è stata meravigliosa, una persona dolcissima che ho apprezzato per la presenza costante, la disponibilità ad aiutarmi a prenotare sia il trekking ( bellissimo) che lo sleep bus per ripartire.
non posso che consigliare vivamente di soggiornare qui!

A very unique experience to sleep in a treehouse. The hospitality of the host - Tien is amazing. She will always help you get to your locations, and always greet you with a warm tea. The only downside is that if you come in winter it may be a bit cold. There is a portable heater and plenty of blankets available though. The walk up is a bit of a hike but I recommend this as a good point because it gets really noisy at night in the main streets and you wouldn't be able to rest properly there.

The team is incredibly kind and fun. It’s in a great location close to Sa Pa town, but still far enough away for a relaxing & peaceful stay. There are heaters for the cold months and the food is amazing!

Super séjour dans une jolie cabane . Nous sommes bercés par les grincements du bois dans la cabane . C’est une expérience insolite . ( d’ailleurs c’est assez sport pour y accédé avec les valises )
Tous le personnel étaient aux petits soins . Les activités étaient organisés à l’avance et j’ai payé à la fin .
Sapa c’est magnifique et loger dans cette cabane à rendu notre voyage exceptionnel.
Merci 🙏🏻♥️

We really enjoyed the stay, we loved the natural surroundings, friendly people and animals. They had a portable heater and a heated blanket, which helped us sleep really well and warm. Also, they had good options for complimentary breakfast. Very easy access for walking to Sapa's market. The host is very responsive and helpful.

We absolutely loved our stay here! The host was the most helpful host we’ve ever had and was always available for any questions we had. We loved the inclusive breakfast and enjoyed our mornings with coffee on the balcony playing with all the animals. The surroundings were so quiet and peaceful yet so close to all the action in Sapa. Highly recommend staying here
Great homestay with probably the best view in Sapa. Amazing scenery with nice rooms facing Ta Van village and Fansipan. Huong was a very nice host. Very much recommended.

This has to have the BEST view of any homestay in Sapa and it gets the sun till late in the afternoon, stunning location and beautiful property.  Huong was an incredible host and gave us some brilliant recommendations, helped book us a guide for Fansipan, and let us check in late at night! She went above and beyond to make our stay memorable and it was massively appreciated!

The 4 of us stayed here for 1 night (wish it could've been longer).
Pro's
1. Host was responsive and accommodating
2. Stunning view of the river and mountain
3. Friendly and approachable staff
4. Affordable
Con's
1. 20mins away from the city center and no establishments nearby
2. Room and pillows had a smell not sure how to explain it
3. A bit difficult to book multiple rooms even though they have a total of 19 rooms
Overall, the place and people were nice. We definitely loved our stay. If you want a peaceful and quiet stay away from all the hustle and bustle of Sa Pa Center, this is a place you can go to.

We had an amazing stay at this beautiful homestay in Sa Pa! Everything from the room to the service exceeded our expectations. The views are absolutely breathtaking — especially from the pool, which overlooks the valley and makes for the perfect sunset spot. Sunrise is just as magical, with several viewpoints on the property that offer panoramic 360-degree views after just a short walk up a few stairs.
Our host, Hanna, was fantastic. She was incredibly responsive, super helpful, and speaks excellent English. She knows the area inside out and gave us great local tips that made our stay even more memorable.
We highly recommend this place to anyone visiting Sa Pa — peaceful, scenic, and welcoming in every way!

Amazing stay here, the rooms were spacious and super clean. The views were amazing and so was the fried rice! Huong made our stay so welcoming and even asked us to join their family party.
Slightly out of the touristy area but perfect for us.
Thanks a lot!
Holly

Thi was very responsive, and her brother was friendly and welcoming.
That said, there are a few things to note. The cleanliness of the bathroom and linens could be improved. The hotel is located about 30 minutes away (on foot) from the nearest good restaurants, and the walk involves quite a bit of climbing. To avoid walking along a busy road for an hour, we chose to have dinner at the hotel.
Dinner must be ordered in advance, and it’s not possible to add dishes on the spot like in a regular restaurant. While the food was nice, it’s tricky to know exactly how much you’ll want to eat ahead of time.
After a few days, we moved to another accommodation in the heart of a village where we could easily walk to different restaurants — we personally preferred being closer to more dining options.
One unpleasant experience was being woken up by loud karaoke around 10:30 pm, which continued past 11:30 pm.
Nice place and rallye Nice view! I am delighted to have spent a short stay there. I recommend it for those who want to live in nature.
very nice homestay and nice view , highly recommend to stay here and enjoy the view every sunset or sunrise 🩵👍🏻 i will come again see you
The stand out point of this place is the view, it was beautiful. the room was good and amenities like the pool were always accessable.

We had a great stay at the homestay, enjoyed every bit of it! The rooms were squeaky clean and special shout out to the host Huong who let us checkin early with a small fee and also upgraded us to villa room by taking just 100,000 dong per day! Although the airbnb mentioned kitchen in the list of amenities but let me tell you guys, no they do not have any kitchen.
But our host Huong was so kind to let me cook my baby food in her restaurant kitchen, again thanks to her.
Also, the swimming pool provides a spectacular view!! We had a fun time swimming in that beautiful surrounding, mountains and rice fields view was breathtaking!!

It was such a lovely perfect place to leave in.
What we loved:
- the view
- the view x2
- the rooms were big (they also have smaller rooms though, but with cheaper price)
- the beds were comfy
- there is a pool
- the roosters and koi fish and big swings (it is child friendly)
- they have massage and hot baths with herbs
- you are in the most beautiful part of Sa Pa
I don’t see why someone would want yo stay in Sa Pa city, I tried it for 2 nights and I preferred to drive to spots I want to visit 15-20 min than stay in the city.
There are things that can be done better but nothing worth mentioning. It is a gem.
The breakfast can be less plain, maybe. Still the pancakes were nice
love this place and its view. The host was flexible with check in and time.

Séjour parfait !
Hôte et personnels de l’hôtel très accueillant et agréables !
Je recommande :)

Nous avons passé un très bon séjour. L'hôte est très réactive et très gentille, sa famille également. La chambre est spacieuse et la vue est incroyable ! Le signal wifi est correct et la télévision est connectée à internet. La literie est propre et le lit confortable (un peu dur pour ceux qui aiment les matelas mous, mais cela ne nous a pas dérangés). Nous avons pu louer des scooters pour nous balader aux alentours à un prix très correct : deux jours pour 350 000 dongs. Pour le petit-déjeuner, vous avez le choix entre deux plats (phở ou banh mi aux œufs) avec thé ou café.
Nous avons également utilisé le service de taxi (200 000 dongs par trajet) de l’hôtel au centre-ville de Sapa (8 km).
Il propose également un service de spa/massage/bain, etc. Nous n’avons pas eu le temps de tester ces services.
Pour un petit coin de paradis à Sapa, je vous le conseille pour la vue, la tranquillité, la gentillesse, le confort et la propreté des lieux. 😁
Great place with awesome view! Room is clean and big, high recommended to everyone.
Love this place and definitely coming back in the future!

Rock Garden was so beautiful!!! It was exactly like the photos, very private and peaceful. The recommended taxi driver on the listing was awesome. He was a great, responsive driver, despite the 20 minute bumpy pothole drive from town to the homestay. The food was pretty good, lots of options for dinner and free breakfast. Overall fantastic place with incredible views and close to the town for a day trip.

Located just 20mins ride from city centre, be prepared for a bumpy ride.
View was incredible, we could see clouds drifting by.
Dinner menu was extensive and we got a bbq set for 2.
Only downside was a slightly mouldy toilet with 1-2 spider webs.
Other than that, highly recommended 5 star Airbnb 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟

The place is exactly how the photos show! The views are absolutely stunning! Wait till about 4-5 pm for the best views (this is in June) There is a bathtub outdoors in addition to the bathroom attached to the room. I didn't expect the bathtub/shower outdoors to be functional but it functions perfectly well! We also absolutely loved the food at the restaurant attached to the property! Simple and hearty. The two girls who helped us wiyh the check in arw extremely helpful and kind. And the star of the place is Nana, the Alaskan malamute!

아침에는 자연경관, 밤에는 야경이 숙소 페이지와 동일하며 멋있었습니다. 그리고 큰 강아지와 고양이가 있는데 너무 귀여웠습니다.
근데 처음 숙소에 들어갈 때가 밤이었는데, 밤에 들어간 숙소는 나방떼들로 덮여있어 바깥 전경을 볼 수 없었습니다. 나방이 빛에 끌리는 걸 알고 있지만 한국에 도시사는 사람으로써는 너무 많아서 불편했습니다! 그리고 아침에는 유리창에 여전히 나방 몇마리가 붙어있었고 나방똥 또는 나방알로 보이는 것들이 창문에 붙어있어서 개인적으로 조금 무서웠습니다.
그리고 숙소 안은 산 속 특성인지 몰라도 어디론가 침투한 작은 벌레와 개미들이 보이고, 침대 위 조명에 거미줄, 그리고 침구류 및 방석이 더러웠습니다. 제일 중요한 건 플러스 꺼진 침대와 침대 안 작은 벌레가 있었다는 거입니다.
그외 사진과 동일한 화장실은 멋스럽기도 했지만 마감 미처리와 변기커버 불량이었고 세면대 디자인이 좀 불편해 많이 아쉬웠습니다.
저는 벌레를 막 무서워하는 스타일은 아니라서 바퀴벌레도 잡으라면 잡는 사람인데도 여기 숙서에 벌레 양은 익숙하지 않기 때문에 캠핑을 즐겨본 사람 아니면 한국 사람들은 비추합니다!
