The accommodation has a very good view, exactly as shown in the picture. I like it very much. It is private and relaxing, but the journey may be a bit difficult. If I have a chance, I will go back again. ❤️

Amazing host, amazing place. I had a wonderful time, I’m not a fan of anything that crawls or flies but it was worth it for the view and the peacefulness. She includes a bed net which was great. The food was amazing and you enjoy it with a breath taking view. 20/30 min drive to town, many shops and restaurants and nearby any excursions. Colder than Hanoi for sure, needed sweatpants and a sweater. I really enjoyed my stay here. And Hoang and her staff made sure I had everything I needed.

Wow what an incredible view! I don’t think the photos do it justice. Even if there is fog really cool watching it go past but we were lucky with how clear it was. The host was incredible, we had a minor issue and she was so understanding and helped straight away. The free breakfast was a nice touch and very yummy. If you’re coming for a getaway in the mountains this is the perfect place! Not very close to much else but they have a restaurant. About 10 minutes drive from alpine rollercoaster and 30 mins from town. Such a lovely stay- thank you !!

We had such a splendid time staying at Hoang's place. It was such a serene experience; away from the hustle and bustle of the city. While it was around 30 minutes away from the city, the stay made it all worthwhile. The mesmerizing view coupled with friendly caretakers (and two adorable dogs) made the stay worthwhile. Highly recommend!

The staff were extremely friendly and the room was amazing! Such a picturesque view! Their recommendation for a taxi into town was much cheaper than others quoted and also extremely friendly. I would highly recommend staying here.

The road to the location was quite scary especially as we came during a very foggy day. The place was clean. They serve food for dinner. We ordered bbq set for 2 and they gave us a lot. I think it would be enough for 4 people. Would have been better of they also offered rice. Since it was foggy day, we did not see the view as expected. Nevertheless, we enjoyed our stay as it was very peaceful and relaxing there.

Une vue incroyable, à couper le souffle vraiment ! Là haut on se sent seul au monde.
Par contre, attention le logement est assez loin de Sapa et la route est très accidentée, peu de taxis ou grab acceptent de vous amenez jusqu'au logement...

Absolutely beautiful location - we were so lucky to have a clear day so we could admire the views from our room. The meals cooked by the host were some of the best we’ve had in Vietnam. Unfortunately the outdoor bath didn’t heat up and the infinity pool was filthy so we weren’t able to swim at all

Amazing location and views stick around for early afternoon to get the best views. 12-2. The ride there and back is a bit far. At night the ride there is an experience for sure. Definitely great if you want to be away from it all with breathtaking views. 10/10

sometimes no hot water supply, this is the 1 point feel regretful. The paid worth for view and environment, nice place for relax and chill, if the main road to homestay can be more smooth this should be a very nice place

Really beautiful location. Not the easiest to get to because of the road conditions however we did decide to come during the rainy part or the year so all is expected. Very good food provided at the accommodation as well! Lots of friendly dogs too so always a bonus :)

ทางไปที่พัก ถนนค่อนข้างแย่ ขรุขระตลอดทาง
ไปถึงที่พัก พนักงานน่ารักมากช่วยขนกระเป๋า แต่พอขากลับเราให้ช่วยขนกระเป๋า เขาช่วยขนนะ แต่ถือกระเป๋าเราไม่ค่อยดี ยางที่หุ้มล้อหลุดหมดเลย
ขณะสั่งอาหารเขาชอบคุยกัน ไม่ค่อยสนใจเราเท่าไหร่
ห้องพักตรงปก แต่ก็ค่อนข้างเก่านิดหน่อย
วิวสวย ราคาคิดว่าแอบแรง ไม่มีอาหารเช้าให้
แต่โดยรวมพอใจ กับวิวที่ได้ แต่คงไม่ซ้ำ

Wow! We cannot recommend this place enough. Our jaws were on the floor as we walked in. Looks exactly like the pictures, and is even more incredible in person. Included breakfast was great, and we ordered dinner in our room. Tub is outside and is visible from other locations, so I'd recommend a swimming suit if you are to use it. We rented a motorbike in town and drove to the airbnb ourselves (though the host offers to arrange taxi pickup). It was a very adventurous drive, but if you are down for adventure, it was incredible. Be sure to set your directions to the "walking" path from Sa Pa, it will cut the drive in half (took us about 25 minutes, vs 45 on main road). The alpine slide is also on the drive, which is well worth the stop. Highly highly recommend, it's like Switzerland 2.0. Be warned, the doors do not seal fully on the bottom, so there were a couple creepy crawlies, but worth it for the views!

tempat best gilaaa! best place to stay! view? sangat cantikkkk! the view was so amazing!
breakfast so delicious. the staff was very nice and cute (LV girl) 😆

The place had absolutely stunning views, no matter the weather. It was at the top of a mountain, and the room reflected that fact with some rock features, but that left a lot of homes for bugs. We spent a month in Vietnam, so bugs weren't surprising, but this place took it to a new level.  A mosquito net was provided. The pool was right above the room but was not maintained, so it was half full and a breeding ground for bugs, adding to the issue. It also wasn't the cleanest, with some hygiene concerns. There was mold due to the humidity. The place was also a long way from town, despite being only a couple of kilometers away. That is not the host's fault, and they had a kitchen that served fine food. It is important to note, in case you are like us and don't have a motorbike, that there was hardly anything besides one open restaurant within walking distance. The hosts were friendly and the property had plenty of photo area. It is the Rock Garden Homestay on Google.

Utsikten var bedre enn på bildene, og verten var veldig behjelpelig med alt fra bestilling av biletter til anbefalinger på fjellturer.
Det er en god del innsekter på rommet, og det kunne vært renere.
Totalt sett så anbefaler jeg denne plassen.

Hoang Hai's Rock Garden Stay in Sapa was a very picturesque and peaceful nature stay for our honeymoon.  Waking up to a sea of clouds covering the valley of terraces in Sapa was a priceless experience. The hosts were also very helpful in linking us up with transportation service from Hanoi to the AirBnB stay and to a local taxi driver to help us get back and forth from the Airbnb Stay to Sapa Town Proper. The road itself going to the Airbnb stay is a bit rocky but you could see the exciting developments around Sapa which reflects its boom as a tourist destination. The resident pets (cats and dogs) were also very friendly and made our stay more comfortable. Thank you once again to our hosts for a memorable stay!
Très bon séjour ! La vue était à couper le souffle. Le logement était propre et correspondait totalement aux photos. Les repas proposés étaient bons. Et le petit déjeuner inclus était délicieux.

Die unterkunft war gemütlich und schön, bei gutem wetter gibt es eine tolle aussicht. Das personal war sehr liebevoll, zuvorkommend und freundlich. Die lage ist gut, jedoch sehr abseits vom zentrum. Das essen dort ist auch köstlich.

Bonjour,
Hébergement au calme avec théoriquement une vue incroyable ( dame nature ne s est pas montrée clémente avec nous, brouillard) mais se qui n a en rien gâché notre séjour.
Des hôtes adorables, une cuisine excellente, dans un écrin de verdure et de poésie.
Merci pour tout

A really central location, situated right in the Sapa Centre with walking distance to all the restaurants. Easy to navigate and there is a mart right beside if you need to stock up on snacks or essentials.
The accommodation is clean. Loved that the fridge is also stocked up with noodles, eggs and fresh fruits.
10/10 recommend.

The check in was easy and the apartment was very easy to find. The supermarket is within the building so very useful. The location is very central and there are lots of restaurants and cafes nearby. It is also perfect if you want to go up Fansipan.
The bathroom was nice and modern, however the rest of the apartment needed doing up slightly.
But overall, a great stay.

The apartment which we booked was small for our group. But the host was very co-operative and agreed to upgrade it at a reasonable price. The upgraded one was pretty spacious and clean. Location of the property is right in the centre you can easily walk around. Amazing experience

Our stay at this apartment was truly exceptional. The space was impeccably clean, stylishly decorated, and incredibly cozy, providing the perfect home away from home. The restaurants and apartments with beautiful lights were magical and were the best spots for photos. The location was ideal—quiet yet close to local markets and restaurants, allowing easy exploration. The host was warm, responsive, and attentive, ensuring a smooth check-in and offering helpful local tips. Modern amenities like fast Wi-Fi and a fully equipped kitchen added great convenience. This apartment exceeded all expectations, making our Sapa trip unforgettable. We highly recommend it to anyone visiting Sapa.

The accommodation fits perfectly for my family of 4. There was adequate space for everyone and a common area for us to mingle. There is hot water for shower and aircon in the room. The accommodation is very clean.
The accommodation is walking distance to the town square and convenient to get a grab. The host had provided welcome fruits and bottled water. There is also washing machine and dryer available in the building. Overall, it is a very pleasant stay! Cảm ơn rất nhiều!

Fantastic stay here in Sa Pa. Beautiful apartment and the host went over and above to supply us with plenty of water, fresh fruit, jam and bread. Loved the layout of the apartment and everything was very clean. Step outside straight into the main square of Sa Pa

The location is very good, the apartment was cosy, everything you need for a trip. The price could be way better though, I felt I was overpaying.
They accepted me to check out later and to modify my trip with one night even 2 days before our arrival, that was great.
You have some basic things inside the house to make yourself a breakfast, super appreciated.
For everyone who really wants to stay in Sa Pa city (although I recommend just stay in the villages as it is way more beautiful) this is a good choise if you are a family (for a couple it is too big)

We cannot complain even about a single thing. We had at our disposal a very spacious apartment with two en suite bedrooms each of them for four people. There was a kitchen, dining room and laundry service available in the public space. Breakfast is included in the price and unlike other places in Vietnam there are ingredients to prepare something for yourself. We even had fresh pineapples. There is also an option to leave luggage in the lobby, which is extremely useful if you want to hike in the neighborhood of SaPa. Overall, great place, highly recommended.

Our stay surpassed all my expectations. The blend of exceptional service, comfortable accommodations, and a fantastic location makes it a must-visit. The room was spotless, spacious, and had all the amenities we needed. We especially loved the breathtaking view from my window, which enhanced my experience. The hotel's location is ideal—close to major attractions while still providing a tranquil atmosphere.

The place was absolutely awesome. Near to everything and every place that you want to visit. It is clean especially the bathroom is huge. It really feels like home inside. In regards with the host,the host is super responsive to all our queries and all the things that we needed. They even have some complementaries goodies for us. Overall our stay is really awesome.

Can request for bed linen changed if you are not satisfied 🙂
The apartment is big and feels like home.

We stayed here for 3 days and had a great experience, it rained the whole time but that didn't stop us from enjoying our stay. One of the highlights was how warmly we were welcomed despite arriving earlier than the standard check-in time, the staff accommodated us right away and even offered welcome food, major points for tired and slightly soggy travelers after a long trip.
This place is in a fantastic location just a short walk to Sapa Center and our unit has a clear view of the Sun Plaza. Even in the fog and rain, the misty views were stunning picture perfect.
The room was simple but clean and cozy, perfect for relaxing after exploring. The staff were friendly and helpful throughout our stay, and the atmosphere felt peaceful.
Overall, Moc Studio gave us a comfortable, convenient, and laid back homey vibe in Sapa. Highly recommended, especially for travelers who appreciate good service and a great location!
Very satisfied! The apartment fully matches the description and pictures in the listing. The host was incredibly helpful and responsive. The apartment was very clean and perfectly prepared.
좋은위치 깔끔한시설 친절한안내 감사합니다
nothing bad to say. Location was great and host was responsive
Lovely apartment in great location. Minh was very responsive and helpful!
Lovely place in central Sapa. The apartment was well equipped with food, water and cooking equipment. Only downside was that hot water for the showers were limited.
The host is really friendly and supported all what I need. And he is communicates quickly! House is also spacious. But it's a shame that the house is humid.

Perfect spot and beautiful place! Service and communication was easy using Airbnb’s chat. The kitchen had all the amenities you can wish for. The toilet was spacious and modern. Location was perfect, smack in the middle of town, without the noise and buzz.

I really love this place, great location, walking distance to sapa station and to everywhere.
Big room room with one double bed and 1 single bed + 1 room with 2 bunk bed. so its perfect for 5 adults
mini market is at down stairs, restaurants anc cafe is walking distance

Minh such very helpful owner, we did earlier check in because our bus was stopped in the early morning. and he pleased us to entry in the morning.. the place was very clean, easy to reach, and close with supermarket also sunplaza. see you in the next future

The apartment was beautiful and freshly appointed, very comfortable for a small family. The beds were very comfy and the AC worked great. It's located right in the heart of town so all the restaurants shops and spas are within easy walking distance. We couldn't recommend it more highly!
사파 중심의 무난한 숙소입니다.
sangat dekat ke sapa center & danau sapa, memudhkan kita akses kemana-mana

Absolutely amazing. The most unique and beautiful homestay I have ever been to. We felt so welcomed, Mai’s family was lovely and the food was the best of all our travels. Plus her home is so beautifully decorated. And the views are incredible. A highlight of our trip. Thank you so much Mai!
Oscar & Maggie

I am so glad I booked this homestay to gain a  real experience of what Sa Pa has to offer. Mai's family was very hospitable and catered for all our needs. The property is quiet and great to walk the area amongst beautiful scenery.  If you want to go into the main town it is easy and cheap to taxi in. We loved this place and highly recommend!

The family wasn't there as we'd hoped but the sister was a excellent host and very friendly with a warm smile. The kitten was very cute and playful. The weather was very cold with lots of cloud with no visibility, not the best time of year to be in the valley of sapa unfortunately, lucky there was a heated blanket.  Place was clean. Food was good. Overall wrong time to be there

It was a pleasure to stay in Mai’s home , the house is even more beautiful in life , located in authentic viet village on the hills. Wooden house  With picturesque view clearly dip you in history , the details of the house amazed us , all house was made by Mai and her husband. And Mai is very friendly and nice person , always help us and support, also we ordered a dinner with wine , and it was very very delicious. We definitely recommend to stay in Chao Lao village instead of touristic SaPa. You will be amazed 100%!

I had the best time at Mai's home, ideally located up in the valley where the region gets the prettier, you will get to enjoy a cosy place to stay and a warm welcome from the family. Mai was really proactive in helping to get to the house, which can be tricky on your own, but it was the best place to go on hikes for the day and coming back felt like a haven. If you are looking for a getaway from the agitation, to have a rest to the sounds of nature, here is your go.

We had the most beautiful time at Mai’s place - calming and relaxing. Mai is an amazing host - very responsive and helpful. In addition, she cooks the most amazing meals! Highly highly recommend. This was our favourite part of our trip to Vietnam

An incredible homestay in the countryside, maybe 30 minutes outside of Sa Pa. Thi (Mai's sister) was a great host! Very responsive, friendly, and had good suggestions for my stay there. On a clear day the scenery is breathtaking, and one could make an entire day just walking around the surrounding area. The place itself is quite nice with a rustic/authentic feel to it, yet with modern amenities. Highly recommended!

Mai ha sido una gran anfitriona, nos ha hecho sentir como en casa, además la comida que hace es espectacular! El lugar es idílico, si lo que quieres es estar rodeado de naturaleza. Muchas gracias por acogernos Mai y familia♥️
Un abrazo de Ariadna, Miquel y Raquel, os esperamos en Mallorca!

Here is a true Vietnamese guest house in surrounding SAPA away from all the noise and city life.  Beautiful lush surroundings.  The guest has is not fancy but appropriate for the area. This is the place to go if you want an experience.

During our stay, the place was covered in fog and we couldn't enjoy the view, but we had a wonderful time chatting with the people we met, playing cards, and doing origami. My 10-year-old son also loved it and is already saying he wants to go back. Thank you very much.

Hien was an excellent host. She was informative about all treks and day trips, accommodating and an excellent chef. The day after our mountain trek we relaxed above the clouds, sipping Mai’s local wine.
Our stay was very relaxing. I will remember the many changing clouds and views forever.

We stayed at Mai’s for 3 nights and it was exactly what we were looking for. It’s about 30mins outside of Sapa town and has some stunning views. It was peaceful, relaxing and made for a great base to explore. Mai and the ladies at the house were super helpful with organising tours and cooking the family dinners every night! Loved it!

We loved staying in Mai’s beautiful guest house and sharing meals and conversations with her sister, Hien. Hien embodies benevolence and is a skilled chef and barista. Hien coordinated several taxis and cooked the best food we ate during our time in and around Sapa. Sadly, we didn’t get to meet Mai and her family in person but Mai was still very supportive coordinating a motorbike rental and checking in on us from afar. If we stayed longer, we would have loved to also get to know Sô (sp?), the Hmong maid, and hear her  perspectives. We connected with other homestay guests during some of the shared meals and in passing. The home and garden are tranquil and inspiring (organic architecture). We loved eating fresh produce from the garden and being able to practice some spring roll assembly. Meow-Meow the kitten was hilarious as sidekick and Bo (sp?) dog is a chiller. There is a 4 km hike down the slope to Ta Van. Taxi to Ta Van~ 45 min, 450k VND depending on weather and road conditi
this is a great place to stay, the scenery is beautiful. the host was amazing. they offer excellent home-cooked meals. will definitely want to return in the future :)

Mai war sehr nett, es ist bestimmt ein schöner Ort bei schönem Wetter.
Als wir da waren, war es sehr kalt. Es gab im Haus keine Heizung, der offene Kamin hat extrem den Raum verraucht, so dass man alle Fenster öffnen musste. Innen war es genauso kalt wie draußen, bei uns ca. 8 Grad.
Das Haus ist sicherlich 30 Minuten holprige Autofahrt von Sapa entfernt, es gibt keine Läden, keine Restaurants, man ist komplett auf die Versorgung durch die Familie angewiesen.
Davon abgesehen, wurden wir von Mai aufs wärmste empfangen, und unsere verfrühte Abreise wurde verständnisvoll aufgenommen.

Lovely property in a remote and rustic location. Hien (property manager) was very friendly, responsive, flexible and hospitable. Had a couple of meals with them which was home made with good spread. Vegetables were from their home grown garden which was really nice. The cabin was quaint and the size was good enough for 2 people. Highly recommended.

Our stay at Mai’s place was absolutely incredible. We felt right at home from the moment we arrived. Mai is so responsive, helpful & kind. Hiên is so sweet & welcoming. We loved hanging out with the cats! The home cooked breakfast and dinner was amazing & just what we needed to end our time in Vietnam 😊
Thank you so much Mai & Hiên! 💗

Staying here was one of the best decisions we made during our trip to Vietnam! The cabin is absolutely breathtaking and filled with so many welcoming touches. The home-cooked meal was delicious, and we had so much fun getting to know Mai and her beautiful family! Mai was also incredibly kind and helpful, particularly in arranging a car for us back to town to catch our bus. Highly recommend to anyone traveling to the area.

Je tiens à exprimer toute ma gratitude envers Mai et Thi Hien, qui ont été bien plus que de parfaites hôtes durant mon séjour. Elles ont non seulement répondu à toutes mes questions, mais m'ont également aidée tout au long de mon voyage, et bien au-delà de ce que j'aurais pu espérer. Leur gentillesse et leur dévouement ont vraiment marqué mon expérience.
Le chalet, quant à lui, est encore plus magnifique en vrai que sur les photos — un véritable havre de paix où chaque détail semble pensé pour le confort et la sérénité.
Et que dire du petit chien blanc... Un amour sur pattes, si beau et si gentil qu'il a ajouté une touche de douceur supplémentaire à ce séjour inoubliable.
Merci encore pour cette expérience exceptionnelle !
This is a really beautiful home. Would highly recommend to get a little out of Sapa town for some peace. We were looked after extremely well throughout, highly recommend.

시내에서 3~40분정도 떨어진 위치에 있어요! 호스트분이 택시를 불러주셔서 이동하는데 어려움은 전혀 없었고 오히려 평화로운 곳에서 쉴 수 있어서 너무 좋았어요. 식사는 다른메뉴들보다 차피가족과 함께하는 저녁식사가 아주 좋았어요! 침구가 엄청 포근하고 집이 아기자기하고 아늑하게 꾸며져 있어서 이 집에 있는동안 너무너무 편안하고 재미있는 시간이였습니다! 숙소가 조금 추운것 빼고 다 좋아용

This was the most beautiful place we stayed at during our 6day trip to Hanoi. The place was cozy, you could walk/hike to villages and surrounding paths. Host was extremely warm, we had amazing home cooked meals. Thank you!

Amazing host, super kind and helpful, such a lovely helpful person, amazing very helpful staff, feel at home and looked after, very beautiful, cosy and Homy, great food and service, thank you mai and her staffs for such lovely, supportive stay and help 🙏❤️

We had 3 peaceful days here. I had some of my best sleeps ever. It is a bit of a ride out of town but I loved the action on the road and watching children at play. I had a small mobility challenge so a bit difficult for me to move around but that was my issue. Hian was wonderfully helpful.

Had a great time at this beautiful bungalow. Stunning views from huge windows! A few insects in the room and bathroom but it's normal considering you're in the middle of nature. Other than that it was perfect. The staffs were super helpful and friendly. They even helped us with getting our rental motorbike and offered to store our luggages at Sapa Town after check-out for our convenience.  Thank you so much!

Wow! Our favourite stay throughout our three week trip in Vietnam. Definetly worth the money. The scenery matches the photos, the place was clean and the staff were always helpful. They even kept us up to date with weather conditions at least a week before we arrived. Opposite the bungalows is a taxi service which is easy to book through staff or Grab.

We only stayed for one night and im so thankful to Hue for helping decorate the bed just as I requested. She made our stay easy and comfortable  shes so kind and helpful, and the rest of the staff were also wonderful. The food was delicious everything was clean, and the view made our stay super relaxing. We will definitely be back again. THANKS AGAIN HUE ☺️

The cabin was located right in the heart of Ta Van, allowing us to experience what it was like to live among the H’mong. Sale and Cau were very welcoming and friendly, meeting us and helping us with our bags to where the taxi dropped us. The cabins were just like the photos, and it was great! We highly recommend the Bamboo Bar Restaurant near the cabins. We also availed of their trekking service, going around Ta Van. We were also able to purchase our Fansipan tickets here, saving us the trouble of lining up at Sun Plaza. 10/10 would recommend and book again.

We are extremely satisfied with our stay and the beautiful surroundings. The staff is so kind and accommodating, always doing their best to provide excellent service. The food was delicious and tasted homemade. The view was breathtaking. We spent a lot of time at the accommodation and truly enjoyed our stay.

Sehr Schönes Homestay mit tollen Blick auf die Reisterassen. Die Gastgeber waren super nett und haben sich die ganze Zeit um uns gekümmert. Mehrmals wurde sich über die Hunde beschwert, dies können wir absolut nicht bestätigen, die Hunde waren immer sehr lieb und haben sich meistens auch gar nicht für einen interessiert.
Beautiful bungalow and proactive staff ! The only disappointing aspect was the fact that it is not safe to go out at night because violent dogs are walking around the airbnb…
Amazing location jn a village nearby Sa Pa - would highly recommend it for anyone in the area. Lovely host that arranges anything you ask for. You will not regret staying here

Amazing location with beautiful views of Muong Hoa Valley! The hosts contacted us a few days before check in and even helped to arrange a taxi to send us to S Plus Bungalow. Very communicative and helpful throughout our stay:) S Plus had breathtaking views, very peaceful and a nice getaway from the city life. Room was very clean and tidy as well! Overall satisfied with our stay here! Would definitely recommend & hopefully return here one day:)
风景超级棒。房东会提供叫车服务，帮忙订门票。
Lovely little cabin. Receptionist was lovely and even stayed later as we were checking in late. Couldn’t have had a nicer more relaxing stay!

Die Bungalows sind toll in der Nähe von Sapa gelegen und bieten einen großartigen Ausgangspunkt für Touren in der Umgebung. Alle Mitarbeiterinnen sind total freundlich und hilfsbereit, wir hatten einen tollen Aufenthalt und würden jederzeit wieder kommen!

Ubytování bylo perfektní. Krásné, čisté, s úžasným výhledem na rýžová políčka. Snídaně byly bohaté a chutné. Recepční byla vždy milá a se vším nám pomohla. Byli jsme nadšení a budeme na tento pobyt dlouho vzpomínat.

Had a great stay here! So (the receptionist) was really friendly and accommodating. The place offers breakfast and dinner at a really affordable price if you want, and they were always happy to help call a taxi for us — super convenient. You can choose to pay by card or cash, just let them know.
The place was peaceful, and they let us use the clean shower and toilet before check-in, which was a nice touch if your room isn’t ready early. The only small downside was the dogs at night, but the latest we ever got back was around 9pm and luckily didn’t run into any.
Would recommend this place if you’re heading to Sapa and prefer a peaceful stay — just keep in mind the taxi fare is about 250,000 VND per trip.
Great place. very quiet and  beautiful landscapes. Nice bathroom and clean room. hosts were friendly and accommodating.

We were 2 nights here. It is a great place to get a feeling of rural Sapa. Unfortunately, we spent most of the time in the clouds so we couldn’t really enjoy the view. The bungalows are 20 min to Sapa Town by taxi (which is the starting point for many activities). So make sure to bring enough cash for this.

This Airbnb situated in Tà Van village just outside of Sapa is absolutely beautiful, the view from the bungalow is worth everything. Our host was very helpful: from getting taxis (to and from the Airbnb) to offering other activities.
I would highly recommend going there if you want to escape busy Hanoi.
The bungalow itself is very cozy and clean.

أشكر أولاً سو و هوي على حسن تعاملهم ولباقتهم وابتسامتهم وتعاونهم معنا في كل شيء
المكان جميل جداً

Great place very peaceful and private,
Very friendly and responsive Host.
Nous avons adoré ce logement, avec une vue splendide sur les rizières. Le personnel est très accueillant et sympathique, nous recommandons.
Me and my girlfriend really enjoyed our stay. Really peaceful surroundings and beautiful mountains. Highly recommend going on trekking tour set up by the host.
Felt very peaceful and quiet. Far from town but the views of the terraces and surrounding nature were worth it. Friendliest locals/hosts.

We really enjoyed our stay here. It’s a little difficult to get to, however, our bags were taken to the homestay for us so there wasn’t much of a hassle at all.
The hosts are all very friendly and were very helpful in booking tours, getting us to and from sapa town centre, very responsive over text at all times of the day, and also gave us fruit and coffee to go when we checked out. I had a few last minute requests which they were very helpful in accommodating.
Would definitely stay here again if we’re in the area. Thank you!

The room exceeded my expectations - bedroom was clean and modern, bathroom also clean and had constant hot (not lukewarm) water, and view from the bedroom was beautiful. We stayed for only one night but I could have stayed for longer! Thank you for the lovely stay!
Great place by the border.

My friend and I had a wonderful stay at May's place. May and her family were welcoming, warm and and gave us the space we were comfortable with, it was a perfect balance. The internet speed was perfect for long zoom meetings. One of the highlights of our stay was the trekking tour we did with May and Sunmay.
As a digital nomand I travel a lot, and we both felt like this place was unique and really worth it.

Hi May place is perfectly as described
It is in a very natural setting and in a proper village area where you can get authentic Vietnamese local feel .
Just a suggestion go by the driver suggested by May as place is 14 Kms from Sapa town and last stretch of 2 Kms has very narrow roads
Avoid coming back late at night as light is little low because of village setting in a natural area

Thanks May, Cao and family for the hospitality! This homestay experience was definitely the highlight of the trip, perfect for short escape from hectic city life. The place was clean and comfortable. The home cook with self grown rice was simple but delicious. Not to forget the trekking around villages for stunning rice fields panoramic view. Would like to come back again with better weather/ season.

Vi boede et par dage hos May og hendes fantastiske familie. Vi følte os hjemme hos dem. Deres sted ligger så smukt i en lille landsby langt væk fra travlhed og turister. Omgivelserne er så smukke og turene med May er helt fantastiske. I må ikke snyde jer selv for at opleve dette smukke sted og den sødeste familie!

May en familie zijn fantastische gastheren. We maakten deel uit van de familie, ze kookten lekker en elke dag anders. Na het koken aten we samen en vertelden ze over het leven bij hen. We hebben 2 dagtochten gedaan, een mooie wandeling tussen de rijstvelden en een motortrektocht, met May en familie als gids.
De bungalow was super rustig en had goede bedden.
Her was een hele mooie tijd en de 3 nachten waren veel te kort...

Thank you so much for treating our family like yours. Your property is amazing, and food is delicious. We loved the motorbike tour and of course June!!!! We will always remember the happy happy bungalow of happiness!

We had a wonderful stay at May’s home. It was a wonderful authentic experience to stay with this warm and friendly family . From the engaging conversation to the delicious food , a shared love of dogs as pets and very comfortable private room . We felt welcomed as part of the family and nothing was too much trouble for them from washing , trekking, motorbike tours , herbal bath and all extremely good value for money. Thank you May and the whole family - we had the best time !!

May (and the accommodation) was absolutely great. Our young kids plaid all day with the animals and when we left they asked: why can’t we stay at this place the full holiday;-)
Great experience, great and lovely people! Simply lovely!

Our stay At May’s homestead was wonderful! We experienced such rich hospitality and had all of our needs met! The homestay had everything we needed! We would highly recommend adding in the lunch and dinners to your stay! Such a wonderful experience!  The 1/2 day trek, and motorbike tour were phenomenal! It gave you a very up close experience with the stunning landscape all around! May was super helpful in helping us make all our connections to get to her village! If you stay with May, you will get one of the best experiences in Vietnam!

Mẩy’s listing is in a serene and peaceful village near Sa Pa town. The warm hospitality of Mẩy and his family made our entire experience extremely wonderful. This is a great place to explore Sa Pa's rice fields and mountains and get familiar with the locals.  The host was extremely responsive and helped us in all possible ways.

Great stay at Mays place. Overall, I liked May and her family. Location is in a very secluded area (14 kms and 350k VND from/to Sapa town). Don’t take a Grab/Taxi there and use Mays suggested drivers (as the drive up the mountain gets technical and is dangerous for the wrong type of car). Go there for the nature. Super clean room and surroundings. Washing machine and drying were available on premise. Overall, a really great experience (but preferably not in Winter when it’s foggy and cold).

Notre voyage n’aurait pas été le même sans ce passage de 2 nuits chez May et sa famille. Merci pour cette hospitalité et cette gentillesse qui vient du cœur. Merci de nous montrer votre mode de vie et de nous permettre d’y prendre part. Quelle belle parenthèse que de venir chez vous et quel souvenir gravé dans le cœur que de vous avoir rencontré. Ne changez jamais.
Chez May, c’est authentique mais c’est propre, c’est la nature mais c’est confortable. Et puis la cuisine de la famille de May est absolument divine.
Merci, ça faut tous les hôtels 5 étoiles.

C’est notre 1er séjour dans le nord du Vietnam, paysage magnifiques et environnement calme proche de la nature. May et sa famille sont très accueillant. Super expérience que je recommande !
Merci

Firstly, I want to say that May and her family are possibly the most genuinely friendly and helpful hosts I have ever met. They make you feel at home and part of their family from the very beginning. May speaks great English but prefers to communicate in writing through her son, Cao, who is super quick at answering any questions. He and his wife, Hoa, along with May’s husband Seeo, obviously play a big part in making their guests’ stays so memorable. May took us walking to a beautiful waterfall in the hills and was always ready to answer our many questions about their life. We ate a lovely breakfast prepared by Cao and a wonderful dinner which the whole family took part in making! The only reservation I would have for some guests is that this is a somewhat remote location and the journey there covers some rough ground! 14 km on mountain roads, is not the same as on paved tarmac. May organised a very skilful driver for us but it was still a little hairy! Thank you for a wonderful visit!

We had a wonderful stay at Bungalow in Sa Pa! The host family was incredibly kind, caring, and made us feel like part of their home. The location is remote, and reaching it involves walking through rough and steep roads but the peaceful surroundings and fresh mountain air made it all worth it. The rooms were clean and cozy, with a spotless bathroom complete with toiletries, bidet, and hot shower. The food was delicious, and sharing meals with the family was a memorable experience. They also helped us book taxis, buy things we needed, and were super responsive in chat. Cao spoke great English and was very helpful! One thing to note: there are lots of barking dogs along the road which can be scary when walking to/from the house, but thankfully we weren’t bitten. Well, we just looked at it as  part of the adventure! Overall, a truly heartwarming and relaxing stay. We’d love to come back!

I stayed for two nights, but when it was time to leave, I found myself wishing I could stay longer. This place is a perfect getaway from the city, surrounded by nature and friendly animals, offering a truly relaxing experience. I also had the pleasure of meeting wonderful friends, and we promised to meet again someday, somewhere. :) If I have the chance, I would definitely love to come back. Highly recommended for anyone looking to escape the hustle and enjoy some peace.

We had a great experience with May and her family .First impression was “Where are we going “ because of wrong location but when we arrived and met Cao and May ,everything went perfect.Try everything that they recommend and will not regret!
A very kind and welcoming homestay. The room and bathroom were very clean. We would recommend the bike tour and herbal bath! The view from their home is beautiful in all weather.

We had such a great time at May’s place. Unfortunately we could only spend one night, but were so glad we got to experience it instead of staying in Sa Pa town. Such a welcoming and friendly family, and the best food we’ve tasted in Vietnam. Thank you for everything !

Had an incredible time at Mays, her and her family are incredible people and instantly made us feel welcome and pretty much made us feel apart of the family.
Amazing stay, highly recommend and I think I will be back!!!

May's place is the perfect location for someone who wants to get an authentic feel of the village life in Sa pa. We only did two nights and would definitely recommend a longer stay. The half day trek and herbal bath were both amazing experiences. Thank you May for being such an wonderful host! PS: The food was delicious
Mẩy and her family were very friendly, and the bungalow is truly secluded. Perfect for relaxing and enjoying nature in peace.

We feel very lucky about meeting with May's family.
We felt very welcome and had a great time staying there. Cao was very helpful with anything we needed.
We loved the place, lost at the end of the road, did not feel like over-touristy Sa Pa at all.
Be ready to be surrounded with chicken, cats, dogs, duck, pigs and buffalos.
We were incredibly lucky that we were here right at the time to pull the rice out of it's initial field, and replant it everywhere on the terraces. We saw the color of the hill change over one day.
Highly recommend if you want a true experience immersed with a Red Dao family.

Merveilleux séjour passé chez May et sa famille ! ce fût une très belle expérience de partager avec eux de bons moments (randonnées en montagne, repas ). merci beaucoup pour leur accueil très chaleureux 🤩

Loved waking up with 180 degree views of the Sa Pa valley rice fields. All staff were incredibly helpful and sweet and quick to respond to messages. We would come back in a heartbeat. Only thing to note is that it is a bit difficult to carry heavy bags to the location as taxi drivers cannot drive all the way to the property. We rented a scooter through the host as well, which made it super easy to drive to and from Sa Pa town.

If you need a get away from the hot humid cities this is the place. The host was very responsive and she was really helpful when it came to local recommendations and check in/out. It is about 25 minutes outside from Sapa town so plan that when it comes to going into town. There is a local restaurants nearby that were all fantastic. Also with the environment the place is located in be prepared for lots of bugs and wildlife. Thank you for the stay it was much appreciated
Perfect location outside of Sapa town. Such a beautiful view, the room is comfortable, and the staff are very helpful and friendly!! Beautiful homestay, i definitely recommend! ❤️

The bungalow was amazing and the view is absolutely breathtaking. The host is very responsive and kind. Hope to make our way back there again someday. You should definitely book your stay, you won’t regret it!

We loved this little spot outside the hustle and bustle of Sapa. It has a great view from the bungalow and they are so sweet! Breakfast was included which I hadn’t realized so that was a nice surprise! The local vendors can be pushy, but just tell them no shopping or ignore them and you’ll be sweet. Highly recommend this stay!

We had a great time at the Bungalow. The room was super clean and the bed was comfortable. The view from the room into the nature and the mountains was amazing. There are many restaurants nearby and it was easy to rent a motorbike. The staff helped us with that.
Just watch out for the barking neighborhood dogs at night. They scared us a little bit but didn’t harm us.
Thanks for the great time. I highly recommend this place!
Het verblijf was heel erg fijn en zat lekker in een rustige omgeving. Het laken op het bed was niet helemaal schoon, maar voor de rest waren we zeer te spreken over het verblijf.

From the first day, we were welcomed with joyful energy and excitement from the hosts to ensure we had the best stay at S Plus! The room was beautiful with stunning views and clean amenities. During our stay we requested a cable car tour up to Fansipan, which the hosts booked for us and showed us a map to help the excursion be smooth and enjoyable! Communication from S Plus was quick, efficient, and friendly, we thoroughly enjoyed our time at S Plus and will be staying again in the future!
The breakfast in the morning was a great start to the day and the staff were always happy to help with extras (i.e. extra towels, toilet paper, etc).
Beautiful bungalow with a stunning view of the surrounding landscape. 25mins away from Sapa center by motorcycle. Could use some maintenance in the bathroom (bathtub and water drainage).

Séjour magnifique , chambre avec vue imprenable sur les rizières ! On recommande cet endroit , pour la gentillesse également du personnel ( juste la barrière de la langue qu’on a utilisé Google traduction ), la chambre était parfaite , juste le bain que l’on a pas pu utiliser parfaitement , dommage !
도심에 지친분들에게 딱 맞는 숙소! 사파의 아름다운 자연환경을 보며 평화롭고 여유롭게 쉴 수 있습니다. 직원들 모두 친절하고 방도 깔끔하고 좋습니다. 사파 중심가에서 떨어져있어 택시나 오토바이로 방문해야 합니다. 장점이 너무 많은 숙소이나 단점으로는 온수가 제한되어 욕조를 온수로 가득채우기 힘듭니다. 그래도 묵을만한 가치가 큰 숙소입니다.

Had the most amazing time here at S Plus Bungalow . Peaceful and quaint location, serving really great coffee and food. Ruby and the team were such amazing hosts who ensured we had a great stay, we had easy transport anywhere we wanted to get to, helped us where ever we got stuck, and answered all our queries. A must stay!

Great place for calm and peaceful to rest.
The host makes you feel like going back to hometown with great hospitality.
Thank you for the stay.

요기는 저만 알고 싶어요^^
너무나 아름다웠던 곳입니다.
그냥 다 굿굿굿

La ubicación está un poco alejada del centro, si no tenes moto es incómodo pero valió la pena por el hermoso paisaje. La habitación era muy linda pero los espacios comunes dejaban mucho que desear. Las fotos no muestran ni cerca el estado real de esos espacios.

Nous avons passé un super séjour dans notre bungalow en plein milieu des rizières !
Le paysage était splendide et le service client était parfait. Nous recommandons fortement à toute personne souhaitant un logement tranquille et reposant !
Great place with beautiful view. The host was very pleasant and helpful. Would definitely stay here again.

Great place if you want to experience the village life! Clean and well maintained. Had restaurants nearby which are walkable and hosts were very helpful in arranging taxis to get to the accommodation. Quaint and nice vibes. However, during winter, heating can be improved. The room was not very well insulated so it couldn’t keep warm.

The bungalow is located in a very beautiful place and the view from the window was stunning! It was the highlight of our trip. The communication with host and the crew was very good - responsive, friendly and caring. Thanks for the help and all advices.
What a fantastic stay! The bungalow in Ta Van offered breathtaking panoramic views of the rice terraces. It was truly beautiful and a memorable experience.

Our stay was wonderful! The place was beautiful and very peaceful.
Hoat was an incredible host, extremely attentive, friendly and flexible!
Highly recommend!

We had a great time at the S Plus Bungalow. Very peaceful and nice village vibes.
A bit further out of Sapa town then we had anticipated but was no issue. Our hosts were very helpful, being able to organise taxis on our behalf.
Fantastic place, superb front desk ladies which were always helpful, away from the clutter of sapa town tucked in a local village. Breakfast provided was fantastic, one of the better stays

If I could’ve extended my stay I would’ve! This place was amazing! It was peaceful and the host was extremely helpful with everything we needed help with. Views were also super amazing. I highly recommend booking the taxi from Sapa town to their homestay with the host. it’s convenient as the taxi drivers know exactly how to get to the homestay ! They were also really helpful with our luggage. I only have great things to say about the room, host and all the staff in this place ! I also highly recommend booking an incense making tour with the suggestion from the host. (: and there is an amazing French restaurant near the air bnb called hmong sisters ta van. The cold cuts there are great!
very flexible host, possible to leave the luggage before the check in, the proposed treck is also pretty good, and the beds and bathroom were very clean. would definitely stay there again!

It was a wonderful stay at Dieu's place. he was really firemdly and helpful. The room and the toilet were really clean. A thick blanket was provided which really hepled stay warm at night. Really affordable too. I enjoyed the stay very much.
It was a great stay , the room and the bathroom are clean. The host is really réactive and ready for help anything. I recommend this Homestay!
虽然最后有很多个人原因没有入住，但是房东的接待非常好，即使是深夜，他也会迅速回复

I had a great time staying at this place.
The host was very friendly and could speak English which was very helpful in our communication. His personal recommendation for activities to do in Sapa and the local eateries were all spot-on and excellent. I also love his cat, Chicken, who adds to the charm and friendly atmosphere of the place.
The common room is also very nicely set up with comfortable armchairs and clean bathrooms for all the guests living in the dormitories.

Really like the accommodation. It has a big and quiet terrace with an amazing view. It’s a little outside the center, but not to far, something I like.
Dorms were really simple but clean. Good quality for money

Staying at Dieu's place is a good experience. Dieu is very responsive and helpful in providing a lot of information, he always greets every guest in the restaurant, he says we are the first muslim guest in his homestay, and we are very glad to hear that. The bathroom in the room is very clean and still looks new, hot water is always there, and the blanket is very cozy for cold air. With that price, it is very proportional to the existing facilities. The most important thing is that the location is very close to sun plaza station and moana. The breakfast at the restaurant is also very cheap and delicious. Nice Dieu and crew

This is my favorite hostel in Vietnam. The family is so kind and they go above and beyond to make guests happy. The view from the hostel deck is one-in-a-million. They also booked my hiking and fansipan tours straight away, which made it easy for me. Not to mention I made some new friends staying there which was an added bonus. So do yourself a favor and stay here when visiting Sapa.
They are good people and they will help you in every thing you need even in booking trips and others

Dieu Tran est à l’écoute pour conseiller les voyageurs et les aider dans leur voyage
Le logement correspond à l’annonce, il est propre et proche du centre ville
Bonne expérience !

The place was lovely. Dieu was a very nice host. However, it was very cold at night and there was no heating. There was a fireplace which was never lit on which was a shame. Had to sleep with our coats on one of the nights. There were stairs to get to the accommodation but these were absolutely fine and easily accessible.
The location is a 2 minute walk from the centre of Sa Pa which was lovely and the place was generally very clean. The showers were good - Okay pressure but hot water was always guaranteed!
Definitely would stay again if we go back in the summer but would not recommend for the winter months.
C’était un super séjour, l’équipe est très gentille, le gérant est extrêmement sympathique et aide les voyageurs à organiser leur séjour à Sa Pa, les dortoirs sont très bien, le chat est très mignon

the host was kind and friendly! he was very helpful with our luggages and transportation and even gave recommendations on where to go. the place was clean and spacious enough for the 6 of us. thank you!!

Dieu and all the staff were friendly! Some are fluent in english so we have smooth communication. We love that the place is walkable to all the restos and cafes.
Our dormitory type room was clean. We also love that they have water heater. Our favorite also they have comforters which was great for the cold weather in Sapa.
The food was great! We choose our breakfast in their resto during our whole stay. Worth the price!
Thank you so much!
great host , communicative and friendly! Definitely recommend
friendly host! he speaks english relatively well too, made it a lot easier for communication. wonderful stay thank you!
Incredible host and place! Dieu was so helpful and helped organize trekking and Fansipan cable tours for us which were both incredible!! Very hospitable

great place to stay when in Sapa! extremely nice owner, had a relaxing and quiet night sleep, booked a 2 day sapa trekking tour through the hostel (absolutely must do! pickup/dropoff included, cannot speak higher of this experience) ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

A wonderful homestay! The place is spotless, cozy, and well-maintained, providing a truly comfortable stay. The host is exceptionally kind and welcoming, always ready to help with a smile. Highly recommended for a relaxing and enjoyable experience!
Tuyệt vời

사파여행 동안 편안하게 잘 쉬었습니다.
배낭여행자들에게는 최고의 숙소입니다. 가성비도 좋고 위치도 사파 주요관광지와 가까이 있습미다. 다만 캐리어를 가지고 오신다면 숙소 위치가 언덕에 있어 조금 힘이 들수도 있겠네요.

100%솔직 후기! 일단 가격대비 무조건 만족할 만합니다. (도미토리 ).주인부부 친절하시고 뭐 귀여운 새끼고양이도 있고 매일매일 청소도 하시고요.
아쉬웠던 2가지. 첫번째, 사파 자체가 너무 습해서 그런지 곰팡이냄새, 쉰냄새가 많이 났어요. 두번째, 위치가 좀 아랫쪽이라 가까운 슈퍼라도 왓다갓다하려면 경사심한 길을 이용해야돼요. 제 개인적인거고 그렇다 치더라도 가성비 좋은 숙소입니다.
Dieu/Diego is a very active host, helped us with a lot of local recommendations for food. The rooms were clean and the communal space together with the roof terras were very nice!

My stay at Mega View Homestay in Sapa was an unforgettable experience. The host went above and beyond to make my 3-day adventure as a backpacker truly special. His warm hospitality made me feel right at home from the moment I arrived. The cozy and well-kept rooms offered stunning views of the mountains, making each morning a breathtaking start to the day. The host’s guidance was invaluable—he helped plan my treks,ensuring I experienced the best of Sapa. The package offered was excellent, providing great value with personalized attention. I highly recommend this homestay for an authentic Sapa experience! thankyou brother. see you again.

Unfortunately I only stayed for one night because I spontaneously extended my trip, but the place is really great! It has a perfect location: quiet, yet close to the city. The room was as described but what really stood out to me was the energy of the owners. They radiate an aura of sympathy. The bar in front offers creative drinks as well as local craft beer and wine. It's a good place to meet people to talk to. When I come back to Sa Pa this is the place to stay!

Get ready for a hike up, wasn’t expecting to have a mini hike up to the airbnb but overall the place was a decent stay!
Its a small cosy room with a mini bathroom.
But was thankful the hosts were very responsive

I loved everything about my stay, my room felt like home and the location is peaceful away from the busy town centre (but not far in walking distance). I highly recommend anyone reading this to book this place as you will not be disappointed. Thank you for having me!

the hosts were very kind, accommodating and responsive. the place is super lovely and we enjoyed coming back to it at the end of a day's trip. will definitely come stay here again when i go back to sapa!

숙소가 조금춥긴했지만 전기장판이있어서 잠을 잘 잘수있었습니다 . 잘 지내고 갑니다 감사합니다
호스트가 매우 친절합니다 . 저녁에 캠프파이어 파티에 초대했지만 몸이 너무 안좋아 참여할수없었습니다
사파의 조용한 골목에 있는 최고의 숙소입니다. 호스트 yen의 친절한 안내 덕분에 편안한 시간을 보낼 수 있었습니다. 마지막 밤에는 바에서 호스트들과 다른 손님들과 함께 정말 즐거운 시간을 보냈습니다.

We stayed at Whisper Home for a night. Yên is a very friendly host and so is the caretaker. They allowed us early check-in and room was also clean before our arrival early in the morning. They have a nice tea/coffee area in the first floor with some books and games. Overall loved the place. The swimming pool was not functional during our stay but we never needed it. the bar next to it was peaceful. The name aptly describes

Stay at Whisper Home was such a great experience. It’s like being at home away from home. The hosts were very accommodating and friendly, like you’ve been friends with them for a long time. The place was really nice and clean. The laid-back bar was a great addition to the stay since it’s quiet and serves great local wine. The stay made my Sapa trip memorable. Kudos to Yên, Chi, and Ánh! They were really great hosts! 🫶🏼

Un hermoso lugar que destaca por la tranquilidad y el buen gusto. Habitaciones de decoración rústica muy bien pensadas y un espacio compartido muy ameno.
Se siente muy tranquilo el lugar en un callejón viviendo dentro un barrio local. Distante del lío, excelente para descansar.
Quienes manejan el lugar hablan muy bien inglés y están más q predispuestos a ayudarte con todo, la comunicación muy buena y me dieron buenos consejos sobre lugares en la ciudad.
Estuve tres noches y me fui con ganas de quedarme más tiempo.
Buenas charlas con quienes alquilan el lugar, gente muy abierta y con ganas de intercambiar experiencias.
Sin dudas recomiendo este lugar, y se nota que está hecho y pensado con mucho amor.
Cozy little place up on a hill. We didn't notice that they don't have ac, however, there was a big fan in the room which helped.
Yen is a nice host , he came to us directly to ask that anything he can help. The room was clean, the bathroom also roomy. All is good and as described in the picture

J’ai passé une nuit dans ce logement et je dois dire qu’en période hivernale, le matelas chauffant m’a sauvé ahaha. Au delà de ça, le logement correspondait parfaitement à la description, et les hôtes sont très réactifs, soucieux du bien-être des visiteurs.
Je recommande vivement ce logement !

Eine wunderschöne Unterkunft mit tollem Blick und einer wunderschönen Bar direkt im Garten. Unsere Hosts waren sehr freundlich und haben uns tolle Insider-Tipps gegeben!
Ich würde auf jeden Fall wieder hierher kommen wollen!

We had a great stay with them! The host was very friendly and considerate. Gave us clear instructions on how to find the place. We arrived at Sapa around 5:30am. They organized the room so we can check in early at 7am even though the check in time is 2pm. A very nice welcome hospitality in Sapa, Vietnam. We'll be sure to comeback. ❤️

Room was exactly as described in post. Beautiful neighbourhood and walkable to everyone. Host was very responsive and proactive with tips, recommendations and connections with fairly priced services. Definitely would return!

We enjoyed our stay at Whisper Home. Super friendly and accommodating hosts. We really enjoyed sitting by the fire and having a drink at the bar. The portable heater and heating pad for the bed were much appreciated during the chilly evenings! The Mist cafe next door is amazing!

This was the highlight of our trip in Vietnam so far. Yen, Chi and Anh were wonderful hosts and made us feel right at home.
A lovely cozy and peaceful atmosphere, a short walk from town. Our bed was comfortable, room was clean, and had everything we needed.
We spent every night by the bar and the fire with our hosts and fellow guests. Don’t forget to say hi to Chot - the cute “guard dog”.

My partner and I especially want to commend Yên for his genuine hospitality and recommendations. The place is walking distance from the city center where there are many options for food, shopping and massages. Easy also to take a taxi to other attractions within Sa Pa (e.g., Cat Cat Village) The accommodations were very clean and comfortable (shoutout to the electric bed warmer too).

This was by far (!) the best Airbnb we stayed in during our Vietnam trip! The room was really cozy and the location was really nice: quiet and hidden but super close to the center. What really added to our comfort were the hosts (including Chot the guard dog) and the hidden bar that was on the property. We’d always love to come back!

We absolutely adored our stay at Whisper Home. This is such a hidden gem in Sa Pa, I couldn’t recommend it more highly. It’s very thoughtfully put together, is in a wonderful location, super friendly staff, comes with an adorable pup named Chôt, and a lovely quiet little bar for a night cap. Thank you and we will definitely stay with you again when we return to Sa Pa in the future.

The place is right by the city centre but away from the hustle bustle of the city. The place is very peaceful and cozy. You can literally hear the whispers. And the hosts are super friendly and we really enjoyed chatting with them. I'll definitely recommend their place.
And yes. Special Mention: Their dog Chot (I don't know whether I've spell correctly) is super friendly and super cute. he's such a fluffball.

The place is amazing. The Host is very nice. He provided clear instructions and very friendly. The Host prepared coffee and sweet delicacies in the common area for guests every morning. The bar have nice wine, so please order. The puppy "Chut" is very welcoming and friendly, bring treats for him if you can. We will return to this listing for sure!🥰
谢谢招待！小屋很有特色，很温馨！我们在萨帕度过了快乐的2天，您提供的租摩托和车站的位置都很准确，对我们非常有帮助！热水也很充足，这在温差大的萨帕简直太棒了！

absolutely loved my stay! yes abd the team was very attentive, kind and accommodating. they gave me lots of useful recommendations and were kind enough to store my luggage - add one more day to my stay due to trekking schedule. thank you very much and will definitely recommend your place further! best regards

Lovely staff and a very very lovely big fluffy dog. They had friendly cats too! Gorgeous place and view. Free breakfast included. A bit of an inconvenient location as the drive up to the place is rocky, bumpy, muddy, and scarily foggy at night. Bugs around the house and in bed and nothing really to prevent the bugs and the place wasn’t fully enclosed. Very lovely for the price though.

I did my first solo travelling to Vietnam and choose this place as my first stay . As a female traveller I feel safe and welcoming. The journey takes you across the village path. It was different and great experience . Totally unforgettable views. The place is literally as its name little house by the rocky mountains. Great sight from the window panel and beautiful nature. Don't be suprised by all the nature surrounding you creating sounds and appearing by its their home anyway we are the guest. The smart tv is a suprised for me cause I didn't see it in the listing which is a great entertainment add up too. The weighted blanket is super amazing to sleep into after a long journey. Totally recommended !

The place was far from the center but the room was cozy and people were so accommodating. The restaurant food was also good and the problem was just the location. It’s too far but all in all it’s a 10/10.

Cute rustic hut with a stunning view (Quite foggy when we went). The hut is located in a resort with a few different huts and the area is beautifully managed and feels private. The couple downsides were the location was that it is remote and away from the main attractions, Sa Pa and restaurants. Harder to get taxi/grabs because the road is pretty bumpy/bad to navigate as you'll find out. Secondly, the bathroom has gaps which allows a lot of insects in and the hut is small and doesn't feel as luxurious as other huts on the resort. Hosts were very helpful and have a small menu for breakfast and dinner with veggie options. Thank you for letting us stay
The host was very nice and friendly.  Will definitely recommend the place if looking for beautiful scenery. The location is a bit far from city so would recommend check-in during day time.
Really beautiful location with an amazing view! I would definitely recommend this place to anyone who wants to get away from the city life. Was a very nice and calm getaway high up in the mountains!

We loved our stay! The staff were super friendly and accommodating. However, accessibility was a bit of a challenge - the road is still under development and quite bumpy. It's also a bit far from the city center, so it's not ideal for those with a packed itinerary. But for a relaxing getaway, especially for honeymooners, this place is perfect! The view is stunning, and the adorable host dog stole our hearts (tip: bring dog treats for instant friendliness).

I had a wonderful stay at Rock Garden homestay in Sapa, Vietnam. The cabin was cozy, and spotless—truly great value for money. Everything was smooth and comfortable, and I couldn't have asked for more.

Die Unterkunft ist einfach perfekt, wenn man ein wenig Ruhe in Vietnam sucht.
Der Ausblick ist einfach unbezahlbar. Allerdings muss man Glück haben, da die Sicht oft durch starken Nebel eingeschränkt ist. Gott sei Dank hatten wir Glück!
Die gesamte Anlage ist sehr schön gestaltet und alle sind sehr nett. Außerdem ist das Essen super lecker!

No words to describe my satisfaction booking this place. the host was super kind and the staffs there are super helpful and nice. sooo glad we booked this place for our honeymoon. they have this beautiful place to eat, we spent hours there, feels super cozy and the food was great! just the journey to the town is abit rough, but there is plenty of places to visit nearby. thank you and hope to stay here again ❤️

Prachtig verblijf!
Het zicht was prachtig. We hadden af en toe mist, maar deze trok snel weg. Het huisje is klein, maar je hebt alles wat je nodig hebt. Je moet er wel rekening mee houden dat er insecten of kleine beestjes aanwezig kunnen zijn. Het huisje is rustig gelegen op 20 min van Sa Pa. Een taxirit kost 200 000 VND. De weg ernaartoe is hobbelig maar doenbaar. De hosts waren super vriendelijk! Het avondeten in het restaurant was heerlijk. Ze hebben speciaal voor ons vroeg in de ochtend ontbijt voorzien, omdat we extra vroeg moesten vertrekken voor een wandeltocht. Ze waren super flexibel en hebben ons een geweldige tijd bezorgd!
Hoang Hai is a great host whos able to answer all your enquiries and its a good place of a get away at the peaceful side of the country

Merci beaucoup pour votre accueil ! Nous reviendrons à un moment où le temps sera plus clément. Je recommande de venir ici ou la vue est époustouflante dommage que la météo n’était pas en notre faveur mais sinon c’est le plus beau logement de Sapa

Les hôtes, le cadre, tout était magnifique. Malheureusement nous avons eu mauvais temps mais ça n’a pas empêché l’hôte de s’occuper de nous! Nous avons même pu être surclassé, avec des matelas chauffants pour notre plus grand bonheur <333

Die hütte ist gemütlich eingerichtet und man fühlt sich schnell wohl. Es ist schön dort und das personal ist sehr hilfsbereit, freundlich und zuvorkommend. Das essen im restaurant ist köstlich und liebevoll zubereitet.

Serene and peaceful location. Host very responsive and provided recommendations for activities and transports.
On the downside, I think the unit was too small for the price. No side table, not enough place to lay our bags and walk about, no mirror except in the toilet. The electrical wiring could have been done better, especially inside the bathroom. I was afraid we could get electrocuted.

Amazing place. The view is unforgettable. Service amazing. The food is the best we had in Vietnam. They also offer private tours - we took around Sapa rice fields and  hiking to Fransipan - both guides were amazing. This place really exceeds all expectations. Definitely recommend to anyone who want to be outside the touristic hustle and enjoy breathtaking view and very good food.

The property itself is breathtaking. All of the staff are very nice. Although the property is quite a way out of town and the roads and currently extremely damaged from the recent typhoon so it’s difficult to get in and out. They do have food there but there wasn’t a huge selection so be prepared to bring snacks or some of your own food. The animals at the property are beautiful and very friendly

Our stay at was absolutely wonderful! The cozy atmosphere and stunning mountain views made it the perfect getaway. The host, was incredibly friendly and helpful. The room was clean and comfortable. We'll definitely be returning for another visit!

The place looks exactly like the pictures and is even more beautiful. The property has a main lodge where they served us great breakfast. We also ate the home made dinner and it was delicious. The host is very helpful, especially with booking taxi drivers. The place is a bit far from the town of Sapa because the road to get there is very bumpy and full of pot holes but I thought it was so worth it cause it was so peaceful. The shower gets hot and the bed sheets were very comfortable. The Air Conditioning worked very well also.
المكان جميل وهادئ والاطلالة حلوة لكن يجب الاخذ بعين الاعتبار ان الموقع بعيد نصف ساعة تقريبا من وسط مدينة سابا. عدا ذلك المكان جدا رايق ويستاهل السعر
Such a dreamy place. Best to head over during the right seasons to avoid higher chances of fog that blocks the amazing valley views.

very accommodating host. 💯
wasnt able to enjoy the view because it was 0 visibility, foggy. but a good place to stay.

The stay was amazing! With the beautiful nature and view such a calm place to relax and recharge and host was responsive! Would highly recommended to spend at least 2 days here to enjoy the stunning view. Unfortunately, the fog was kinda thick in the morning so we can see the view that clear :( Will definitely come back again and spend more time here another time!
Looking forward to be back again!!
P.S: Lou or Lu is super adorable!!! Another reason to come back again xx

Friendly and responsive host and staff. Beautiful place to stay with great view. The only cons is that the window on top has no curtain. It is nice to sleep to see the stars at night but if there is curtain it would be nice to sleep with dark room during the day and won’t feel hot. Nonetheless i still love the stay overall :)

Sehr gute Unterkunft. Tolle und ruhige Lage mitten in der Natur mit toller Aussicht. Mitarbeiter waren alles sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit. Kommunikation auf Englisch war problemlos möglich. Für die Strecke von der Unterkunft zur Hauptstraße und zurück konnte jederzeit und flexibel der Buggy-Shuttleservice in Anspruch genommen werden.

Das Glamping-Erlebnis war etwas ganz Besonderes, man schläft quasi mitten in der Natur und wacht mit einem atemberaubenden Blick auf endlose Reisterrassen auf.
Der Ausblick ist wirklich magisch, vor allem morgens im Nebel oder bei Sonnenuntergang.
Die Unterkunft ist liebevoll gestaltet, gemütlich und trotzdem komfortabel.
Perfekt für alle, die Natur und Ruhe suchen!
Das Team vor Ort war super herzlich und hilfsbereit, man fühlte sich direkt willkommen.
Wir wären am liebsten noch länger geblieben, absolute Empfehlung für alle, die Sa Pa mal auf eine besondere Art erleben möchten.
It was an amazing place with an amazing and helpful host, helped us with every little thing from before check in till after check out
Perfect place to unwind and get away, but not too far away as they have their own private cafe/bar where I can conveniently order amazing drinks whilst I work

The best stay in Vietnam!The room was very cozy and comfy .weather is perfect for resting.warm lights made it more cozy and homey. I love how the couple are very approachable and kind. i love their book set,just to bad i didnt get so much time staying, but i will definitely be back there.the best stay so far in Vietnam😍 maybe i would like to see more upstairs like some bean bags on the vacant part of the aisle.could be more cozier and perfect.

A beautiful homestay. Thanh and Chang went out of their way to make me feel at home. The surroundings are absolutely gorgeous. Instantly you feel welcome in the house. My bed was comfortable and cozy, bathroom clean and so many places to relax, read, admire stunning views. An absolute must: sit down to a family dinner with Thanh and Chang, and book your Sapa Trek through their recommended guide. One of my favourite experiences abroad ever.

Honestly it was one of my all time Favorite stays ever and I have traveled many places and i’m always trying to find hidden gems and I think this is the purest of them all, the hosts made the experience exceptional and the make sure you join in for dinner as it is one of a lifetime experience, and you’ll sleep like a baby trust me, very comfy beds and the shower pressure is a no match.

I had a great stay at  thanh’s homestay ❤️ the heated bed was extremely comfy and exciting to come back to after long days trekking around ta van. family dinner was so sweet and considerate and made me feel welcomed as a solo traveler. it was located perfectly to walk around the village and visit different spots and cafes. i would highly recommend

Thanh and his wife are very kind and friendly. Their home is simple, surrounded by stunning landscapes. We shared a dinner altogether with the other guests, it was so nice, feeling that we were at home :)

Es war meine bisher beste AirBnb Erfahrung. Die Gastgeber waren unheimlich nett und hilfsbereit. Ich hab mich ab Sekunde 1 wie zuhause gefühlt. Es ist der perfekte Ort um einfach mal nichts zu tun und runterzukommen. Ich kann nur empfehlen am Familien Abendessen teilzunehmen. Noch mal vielen Dank für die wundervolle Zeit.

Amazing stay, with amazingly warm hosts!! I don't think my experience at Sapa would be as amazing as it is without Thanh and her husband. Special shout out to Ca, Indi and Ngou who made this stay so much more lively and cute :)

One of my favorite stays in Vietnam!
The location is perfect – even better than being in the center of Sa Pa. The house was super comfortable, and every evening we enjoyed a cozy fire in the fireplace. The animals around the place were adorable, and the food was amazing – especially dinner, probably the best Vietnamese food I've ever had! What made it even more special were the little touches, like a warm tea after dinner. They really pay attention to the small things. Highly recommended!
非常喜欢他们家，而且环境也特别得好，他们人也比较好，他们都可以说英语，然后他们还可以帮我们做晚餐也很便宜，也特别好吃，他们还要自己做的酒

I had a wonderful stay at Thanh’s homestay! The place was very nice and my bed was super comfy. Thanh and his wife were very accommodating and helpful throughout my stay. The family dinner was delicious and Thanh’s coffees each morning were so good! Would definitely recommend staying here!

They were very kind and always looked out for me. They told me lots of stories when we had family dinners. I also had many opportunities to interact with the other guests. Thanks to them, I had a very enjoyable trip.
Lovely, cosy place to stay made even better by the friendly and kind hosts and the cool people you will get to meet. You must do a family meal, the food is some of the best I have had in Vietnam!

Indi house has my heart. Hosts are incredible, super friendly and helpful. The vibe is peaceful and the surroundings are beautiful. The pets are also so sweet and well behaved. I will definitely be going back :)
They were so helpful and friendly. I love how they decorated their house! Close to nice restaurants and bars.  Absolutely reccommended！
다른 여행자들과 주인 부부와 같이 식사하고 대화도 할 수 있어서 좋았습니다

Felt right at home once I arrived. I had such a fun experience at Thanh's house. It was warm, cozy, peaceful, and perfect! She recommended the local village hike tour which I enjoyed so much along with the friends I met. A lot of restaurants, cafes, and spa are nearby, as well.

Had an extremely relaxing and enjoyable stay at Indi House. Space was as described, facilities were well maintained, and family dinner/s were extremely tasty and affordable. Location was great, next to a stream, which was a peaceful sound to fall asleep and rest to. Lots of great restaurants were within walking distance, and lots of opportunities for trekking in Ta Van/Sapa.
Honestly one of the few times on Airbnb that I would honestly believe the reviews

I had a truly wonderful stay at this place. There were two dogs and a cat, all very calm and adorable. The people here were also incredibly kind and warm-hearted. The two hosts were especially generous—they even prepared breakfast for me, which was absolutely delicious.
The room was very clean and quiet, making for a peaceful and comfortable stay. The living room had stylish decor and was a great spot to relax and refresh. The hosts also introduced me to a local trekking guide, who was fantastic and helped make the experience even more memorable.
The trek was quite long and physically demanding—it took over half a day—so I’d recommend being prepared in terms of stamina. That said, the hosts kindly lent me rubber boots, so I didn’t have to worry about getting my shoes or feet dirty. Along the way, I was able to meet and interact with people from various ethnic communities, which was a deeply meaningful and rare experience.
After returning from the trek, I was offered a shower, which
A great place to stay if you want to have a chill and relaxing trip. Great host which very helpful in everything!

The place is very cute and cozy! I didn’t have the best weather but I still managed to walk and hike around a little and the village is very nice! The dinners are delicious and fun as you get to chat with the hosts and the other guests. They have heated mattresses which is AMAZING!
Thank you for a wonderful stay! Highly recommended - kind and helpful hosts; it was clean and cozy and very hospitable and delicious. Don’t miss a chance to get banh mi for  breakfast. Best of luck!
호스트는 너무 친절했다. 호스트가 직접 만든 베트남 가정식을 먹으면서 행복한 시간을 보냈다. 두 마리의 강아지와 고양이 한마리는 얌전하면서 친근했고, 벽난로는 추운 날씨에 완벽했다. 다시 방문하고 싶은 곳!

I had the only sleeping place not in a room. It was a good place to stay, certainly safe enough. This really feels like a homestay, you can have dinner with the lovely couple running the place and the other guests staying there. Very recommendable.

Our family loved staying in the villa. We hired scooters which made getting into town easy. The Grab app is also great for cheap taxis. The hotel next door has a good restaurant so dinner was easy when we didn't feel like going far. Such a nice experience staying in an alpine style villa overlooking the valley with Fansipan in the distance

One of the most memorable nature stays we've ever had. Van Anh, our host, was incredibly warm and helpful throughout our visit. The mountain views were absolutely breathtaking — truly the highlight of our trip.
Virkelig dejligt ophold med en ekstremt imødekommende vært og kok. Derudover havde værelset en flot udsigt udover gården 😃
Great place and beautiful location

We werden hartelijk ontvangen, in het begin was er wat mis gegaan met de reservering maar ze dachten gelijk mee in oplossingen. En er was gelijk goede duidelijke communicatie via wathsapp.
De ruimte waar we verbleven was erg netjes en schoon. Fijne plek om te verblijven!
Ook het personeel is erg vriendelijk en meedenkend. Het is mogelijk een scooter bij hun te huren, ook denken ze mee met vervoer naar andere plekken zoals terug naar Hanoi.
Bij hun restaurant zijn er veel verschillende dingen te kiezen om te eten en drinken.
We voelden ons erg welkom en zouden hier zeker terug komen! We raden iedereen dit verblijf aan!

Had a lovely stay at Indi house! One of our favourite airbnbs in Vietnam. The village, Ta Van, was the perfect place to stay to experience the picturesque mountains of Sapa and is home to the best restaurants, cafes and bars with incredible views within a 5 minute walk from the Airbnb. The hosts were so so kind and helped us book taxis and a hike and prepared delicious family meals for all the guests. We definitely recommend staying here if you come to Sapa, felt like a home away from home!

Had a lovely stay at Thanh’s place. We were arriving late from the ha giang loop but Thanh organised a taxi for us to pick us up which we really appreciated. The home was so warm and cosy with lovely friendly dogs. The family dinner was delicious and was so nice to meet people and listen to their stories. Would highly recommend! Thank you :)

I love the trip in sapa, Thanh made a lot of precious memories for us. I highly recommend you to join the hiking tour. A Red Dzao maam will be your guide, she will share the lifestyle , culture of her ethnicity or other interesting stories to you. It’s a very unique and unforgettable experience. Thanh’s house is very beautiful and I love the style. We’ve dinner together and it was excellent, i’m sad that I could not taste it anymore. Anyway, we had a very good time in Thanh’s homestay. I’m sure I will miss it a lot. (Btw: Thanh’s wife is very pretty )

this was one of the most intimate and beautiful home stays i’ve had the pleasure to experience. Thanh truly makes you feel like a part of her home. Don’t miss out on the family dinner, the food she cooked was so, so delicious!
I really enjoyed my stay here. What a lovely experience.
thank you Thanh!

My friends and I were happy to have experienced Than and Chang's hospitality. The house, although not looking as new as when the photos were taken, proved to be very cozy and well maintained in terms of cleanliness. We loved the dinner that the family prepared, and their adorable cat and two dogs. The nature was lovely and there were some quaint cafes to eat so we only needed to go to town once. Would definitely recommend the place for a stay and for the experience.
