Had the most wonderful stay in Chang and Thanh’s lovely home. Such kind people that go above and beyond to make you feel comfortable and happy. Thanh is such an amazing cook! Amazing trekking tour offered also which is highly recommended. In a beautiful village where you really get a feel for the local way of life. Walking distance to restaurants, cafes and bars.

Home, far away from home! I could stay here forever. The room and bed is so cozy, the house as well; food (dinner) is outstanding and the help and recommendations are amazing. Did the trekking with a local guide and really loved it. Even while the weather wasn’t great, still extended my stay because of Indi House 😍
Thanh님의 인디하우스는 타반마을의 정취를 즐기기에 부족함이 없습니다. 인디하우스에 살고 있는 두마리의 강아지와 한마리의 고양이도 매우 사랑스럽고요. 하루밖에 지내지 못해 아쉽습니다. 다음에 사파를 방문할 때는 더 오랜기간 지내고 싶습니다.

One of my favorite stays in Vietnam!
The location is perfect – even better than being in the center of Sa Pa. The house was super comfortable, and every evening we enjoyed a cozy fire in the fireplace. The animals around the place were adorable, and the food was amazing – especially dinner, probably the best Vietnamese food I've ever had! What made it even more special were the little touches, like a warm tea after dinner. They really pay attention to the small things. Highly recommended!

By far my favourite place I have stayed in Viet Nam. The house was so homely, and Thanh & Trang were so welcoming, helpful and spoke perfect English, we loved getting to know them! I would have loved to have stayed longer. The vibe of the town was peaceful and stunning. Loved every minute. Thank you Thanh & Trang!!

Ta Van is a beautiful village with plenty of restaurants and bars. Amazing landscape. Due to really bad weather we couldn’t enjoy it in a proper way. We can recommend the tour with a local guide offered by the hosts. We also liked the breakfast and the family dinner. Good opportunity to get in touch with other guests. If you arrive in Sa Pa we would recommend to let Thanh to order the taxi for a good price. The communication with him worked easily and fast.

We enjoyed this stay SO much. I brought my 8 year old and they made him feel so comfortable and it’s just a lovely home and couple. The area for any of these home stays is not as remote as described, they are piled on top of each other. But it is still somehow very peaceful. We enjoyed it here more than anywhere else and loved the wonderfully cooked home meals that were shared.
We had an amazing stay! The hosts are friendly and made us feel right at home. The food at the family dinners and breakfast was amazing. It's a beautiful base to explore Sapa! 😀

Thanh og hans kone var helt ekstremt imøtekommende! Vi skulle være der i en natt, og det føltes ut som jeg var på et familiebesøk. Så positive og gjestfrie verter finner du sjeldent. Tusen takk for at vi fikk bo hos dere!
If you’re looking for an authentic Vietnamese homestay, this is it! Thanh and Chan are very hospitable and their home is beautiful. The local village has lots going on. A hidden gem ❤️

We loved staying here, just beautiful. Our hosts went above and beyond for us from helping with transport to booking a local guide to chatting over dinner and drinks together. Special place run by special people!

We had an amazing time staying at Indi homestay, Thanh and Chang were the perfect hosts. They helped us organise taxis to and from Sapa, a great local guide for a trek and the local laundry service. Chang’s food was incredible and the best food we have had in Vietnam. The homestay was impeccably cleaned multiple times a day, meaning that sharing a bathroom with others was no problem at all. The location is excellent, the village has loads of great restaurants and cafes - MUCH better than Sapa town. We felt right at home and would love to stay again if we come back to Sapa in the future.
Best Homestay experience in Vietnam. Amazing hosting, fantastic food and location is a dream. Great and lovely Communication with the hosts who help out with Everything! Cant wait to get back!

사파 타운에서 편하게 갈 수 있도록 택시를 불러주셔서 감사합니다. 샤워시설이 잘 되어있고 편안한 휴식을 취하기에 최고의 장소입니다.
인테리어가 예쁘고 창문으로 새 소리가 들려오는 평화로운곳입니다

Thanh and Chang were extremely welcoming, our stay here felt just like home! We really enjoyed the interaction with other guests over a scrumptious home-cooked family dinner on our last night! There are two dogs and a cat here as well 🐈🐕🐕
We had a lovely stay at the Indi House. Easy and flexible check-in at night possible and really delicious food. We felt directly at home, especially the family dinner was amazing.

We had a wonderful stay at Thanh’s homestay. The location is perfect, in a beautiful village, away from the bustle of Sapa town. There are lots of great coffee shops around, and opportunities for scenic walks/hikes. The house is very well arranged, and has everything we needed. The communal dinners were a great opportunity to exchange with Thanh, his wife and the other guests.

Our experience was fantastic. Thanh and his wife were incredibly helpful, taking care of all our arrangements, from booking taxis to organizing guided hiking tours. We also had the pleasure of enjoying a delicious breakfast and dinner with them for a reasonable additional cost. Plus, they serve excellent espresso, which is definitely worth the extra charge.

Amazing homestay!  Very cosy and felt right at home. Our hosts were lovely and made us a wonderful family dinner which was very tasty! The house had lots of character and a great view of the mountains and paddy fields. It is a perfect place to relax and unwind. There are also 2 really friendly dogs and a nice cat! Would recommend to a friend 100%

Staying at Mays place was a highlight of our trip. Her family are beautiful, welcoming us with warm smiles and great hospitality. Nice location away from the craziness of Sapa which is exactly what we wanted. The Airbnb was clean and comfortable with lovely nature surrounding it. I would save yourself some worry booking anything else and come stay here!!

מאי ומשפחתה היו מקסימים בצורה בלתי רגילה. הנכס שלהם נמצא בכפר ומאפשר חוויה אותנטית אמיתית של חיי כפר עם ברווזים, תרנגולים וכלבים נפלאים. מאי ומשפחתה היו מאש נחמדים, תקשרו איתנו באנגלית, סייעו לנו בכל דבר: תכנון טיולב הזמנת מוניות, כביסה וכל דבר שהיינו צריכים. נהנינו מאד גם בטיול טרקינג שלקחנו איתה. בסוף מאי אפילו נתנה לי ולחברה שלי מתנה שהכינה עבורנו.  בקיצור, מומלץ מאד.

If you come to Sapa, you have to stay here! The place is incredible, surrounded by nature! May and her family are very welcome and friendly. I suggest you to do the hiking with them as you will see incredible views. Additionally the food they make is absolutely delicious.

Our stay was absolutely fabulous! The host went above and beyond to ensure our comfort and enjoyment. The place was immaculate, beautiful, and equipped with everything we needed. The location was perfect, and the views were breathtaking. We felt truly at home and cannot wait to come back. the food is probably the best we have tried in Vietnam and may and her family are adorable.
I will come back for sure
Highly recommend!
---

Without a doubt, staying here was the highlight and best part of our trip. May, Cao, and Hua were amazingly gracious hosts! We looked forward to every single home-cooked meal, and the activities were so fun and special. Once in a lifetime experience - breathtaking views and hosts that made us feel right at home. We are already planning our next trip back!

we enjoyed our stay at May's place. her hospitality is superb and we thoroughly enjoyed ourselves. she prepared nice meals for us.
the only downside is that it is in a village which means that it would be more challenging to walk around on our own. if we stayed there long enough, we should be able to navigte around the village, but it requires travelling up and down hill to get to nearest amenities by foot.
otherwise, May and her family took great care of us and gave us good advice and recommendation and made our stay very memorable. we will definitely recommend her place and do it again if we have the chance.

May와 그의 가족들의 친절한 환대에 감사합니다. 환상적인 오토바이 투어를 통하여 SAPA의 아름다운 진면목을 알게되고 현지인 가정을 방문하여 그들과 같이 식사를 하고 담소를 나눈것 등은 잊지 못할것 같습니다. 가장 잊지못할 추억은 저의 일행이 죽순요리가 맞있다고 하자, 직접 산에 올라가서 죽순을 채취해와서 죽순요리를 해준것은 진짜 감동이었습니다.
May와 그 가족들의 친절한 환대는 잊지못할것 같습니다.

We had a great experience enjoying the quiet of the village! The communication was extremely smooth from the very beginning, the room was lovely and clean, the food was simply amazing. We really enjoyed the hike through the rice fields with Mây.
Superb experience staying with May and family. She has all you need for a quality escape from city’s hustle bustle. Just book your stay with May, pack your bag and indulge in the peace of mind!

A Perfect Mountain Retreat for Families
Our family of four had a wonderful stay here. Mẩy is an exceptionally gracious host—every meal was delicious and made with fresh, local ingredients. Her son, Cáo, was incredibly helpful with communication before and during our visit, making everything smooth and easy.
Though it’s off the beaten track, that’s exactly what made it the perfect retreat. The peaceful setting, far from tourist crowds, gave our kids a chance to explore nature, spot wildlife, and meet friendly farm animals. It was restful, beautiful, and full of charm. Skeptical of leaving behind their screens when we came, after three nights here, our kids didn’t want to leave when it was time!
What made the experience even more special was learning about the Dao minority, to which Mẩy and her family belong. Their warmth and connection to the land gave us a deeper appreciation for the culture of this region.

May and her family are extremely welcoming hosts! They are very friendly and often took the initiative to find out about our plans, so that they can accommodate to us.
The location is very peaceful and a great getaway into the village! May recommended many activities for us to do, such as trekking, motorbike tour, climbing fansipan mountain (all guided by her or Cao), so you won’t have to stress too much about finding local guides!
The Airbnb is located at least 30min away from sapa town by car, and there’s only two taxi drivers who are skilled enough to drive through the bumpy terrain of the villages to get to the Airbnb! May and Cao are very quick to contact them whenever we needed the transport.
The food prepared by May and her family is extremely delicious too! Lots of fresh vegetables and fruits :)
I did not have trouble communicating with May and Cao as they can speak English well!
Overall I highly recommend this airbnb, I hope to come back one day!
Simply Beautiful… A treat to all five senses in paradise. Most of all, the warm and uncompromising hospitality will forever etched in our memories…

I cannot say enough good things about May, her family, and this place. It really is a little oasis in the rice fields! We loved everything about our stay - from our bungalow (which was very clean and comfortable), to the food (so delicious), and most of all, to May, Cao, and the entire family for welcoming us with such open arms. We were really looking forward to this leg of our trip to Vietnam and it was beyond our expectations. Simply perfect. Staying here is our highlight and a must if you’re in the region!
We highly recommend doing the trek, and enjoying the home cooked meals (with other visitors if you’re lucky) - such nice moments!

Staying with May and her lovely family was unique, special, and a true privilege. May was not only generous with the food servings (such yummy food!!) but also with her time and patience. She answered my million questions with so much patience and always with a smile. My kids and I enjoyed being her guests immensely and felt immediately very welcome. The surrounding area is so gorgeous and the bungalow itself was very nice and comfortable. We went on a hike in the mountains and bamboo forest, the views were breathtaking and we even stopped at a waterfall and were able to jump in for a swim. The hike was not so easy especially after the rain, but May was attentive and made sure we were okay. At night we had the herbal bath and that too was a lovely experience. We will cherish our time with May, her family and the dogs. Thank you, lovely family!

Zalige verblijfplaats als je houdt van rust en natuur. Weg van de drukte in Sa Pa, maar toch niet ver weg als je even wat meer actie wil. Scootertocht van één dag gedaan. Een echte aanrader (bij mooi weer). Prachtige vergezichten en s middags eten bij locals (lekker). Ook het medicinaal kruidenbad was een ervaring. May was een zeer goede gastvrouw. Ze doet je onmiddellijk thuis voelen. Het eten (zowel ontbijt, lunch als diner) is zeer lekker (bedankt aan May’s schoondochter). Wij hebben ontzettend genoten van ons verblijf.

expérience hors norme en dehors des hordes touristiques.
accueil exceptionnel de la part de may et de sa famille.
nourriture, convivialité et disponibilité sont les maîtres mots de l'hébergement.
sans oublier la quiétude.
A découvrir très vite !!
merci du fond du cœur ❤️

May and her family were super kind and accommodative. They took great care of us and even allowed us to cook a vegetarian meal in their kitchen. May helped us gather the ingredients from the market, communicate with the locals and took us around to get an idea of their village. We had an awesome time at her place

We had a wonderful stay at May Homestay!
May and her husband are incredibly kind and welcoming—we truly felt at home.
The food they prepared for us was absolutely delicious!
We would have loved to stay longer if we could, and we hope to come back one day.
Definitely the best homestay!
Anton, Claire & Milo

Tôi đã đi và đến rất nhiều lần, mỗi lần tình yêu của tôi với gia đình anh chị Siệu Mẩy, ngôi làng và những đứa trẻ quanh nhà lại nhiều hơn.
Mỗi lần tới đây tôi cảm giác như về một mái nhà yên bình với đầy tính văn hóa bản địa. Tôi được tiếp đón nồng hậu và không thấy có khoảng cách giữa các thành viên trong gia đình.
Một nơi rất đáng tới và lưu trú dài ngày, nhất là khi bạn cần sự bình yên trong tâm trí và trái tim.

We had an absolutely amazing stay! The place was truly magical, and May and her family were incredibly welcoming and helpful throughout our visit. They helped us organize a reliablie taxi, they helped with our bags in the middle of the night, they were great companions during the meals and awesome guides through adevntures.
It was undoubtedly the highlight of our trip.
We took advantage of most of the available amenities, and every experience was well worth it—especially the motorbike trip through the villages, which was breathtaking at every stop.
And the food… wow! Every day, we looked forward to dinner and supper, as each meal was not only delicious but also a chance to try dishes we had never experienced before.
Thank you for making our stay so special. We would highly recommend this place to anyone looking for unforgettable experience.

Amazing homestay! Can not recommend it more! Unfortunately we had an illness in our group and had to leave early, which May and her family fully understood and where so helpful getting us back to the city! Great family, great food!

The happy bungalow was exactly described!! May and Cao were the best hosts and made amazing food, took us on great adventures and were overall so hospitable and welcoming. Very easy to connect with the family as well as other travelers who were there. Thank you so so much for an amazing stay!!!

May and her family are great hosts, probably the best I've had on airbnb. We felt right at home.
The cabin was very clean and well maintained. They also arranged transport to and from the village for us.
I'd visit again in a heartbeat!

May and Cao were very hospitable from the beginning. We stayed in a lovely little cabin they built in their garden. At night, they provided us with mosquito nets, which was greatly appreciated given that we were in the mountains.
They prepared delicious and varied dinner and breakfast for us and offered a trekking tour for the next day. May was our guide and explained everything about their culture and the rice fields they work in.
We loved the place and the experience, and we would definitely return if we came back.

It was a beautiful experience in sapa. Situated away from the hustle bustle of streets. U see the beauriful mountains very peaceful. We had a villa with both g space and three room with all the amenities. Kids ahd good space to relax n have fun. It was amazing experience.. I would recommend everyone if u want to be in the lap of nature n have real feel of Sapa you should definitely go for this property. Heartful Thanks to our host Jenny. She was so helpful, alway available she even arranged for the baby diapers. Thank you Jenny.. We are taking back beautiful memories of Sapa.

I had a great stay at this Airbnb! A big highlight was the host- they were incredibly responsive, helpful, and made the whole experience smooth and stress-free. I really appreciated the warm welcome and the wonderful gift, which was such a lovely surprise. Highly recommend this place to anyone looking for a pleasant and hassle-free stay!

We had a wonderful time at this beautiful, spacious stay nested in a peaceful neighbourhood with a breathtaking view. Special thanks to Jenny for all her help and great recommendations. We'd love to visit again for a longer duration.

하노이행버스가 갑자기취소되어서
두려웠다 제니에게 어려움을 애기하니 적극도와주었어요.
제니가 버스예약과 결제까지해주어서 우리는 하노이에 도착해 집에 갈수있었어요. 좋은경치에집과
든든한 제니가있어 다음에도
올겁니다.

Jenny was very proactive in connecting us to other vendors like motorbike and trekking. We really appreciate all the food recommendations and help in booking of train tickets. Apart from the insects that invaded our abode, everything else was sensational.

Heel fijn verblijf dichtbij het centrum van Sa Pa maar toch heel rustig met mooi uitzicht! Ruime woonkamer en leuk terras. De hosts waren heel vriendelijk en regelde alles voor ons in korte tijd. Scooters, trektochten en vervoer midden in de nacht naar huisje. Ook was ze altijd bereikbaar voor aanbevelingen en liet ze ons onze spullen wat langer in het huisje laten! Zeker aan te raden

The stay with Jenny was so great. She even booked our sleeper bus going to and from hanoi-sapa. The place was on hilltop, perfect for group vacations and for a peaceful goodnight sleep far from the busy center. Although far from the busy center, the sapa station is walkable under 1 km.
They also helped us with our bags/luggage.
They gave us a tour cheaper than klook.
Thank you, Jenny and Thung.

The place was perfect for our party. Jen was so friendly and always communicated with us. She booked a Sapa hike, motorbikes, a BBQ, and even a driver to pick us up at the bus station. Apart from the house being up in the hills, Jen brings the most value to this Airbnb. I recommend it 100%; our party of 4 loved it.

Beautiful home in Sapa with a really nice view. The place is very spacious, clean and cozy. Really felt like home away from home :) It is also near from the tourist spots in Sapa.
Communication was seamless! Jenny and Thanh are very responsive, kind and accommodating ensuring our stay comfortable from start to finish. They even gave my mom a bouquet of flowers as present for her birthday ❤️ they also helped us booked our sleeper bus ticket and also helped us with our tour. We never had any issues in our stay here.
Thank you, Jenny and Thanh for having us. Your warm welcome and generous hospitality made our stay truly memorable. We’re grateful for the wonderful time spent in your lovely home. 😊

أقمت عند هذا المضيف وكانت التجربة متوسطة بشكل عام. الإعلان ذكر وجود غسالة ملابس ولكن لم تكن موجودة فعليًا، وهذا كان مخيبًا المكان أيضًا غير مناسب لكبار السن بسبب وجود درج مرتفع الحمامات تفتقر إلى التهوية الجيدة، ولا تحتوي على فتحات مناسبة لذلك الأسرة لم تكن نظيفة بما يكفي، وكان المنزل بشكل عام مكتومًا رغم وجود منقّي هواء، إلا أن المكان بحاجة إلى أكثر من جهاز ليكون الهواء أفضل.
ورغم أن مبلغ السكن كان عاليًا جدًا، إلا أن مستوى الراحة والخدمات لا يوازي التكلفة. ومع ذلك، لا يمكن إنكار أن الإطلالة كانت جميلة جدًا، والمكان يحمل طابعًا هادئًا، لكنه بحاجة لبعض التحسينات ليكون أكثر ملاءمة للنزلاء

The place is peaceful. Outside it was a picturesque. You can see the mountain and the fields.
For a large group like us, the place was perfect, we avoided the hustle and bustle of Sapa square.
Our host (Jenny) was exceptional. She consistently provides high level of kindness and helpfulness. She arranged our sleeper bus from Hanoi to Sapa, find a limousine for us and consistently provide us with assistance. She’s sweet and very friendly.
The place is highly recommended to guest who wants a peaceful and comfort of a home.
Beautiful view from the house. It’s a great location that is walking distance from Sapa’s center. Host is responsive and very helpful.

Thanh & Jenny were amazing hosts.
The place was serine. Few minutes from the center.
Jenny went over and beyond and accommodated us with any warm hospitality.
Thanh and Jenny very responsive hosts. Everything just right. We would definitely book again if we go to Sapa. Thanks for hosting us!
المضيف ودود وحجز لنا الباص الليلي الى المطار، وطلبت منه تنظيف ونظفوا لنا بدون مقابل ، البيت كان لا باس به الصالة والمطبخ ممتازه، غرف النوم والحمامات بحاله متوسطه

Very humble and helping host, I must say!
House design and location are just too good; view is so mesmerising that we didn’t bother to go our much.

Amazing, will come back a hundred times!!!
Great service, even picked us up from bus station for free! really touching <~<
Recommended 100%
Would definitely recommend. Amazing location with insane view and great place! Host was very communicative and very helpful as well!
Great location and host!

My friends and I had such an amazing time at La Maison SAPA, with its great scenery and restaurant colocated with the bungalow. It also had many cute kittens that we could play with. Most importantly the staff were super friendly and proactive, assisting us with check ins and even giving recommendations on places to go!
We wished we could’ve stayed for longer :)

A heartfelt thank you to the entire team for taking such great care of us! We had easy access to activities that truly reflect the local culture and surroundings. The restaurant next door is a real highlight — serving delicious coffee, fresh juices, and even featuring some adorable little animals that made our experience even more special.

Hosts were very accomodating and helpful. Our enquiries were always answered promptly which made our travel plans smooth. Arrangements for transport was also hassle-free. Definitely recommend staying here if you are looking for a peaceful place away from the busy city/town. Huge thanks to Sen for always ensuring everything was accounted for!

The place is in Ta Van, just outside Sa Pa: is actually really nice!
Way more relaxed, beautiful surroundings and not as busy Sa Pa. Lots of great coffee places and cafes around. So location a 10!
The host is actually amazing, helped us a lot with e.g. renting a scooter & taxi and was soooo quick in responsive. Really nice! 😊
They had kittens at the garden (too cute!) & the whole ‘common area’ was extremely beautiful. Surrounded by green and everything is made from wood :)
The reason we’re not giving five stars is because we thought price-wise it was quite expensive for the house you get. The mattress was on the ground, and there was construction very early in the morning.

La Maison was exactly as described, no frills but exactly everything you would need. I went in early May and it was summer, but Truc provided many fans to keep us cool and the house was always breezy so the heat was not an issue at all.
Truc, Sen and Nicole were extremely helpful and accommodating the entire trip, sorted out transport and treks for me. Very responsive as well. Thank you so much for making sure that my stay in Sapa was as wonderful as it can be.
PS: the resident cat has won my heart.

머무는 동안 매우 정확하고 빠르게 모든 걸 도와주셨어요! 강아지와 고양이들도 너무 귀엽고 사랑스러운 장소였습니다.💖
아침마다 아름다운 풍경을 보며 조식을 먹는 게 정말 즐거웠어요 근처에 멋진 카페도 많아서 둘러보기 좋아요 사파 시내보다는 타반마을의 숙소를 추천해요~!

좋은점 1.타반 지역 여행지와 가까움 2.인스타용 사진찍기에 적당함
나쁜점 1. 온수 사용이 어려움 2.제공되는 물 및 컵 위생 의심스러움 3. 사진과 많이차이남

Environnement très paisible avec une belle vue sur les montagnes et rizières. A l’écart de la ville sans charme de Sapa. Logement agréable, très beau restaurant où nous prenions le petit-déjeuner. Je trouve juste dommage qu’il n’y avait personne sur place avec qui nous pouvions échanger sur les activités aux alentours. Je recommande tout de même fortement ce logement car le cadre est magnifique et très ressourçant.
Such a beautiful serene spot! Free breakfast in the mornings was delicious, and we loved getting to know all the animals on the property. Close to lots of great food and beautiful surroundings!

This place was stunning. The location is great, we initially thought it would be closer to Sa Pa City but in the end, we were so happy about the location (it’s a 30 minutes drive from Sa Pa City). The village is lovely with plenty of beautiful restaurants around where you can just chill and relax. The home is on the same property as a cafe/restaurant that has a cozy vibe with kind cats and dogs. The staff and hosts were amazing, helped us out a bunch (laundry, taxi and more).
Were we to come back, we would most likely book this place again.

We had a great stay at the bungalow, and we celebrated our first wedding anniversary here. The village is amazing (sooo much better than Sapa) and it offers everything you need — beautiful nature and views, lots of trekking trails, there are also restaurants, bars, shops and even a good spa. The garden in front of the house and the decoration really stood out. Truc and Thi Sen were very responsive and helped us with everything we needed.
Breakfasts were ok (big portions, but not as great in taste as we were used to in Vietnam). On the downside, I think the cabin could use more storage space — the overall aesthetic suffers when our things are scattered on the floor. Also, unfortunately, the bungalow area wasn’t very peaceful — we were often woken up in the morning by construction noises, drilling, and so on.

This place was absolutely stunning. Very rustic and charming, perfect spot for an artistic soul. Doesn't have all the fancy amenities, but has everything you need. The view of the mountain from my bed every morning was magical. The traditional Dzay set menu was one of the best meals I've ever had. And the homebrew ginger beer changed my life. The hosts are friendly and helpful. The design of the garden and the art gallery show an excellent eye. 1000/10

“I had an unforgettable stay at this beautiful and artistic property in Sapa, run by the kindest hosts. Nicole, the host, went above and beyond to make my stay special—she showed me around, introduced me to her friends, and shared the rich history of the area. The property itself is stunning, with its own art gallery, café, and so much more. My only regret is not staying longer. I can’t wait to return and spend more time here!”

Peaceful place that is slightly away from Sapa town. Simple but delicious breakfast was provided as well. Love the drinks specially the coconut coffee at Sa Moc!

Nicole was very responsive and easily contactable whenever we have question or require a driver.
The 4 cats and 2 dogs hosts were super cute and welcoming, making the place so memorable ❤️
Highly recommend this place!
Best place eveeer, felt like I was living in a dream land! You’ll need a bike to go into the city centre but the location was beautiful. Just like the pictures

Our stay at La Maison was memorable. Cute bungalow in the town of Ta Van which has a very relaxed atmosphere. The restaurant linked to the homestay was the highlight with delicious food, great hospitality and cozy atmosphere.

We were advised by friends who have recently stayed in Sapa town to stay In one of the outskirt villages and we couldn’t agree more. Ta Van was peaceful and quiet it felt rural but still very close to Sapa which we enjoyed checking out for day trips. The bungalow has amazing mountain views and is at the base of where many of the walks and treks start. Water was hot, bathroom was clean, bed had an electric blanket which was perfect. Highlight of our stay was the warm hospitality of the cafe/restaurant that is next door to the bungalow ‘Sa Moc’ delicious food and drink, very welcoming! The host and Sen were quick to respond and very helpful with booking activities and taking care of any queries we had. Would recommend to friends 100%

Die Unterkunft ist in einem sehr süßen Dorf etwas außerhalb von Sa Pa gelegen. Die Unterkunft selbst, wie auch das Dorf sind sehr schön, gemütlich und künstlerisch gestaltet und wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt. Es gibt super schöne Cafés und Restaurants und wir haben uns in dieser ruhigen Ecke sehr wohlgefühlt. Die GastgeberInnen waren auch sehr kommunikativ und hilfsbereit!

Wow! Where to even start. The stay was fantastic. Had come from Hanoi and needed somewhere quieter and this was the place.
As soon as we arrived we felt so peaceful. The amazing surroundings paired with the beautiful bungalow was something I won’t forget.
The location is 20 minutes taxi from sapa town but staying a little bit further away was actually so much nicer. The village offers restaurants, drinks and plenty of cute animals.
The food at Truc’s was also good, very generous portions.
Thank you, will be recommending to many other travellers heading to Sapa.

Truc was great, so responsive and helpful. Helped us book a taxi and get a motorbike. The surroundings are beautiful, it’s so cozy and pretty, there are cozy lights in the night. It’s peaceful generally but there was a lot of construction work going on around the place when we stayed during Christmas so was a bit loud.
Food and coffee is good and definitely try the homemade wines. The only thing was that the rest of the staff felt a bit unwelcoming and unhelpful, only nice when around the owner. Overall would recommend!

The aesthetics of this place is just beyond words. We stayed here for 3 nights and we loved every bit of it. Nicole was so friendly and helping host.. If I’m in Sa Pa, I won’t choose any other place than this.

Had an awesome couple days. Even with rainy weather the vibe of this spot did not disappoint. Piano music, good food, kind people, cute stores nearby, an incredibly bakery down the way, kind people, and the best kittens. Highly recommend.

My friend and I spent six nights at La Maison and loved it. The four kittens were a bonus. The restaurant onsite was charming and delicious. Truc found a great trekking guide for us and the scenery was amazing. Lovely place to unplug and relax.

My stay at La Maison was nothing short of spectacular. If you're looking to get away from it all, but still have access to some sightseeing, bars and restaurants, this is the place to go. Truc is an incredible host; proactive in communication and replies within minutes of any questions asked. Truc is also super helpful and was able to arrange a scooter during my stay as well as a driver for an evening out and to take me to the bus station.
I am going bak to Vietnam and this place is on the top of my list!

The family house is in the middle of their tribe's village, in the Ta Van mountainous area.
Their viillage was filled with ducks and chickens, other pets, so much nature and amazing views whichever way you looked. I had a lovely stay with the family.
Most of all I really enjoyed the homemade fresh food they had to cooked everyday. Their cooking made me think of home.
Thank you everyone 🫰🏾🥰

If you come to Sapa don't miss the chance to stay with this family.  May, Sieu, Cao, and Hoa really put a lot of themselves into their little homestay.   The village is off the main road and the homestay is at the end of the village,  a very tranquil place.   You will be surrounded by Red Dao language and culture.  Home cooked meals are fantastic.   Also don't miss the motorbike and walking tours.  I will certainly be back next time I'm in the neighborhood!

Excellent séjour à l’écart de la frénésie de Sapa. Nous y avons passé trois nuits.
Le premier soir nous avons pu profiter d’un bain traditionnel aux herbes après le dîner. Le lendemain nous avons choisi la journée complète en moto qui était superbe et le dernier jour une demie journée de trekking qui était très agréable. La nourriture était excellente. Je recommande à 100%

Place might be far from the city but it's worth the travel there for us as we're there for the nature. Love the surroundings as we managed to enjoy both foggy weather and sunny weather. May and family is also very welcoming and friendly. Never fail to answer any questions we have for them.

We had a wonderful time here! Even though we visited during the Tet holiday, May welcomed us right into her family. We loved walking around the village, petting all the dogs, and eating home-cooked dinner together every night. We also really enjoyed trekking in the mountains and doing herbal bath at night. May and her family were extremely accommodating, they even drove us by motorbike to our taxi driver so that we would make it to our bus on time. We will definitely come back here again in the future!

Amazing location, beautiful surroundings and incredible people. Best Airbnb we’ve stayed at in Vietnam and one of the best Airbnbs overall. Sa pa was the highlight of our Vietnam trip and a lot of that was down to May and her family. We thoroughly enjoyed her home cooked meals, conversations with her and her family, walks in the area, motorcycles tour, pets and the accommodation. Highly recommended for an authentic experience.

There aren't the words to describe our experience with May and her lovely family. It truly made our trip to Vietnam unforgettable. Beautiful place and beautiful people.  We did the days walk, the day motorbike trip and had an amazing herbal bath. All of it was fantastic. The food was amazing and getting an opportunity to stay in an authentic village was something I will never forget. Very sad to leave. I couldn't recommend this more.

Der Aufenthalt bei May und ihrer lieben Familie wird unvergesslich bleiben. Wer in das vietnamesische Leben (oder in das der Dao) eintauchen möchte, ist hier genau richtig. Abgeschieden in wunderschöner Natur, aber nicht abseits (easy Transport per Taxi, 40 min) waren es so schöne, erholsame Tage.
Alle Wünsche/ Touren werden von May und Cao (Sohn) super schnell organisiert und umgesetzt. Seien es Hiking-oder Motorradtouren durch die Berge oder die Wanderung auf den Fansipan.
Natürlich darf das Kräuterbad nicht unerwähnt bleiben, was bei unserem sehr nebligen Aufenthalt wunderbares Wellness war.
Wir würden jederzeit wieder kommen 🥰

Ich würde auch mehr Sterne vergeben wenn möglich! May und ihre Familie haben mir die beste Zeit in Asien beschert! Ich habe mich wie ein Teil der Familie fühlen dürfen! Leider war ich viel zu kurz da, aber ich werde wiederkommen! Liebe Grüße an alle und macht auf jeden Fall die Motorrad Tour mit May und nehmt das Kräuter Bad 🫡

Ich hatte aus Versehen eine Nacht zu früh gebucht, was absolut mein Fehler war, jedoch war May sehr verständnisvoll und hat das Datum einfach angepasst. Die Unterkunft ist alleine zwar schwer aufzufinden, aber uns ist jemand aus der Familie entgegengekommen und in die Unterkunft gebracht. Es war ein ruhiger Ort mit fantastischer Aussicht. Wir haben eine Halbtags-Wanderung mit May gebucht und keinen Cent bereut. Außerdem hat das Frühstück alle Erwartungen übertroffen. Ich würde den Aufenthalt bei May nur empfehlen! Dankeschön May!
we had a great time with May and her Family. the Herbal Bath is a must do. she allowed us to cook Indian food in her kitchen which was one of the biggest highlights.
We’ve been welcomed by May as we were family. The place that was created by her family is amazing and we recommend it to anyone.
It was amazing. I highly recommend this experience

We had an absolutely perfect stay at Loi's place, Maison de Sapa. The hotel and room were top clean and confortable. The staff was super helpful and offer lots of services. Loi was proactive, reactive and flexible. The breakfast was delicious. The location of the hotel was great. We like so much that we extended our stay of two nights. We definitely recommend for a stay in Sa Pa.

This was the BEST place we have stayed in Vietnam! A 10-15 minute walk to the main restaurants & church (where you meet for trekking). They provide a free brekky & have free fruit & tea for the guests. The staff here are so so helpful & friendly. The room was so clean & tidy, great bathroom & shower! A very quiet area with lots around. A great place for people who work remotely as there are lots of tables & chairs with a quiet working space & power points! Defs recommend this place!!!!

We loved our stay, from the process of checking in to checking out were pleasant. The staff here are the sweetest and friendliest. Not to mention the bed is extremely comfortable, not the typical hard bed that is common in Vietnam. You can tell they use quality bed sheets, soap
and there's always running hot water. They even have good options for breakfast. It's only a 5 minute walk to the Sapa Station and center, the only downside is the hill back up but not bad. There's marts along the way and few restaurants. Overall highly recommend here!

Tout était excellent ! La chambre parfaitement identique à l’annonce, un accueil incroyable.
On m’a trouvé un trek magnifique de 2 jours dans les montagnes à la dernière minute et qui a été exceptionnel ! Je n’aurais pas pu trouver mieux ailleurs. L’hôte est adorable et serviable ce qui a rendu le séjour ici excellent !
Merci pour tout !

My stay at Maison de Sapa couldn’t have been better.
Although I had some minor issues on my check-in (my grab took me to the wrong address, not host’s fault), the staff was really helpful and kind, even though I was tired and cranky about it.
The place is perfect, I mean it. It’s clean, comfortable (the bed/pillows were the BEST), the breakfast is tasty, the host is responsive and attentive and kind. The location is great as well, as it’s a bit secluded but just a 9 min walk to the city centre. I cannot think of any complaints whatsoever. I strongly recommend this place if you’re looking to relax while exploring Sapa! Thanks for everything, specially for your patience and kindness.
so.nice people nin this place! they help us with the luggages, they kept them because of our trekking trip to sapa for 1 day! I suggest you the French  toast as a breakfast,  it was delicious!!
Thanks for being so helpful and lovely girls! Lovely place and pleasant experience
had a fantastic stay, front of house staff were really helpful, the room was nice and a location just a short work into town was a good fit to explore Sapa.

It wasn’t too bad of a location since it was near Sapa town. However,  there were bugs, spiders and ants in the room. Some of the towels were dirty as well. It was a pretty cheap airbnb but I would pay for a better apartment next time as this room felt dirty and unsafe to live in. Owner was super nice and friendly though. Would recommend staying here if you are not afraid of insects.

A good value stay in Sa Pa with a lovely wine bar to relax and meet the other guests. The room was comfy with a nice view. The only issue is there are no windows & we found the room to smell fairly damp & there was significant condensation on the walls, otherwise a good stay!

Le logement proposé correspond totalement à la description. Quelques minutes à pied seulement du centre-ville. Quartier hyper calme, le logement est propre. Le gros + est l’hôte que l’on a pu rencontrer, bien avant d’arrivée, son aide, ses instructions nous ont facilité. Il est extrêmement souriant et gentil. Pleins de bons conseils et de bonnes adresses.
Encore merci

Had an amazing stay with Anh (one of the 3 idiots 😄)!
There was a power issue at the original place, so they moved us to their new property — but they handled it so smoothly with great communication plus its close proximity to the bus station was cherry on top!
The room was super clean and had everything we needed. The hosts were really sweet. They let us leave our bags after checkout, and even let us shower before heading out.
Would totally recommend for a chill, stress-free stay in Sapa!

Had a great time staying at Whisper Home. It had all the amenities needed for the weather, and most importantly, it was very close to the city center - a 5 minute walk, yet it was quiet and peaceful. I would definitely recommend it and stay there again when I visit Sapa. And also the Host were super responsive and warm. Thank you.❤️

I loved the vibe of the place. It seems remote because of the exclusive vibe but actually it is super close to Sun Plaza, restaurants and stores. Beside it is The Mist where you can get coffee and breakfast. The room is clean and the bed is big, even has a heater since Sapa is cold when we were there. Overall, I loved our stay.
Too bad we were not able to spend the first night there because of my poor scheduling (we booked 2 nights). I would have liked to enjoy what the bar has to offer. Did I mention there is a bar just right outside our room? Will definitely come back and this place is super recommended!

such a nice vibe i was having while staying here. it has a bar with good beverages too. make friends while hanging out there. the owner is so friendly and overall experience there is fun and memorable🫶🏼

We will keep a very cool and great memory of our stay. Yen is so kind, sweet and really carring 😊 We really feel like we was a part of the home. it's very nice to share a talk with him and he will always do his best to help you or plan your day. He''s a very great bartender with unique and delicious homemade cocktails. I would love to be stay here again ! i recommand 100%

Perfekt für einen Aufenthalt in Sapa! Das Zimmer liegt ca. 10min entfernt vom Zentrum. Man kann alles fußläufig erreichen, hat aber trotzdem Ruhe. Die Zimmer sind groß und verfügen über alles was man braucht. Im zweiten Stock gibt es zudem einen Aufenthaltsraum mit Snacks, Getränken und Gesellschaftsspielen. Abend kann man zudem in der anliegende Bar etwas trinken.
Die Kommunikation mit den Hosts ist einfach und schnell. Es gibt zudem die Möglichkeit über diese Trekkingtouren zu buchen.

Such a beautiful house with the nicest host you could ever ask for! We got the middle room which had the bar right outside so coming back in the evening, you could enjoy a drink right before going to bed! The owners were mindful enough to keep the music at a comfortable level too so it wouldn’t affect guests even if you’re just resting in the room. About the location, it was far enough from the city centre for a peaceful night of sleep, but close enough on foot to plenty of food places & even the Sapa station to Fansipan. The hosts helped us with pretty much all questions we had as well & even with a bike rental 🤣 All in all, top notch hosting & couldn’t recommend this listing more for a pleasant stay in Sapa!
très bon logement à Sapa bien situé avec une jolie vue au réveil ! l'hôte a été super réactif lorsqu'il y a eu un problème de ménage
Hosts were super nice and also they ran a cozy bar. We had a great time chilling at the bar as well. Overall, we enjoyed the stay!

이 곳은 사파에 도착한 날 시내 호텔과 고민하다 고른 곳이에요. 기존 리뷰를 꼼꼼히 읽었고 결정을 하게된 이유는 가격때문이었지요. 여기를 한마디로 말하자면 “사파의 낭만” 이라고 할 수 있겠네요.
장점
1. 유연한 체크인, 보통 사파에 새벽 도착일정이 많은데 얼리체크인이 당연한게 아님에도 호스트님은 여건이 되는한 최대한 배려를 해주셔서 감명깊었습니다.
2. 숙소 위치, 도보이용가능! 한국인에게 유명한 반미집, 마사지집, 카페, 썬월드역 모두 5-10분이내 도보컷 가능합니다. 처음엔 외진 곳이라 생각했는데 검색해서 가보니 다 숙소근처에 있었어요. 특히 (더미스트사파) 카페는 숙소 들어가는 입구 옆에 있어서 놀라웠습니다🙂
3. 호스트yen과 경비견choi~!
두 분 모두 사파를 사랑하며 애정이넘쳐요. 길지나다니다보면 초이를 심심치 않게 만나는데 참 반갑구요. Yen 같은 경우 늦은 귀가에도 항상 친절히 반겨줍니다. 그리고 숙소 건물 바로 옆에 바도 운영되는데 이곳이 사파의 낭만을 끌어올리는데 최고였어요. 바텐더가 만들어주는 칵테일 한잔과 yen의 따뜻한 마음과 포그 사파 속 낭만을 느껴보시려면 한번 묵어보시겠어요?
단점
1. 오르막길이 많음. 캐리어 같은 경우는 이동이 힘들 수 있으나 그랩이 숙소 초입구까지는 오니까 커버가능. 단 숙소입구에서 숙소까지는 힘 좀 써야하나 고생 끝에 낙이온다는 것을 절실히 느낄 수 있음. (체크아웃 땐 yen 도와줌)
2. 난방시설(침대 전기매트, 전기히터)가 있어 잠자는데는 무리가 없지만 씻고 나온 직후에는 잠시 추움. 전기히터가 좀 더 고성능으로 교체된다면 단점이 보완 될 듯 함.
장단점이 분명한 곳이었지만 여행을 마치고 돌아봤을 때 편히 묵었던 호텔들보다 기억에 많이 남는 곳이에요. 사실 단지 숙박만을 위한 선택지였는데 호스트yen 덕분에 사람의 따스함을 느꼈고, 사파를 보다 더 잘 이해할 수 있어서 참 행복했네요. 캠핑(글램핑) 좋아하시는 분이라면 적극 추천하는 곳입니다!!
(Yen의 한국어사용은 사랑스럽구요❤️

Une magnifique chambre, dans une maison proche de tout les restaurants et attractions de Sa Pa, avec des gérants adorables qui ont toujours été dispo à tout moment ! attention aux personnes qui ont vite froid cependant, la maison n’est pas chauffée et seul le lit est très chaud mais si vous êtes prêts à surmonter ça alors vous serez super bien ici !
Quiet, beautiful and near to the center of Tam Coc
Very nice atmosphere and overall lovely place and host!

had such a wonderful time staying with Whisper Home, on our first night, enjoyed the fireplace at the hidden bar :) the hosts gave us great advice on visiting Sapa and other parts of Vietnam, and it made the whole stay so much more memorable! the amenities provided really helped us to warm up in the Sapa cold too.
Yen the host also constantly checked in on us and was responsive to our questions.
there is a nice cafe located right beside this airbnb too. its also easy to get grab from there too.
MOST IMPORTANTLY, we love Chot the guard dog!!! 🐶🐶he was such a cutie, he followed us to the cafe and followed us back to the airbnb when we had to grab our stuff. he waited for grab with us when we had to leave too🥲🥲 dont forget to give him pats when you see him sleeping outside the rooms. we wish we had brought him some treats and blankets to warm him up (although the host mentioned that he prefers to stay outside) :)
a comfortable and peaceful stay in Sapa! the hosts are incredible and super helpful with everything needed. i would stay here again. thanks for a great stay.
Great place in the mountains
Very cool

Pavi’s home was wonderful! It is so beautiful and the surrounding area is peaceful and gorgeous. We were able to rent scooters that were brought right to the place and get recommendations for trekking in the area. We also got our laundry done and they were so helpful and responsive every time we had questions. And on top of that the cutest and sweetest dogs ever love there. Highly recommend!

The stay was very beautiful and surrounded by nature. It was peaceful and private. It was slightly away from the main Sapa market, but hey it was totally worth the time and the view. if I had to go there again would definitely be!

I had a great stay at Pavi Home! The place is absolutely worth it, from the beautiful views to the warm and welcoming staff. They were incredibly helpful in arranging my transport and tours, which made everything so convenient. What truly made the experience special was the people. Highly recommended!

We really enjoyed our stay at Pavi's. It is a beautiful place in a quiet area outside of Sa Pa. The host Jack and his super friendly dogs made us feel at home immediately!  The location and views are insanely beautiful. Food is good and we also loved the trekking tour with a local that Jack arranged for us. Definitely recommend if you want to stay outside the touristy city. It is also possible to rent a motor cycle and explore the area yourself.

Pavi a été très arrangeant et à l'écoute, il  a organisé une randonnée de 2 jours pour nous qui était exceptionnelle, a organisé notre transport pour la suite, nous a donné des recommandations. Il nous a été d'une grande aide. De plus, le logement était très sympathique et nous avons bien mangé. Merci !

Our stay at Pavi’s place was so lovely. The location is out of the busy tourist areas surrounded by local villages and rice fields, which was exactly what we wanted. The views from the top balcony stole our hearts as well as the cute puppy dogs! We felt very heard by all the staff and even when we asked to swap rooms the second day (because the bathroom fan wasn’t working), it was a swift and easy process. Such a beautiful family we would definitely recommend staying here.
Thank you 🥹🧡

Stayed with my partner for a few days there and we both love it. Peaceful and quiet. It’s around 30 mins drive from the Sapa town but if you can drive or rent a car shouldn’t be any issue to go around. Rental is available too and pretty good place to stay. You can hike near by waterfall as well if you’re adventurous. Hope to go back if there is a chance.

A beautiful, clean accommodation with a wonderful garden. The host was incredibly friendly and offered many services such as breakfast, dinner, and trekking tours. The driver who always took us to Sa Pa was also extremely friendly and helpful!
The only downside was the bathroom floor, which stayed wet for a long time after taking a shower.

Wir haben 5 Tage bei Pavi in der Unterkunft verbracht und waren super zufrieden. Die Unterkunft ist etwa 30 Minuten mit dem Auto bzw. Scooter von Sa Pa entfernt. Wir fanden das allerdings super, da es genug zu erleben in dem kleinen Ort selbst gab. Außerdem konnten wir super stressfrei über die Unterkunft günstig einen Scooter buchen, wodurch man die Gegend erkunden konnte.
Das Zimmer war sehr sauber und schön eingerichtet. Außerdem gab es immer jemanden vor Ort, falls man Hilfe brauchte oder man konnte Pavi direkt schreiben.
Absolut empfehlenswert auch für mehrere Tage! 😊

The perfect Home Stay. Jack is extremely friendly and you will for sure feel at home here. I visited in early December and they decorated the place, played Xmas music and we enjoyed the heat of the fire place. The room is spacious and comfortable. Views breathtaking. A driver can be arranged to take you to Sapa center which is approx. 25 minutes away.

Υπέροχο μέρος , πανέμορφο κατάλυμα , μαγικό μέρος για να χαλαρώσεις. Η οικογένεια που συναντήσαμε σε αυτό το μέρος ήταν όμορφη. Ευγενικά πρόσωπα και εξαιρετική αύρα. Προτείνουμε την διαμονή σας εκεί. Θα είναι μια ονειρική στιγμή στο ταξίδι σας.

Pavi is amazing! Wonderful service, quick responses, sincere guy. Stayed there for 3 nights. Pavi attends to your every need with immediacy. The host is very accommodating and friendly, check in was very smooth even at 10pm. He offers trekking services at a good price, which we would consider if it could fit in our itinerary. He has a driver that can bring you anywhere. Hailing grab is easy too! I’ve never once had difficulty even with such a location.
I missed breakfast timing once, but Pavi still brought the food to our room when he didn’t have to. I wasn’t the best patron, and still, wonderful service all round. The fried spring rolls is a must order!
A 10min straight walk along the road to Sapa Eco Villas where they offer spa+herbal services for cheap. Another scenic 10mins and it’s a really big supermarket called Thach Son. Another 5mins and you’re at Sailing Cafe!
The house is decent, but the view, service, and the cats/small dogs in the area will win your heart! I promise!

It was a very nice and private place to stay at but it would be better if they include shuttle to town. Communication barrier led to misunderstanding so it’s good to double confirm things with the host.

Excellent view, cute pets, very cozy. I enjoyed the food at the airbnb as well.
I did not plan much for my trip so I went ahead with the tours they provided. Did the tour with paint workshop and discovered their beautiful cafe right in the middle of the rice terraces 😍

Wir haben zwei Nächte hier verbracht.
Es ist schön ruhig gelegen und man hat eine tolle Aussicht.
Das Essen hier ist super lecker, es wird frisch zubereitet.
Das Zimmer hat alles was man braucht und man kann entspannt auf der kleinen Terrasse sitzen.
Wir konnten uns für einen Tag einen Roller ausleihen und habe eine Tour mit einem local durch die Reisfelder gemacht.
Es war sehr schön, wir kommen wieder.

H
We had a pleasant stay at Pavi’s. The view is beautiful and location is quiet. Our highlight was playing with the beautiful and friendly dogs. 🥰 Please note it is not close to amenities or restaurants so if you don’t have a motorbike, you are restricted to only eating at the homestay. The restaurant food is fine but pretty overpriced. Unfortunately it was quite hot and humid during our stay and the air conditioner in our room did not work effectively. The host gave us a fan but basically said it’s working fine and it’s just an old system when the air coming out was clearly not cool air…
It would have been nice to have a water refill station in the room since there was no way to buy more water without going into town.
Overall a nice place to consider staying at. Comfortable bed and nice hot shower!

Meine Freundin und ich verbrachten 5 wundervolle Nächte in dieser Unterkunft und können mit Sicherheit sagen, dass es die beste Unterkunft war, die wir in unseren 2 Monaten in Vietnam erlebt haben. Die außergewöhnliche Gastfreundschaft und das harmonische Zusammenleben mit der Natur und den süßen Hunden haben unseren Aufenthalt unvergesslich gemacht. Von der Ankunft bis zur Abreise war alles perfekt. Wir konnten sogar nach Absprache früher einchecken. Die Gastgeber sind unglaublich freundlich und haben uns das Gefühl gegeben, wie zu Hause zu sein. Das Essen ist unglaublich lecker und wird jeden Abend frisch zubereitet. Wir hatten hier die wahrscheinlich besten Frühlingsrollen unserer Reise. Die Umgebung ist atemberaubend und bietet eine Oase der Ruhe und Erholung. Es gibt viele Wandermöglichkeiten in der Nähe. Der Gastgeber hat uns viele Tipps und Empfehlungen gegeben. Wir können diese Unterkunft wärmstens empfehlen und werden auf jeden Fall wiederkommen.

Wir wurden herzlich im Homestay empfangen, nachdem uns ein persönlicher Fahrer aus Sapa Zentrum abgeholt hat. Der Ausblick ist wirklich beruhigend und der schönste von allen Homestays und Hotels, die wir gesehen hatten. Wir verbrachten hier 5 Nächte und waren sehr froh, dass es etwas weiter abseits war und wir den Blick und die Ruhe genießen konnten. Es werden verschiedene Trekking Touren angeboten. Die Zimmer waren einfach und ausreichend. Wir werden die Gastgeber, den Ort und die Hunde in positiver Erinnerung behalten.
Loved the food and the host - the room was alright!

Las habitaciones de Pavi son ideales si queires descubrir la naturaleza real de SA-PA, si bien son algo básicas pues se encuentran en la campiña yo no tuve ningún problema, entendemos que por el terreno y la ubicación rural puede haber algo de tierra, y pues humedad, sin embargo considero que Pavi y su familia intentan hacer todo lo posible por que el lugar sea agradable para la estadía, (yo solo cuidaría un poco más ciertos detalles de limpieza pero considero que son más culturales que un descuido en sí mismo) la comida de Pavi es deliciosa y barata, las motos son buenas y estables y a excelente precio, está algo alejado del pueblo pero vale la pena lo que gastas en ir y venir teniendo estas vistas tan espectaculares, sus perritos y su gato son un amor y en general el servicio es muy barato y bueno, volvería sin duda pues fue mi lugar favorito en Vietnam! Gracias.

We had a wonderful experience at this place. It is a basic but peaceful accommodation, perfect for relaxation. The view from the balcony overlooking the valley is absolutely stunning, especially in the morning when watching the sunrise. We also greatly appreciated the meals, BBQ, and hotpot. The host's attentiveness made our stay even more enjoyable. This is definitely a place we would return to in the future.

We would absolutely recommend anyone staying here. Pavi's home has everything you need in the room and a nice little restaurant with the best cooking we had in Sapa, which they all make themselves. They have different daily hikes you can take and will help you wherever they can. We absolutely loved it!

Sur Pin is the town which is 30 minutes by car from SaPa. The host explained that they and other hosts had the same problem with airbnb who kept listing it as SaPa. The streets have no names so airbnb hasn’t figured this one out. The location is stunning and very peaceful away from the noise of Sapa which is far larger than I expected. Pavi is a terrific host and I highly recommend his place
Uitstekend verblijf met een prachtige locatie!

We loved our stay at the chalet. The host was extremely responsive and accommodating, catering to all of our needs and offering great recommendations. The meals were delicious. The chalet is in a very peaceful location away from the hustle and bustle of town. We wouldn't hesitate to stay again or recommend the chalet to our friends and families.

تجربتنا كانت رائعة جدًا! الموظف كان لطيفًا ومتعاونًا لأبعد الحدود، والمكان يتمتع بإطلالة جميلة ومساحة واسعة تناسب عددًا كبيرًا من الأشخاص. النقطة الوحيدة التي أتمنى تحسينها هي أن الطريق لم يكن معبّدًا بشكل كامل، فالوصول إلى الأعلى لم يكن سلسًا وهادئًا، بالرغم من أن السيارات تستطيع الوصول بسهولة. بشكل عام، المكان يستحق الزيارة وبالتأكيد سأكرر التجربة!

A very peaceful stay in the village. Amazing view. You don’t need to visit the fake Cat Cat village if you’re already staying in a real village.
The chef was great, he didn’t know english but that wasn’t a big issue. There’s also a very chill dog that roams around the house, but never comes inside. Felt right at home at Huyen’s place.

We had an amazing stay, Huyen was very helpful. Our bus came in 2 hours later than expected but she helped us with a taxi to the airbnb. The view was amazing. Very peaceful. Mr.River made us good breakfast and dinner. Felt very safe. Huyen also gave us recommendations for drivers and things to do.

We loved our stay in this beautiful chalet overlooking the mountains. The views were incredible and the garden around the house was lovely!
One thing to note for anyone considering staying here is that it is a 30-45 min drive from town - the roads are very rough from the recent typhoon. Other than that, this place was perfect :)
Thankyou again for all your help Huyen with finding taxis for our group of six and to Sung for his help with our suitcases.

Huyen’s home is far more than what we expected.. it definitely exceeded our expectations! EVERYTHING about the home is perfect. It is beautifully kept, so so so clean and tidy! It was spotless when we arrived. Mr River is absolutely amazing and so so helpful.. he cooked us so many delicious meals!
The views are stunning and it is just so peaceful up there.
Can not say enough good things about this stay. Only downfall is that we didn’t stay long enough!
Thank you for having us Huyen & Mr River!
We will be back one day ❤️
우리는 이 숙소에서 너무나 좋은 시간을 보냈습니다. 조용하고 전망좋은 산장에서 제대로 힐링한 느낌입니다. 호스트는 굉장히 적극적이고 친절하며 관리인 송씨 역시 많은 도움을 주었습니다. 깊은 산 속 우리들만의 별장을 원하시는 분들께 강력하게 추천합니다.

Stunning location with incredible views, perfect for those looking for a relaxing and peaceful trip. A super spacious home with beautiful dogs and an amazing chef. The host was able to help us arrange transportation into sapa the fridge was stocked with drinks and the bedrooms were well equipped for the cold weather with electric blankets and heaters. To get into sapa it is about a 40 minute drive but we were able to find drivers easily with the help of our host. A great place for families would highly recommend.

We loved every bit of our stay at Huyen’s place. Even if it was just overnight, we felt right at home. Huyen was very responsive, helped us with booking our rental taxi from the airport to the accommodation, and gave us suggestions on where to go. Unfortunately, due to the weather, we had limited visibility. We will definitely go back in the summer or spring. Thank you so much, Huyen!
Beautiful home with stunning surroundings. Host was kind and super responsive. Highly recommend!

ココはサパから離れた場所にあるので、夜はサパのタクシーは嫌がる人も居たが、
ホストは常に気にかけてくれ、タクシーの手配もしてくれたので、不自由なく過ごせた。何より朝靄の中で過ごす時間は至福で、ホームメイドリキュールは、白ワインの様に美味しかった。オススメします

Stunning view and a peaceful vibe. To get there you have to go through rough roads, so it’s not ideal if you plan to go back and forth to the town center often. Perfect for relaxing and enjoying the homestay.

Huyen’s home is amazing!!! We had such a perfect time. The house is beautiful and the surroundings are spectacular and so peaceful. Nice to be outside of town and away from busy areas. Huyen is incredibly kind and helpful and the perfect host. Can’t wait to stay again.

⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
This place in Sa Pa is absolutely the best! I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a peaceful, beautiful retreat. The space is incredibly spacious, and every corner feels like it’s straight out of a dream or a fairy tale. The tranquility and charm of the surroundings are unmatched!
Huyen and her husband are very welcoming host! They are very, very kind! Best host if you ask me!
It’s truly a perfect escape. If you’re visiting Sa Pa, this is the place to stay!

I knew the place was almost 30-40 minutes away from the city centre but chose it primarily for the amazing views and it was worth every penny. Huyen was really helpful and assisted us in every part of the journey. Cannot recommend this place enough. Such a gem✨️✨️✨️
Huyen’s place was beautiful! The surrounding mountain views were amazing. We also really appreciated Huyen helping us call our taxi and helping us with finding a tour guide.

Huyen is a great host, she made sure we were were fine throughout our stay and that we got back to Sa Pa from the house - even though a typhoon had just hit the north of Vietnam and roads were partially blocked. The housekeeper was also super friendly and helpful and a great cook. The rain caused by the typhoon had us stay inside but we still had a good time. Would love to come again to explore the beautiful mountain surroundings for hiking. All in all an accommodation to recommend!

Huyen is a great host! She helped us out a lot and was very responsive. The location, although a little hard to get to due to its distance from Sapa Town and the rough roads, is beautiful and serene. Huyen is able to arrange a taxi to get you to and fro Sapa Town, which helped us out tremendously.
The house also has a housekeeper that can prepare meals for you, something that we found convenient as it takes 30 minutes to get to town.
Overall, it was a pleasant stay.
Cudowne miejsce, przytulne i przestronne.   na zewnątrz cudowne widoki na góry, na zewnątrz przepiękny ogród. Miła cicha okolica. Gorąco polecam!

Huyen's house is really special, homely and creative. We did find the house a bit cold though - there is a fireplace downstairs, and it was cosy and nice to sit there and play boardgames and talk. Upstairs, we had electric heaters. The house is big, though, so we still felt cold while not under the covers or in front of the fire place.
Huyen is always quick to answer any questions and comunicates clearly. Mr Song made us very nice meals and kept the house tidy and clean.
I would absolutely love to come back during spring, summer or autumn to really take advantage of the house and it's amazing surroundings.

המקום מקסים! גדול ומסודר, מאובזר, הבעלים זמינים ואדיבים. אין מה לעשות באיזור אבל למי שמחפש קצת שקט ונחת זה המקום המושלם. הדירה מושלמת ומרווחת ויש פינות רביצה בכל מקום. היינו שם בחג (שומרי כשרות) והיה ממש נוח וכיף. ממליצים ממש!

I'm in love with this home! I questioned if it was worth it since it was just me and my boyfriend..and it was! The view is stunning and worth every penny. The house is so spacious, decorated well, and cozy. We are glad we chose to rent two motorbikes and drive separately with our bags since you have to make it up the mountain and some areas are rocky. It was a beautiful drive. Definitely pack what you want to drink/eat if you don't want to go back to town. There's some small shops, not too far by motorbike, that have beer and the basics. If you want to relax, Huyen can also help you find a taxi. The housekeeper is so kind and can help to cook, clean, etc. We felt that we wanted to be alone and he completely gave us our own privacy, but it was good to know he was available if we needed him. Thank you so much again 🙏🏼
Amazing place to stay!
it was a very nice stay, I would highly recommend it

Great host with a beautiful family! Their home is in the most beautiful location, and you have the ability to go on treks with the family around the area. The food they provided was delicious and made the experience even more special. Ya had amazing communication and helped me with transport, which was a big help since the homestay is a 30 minute drive out of town. Would highly recommend! :)

Ya is such a great host. She welcomed us with great care and was very curious and eager to share her culture with us. The house is something out of a movie. So beautiful, plus you will stay right in the village surrounded by rice and corn fields. No tourists in sight, just peace and quiet and lots of animals.
I highly recommend having dinner with the family if you have the chance, it was one of the best meals we had in Vietnam.
Amazing views, clean room, very friendly family and yummy food. felt right at home. Good experience, highly recommend if you wanna experience the less touristy side of sapa.

Ya’s place is a gem! It’s nothing like other home stays in Sapa, you get to stay with Ya and her beautiful family in their incredible house nestled in the mountains. We had two meals with the family which were possibly the best we’ve had in Vietnam.
We got to learn a little about Hmong culture; their food and language is so different to Vietnamese and definitely worth finding out about. Our room was so cozy and had a much-appreciated mosquito net. The views are just breathtaking, and Ya was so kind and generous. Thank you so much, we hope we can come back!

Ya’s home is very beautiful, clean, + great value. Ya is a kind and generous woman, + her kids are lovely. The food was tasty + affordable. It is a very quiet place in the rice fields, among other Hmong families. You can get a glimpse into the everyday life of this indigenous group of people :)
It’s important to mention that this stay is not for everyone. It is not far from a main road, but the walk is very steep (do not try riding up it with an automatic scooter, you need at least a semi if you want to use a bike). If you are someone who has physical limitations, I would consider whether this is a good fit for you. In the summer this place was a little too hot for me as there is no fan and few windows. I did mention this to the host, however, and she accepted my feedback very graciously, so I believe future guests may have a fan. Double check with the host 😉
It was a unique and beautiful stay, and I would recommend it to adventurous and culturally curious souls :) best of luck Ya!

I had a great stay here!! Luna and Đậu’s home is full of meaningful details. From hand-dyed linens to pleasant warm-toned lighting, this home stay is the embodiment of coziness. I wish I had stayed longer and did one of the workshops as well! Also, the hosts were incredibly accommodating of my last minute booking and were around if I needed anything. (P.S. they have the cutest cats and puppies as well:))

Wow. This place was easily the best accomodation we had in Vietnam. The hosts, Luna and Dau, were so nice and welcoming in their beautiful, historic home. Ta Van itself was great to explore every day, but it was also just a cool place to relax. There are many places within walking distance to see and bars/restaurants. But they make their own amazing salt coffee too! If you are ever in North Vietnam, I would highly recommend to stay here. Thanks again and looking forward to returning,
Rupert & Lydia

ホストのお二人も、空間自体も、どちらも最高のAirbnbでした。
ホストのルナさんとダウさんは、温かくて親しみやすいだけでなく、ホスピタリティ精神に溢れていて私のステイが良くなるよう最大限におもてなししてくれました。夕食を作ってくれたり、モーターバイクで彼女たちの犬達と共に仲間のカフェに出かけたり、1人で来ても彼女たちが沢山尽くしてくださるので、楽しいことが最後まで尽きませんでした。
また空間そのものも、清潔でかつ落ち着く空間で、のびのびと過ごすことができました。特にコモンスペースで、犬猫たちと戯れたり、他のゲスト•ホストのお二人とおしゃべりする時間は、このような滞在方法ならではの至福の時だなと感じました。個人のお部屋は、藍染めされた寝具や木でできた家具達、壁に飾られた伝統衣装(?)、ベッドサイドのアロマ等々、ホストのお二人のこだわりを感じられる、可愛らしいお部屋です。共有のシャワー•バスルーム(2つあります)も、清潔に維持されていたので、神経質な私でもストレスなく快適に使用できました。
ホストのお二人、友達になったゲストの女の子、そして可愛いペット達に囲まれた素敵な日々で、本当に幸せでした。雨が多い時期だったので一歩もここから出ないという日もありましたが、雨の音を聞きながら日記を書いたりぼーっとしたり、おしゃべりしたり、そんな時間がTa Vanでいちばん幸せな時間だったと思います。
日本ではあまりTa Vanの方まで足を伸ばしてくる方はまだ多くない気がしますが、是非、是非皆さんに来ていただきたいなと思います。また、滞在ではなくても、ここで提供しているヌードルと塩コーヒーがびっくりするくらい美味しいので、是非試してみてください。
4日ほどしか滞在していませんが、人生最高の夏休みだった気がします。今Hanoi 行きのバスでこれを書いているのですが、すでにbluebird ロスになっています。また今度別のシーズンに、大きくなったpuppyたちに会いに行きたいです。
ありがとう、大好きbluebird family 😭❤️

‘BlueBird Homestay’는 두 호스트의 감성이 묻어나는 아늑하고 따뜻한 분위기로 꾸며져 있어 마음이 편안해지는 느낌을 받았습니다.에어비앤비 프로필에 주변 명소와 맛집 정보가 잘 정리되어 있어, 여행 계획을 세우는 데도 큰 도움이 되었어요.숙소는 자체적으로 식당과 카페도 운영하고 있으며, 주요 식당, 카페, 마트가 모두 가까운 거리에 위치해 있어 아침에 느긋하게 일어나 레스토랑에서 식사하고, 예쁜 카페들을 탐방하며 마을을 산책하는 여유로운 일상을 즐길 수 있었습니다.또한, 강아지들과 고양이들이 함께하는 숙소였는데, 호스트가 정성스럽게 내려준 커피를 마시며 강아지들과 보낸 평화로운 시간은 특히 기억에 남습니다. (고양이들도 아무도 안 볼 때 저를 챙겨주었습니다🐾)Luna와 Đậu가 만들어준 커피와 국수는 정성이 가득했고, 두 분 모두 항상 세심하고 따뜻하게 챙겨주셔서 감사한 마음이 컸습니다.제가 낯을 많이 가리는 편이라 마지막 날에야 조금 더 가까워졌는데, 그래서인지 떠나는 순간이 유독 아쉽게 느껴졌습니다.사파 시내로 가는 택시를 기다리며 만든 키링은 이곳에서의 추억을 간직하게 해준 특별한 선물이 되었습니다.다음에 다시 Ta Van 마을에 가게 된다면, 꼭 다시 이곳에서 머무를 것입니다.💙🪶

Luna and Dau are the sweetest hosts you could ask for.
Their home oozes cosy and homely vibes with a very rustic feel.
The extra bonus was the one month old puppies that I met on arrival and the kitty crew 😻

Thật tuyệt vời khi được lưu trú tại nhà của Luna & Đậu.
2 cô gái trẻ, với tình yêu thiên nhiên, yêu động vật, yêu cái đẹp đã tại nên ngôi nhà tại Airbnb thật tối giản, tinh tế, ấm cúng, đón được rất nhiều ánh sáng tự nhiên, ban công/ cửa sổ cực chill ngắm được cảnh Mây/ Núi, với phong cách thiết kế đậm đà dân tộc Giáy và khối gỗ Pơ Mu thật sự quý hiếm
Với sự chu đáo của chủ nhà, tôi đã có quảng thời gian thư giãn, vui vẻ, thoải mái tại đây và cảm nhận được rõ ràng bầu không khí trong lành tự nhiên, được ngắm nhìn mây/ núi hùng vĩ tuyệt đẹp, vị trí nằm ở trong khu nhiều nhà hàng được decor rất ấn tượng, các món ăn Âu/ Á/ Việt Nam rất ngon nên thưởng thức.
Lưu ý: Đừng quên thưởng thức món ăn Phở Bò Huế/ Miến xào Chay/ Và những cốc coffee cực kỳ ngon do chủ nhà tự làm nhé ^^.

블루버드 하우스에서 지내는 2주의 시간동안, 정말 편안하고 평화로운 나날을 보냈어요! 우선 숙소 위치가 타반 마을에서 다양한 식당, 가게와 매우 인접해 있어서 지내는 데 정말 편했습니다. 블루버드 앞에는 타반마을 (거의) 유일한 음악이 흐르는 바가 있는데, 항상 바에서 음악이 흘러나와서 낭만 넘치는 하루하루를 보냈답니다 🎶
또 호스트인 루나와 다오는 언제나 밝은 미소와 따뜻함으로 저희와 행복한 시간을 보내줬고, 함께 하는 저녁 식사 또한 너무 맛있고 행복했어요!
그리고 숙소에 고양이 3마리와 강아지가 있는데, 다들 주인을 닮아서인지 너무 순하고 귀엽답니다! 블루버드에 머무신다면, 아마 매일 밤 고양이들과 한 침대에서 잠드실 수 있을 거에요 🌝
숙소 건물이 목재 건물이라 다소 삐걱거리고, 각 방마다 방음이 되지 않아 청결이나 프라이버시가 중요하신 분들은 조금 불편하실 수 있지만, 저희는 현지인처럼 지내는 기분을 충분히 느낄 수 있고, 타반의 매력이 느껴져 불편하지 않았습니다.
또 블루버드의 소고기 국수와 소금 커피도 정말 맛있으니 머무르며 꼭 즐겨 보세요! 블루버드에 오시면 타반마을의 매력을 듬뿍 느끼며, 행복한 경험을 하실 수 있을 거에요 🌳

可以住到這家民宿真的太開心了
雖然已經看過照片但實際到達還是很驚喜🤩
有三隻貓咪跟一隻可愛的狗狗每天都很幸福
跟Luna聊才知道這是她們一手打造的空間，美感真的非常好！
藍染體驗也很特別✨可以當紀念品帶回家很有意義～
鹽咖啡跟牛肉麵也是必吃必喝！Dau的私房食譜太厲害 我已經開始想念🤤
也謝謝Luna跟Dau教我玩德州撲克、帶我去他們朋友開的咖啡廳，一切都太喜歡啦～下次還來
忘記在guest notebook留下什麼，因為每天都過太充實了XD

A beautiful Homestay in a beautiful place with beautiful hosts. The energy of Bluebird is unmatched: Luna and Dau are lovely, helpful people with great taste. The Homestay is in the centre of the village so it’s easy to go trekking plus it offers delicious beef noodles for when you’re back. Thanks for a great stay ladies!
Luna And Đậu sind zwei wunderbare Gastgeberinnen und ihre Tiere die beste Gesellschaft. Das schöne Haus ist mit viel Liebe zum Detail gestaltet und ich hatte einen großartigen Aufenthalt.

Luna and Dau were very kind hosts (& very cool people), and we were super grateful they invite us to the rice festival while we were there! Their very beautifully renovated homestay ended up being the perfect place for my partner & I to comfortably recharge for a few days in the middle of our busy 2 months. It’s a very cute artsy space with adorable cats & dogs to keep company, and in a nice area with accessible food options as well as trekking tours. Their stewed beef noodles & salted coffee were also delicious!! Wish we could’ve stayed a bit longer and tried some of their workshops :’)
Thank you! Hope to meet again <3

If slow living was an accommodation, this would be it. The place was well refurbished and homey considering that it was a 100 year old house. A great place to seek a brief respite from the busy city, Ta Van village is the place to be❤️. Thank you Luna and Dau for the warm hospitality, I’ll definitely visit again someday:-))
(I miss cutie and muoi~)

Had a great stay. It's a beautiful old wooden house decorated with a lot of passion. Also the location in the village is a great way to escape the masses from Sapa. Still there's everything you need nearby. Luna and Dau are super friendly, would come back anytime.

luna and dau are very welcoming and helpful :) the house was really nice as well and if you’re looking for somewhere quiet around sa pa with great views and also experience how is it like living in a vietnamese village look no further i would highly recommend staying with them!! also can i just say that they’re a really cute couple as well!! :)

Ngôi nhà của dân tộc Dáy với tỉ lệ  không gian đẹp, ấm cúng. Cảm ơn Linh và Đậu đã nỗ lực trả nó về gần nguyên bản. Cách chào đón, không gian và cơ sở vật chất khiến mình cảm thấy tự nhiên, thoải mái và độc lập. Home cũng ở khu vực có những nếp nhà ấm cúng có tính cộng đồng, nhiều hoạt động địa phương.

Luna and Dau welcomed me in their beatiful cozy home with care and attention to details. A highly recommended stay if you are looking forward to share sone bonfire time with lovely people and enjoy some quite time outsite the messy Sapa town.

베트남으로 일하러 온 지 2달이 되어가는데, 그동안 일하느라 못 느꼈던 베트남을 블루버드에 있는 2일 동안 다 느꼈습니다.
타반마을 특유의 분위기, 풍경, 거리
그 안에 있는 블루버드의 따뜻한 호스트, 포근한 침구.. 세상에서 제일 맛있었던 쌀국수.
먼 훗날에도 그곳에 그대로 있으면 좋겠다는 욕심이 듭니다.
언젠가 또 만나요 루나, 다우! 그리고 동물친구들

在Luna和Dau家度过了难忘的五天。虽然天气很冷但是每晚吃饱大家在院子里烤火聊天也很温暖～住在这里不仅了解到许多关于越南的文化，两位女主人的故事和生活方式也深深地打动了我，还认识了许多来自世界各地的新朋友，才想起我似乎已很久没有这样与人敞开心扉。民宿还提供餐食，Dau和Luna的厨艺超级棒，牛肉面和烤鱼都太好吃了！最后Luna和小狗Gugi目送我离开，我忍不住偷偷掉眼泪了，希望下次有机会带我的家人再来～

一段時間沒有住過這麼喜歡的房子了，裡頭的一切比預先的介紹及照片還來的太好了！
房子是木頭製造的，從擺設到附設的盥洗用具都感覺得到他們的用心，是一種生活的樣子！🧡
luna &zalo 的溫暖照顧讓我們能順利也安心的在ta van 過的非常快樂，非常謝謝他們🧡
ta van是一個很棒的地方，不論是人們、動物們、自然，一切的洋溢著祥和的樣子。
希望每個人都能來看看！🫶
有機會希望能再次回來☺️
Very quaint and welcoming. She puts so much care into her place.

Staying here felt like home in the best way possible. The place was cozy, Luna and Ðǎu were so welcoming and accommodating—they made me feel like part of the family, and went out of their way to make sure I felt comfortable  🤍 Their recommendations completely enhanced my trip, but what made it even more special were the pets! I’ll never get over Cu Ti the dog - such a sweetheart! and the adorable cats who made every moment even cozier. The game night and laughs we shared will always be one of my favorite memories of this place. I honestly wish I could’ve stayed longer and will definitely be coming back. Highly, highly recommend this place—it’s more than just a stay; it’s an experience I’ll never forget!
Nice place to stay.  Beef noodles were yummy 😋

We had the most incredible stay at Blue Bird Homestay, and it was all thanks to our wonderful hosts, Luna and Ðau. From the moment we arrived, they made us feel so welcome, like we were part of their family. Their kindness and hospitality truly made our experience unforgettable.
One of the highlights of our stay was the delicious beef noodles—hands down some of the best we’ve ever had!
We also absolutely loved spending time with their adorable pets, who added so much joy to our days. Whether it was playful moments or just the comforting presence of furry friends, they made the homestay feel even more like home.
Another unforgettable experience was the indigo dyeing class. Learning about the traditional techniques and getting hands-on with the dyeing process was both fascinating and fun. Luna shared her knowledge with so much passion, making the workshop an incredibly special and immersive experience.
Everything about Blue Bird Homestay was perfect!

Abbiamo avuto il privilegio di alloggiare in questa meravigliosa casa antica, interamente costruita in legno e situata nel pittoresco villaggio di Ta Van, nella provincia di Sa Pa. Questo luogo incantevole ci ha permesso di immergerci in un autentico paradiso terrestre.
Ogni angolo della casa racconta una storia: piena di dettagli unici e affascinanti, curata con amore e attenzione. I suoni della natura circostante si mescolano con l’atmosfera storica della struttura, creando un’esperienza indimenticabile.
I proprietari, sempre presenti ma mai invadenti, ci hanno fatto sentire accolti e a nostro agio. È evidente la passione con cui gestiscono questo luogo speciale.
Siamo stati felicissimi di vivere questa esperienza e porteremo con noi il ricordo di questo rifugio incantato!

We knew we made the right choice when we first stepped into the place and were greeted with a warm welcome. Dieu was really friendly and helpful. He made sure that our needs and comfort were met. The place felt very homely and we looked forward to going back to the hotel at the end of every day. 11/10 experience and definitely would recommend!

Had a lovely stay here. We had a Mountain View and it didn’t disappoint. Was beautiful and peaceful. Our Room and communal area was clean and inviting. Was in a great location, near restaurants and not too far to get the train to fansipan. Host was extremely helpful and friendly. Helped us book our bus tickets and tours. He also checked in with us every day and made sure we were okay. Would 100% recommend and stay again.

Very spacious! Bathroom is clean and big! Was very foggy during the majority of our stay but when the sky cleared up we got the best view of the Sa Pa mountain from our room. Highlight of our trip was our trek to the Hmong Village, definitely recommend booking the experience. Thank you Dieu for the great accommodation!

tôi chỉ có thể nói là rất tốt, Dieu rất thân thiện, chúng tôi đến vào những ngày giáp tết và chỉ đặt được 1 đêm, trước khi họ nghỉ tết. Nhưng khi Dieu biết chúng tôi muốn nghỉ thêm 1 đêm nữa, anh ta đã sẵn sàng tạo điều kiện ấy cho chúng tôi, rất cảm kích và đánh giá cao hành động này , 6 sao

We had a lovely stay at the mega view hotel
We just sad we didn’t have a longer stay
It has a real cosy and homely feeling
Very friendly and helpful staff
The bedroom was lovely with amazing views and very comfortable bed
A lovely friendly cat called chicken as well was a lovely surprise
We would highly recommend to stay here :)

Unbelievably beautiful location with picturesque view at the same time located close to restaurants and stuff, beautifully designed suit. Owner is always ready to assist with whatever you need. 100% recommend

The place is walkable Sapa Square and restaurants so it’s really a plus! They are also very accommodating. We will surely be back here if we decided to visit Sapa again! It also has the most beautiful view 😍😍😍

I thoroughly enjoyed my stay.
The host was proactive in providing assistance with tours and recommendations. He also helped me to get my phone repaired.
The room itself had beautiful views of the valley and mountains, was very clean and comfortable, and the bathroom had great water pressure.
If I was to return to SaPa I would stay again.

Located among so many restaurants, our favourite one was Casa Italia. Very well run homestay with so many rooms and a basement dorm. Breakfast set cooked by host was delicious at just 60k.
Recommended by the host for a walking tour, we took it up and saw so many scenic views 😍
The only downside is a flight of 30m stairs you have to climb to get to the main town.
Other than that, highly recommended 5 star Airbnb 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟
