Had a wonderful stay. Room has a fantastic view of the mountains. Would recommend also doing the day trekking :) Nini (the local guide) was so accomodating. Will definitely come back.

Anh Dieu is great! Super communicative and very friendly. Goes above and beyond to accommodate his guests. We got there well before arrival time, and he was able to set us up in a downstairs public room just so we could rest before beginning a tour that he arranged for us. From start to finish this was a great experience. The view from the room were a phenomenal.

A beautiful stay in Sapa! The host was super helpful, allowing us to book another night and check in at 5am when our bus got in. He also helped us with local recommendations and booked us our bus tickets back to Hanoi when we left it last minute. Our room was absolutely gorgeous with a breathtaking view. It felt completely unreal! We had absolutely everything we needed and nothing was too much trouble. I would highly recommend!!

The place was great and our host was very friendly as well the staff there. He was checking how our trip was very time he sees us comes inside the building. And when checking out the staff helped us bring our luggage up the stairs. Overall the stay was great. Definitely coming back in the future!

Merci a Dieu Tran et son équipe pour leur accueil , leur sympathie et toujours à l écoute des voyageurs.
Les randonnée proposé par l' hote est un excellent moyen pour découvrir la vie local 😎
Il a pris aussi en charge les transferts en bus .
On y a va relax chez Dieu Tran , il s' occupe de tout ❤️
很惊艳的一个房间，一推开门就是美丽的山峦，房间整体很舒服。楼下有休息室，退房后可以在那里休息等巴士，可以充电、洗漱，对夜间巴士的旅客非常友好～

The host is friendly and responsive. The place is so worth it as the views are nice considering the room has a balcony. I an very picky when it comes to booking rooms so I can definitely say this one is worth it.

Everything was perfect except you need to take 100 steps down and up to go on Main Street. You can’t go to location directly by car motorcycle as well. The only thing which i found not well otherwise everything was exceptional.

Very sweet host. We arrived in Sapa very early at 5:30am. Got to the hotel at around 7-8am. We ordered breakfast and were really tired, i was almost falling asleep on the table. Dieu let me downstairs to sleep on a little couch!
Room was clean, accurate to photos. Its walkable to nearby restaurants and shops. We walked everywhere from the hotel.
The tour offered for valley trekking was splendid. Guide spoke great english and answered all questions.
There’s also a sweet cat to greet you named Chicken.

The room is great with hot and cold shower, very nice airconditioning and brilliant view of the valley. The staffs are very helpful, accomodating and informative. highly recommended place to stay in sapa

Dieu Tran was super helpful, informative and enthusiastic during our stay. He assisted with finding a restaurant, booking a day trip in the rice fields and getting transport. The room was as described, clean and well located.
Great place to stay at, Dieu was very prompt to reply all of our enquiries and made sure we had everything we needed. Awesome hospitality and even greater host! Wouldn’t do Sapa any other way !
Perfect, we really enjoyed our stay. Very central location but still quiet. The host is really helpful and friendly and the breakfast is also really good. And the views are stunning!

Great place to stay in Sa Pa. We arrived late for check (2am), but Dieu provided clear instructions so we could easily get in.
The place was large enough, they can make breakfast and have laundry services as well. Location is also great.
The bathroom was clean, but not spotless (like many other places we’ve in vietnam). The bed could be more comfortable as well, very firm.
Overall Good value for the price.

We felt right at home when we came in and met Dieu!
He's really funny and friendly! He's a breath of fresh air from other hotels where it's hard to build a connection with the host!
He's also super honest on best activities on recommendations even if this means less business for him!
Loved our stay there! 10/10

such a gorgeous home with such a wonderful host. Lo was so helpful and always replied to any request we had super quickly. the location was so gorgeous and the room had the perfect view. only thing was it was slightly difficult for taxis to reach since it’s not in Sapa main town but we still loved our stay nevertheless.

Het verblijf van mister Lo is precies zoals het op de foto’s staat, echt een fantastische plek! Midden tussen de rijstvelden, prachtig uitzicht en veel privacy. Persoonlijk vond ik het in het echt nog mooier dan op de foto’s 🤩
Mister Lo is heel vriendelijk en voorkomend. Kortom, een echte aanrader deze plek!

Loved our stay at Lo’s we booked very last minute and Lo was very accomodating with this! The bungalow has the most amazing sunrise view over the mountains and rice patties. Room was clean, and bathroom was good. No aircon but fan was provided!
Great accommodation in stunning location at a reasonable price with flexible check in. 30 minute taxi in to main town if needs be. Overall, excellent place and host super friendly and attentive

Quite far from the city centre, and getting in and out of city is difficult and expensive from this location. However, if you want to take some time out from daily life, rewind and recharge, it's the perfect place. It's secluded from the main population. The host and his wife were really nice.
Lo was very helpful with checking in and helped us to get a taxi to get to our bus stop in the early morning on the day we checked out. The room was amazing and we loved our stay!

A peaceful spot with authentic charm – nothing fancy, but just right for a laid-back stay. Clean room, large comfy bed. Within walking distance of some nice restaurants and cafés. Lo is super friendly, helpful, and very responsive. He invited us to stay with his family for dinner. The view over the rice fields is beautiful, and it's very quiet at night. There is a heated mattress since it can get quite cold at night in February.

Place itself was beautiful - exactly like the pictures and the bathroom was very clean. No hand soap but did provide sachets of body wash and shampoo which was helpful since we arrived without our luggage.
Stored our luggage when it arrived and for a few hours on our final day, very responsive when we arrived with flexible check in (we arrived at 3 instead of our estimated 4-5pm).
It was noisier than expected since there were a group of rowdy boys in the home stay next door which we weren’t expecting. Whilst the bungalow was private there were buildings above and not far below and you could see some people in the rice fields. Thought it would be more secluded.
Generally would recommend since it was out of sapa town and gave us a chance to try local food and see another village in the surrounding area.
Lo and his family were all lovely and very welcoming.

Staying at Lo's place was really awesome.
You take a taxi from Sa Pa to the listing. Depending on the vehicle, it can get you pretty close, only then you'd understand that the price of the taxi is worth it. The views were stunning, I kid you not.
We came during planting season, so instead of the green rice field in the picture, it was full of water. This was so nice especially during the full moon. The reflection of the moon as you sit outside was enchanting. The room is simple, it's a clean comfy bed and a hot shower (and a nice sink). Two sides of the room was all glass, so you could chill on the bed and be mesmerized by the view of the mountains in front or the rice field/pond on the side, it was amazing. Really worth the money on this one. Hot shower did not come on at first but Lo responded immediately (not even 10mins) and reset the hot shower and it worked like a charm. Lo was very helpful and the people of Ta Van are nothing but lovely. We really enjoyed our experience
We really enjoyed our stay! Everyone was very friendly and super helpful with everything. Also, great location and beautiful surroundings. Thank you so much :)

Super logement. Isole et au calme, c’est très agréable.
Le matelas était chauffé, ce qui est vraiment appréciable lorsqu’on vient en saison basse.
Lo est gentil et accueillant. Merci pour tout.
Lo's home is a beautiful space in Sa Pa, around 30 mins by Grab from the centre. clean and comfortable sleep. Thank you Lo!
Lovely place with stunning views all around. Highly recommend

nice peaceful stay in the roomy villa. The outlook is great and host very helpful.
Short steep 5 minute hike to some great little restos, really enjoyed this stay.
Very friendly host, beautiful and peaceful location. The room was amazing and had great views. There was a heated bed and it was a very nice stay.
Great stay! Clean, cozy, and well-located. Friendly host. Highly recommend!

Très bon séjour passé chez Lo et sa famille.
Très beau logement il est agréable d’y résider.
Lo est très réactif et accueillant.
Je recommande
Прекрасный вариант прямо в горах. Хозяин был любезен и очень добр, помогал во всех вопросах, согласился на раннее заселение и даже помог найти билеты на автобус из Сапы!
Lo ist ein sehr aufmerksamer Gastgeber der keinen Wunsch unbeantwortet lässt. Ich habe mich bei ihm sehr wohl gefühlt. Er und seine Familie machen das super!
one of the best places I’ve been to! definitely would not want to miss out.
Je conseil fortement cette place !   L'hospitalitée de chacun à fait de ce séjour , un endroit à ne pas manquer si vous êtes à SaPa.  Merci encore à Lo et à sa femme et sa soeur .
We had a really great stay here:)
Very peaceful stay - thank you !
Nice & charming stay, would reccomend

Conveniently located, close to city centre.  Le was very friendly and provided all the assistance regarding facilities required in the room and also to plan sight seeing and transfer. Room was in good condition and had all the amenities promised. Good room heater and heated mattress. Overall, a lovely room experience of 2 day stay in Sapa. Value for money.

My best friend and I stayed at Le’s place for 4 nights. Accommodations were decent, not plush; but precisely as advertised. Our first night the shower head became detached from its base. Thanks to good communication with the caretaker and staff, it was fixed the following day. The inclined slope up to the quarters (about 70 meters/75 yards) had some algae covering which could have been treacherous when wet. The staff worked on scraping it and sprinkling what appeared to be salt; although care was still necessary to avoid a fall or slip.
The room was small. While totally adequate for 1 person, it was a bit tight for 2 for more than a few days. Shelving was limited; closet space nonexistent, so gear had to be arranged on the floor. A short distance away were several superb restaurants, 2 of which provided us with delicious meals.
While accommodations were adequate (comfortable, clean and conveniently located), if I were to visit Sapa again, I would look into renting another place.
had an amazing stay, room was spacious and there was very little disturbance! thankful for the peace and quiet :)
The place is lovely and close to city centre. The host helped in making arrangements to travel. Would recommend anyone visiting sapa.

Le logement est comme sur les photos ! Confortable, spacieux, pour les températures basses du moment le matelas chauffant et le ventilateur/radiateur un vrai bonheur !! Emplacement idéal, calme et proche des rues animées ! Nous recommandons !
친절함이 최고였습니다. 특히 침대가  따뜻해서 좋았습니다. 모든 여행에 대해 매우 친절했으며 마지막까지 도움을 주셨습니다. 너무 감사했습니다.

A great stay over Lunar New Year and despite the celebrations Linh and family were extremely attentive and took care of us.
The heated blanket and heater during the very cold weather was an absolute luxury.
Location is close to restaurants and shops, and only a short walk in to the centre.
Our transport out of SaPa wasn't until the evening, but Linh kindly let us stay in her dorm/lobby until we needed to leave.
We would definitely recommend this spot for a few days in SaPa :)

Beautiful, peaceful place to stay. The lady at the property is very helpful, polite and she helped in a lot of things. It felt right at home, all ameneties were there. Absolute value for money property.
Very much enjoyed our stay here, perfect walking distance to the town centre and restaurants/shops, lovely hot shower and bath facilities. Great stay here & Linh & her team very kind and helpful :)
Hot water, clean, private and comfy bed.  Great spot for a night or two.
very beautiful room and view, nice host,Linh helped us also to book a bus back to hanoi, highly recomanded. thanks a lot
Very central, clean an ideal no-frills budget accommodation. I recommend Le's and would happily stay again.
Loved this Airbnb! Clean and comfortable and in a great location. Linh was always quick to respond as well
Great Place for its price, Near Sun Plaza and Walking distance to all major places.  You get what you paid for
sangat bagus dan dekat dengan tmp wisatanya
Le is very Nice Peršin, room od very comfortable and clean on great location.
It was hard to walk into the place. Too steep and need a grab to get home
Really nice stay! Cozy, friendly, clean, highly recommended :)

We really loved staying here, it was peaceful and really cosy. The bath & electric blanket were a touch and we loved the colour on the windows. Loads of natural light everyday to see the crazy weather changes of sapa. The hosts were really easy to communicate with and helped us with everything we needed help with. We’d definitely stay here again. Plus right round the corner to the best cafe- Mist!
endroit exceptionnel  avec matelas chauffant  c'est vraiment le reve
Tolle und zentrale  Unterkunft. Schöner Ort für unseren Zwischenstop😊
Amazing and comfy stay close to the city centre

We stayed an Tay Bac for 3 nights and everything was great.
Place was clean and tidy and beds very comfortable. We even had electrical blanket that was very useful during cold nights.
The host is very very helpful. She speak very good English and helped us arrange a scooter. They also have a laundry service. On our last day she also printed our bus tickets so if I could give more stars I definitely would because we received really a lot of help.
Internet is very good and fast so if you need to work online that is a good place for you.

I can’t say a bad thing about this place. Great location close enough to the center to walk but far enough away to be quiet. Clean, peaceful and easy to find. The host was also amazing with any inquiries we had.  Will definitely stay again!

A beautiful stay to remember - spacious villa suited a family with 2 teenagers and the views are to die for! Using Grab car booking cost less than US$3 each way and it was so peaceful staying just outside town so those amazing views could be enjoyed.
Cao was helpful and quick to respond and the laundry service was a life saver!
Very happy with our stay.

3시간 일찍 체크인
1시간 늦게 체크아웃
빠른 응답과 친절함에 감사드립니다.
clean and cozy place with nice views of mountain. Host was warm and helpful with luggage too.

Die Unterkunft war wie auf den Bildern.
Wir waren nur für eine Nacht da.
Die Mitarbeiterin, die mit uns den Check-in durchgeführt hat wahr sehr nett.
Es ist ein bisschen weiter außerhalb und man muss aufpassen, das man dem Taxifahrer die richtige Adresse gibt, da es mehrere Unterkünfte gibt die einen gleich klingenden Namen haben!
Leider hatte ich Abends unter meiner Bettdecke Insekten, was mich ziemlich erschreckt hatte, weil ich eine Angst vor Insekten habe und eine Allergie. Zum Glück konnte mein Freund sie alle entfernen und hatte das Bett gründlich untersucht!
Leider hatten wir in unserem Schlafbereich in der oberen Ecke Schimmel entdeckt, was ich dem Besitzer am nächsten Morgen via Chat mitgeteilt hatte und hoffe, dass er es für die nächsten Besucher entfernt!
Sonst war die Unterkunft in Ordnung!
There is a good view from our unit. My wife and daughter love it.
Great house with beautiful view. We also liked fireplace inside the house very much
Nice and quiet surrounding
Awesome place. Peaceful away from the city
villa was super super amazing! all the rooms were  clean and looked exactly like described, the villa was super comfortable too :)

Myself and 3 friends were recommended to visit Sang and her families house and trekking. Sang collected us from our bus which got in at 2am and helped us settle in. The meals were delicious and the house is so beautiful. We spent a day relaxing by the pool and another day trekking. It rained a lot the day we were trekking so Sang and her husband bought us rain boots and ponchos. We could not recommend her enough, they are so good!!! I wish we could stay longer!
chị chủ rất là nice. 100% come back

Awesome place with a more awesome view. Staff were very nice and helpful. Only caveat is the location. It’s easy enough to find a driver to get to the place but getting somewhere from the place itself was a little challenging. Thankfully, the staff will assist you in calling for a taxi. Only regret for booking this stay is that I didn’t book for longer!

The cabin itself was nice, nothing to shout about but the surroundings were super tranquil. Loved the greeneries lining the pathways, with panoramic views overlooking the paddy fields. There were some stairs leading up to the cabin, where you get a nice balcony and a large garden surrounding it. At night it looks magical all lit up. Beware of insects though. I enjoyed chilling in the room with Netflix and walking around the area especially when the air is clear (no fog).
I took the recommended taxi and as expected the ride was rough (took about 20-30 min from Sapa town). For meals, they didn’t have halal options but I brought my own food & snacks and ordered white rice and omelette from their kitchen. They were kind enough to accommodate my requests. Breakfast was toasts with eggs and pancake (asian style) with syrup.
Worth staying for a relaxing time, otherwise not much to do. Pool wasn’t clean enough to swim in.

If you are ready to relax and be away from the chaos of Hanoi or Ho Chi Minh, this is the place for you.  Sapa town is only about a 15 minute taxi or grab away. This is by far worth it simply for the view and the surroundings of the ecology. The staff is incredible as well. They were so attentive and friendly.  Breakfast was included and it was excellent! We will be returning here the next time we are in Vietnam.

We had a wonderful, peaceful stay at Khanh’s eco lodge in SaPa. The view from the bungalow and from the lodge’s gardens and pool is breathtaking. The staff were so friendly and bent over backwards to make our stay memorable. Great to be in a small family lodge with only a few bungalows  compared to the large resorts surrounding SaPa. The rooms are relatively basic but are very comfy and are built and decorated beautifully in the traditional styles. Location is peaceful away from the main town but we never had a problem getting a Grab the 10-15 mins into town. It was lovely watching the rice farmers at work and falling asleep to the sound of nature.

Amazing service, clean and eco friendly. The view from this bungalow was incredible!!! Overlooking the rice paddies and mountain range, you can wake up in the morning and see the farmers planting their vegetables and rice: truly a tranquil experience.

This place will always have a special place in our hearts! We celebrated our honeymoon here and it was very memorable even though we didn’t get to enjoy the sun, the views were still wonderful when the fog got clearer. At night it was lightly raining and very peaceful to fall asleep to. The staff were very professional and wonderful. The kitchen also cooked delicious meals and breakfast for us. We received the best massages here and ended up getting more than one. Everyone was very welcoming, even their small dog and cats who were so friendly and added to the experience.

This was the highlight of our stay in SaPa. The views from the room, poolside and restaurant are beautiful. The staff are very friendly and helpful. If you eat at the accommodation, the food is very fresh and they cook it for you whenever you would like as long as you give them notice.
The room was traditional and no AC but at the time of year we visited we found this ok. The staff came round and cleaned the bathroom and refreshed towels everyday.
We would highly recommend this accommodation if you would like to wake up to amazing views and stay out of the busyness of the main town but still be in a short distance to Grab in.

We had an excellent stay at this Airbnb. We stayed just for a night after climbing Mount fansipan but it was amazing. Everything was as described. Loved the food and the staff who were very attentive to our needs. I strongly recommend this listing for anyone looking for a stay far from city hustle.

What an amazing peaceful oasis. The grounds are beautiful and perfectly manicured. The staff are so wonderful and friendly. They organized laundry and a driver for everything we needed. The restaurant is incredible. Felt right at home and the views are incredible. This definitely felt like a honeymoon trip!!  Thanks for an amazing stay !

Eco Palms House is like a fantasy land. Khanh and the rest of the staff are super warm, welcoming and acommodating. They made sure that we felt right at home and we did. The view is just unmatched. The landscape and how everything was put together was just magical. I love our bungalow because of the privacy and the view. The breakfast was included and we thoroughly enjoyed eating it while looking at the majestic view. I highly recommend it!

This was a perfect place for us to relax while in Sa Pa! The pool is great, the water was warm and the views incredible. The food here is some of the best we've had on the trip so far. All of the drinks and coffees were top tier. Their massage and laundry services were wonderful on site. The staff are all very friendly and go over and beyond to ensure our stay was perfect. Wish we could stay longer!

The location, a private quiet place away from town, but close enough to get a short grab into town. It's so peaceful with the best views and the kitchen is unreal. The food was perfect with fresh ingredients from the farm. The staff were so friendly and helped us so much. They were so helpful with our daughter and loved playing with her. They let her feed their koi fish in their pond and play with their animals.
Being a little bit away from central Sa Pa there are motorcycles to hire 500m walk up the road.
If you aren’t keen to ride, Khanh was ordering grab taxis for people.
We will definitely come back here or refer to our friends.
We highly recommend this location!
We zijn hartelijk ontvangen door de familie. De bungalow was erg mooi, met een fijn bad en een prachtig uitzicht. Helaas geen zon, maar we hebben heerlijk bij de open haard gezeten.

Magnifique endroit avec une vue à couper le souffle. Les hôtes ont été très accueillants et chaleureux de notre arrivée jusqu'au moment du départ. La nourriture du restaurant est excellente autant pour le petit déjeuner que les repas. Je recommande chaudement !

superhost. Super friendly, nice, helpful and welcoming. felt like home and family. Make any special requests and they will do it for you. The room is super cozy and clean. Most importantly the view and the vibe is very peaceful. Highly recommend dining in the restaurant, super authentic, delicious and fresh. Stayed there for three days and had every meal in their restaurant. Lovely place, memorable stay and experience. Hope to come back in the future.

Die gesamte Anlage ist wunderschön in den Bergen gelegen und sehr schön angelegt.
Man hat sich sofort wohlgefühlt und das freundliche Personal hat sich bestens um einen gekümmert.
Da man auch im Resort essen kann, muss man dafür nicht jedes Mal nach Sa Pa, das ca. 6km entfernt liegt.
Wir werden auf jeden Fall wiederkommen!
Had a great time here, unfortunately was only able to stay 1 night but the staff were very accommodating and helpful and room was amazing and well equipped for the winter season. Great experience!

A beautiful, eco-friendly retreat with exceptional service, this family-owned gem in Sapa offers a chef-style restaurant, stunning views, and a perfect location to escape and unwind.
The staff goes above and beyond to ensure a memorable stay.

Amazing natural beauty here in a traditional setting. Would recommend to anyone looking to experience the real Sa Pa, and great vegetarian options at the restaurant here. They were very accommodating of custom requests as we don't eat egg either.
Amazing few days, only regret is that we didn’t stay longer! Breathtaking views from the bedroom, 10/10 food and the staff were so wonderful and friendly would recommend anyone!

Vom Empfang bis zur Verabschiedung wurden wir mit größter Herzlichkeit beglückt. Das gesamte Familien Team ist höchst professionell, sehr aufmerksam und strahlt immer guter Laune aus.
Die gesamte Anlage ist wunderschön und sehr gepflegt.
Das Frühstück ein wahrer Traum!
Wir haben auch das Abendessen sehr genossen.
Eine rundum Wohlfühl Oase.
Unsere Empfehlung: Komm, wenn es warm ist!
Bei uns war es leider sehr kalt und durchgehend nebelig und regnerisch.
Trotzdem verbinden uns die besten Erinnerungen an diesen Ort.
Vielen Dank für alles ❤️
Ganz liebe Grüße von Thomas und Kerstin

The Eco Palms Lodge is a place that I would highly recommend to everyone traveling to Sapa. Their staff is amazing, especially Nam, along with the ladies in the kitchen and housekeeping. The front desk gentleman is also extremely personable and will provide his expert opinion to tour the area. The owners Khanh, and his wife are very hospitable, and this is a definite must-stay for Sapa and visiting Fanispan and other attractions, shops, and villages. I would not stay anywhere else upon my return to Sapa. This felt like family, and I was extremely welcomed and felt great about the experience. The restaurant serves delicious food, and they were very accommodating in preparing me breakfast for some of my early morning activities even before the kitchen officially opened. Five Star service, without a doubt!!! Please stay here for a visit, and you will not be disappointed.

This was by far the best Airbnb experience that we have ever had. The property is absolutely stunning and the views from the room are breathtaking. The food was the best we had in Vietnam and the complementary breakfast was so convenient. The staff consists of the nicest humans we have honestly ever met and they made us feel like we were at home. Their hospitality is something we have never experienced before. There are more than enough activities available including swimming in their pool, getting a massage on the property, taking a cooking class and trekking tours. The taxi from SaPa is 200k Vietnamese Dong and the staff will call it for you whenever you would like to leave the property. By the end of the trip we wanted to stay at the Eco Palms forever. This was genuinely the best experience we’ve had and I couldn’t recommend it more.
We absolutely loved our stay at Eco Palms. Wonderful staff and fantastic food and amenities. Very comfortable and unique bungalows with stunning views.
Enjoyed my stay and great staff who was attentive enough to all my needs. great view from my room as well.
We had a great stay!  Well run place with friendly helpful staff.

The stay was absolutely wonderful. From the view to the ambience of the place. Everything was clean just the toilet seat was broken a bit. Very spacious and cozy aesthetic. We also enjoyed some Netflix at night.

We arrive early and getvto check in early. I think we got upgraded from 2 queen bed room to large house with 4 queen bed. Full utilities and kitchen and beautiful bathroom with bathtub. The view was stunning. Love it. Beautiful valley scenery with paddy terrace and mountains. Recommended for quiet and peaceful place to rest.

가격에 비하면 조식도 주고 뷰도 좋지만 너무 더러워요
화장실은 춥고 더럽고 침대 밑과 사이도 먼지가 가득하고 수건이 냄새나요
장점:조식맛있고 전망이 최고에요
단점:길이 험하고 멀고 택시비가 들어요. 겨울에 너무 춥고 대처가 미흡해요.
냄새와 먼지가 많고 청소가 미흡해요
The location is extremely far from the town side and the road towards this place is extremely bad. We had bad experience throughout the drive.

Die beste Unterkunft in ganz Vietnam. Stellt euch einfach vor ihr seid mitten im Berg, habt ein blitzsauberes Zimmer mit traumhafter Aussicht (+ beheizte Decken) und werdet jeden Abend und Morgen für angemessene Preise sehr lecker bekocht. Unbeschreiblich in Kombination mit der Kulisse. Einzig allein: Die Anfahrt mit dem Grab ist immer ein kleines Abenteuer, wenn man täglich ins Tal möchte. Mit den gebuchten Taxis über die Unterkunft aber auch kein Problem! 😊 Danke für alles.

We truly loved our stay! Tucked away in the mountains, it was peaceful, quiet, and surrounded by nature—waking up to the stunning view was such a treat. Even though we arrived at 2am, the on-site staff greeted us warmly and made check-in a breeze. A big heartfelt thank you to the lovely Sumy—she went above and beyond to help us with everything from Fansipan tickets, local guide arrangements, to recommending massage spots. Her kindness and care made our trip extra special. The staff were always ready to help, even giving us a heads-up about bugs in the area, which is to be expected since we were in the mountains. The taxi service tied to the stay made getting to and from the town centre effortless throughout the trip. We also loved the free breakfast, delicious Vietnamese coffee, and the sweet dogs that kept us company each morning. It was such a memorable stay—we’re so grateful and would highly recommend it to anyone looking for a peaceful mountain retreat.

A bit of a hassle to get there, the roads are not the best, but it’s so worth it! It’s calm and peaceful and the view is unmatched. Breakfast is included and you can have dinner here as well (which is recommended as there are not many restaurants around). The host was very welcoming and helpful and they have super cute dogs and cats to cuddle with!

Highly recommend this place. It’s a very special experience immersed in the local community. It’s not walking distance to main sapa town but it’s a short car ride to everything. The host was wonderful, generous and always ready to help. The food cooked in the Homestay was delicious and the walk around the local
Village was delightful. Overall it was an authentic experience. Private space, warm beds either heated blankets.

They’re on top of the mountain which makes the place more private. Since we prefer to stay in a peaceful and relaxing place after we go around the tourist spots in Sapa. You’ll get to see the best like a panoramic view of mountains and an overlooking view of Sapa. The receptionist was so good and assisted us very well. Also, she cooks too! The room is so cozy that we don’t want to leave this place. Overall our stay is perfect and unforgettable. Thank you so much!

TLDR; highly recommended if you need a retreat spot/ romantic getaway. Not the most ideal for solo travelers, or those that want good access to Sapa Town.
Initially booked for a three night stay - but cut it to one night since the roads and lights towards the place wasn't as developed to our liking - it was rocky, about 30-40 mins by car, and would be inconvenient for when we stayed out late in Sapa Town. HOWEVER, the host did try to alleviate the blow on the remote location by offering to book a car for us if Grabs were difficult to find. Maybe until the infrastructure is more solid, we'd be very happy for a return.
BUT - if you're keen to make this your retreat away from the noise, and don't have to go into Sapa Town that often, I would highly recommend this place. It has it's own pool, and despite the distance - WiFi, running water and heating were are superb. Not to mention a good selection of food for breakfast, lunch and dinner if you get hungry. Highly recommend the hotpot.

Vi en en overnatning og havde mulighed for tidlig tjek ind, da vi kan ankom med natbus. Mange tak! Super skønt sted! Dejligt tæt på naturen og fantastisk sød vært med gode lokale anbefalinger- vi var med guiden Tam, som tog os på en 4 timers tur ud i rismarkerne. Det var virkelig en god oplevelse!
Hvis du vil bo tæt på byen, så er dette måske lidt langt væk - især fordi vejen dertil er meget svær. Vi tog taxi derhen, som var anbefalet af vært, hvilket var super fint, men det tog alligevel en halv time og ville på ingen måde anbefale at tage scooter selv.
Desuden var der på ingen måde koldt, da de havde varmeblæser, varme i sengetæpperne og en varmeblæser på badeværelset 🫶
Tak for denne gang!

Beautiful home with lovely staff, little out of town but a short 20 minute taxi ride in. Filled with friendly pets and an amazing view with a cosy wooden style living room with a fire to keep you warm.

I really enjoyed staying here even in the bad weather, i felt like i was in my relatives home. The staffs were so nice, as soon as I sat on the sofa, they set up the fireplace immediately to keep me warm. The place is so cozy and tranquil. I definitely come back here again.

Der Aufenthalt war sehr schön, die ganze Familie war super nett und hat sich sehr um uns gekümmert. Wir konnten ganz kurzfristig alle Touren (die preislich sehr fair waren) über die Unterkunft buchen und das Essen war hervorragend. Ich hatte vorher gar nicht gewusst, dass das Frühstück dass a la carte für jeden einzeln vorbereitet war sogar im Preis enthalten ist.
Ich würde die Unterkunft sofort nochmal buchen für einen Aufenthalt in Sapa.

My partner and I stayed here for our anniversary and this place is by far the best place we have ever stayed.
the house was decorated extremely lovely and romantic as per requested.
the house decor is stunning and charming and the views are unmatched and glorious.
the workers are super friendly, attentive, warm, and welcoming.
we felt so at home and at peace. the view is just out of this world. better than going to another tourist attraction with a view.
we love it so much and it was the perfect location to stay on our anniversary.. it couldn't have been more perfect. thank you so much
베트남 이곳저곳 다녀봤지만 사파가 제일 좋았고 제일 좋았던 기억으로 남을수 있던 이유는 여기 숙소에서 지낼수 있어서 였습니다 진짜 지금까지 본 인생 최고의 뷰와 맛있는 음식 좋은 숙소 평화 그자체에요 사파에 온다면 여기 숙소에서 꼭 지내세요 꼭!!!!
Amazing stay with amazing view and friendly hosts! Will come back again for sure!
The place was magical and peaceful i wish i stayed longer , i would definitely recommend it

This was a cozy home stay in Sapa for myself and my 60-year old parents. The beds are really comfy, the bathroom was clean and the place felt like a cottage. It was lovely. We came right after the typhoon so they were still fixing the roads. It was a bit scary coming up the mountain in our arranged car ride recommended from the host (they also have Grab in Sapa for comparable prices), but we came so late and the drivers were very knowledgeable of the roads so we felt a bit safer. The owners were nice, they greeted us and checked us in at 12am! The owner’s dogs and cat were one of the best parts! They also serve free breakfast which was delicious. You have the occasional spider or insects, but it was perfectly fine. Overall, it was a fantastic stay in Sapa and really appreciate the hosts and their hard work!
Super super beautiful place. Surrounded by gorgeous nature and due to its location, everything felt ethereal and unreal. Scenery was truly amazing.
Good place to stay
Wonderful host
We loved our stay! The Food was amazing, we will stay here again :)

We stay for 1 days, we check in on time and got enough time just to chill/relax and appreciating the view. The host can speaked & understand english. They also served free breakfast, even though not stated in the amenities . There's also a few menu that Muslim can choose. We use taxi provide by the host and the driver was always on time and even arrived early.

Lo is such a great host. Highly recommended staying at his property. Such a beautiful property overlooking the paddy fields. Lo was extremely friendly and flexible according to our plan. Can’t wait to come back here

Place is exactly same as in pic. I had to use host’s personal kitchen since no separate kitchen. Which was bit uncomfortable. No wardrobe to keep stuff. Everything had to be kept on floor. Whatever is shown in picture, is only available. Lo was helpful. He gave me ride to market on his way to work n brought me to property on his way back, was great. He allowed me to check in early, which was good experience.

The place is beautiful and Lo was very helpful. I will however mention that the curtains let in a lot of light in morning making it quite hard to sleep. Moreover, lots of people pass this room to see the view and the glass walls don’t ensure much privacy. Lastly, if you are thinking of renting motorbike, be wary the roads are very rocky and difficult in one section .    Overall we loved the cabin though- very clean and beautiful views-  thank you Lo
Lo and his wife were great hosts , they helped us with food recommendations, even got us a motorbike straight to our place and they were just extremely helpful and a kind people .
Lo and his wife created a very welcoming home for us. The view was even more beautiful than I expected, and the room was absolutely perfect. I would recommend for anyone who wants to explore Sapa.

Place was just as described, with a beautiful view and a nice clean minimal room. The rice on the terrace was just being planted so it wasn't green yet, so the view would probably be nicer in a month other than May. The place was slightly hard to find and hard to get to (lots of walking up and down steep hills), but the upshot is that it's very peaceful, with no cars going by.

Our 3-day stay in Lo’s place was amazing! The room was super cozy, plus they have a  spacious comfort room. My favorite is their bed heater, perfect for the cold weather when we visited. Lo was very helpful also, would definitely recommend!

Had a great visit, place is inside Ta Van village which had quiet and local vibe. There are a lot of good places to have a drink and just explore the village itself. The house was little bit hard to find due to incorrect Google Maps location/route but host was really helpful and we made it! Next night we stayed at another place of the same host which was perfect 🙏

Staying at Lo’s place was a highlight of our trip. The small house is simple but cozy, with a bed, a private bathroom, and an absolutely stunning view over the rice terraces. It’s the perfect spot to relax, go hiking, and take in the natural beauty of the Sapa.
The road to get there is a bit tricky and steep, but totally worth it once you arrive! There are small restaurants and cafés within walking distance, and it takes about 25–30 minutes by taxi to reach Sapa town.
Lo was incredibly kind, helpful, and responded quickly to all our messages. We felt very welcome and we’d love to come back again!
mong sẽ có thể quay lại đây

Our stay with Lo was truly unforgettable, and my partner and I had such a wonderful experience. Waking up to that breathtaking view is a memory we will cherish forever. We also feel incredibly grateful for the opportunity to explore the local area and participate in a trek that Lo helped organize for us. Stepping away from the main area of Sapa allowed us to connect with the beauty around us in a special way. We wholeheartedly recommend this experience to anyone looking to create lasting memories!

Lo was the best host!
He was very responsive and helpful with local recommendations.
The cabin was in a very beautiful part of town and had a lovely view.
I enjoyed trekking with the local women and learning about their culture. Lots of incredible nearby restaurants.
Very comfortable and lovely stay! Amazing view of the countryside from the bungalow and very accommodating hosts.
Lovely accommodation with a view on the rice fields. Spacious and quiet. Totally recommend

Fue un lugar increíble con gran vista, sientes la conexión con la naturaleza. Muy amiglables, súper limpio. Definitivamente volvería a ir. Muy rápida respuesta.
Agradecemos enormemente que nos hayan permitido dejar las maletas y usar la ducha temprano🙏llegábamos de un viaje en bus de 8 hrs😅

Lo’s place was amazing, literally in the middle of a rice field and the view was incredible. Location is private and peaceful alrhough it’s a hit hard to reach by taxi and a long way from the Sapa town center but if you’re into the peace and quiet and you want to relax, it’s the perfect place. There’s lots of restaurants and places to see nearby too.
Room is just right for 2 people and looks exactly how it is in pictures. Lo and the care taker are very friendly and responsive, they just live next door so they can assist in everything. They are flexible on the check in and out too.
Overall i had a great stay at this place and definitely recommended ! ❤️
I had a wonderful stay. The private room was spacious, cozy, and spotless—truly great value for money.
Room was tidy, comfy and in a beautiful location.
Wonderful Airbnb, beautiful scenery and clean and comfortable space. Will be back!
Moltes gràcies! Lo ha sigut molt amable
Nice and sturdy bed.

We were only the second group of guest who were priviliged enough to rent the place, we can only recommend it!
The place was amazing, with a kitchen stocked with food and even with vegetables from the garden.
Huong (The Host) was very helpful with the renting of our bikes and also the Ha Giang tour.
We had a beautiful time and cant wait to retourn!

A Hidden Gem in the Heart of Sapa 🌿
I had the pleasure of staying at this beautiful eco-luxury homestay in Sapa, Lao Cai, hosted by the warm and welcoming Thi Houng. Surrounded by lush greenery and peaceful mountains, this retreat blends comfort, sustainability, and authentic Vietnamese hospitality. The thoughtfully designed villas and the stunning swimming pool overlooking the valley offer pure serenity. Every detail reflects a deep respect for nature. Thi Houng went above and beyond to make our stay memorable—sharing local tips and helping plan nearby adventures. Her genuine care truly stands out. If you’re looking to unwind, connect with nature, and enjoy a touch of luxury, this is the place. Perfect for couples, solo travelers, or anyone seeking peace in Vietnam’s mountains.

Every time I go to a place, the first thing that I check is the bathroom. And this place has the cleanest bathroom that I have seen. The room is so tidy and smells really good. I like how peaceful the place is but still near along the sapa town center, it is really accessible and easy to locate. Quang is so accommodating and hospitable, a really nice host. He responds fast to our queries. If we ever travel to Sa Pa again, we will for sure book this place again.

We had a very nice stay here. The place is charming and the room, though small, was cozy and comfortable. The bed was a little firm, but everything else was great. The location is excellent — very close to the church and in a quiet area, yet just a short and easy walk to the town center.
Quang was very kind and helpful throughout our stay. Overall, a lovely experience!

Similar to other reviews, room was a little cool due to inclement weather outside which affected dryness of towel or clothes.  But I LOVED the heated bed which was a major plus in my book.  Quang was extremely hospitable as I was able to leave my big bag with him for a couple of days while trekking in the village and was always responsive. He even helped me find a place after to keep my bags several more hours for free as he was closed for the evening.  2min walk to Sapa station and church and very conveniently located.  Great stay for me.

Great location, good communication. We arrived early in the morning and check in instructions were clear. We requested breakfast one morning and it was yummy and well priced (35k each). Would definitely recommend.
The room was just like in the pictures, very clean and spacious. I got to the hostel very late at night and the host was extremely accommodating and responsive. Would book again!

Preis-/Leistungsverhältnis super. Schönes kleines Zimmer (ja, das Bett etwas hart, aber es war okay). Das Bad war gut. Der Check In war flexibel und ich wurde freundlich in Empfang genommen.
Die Gegend ist super, mitten im Zentrum von Sapa, alles zu Fuß erreichbar.
Ich kanns empfehlen :)
parfait, tout s'est bien passé ! logement niquel, super location et il y a un endroit en bas de la rue top pour manger.
Perfect little place to stay for a couple nights, very helpful host and easy check in. Slightly chilly at night but bed is heated so not a problem. Thanks again

Quang's place was great. I love how he communicated with me. He is also friendly. I also didnt have a hard time communicating with him since he can understand and speak english as well. Thank you Quang.
great stay nothing to complain about

Great stay! very polite and approachable
host!
Le logement était super, instruction claire, localisation parfaite (seul petit problème le lit était très dur)
Cheap stay, nicely located and friendly staff. Perfect for a budget trip to Sa Pa.

Das Zimmer liegt nur etwa 5min zu Fuß vom Sun Plaza entfernt und damit mitten in Sapa. Restaurants, Cafés, Geschäfte, Seilbahn, alles sehe gut zu erreichen.
Während meines Aufenthalts war es sehr kalt mit Nachts um die 5°C. Das Zimmer war entsprechend auch kalt. Es gibt zwar eine beheizbare Bettunterlage, aber der Raum bleibt trotzdem kalt. Auch das Badezimmer ist kalt und trocknet nach dem Duschen nicht richtig durch die Kälte. Für etwa 6min kann man heiß duschen, danach wird das Wasser kalt.
Das Zimmer bietet wenig Stauraum, also eher was für Einzelpersonen oder Pärchen mit wenig Gepäck.
Im Zimmer gibt es einen Wasserkocher, am ersten Tag bekommt man Handtücher, 2 kleine Wasserflaschen und Shampoo & Showergel.
Um ruhig schlafen zu können empfehle ich Ohrenstöpsel.
Good
겨울이라 추웠지만 호스트는 최선을 다해 도움을 주었다
Perfect place for the night and perfect location
To get to the apartment was very easy. You could just check-in at any time. Quant helped a lot, gave directions, booked hiking trips and tried to make my stay as easy as possible.
Excellent séjour!

very good location but there is no cafe no restaurant in the street so you must walk and the vest is the railway area at around 1km.
its quiet , just the sound of the fountain. its clean
Clean room, good communication with staff.

nice hotel. new and modern. The street has plenty of shops ( telephone, electronics...) but no café. A bakery only.
Better when we have a bike
Very good hotel ! confortable and clean
Lovely stay near the train station on the way to Sapa. Lovely clean hotel and friendly staff
Hôtel tout à fait correct hormis une légère odeur de tabac dans la chambre à l'arrivée. Mais l'hôtesse d'accueil a été très réactive. Très bon rapport qualité-prix.
amezing stay.. beautiful people

Die eigentliche Unterkunft stand nach starken Stürmen nicht mehr zur Verfügung und Hung bot uns eine neue Ausweichen-Unterkunft in der Muong Hoa Eco Villa. Das ist ein sehr gemütliches Hotel ein Stück weiter oben am Berg. Das war eins der schönsten und nettesten Hotels, wo ich bisher war! Das Personal ist super lieb und gibt viele Tipps, aber nur wenn man sie auch haben möchte. Die Umgebung und der Ausblick über die Berge sind sehr schön und gut zum Wandern. Das Restaurant im Hotel und der Service sind super!

This location is within a beautiful village, friendly locals with great shopping skills. Attention and quick responsed from staff was always pleasant and warm. Staying outside the Sapa centre and with the locals was a wonderful experience. Will definitely return and book longer time in Sapa.

The private bungalow was nice. The staff were very nice, especially the day staff.
There is not much to do in this area so don’t spend too much time there.
The property is nice but it looks a lot more magical and charming in the pictures than it is in reality.
The river is dirty, I wouldn’t swim there.
Some items on the restaurant menu were not up to date, either on the price or on the avaibility.
The breakfeast (included) was really good tho !

I really enjoyed my stay here! The place was spacious, clean and looked exactly like the pictures. The bed had heating available, linens were clean and smelt amazing too.
The toilet was really unique, with rocks as part of the the whole look. As the room overlooks the river, there were a few harmless slugs that might appear at night but nothing much of a concern for me. Got to wash my clothes as well with their washing machine and dryer available.
All the staff were really kind and helpful! They helped me to arrange a taxi to and fro Sapa Town pre and post check-out as Grab isn’t available in Sapa. The breakfast were delicious meals we could preselect the night before! There were also a lot of benches and even swings in the restaurant/entrance common area for a peaceful chill spot to read a book or stargaze to the sound of the river.
Hosts were very proactive and even recommended local cafes/bars to visit and even accessible hiking spots.
Would definitely love to come back again!
Beautiful views, right on top of the river. We loved staying here, it was a peaceful and enjoyable getaway. 10/10!! I will definitely be coming back next time.
We loved to stay at this place! It’s very cozy and clean, the staff is so friendly and always helpful! ♥️
Best place to stay.. out of city area.. no noise n very peaceful environment.. loved it..
It was a great experience staying at Riverside SaPa.
incredible place - an oasis!

Fomos muito bem recebidos por essa familia linda. Não é uma hospedagem. É uma imersão cultural na etnia hmong. Eu definitivamente recomendo para você que quer ter uma experiência única no Vietnã. Amamos esse lugar. Eles foram muito prestativos do inicio ao fim.
Ya ist eine total herzliche und offene Gastgeberin,bei der ich mich gleich aufgenommen gefühlt habe. Die Lage ist schön ,die Familie sehr angenehm
Cool views and very friendly family.
Nhà sạch, chủ thân thiện. Rất tốt.

ce logement à l'écart de la ville et en face du champ de Muong Thanh est très reposant et très joliment décoré. le propriétaire est très disponible et prêt à faciliter notre séjour autant que possible. Il faut prendre le taxi ou louer un scooter pour un prix modique pour se rendre en ville.

Nous avons passé un agréable séjour, les hôtes sont très gentils et accueillants. La maison est trés confortable et spacieuse. Il y a un peu de marche jusqu'au centre mais c'est tous à fait faisable. ( possibilité de louer des scooters )
Nous avons choisis de dîner à la maison et le repas était délicieux merci beaucoup !
Merci encore pour nous avoir conduits dans les différents endroits.
je recommande !

Le logement, l’accueil, la chambre  et les hôtes sont très bien.  Pour les suppléments (repas, café, moyens de transports) bien se faire préciser le prix avant toute acceptation. Nous avons passé un excellent séjour
Très jolie maison, très bon accueil , le prix de la chambre rien à dire par contre le service de taxi et le repas du soir étaient très élevés (le plus cher de tout notre voyage)

super accueil.
on a profité de la gentillesse des hôtes pour manger de la cuisine traditionnelle ainsi qu une journée dans les environs de Dien Bien phu
je le recommande vivement cette hote .

Excellent host! Very clean, tidy and beautiful home and rooms! The host's family was very accommodating, friendly, flexible and you felt home right away! I will definitely come back whenever I visit Dien Bien Phu! See you again soon! Paul

On that day, I drove all the way, 200 kms from north Laos to Dien Bien Phu. I was welcomed by Quynh's parents who are very kind people and welcomed me.
The house is high class and new. The star fruits from the garden are delicious and... now that I left... I miss the jacuzzi with top melisse scent...
I had a brief, but very nice stay with this family.

Nous avons été très bien recus chez Quyng.  Accueil très chaleureux, sincère et amical, et la chambre très belle. Nos hôtes nous ont aidé pour tout ce dont nous avons eu besoin, très disponibles. En plus de ce très bon séjour, nous avons fait une belle rencontre. Merci !
It’s just unbelievable worth for a stay as it’s cheap indeed compared with other places
The couple who ran the airbnb were the loveliest people we’ve met. Showed us around the town and cooked a very nice meal. Best place we’ve stayed!
Alloggio in una posizione lontana dal centro ma con un ottima vista sulla natura. Hiên é una persona molto disponibile e ci ha aiutati molto quando avevamo bisogno.

Logement idéalement situé dans Dien Bien Phu. En revanche, heureusement que nous y sommes resté qu’une nuit. Chambre avec des taches au sol, salle de bain pas très propres, eau chaude aléatoire et moisissure. Literie très dure.
De plus la communication est très compliqué. Nous avons certes demander une arrivée plus tôt car nous arrivions avec un bus de nuit, on nous dit que ce sera peut être possible et qu’on nous tient au courant. Résultat on ne nous a rien dit, on est arrivée à 8h on nous a dit de repasser à 12h puis à 14h, pour une arrivée finalement à 15h. Même en ayant contacté l’hôte par message, nous avons eu une première réponse puis plus rien.
Dépanne bien mais pour une nuit.
Belle chambre environnement paisible loué des scooters Hien très sympa nous a aidé pour notre resa de bus pour le lendemain très tôt je recommande

Tiếp khách vui vẻ, chu đáo, nhanh nhẹn, nhiệt tình và chiều khách hàng.
Gần trung tâm Điện Biên.
Có phục vụ nước uống và thức ăn địa phương tại chỗ.
Tư vấn địa điểm tham quan, ăn uống ở địa phương.
Có cơ hội đến thăm Điện Biên mọi người thử đến trải nghiệm nhé!

Hien was incredibly likeable and super-helpful about everything. Responsive to all my requests - nothing was too much trouble. Made great recommendations about a guide (Son) and arranged airport transfers. I hadnt realised they had a pool & this was a lovely bonus.

Hôte très serviable, sympathique, très réactif et de bon conseil.
Nous avons pu profiter d’une journée avec un guide pour découvrir le site historique, la ville et les montagnes alentours.
Je recommande

Quynh's place in Điện Biên Phủ is peaceful, welcoming, spacious and sparkling clean. Quynh's parents were thoughtful and warm in their interactions and taking care of us. We were here for a historic tour and the house is easy to reach from the city center. Both of us felt very much welcome and had a wonderful time in the city.

Logement correspondant aux photos et à la description, très grande chambre et salle de bain, propre.
Nous avons été très bien accueillis par les parents de Quynh.
Cependant, manque de communication et de transparence sur les services additionnels (petit déjeuner compris dans le prix mais pas les cafés ou thés, dernier petit déjeuné payant - sans mention initial du prix).
Dans l’ensemble nous avons passé un bon séjour mais nécessitez d’être plus transparent sur les services payants.

La chambre était confortable en privée.
Host a donné de nombreuses informations sur Dien Bien Phu.
très bien situé,  très  propre, personnel  très  agréable  et compétent. vélos  gratuits en plus
L’hôte est très agréable et serviable. L’emplacement de l’hôtel est bien. La chambre est correcte mais pourrait être plus propre.
très bon accueil. Equipe très réactive.
Un établissement agréable et bien situé. je conseille

Mai’s house showcases traditional H’mong house architecture. Though not far from the center of Sapa, it remains peacefully secluded from the bustling tourist spots. My friend and I truly enjoyed the house and the warm hospitality of the people there. It was a wonderful experience, and I will definitely return.

This is a beautiful stay in a traditional Hmong village. Mr.Chu is a great cook, and his wife was very kind as well. Please note that food by him is a separate cost that goes directly to him - so bring cash. There aren’t any restaurants in the area as it is a local village, so keep this in mind. If you get hungry between meals, it might be wise to bring some snacks for yourself.
The kids were very cute and friendly, and when I stayed, there were also a few Vietnamese volunteers who also spoke English, which made my stay even more special as they showed me around and explained the volunteer work they were doing in the village.
The homestay itself is very clean and nice, I liked the design and ambience. Sometimes communication with the host was not always quick, but they provided an in depth message right upon booking which answered most of my questions. Thank you again and all the best 🙂

amazing place and host.
would recommend this to anyone looking for an authentic escape from the city

Đây là địa điểm chữa lành đích thực cho cả người lớn và trẻ em!
Tôi yêu hiên nhà đầy gió và lãng mạn! Tôi có thể ngồi cả ngày ở đây ngắm nhìn những tia nắng chiếu qua tán lá ngoài sân hay ngắm mây bay trên đỉnh Fansipan.
Trẻ nhỏ thì thoải mái rong chơi với trẻ em ở đây. Chúng đi bắt cua, bắt côn trùng để chơi, chúng trèo cây hái quả như những em bé ở bản. Cũng có lúc chúng lắng mình lại bên hiên đọc những cuốn truyện chúng yêu thích.
Đường tới đây không dễ dàng nhưng rất đáng để vượt qua và trải nghiệm.

Un endroit extraordinaire où le temps est rythmé par le soleil, les animaux et le va et vient des villageois. La barrière de la langue ne permet pas toujours une grande communication mais le peu que l’on arrive à échanger apporte beaucoup.  La cuisine de Monsieur Chu vaut le voyage à elle seule! Elle est extrêmement diversifiée avec des produits frais d’une grande qualité. On a même eu droit à du cochon de lait tué le matin même. Nous sommes vraiment heureux d’avoir pu vivre tout ça.

A great place to explore H’Mong culture and cuisine , great views of Fansipan, very peaceful surroundings. We have access to a beautiful spring, the view from the slopes leading there is breathtaking. Mr Chu prepares very good meals with local fresh ingredients. We enjoyed our stay a great deal. Will definitely come back.

Highly recommend this home stay. It is a very peaceful escape from Sa Pa! It is also very comfortable with a flush toilet, hot water, and soap. The space is gorgeous like in the photos and the meals were diverse and outstanding. The host family was nice and made us feel comfortable. For clarity, the location is in Google Maps under Mai Mai Homestay (it took us a while to receive the location information so we had to backtrack on our bikes).
I'm very pleased with my experience at Smoke Valley

What can I say that hasn't been said already? This was a truly wonderful experience.  Zung responds quickly to any questions, will help arrange whatever you need. I went largely with the idea of going to a quiet, interesting and tranquil place to write, and this worked perfectly. Oh, and the food is wonderful,  very generous portions, fresh as you can get it. I feel truly privileged to have been able to spend time in this lovely community with wonderful people and to have been introduced to the Hmong community.

We had a very nice stay for two nights! The accommodation was simple but everything you need. Mr. Chu and his family were welcoming and fed us so much yummy food! We wandered around the village and enjoyed the beautiful scenery. I would recommend to anyone looking for something off the beaten path!

Mai’s house it’s the best airbnb experiece we ever had. If you want to know a bit more about hmong comunity this is the right place. Chu’s family has been super kind with us, it’s been a pleasure share the meals with them. We will always think of Xin Chai as the best stop of our trip in Vietnam. Would highly recommend!

I travel a  lot and love non touristy off the beaten track places. This is the very best local/authentic stays I’ve ever had. To me, I felt like I was transported into the pages of a national geographic magazine. Amazing views, local life - chickens, pigs, dogs, ducks, water Buffalo, etc.  If you are wondering- the place has stone floors but is spotless. The walls are wooden slats but I never saw a ‘creature’ ie. mouse, etc. inside or outside. The shower is hot. Taxi will easily take you to Sapa if you want to go. Trekking is amazing with the host (my daughter was so excited because she got to see China). The food is AMAZING, plentiful and healthy. Great vegetarian options. The hosts are beautiful, welcoming people. Taxi service that was recommended was also super helpful. Stayed here with my 16 year old daughter and we both felt safe walking the street, hiking whether alone or together. This is a great community- nobody tries to sell you anything and they just go about their lives.

Even though we had read previous reviews, our whole family was still surprised when we came to stay. Every arrangement in the house made us feel cozy and close to home while still feeling the characteristics of the H'MOng people. Mr. Chu's family, everyone is friendly. In addition to eating hot and delicious meals with his family, we also enjoyed typical H'Mong dishes during the Lunar New Year. Located in a village that is not a crowded tourist area, the whole family can feel the natural scenery of the surrounding landscape and people. The fresh air, friendly people, clean, cozy house and delicious food made us initially plan to stay 2 nights, then decided to stay 1 more night. I also had a very special experience trying on H'Mong women's costumes. Unforgettable cultural experiences for the whole family. We plan to return here during the ripe rice season to harvest rice with Uncle Chu's family.

Mai Mai homestay in Sin Chai is a great place to relax. The house is beautifully decorated (probably the nicest place I stayed in the northern mountains of Vietnam), but keep in mind that it is made like this for tourists, since mountain ethnics usually do not care so much about that.
Our stay was very comfortable (beds, bathroom, cleanliness, etc.), usually accommodations are more basic. The houses can accommodate 6 persons (3 double beds).
There’s an easy 3 hour trek path in the surroundings, but after that hiking itineraries are demanding since it is located near Fansipan mountain range.
Communication with Mai could not be better! Thank you!

Từ lúc mình hỏi đặt chỗ ở, chị Mai đã rất nhiệt tình hướng dẫn mình. Và mình càng chắc chắn hơn về quyết định này khi được biết toàn bộ số tiền thuê phòng sẽ được dành để cho trẻ con trong bản đi học và chữa bệnh.
Mình đã có 1 kỳ nghỉ rất dễ chịu tại đây, được gia đình bác Chư tiếp đón rất tình cảm. Lan, Nủ và vợ chồng bác Chư là những người hiền lành và tử tế, họ quan tâm mình chút một. Mình luôn được chuẩn bị cho rất nhiều đồ ăn, và bác Chư nấu ăn rất ngon. Bác luôn sợ mình đói. Chị Lan con nhờ 1 bạn nhỏ trong bản tới ngủ cùng cho mình đỡ sợ. Và trẻ con trên này luôn làm mình cảm thấy yên tâm và dễ chịu mà không một chút phiền hà. Mọi thứ rất thân thuộc.
Có lẽ, đây không phải là một nơi bạn nên đến nếu như bạn yêu cầu một sự tiện nghi và sạch sẽ hoàn hảo. Nhưng nếu bạn thực sự muốn một nơi để có nghỉ ngơi, ngắm nhìn thiên nhiên, suy nghĩ, sống cùng với người dân tộc vùng Tây Bắc, thì đó là một sự lựa chọn tuyệt vời.
Mình chắc chắn sẽ quay lại nơi đây vào một ngày gần nhất
Nice experience to feel the village life. There is nothing special to do in surroundings but it’s close to Sapa and nature attractions

Ba năm trước mình đã mò mẫm đến nơi đây một cách rất tình cờ. Khi chuyến đi Sapa kết thúc, mình vẫn tiếc nuối mãi khi không thể nghỉ chân tại nơi đây một ngày nào. Khi đó mình đã có ý định quay lại, thế mà mất tới tận ba năm sau mình mới trở lại được nhà anh Đức - chị Mai.
Chuyến đi lần này của mình và các bạn thật may mắn. Chúng mình lên nhà đúng vào dịp trung thu, được góp phần tổ chức và chứng kiến tiệc phá cỗ của các em nhỏ tại bản ngay trên bếp ăn của các bạn Lan-Nủ dựng nên cạnh nhà. Chứng kiến những đứa trẻ vui cười khiến chúng mình cảm thấy cực kỳ hạnh phúc.
Dịp này cũng đúng mùa lúa mới, mùa gặt của đồng bào, chúng mình được trở thành một phần của cộng đồng nơi đây, được cùng chung tay ra đồng mùa lúa mới. Chiều hôm ấy mấy đứa tụi mình ngủ quên, cả gia đình bác Chư đã đi làm từ đầu giờ chiều, mỗi người một việc. Em Sô vẫn đợi tụi mình thức dậy, để thực hiện lời hứa đưa anh chị ra đồng. Ngắm nhìn những thửa ruộng xếp thành tầng từ chân núi lên, được cùng đồng bào lao động trong tiếng cười nói, chứng kiến trẻ em nô đùa, nhảy nhót với đám rơm rạ, tụi bạn mình ai nấy được bữa cười giòn tan. Mấy đứa lóng ngóng tay chân như mình vẫn được cùng mọi người thực hiện việc thu hoạch những bông lúa chín nặng, đập bông lúa rơi ra thành từng hạt thóc, nhặt các cọng rạ thừa ra khỏi chỗ thóc vừa tách khỏi bông, rồi đóng thóc thành từng bao, vừa kịp chạy cơn mưa đang tới, chúng mình xúc động, quý trọng công sức người nông dân làm ra hạt gạo. Lúc đó mấy đứa mình đều suy nghĩ và tự nhủ không được phí phạm hạt gạo nào thêm nữa. Rồi mà gặt lúa xong thấy toát mồ hôi, chúng mình xuống suối tắm giải nhiệt. Dòng suốt mát lành chảy xuống từ Thác bạc, cùng lũ bạn í ới tạt nước vào nhau, tắm xong thì vội lau người đứa nào đứa nấy hơ người bên đống lửa đã nhóm sẵn. Mát lạnh, sảng khoái tuyệt vời!
Mỗi sáng tụi mình ngồi trên võng tựa đầu vào cánh cửa nhà ngắm mặt trời mọc rực rỡ ló ra từng tia nắng hay chiều đến trèo lên đường to ngắm hoàng hôn buông, lòng chợt chẳng nghĩ chẳng lo, chẳng vui chẳng buồn. Một cảm giác bình yên.
Mình nhớ ánh mắt bác Chư dõi theo núi rừng, bác có chút nuối tiếc khi được hỏi về sự thay đổi của Sapa, của đỉnh Fansipan. “Khác chứ, thay đổi nhiều rồi, khác lắm rồi.” Người Kinh len lỏi đến Sapa mang tiền cùng các dịch vụ để phục vụ du lịch, từ len lỏi, có nhiều nơi đã thành đa số. Nơi đó người H’mong đã bán đất cho người Kinh để người Kinh làm kinh tế. Ở Sín Chải đây, người H’mong không bán đất. Đồng bào người H’mong- mà dưới con mặt của mình đại diện là gia đình bác Chư - vẫn đang gìn giữ nếp sống xưa: vẫn đi rừng, vẫn làm nương rẫy, vẫn chăn nuôi lợn gà, vẫn quây quần bếp lửa nghi ngút khói quanh năm. Có chăng, khi làm hết việc rừng, việc đồng áng, đồng bào mới đi tìm thêm việc làm ngoài thị xã để cải thiện kinh tế.
Chúng mình mong đồng bào nơi đây, gia đình bác Chư mãi yên tâm bám bản, giữ bản, giữ lấy cả bản sắc dân tộc H’mong. Chúng mình chúc những người đàn ông nơi đây mãi mạnh mẽ, chân thật, khiêm nhường. Chúc những người đàn bà nơi đây tiếp tục cười những nụ cười trọn vẹn, vẫn đảm đang, săn sóc cho gia đình.
Có lẽ điều em viết sau đây sẽ hơi mang tính khuôn mẫu và sáo rỗng. Nhưng không viết ra không được. Chúng em cảm ơn anh chị Đức Mai. Qua đọc thêm về những điều anh Đức viết, em được biết anh chị đã tạo dựng nên một ngôi nhà H’mong đúng như nguyên bản cổ truyền, đã thực hiện hóa được một phần giấc mơ lãng mạn mà mười mấy năm trước hai anh chị đặt ra, cảm ơn anh chị đã kiên quyết mà giữ lại căn nhà này trong những lúc khó khăn nhất của cuộc sống và đã góp phần cải thiện đời sống sinh hoạt của cộng đồng, góp phần giữ gìn bản sắc dân tộc người H’mong.
what an amazing place to stay. friendly, beautiful, quiet... perfect!!!
beautiful land!

Mai's house is more than just an Airbnb. It is a lifetime experience. Hands down, this is the best experience I have ever had in Airbnb. Mr. Chu and his family took care of me really well despite the communication barrier. I stayed for 3 nights, but wished could stay longer. The place is beautiful, and peaceful. This is definitely a place to relax and rejuvenate.
In the day time, Mr. Chu's family invited me to plant corn seeds at the farm on the mountain. After farming, they would invite me to the family lunch with abundance of food and rice wine and family time. What I like the most is that, none of the activities or experience is curated. It all felt natural based on our own effort to communicate with them and to be part of their community.
Will definitely come again for sure!

Một địa chỉ tuyệt vời cho chuyến trải nghiệm của các bạn nhỏ và nơi nghỉ dưỡng cho các bố mẹ.
Không khí trong lành, cảnh đẹp tự nhiên, con người thân thiện, đồ ăn siêu ngon. Thêm điểm cộng vì cả đồ chay và thịt đều ngon.
Món nem rau củ ngon xuất sắc, món nem lụi thu hút cả đội quân team thịt, 100 cái nem lụi hết veo, đã phải đăng ký bữa tiếp theo lại nem lụi :))
Món gà nướng ống tre chấm 10 điểm
Và lẩu chay với các loại rau quanh nhà cũng là 1 điểm nhấn.
Cảm ơn gia đình bác Mai đã có 1 ngôi nhà tuyệt vời.
Cảm ơn gia đình bác Chư đã cho cả đoàn có những bữa ăn siêu ngon.
Cảm ơn các bạn nhỏ ở bản- các hướng dẫn viên du lịch siêu đáng yêu. Hẹn gặp lại nha nha nha

Si vous cherchez le confort, ce logement n’est pas pour vous. En hiver, malgré le feu et les bouillottes, il fait très froid. Mais nous avons vécu une expérience extraordinaire à Sin Chai : en suivant les conseils de Zung, nous sommes allés à la rencontre des habitants ; nous avons été invités à déjeuner par le Bible study group, nous avons assisté à une cérémonie rituelle pour chasser les esprits mauvais (incroyable), nous avons partagé les repas de Za, Chu et Lan, le mari de Lan nous a joué de la musique… C’était une immersion totale et probablement le souvenir le plus marquant de nos trois mois en Asie.
a really beautiful place where ypu can find a real Sapa people's life.
A great place to disconnect from the hustle and bustle of a life in the city

It was a wonderful, peaceful experience at Long’s home. He was not on the property but kept checking in about our stay and addressed any concerns promptly. He even arranged a driver to bring us from the main market to the Homestay on the day of our arrival. The place is a little far from the center so he offered a free motorbike too! For a clean, spacious, getaway it is a must visit :)

All we can say is WOW. Not only is the cabin and location beautiful, but Long and Giangg are wonderful hosts who truly care about their guests' experience. Long is very hospitable and welcoming and gave us excellent local recommendations.
The cabin itself is perched on a hill overlooking rice paddies, right next to a small local farm. You wake up each morning to the beautiful sounds of nature and can enjoy your coffee overlooking the peaceful valley. It's well stocked for longer stays, and all the furniture is very comfortable. Wifi is also great! One thing to note is that this is not all one house, but rather 3 separate suites, each suite with one bedroom.
The location is perfect if you are looking for a peaceful atmosphere. It's about a 15min drive out of Sa Pa town, and as long as you have transportation, it's absolutely perfect. We only wish we would have spent 1 month here. Thank you, Long & Giangg for everything 🙏❤️
It was a nice and peaceful stay.

Wundervolle Oase der Ruhe nahe Sapa!
Wir hatten einen absolut fantastischen Aufenthalt in dieser Unterkunft in Taphin! Die Lage, nur etwa 15 Minuten vom Zentrum Sapas entfernt, war perfekt für uns. Wir haben die herrliche Natur und die unglaubliche Ruhe in dieser Gegend sehr genossen – eine willkommene Abwechslung zum Trubel.
Das Haus selbst ist gemütlich und authentisch ländlich, genau das, was wir uns gewünscht hatten. Der Garten war ebenfalls wunderschön und trug zur entspannten Atmosphäre bei.
Besonders hervorheben möchten wir unseren Gastgeber. Er war unglaublich hilfsbereit, gab uns tolle Empfehlungen für Unternehmungen in der Umgebung und hat sich sofort um kleinere Anliegen gekümmert. Als besonderes Highlight hat er uns sogar zu einem köstlichen, lokalen Abendessen eingeladen – eine wirklich nette Geste, die unseren Aufenthalt noch unvergesslicher gemacht hat.
Wir haben uns rundum wohlgefühlt und können diese Unterkunft jedem wärmstens empfehlen.
Very peaceful place to stay!
Clean & comfortable room. Stunning views from our room. Staff was welcoming & helpful. Lots of food options for the breakfast buffet.
The place is nice we expected that there is a swimming pool and a room close to the overlooking train. But overall the place is nice.

The hotel is well located near Sapa Museum and Sapa Station within 10 min walk and there are lots of great restaurants to choose from. We were unlucky with cold, foggy weather and the hotel could have been warmer as doors and windows were left open and there was little heating but we realise it is winter time.

David was a great host! Responded very quickly, and was very accommodating to our needs/requests. Check-in instructions were super detailed and helpful.
The apartment was very clean and well stocked. We could not have asked for a better location. Overall a wonderful place; we would stay here again easily!
좋은 뷰가있는 숙소였습니다 직원분들이 친절합니다
The place is so nice just a walkinh distance to sapa train station going to fansipan. We upgraded our room to vip room and the view was so nice. We can see the train passing by.

I enjoyed my stay in Sa Pa! Thanks to all of the staff who helped me the entire stay. Always there to help and the location is near to Sun Plaza station! The place is very clean and everyone is friendly and nice. This place is highly recommended!

Sadly the typhoon had just happened so the swimming pool was out of action. This was one of the main reasons for booking. It would have been nice to have been informed so I could have made a decision of going or not. Breakfast was great on last day but poor on the others again because of typhoon and lack of guests. Everything seemed closed.
The views were magnificent and the location was perfect.
Room was beautifully appointed.
Tv was great for films. Especially Box 24 channel as they were in English.
Would I stay here again absolutely and hopefully next time I can enjoy the facilities fully.
Great place to stay with great views
Fantastic location with stunning views. Ha Huu Khoa, the manager was very accommodating. sort out our transfer to and from La Caio.  Clean room with decent breakfast.
great value, along the road to the place you can find a lot of motorbike rentals

I had a lovely visit and stayed  five nights.   I had one concern on the first day and they resolved the problem immediately. My room was absolutely lovely with an incredible porch and view of the valley. It was incredibly relaxing place to stay.  The bathroom and the room were perfectly clean.  The large deck is exactly as you see it and is splendid place to sit with coffee or a beer.  The location is within easy walking distance of anywhere you would want to go, including the lake and some of the nearby walks. I would happily stay here again.  Thank you so much for such a great visit.

Great location! We loved the view of the mountains and train. The staff was very attentive and allowed us to check in early for a small fee, which included delicious pho. Thanks again! We hope to be back.
시내 중심가에 있으며 좋은 전망을 자랑하고 있습니다. 바로 앞에 판시판 으로 가는 기차 레일이 있어서 좋은 사진을 찍을 수 있었습니다. 숙소는 조용하고 깨끗했으며 직원들 역시 친절해서 좋았습니다.
Very communicative & helpful!

The room is amazing with a breathtaking with the view of the mountain with the train that goes to Fansipan right in front of the window ❤️
David is an amazing host thank you so much for everything and I’ll see you soon again I promise ❤️
David was great at communication and the service was top tier, room is cozy and it has a nice sized tv great views of the train and great breakfast selection. Would stay here again.

I requested a room with the best view for my birthday solo trip to make it really special. I’m so grateful that I was given an amazing room where you can see the mountains and the Fansipan train right from the window. The room is huge, and the bathroom is clean with a working heater.
The hotel is also close to some great spots, and the views are breathtaking. This hotel has one of the best views of Sapa.
What I’m especially thankful for is when I lost my purse with my passport at Fansipan. I sought help from the General Manager, Mr. Ha Huu Khoa, who helped me find it. Thanks to him, I was able to retrieve my purse from customer service at SunPlaza.
Highly recommended!
loved my stay and will definitely come back had a great time in the area and the morning views was just amazing.
Accomodation and Service is very remarkable. We look forward to stay at JoVille Hotel once we return to Sa Pa.

Our stay at Joville Hotel exceeded all expectations! Located in a relatively new building, we were thrilled to find the best offer available. A huge shoutout to our fantastic host, Huu Khoa, who went above and beyond to fulfill our dream room request – a stunning view from the monorail railway. Tower B provided us with the most breathtaking scenery, making our stay truly dreamy.
Special thanks to the male receptionist who assisted us throughout our stay. Despite the language barrier, he made every effort to communicate effectively, ensuring we felt welcome and attended to.
While the room was a bit chilly and lacked a heater, the hot and cold shower more than made up for it. Overall, our experience at Joville Hotel was nothing short of magical. We cannot wait to return and highly recommend it to anyone visiting Sapa. Many thanks to the entire team for making our stay unforgettable!
Ruhige Ecke und eine wunderbare Aussicht . Die Leute waren sehr hilfsbereit und die Kumulation funktionierte gut .
Hưng và Linh là những chủ nhà tuyệt vời, họ giúp cho kì nghỉ của tôi tốt đẹp. Giao tiếp cực kì hữu ích. Tôi chắc chắn sẽ trở lại đây. Cảm ơn bạn

Hungs place was absolutely gorgeous. We felt very welcomed by the family and even had dinner with them. not only was the place super cozy and had an amazing view, but it also was a nice cultural exchange. Hung is one of the most friendly hosts i’ve had the pleasure of meeting with so far!

This is a true Vietnamese family home stay. Hung his wife & amazing 2 young boys ( great interpreters) were the best host. The breakfast that are included were different every day & tasty. We stayed with them for dinner 1 night for a feast of Vietnamese culinary delight, from the fresh fish to the homemade spring rolls to the amazing vegetables, for 3 big lads from Canadian we were stuffed. And copious amounts of Hung’s homemade Plum wine. They drove us into town when we wanted but we enjoyed the magnificent beauty of being 5000 ft up on the side of the mountain over looking the valley below and staying around his home. Great coffee and views just up the road but the coffee at home was excellent. Recommend this 100% on your list, very rustic & a bit to get to but this family makes it worth the trip.
The house is not too far from town and the view to the valley is amazing. The owner is an architect and he build his house from wood with unique design.

The house was at a very beautiful location and the view at night was breathtaking and awesome. The location made the stay even more memorable and joyful. Would highly recommend to stay with this host.
The most beautiful house on the hill we could have imagined.  The family was so lovely.  Can’t wait to go back.

This house is ideal if you want to experience the real life of Vietnamese people. We had an amazing stay. House is handbuilt with many quirky features. The views were amazing and Hung, Linh and family are wonderful hosts. Perfect spot to switch off, enjoy the local culture and beautiful food made by Linh. It is rustic, peaceful and one of pufavourite stays ever. Hung is very helpful with transport in and out of Sapa which is only 5kms away
Higkly recommended 😊😊😊😊😊😊
Very nice…

Amazing hospitality. Very patient if you don’t know Vietnamese. I hurt my leg on a motorbike and they gave me a local topical remedy and treated me like family.
