Extreme comfort when we needed it most! Location is perfect for incredible views. They are very helpful with transportation. The food is some of best we have ever had in Vietnam! We will be back.

Really cool and unique place! A nice blend of traditional Vietnamese house western style on the 2nd floor. I don't think the pictures do it the justice it should. But the space you have is cool, there's a living room with fireplace, bathroom area, and 3 separate rooms - 1 an attic like room. The location isn't the best, but that's clear from the airbnb profile. It's a great space if you want to get away with friends and have a cosy place to stay.
경치좋은 산장에서 친절한 주인부부의 도움으로 편안히 쉬다 왔습니다. 모닝커피, 녹차에 식사까지 챙겨주시고 함께 식사할 때는 직접 만든 자두주, 레몬청등도 아낌없이 주셔서 너무 감사했습니다. 샤워가 조금 불편하고 실내에 벌레가 많아 여자분이나 애들은 불편할 수 있습니다.

I had a wonderful stay at Sapa Fansipan View Hotel! The location is perfect, with stunning views of the mountains and easy access to the town center. The staff were incredibly friendly and helpful throughout my visit. The room was clean, cozy, and comfortable—just what I needed after a day of exploring. Highly recommend for anyone visiting Sapa!

Perfect location and amazing pool! Just a 4-minute walk to Moana Sapa and 11 minutes to Sun World Plaza (a bit of an uphill walk, but doable!). Tucked away enough to be peaceful at night, but still close to the town center. The pool was absolutely stunning…highlight of our stay! Daily housekeeping was a nice touch, and the room was clean, cozy, and comfortable. The staff were super friendly and helpful. We honestly couldn’t have asked for a better place to stay in Sapa!

Highly recommend staying here while you’re in Sa Pa. Just a 2 min walk from SaPa Moana, lots of great food just down the hill, the scenery is beautiful, the staff are incredibly friendly and helpful, our host was great as well, responsiveness was quick the recommendations, accommodations and support was above and beyond, especially with the HBD surprise for my GF they even made a cake along with the swan and roses in blown away!

Perfekter Ort für einen Aufenthalt in Sapa. Die Unterkunft war bisher die beste die wir in Vietnam besucht haben. Alles war sauber, keine Tiere, warmes Wasser sodass man tatsächlich die Badewanne nutzen konnte, schöner Pool, tolles Frühstück, Netflix Möglichkeit für schlechtes Wetter, super Service und die Lage war auch gut.  Sehr gutes Preis-Leistungsverhältnis!

We had a nice stay! There was free breakfast with a lot to offer, a restaurant which was a bit expensive, a nice warm outside pool and super friendly cast. But it could be cleaned a bit better. Everything else was super nice!

Lovely place to stay, host & staff  were very helpful & friendly. Views  from our balcony & the pool were amazing.  Our room was beautiful decorated & very comfortable with an extra large bed. Probably the best we've stayed in in Vietnam.
Le personnel de l'hôtel ont été extrêmement serviable et d'une gentillesse incroyable. La piscine sur le toit sublime. La nourriture du resto très bonne. Le lit confortable.

This place is beautiful! It is accessible and the car walks straight up to the gate so you don’t have to haul your luggage which can be an issue in Sa Pa hotels as there are narrow alleys. It’s a short walk from Moana Sapa and is very near to the main city centre too. Going uphill you can take grab but coming back one can easily walk back to the hotel.
The hotel staff are very friendly and cooperative. They even helped us with our bus bookings to and from Sa Pa.
THE POOL IS STUNNING! It’s the best one of all the places we stayed in Vietnam. The room was clean, spacious and they’d clean up every day with fresh bathrobes and towels for you. Given the price it’s a steal. Cannot recommend it enough.

Incroyable séjour à SAPA !
Hôtes très réactifs pour toutes nos demandes… Transports vers d’autres villes.. tickets pour les activités.. service de laverie…
Tout était vraiment parfait.
Merci pour ce beau séjour ! 🫶🏼

장점
직원들이 매우 친절하며 침구가 깨끗하고 편하다 조식이 포함 되어있다
단점
욕조에 물이 잘 빠지지 않음
번화가로 가기엔 도보 이동 시 시간이 걸림

Das Hotel ist sehr nett. Die Lage ist ruhig und man hat einen schönen Ausblick auf den Fansipan. Leider gibt es auf dem Balkon keine Stühle um es länger zu genießen.
Das Zimmer ist gross und bis auf ein paar kleine Mängel ( Gardine leicht schimmelig) sehr schön. Wir hatten Zimmer 508 und würden es jedem weiterempfehlen. Es ist sehr leise. Das Frühstück gibt es in Bufettform. Capuccino kann man extra bestellen, sowie Eier in verschiedenen Arten. Der Pool war warm, was es sehr angenehm machte, abends nochmal schwimmend den Ausblick zu genießen.
The hotel is very quiet with beautiful scenery. The room is new and clean. The host was very helpful to us.
Thuy trang ! Fue muy amable me ayudó en todo momento , consiguió tickets y bus para mi regreso !! Sin duda es un anfitrión muy recomendable y la habitación limpia y acogedora , cerca de todo !!

We stayed at their place on our 2nd day in sapa, i regret not booking the place our whole stay, The place was very convenient, it's near sunplaza, moana & a little near in alpine coaster.
The customer service was impeccable, I would like to commend all the front desk staff, they were very accomodating and helpful.
I made a mistake of writing the address of the hotel for the Sleeper bus pick up to sapa, I contacted them and they assisted us even after we checked out. They even offered to contact the bus company if we wanted to have our pick up address changed while we wait on the lobby. such good customer service. Thank you so much! We'll definitely reccomend!
فندق جميل ونظيف وموقعه ممتاز قريب من الخدمات وبعيد عن الازعاج يستاهل القيمه مقابل الخدمه والنظافه

A Hidden Gem in Sapa!
Staying at Fan SiPan View Hotel was one of the highlights of our trip to Vietnam. From the moment we arrived, the staff made us feel incredibly welcome. They were warm, helpful, and always ready to assist with a smile. The views from the hotel are absolutely breathtaking — waking up to the misty mountains something I’ll never forget.
The room was clean, cozy, and well-equipped with everything I needed. The bed was comfortable, and I appreciated the attention to detail in the decor. It really gave a local, authentic vibe. Breakfast each morning was fresh and delicious, with both Vietnamese and Western options.
The location is perfect — just a short walk from Sapa town, but peaceful enough to feel like an escape.
I highly recommend Fan SiPan View Hotel to anyone visiting Sapa.
lovely room, would happily go back and stay there in future, incredible view from the room.
Nice stay host is responsible enjoy warm water on pool get complementary breakfast about this all room is A1 with amenities.over all great in sapa
We really enjoyed our stay at this hotel. It was very clean and comfortable, and the service was great. The location was also convenient, being only 2km from Sa Pa town.
Great place to stay, responsive and friendly host

Beautiful spot in a beautiful location, short walk into town centre, but also very easy to hire scooter at front desk if walking isn’t your thing, very lovely helpful staff, also very accommodating and we were able to use the facilities until our late night bus ride, would definitely recommend
Tolle Unterkunft, super Aussicht! Jederzeit wieder :)
كان نضيف ومرتب سعدت جدا بوجودي  هنا
Had to stay here for a second time, really ideal place :)

This hotel might be the best value for money I’ve ever experienced!
Amazing view on a clear day.
People are complaining about walking up some stairs in other reviews. As long as you’re healthy it’s not an issue. It’s Sa Pa - it’s all hills and mountains. Also the breakfast is a varied selection, with lots to enjoy.
Wonderful place, will return.
Một kì nghỉ quá tuyệt vời, chủ nhà và nhân viên của anh ấy đã chào đón tôi với tất cả sự nhiệt thành!!!!
Dù chỉ ở 1 thời gian ngắn nhưng mà trải nghiệm đáng nhớ. Chủ nhà thân thiện, nhiệt tình, dịch vụ tốt, nơi ở tiện nghi, sẽ quay lại

Nous avons passé un très bon séjour au Sapa village Hôtel. Les chambres son équipées d'une grande terrasse partagée par les 4 chambres du même étage. Le petit déjeuner compris est un buffet à volonté, vous pourrez y retrouver tout ce dont vous auriez envie pour le petit déjeuner. Le seul bémol que nous pourrions soulever et la fermeté du matelas qui peut certainement déranger certaines personnes. Au début nous avons été surpris par la fermeté du matelas mais finalement nous avons très bien dormi. Je vous recommande vivement de venir y séjourner puisque le rapport qualité prix est excellent !
In the process of checking in, one of our passport got folded, the host communicated immediately and asks to apologize. All in all a 10/10

Initially we weren't informed that all guests are required to show their passport to check in, which we had to spend sometime finding a copy which delayed the check in. Then the warm water was not enough to shower and was easily used up by 2 people even though the room was meant for 4 people. When that happened, the 3rd person waited for the supposed 15minutes for the water to heat up, but then the warm water only lasted 3minutes, and the rest had to shower in ice cold water, which was a huge deal breaker for us. When we informed the receptionist multiple times no proper action was taken other than telling us to wait 15 minutes between each shower even though the heater did not work the whole of the second day. One of the level 2 rooms that we had, there was brown toilet water dripping and there was a bad smell. Despite complaints issue was not fixed and we couldn't use the toilet at all. But the location is convenient and easy to get around and breakfast buffet is good.
Everything was as listed. It's maximum 10 minutes from the center of the city, which is great, because it can get very loud and bright.

This place in Sapa is the best hotel in town! The room is so clean and pretty. Also have a nice view of city from the balcony. They clean the room everyday, change towels and give bottled water everyday. Free breakfast buffet is so delicious. You can also order delicious food from their menu and they can also deliver it to your room. The hotel staff is so helpful and im very thankful to them, they help us to bring our luggage in our room and also help us to bring down when we check out. I want to give tip to the guy who helps us to carry our luggage to our room but unfortunately upon check out we did not see him, different guy help us when we check out and he is also kind! Thank you so much. Host is also responsive and helpful to our inquiries and favors. Very recommended.
very responsive, the people working there are very helpful, breakfast buffet are good. We enjoy the place so quite and you can see the city view and lake.

A nice place to stay quite and pretty view of the mountains They offer free breakfast which is not bad. Will
Definitely recommend to my friends.

The place was awesome and the view was beautiful from our room.
The host helped us a lot with the bookings and food related options.

Es war ein sehr angenehmer Aufenthalt im Sapa Village Hotel. Dong konnte uns bei Fragen immer weiter helfen und man konnte auch den Bus für die Weiterfahrt und Ausflüge im Hotel buchen. Sehr ruhig gelegen. Etwas Abseits des großen Trubels in Sapa und dennoch ist alles gut zu erreichen. Frühstücksbuffet war umfangreich. Eierspeisen wurden frisch zubereitet. Wir würden jederzeit wieder kommen.
It's beyond our expectation! Great place to stay in Sapa :)
Staff are friendly. Nice location
Beautiful surroundings and mountains view from the room is feast for the eyes.
Great place, but ensure you book a room above the restaurant not in front.
Great location! The view was amazing and breakfast buffet was really good as well
숙소는 깨끗하고 호스트는 매우친절했다
ممتاز جدا
Great service and a good view
Assez petit pour 3 personne
Great place, great location!
有雜物，其餘皆不錯
Très belle endroit et très calme pour les gens qui veulent se reposer

The cabin is exactly how it was described in the listing. If you want a nature-y vibe that is still near in the city center, this is the cabin for you. Though, it will be sort of tiring to reach the cabin bcos of the stairs but you know its gonna be worth it. They are also responsive with our concerns, which I really appreciate.

We had a lovely time in Jungle homestay.
The host was so friendly and helpful with local tours and trekking. Had dinner there and it was one of the most delicious meal we had in Sapa. It was a very peaceful stay. We did have a bit of trouble with Wifi as it dropped in and out of use. Other than that I recommend this place!

We loved our time in this property! It is hidden away from the city so is super quiet, but you can walk into town in 10 mins. The room was stunning and exactly like the image. Staff were amazing, booking us a bus to our next destination and providing breakfast as well as dinner for us after a long day of hiking. Highly recommend!

We stayed here for 3days and all the staffs are very friendly and kind….having breakfast(egg fried rice) in early morning is the best part for me…i can feel the nature even while i’m staying in the room….if i go to Sapa again…i will definitely stay there again…😇😇😇

I wish I could give more than 5 stars for our Jungle stay! Thien and her team were so friendly and helpful, breakfast each morning was delicious and the perfect start to the day.
The rooms were cute, rustic and very cosy and the view amazing from the balcony!
Everything is in walking distance, great restaurants, markets, shopping.
Mango the cat is the cutest 🥰
There is a little walk uphill if able to get to the accommodation or the back way is easy if walking is not an option.
We will definitely be back to visit Sapa, such a beautiful place ❤️
Thank you Thien for welcoming us so warmly
Really lovely stay in Sapa, just up the hill away from the main town but still in walking distance. Lovely room and very clean, great for the price. The breakfast was lovely too!

We really enjoyed our stay! So close to town, but in a quiet, beautiful location with amazing views. Dien who ran the place was very helpful and kind. She helped us book tours and provided us with local information. The food was delicious, and the little cabins were clean and comfortable.
Highly recommended.

Das Bungalow war sehr schön. Wir waren zu viert und haben es uns den Bildern nach grösser vorgestellt. Als Frühstück gab es nur fried rice oder Toast zum Sandwich machen und Getränke mussten bezahlt werden.

This homestay is amazing. The staff was very friendly and the food they cooked was delicious. They are ready to give tips and help anytime. The place is situated far from noise and all we could hear was the nature (which is exactly what we came for to Sapa from the city noise of Hanoi). The description mentions self-checkin which was not exactly the case. We needed a staff member to open the cabin for us, which was quite unfortunate because we booked the place for an extra night so that we can checkin extra early (around 5 am), however the staff was very friendly and kindly helped us with the checkin after our arrival (even in heavy rain at night). This was easily the most peaceful stay we had in Vietnam and would come again anytime.

A stunning oasis away from the hustle
and bustle of Sapa central but still within walking distance of everything!! The bungalows were clean and comfortable. Staff were very attentive and assisted us to arrange transport and attractions. They also prepared us a delicious meal after a long day of hiking which was super convenient. Would recommend to anyone travelling to Sapa! (note: as the property is on a hill there are lots of steps so may to be accessible to all)

definitely my favourite homestay in Sapa!! am so lucky to book this place! beautiful house near the nature, super helpful and nice hosts, they even help us buy a birthday cake to celebrate our friend's birthday, and also brought my torn jacket to a tailor to repair it. they also helped us book our tickets to Fansipan and call taxis for us! really pleased with the stay, would definitely be back again! not to mention the super cute cat and dog they have here... what a 10/10 experience, really recommend!

Ich hatte eine großartige Zeit in dieser Unterkunft! Alles war makellos sauber, und die Atmosphäre war sehr einladend. Besonders hervorzuheben ist das super freundliche und hilfsbereite Team – sie haben den Aufenthalt noch angenehmer gemacht. Die Unterkunft hat meine Erwartungen absolut erfüllt, und ich würde jederzeit wiederkommen. Vielen Dank für die tolle Erfahrung!

큰 길가에서 숙소로 올라갈 때 길을 헷갈릴 가능성이 있습니다. 사파 정글 팻말이 있는 골목으로 들어가세요
호스트는 매우 친절했고 좋았습니다
방도 청결했고 자연 친화적인 숙소에 감탄했습니다
조식도 맛있습니다

We loved staying here so much the host was so nice! Having all the animals around made the home stay feel like home.
Thank you so much for having us and would 100% stay again ❤️🐶🐱

The place was amazing, very close to the city center, just make sure your car drops you off at the entrance without the stairs if you have a lot of luggage like my family.
The room was amazing, there is coffee shop with an amazing view, breakfast was included without the coffee though. There are very very cute and friendly dogs at the property which is an added bonus. Tracy was super helpful with all our requests and Will definitely recommended this place to anyone who wants to visit SaPa

Lovely and cozy place nestled in Sapa Town. Convenient 10min walk from Sapa Town central. Cute puppies. Jungle was quick to reply and easy to communicate with. Helped us to arrange village trek and also fansipan hike. Overall very nice place to stay at while at Sapa, recommend to other visitors. Thank you for the enjoyable stay.

Beautiful environment surrounded by trees with a view looking out towards the town area. Feels homely and Jungles’s team were very polite and responsive especially when it came to guiding us to their homestay. Breakfast was also provided every morning!
Room was cozy with high ceilings. Tall windows everywhere allowing for sunlight and ventilation. Easy access to our bikes as we were allowed to park our motorcycles right outside the room by the walkway. Room was very airy so a fan was barely needed let alone an ac.
Area is not sheltered so an umbrella is required whenever it rains. Place is pitch black at night with only the main light source from the town below. It’s in the forests so expect insects to occasionally turn up by your door. There is no TV and fridge.
Overall it was a pleasant experience. Only thing I didn’t expect was the lack of fridge but I did not mind the rest. I’d definitely book this place again if I’m back in Sappa!

C'est une perle rare !  L'accueil fut extraordinaire,  chaleureux et on s'est senti comme à la maison.  Les repas étaient copieux et savoureux.  J'ai tout de suite été bien parmi l'équipe de Jungle.  C'est mon coup de coeur du Vietnam.   Je recommande cet endroit.

Beautiful place at Jungle Stay! Really a must try experience in Sapa! Waking up to a wooden hut with beautiful views + cooling weather was really memorable. The place was really clean, comfortable with fans despite being so close to nature. It exceeded my expectations! The best part was the communication! Host gave clear instructions on how to find the place and was super helpful! They allowed us to place our luggage at reception after check in and even offered the common bathroom to shower before we catch our sleeper bus at 11pm. Really love the place and excellent service! This is the best Airbnb experience I had so far!! 11/10 would recommend everyone to give Jungle Stay a try!! Just take note that to get to this place, you have to climb a flight of stairs and steep slopes for about 5 mins! Good workout carrying luggage up and down during checking in and out! 😊

KC, Quang & Giang were very helpful & responsive. They made sure that everyone at the Airbnb felt comfortable & right at home. We loved the greenery around, breakfast and the pets at Jungle homestay. Very loving & friends pets, made out stay even better ❤️ Would love to visit again and stay here. We would highly recommend this place if you are in Sapa

If you are visiting Sapa, you should absolutely stay here. The cabins are located in the most beautiful location, away from the hustle and bustle of the town but only a 10 minute walk away. Jungle has a separate balcony where you can enjoy drinks in the sun and another terrace area for breakfast and dinner if you choose to eat there. The cabin was cosy and clean and the beds (and bed linen) were amazing. A special thanks to our host KC who gave us such a warm welcome and made our stay memorable, we enjoyed our chats with him and nothing was too much trouble! We'd love to return one day.
Enjoyed the stay and great hospitality. Found staff to be especially helpful and accommodating.
Tian was a superhost, beautiful place and lovely people. All in all a wonderful experience.
very very very helpful. we arrived on night bus at 5am and they were responsive, came and welcomed us. very friendly, lovely pets, 10/10 would reccomend.
chỗ ở rất đẹp, view toàn cảnh và có thể thấy đỉnh fansipan, gần làng Cat Cat. Nhìn chung rất tốt

Quang's place had some of the best views in Vietnam overlooking Mt Fansipan Vietnam's highest peak, the cottage was super cute and was very sufficient for my short stay in Sapa! would highly recommend 😊👌

Un très bon séjour dans ce chalet avec une vue magnifique ! Malgré la pluie, nous avons pu profiter un peu de sapa.
Les services proposés sont vraiment top (location de scooter, recommandations,etc.)
L’hôte est vraiment arrangeant !
Attention en période de pluie l’accès au logement n’est pas facile, ça glisse beaucoup.
Merci encore pour ce super séjour !

The fees were breathtaking worth the money alone, the cabin itself was a bit old but very clean and didn’t get many bugs at all considering you’re in the mountains!
Would recommend the stay to anyone visiting Sapa

Die Unterkunft an sich war wie beschrieben. Allerdings ist der Duschkopf regelmäßig abgefallen und die Dusche im allgemeinen nicht perfekt. Außerdem muss man mit Insekten im Zimmer rechnen, da es keine Netze an den Fenstern gibt und die Holzdielen Ritzen haben durch welche man direkt nach unten blicken kann. Insgesamt hatten wir trotzdem eine schöne Zeit. Allerdings ist der Anstieg zur Hütte eher für körperlich fitte Menschen zu empfehlen.

It was a great experience from the moment we arrived. The beautiful views and the friendly hosts made a wonderful time. The room was clean and very nice to stay at. It’s very close to Cat Cat village so that’s a plus and the center is a quick moto ride oh and if you like animals they have a friendly little puppy that is so nice. They have little shop at the bottom where you can get drinks and a few snacks I think and they also rent the traditional dress of the people there if you’re interested. I highly recommend this place because you won’t be disappointed

We had a great time at Xavia Sapa. The scenery around the bungalow is breathtaking and the bungalow itself was good. There is a hiking trail that starts right at the door.
The place is 5 minutes away with a taxi from the city center and it’s pretty quiet at night. I recommend this place for people who want to enjoy beautiful nature and still have the chance to visit Sapa and see the city without having to live in crowded areas.

Het uitzicht was prachtig. Je moet wel een gladde hoge trap op met al je spullen dus hou hier rekening mee. Host was goed bereikbaar en locatie was net uit het centrum. Je hele huisje kraakt en gaat heen en weer met wind dus als je hier niet tegen kunt zou ik niet gaan. Verder vond ik het een fijn verblijf.

Nous avons été surpris par cette superbe cabane à la vue imprenable ! L’hôte est très joignable et bienveillant ce qui est rassurant.
Situé entre cat cat et sapa (15min à pied en pente) nous avons aimé être un peu en dehors de l’agitation et plus proche des trail.
Il faut s’attendre à un peu de bruit le matin et en journée mais rien de vraiment dérangeant.
Le chauffage fonctionnait très bien.
Great stay, gorgeous views! Photos don’t do it justice! Steps up to cabin are worth the views and very manageable with bags.
The view is excellent. Loved the scenery both day and night. Furnitures and fittings could be renewed in the future.
Absolutely beautiful view. Very quaint house. Host communicates well. Can be hard to get Grab/Taxi into town
Looks like in the photo. Recommend if u want to escape from the city vibe. And love 360 view.

the Location was beautiful and the room was Clean and really nice. it Had gorgeus Views of Cat Cat Village and the Valley near Sapa.
the Check in was fast and Not complicated. would recommend.
the only small grype i Had was the bathtub was leaking a bit so the bath was empty after a while. other than that it was a 10/10 experience
If there was any option for a minus rating I would give the host they stay n the staff

In der Unterkunft hast du den besten Blick aufs Tal.
Die Kommunikation mit Quang war sehr gut.
Gerne wieder!
Cute place with amazing view. 20min walk from Sapa Center. The mattress is a bit hard but besides that everything was great.
The surroundings are beautiful, a very comfortable and secluded spot that’s also in reach of everything you might need for your visit to Sa Pa. We had a lovely stay.

Leider war es sehr kalt und wir konnten mit der Klimaanlage nicht heizen. Es gab zwar einen kleinen Wasserkocher aber keine Tassen.
Leider von morgens bis Abends Verkehrslärm, starkes Hupen - Mopeds, Busse & Autos.
Ca. 30 min steiler Anstieg auf einer stark befahrenen Straße ins Zentrum.
Im Sommer sicherlich eine nette Unterkunft, hat aber eher was von Camping

We loved our stay in the beautiful mountain-side hut. The place was clean and comfortable, and the view was so pretty (even when the weather changed). There are a few stairs to climb but we loved the extra walk honestly.

Wonderful stay with my girlfriend after 4 day ha Giang loop tour and a long late night bus ride. It was a comfy mountain retreat with pretty views and clean environment. The shower did have some issues with it falling off of the wall but a little tape fixed it. Location felt secluded and it was easy enough to get into town even during road closures from prior landslides. Thanks Quang I hope you fix the shower it did attack me when detaching from the wall

Eine absolut tolle Unterkunft!
Mega Aussicht!
Super nah zu Cat Cat village als auch zu Sa Pa Stadtmitte.
Für uns die perfekte Lage.
Zimmer waren sauber und die Hütte hat ihren Charm.
Der Gastgeber war super freundlich und hat auch unser Gepäck beim Check in als auch beim Check out hoch- und runtergetragen.
Ganz klare Empfehlung!

The property was great! The pictures don’t do justice to the place. It’s a cute private cottage with warm wooden interiors.
What brilliant views!!
Only setback was that it was a little away(about 1.5kms) from the center but if you’re planning to rent a scooter it wouldn’t be a problem at all. You can walk to the center too but it’s a steep walk. Walking at night might not be a great idea since the road is not lit.
The staff was very sweet and helpful, especially Linhi.
Over all it was a wonderful experience

Great place with an amazing view! Quang was a very responsive host and will answer all your questions! Only nitpick downside is that it is quite a walk from the city centre and has quite a lot of stairs. But overall still a great stay to get away from the city noise!

mọi thứ đều tuyệt vời, từ nhà hàng, dịch vụ, phòng và cảnh. Tiện ích đều đầy đủ, đồ ăn ngon, nhân viên phục vụ tốt
1 điểm trừ là xe điện chỉ có 7-22h nên đôi khi bất tiện

We stayed at Phansi and it was amazing! The view of the rice fields and mountains is absolutely stunning — especially at sunrise and sunset. The whole place has a calm, cozy atmosphere, perfect for relaxing in nature. The host is super friendly, caring, and always ready to help with anything you need. One of the most peaceful and memorable stays we’ve had. Highly recommend!

Amazing place to spend time, staff is very polite and sweet. Services are top notch, rooms are clean and very hygienic. Food quality and quantity is top notch. Everything about the stay was perfect, from the host to the staff to the room to the services and amenities. Definitely a must place to stay when in sapa.
Only regret is that we were here for just 1 night 🙃🙌🏻♥️

Honestly, the best amazing place to stay! I will always recommend this place to everyone visiting Vietnam. We couldn’t stop looking at the views - picturesque! We arrived at 7am after a sleeper bus from Hanoi and they were able to give us a check in straight away for a small fee which was very much appreciated! Thank you so much to everyone who made our trip special. P.s have the pancakes for breakfast!

I can’t find words to express the amount of joy I had in this place starting from  the stuff they are so kind helpful the place and the view is outstanding highly recommended the best place to stay in sapa

This place looks just like the pictures. The views and property are gorgeous! If you wondering why it’s called Glamping, there were some bugs that could get into the room, but other than that it’s more of a luxury hotel!
Amazing accomodation, the view and facilities were brilliant. The staff were very welcoming and joyful. Would highly recommend staying here, I don’t think you’d be able to find a better view.

We had a pleasant stay at phansi - the location was beautiful and the place was very peaceful- breakfast also included! Only thing I would like to add is the attentiveness of the staff could be better when customers are at the check in or reception.
Secondly, worth noting that it takes 5-7 mins with the buggy to get inside the accomodation- they are fairly responsive but it does add to the time. The location is right next to Moana (walkable!) but for anything else, you will need a taxi as it’s uphill and not an easy walk!
We had such an amazing stay, the place was absolutely stunning and all accommodations were perfect! Everyone was so welcoming and friendly! Would definitely reccomend to anyone visiting Sa Pa!

This glamping experience is a great way to spend some quiet time in Sapa! Hosts are super responsive and happy to help with luggage and drop offs/ pick ups on the main road due to the location being a little out of the way for taxis. The only drawbacks were a plumbing issue that required me to move tents, and poor wifi at the second tent location. However, still a 5/5 rating for location, views, and easy communication with hosts!
Great place to stay at! The view from the lodge is unique and spectacular. The team serving us were attentive and took care of us well too. I highly recommend this for your stay at Sapa!

Staying at Phansi was really awesome. The views were spectacular. The service was premium. Huong and the rest of the staff were very nice. The restaurant and bar being at the same place was really convenient. Breakfast was lovely. They provided bike rentals at the venue for the price you get outside and the bikes were in much better condition and we did not need to walk far or look around for one.
We got there when it was full moon and everything was gorgeous. at night you get to see the city from a far which looks like a really nice steampunk city.
We really enjoyed our stay. The views, staff, service. Was definitely worth it.

We stayed at this place for 3 nights and we would come back everytime. The view from the balcony ist amazing and breathtaking. The view is even better as on the pictures. The stuff members are super friendly and helpfull. Not all of them speak englisch but it was never a problem because they help you or reach out to someone else. You can also eat at the Restaurant there and it was delicious. They have a shuttle service and they can drive you up and down because the road to the Phansi is not made for cars. The service was for free and available kind of all the time. Thanks again for this beautiful experiance.

The place was absolutely great
But unfortunately the path to Phansi was not that smooth for those with child and baby
The buggy service was quite slow especially when night time
Otherwise the staff was absolutely polite and helpful

I recently stayed at an underrated spot in Sapa, Vietnam, and it truly felt like home. This place gives you the sensation of being on top of the mountain, surrounded by fog and tranquility. Everything about it is simply perfect. The food is delicious, and you definitely shouldn’t miss their egg coffee—it’s a must-try! The rooms are spotless, and the location, a bit away from the hustle and bustle, serves a purpose. If you’re looking for a peaceful escape amidst the mountains, this is the ideal place to unwind.

we had a great time at Huong's. The staff is very reactive, friendly and welcoming. the view from the deck is amazing and well worth the trip. we also enjoyed the tasty breakfast. we would recommend this location to anyone visiting Sa Pa

Beautiful place to stay and so relaxing! The location is great if you want a more peaceful stay in Sapa but still want to access the town. The cabins were beautiful and the views were amazing, the food was also great!
i think the stay was really amazing! just that the weather didn’t allow us to see the clouds sadly. the bbq was sooooo good too! remember to get the bbq set when you’re there

I love staying here. Mr Home and his staff are very nice, helpful and friendly.
Staying here also means you support young locals who are working tiredlessly in this glamping.
Highly recommended!!

The view from the accommodation was absolutely breathtaking! From the moment we arrived, we were warmly welcomed. They provided great recommendations for things to do in the area and even arranged motorcycles for us to use for the day.
A true highlight was the outstanding breakfast – not only was it delicious, but the view from both the breakfast area and our room was simply spectacular.
We felt completely at home and would definitely come back!

Our cabin at Phansi was a dream! Stunning 360 views, friendly & helpful staff, peaceful location, and all services available to us. This place was exactly what we wanted for a tranquil, romantic getaway. Definite recommend :)
Lovely place, slightly out of town but they provide buggy services. The Cafe was super nice to just spend the day at
Lovely stay in Phansi. The view was absolutely stunning, and the service was impeccable. Great responsiveness from our host!

Het was een erg fijn verblijf bij Phansi, de kamer had erg mooi uitzicht en het personeel was super vriendelijk en behulpzaam!
Het enige nadeel was voor ons dat het bed erg hard was, waardoor we wat minder lekker sliepen.

We loved our stay here. The views are absolutely incredible and the little e-buggy ride down really adds to the secluded feel. The restaurant area is lovely and all the staff are super friendly. We particularly want to thank Susan who was always really kind and helpful to us! Would 100% recommend.

The place is Beautiful! The view is unbeatable, I’ve had the best time chilling and enjoying.
Wish they were a little more flexible with the check in if the room is ready early.
But still would 100% recommend this place. Beautiful view and the most cozy cabin/ dome, and they’ve got great restaurant, lovely staffs and good all round services.

Das beste Hotel in Sapa. Super liebes Personal und die Lage und Aussicht sind einmalig. Ich würde jederzeit wieder hier her kommen!!! Als wir nach einem
Spray gegen Moskitos gefragt haben ist die Mitarbeiterin sogar in schnell in die Stadt gefahren und hat eins gekauft. Diese Unterkunft ist mehr als empfehlenswert und das BBQ der Hammer. Vielen Dank für Alles!!! ♥️♥️♥️

My boyfriend and I got to stay here during our trip to Sapa and this place is literally unreal. The views itself made it 100000% worth it. The staff is also so accommodating and kind and the food was so delicious. In order to get to the property, you have to take a buggy which we did not mind at all, and they were super efficient in terms of dropping and picking us up from the drop off location. If you are ever in Sapa and want a peaceful and picturesque room, I highly highly recommend!

I am absolutely mesmerised by this place. I have never seen a sunset like that in my life, if you haven't been to Sa Pa you should definitely come. Apart from the cosy, clean glamping with everything you need, I would like to mention the terrace overlooking the mountains and rice fields and the very friendly staff. I will definitely be back.

Our glamping stay in Sapa was truly unforgettable. The tent was cozy, well-equipped, and offered breathtaking views of the mountains and rice terraces. The hosts were incredibly kind and attentive, making us feel right at home and helping with everything. This is the perfect blend of comfort and nature — highly recommended for anyone looking to experience Sapa in a unique and peaceful way!

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at this place! Place was clean with an amazing view.
Host was very friendly, making our stay very enjoyable.
Only downside was the inconvenient location, as it is a steep walk to and from the airbnb. They did offer free shuttle service up to main road whenever u call/inform them~

Massive thank you to Huong for letting us stay at her gorgeous place at Phansi! We made the right decision booking this place at Sapa! It was my favourite accomodation that I booked throughout Vietnam. The place was overlooking the rice fields, exactly what the photos showed and I felt really comfortable during our stay, staff was so friendly and we had a great time with all of them! Huong was easy to communicate with and helped us throughout! I definitely will be back here again!
완벽한 경관에 너무 친절한 직원 분들, 심지어 조식도 너무 맛있습니다! 사파 타운까지 나가는 게 좀 힘들긴 하지만 너무 추천합니다!

Wir fühlten uns vollkommen wohl in der Unterkunft. Leider erwischten wir bei Ankunft einen kalten und sehr wolkigen Tag, wurden dann aber zum Glück am zweiten Tag mit Sonne und einer umwerfenden Aussicht belohnt!
Ein großes Dankeschön auch an alle Mitarbeitenden, die äußerst freundlich und allzeit hilfsbereit waren.
Klare Empfehlung (& unbedingt den Salt Coffee probieren ;-))

Die Unterkunft ist außerhalb von der Stadt, es wird aber super Service geboten. Man wird abgeholt und jeder Zeit zur Hauptstraße gebracht. Der Gastgeber ist sehr zuvorkommend und hilft mit Organisationen von Ausflügen.
Die Unterkunft ist sehr sauber.
Das Essen ist auch sehr lecker.
Die Aussicht ist sensationell!
Eine definitive Empfehlung von uns.
The views were amazing, the restaurant at the accommodation was amazing, the host and staff were so accommodating and friendly. We couldn’t ask for a better stay in sa pa!

Instructions on where we will be picked up was given proactively. Akong was extremely friendly, same with Kit. It was easy to ask them to fetch or bring us to the main road using the buggy. The room was very cute and clean. The view when the fog cleared was stunning. Their shower heater is strong and hot enough. Same with their room heater. It was comfy even if it was really cold outside.
Loved it. It’s beautiful and peaceful. I’d definitely visit again. Host was friendly and great. Restaurant could have more vegetarian options.  Rest was amazing! 😻
Lovely place with beautiful scenery and responsive & helpful host and staff! Had an enjoyable time staying here :-)

Die Lage und der Ausblick des Resorts sind unschlagbar! Wir wurden sehr freundlich empfangen und durften (ohne Zuzahlung!) früher einchecken. Mitarbeitende des Resorts haben uns mit einem Elektroauto von der Straße zum Hotel gebracht und umgekehrt, da das Resort etwas abgelegen von der Straße lag.
Die Zimmer waren toll gelegen, man muss sich allerdings auf den Besuch von Insekten (Mücken, Ameisen) einstellen. Das ist bei der Lage des Resorts nicht zu vermeiden, aber der Ausblick über die Reisterrassen ist es definitiv wert!
Beste airbnb ooit! Het uitzicht was waanzinnig, de cabin was heel schoon en is alles wat je nodig hebt. De foto’s doen de rest van het ‘park’ geen recht toe, het was echt prachtig. Dikke aanrader!

Meget smukt og fint sted væk fra det larmende Sa Pa by. Bliver hentet i en lille buggy og kørt ned ad bjerget til de små søde huse. Dejligt personale. Meget hjælpsomme. Smuk udsigt, som vi desværre kun fik et lille blik af, da det var meget tåget. Vil klar anbefale stedet til andre.
vraiment une très belle place le monde accueillant chaleureux serviable très belle expérience très belle place je conseil vivement

It was simply beautiful! The “tent” was spotless and decorated in a lovely style. The view from the balcony was absolutely stunning – a direct look over the rice fields. For breakfast, you could choose from several options – all were delicious and beautifully presented. The dining area is also open to non-staying guests and basically feels like its own little viewing platform. The drinks were great, and dinner is definitely worth trying as well!
One small downside, though it did not affect our overall impression: unfortunately, we accidentally broke a glass. When we returned it, no one mentioned that we would have to pay for it – we only found out at check-out, which was a bit of a surprise. A bit unfortunate, as accidents like this can happen.

INCROYABLE. Les membres du personnel sont accueillants, tellement gentils, disponibles et à l’écoute de vos besoins. La hutte est belle, bien aménagée, confortable et propre. Le chauffage est suffisant, même lors de températures fraîches ( nous y étions en mars). Tout l’environnement (restaurant, bar, airs de détente) est bien aménagé et permet une vue incroyable sur les montagnes. Le service de buggy entre la route et l’emplacement rend l’endroit facilement accessible.  La nourriture et les breuvages (café+++) sont délicieux. Bref, un réel coup de cœur pour l’ensemble de l’œuvre. Un MUST à Sapa. Nous avons beaucoup voyagé, et cet endroit est un coup de cœur, tous critères confondus.

The place is a little bit out of the way for travellers, however it’s just perfect as it offers lots of peace and serenity with it being a little further from the main town area. They offer their e-car service to fetch and send you to the top of the residential area, so it’s easier for you to travel to and fro the town area. You can walk yourselves to enjoy the local views and houses, but it’s a bit far and full of puddles so the e-car service was great! The views at the accoms were mostly covered my mist/fog due to us coming in Feb, but we still loved it! It was cold and cosy. There is also heating in the airbnb, although I could be quite inconsistent. Take note there’s no TV but wasn’t a problem for us, as the views and mist covered balcony kept us occupied with its beauty. They offer complementary bfast which is really nice. The staff were also all very friendly and accommodating. If we ever come back to Sapa, we might just stay here again! :)
Amazing view for the summer time, not so great for the foggy weather. Responsive and accomodating host with amazing food at the restaurant. :)
It was a beautiful place to stay, the hosts were lovely and so accommodating. The location was slightly out of Sapa town but still within walking distance. Would definitely stay here again!

The place had great views. Did not need to take a trekking trip through the rice fields because it was just there in front of us. Host was accommodating.  The cat is cute too!  11/10 would book again!

One of the best airbnbs I’ve been to especially for the price. He totally undersells it. The view right from the room is beautiful. We had horses go right past the back. The shop above the rooms is very cute and has nice stuff. The host is the kindest guy, he was very friendly and respectful. Also it says it doesn’t have hot water but every unit does. 11/10 recommend

Beautiful stay in the rice fields and Quan was the loviest person ever who made the stay 100x better. The home is about 20-30 minutes out of town, but grabs are easy enough to get. Rooms didn’t have aircon but fans made up for it! Great place :)
Nous avons passé un super séjour chez Anh. Tout était super !! La maison n’est pas facile à trouver et se situe à 30 minutes en voiture du centre de Sa Pa ! Merci pour votre accueil et réactivité

We booked all 3 rooms for a our group of 4, the location is close to a Village called Ta Van which is on the Trekking route, there's great cafes & restaurants a short walk away for food. The views are absolutely breathtaking. It's about a 25 mins taxi from Sapa town, we managed to get a Grab for our whole stay, a car or bike is needed if you wanted to explore the area. There was a couple of land slides when we went but this didn't seem to stop the drivers.
the rooms are very simple, but beds are clean and comfy, the shower does produce some hot water even though the listing says it doesn't, there are a lot of bugs due to being right next to the the rice paddies, and there's no air con but a fan is provided. we did notice a little bit of mould on the walls, this could be caused by the rainy season.
The hosts are super kind, they waited until 8pm for us to arrive, they also have a really cool souvenir shop above from local artists, we all bought something, absolutely would recommend!!

Anh’s place is extremely beautiful and peaceful, the view you’ll wake up to every morning is amazing. My family and I arrived at Sapa at 5am in the morning and Anh was actively messaging me making sure we were able to find the place. When we arrived, he greeted us with a smile and helped us check in.
There are 3 rooms total, I personally slept in bedroom 3, and the only downside I would say is there are a lot of insects because the toilet’s ventilation was a hole in the wall. If you don’t prefer insects, I will suggest sleeping in bedroom 1 and 2!
Overall, I really enjoyed my stay with my family here and it is a view I will never get back home <3
The accommodation was very good! The guys have a store on top with cool tees and hoodies with unique designs!

My friends and I booked Anh's place to stay for a couple of days so that we could experience the true Sa Pa villages away from the main hustle and bustle of the town, and we are so glad that we did! Anh was very responsive from the beginning and even helped to arrange a taxi to come and collect us from our last place and bring us to the Air bnb. He also got two scooters for us so that we were able to ride around the village. The rooms themselves were so cosy and beautifully designed - we were all extra happy with the electric blankets as it could get really cold at night. There are also heaters in each room and hot showers so we never felt cold after a day out in the rain. If you are looking for a peaceful, relaxing place to stay in one of the Hmong villages, I would 100% recommend Anh's place. Thank you so much for making our trip so special :)

We were shocked when we arrived at the Airbnb. The pictures already looked amazing, but once we arrived it was so much better than we had hoped. Big open windows of the rice fields (which I hope Anh will put more clearly in the preview, because waking up to the sunrise when we decided not to cover the window blinds was the best decision) and easy access to several hikes which we decided to take! Sapa was amazing, but seeing this town was even better. Some of our friends decided to extend their stay once they realised that the bed had a warmer function we didn't know about before arrival. We decided to go hiking without a guide, and locals helped us find the right paths when we were at forks in the road. The supermarkets were in easy walking distance and open until 21. The nearby restaurants also had amazing food with very generous portions. We were able to sit down and have coffees while talking to some very nice people we met while we were here.
The views from the Airbnb were very pretty and the host was extremely helpful
very nice place in the paddy fields perfect place if u want to escape the city and really soak in the nature
Great place to stay. Ahn is very friendly
Good view and local experience
Nice new rooms that are well cleaned. There is always someone around the house to help you. Only slight drawback is location next to the main street.
Un super accueil !!!
Dinh helped us a lot on this trip. Thank you very much. It was a pleasant journey.
Dinh is very welcoming and helpful. He will help you and give tips to plan your trip in this amazing region!
Nhà rất đẹp, rất yên tĩnh và riêng tư

Great place with a great view! Host was very welcoming and accommodating. There’s a mini trekking place ride beside the homestay to catch the sunset or sunrise above the clouds! Thank you so much and we hope to be back again 🤩🙌🏽🙌🏽

We hebben enorm genoten van het verblijf bij Hang. Hij is een heel warme persoon, die ons vanaf het begin van ons verblijf zeer welkom heeft doen voelen. Hij vertelt voluit over het dorp en over de Hmong cultuur en neemt je mee in de tradities van de lokale bevolking. Hij nam ons ook mee op mooie wandelingen door de natuur. De ideale locatie om tot rust te komen!
Home mới, sạch sẽ, yên tĩnh

Wunderschöne Unterkunft, idyllisch gelegen  an einem Bach mitten in einem Bergdorf. Man spührt, dass die Familie das Homestay mit viel Liebe und Herzblut führt. Sie gaben uns super Tipps, um dir Gegend zu erkunden. Das Abendessen war fantastisch. Wir haben den Aufenthalt so sehr genossen, dass wir sogar eine Nacht länger blieben als geplant.
Friendly and welcoming staffs, convenient location.
great host

So eine schöne Unterkunft gibt es selten. Die Bungalows sind so süß und authentisch gebaut. Und am Abend beim Essen war es so herzlich, wir haben viel gelacht, es schmeckte super und wir wurden sogar auf einen Schluck aus dem Trinkhorn eingeladen. Die Gastgeber erzählen gern von ihrer Tradition. Und sind so voller Hingabe für das, was sie tun!
Lovely getaway in a beautiful part of Vietnam. Everything wa exactly as described. Highly recommend
Prachtig afgelegen locatie met een heel mooi uitzicht! Er was snelle en goede communicatie.

房間乾淨，窗外風景漂亮
回覆快速，態度友善親切

We had an amazing time at Little House with Nga and her lovely family. The Little House they have built is beautiful, peaceful and comfortable. Nga and Dung were perfect hosts and made us feel like part of the family - taking us around the village to meet their friends and celebrate the national holiday, and inviting us to eat with them in the evening. The food was the best we have had in Vietnam and from the house we were able to do lovely hike and paraglide across the stunning valley. We will recommend to all our friends!
Très bon service, très bon emplacement, proposition de dîner en fonction de nos préférence et (très bonne cuisinière bien que ce ne soit pas un restaurant). Merci beaucoup !

On a passé un séjour hors du temps chez Nga ! L’expérience est unique et reposante. On a pu faire différentes randonnées et profiter des sources chaudes. Le cadre est merveilleux au bord d’un ruisseau et dans un village typique enfin les rizières en escalier donnent un panorama unique. Le petit déjeuner était excellent et le soir on a fait le choix de manger chez Nga et c’est une véritable perle à la cuisine !  C’était bien sûr très calme et on a apprécié la présence du petit chiot et à la fin du séjour les filles ont pu faire quelques parties de uno avec les fils de Nga. On recommande vivement !!!

Thanh Ngas bolig er en perle i den absolut smukkeste natur i Mu Cang Chai regionen. At komme til det lille hus i Khau Pha føltes som at træde ind i et eventyr af vietnamesisk skønhed og de rolige omgivelser, den rislende å, hundene og katten at nusse med og fuldstændig vidunderlig mad lavet af sødeste Si var ubeskrivelige oplevelser for vores familie (mor, far, to børn på 8 og 12).
Thanh Nga var så sød at svare prompte på alle vores henvendelser og hjalp os med at undersøge mange ting lige fra paragliding til at booke busbilletter til os.
Vi opholdt os i det lille hus i to nætter og det var perfekt. Tusind tusind tak for den smukke oplevelse.

Amazing little hide-out up in the mountains. Need to be a bit of a wandering spirit to venture out here but you’ll be rewarded with the stillness and atmosphere one needs to do a proper brain reset. Oh, and love dogs, cause you’ll get escorted by them frequently while out and about. Highly recommend this place.

Staying at Van’s place is a very special experience. It is beautiful, remote, rustic and authentic. It is a bit challenging to get to, but well worth it. Perfectly off the beaten path. Van is a wonderful host, we enjoyed dinner with her and seeing her farm. We spent one night, getting there via motorcycle. The road up to the house is challenging to ride, so if you don’t have much experience, highly suggest walking.
Magnifico eco lodge, una volta arrivato ti sarai dimenticato della ‘fatica’ per raggiungerlo. Immerso nella natura. Van molto disponibile e ci ha cucinato due cene deliziose. Consigliato!

Bei Van hatten wir einen ganz besonderen Aufenthalt. Die private Hütte bietet einen beeindruckenden Ausblick über das Tal, ist einfach aber gemütlich. Van kocht sehr gutes, vielseitiges und gesundes Essen und wir haben uns sehr gern mit ihr unterhalten. Bei der An- und Abreise konnte sie uns hilfreich unterstützen.

We had a wonderfull stay at Van’s place. Waking up with an amazing view and some home-made tea is a blessing. She helps you out to come to her place, so don’t worry about that! A small village to discover, waterfalls and hot springs, you can easily spend 3 nights or more here. Last but not least, Van is a wonderfull cook, preparing 3 delicious vegetarian dinners for us.

We recommend this place if you‘re good by foot.
The view from the big window is very beautiful and you can enjoy some time away from the busy city.
You should be a lover of nature and not get scared easily of spiders, bugs, mice… cause they will visit 😉 we very happy for the mosquito net provided by Van!
I especially enjoyed the variety of butterflies around the house. The food by Van was simple but very delicious and we also loved the tea she offered.
Last thing: you should like dogs if you come here :-)
They will great you with barking and grunting but are very friendly, chilled at the Lodge sometimes during day and night, hunting for mice and also walked by our side when we went down to the village/for a small hike, which was very cute.

Le logement est dans un cadre incroyable la vue est superbe! Pour être au calme en pleine nature c'est parfait.
Un peu difficile d'accès sur le dernier kilomètre surtout si il a plu mais vous pouvez dans ce cas rejoindre le logement assez rapidement a pied. La cabane est très mignonne même si elle est peu isolée et vous pouvez donc rencontrer quelques insectes et souris mais ça fait partie du charme de la nature!
Nous avons pu diner avec Van et discuter avec elle puisqu'elle parle très bien anglais!

This place is a little paradise up in the mountains. We loved our stay with Van, it is truly peaceful up there. It takes 20 minutes to hike up, but it is totally worth it. The sunset is right in front of the guest house, with amazing views over the valley. Van cookes great food and takes care of you while you are there.

Staying with Van was beautiful!
If you’re looking to get away from the tourist spots (and away from people in general) to have a rural Vietnamese adventure, then this is definitely the spot for you. Just getting driven up the mountain to her place was an adventure! Exploring the hills and town was lovely. The local hot spring baths are great for a dip (especially while surrounded by those mountain views).
I travelled in via bus/motorbike/walking and had a great time. But would probably recommend this place to people with their own transport.
Van was an amazing host, I was a bit disorganised but she was able to help me out a ton (everyone please remember to bring enough cash with you from the city, there are barely any ATMs out here and a lot of them don’t work with international cards).
Overall, would definitely recommend.

Thank you so much Van for one of the most unforgettable stays in Vietnam. Van has created something truly special with this Airbnb! The Airbnb is located on a lovely property and the sunsets from the room were incredible.

Van is super helpful. Although the place is remote, it would not make you disappointed. We had a good rest there and had small hikes there with lovely dogs (raise by Van). Highly recommend to all Eco-lodge lovers.
Unser Besuch bei Van war wirklich besonders! Weg von dem Massentourismus, ein bisschen im Nirgendwo - super schön! Es dauert bis man dort ist, aber die Reise hat sich gelohnt!

Our stay with Van was truly unique and beautiful. It was unlike any other Airbnb experience we’ve had. The accommodation on the mountain was stunning, and living with Van felt very authentic. The food she prepared was absolutely delicious, and we thoroughly enjoyed having conversations with her. Her dogs and cats were also incredibly charming!
For future visitors, I would recommend bringing plenty of snacks with you, as there are no dining options in the surrounding area. Be mindful of the insects, though!
We are also incredibly grateful to Van for her help with our arrival and departure. We encountered a few issues, but she was always available and provided us with great assistance.
We are so happy about our time with Van and would do it all over again ♥️
This place was perfect. Isolated and away from everyone. Exactly what was needed.

My stay was everything I wanted. The food and conversation shared was delightful, the scenery was mind-blowing, and the animals were also such sweet and helpful little co-hosts (the dogs accompanied me on my walks and were protective and helped lead the way).
Van was also incredibly helpful in arranging my travel to and from the homestay. Thank you for everything and I can't recommend enough to other nature lovers and those looking for a peaceful stay in the outdoors.

Van’s place is amazing! It’s the most gorgeous airbnb I’ve seen. There is a great view over the mountains and the village, the tiny house has super nice decoration, there is even warm water in the shower and Van makes super delicious food. It’s a wonderful stay and experience if you like the mountains and nature💜

Nous sommes au Vietnam depuis 1 mois et demi et c’est notre hébergement coup de cœur. Sa montagne est un havre de paix. Van est très chaleureuse et nous a invité à dîner avec elle à tout les soir et elle cuisine très bien. Elle nous a recommandé des chute à 10 min de l’hébergement et comme s’est une région non touristique, nous avions la chute à nous seul pour s’y baigner.

Après un doux périple pour arriver chez Van, nous avons été très bien accueilli. Le lieu et le logement de Van sont incroyables. Tout comme Van et ses animaux ! Nous avons partagé un excellent repas cuisiné par Van.
Pour partir, nous avons eu le privilège d'être accompagné par l'un de ses chiens !
❤️

Dream stay!
Easily sits on our best experiences during travel list :)
Van is not just a super host but a super woman, we loved interacting with her more and more leaving us inspired, wish to cross paths with her very soon.
Van if you’re reading this, we cant wait to host you in India soon <3

What a stay! Anyone who wants some peace and quiet at the edge of Vietnam, disconnect from the outside world - this is the place to go.
A tip for future travelers: use Maps' satellite mode to find Van's lovely home more easily because it can get be a little tricky doing so without any internet.
She was kind enough to prepare dinner and breakfast for me and the whole stay/place felt something out of Studio Ghibli animation - couldn't recommend it more!

It’s an adventure to get there but it’s worth it for the beautiful view and lovely host! I recommended to anyone who is looking to get away from the busy areas and have a quiet peaceful time. Next time we would stay three nights and visit the waterfall and hot springs!

Unfortunately we were only at Van's accommodation for one day on our motorcycle tour, but that one day was so idyllic and exactly as beautiful as described! This wonderful accommodation with a breathtaking view is located at the top of a mountain, secluded among home-grown vegetables! It has everything you need in such a quiet place. You can really relax here! We went for a walk through the fields with their three dogs and in the evening we had dinner together with Van. She prepared super tasty and simple vegetarian food for us, thank you for that!
Don't underestimate the walk up! It's not a problem on foot, but it takes about 30 minutes. It's quicker to get to the top on a motorcycle, but the road is a challenge and you have to be very careful on the way down... it can be very difficult when it rains.
But this was also described by Van and is really the only thing you need to know!
We would have loved to stay one more night in this peaceful place!
Beautiful and peaceful place. Amazing nature, very friendly pets. Van is very kind  person. Her home was wonderful. Thank you so much 😊

This was the highlight of our stay, Be aware yes it’s an adventure to get there but the view is absolutely worth it. we extended our stay, because we loved it so much. We arrived at night and we did not know so we hike for so long in the dark but the host explained to us that we can grab a moto bike taxi if we don’t want to hike. we are the only ones on the mountain and you are in a indigenous village where tourists don’t come often. We were the only ones there and it was an amazing experience. People were really friendly. The host, van is amazing at first she seems a bit shy but she is really kind. she helped us so much during our stay. She answered all ours questions, she helped us to rent a motobike , to book a bus and a taxi motobike. She is amazing. She invited us in her home and she cooked for us for a small fee. Her cooking is insanely good & healthy. The bungalow is just perfect super eco friendly. I will never forget her two dogs, they were so friendly and cute.
chủ nhà uy tín, ngoài việc đặt phòng còn tư vấn cho khách đi trekking rất tuyệt vời! Xin cảm ơn!
một nơi phù hợp để cho gia đình/nhóm bạn đi trốn :)
Perfect villa for a relaxing stay. It feels like home with all the amenities. The house is clean and spacious. The host should considering adding a microwave and wine bottle opener 😊

"A Hidden Gem in Moc Chau!"
I recently had the pleasure of staying at this charming homestay in Moc Chau, and it was an unforgettable experience. The cozy and rustic atmosphere immediately made me feel at home, with beautiful wooden interiors and stunning views of the surrounding hills. The hosts were incredibly warm and welcoming, always making sure that I had everything I needed. The highlight was waking up to a fresh, misty morning and enjoying a delicious breakfast with locally sourced ingredients. The peaceful environment, combined with the authentic experience, made it the perfect escape from city life. Highly recommend this homestay to anyone looking for a peaceful and authentic retreat in Moc Chau!
숙소가 넓고 깨끗했습니다

The place is super calm and the view is very nice. The problem we have is they don’t talk English so you had to translate all in Vietnamese. Other thing is the place is in the nature so be sure you are not afraid of bugs / spiders / snake ect…
Phòng xinh xắn sạch sẽ, hơi xa trung tâm 1 chút ạ. Anh/chị chủ nhiệt tình lắm ạ
Chỗ nghỉ rất tiện nghi, không gian rộng thoáng mát, nhân viên nhiệt tình. Sẽ quay lại lần tới
Chỗ nghỉ tốt; thời tiêt trong lành; nhân viên đáng yêu ; đồ ăn ngon và dịch vụ ổn

Beautiful new hotel  with friendly staff and fantastic views. Spotlessly clean, comfortably slept 3 of us and bikes were safe parked out front. Dinner not to English taste (travelling with my dad) but well presented and staff very helpful in offering an alternative. Swimming pool was a great addition to our stay.

Our family enjoyed a restful stay at Mường Lò Retreat after two weeks of traveling. The staff is extremely hospitable from the moment you arrive, always friendly, soft-spoken, and smiling. Breakfast and afternoon tea is included, and the restaurant serves very good dinner (upon reservation) with large portions, as well as simple lunch. Although we didn't come in the best season (the staff said August-September is more beautiful) we loved waking up to the view of the valley and town. Note that the hotel only accepts cash for additional services and dining, and it is difficult to exchange cash or access an ATM in the area.
Special thanks to the staff at Mường Lò Retreat :-)

Beautiful location and stunning views.  Food is great. Only thing to mention for guests staying in the Dormatory is that it is right above the restaurant and you can hear everything. My rest was based on when the activity in the restaurant stopped and started.

Definitely an aesthetically pleasing lodging facility for cloud-hunters in Ta Xua! The sheer rawness and relative lack of development in the area makes it one of the very few places left in Vietnam where foreign tourists are more of an exception than the rule. The ecolodge itself is a nice spot to relax, unwind and observe nature in all its brilliancy. However, if you’re here for cloud-hunting, beware—the roads, especially the back-end of the Dinosaur Spine peak may make you crap your pants if you’ve no experience in mountain-biking. Highly recommend hiring motorbike taxis if that’s the case.
Also, come prepared if you’re vegan/vegetarian; I was expecting little to no options at their restaurant and that’s indeed the case. The staff are friendly though, but only one of them speaks conversant English. As a rule, always carry cash in Vietnam; cards aren’t accepted here. Remember, this is remote Vietnam!
Overall, if you have realistic expectations, this place won’t disappoint you.
Great food, great stay! Thu was awesome and very helpful.

We had a wonderful stay at Khanh's place!! The bedroom is really spacious and has lot of natural light!! The terrace is so nice and cozy, perfect to drink tea or coffee while taking in the beautiful view! There was also complimentary breakfast and it was different every morning but always super tasty!! Khanh also picked us up from where the bus dropped us and also contacted the bus company so that we're picked up at his place when we left. Honestly a perfect place to explore the beautiful Mu Cang Chai and to have some nice genuine experience! I will definitely come back!! The internet is suepr fast, perfect for working 😉
Tiếp đón nhiệt tình, nhà cửa sạch sẽ
einfach Klasse. wir waren eine Nacht im Teehügel leider war die Sicht nur durchschnittlich und es waren 13 Grad. aber der Kamin hat uns gewärmt.

Super séjour passé avec la famille de Dinh. Très accueillant, repas délicieux, paysages magnifiques ! Chambre avec une vue direct sur les rizières en terrasse et possibilité de prendre un taxi moto pour arriver au logement.
I am so happy for having done this trip to visit the indigenous family of Hmong. This family has welcoming me in a lovely way. This experience was one of the highlights from this trip in Vietnam.
Great homestay! We were picked up from the bus station, and had very nice, simple food served three times a day. And the most amazing views!! Would definitely recommend staying here
Authentic stay in rural Vietnam in the hills. We were offered dinner which was lovely. Easy to find on our motorbike even in the dark! Thank you very much for having us ❤️
Such an incredible experience. The views from the accommodation are absolutely breathtaking. The host family is so kind and warm. My stay here was easily one of the best experiences of my life.

If you want to see the beautiful view of immense rice fields from your bedroom window and have a traditional meal with a H'mong family this is the best place around. Dinh and his wife An are always there to help and the treks you can do starting from their homestays are absolutely stunning. Amazing meals, great people, always ready to help and gives you answers to all your questions. Amazing stay!

過度に観光地化されていない場所でモン族の素朴な生活に触れてみたいという全ての方に、この宿泊施設をお勧めします。
ホストのDinhの両親の家の傍に建てられた木造の小屋に宿泊させてもらいました。よりプライベートなコンクリート造の部屋も勧められたのですが、個人的には木造の部屋の方が味があって窓の景色がよく、お勧めです。 家の前から見晴らせる棚田の景観は壮観です。
Dinhご夫婦とご両親、Dinhの兄弟夫婦が協力してゲストの対応をしてくれます。食事は伝統的な作りの母屋で彼らと他のゲストとともに手作りの料理をいただきました。
Dinhは朗らかでエネルギッシュなガイドで、畑の作物や季節ごとの仕事の手順など、目に映る様々なものについて湧いてくる疑問に丁寧に的確に答えてくれます。今回私は申し込みませんでしたが、彼と一緒に周囲の山や村をトレッキングするのもとても楽しそうでした。気ままに自分のペースで集落の周りを散歩したい人の気持ちもよく理解してくれて、夕暮れ時に行き交う村人に混じってそぞろ歩きするのも素晴らしい体験でした。
私は村にいる7人のシャーマンのうちの1人である彼の母親が臈纈染を教えてくれると聞いて、マンツーマンで教えてもらいながら彼らが採取した蜜蝋と独自の道具を使って小さな木綿の布に藍染をさせてもらました。他にも、彼らが母屋のすぐ隣で飼っている水牛や豚に餌をやったり、夕食のために炭火で大きな魚を焼いたりして、2泊だけの短い滞在でしたが彼らの生活の一端に触れられてとても感慨深かったです。
Dinhとご家族の皆さん、どうもありがとう。

Superbe emplacement, les hôtes sont formidables.
La vue et le logement....Splendide pour ceux qui veulent sortir des sentiers battu!
Juste vous assurer d'avoir des bouchons pour les oreilles car les coqs sont intense le matin.
Aussi soyez averti que les matelas vietnamiens sont beaucoup plus dur!
Je recommande fortement!

Lovely, smiling people and very authentic experience in a stunning location. They had a family celebration one of the evenings and they invited us to join and be part of the family. Amazing. All the best!
Super nette Gastfamilie! Die Lage ist wunderschön und ruhig gelegen. Perfekt zum Runterkommen!

Très bon séjour passé chez Dinh et sa famille même si c’était court. Nous avons pu déguster la très bonne cuisine de sa belle sœur et son frère et sa belle sœur nous ont emmené en moto à la station de bus de Mu Cang Chai. La vue de la chambre est juste magnifique. L’emplacement bien que reculé et difficile d’accès (nous a dû monter à pied car les voitures ne peuvent pas monter et il n’y avait pas de grab nous sommes arrivés tôt), nous permet de faire des randonnées car à proximité de point d’intérêt. Merci à Dinh et sa famille je les recommande !

De momento la mejor experiencia que he vivido en Vietnam, me ofrecían comida cada vez que me veían. La comida es abundante y muy deliciosa. Te sientes como en casa y te tratan co uno más de la familia.

Bel accueil chaleureux, authentique et réactif à mes demandes. Vue magnifique en hauteur sur les rizières. Matelas un peu dure pour mes os d’âge avancé en comparaison à nos matelas européens mais bonne nuit face à la nature.

Super séjour au sein de la famille de Dinh au cœur des rizières de Mu Cang Chai. L’ensemble de la famille est adorable et son à vos petits soins. Ils proposent aussi des excursions à la journée pour découvrir les environs. Toujours arrangeant, je recommande fortement.
Logement authentique, famille très accueillante et gentille qui fait tout pour qu’on se sente bien. Merci pour ce séjour !

We had the most beautiful relaxing stay with dinh. The view is out of this world. The beds and rooms were cosy and clean and the food was some of the best we have had. We also did a trek with Yien and it was really great, we got to walk around the rice fields and learn about the h’mong tribe and see parts of their daily life. We were very sad to leave but will definitely try to come back one day. Would highly highly recommend

This is a beautiful stay with a beautiful family who really look after you. A great place to meet other travellers. We had so much help from the owners who went out of their way to help us. We loved the traditional experience and would recommend you stay

Nous sommes restées une semaine dans ce homestay, la famille est très gentille et toujours au petit soin pour les voyageurs qui viennent, le homestay est agréable et la vue est spectaculaire ! Par contre, il y faisait très froid en novembre donc prévoyez des vêtements chauds pour dormir et des boules quies car les nuits et matins sont assez bruyants avec les animaux autour (chiens, cochons, coq...). Je recommande ce homestay !

This is an amazing home stay if you make the effort to get there! Dinh and his family are lovely and extremely welcoming!
The view is amazing, we will definitely be visiting again

Chủ nhà thân thiện, vui vẻ.
Mình đã rất vui khi ở đây

Min partner og jeg var meget glade for at bo i dette homestay! Yien og hans familie var meget venlige og behagelige at være sammen med. Der er også god mulighed for at lære andre gæster at kende. Min partner og jeg var på en heldagstur med Yien og hans kone, som kan anbefales - de er begge meget søde og nemme at kommunikere med på engelsk.
Omgivelserne er smukke, maden er god og familien er meget venlig. Vi anbefaler!
Amazing experience in the mountains. The nights were super cold and the rooms not insulated but it was a part of the game. Traditional and family atmosphere was very warming.

Superbe séjour dans le homestay de dinh et la chance de partager le quotidien de sa famille H'mong qui est tout simplement Incroyable. l'endroit et les alentours sont magnifiques et tellement depaysant. je vous le recommande

Superbe emplacement !
Avec des hôtes en or, qui nous font découvrir leur culture avec plaisir.
Une vue à en couper le souffle ! Assez isolé, mais tellement agréable.
Je recommande !

We were warmly welcomed by A Hang. The dinner was thoughtfully prepared and delicious. After dinner, we sat by the fireplace and talked with A Hang family about daily life in Ta So village and many things about the place. Thank you A Hang and your family!

Dinh, sa compagne, ainsi que toute sa famille sont très accueillants, adorables, et toujours prêts à rendre service.
L'environnement autour est incroyablement beau, et authentique.
Merci Dinh pour cette splendide expérience !

The house of Dhin offers a rare and unforgettable experience. Surrounded by the unique colours of the rice fields, an authentic and pure location.
We met special people who made us feel part of their family. We will always carry with us the memory of the last hug before we left. 🥰 Dinh and his brother were great in helping us organise our trip back to Ha Giang, showing willingness, dedication and care for our request.
We recommend to organise transport in advance as the house is not easy to reach.
It was for sure one of the best memories of our trip in Vietnam ❣️

This accomodation took our breath away! The location was in the ethnic village excluded from the noisy Vietnam but it doesnt even felt like a tourist atraction. We really recommend to take a motorbike full day trip with your personal local driver where you will see the whole valley, seriously you will see everithing! Every dinner was with the owners family and all food was from local fields and gardens. Seriously recomend to stay here more than 1 night. We were there in August and almost alone with just a few tourists. Probably out best experience from Vietnam!

Der Aufenthalt bei Dinh und seiner Familie war ein echtes Erlebnis. Allein die Fahrt zum AirBnB war schon ein Highlight für sich. Beim AirBnB angekommen, wurden wir herzlichst von Dinh seiner Familie begrüßt. Der Ausblick aus dem Zimmer war, genauso wie auf den Bildern zu erkennen, einzigartig. Auch das Abendessen mit Dinh seiner Familie war eine Erfahrung, die man unbedingt erlebt haben sollte. Es gab lokale Speisen und Köstlichkeiten. Für faire Preise kann man bei Dinh auch Wandern-Touren buchen, die durch die schönen Reisfelder führen und einem das Leben und die Kultur der Einheimischen nähen bringen.
Für jeden, der nach Mu-Cang-Chai kommt, ist Dinh sein AirBnB nur zu empfehlen!

Man wohnt mit einer Einheimischen Familie an einem der schönsten Orte in diesem Tal, wird trotz deren finanziellen Möglichkeiten bekocht und es gibt Führungen. Kommunikation-Skills sind sogar besser als in der Stadt! Was will man mehr?! Erwartungen senken und einfach genießen!
Vielen Dank für deine Zeit Dinh!❤

Dinh's place was amazing. His whole family was so welcoming and inviting, it really did feel like home. Although it rained the entire time we were there, they were still accommodating and were super friendly with everyone. All the homecooked meals were honestly superb - their veggie dishes were my favourite!
If it's going to be rainy weather, remember to dress accordingly - it gets very cold and windy as you're high up in the mountains. I was not prepared at all, but I still had a blast and it was definitely an experience remembering!
La famille est très gentille et accueillante. Les repas sont très bons et partagés avec eux. une chouette immersion en famille au cœur de cette ethnie.

As an expolorer who wants see truly homongs live I can really recommend this and thanks for this opportunity to be here. This homestay is really special and unique. Sleeping and eating with homong Family in one house. You are like a member of this nice and friendly family. You can see true live, work on a field, amazing village in the montains around. Like a bonus you arranged everything with a english speaker who helps you.

This was for sure the best accommodation in whole Vietnam! Dinh and his family were very kind and friendly. They showed us local waterfall and gave us a way through the rice fields. We enjoyed our stay with them a lot and would recommend to everybody!

Nyob zoo, ua tsaug! (H’Mông) This was our best Vietnam experience so far! We are so happy that we got to this place and got to know Chu, Dinh and their heart warming family who was so stunningly friendly. The place is as soothing and quite remote. We had to “climb” smallest ways between the rice fields with our motorbikes for quite some time (which could be fun for more experienced drivers) until we found out, that there is a wider better road. If you come here by yourself, take the street to the north in Q58C+MWM, QL32, Púng Luông, Mù Cang Chải, Yên Bái, Vietnam. You can still walk the small ways between the fields by food😊
We hope to come to this place again in the future!😊 Best regards,
Johannes & Terje

If you want to come in mu cang chai, you need to come there! The place is perfect to go around and you will live with locals : a family which is soooo nice that you won't regret it at all. I recommend it for sure.
An authentic and amazing experience in Dinh's familly homestay! Try it and enjoy the peacefull atmosphere there.

Merci pour ce séjour incroyable chez votre famille. nous avons beaucoup apprécié passer du temps a mu cang chai et découvrir la culture hmong. nous avons adoré les plats que nous avons partagé et la chambre était très confortable !

The views here are incredible. The room is right in the middle of the rice hills with fully unobstructed views. It’s a little challenging to access, but the owner takes care of everything. We were also fed a delicious lunch cooked by Dinh’s wife and sister. And, Dinh (and a friend) offered us a motorcycle easy-rider tour around the entire area that was the highlight of our entire Vietnam trip so far.
Experience incroyable. Dinh et sa famille sont très gentils et attentionnés. Les repas préparés sont toujours excellents, l’ambiance est très agréable et paisible, les paysages sont magnifiques.
큰창으로 보이는 풍경 하나만으로도 이 숙소에 올 가치가 있다

I felt really great there. I had a warm shower, a beautiful view, delicious meals, a responsive host, nice family ambiance and the evenings near the fire must be my favorite. Many thanks to the family that made this possible I want to thank you for your hospitality :)

This place is a real gem! And the hosts, Chù and Chỏ are such wonderful people! We stayed 2 days/ 1 night at this place and it was probably the highlight of our time in the North of Vietnam.
