The views are mesmerising, the food, the time we spent with the family, everything was incredible. And they made the best coffee too! I cannot recommend this place enough.
We booked a half a day hike with Chù which I really recommend. They also arranged for pickup and drop off and bus back to Hanoi for us.
If you want to experience an authentic H’mong experience, book and stay with Chù and his family and you will have a blast!

Dinh’s place (Indigenous Homestay) is very special… you feel lost in nature, surrounded of rice 🌾 fields, unforgettable view…. but the best is “the hole family” they are beautiful people, welcoming, friendly and big heart ♥️ so glad they open their home to us. Super thankful for sharing time with this beautiful souls!! Wish we could stay longer!!
Food was delicious!
We did the motorbike 🏍️ tour with Yin and his brother!! Memories we will never forget! They took us to the place we were dreaming about it during months! We saw 🐃, the best rice fields photo spots, bamboo forest…. The drive was like being in a movie! (We weren’t prepare for trekking.. but 100% recommended in the area).
We just leave and we are looking forward to come back!! 💯 RECOMMENDED! OChau! ♥️♥️
Eine richtig schöne Aussicht! Dazu kochen sie auch sehr lecker!!
Everything was great! Thanks 🙂
Dépaysement incroyable, une expérience à réaliser au moins une fois dans sa vie ! Je recommencerai

Der Name ist Programm. Urlaub im Paradies. Herrliche Lage, sehr nette Gastgeber, mit einfachen Mitteln wurde ein absolutes Wohlgefühl in einem authentischen ländlichen Umfeld geschaffen.
Das Frühstück ist abwechslungsreich und das Abendessen immer ein traumhaft leckeres Menü. Das beste Essen in Vietnam für uns.
Die Umgebung ist wunderschön und lädt zu diversen kleinen und großen Wandertouren ein. Es lohnt sich auf jeden Fall länger als nur zwei oder drei Nächte zu bleiben.
100 Prozent Empfehlung

Nam and is wife have created a true paradise for those traveling to Mu Cang Chai.   A cozy room, comfortable bed and the most delicious food in a stunning location made this a perfect stay for me. Highly recommend!

숙소도 깔끔하고 전망도 최고!
호스트님이 오토바이로 여러 명소를 태워다 주셔서 너무 편했습니다. 그리고 무엇보다 호스트 아내분이 직접 만들어 주시는 요리가 너무 맛있었어요! 여기 며칠 더 있다간 살쪄서 나갈 것 같습니다. ㅋㅋ 가성비 최고의 숙소 입니다!

amazing place and people.
the host speaks english well, gives good tips for the area. And his wife is an amazing cook!
Tey understood allergied wel and were accommodating.
highly recommend to visit!
wonderful stay here in lapantan paradise. the location has incredibile view and Nam and his family are super super host, very friendly and helpful. i Hope to come back soon.

More than the place and the surroundings i would definitely talk about Nam and his family
They were the best part about our whole trip
Unforgettable hospitality and help
Warm and cosy dining area and excellent vegan food (vietnamese)
People dont always keep mountains in their list but Nams place is a must stay and MCC is a must visit
Nam was also amazing and helpful with planning our day and was the hero of it all
He is a very talented videographer as well
Arranged a cake on a short notice for us as we celebrated a birthday
Even helped us arrange a car back to hanoi
100% everything
Thank you Nam🙏🏼

Really nice hosts, beautiful surroundings, delicious food, great place to stay, I wish I could have spent more time there. Hosts waited for me and picked me up, brought me to the bus when I left. Gave me directions and also invited me to a local party. Excelent communication, both hosts speak English, always checked to see if all is good. Had to spend one of my 3 nights at a different guest house because some "Airbnb error" , the place was of lower quality, but in the end didn't mind it.
The place is as advertised, great bed, good shower, cleaning wise could be better.

Super endroit paisible, vue magnifique sur la vallée et ses risieres. Hôte accueillant. Je recommande fortement de faire le tour en scooter avec l'hôte, cela permet de voir les environs splendides, cascades, Terrace de riz.. La nourriture préparée chez l'hôte est très bonne avec des produits frais de la région.
היה מושלם

Neuvěřitelné krásné místo, velice milí hostitele , výborná snídaně a večeře velkolepá. Cítili jsme se jako doma. Nic nebylo problém! Hostitel trpělivě a rychle odpovídal na veškeré mé dotazy. Pomohl nám s příjezdem i odjezdem....   Nechtělo se nám odjet, místo se nám vrylo hluboko pod kůži.

What a fantastic scenery experienced staying with Nam and his adorable family -
The wife is a charming lady, very welcoming and an awesome cook. Healthy an tasty meals -:)
The kido is adorable and was my guide to show me a near by creek -:)
Nam is friendly and caring.
He picked me up when i arrived by bus and on my return stayed with me at the bus station until the bus arrived. A gentleman!
This location is paradisiac !!!
For those who love nature and long hikes you'll be very well served. Stunning landscape that starts right from your cabin window and balcony.
All in all it was a fabulous experience!
I'll be back :)
Perfektní! Nam i jeho žena byli velmi přátelští a nápomocní. Se vším nám moc pomohli, nebyl problém půjčit motorku nebo připravit večeři. Moc doporučujeme!
I highly recommend this place. You will never regret. The food was amazing thanks to Nam’s wife.
Anh chị chủ nhà nhiệt tình, chị vợ nấu ăn ngon và chu đáo, tiện nghi dịch vụ đầy đủ.

Decide to stay here for 1 more night, a great place, a very lovely place, the homestay is located in a heart-shaped land and environmental friendly. We even have organic veggie and peaches form the garden. Very peaceful, romantic, and quiet. I feel so connected with myself and nature. Will come back if possible.

Nam’s family is extremely friendly, the view from the room is amazing too.  Just the road where entering the place is quite slippery and only bike could ride in, the car is able to park outside and walk in around 200m, they are going to fix it in winter time.  Hopefully, it is getting better.

Great host, very beautiful field nearby, his place is located in a heart shaped land, very romantic area. It is amazing thing to know. clean and environmental friendly. Breakfast is included, nice banana pancake. Dinner is at an affordable price and delicous

Lapatan paradise is a great place to escape for anyone who wants to get off the beaten path. Beautiful views of rice terraces and mountains right outside your window. There is even a nice balcony and a fire pit where we drank and played guitar. The best part about staying at Nam’s was that he made a big Vietnamese feast every night with unlimited rice wine. It was nice because there were other Americans staying at the homestay also, so Nam made a mix of American and Vietnamese dishes to make us feel at home. One of the Americans had her birthday while she was there, so Nam went out of his way to get her Swiss cakes and candles to celebrate her birthday. Would definitely recommend his homestay for anyone visiting the Mu Cang chai region!
Très bien
Chủ home rất nhiệt tình, hỗ trợ linh hoạt và thân thiện với khách
Helpful hosts! Great location, would stay here again!
good place for staying for one night
Logement neuf, bien équipé. Hôtes sympas.

This accomodation is very beautiful and the family is really generous. Spending time there was really fun and great experience to see Vietnam in its original beauty and also the pool is really great.
I would recomend staying there for sure!

너무 세상에 있는것 같은 착각에 드는 장소입니다.metaverse공간 같은 느낌. 아름다운 경치와 지역주민들이 일하는 모습 너무 환상작인 장소입니다.cao pa 가 무캉차이에서 최고의 장소입니다.
스텝 si는 요리 솜씨가 좋고 항상 주방과 카페 게스트공간을 깨끗이 정리합니다. 살림꾼..^^
다음에 와도 지금 그대로인 모습이면 좋겠습니다.
지역버스를 이용하는 방법을 배웠는데 갈려니 아쉽습니다.
재미있었어요. 그리고 지역주민들도 친절하고 무엇보다도 정직합니다. 마켓에 물값을 보면 알아요. 깜짝 놀랐습니다.^^

We had a fabulous stay in Lim Mong at Thanh Nga's homestay. The surroundings are very quiet and peaceful and Thanh Nga's was so lovely to help us organize some activities and logistics.
Have dinner at the homestay, the meals were incredible!
You'll share the bathroom with the other guests and note that the rooms are not fully sound proof but this was superceeded by the hospitality of Thanh Nga and her family.

Little House est situé dans une vallée magnifique. Le lieu est très bien situé.
Little House est une maison au charme unique.

Encore merci pour votre accueil ! Les instructions pour venir depuis hanoi sont très simples, notre hôte s'est occupée de tout... en quelques heures de bus vous êtes dans un paradis comme il en existe peu. Nous devions rester 2 nuits, on s'y sentait tellement bien qu'on est restés quelques jours supplémentaires ! La restauration est decilieuse et variées tous les jours. La famille est très accueillante ainsi que les villageois. Ils pratiquent leur métier avec passion et amour.

Nga a été très gentille, elle s’est toujours rendue disponible pour nous aider et à répondu à toutes nos questions. La maison est agréable, la vue sur la rivière et les guirlandes le soir donnent un charme immense à la maison. Pour nous, le summum ça a été les repas le soir! Inutile d’aller ailleurs, il faut manger la bas tous les soirs : les menus sont variés, les produits de grande qualité et c’est une manière de découvrir une cuisine simple et absolument délicieuse. Nous avons vécu une expérience unique loin du monde et hors du temps.

Wenn ich könnte würde ich 10 Sterne vergeben. Wir hatten bei Nga wundervolle Tage in einer sehr schönen Gegend. Die Lage der Unterkunft bietet sehr viele Möglichkeiten. Wir waren Gleitschirmfliegen, im Fluss hinter dem Haus baden und rund herum konnten wir die wunderschönen Reisfeldern bestaunen. Die Gastgeberin hat uns den Transfer von der Bushaltestelle zur Unterkunft organisiert und tagsüber haben wir Motorräder ausgeliehen.
Das Essen wurde von Nga selbst zubereitet und ist super lecker. Ich kann die Unterkunft zu 100% empfehlen.
We loved our stay. Thanks for the great time!

Amazing homestay experience! Thanh Nga and her wonderful family, including their adorable pets, cat Butter and dog Black, were fantastic hosts at their fabulous homestay. The rooms were cute and bijou. Whilst the shower and toilets were at the end of the corridor, they were of very high quality. The home-cooked food was exemplary (yummy +++), and Thanh Nga treated us to an amazing guided tour around the valley. We truly enjoyed our time and will be recommending Thanh's homestay to all our friends and family. The picturesque surroundings are breathtaking!

We loved our stay at the Little House - so much so that we came back. The house is set in a peaceful place next to the river and guests have a really warm welcome from the family. We were left to ourselves but also a welcomed to use the space as we wanted. The home cooked meal from their garden was absolutely delicious, bed was super confortable and there were lots of nice homely touches too. Highly reccomended if you are after a more alternative vibe. We hope to come back one day!

The homestay is perfection. The hosts were energetic, friendly and happy. The views and food were fabulous.
My partner, who has something to say about everything, was completely smitten with the place and keeps talking about going back.
I was sick a lot from a previous place and the rooms are clean and lovely and as far as being sick on holiday goes, the homestay made it very bearable.
Parfait du début à la fin, les hôtes étaient d'une grande gentillesse et leurs logements incroyables !
Very beautiful place to stay. The host was also very nice and helpful. They cooked us very delicious dinner and offered us the local drink. Highly recommended 🙏
Hôte très accueillante!! on se sent comme chez soi!
Meget værdi for pengene. Smukke omgivelser

We had a great stay at Nam’s place. The view is amazing and the environment really quiet, you can only feel at peace at Lapantan Paradise!
Everything was as mentioned and pictured, and the food was - as stated in many comments - really amazing and generous!
We wish we stayed more than one night..!
Thank you Nam!

Mr Nam and his wife were excellent hosts and their home stay in La Pan Tan is glorious. Beautiful surroundings and walking routes along the valley. Room was clean and comfortable with a lovely view across the valley and the food was superb. Nam came to collect us from the road and arranged our onward transport for us. Amazing hospitality and value - would recommend!

Leuk huisje midden tussen de rijstvelden. We hebben 4 dagen doorgebracht bij Nam en zijn familie in het mooie Mu Cang Chai. Een prachtige omgeving waar je mooie wandelingen kan maken door de rijstterrassen en kleine dorpjes. Nam en zijn familie zijn heel gastvrij en relaxed. Zijn vrouw kan zeer goed koken, we hebben iedere avond hier gegeten en iedere dag werd er anders gekookt en alles supervers. Nam reageert ook zeer snel via telefoon en kan alles voor je regelen ook de transport heen of terug, heel handig. We hebben die 4 dagen amper toeristen gezien en het voelde heel authentiek aan. Een echte aanrader en een heel lieve familie!

Nam is the best host that you can wish for, he has show me all the beatifull places in mi cang chai and also invited me to a party from the neighbors.
The food was also really Nice, nams wife has cooked every day for me and it was Nice and a lot.
Go to this place !

Lapantan Paradise is absolutely worth staying. I looked at a few others and in fact saw a couple whilst there. Glad we chose this one.
The food cooked by Nam's wife (sorry i forgot her name) is amazing. She's the best cook we've found on our trip so far. Delicious. And quite a variety (we atayed 2 nights). Oh and stay 2-3 nights if you can. Nam will agow you where to walk. Best rice fields are in La Pan Tan.
Loved little 5 month puppy Lou Lou.
If you turn right if you look to the fields there is an awesome out and back trail. Highly recommend.

חופשה נפלאה. תחושת גן עדן עם הנוף מהחלון. אוירת ארוח משפחתי עם האוכל המהמם של זאן שאין כמותו בכל ויאטנאם.
סיימנו שבוע ובחודש הבא אנחנו מגיעים שוב בהרכב משפחתי מורחב. זה אומר הכל...
להתראות

We absolutely loved our stay in Mu Cang Chai even though we visited during winter. The rice terraces were still stunning even though it was “off season “. It was possibly the best time during our four week trip in Vietnam.
The homestay is located in stunning surroundings not far from one of the best views in Mu Cang Chai. In addition, the area is inhabited by sweet, local Hmong people which adds to the overall experience.
We also had some of our best meals in Vietnam there prepared by Nam’s wife. Bring your appetite as the food is delicious and plentiful.
We arrived from Ninh Binh and were not able to make it time for the bus to MCC from Hanoi, so Nam helped us arrange a private transfer from Yen Bai.
We look forward to coming back to this unique place!

We had pleasant experience staying at Lapantan Paradise. We also tried Nam's wife homemade food which was delicious. Behind the accommodation, there were rice terraces in walking distance so you don't have to travel far. Nam was also very helpful and accommodated us with motorbike tour around Mu Cang Chai and all attractions.

Come innamorarsi di un posto? Andate a Lapantan Paradise. Svegliarsi alla mattina, aprire la finestra e vedere un vero paradiso. Nam è attento, disponibile e simpatico. Sua moglie è un'ottima host e cuoca, abbiamo mangiato benissimo. Nam ci ha fatto sentire come a casa e ci ha portato a fare un tour delle risaie che ricorderemo per sempre. Grazie Nam! Super consigliato
Danilo e Vittoria
Amazing

Our stay with Nam was amazing. The place is beautiful and everyone is so welcoming and makes you feel at home. The food cooked by Nan’s wife was also amazing.
Nam even took us on a motorbike tour around mu cang chai and showed us some amazing spots. I’m very happy we came here

We stayed here in the winter season so the place was empty and we were hosted by the owner’s son, however this was no issue. The whole family was extremely accommodating. The cabins are very nice and cozy, the views are incredible. I would say maybe it is a little bit on the expensive side, but other than that we are very happy with the stay and would highly recommend!!

Beautiful location and private cabins!
It was nice being off the main road and the entrance leading up was a great path for motorbikes.
Nam and his wife are wonderful hosts. Their English is great, so we had the opportunity to learn about the surrounding rice fields. His wife made us a delicious breakfast and dinner. Comfortable beds with warm blankets are perfect for the cold nights.

Nam and his wife were great host, they both were very kind and helpful.
His wife cooked the best crepes for breakfast.
I really enjoyed my stay, although the room was a little bit cold without heater

This is one of our favorite places we’ve stayed in Vietnam. It is a beautiful location, the staff is so friendly. We arrived in rain-soaked clothes from riding motorcycles and they kindly dried our clothes. The food was perfect. The room very clean and welcoming. We would have stayed longer if we could!

Thank you for a wonderful stay and thoroughly enjoyed being able to join in the private reunion party, complete w Thai/Viet ethnic group  cultural dancers. Pool with a wonderful view similar to our private bungalow opening out onto rice terraces. Free bicycles was a plus. Take mozzie/bug spray - this accom is in the countryside, hence rice terraces. Great hospitality. Lots of stairs so not wheelchair friendly.
Beautiful location - amazing place!
Beautiful place. perfect to relax. very friendly hosts. Possibility to use bicycles for a tour.

Dieser Aufenthalt war unser Bester  in Vietnam. A Su und seine Familie sind unglaublich freundlich und nehmen einen mit offenen Armen auf. Am Abend hat man die Möglichkeit mit der Familie ihr selbst gemachtes Essen gemeinsam zu genießen und sich zu unterhalten. A Su beantwortet einem viele Fragen und kann eine Menge über die Kultur erklären. Die Zimmer waren sehr schön und der Blick gigantisch. Absolut empfehlenswert!!!

Von Anfang an unseres Aufenthalts war es ein herzlicher Familien Kontakt in A Su’s Unterkunft. A Su kümmerte sich mit seiner Familie einfach toll um seine Gäste. Wir nutzten die Möglichkeit, im familiären Umfeld das Abendessen einzunehmen. Seine Frau ist eine sehr gute Köchin und wir bekamen eine abwechslungsreiche Küche serviert. Genaus war es auch mit dem Frühstück. Auf Nachfrage hat A Su uns ein Moped ausgeliehen, mit dem wir die Umgebung noch besser erkunden konnten. Die Unterkunft liegt etwas abgelegen, was aber mit Taxitransport kein Problem war. Es lohnt sich auf jeden Fall hierher zu kommen, da man mit einem grandiosen Ausblick auf Berge und Reisfelder belohnt wird. Die Kommunikation lief auf Englisch, wenn es zu kompliziert wurde half die Übersetzungsapp und wir haben viel über Vietnam, die Region und über die Menschen und ihr Leben hier erfahren.
Wir sind als Gäste gekommen und als Freunde gegangen.
Một chỗ ở tuyệt vời, ăn uống rất ngon! Chủ home thân thiện

Stayed as a family of 6 and were very happy with the place. We only spent one night here and it didn't seem enough. The people around here are very friendly. The house had everything we needed to live.
Great place to stay with two bedrooms
Vše bylo dle mých představ. Milý a ochotný hostitel, výborné jídlo, skvělé místo

Vị trí của Mộc Homestay gần rừng thông bản Áng, tầm nhìn thoáng rất đẹp.
Ngoài ra home nhìn mới và đẹp hơn ảnh rất nhiều nên các bạn cứ tự tin mà lựa chọn!
Highly recommend for all guests!
viet's place was the perfect overnight stay for me after a big days riding he was very welcoming and I enjoyed having dinner with his family 😊 would happily stay again.

Heel goede ervaring gehad, je wordt meteen in hun familie verwelkomd. De locatie is ook leuk. Een ding, er werd niet gezegd dat ik achteraf 170.000 dong moest betalen voor het eten, maar dit vond ik niet erg aangezien ik een super leuke ervaring heb gehad!! Zeker een aanrader!
good place and location for stay , guest helpfull .
Nice apartment to rent

Chủ nhà rất thân thiện, chu đáo, và chỉn chu đến từng chi tiết nhỏ nhất trong nhà để mang đến trải nghiệm tốt nhất cho khách (ví dụ: ngoài những vật dụng cần thiết như bát đĩa dao kéo, chủ nhà còn chuẩn bị dù, túi nilon, etc).
Nội thất xịn, decor xinh, view biển.
Mini bar giá rất hợp lý như là chủ nhà mua đồ giùm khách thôi.
Nói chung là rất yêu chủ nhà ❤️
Chủ nhà rất nhiệt tình, hỗ trợ nhanh chóng, vị trí trung tâm. Nhà dễ thương đủ tiện nghi và sạch sẽ. Mình sẽ quay lại nếu có dịp.

Căn hộ sạch sẽ và ấm cúng, cảm giác thiện cảm từ lần đầu bước đến
Host siêu chu đáo và luôn hỗ trợ nhiệt tình, giá cả quá hợp lý, hầu như mọi thứ đều vô cùng hoàn hảo và chắc chắn mình sẽ ghé lại nhiều lần
Hi vọng host luôn năng lượng và duy trì dịch vụ nhé 🥰🥰 cảm ơn sự tận tình và chu đáo của bạn
Chị chủ dễ thương và nhiệt tình, home rất đẹp, sạch sẽ và đầy đủ tiện nghi sẽ tiếp tục quay lại

Một trong những home tốt nhất mình đã ghé. Chuyên nghiệp, sạch sẽ, đầy đủ và chủ home rất tinh tế, sắp xếp cả kẹp tóc cho khách nữ, dụng cụ bếp sử dụng các loại tốt và còn rất mới. Đáng với giải tiền !

Sạch sẽ và rất thơm. Lần đầu tiên mình dám xài khăn tắm ở ngoài vì khăn siêu thơm và sạch sẽ. Phòng bếp chuẩn bị đồ dùng đầy đủ. Nhà vệ sinh được dọn sạch sẽ. Phòng ngủ thì view đẹp và sạch. Phòng khách thì sofa cũng có mùi thơm. Mong home sẽ giữ mãi chất lượng như thế này

This is a gorgeously equipped apartment with very thoughtful hosts. Incredible shower, indoor and outdoor slippers; and personalized check-in. Beautifully designed apartment.
The view of back beach is incredible, and easy to get around Vũng Tào. One of the hosts stays in the same building and is extremely helpful!
Very memorable and restful stay
Phòng rất xinh  , bạn host rất nhiệt tình luôn ạ ❤️
nhà xinh lắm ạ, chủ nhà thì  luôn hỗ trợ nhiệt tình
Amazing place and hidden gem for weekend getaway. Apartment is exactly as in pictures, surpassed our expectations. Host puts a lot of love and effort into this place and her guests.
Nhà rất gọn gàng, sạch sẽ và chủ rất dễ thương

We had a great one night stay in Phuong's superb apartment right by the beach. It's a lovely place, super comfortable, modern, new and well equipped and the location is great for the beach.
Phuong is the best host ever, so helpful and kind and wanting her guests to have the best time. Thanks so much!

Chị chủ nhà phản hồi rất nhanh, rất chủ động
Nhà sạch sẽ, đầy đủ tiện nghi
Rất đáng để trãi nghiệm
Phòng ốc rất okie, trên hết là dịch vụ đỉnh nóc, kịch trần, bay phất phới. Sẽ book trong tương lai

Anh chị chủ rất dễ thương. Hỗ trợ mình 24/7 luôn 🥰 sẽ quay lại vào những dịp tiếp theo
Nơi ở đầy đủ tiện nghi, 10 điểmmmmm

Không gian phòng ấm cúng, thoải mái, đầy đủ tiện nghi
Chủ nhà nhiệt tình, dễ thương, sẵn sàng hỗ trợ
Một chiếc homestay tụi mình ưng ý nhất từ trước tới nay ở Vũng Tàu. Nhất định sẽ quay lại vào dịp tới.
Cảm ơn host và partner vì món quà sinh nhật cũng như đã hỗ trợ mình có một kì nghỉ hoàn hảo. Chúc các bạn nhiều sức khỏe và niềm vui trong cuộc sống. See you soon!

Phuong is a great host!  Extremely helpful and responsive when needed.  We had a wonderful time enjoying the beach and visiting many sites, all very nearby and easily accessible.  The apartment was the perfect place to relax, listen to the waves and enjoy the sunrises and sunsets!
Mình cảm thây rất thoải mái, view biển đẹp, nơi ở sạch sẽ, giống như hình

We had a wonderful stay at 22 Lagom. The host was incredibly accommodating and made us feel right at home. Even though we arrived early, we were able to check in sooner than expected. The house was spotless, always smelled fresh, and was fully equipped with everything from household appliances to makeup remover pads. The ocean view was stunning and the interior design was perfect for a relaxing getaway. Thank you very much, Ms Thao and highly recommend this homestay to anyone looking for a relaxing vacation.
Căn hộ rất tuyệt! Cảm giác như đang ở nhà

Phòng rất sạch, đẹp, view như hình, từ phòng có thể nhìn thấy cảnh biển. Phòng rất ngăn nắp, có đầy đủ tiện ích cần có. Tất cả đồ dùng đều rất sạch sẽ, chủ nhà rất chu đáo chuẩn bị thêm rất nhiều đồ dùng cần thiết với các bạn nữ. Căn phòng thật sự phù hợp với những bạn có nhu cầu du lịch nghỉ dưỡng, mình có thể nằm cả ngày trong phòng không cần bước chân ra ngoài mà vẫn cảm nhận được không khí và view biển. Mình sẽ quay lại thêm nhiều lần nữa!!!!

Căn hộ cực kỳ đẹp và sạch sẽ, mình và tụi bạn đã có những giây phút thư giãn khi ở đây. Chủ nhà cực kỳ thân thiện và luôn hỗ trợ tụi mình hết mình, nếu có dịp quay lại Vũng Tàu mình sẽ tiếp tục ủng hộ chị chủ

Nơi ở trung tâm, sach sẻ, đi lại dễ dàng.
Chú ý là thanh toán thêm phí ôto gởi ngày và đêm là 110.000 đồng... Chủ nhà phản hồi nhanh những yêu cầu. Nói chung là mọi thứ ok.

Phòng view đẹp , nhìn xuống hồ bơi , thành phố , xa xa thấy biển rất ok ạ . Ở đây qua hồ bơi em bé rất gần . Có máy giặt , bàn ủi đứng , nhiều móc phơi đồ rất tiện. Giá rẻ nữa . Bạn chủ nhà rep rất nhanh luôn . M cảm ơn b nhiều . Sẽ quay lại lần sau ạ ❤️

We had a fantastic time at this Airbnb. The apartment was modern and spotlessly clean, and we especially loved the beautiful balcony. As the host helpfully pointed out, the elevator can be a bit slow during peak times, but their proactive communication and tips on when to avoid the rush made it a non-issue. We would definitely recommend this place for a great stay in Vung Tau.
Thân thiện. Nhanh chóng
Spotless room with a spacious balcony offering a stunning view. The host is exceptionally welcoming, and the location is a major advantage. We enjoyed a wonderfully stay here.
Phuong was an excellent host. Super responsive and polite. The location is just a shot walk to the beach and the accommodations were just what we needed. We enjoyed our stay.
Second time staying at Phuong’s apartment. Everything was great. Recommended for a clean, quiet stay :)

We viewed several apartments at The Song and this one stood out as the best by far. It was cozy, clean, and well cared for. If you have a mold allergy, we recommend sticking to the lower floors like this one on the 9th floor, everything above 12 seemed hit or miss. This one felt much better than others we saw.
The balcony was a highlight, our favorite spot to unwind at night, with a nice table and chairs for relaxing and morning coffee. Also perfect for working. Laundry was clean and there’s a large drying rack on the balcony which came in very handy.
Supermarket in walking distance. Cafe right in the courtyard. Motorbike rental was super easy, and the building has great amenities. The elevator wait wasn’t bad at all, never more than five minutes. Overall, a solid stay with good vibes and practical comforts.

Clean cozy modern studio within a big apartment building. Great host (responsive, local recommendations). Walkable to shops and restaurants. Guards are present at the front entrance providing extra security for guests and residents. Good stay for me.

The apartment itself is very nice and the check in process was very easy. The Netflix on the TV was much appreciated also.
Unfortunately the room did have a strong durian smell which was off-putting and the lifts took quite a long time so bear in mind if you book a taxi. The beach nearby was shut which we did not know so visited the rooftop pool but there was no beds to lounge apart from in the pool itself and half of the lounge area was closed which was disappointing.
10d k có nhưng😍😍😍
Phuong Nguyen was responsive, helpful in providing info & answering questions. Nice location for accessing the beautiful Back Beach of the town. I recommend the host and the unit.
굿
rất recommended
Phuong is one of the most accomodating host I had. The place was beautiful with the overlooking view of the city and the coastline.

Tôi vừa mới trải nghiệm một kỳ nghỉ tuyệt vời tại căn studio này với một trải nghiệm tuyệt vời!
Đầu tiên và quan trọng nhất, căn phòng rất sạch sẽ và gọn gàng khi tôi bước vào. Điều này thực sự làm cho tôi cảm thấy thoải mái và hài lòng ngay từ đầu.
View ban công nhìn rất thoáng, có thể nhìn ra biển, khá rộng. Tôi không thể tin nổi rằng mình có thể tận hưởng một khung cảnh như vậy từ một căn studio. Không gian thoáng đãng này đã tạo ra một bầu không khí yên bình và thư giãn cho kỳ nghỉ của tôi.
Mặc dù cách âm ở hành lang có vẻ chưa tốt lắm, nhưng nhìn chung, không gian bên trong căn phòng vẫn cảm giác rất tĩnh lặng và thoải mái. Âm thanh bên ngoài không ảnh hưởng nhiều đến trải nghiệm của tôi.
Tôi cũng muốn khen ngợi chủ nhà vì sự chu đáo và thân thiện của họ. Họ đã cung cấp mọi thông tin cần thiết cho tôi và luôn sẵn sàng giúp đỡ trong suốt thời gian lưu trú của tôi.
很不错，原本只订了一晚，因为环境很不错，又多住了一晚
good place to stay! would come again.
good
We loved our time here! Great location, amazing amenities. The only thing that was a minus in our books was the time it took for the elevators to come, but other than that we loved our time here!
很棒
Great deal. Beautiful, secure & private.  Less than 10 min walk to the beach. Great host. Very responsive. Clean, pretty space.
Sparkling clean apartment with breathtaking sea views in Vung Tau. Highly recommended for a perfect coastal getaway.
저렴한 가격에 아주좋은 여행이 되었습니다

Căn hộ sáng sủa, thoáng mát, đầy đủ tiện nghi, view nhìn ra vòng xoay và hướng biển. Khu vực yên tĩnh và có siêu thị tiện lợi dưới chung cư. Host trả lời tin nhắn nhanh, hướng dẫn check in chi tiết, và có hỗ trợ thuê xe máy. Tuy nhiên do căn hộ nằm trên tầng 34 nên đợi thang máy lâu vào giờ cao điểm. Một số vị trí như quạt hay đèn có bụi bám và chưa được vệ sinh kĩ.
chúng tôi đã có trải nghiệm rất tuyệt vời ở đây, view đỉnh, tiện ích đầy đủ, sạch sẽ.

인테리어는 화초를 제외하고 사진과 동일합니다
여기까지는 평범한데 이 아파트 특성을 잘 이해하시면 아주 매력적인 공간이라는 것을 아시게 됩니다
우선 34층에 오션 시내 뷰이고, 34층이라 불편한 엘레베이터을 이용하지 않고 계단으로 바로 36층 짐과 수영장을 이용할수 있습니다
몇몇곳은 짐을 이용못하는데 이곳은 호스트가 직접 등록해줘서 있는 동안 편안히 사용했습니다
그리고 무료주차되눈 오토바이도 대여해 줘서 머무는 동안 더욱 편안했습니다
무엇보다 호스트가 적극적이고 행동으로 답변해줍니다 무슨 요청이든 다 들어주며 하루안에 해결됩니다
추천합니다
Chủ nhà dễ mến, phòng giống ảnh và rất xinh. Sẽ trở lại nếu có đến lần sau

wow, just wow, Kim is such a beautiful lady, she has bike rental service too, so so responsive, will reply to you within a few minutes, sometimes then and there, she will provide her phn number, and always have an assistant for emergency service. I am lucky and thankful to Kim, I will recommend this stay, if you are having this fl 34 means you are lucky. Kim you will have a lot of guests by my recommendation, Whenever I entered into Kim's accommodation, my girl was damn happy, i understand within a glance after seeing her joy that its one of the most beautiful place. such a nice stay Kim. I am sorry Kim, i couldn't wash one 🥣, and my time was so short that i couldn't wipe your full appartment. 😊

First time in Vung Tau and really enjoyed this seaside town. The condo was perfect with an incredible view, better than average shower, and lots of space. Enjoyed the Netflix and deck equally. Kim helped us rent a good motorcycle which we used to see all the interesting angles of VT. 6am ride to the beach and early pho breakfast, as well as the full coastal ride around the city, was the highlight.

The large space was great to have with 2 people sharing it, making it comfortable.
The location was excellent for the beach, convenience store, restaurants, scooter rental and general walking around.
The gym and pool were super to have right in the building, making the stay nice and the place to come back if ever in the area.

Kim waited to greet me downstairs when I arrived as my taxi was late due to traffic from Saigon.
she's a wonderful host and the apartment is amazing.
I can't say enough about how beautiful the view was. this is exactly what I needed for a great holiday.
I will definitely come back here and if I'm lucky I'll get to book this apartment again. I highly recommend this apartment if you want a nice place with a beautiful view
Sạch sẽ, thoải mái, view rất đẹp

Mình và bạn đã có trải nghiệm tốt tại đây. Bạn chủ rất nhanh chóng trong việc phản hồi những thắc mắc, câu hỏi của mình và linh hoạt hỗ trợ mình check in sớm.
Căn hộ tầng cao view rất đẹp, sạch sẽ thoáng mát, chủ nhà thân thiện, mình sẽ còn quay lại
Phòng sạch sẽ, cung cấp đầy đủ tiện nghi, trang trí siêu xinh, chủ nhà thân thiện & phản hồi nhanh chóng. Highly recommend 👌🫶🏻
just perfect
Great view. I definitely come back.
It's was good and pleasant stay.

I recently had the pleasure of staying in one of Kim Phuongs apartments here at The Sóng Luxury Apartment in Vũng Tàu, and it was an unforgettable experience. Kim Phuong was exceptionally helpful, providing invaluable local tips that enriched my visit. Her responsiveness to my communications ensured a seamless and stress-free stay.
The apartment itself boasts a unique vantage point for photography enthusiasts, the balcony overlooks Vũng Tàu Martyrs' Memorial as well as offering breathtaking sunset views that are quintessentially Vietnamese.
The location is incredibly convenient, situated just 200 meters from the sea and in close proximity to Lottemart (supermarket). The Sóng complex offered an array of complimentary amenities, including a children's play area, ping pong tables, a rooftop BBQ area, a beautiufl infinity pool, a meeting room, a gym, a yoga room, and a sauna.
Being centrally located, the apartment provides easy access to Vũng Tàu's main attractions.
Kim’s location was nice and the place is very spacious with a gorgeous view. Perfect for 2 of us for a quick trip to Vung Tau.

nous avons passé un bon séjour sauf qu il faut parfois attendre l ascenseur très longtemps.
merci
체크인에 대한 안내가 정확했고 좋은 숙박이었습니다. 감사합니다.
位置很好，也是最高的公寓，旁边有个乐天超市很方便，就是房间卫生需要再干净一点

trải nghiệm tuyệt vời không có gì để chê ngoại trừ việc khoá phòng trong khó mở và check in hơi rối. Phòng sạch sẽ, đầy đủ tiện nghi, đẹp, yên tĩnh, vị trí thuận lợi, có thể ngồi trên mai nhà và ban công rất bing chillin.

Mình dành 2 ngày 2 đêm tại đây và được Đan cùng Miên chào đón nhiệt tình. Mọi phòng đều ấm áp dễ chịu, nội thất đẹp và đầy đủ đến từng chi tiết.
Có 2 điểm nổi bật ở đây là chiếc ban công đầy nắng gió quá đẹp, mình cứ muốn ngồi mãi đó thui. Điểm thứ 2 là ở tầng 1 là spa của cô chủ, khách ở home được giảm 20% các dịch vụ cơ bàn, mình dùng gói massage cổ vai gáy thấy rất thích. Mn nên hỏi Đan và Miên chỗ đi ăn đi chơi vì mn sẽ chỉ những địa điểm vừa dễ thương, k đông đúc mà chất lượng.
Mong sẽ có ngày quay lại ở đây dài hơn 🤎

Máy chiếu khó sử dụng, mình nên có phần thông tin hướng dẫn khách.
Nội thất khá ổn, nếu tốt hơn bạn có thể thiết kế phần bếp (trong phòng khách) hướng ra cửa sổ.

Không gian tuyệt vời cho gia đình mình trải nghiệm tại Vũng Tàu. Tuy chỉ ở 1 đêm nhưng mình cảm nhận được cách các bạn quan tâm đến khách hàng qua những điều nhỏ nhặt từ những mẩu giấy nhỏ ở khắp nơi, hộp thuốc sơ cứu, bình nước lọc ở từng phòng. Gia đình mình rất hài lòng về trải nghiệm tại nơi ở.
Cám ơn các bạn đã góp phần làm cho chuyến đi của gia đình mình trở nên trọn vẹn.
Mong các bạn sẽ tiếp tục duy trì tinh thần này cho những khách hàng sau và chúc các bạn ngày càng đông khách.
home xinh, check in-out dễ dàng, linh động, thích hợp cho nhóm bạn hoặc gia đình đông thành viên
Comfortable stay, great host
Like a hidden pearl in the middle of Vung Tau, highly recommend for those who want to have a peaceful stay in a lovely space.

Kim Phuong là rất là tốt, cô ấy luôn trả lời tin nhắn rất nhanh, chính xác thông tin. Căn hộ đẹp hoàn hảo và tiện nghi. Nói chung mọi thứ đều xuất sắc.
Đặc biệt khi tôi quên đồ ở chỗ căn hộ, cô ấy nhắn lại và giúp đỡ tôi rất tận tình gửi lại.
Cảm ơn Kim Phương một lần nữa về điều này. 🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰😘🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰
Phòng sạch sẽ, có mùi dễ chịu. Chủ phòng take care khách tương đối tốt, trả lời nhanh. Tiện nghi nội khu oke, tiện ích trong phòng khá đầy đủ.
Căn hộ của Kim Phuong rất đáng để trải nghiệm, đầy đủ tiện nghi và sạch sẽ. Vợ chồng mình rất hài lòng với trải nghiệm dịch vụ lần này, nếu có dịp sẽ book lại. Cảm ơn rất nhiều

Định ở 1 đêm nhưng mà chỗ chị Phượng quá dễ thương nên ở liền 3 đêm. Chị host rất nhiệt tình, phòng sạch sẽ, đầy đủ tiện nghi. Di chuyển cũng thuận tiện và có cửa hàng tiện lợi ngay phía dưới. Sẽ còn quay lại

She’s a very reliable person. Kind, replying friendly, giving you a proper instruction when it’s needed etc. The room is clean and location is really great, it’s easy to access to convenience store which is located G floor the building. I hope that I could back there soon.

Very nice apartment which is close to the back beach and you could see the ocean. The apartment is clean and has all you need. Amazing rooftop pool and convenient location. Song is a great host who responded fast, always patient with my questions and communicated well. Thank you!
chị chủ nhà tư vấn rất nhiệt tình. Thật thú vị khi tự check in như đang chơi escape game 🤣🤣
giá rẻ phòng rộng sạch sẽ đầy đủ tiện nghi có view thành phố & núi, hướng dẫn checkin đầy đủ rõ ràng 💯💯
Phòng rộng sạch sẽ thoáng mát ạ, chị chủ thân thiện dễ thương phản hồi nhanh, sẽ quay lại nếu có dịp á ❤️
tuyệt vời
Trải nghiệm ổn, chỉ bực một chút lúc thang máy đông phải chờ lâu

Kim Phuong has been extremely helpful. From meeting us before checking in to being able to respond right away.
We were a bit worried because of the reviews around the back beach with constructions, but THIS IS THE BEST (me coming from the Philippines with lots of beaches), a 5 min walk from her place, baby powder like sand, literally just me and my husband in the beach.
Lotte Mall is just 4 mins walk from her place which makes all convenient. The balcony view is stunning any time of the day, where you can see the Vung Tau skyline and the sea.
When we go back to Vung Tau, we will stay at Kim's once again!

We had a great time at Kim’s place. The room was spacious, comfortable and clean. Nice view for sunset. Very nice pool. She was able to provide a bike so it was easy to get around. 3 minute ride to the beach. I highly recommend this place!

Die Unterkunft war wirklich schön. Leider war der 300 Meter entfernte Strand nicht nutzbar, es sei denn man fühlt sich zwischen Baggern, Lastwägen und Betonmischmaschinen wohl. Der Pool im 36 Stock ist sehr schön, konnte nur an einem ganzen Tag wegen Wartung nicht genutzt werden. Mit den Aufzügen gibt es manchmal lange Wartezeiten.
Dennoch Gesamtwertung: 4,5 von 5
素晴らしい部屋で落ち着いて滞在できました。コンビニやロッテマートが近くにあり、日常は何も困りません。飲食店は少ないですが、Grabを利用すれば問題ありませんでした。
Kim is a wonderful host that will help you with anything you ask from restaurants to local activities. The apartment is spacious with a fantastic view. You will not be disappointed.
thật sự là tuyệt vời

I like the location. It's near the back beach of Vung Tau. The place is exactly the photo with great views. It's a very comfortable place to stay. The bed was too firm for me but when I told Kim about it, she quickly have me a softer mattress topper which made it a lot better.
She's very accommodating and responsive. Great place to stay at. It's about 8 mins grab bike to the front beach of Vung Tau. Super close walking distance to Lotte Mart.
Great host and great place!
Great place
Easy and friendly, lovely host. Recommend :-)
Kitchen is a bit smelly, other than that its a  comfortable and relaxing room, the view is a nice touch
Chỗ ở ổn, nhưng phí gửi xe máy ở tầng hầm khá cao 20-30k/ngày. Ngoài ra lượng khách checkin đông chờ rất lâu.
Vị trí tốt, tiện lợi, sạch sẽ. Thang máy chờ hơi lâu

This was a great place to stay for the location and cleanliness! The host was also amazing and very responsive! The only down side was there were only two lifts and the whole apartment block using them so getting up and down took a long time and a lot of the time you couldn’t fit in the lift at all

The property is nice. The price was great aswell. We initially only had listed 2 guests but I had a 3rd guest come join us. In the beginning the host wanted to charge a fee, but once I changed the reservation to 3 in the app, the price stayed the same. Theres 2 seperate rooms, with big beds. You can expect atleast 3-4 people to be able to stay.
The sauna was closed. The gym required you to sign up. The host did not mention anything regarding this. The security told me that I had to sign up to use the gym, so I felt somewhat intrusive when I was there. Luckily the security guard told me it’s okay. But i still felt weird being there. If I was told this information prior it would have been very helpful to avoid a awkward situation.
The elevator is unfortunately terrible. How can a property have so many people but such a lack of elevators… its unfortunate. It can take you 5-10 minutes to go down or up. Theres always a lineup aswell.

Angenehme Kommunikation mit dem Besitzer. Die Wohnung war sauber und entsprach der Beschreibung. Das einzige, was Zeit gekostet hat, war das Warten auf den Aufzug, dafür sollte man stets etwas Zeit einplanen.

I had a wonderful experience at the Song Apartment with this service provider. The apartment was clean, well-maintained, and provided all the necessary amenities for a comfortable stay. The service was exceptional, with friendly and responsive staff always ready to assist. I would highly recommend this place to anyone looking for a quality stay.
Tôi đã có một trải nghiệm tuyệt vời tại căn hộ Song với nhà cung cấp dịch vụ này. Căn hộ sạch sẽ, được bảo trì tốt và cung cấp đầy đủ tiện nghi cần thiết cho một kỳ nghỉ thoải mái. Dịch vụ ở đây rất xuất sắc, với đội ngũ nhân viên thân thiện và luôn sẵn sàng hỗ trợ. Tôi rất khuyến khích mọi người đến đây nếu đang tìm kiếm một nơi nghỉ dưỡng chất lượng.
장점이 많은 아파트. 편안한휴식을 준다
nice place to stay with full modern facilities and the responsibility rapidly
Thế staff are friendly, welcoming, and always smile when greeting guests.
Five stars for all services
The room was clean, and the staff was friendly.
It’s a great place!

Nơi ở dễ dàng đi lại và thuận tiện.
Lần sau đi sẽ quay lại.
Chỗ ở rất sạch sẽ và mới, mọi thứ đều tuyệt vời, có cả bếp và gia vị chị chủ chuẩn bị cho lun ạ, có chìa khoá thang cuốn ra vào thoải mái, có bé corgi cưng xỉu. Chắc chắn sẽ quay lại

Phòng ở sạch sẽ đẹp hơn trên hình, nhà có cửa cuốn có thể ra vào thoải mái và cảm giác rất an toàn. Anh chị chủ nhà thân thiện và rất dễ chịu, những thắc mắc của mình đều được phản hồi rất nhanh. Dưới nhà còn có bé Corgi cực ngoan rất hiếu khách 😆. Rất đáng tiền, chắc chắn mình sẽ quay lại.
Phòng rất sạch sẽ và thoáng, y như hình chụp. Mình đến checkin muộn nhưng chị chủ cũng vẫn nhiệt tình. nhà có em chó corgi dễ thương
Chỗ ở đẹp gần biển, phòng sạch đẹp view thoáng, anh chị chủ tốt tính, dễ thương hỗ trợ rất nhiệt tình 100/10 🥰
Chỗ ở mới, sạch sẽ, gọn gàng như ở nhà. Hãy lựa chọn khi đến Vũng tàu nhé.
Tuyệt
Nice host nice stay

Lần thứ 3 gia đình mình chọn ở đây vì luôn hài lòng với căn hộ và những hướng dẫn rõ ràng từ chủ nhà. Phòng khách có view biển đẹp, nội thất và tiện nghi đầy đủ khiến mình thoải mái như ở nhà. Đi bộ từ căn hộ ra biển chỉ 200m rất tuyệt vời.

CĂN HỘ TUYỆT VỜI
Gia đình tôi đã có những khoảng thời gian thoải mái ở đây với view hướng biển rất đẹp, căn hộ sạch sẽ ngăn nắp, xung quanh văn minh, xuống biển chơi rất tiện.
căn nhà rất đẹp, tuy đôi lúc host trả lời hơi chậm nhưng hỗ trợ nhiệt tình, rcm mọi người căn hộ này để có trải nghiệm tốt nha

Phòng sạch sẽ, thoáng mát, vượt kì vọng của mình. Sẽ quay lại lần sau nếu có cơ hội.
Host hướng dẫn tận tình, dễ thương
căn hộ rộng rãi và thoáng nhất mình từng ở tại CSJ, sẽ quay lại nhiều lần nữa. Nếu có thêm lò vi sóng sẽ rất tuyệt
Dịch vụ xứng đáng với số tiền bỏ ra
Phòng ốc sạch sẽ , gần biển

This is a very beautiful, quiet, and luxurious apartment at a reasonable price. It offers a rare coastal view in Vung Tau, with a balcony that provides a distant view of the Christ statue. The bedroom is relatively private and also offers a view of the city.
The room is very clean, the furniture is beautiful, and everything is just perfect.
One thing to note is that the hot water requires turning on the electrical switch on the wall.
Cảm ơn chị Giang, em Vy vẫn luôn giúp đỡ nhiệt tình, nhà mình mỗi lần có dịp đi Vũng Tàu đều thấy thật thoải mái như ở nhà!
nhẹ nhàng
Phòng và cảnh view giống hệt trong ảnh, tuyệt vời, cảm ơn bạn Vy hỗ trợ nhiệt tình
Cảm ơn Vy đã giúp đỡ tận tình, căn hộ vẫn luôn là lựa chọn đầu tiên của gia đình mình!
附近就是海滩，乐天超市，房间很新很干净，沟通也很丝滑，所以多住了一天，愉快！
Breathtaking view, spotless stay, and Giang’s warm hospitality made everything perfect. Highly recommend!
Wonderful stay, even it rained throughout the whole trip. Vy was a superhost, responsive and helpful. I'd love to come back next time.

Ok space, resident apartment next to us had a lot of kids that were quite noisy at times. Spacious, has everything if you’d want to cook. Bed is very hard but tolerable for a few nights. Place could have been cleaner- hair on the floor, wash cloths that had already been used and left in kitchen. Host was very responsive and provided more towels. Overall location didn’t have much to do as the local beach is under construction. We rented a scooter and spent most of our time by Front Beach. It would have been helpful to know local beach is accessible but limited. Also a lot of trash on the beach. Not a reflection of this unit, but not the place to walk on the beach.
Phòng rộng, đẹp, phòng ngủ thơm tho sạch sẽ 🥰

The location of this property is very good, with excellent views. You can see the beautiful sea view and the combination of the city through the balcony of the living room. The room layout is reasonable, and all basic living necessities are complete. It is a high-quality Airbnb property in Vung Tau.
Phòng rộng, sạch và có view biển cực đẹp ạ ❤️
Lần thứ 2 mình ở nhà của Giang. Mọi thứ vẫn tuyệt vời.
Nhiệt tình, dễ thương, hỗ trợ nhanh
Nice place and very close to the beach. Supportive and responsive host.

We really enjoyed our time. It’s very close to the beach and just 3 minutes on foot to the next convenience store.
We recommend getting a scooter, there is a very good rental just 10 minutes from there.
The space was very clean and we felt comfortable.
Giang is quick to respond and supportive.
Only notable downsides were a lot of construction sites next to the building and the beds are quite hard.
But all in all we recommend this place and loved our time kite surfing at the beaches there!

Căn hộ tuyệt vời, có thể tận hưởng cả ngày nghỉ ngơi mà không cần ra ngoài.
Vị trí và view 10/10.
Xứng đáng với giá thuê.
Đặc biệt mình rất thích self-checkin của host.
Sẽ quay lại trong dịp tới. Xin cảm ơn!
Phòng giống hình, sạch sẽ, yên tĩnh, địa điểm rất thuận lợi! 🥰 Chị host rất nhiệt tình hỗ trợ 👍 Có dịp sẽ ghé lại !
Phòng ốc sạch, phản hồi nhanh.

Nice, quiet, and very clean home in a residential neighborhood full of shops, cafes, and restaurants. Only a few minute walk to the popular fish market (chợ cá Xóm Lưới), walk a few minutes more and you're in front beach (bãi trước) where the locals hang out in the big pretty park, perfect for an early morning or late afternoon walk. Great location and so is the host Cherry, very easy going and very accommodating, check-in and check-out was a breeze. Will stay here when I'm in this seaside town again. Highly recommended!

Jeg bode der i 3 uke. Stede er rent å pent. Det er veldig sentralt, med gode restauranter og nær strand. Mennesker rundt er vennlige. Cherry er tilgjengelig 24,7.
cherry har design huset fint og gode møbler.
Jeg følte meg rett og slett hjemme.
It’s been great staying at Cherry’s place, she is very friendly And helpful specifically with activities to do in Vung Tau. Very  responsive.
房子处于一个动静结合的地段，住得舒服，外出方便，去海边近，楼下周边很多吃的店！也很近市场！
房东很热情很有礼貌。房子很干净。下次来还住这里
Nice place to try
Very welcoming host easy to communicate

We decided to go on a spontatnuous one day trip to Vung Tau and found Chau's place listed. We reached out and she was prompt to reply and accept, which was very helpful for us coming on the same day. Chau was responsive and helpful, the place was perfect for our purpose, all in all a great experience. Can recommend and will come back, thanks Chau :)

如果你正在看頭頓的房間，我非常推薦您入住這個房間。
房東Chau非常友善熱情的接待我們，房間十分漂亮乾淨舒適，露台的視野也非常棒。物超所值！

The apartment itself is great - clean, comfortable, and those views are amazing. Having a playground and mini water park right in the building was a real blessing with a 5 year old. My little one had an absolute ball splashing around while we could actually relax for a change. Perfect setup for families - highly recommend if you're heading to Vung Tau with kids.​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​

A nice clean apartment in Bải Sau . It is so near the beach so we walked to the beach every morning.
The elevator can be a chaos during peak hours

I stayed here with 2 of my friends and it worked out really well. The second bedroom has the bed on the floor but it is still good and has space for you to put things. There are some places to eat around the condotel, with a GS25. Hotpot next to GS25 isn't that good though. All in all the experience was great and the amenities provided were really good and we felt welcomed by Chau 👍
Căn hộ rất sạch sẽ, chăn drap tốt. Chủ nhà set up rất chỉn chu. Căn hộ khá gần biển. Bạn có thể đi bộ ra biển. Tôi đã có trải nghiệm cực kỳ tuyệt vời ở đây. Chắc chắn sẽ trở lại.

Nous avons passé un excellent séjour en famille avec notre jeune enfant.
Le logement, moderne et impeccable, est très agréable et bien situé : la plage est accessible à pied, ce qui est très pratique avec un enfant en bas âge. L’hôte a été disponible et réactif, répondant rapidement à nos besoins.
Le quartier est animé, avec un centre commercial tout proche et de très bons restaurants à proximité.
Quelques points à noter : l’attente pour l’ascenseur peut être longue aux heures de pointe, notamment entre midi et 14h. La piscine au 36e étage, bien que magnifique, est réservée aux personnes mesurant au moins 1m40, ce qui nous a empêchés d’en profiter tous ensemble. Une piscine pour enfants est disponible au 5e étage, mais l’eau ne semblait pas très propre lors de notre passage.
Malgré cela, je recommande vivement ce logement pour son confort, sa localisation et la qualité de l’accueil.
Nous reviendrons avec grand plaisir en famille.
Everything seems to be good. only downside is the lift go to the apartment and pool, always crowded and takes long 😅😅
Amazing stay, I’ll be back
Nice host, comfortable place.
the flat is nice with great view to Vung Tau city and beach. Madame Chau is very nice and friendly. we will come back again.
Amazing place and a very kind host. The only problem was the elevator traffic, very weird system and took too long. The place was clean and everything else was perfect.
Chị Châu rất thân thiện và tử tế. Tôi cảm thấy rất thoải mái. Bản thân tôi có yêu cầu cao về vệ sinh sạch sẽ, thì ở đây đáp ứng được. Tôi rất hài lòng.
Phòng sạch sẽ như ảnh và chị chủ siêu nhiệt tình, nếu có dịp vẫn muốn quay lại 😝😜
Je recommande le logement de Chau à 100%. L’appartement est très agréable, vue magnifique, très propre, fonctionnel. Nous sommes très satisfaits.
이번여행은 숙소때문에 아주 만족스러웠다. 재방문의사 100% 입니다

Mrs. Chau's room is clean and very spacious. I stayed there with my family for 3 days. The room has 2 bedrooms with air conditioning. Mrs. Chau, as a host, is superb. She took great care of us, organizing the ride from Saigon airport to her place, as well as arranging the return trip to Saigon. I highly recommend Mrs. Chau!

Staying at this Airbnb was an absolute dream! The sea view was breathtaking—perfect for my mornings and sunsets. The apartment itself was incredibly comfortable, making it easy to relax and feel at home. Above all, the host was friendly and attentive, going the extra mile to ensure we had a memorable stay. I highly recommend this place to anyone looking for a blend of comfort, beauty, and warm hospitality.
Chau var nem at kommunikere med, og lejligheden var perfekt til vores behov.
편안하게 쉴 수 있는 곳이었습니다.
Awesome place. Super clean. Very comfy. Smart tv

Chau is the perfect guest,  if I had the option to give her 100 plus star's. I would have. I had a problem arranging tickets online and I couldn't get hold of the ferry by phone, so i messaged Chau.  She booked the tickets online and we payed through our Airbnb. that made us very grateful.  The best host ever.  Thanks  Chau and your husband.

The place is extraordinary, we planned a lot of things but then spent our time at the apartment. Because of the room is too good and facilities there such as the pool and the gym are available, we have a great leisure time there
good
Căn hộ rất sạch sẽ. View thoáng. Các tiện ích như hồ bơi trẻ em, khu vui chơi vô cùng hữu ích cho các bé nhỏ. Chủ nhà nhiệt tình, hỗ trợ ngay khi khách cần
Rất tuyệt vời vì tôi tìm được chỗ nghĩ ưng ý

Căn hộ rộng rãi, sạch sẽ và tiện nghi. Mọi thiết bị đều hoạt động tốt nên mình có thời gian lưu trú rata thoải mái. Chị Phụng luôn phản hồi rất nhanh với mọi thắc mắc của mình nên mình cảm giác rất dễ dàng và trôi chảy. Nếu quay lại Vũng Tàu mình sẽ tiếp tục chọn căn hộ xinh xắn này
Chủ nhàn thân thiện, chổ ở thoáng mát và thông thoáng, mình để quên đồ chị nhà nhiệt tình gửi bưu điện lại dùm mình! Cám ơn chủ nhà nhiều 🍀🍀🍀

Căn hộ sạch sẽ ,có view rất đẹp, đặt biệt là hoàng hôn ngoạn mục.
Có thể nhìn thấy toàn cảnh thành phố, núi, hồ và biển ở phía xa.
Vị trí trung tâm, có thể đi bộ ra biển, siêu thị lớn ở gần.
Mọi thứ thật tuyệt vời với giá rẻ.
Sẽ quay lại.
Chủ nhà rất dễ thương và nhiệt tình phản hồi, hỗ trợ cho khách, phòng rất sạch và view đẹp. Sẽ ủng hộ tiếp khi đến vũng tàu. Cảm ơn chị chủ nhà.

Sau khi ở căn hộ của Phuong, tôi đã giới thiệu và đặt cho bạn của mình.
Mọi người đều hài lòng.
Căn hộ 10/10 host 10/10

The Song Apartments are serviced individually from many different agents. So, all depends on the agent and how the apartments are kept. I booked apartment 26.39 with Kim for 4 nights and I really enjoyed the stay. I can recommend her. Here are my highlights:
+ Good service
+ Clean
+ Apartment is like fotos in Airbnb
+ Restaurants and mini market in walking distance
+ Close to the beach
+ Scooter rental, 150k/day
+ Nice swimming pool
- Walls are thin and you can hear neighbours, overall noisy complex
- Mold in the bathroom
Căn hộ đẹp , tiện nghi, view biển núi thật đẹp. Chúng tôi sẽ qoay lại.

I really wish we didn’t have to leave! What a great location, apartment, view of the city and host. We stayed for several weeks and worked remotely, wifi is supreme, amenities were amazing, be sure to check out the pool and sauna. Looking forward to visiting again.

Great location. Perfect view, especially at sunset. Kim is very responsive. The bed is a little firm but the space is great for the price. The apartment is close to the beach and a grocery store. Pool and gym are quite a bit smaller than the pictures would suggest. The beachfront is under construction at the moment but there is access to the water. Early morning runs along the beach were the highlight for me. It's worth a trip by ferry if you're looking to get out of Saigon for a few days. Food selection is a bit limited but weather is great (cool in the morning and night).
我來自臺灣。這是我旅遊這麼多地方, 最棒的Airbnb. 你想得到的需求, 在這間我都給予極大的評價。尤其照片跟現場一摸一樣…我可能會為了他, 再次來頭頓放假😍
Minh rất thich noi nay
뷰하나만으로도 끝장나는 방입니다. 모든것이 완벽했지만 방에서 빵이라도 한조각 먹으면 개미가 쫌 있습니다. 그것만 조심하면 완벽한 숙소입니다

Mein Aufenthalt war schön. Sehr hervorzuheben ist die gute Kommunikation mit Kim. Bei Fragen oder Anmerkungen war sie stets freundlich und zuvorkommend. fussläufig ist alles in der Nähe. Das Zimmer ist schön hell, das Bett bequem die Bettwäsche sauber. Balkon mit Sonnenseite zum Sonnenuntergang, wirklich schön. Weit oben kann man alles sehen. Als mir eine Sache im Zimmer aufgefallen ist wurde sich umgehend gekümmert. Ich würde wiederkommen. Danke für die Zeit.
Good location. Clean apartment with views of city and beach. Nice rooftop pool and small gym to use. Responsive host
Great place to stay
Fantastic place to stay, clean and comfortable, definitely recommended to all!
너무나좋은숙소에서좋은시간보냈습니다
Nice place, just as advertised and a great stay.
Ổn

Nice appartment with great views on the beach. Unfortenately there are construction works going on at the beach. The appartment inside is nice, although I missed some small towels in the bathroom. And the bed is very low, you have to get used to it as a tall European person. Recommended for a short stay.

Very  nice apartment.  Great view, nicely decorated and close to the beach.  Every morning, I would look out at the beach and sit out on the balcony to drink coffee.  I am looking forward to returning to the apartment on my future visits.
Rất tốt
Rất tốt

We stayed at Hoan’s beautiful apartment and I must say it was amazing! The apartment itself was clean and so nice. Hoan was very quick to reply anytime I needed anything and even helped me set up a birthday gift for my partner which she was so happy about. Highly recommended for anybody going to Vung Tau!
Thank you Hoan 🙏

So glad that I chose this place. it has amazing view from the balcony.
Made my trip even better!
Nice place.  Good value.
this is by far the best place I've stayed at in Vietnam.
The perfect place to book in Vung Tau. Very clean, spacious and well furnished. Highly recommend it.

It’s a perfect place to stay.
The view is gorgeous!
Looks like heaven.
The apartment is clean, comfortable and modern.
The host is responsible and friendly.
I will definitely come back!
Thank you!!!
Really great place to stay, lovely view. There is a convenience store nearby that isnt on the map yet but its just up the road towards Lottemart
the location is good and convenient, center of the city. quite and romantic place for couple, especially the host is friendly and support very well
Highly recommended! Hoan is very helpful with everything. The sea view is such a stunned.
Nhà đẹp, sạch sẽ lắm luôn. Thực sự đi du lịch ở được 1 căn như thế này, cảm thấy mọi thứ đều xứng đáng.
Căn hộ mới, mang lại cảm giác thoải mái. Dụng cụ ăn uống cơ bản

Amazing place! Would definitely come back! Bed and sofa are so comfy I had a hard time keeping myself awake lol The TV,speaker and light projector are AMAZING! The 2 outdoor chairs on the balcony are a must during sunset time! Hoan is such a great and friendly host,thanks for everything! The only suggestion I have is the bathroom needs some sort of towel to step on after leaving the shower room.

The house isnt match the photos ,   host might have the similar houses with same decoration style in same building . But the house is good clean anc cozy . Host was supportive and always picked up guest phone call , thanks for the urgent help when we left the enter card inside the place . Five stars host
사진과 숙소가 일치하지 않습니다
nhà rất đẹpp, mát, view đẹp. 10/10

Tui với ông chồng trốn việc đi biển mà toàn ở trong căn hộ này thôi, tại vì phòng quá đẹp ko muốn đi ra ngoài luôn.
Phòng đẹp. View xịn. Anh chị chủ cũng rất dễ thương, mình tính book thêm 1 đêm mà full booking rồi. Lần sau có dịp chắc chắn sẽ quay lại.
was nice!!
Ok book di. Excellent <3
Tốt, chủ nhà thân thiện
Tuyệt vời
Home quá là xinh
Very good home with a very kind-hearted host
Mình chọn địa điểm này vì gần nơi bạn mình tổ chức đám cưới, đi lại rất tiện lợi, xung quanh nhiều hàng ăn ngon. Phòng nhỏ, sạch sẽ, giống hình, anh chị chủ giúp đỡ check in nhiệt tình.
Chị chủ nhà rất dễ thương, hướng dẫn chu đáo, không gian thoải mái, tiện nghi cho các khách muốn tìm một căn hộ rẻ và tiện lợi. Mình thích cửa ra vào của căn hộ rất tiện lợi so với ở chung cư.
Phòng ngủ nhỏ xinh rất hợp 2 vợ chồng. Nhà tắm rộng và sạch sẽ là điều mình cực kì ưng. Nhà dễ tìm, ko gian riêng tư, thoải mái. Chắc chắn mình sẽ quay lại!

Really nice place, very clean and really nice shared space. The location is nice and very local... You don't see many tourists in the area and it makes it more special, there is a mall nearby, plenty of cafeterías, local estaurantants and other stores. 20 minutes walking from the beach area... Really easy to move around. Everything was perfect! I would definitely stay again.

Đây là lần đầu mình tự đặt Airbnb nên cũng có nhiều thứ không biết nhưng đặt trúng được một chỗ ở mà mình chắc chắn sẽ quay lại. Phòng mình ở đáp ứng đúng những gì mình cần cho những chuyến đi đột xuất ngắn ngày. Cám ơn Lily nhé! Sẽ gặp lại nha!
Phòng giá khá hợp lý, cũng gần trung tâm tiện đi lại, yên tĩnh và có bếp

Nice place, nice host with the suitable price (the price of weekday is very cheap). Highly recommend for the couple or the medium family (you can block 6 rooms and use the shared space for the family party). Will come back when having the change back to Vung Tau.

This is a place that makes you feel at home. The kitchen was helpful and they also washed my clothes for me as well. This is a good place to come with friends as you explore the city. I think the wifi was about 60 Mbps.
Tôi rất thích được lưu trú ở đây khi đến VT
Overall, it was a good stay. The owner’s husband (I believe) was very supportive—he helped me find a motorbike to rent and regularly checked in to see if I needed any assistance.
The host is very nice and this is affordable place for those who are looking to explore local foods around. Its also close to central of Vungtau city. Highly recommend!
Chambre décorée avec gout et propre, espace commun agréable et propice aux rencontres.

Giường to 3 người ngủ được, phòng sạch sẽ giống ảnh, host giúp bọn mình thuê xe máy. Nhà không gần biển lắm sẽ cần đi xe máy tầm 3km mới đến biển.
Ở tầng dưới có cafe có thể ngồi chill
Phòng xinh, sạch sẽ. Chủ nhà dễ thương, nhiệt tình.
phòng rộng, sạch sẽ, thoáng mát, chủ dễ thương thân thiện🥰
Phòng sạch sẽ xinh đẹp, chủ nhà thân thiện
Chủ nhà tận tâm, dễ thương. Luôn luôn hỗ trợ khi cần
Căn nhà ngăn nắp , sạch sẽ  và đẹp

The apartment is located in the city center; near by bus station, the sea, coffee shop, and local delicious restaurants such as squid noodles soup Onggia Cali... The response by host is quickly. Rooms are clean with nice decoration!!!!
We will come back Lily House!!!

This place is so beautiful and clean. It looks exactly like the pictures they posted. The host was really nice and responded me almost immediately. I would recommend this place 100% to everyone that come to Vung Tau with their family. Hands down 5 stars for Lily’s apartment ⭐️
Friendly host couple, cute, clean, and modern rooms. Great communication.  Would definitely stay again.
Nice and clean. The house was fully-equipped, we love the decoration so much!!! Looking forward to be back to this place soon :)
The house is clean, nice and full eqquipped. It is located in the center of Vung Tau. The host is nice and helpful. We will sure be back if we travel to VT.
I enjoyed this apartment room so much., because of its convenience and owner’s hospitality.
Nếu như có thể được quay lại vũng tàu nhất định tôi sẽ chọn căn này để đc tận hưởng ngắm cảnh hoàng hôn.

If you’re in Vùng Tấu, this is one of the better places to stay in because you get a panoramic view of the ocean when in the house. Apartment was clean and check in was simple and straightforward. No regrets staying here! Highly recommended!

The apartment has beautiful ocean views and is very well laid out and spacious. If you are a westerner and like to cook at home, the cooking utensils were not well stocked. But as you are across the road from high quality seafood restaurants and a few minutes drive from District 1 it might not be an issue. Noise at night was minimal. Sunset drinks on the large balcony were relaxing and a big plus.
整體評價80/100，整個公寓海景非常漂亮，3間房間，其中一間的床沒有拆塑膠套子，比較難睡，以及廁所的門不好開關，除此之外一切非常完美
The host is good, the location good..the house is perfect I do like it

I had a great stay at this apartment in Vũng Tàu. The place was exactly as shown in the photos clean, stylish, and comfortable. The balcony setup was a highlight, perfect for relaxing with a coffee or reading a book. The location is convenient, and everything I needed was nearby. Xuan Tho was a great host friendly, responsive, and made check in smooth. I’d definitely recommend this place to anyone visiting Vũng Tàu and would stay here again without hesitation

Good place to stay. Trust me, it's even much better and bigger than in the photos. Feel like the host didn't post many pics about the stay but it came out so great in real. Clean and well-furnished, I was surprised. Host is friendly and responsive. Cheap price even on the high peak holiday. Definitely come back!

숙소 사진이 많이 없고 리뷰도 없어서 처음에 걱정했었는데. 숙소를 봤는데 깨끗하고 호스트도 친절해서 너무 편안히 묵었습니다.
다음에 붕따우를 방문한다면 재방문의사 100%입니다.

Sehr schöne moderne Wohnung. vollständig ausgestattet.
Der Gastgeber war sehr nett und hilfsbereit!
Ich bin mit meinem Aufenthalt in dieser Wohnung sehr zufrieden
Không gian đẹp sạch sẽ
Mình đã ở và rất ưng. Mình sẽ ghé lại lân 2

깨끗하고 관리가 완벽했습니다.
발코니도 넓고 침대도 좋았습니다.
롯데마트도 도보 3분이고 1층에는 GS25도 있어요.
지금껏 경험했던 에어비앤비 중 가장 만족스럽습니다.

Chỗ ở này thật hoàn hảo cho gia đình của chúng tôi — được bảo trì tốt, sạch sẽ, thoải mái và dễ quản lý. Chị Thanh Cẩm là một người chủ nhà tuyệt vời, chị đã hỗ trợ chúng tôi trong việc sắp xếp dịch vụ đưa đón và luôn phản hồi nhanh chóng trong suốt chuyến đi. Rất khuyến khích mọi người đặt chỗ này nếu có kế hoạch đến Vũng Tàu.
Cảm ơn anh chị đã hỗ trợ em và các bạn có một chuyến đi thật thú vị và thoải mái.
Lần sau đến VT chắc chắn mình sẽ ở đây. highly recommend ❤️
Villa sạch và đầy đủ tiện nghi,cũng rất gần biển

Thi Thanh Cam est une excellente hôte. Elle a été présente à chaque fois que nous l'avons sollicité. Elle est compréhensive et très correcte, c'est important. Elle fait de son mieux pour nous arranger et pour que nous passons un bon séjour. La Villa que nous avons louée était disponible à 14h le jour d'arrivée. Nous sommes arrivés vers 11h, elle nous a de suite proposé une autre Villa proche qui est encore plus belle. MERCI pour sa gentillesse. Dans la nuit nous avons été privé d'électricité à cause d'une grosse tempête et elle était présente au téléphone. Le quartier avait l'électricité coupé mais dès le lendemain elle est venue nous présenter ses excuses, bien qu'elle ne soit pas à l'origine de cette coupure. Merci pour sa délicatesse et son professionnalisme. Je ne manquerai pas de faire appel à elle lors de mon prochain séjour.
よかった！

the Sóng ngày càng hot nên lưu lượng dân du lịch và tần suất thuê khá lớn, các bạn nên lưu ý về thời gian chờ thang máy, dù tầng cao hay thấp đều có bất cập riêng.
Dù apt có bếp nhưng ăn ngoài vẫn là một option tốt vì dụng cụ ăn uống khá ít
Phòng cách âm tốt nhưng đừng nhậu nhẹt la lớn quá, cũng ảnh hưởng ng xung quanh
Để có city view chụp ảnh thì tầng 22 trở lên sẽ tốt hơn 1 chút, đỡ vướng nóc của căn DIC đối diện
hồ bơi không còn view trực diện ra biển như 2 năm trước vì có cao ốc đang xây chắn thẳng view ra biển
Kết luận:
- Phù hợp với tầm giá từ 1tr2-1tr4/đêm cho cuối tuần + yêu thích city view
- Không phù hợp với người thích view biển (lựa chọn Premier Pearl giá gấp đôi sẽ tốt hơn)
Phòng sạch sẽ, ở rất thoải mái. Chị host dễ thương, cực kì nhiệt tình khi hỗ trợ tụi mình.  Nói chung không có gì để chê, có dịp chắc chắn sẽ tiếp tục ở đây 🫶🏼

The apartment is perfect for both short and long-term stays. It looks exactly like the photos — clean and well maintained.
The location is excellent, close to Lotte Mart, great local food, and the beach. The facilities are also perfect and very comfortable.
Phuong is a wonderful host and provided clear, detailed instructions, making the check-in process seamless.
Highly recommended!
Very nice place! Convenient locating.  Super helpful host! It will be my go to place whenever I comeback here to this wonderful city!
The house wad very cleans with full views of city and beach! Specially the host was so helpful

I stayed in Vung Tau from November 19 to 22, and it was an amazing experience. The studio on the 21st floor offered a breathtaking view, making the stay even more enjoyable. The host was incredibly responsible, kind and honest, always ready to assist with any questions and provide support. The open balcony was a perfect spot to relax and take in the scenery. I’m very grateful for the host’s help throughout my stay, and I highly recommend this place!
Highly recommended - second time I've stayed there.
Nice place ! Love it
Nơi ở tốt đúng như mô tả!! Khuyên các bạn nên chọn

We really liked it here, the room was clean and exactly as in the photos, the equipment was also good. Cleaning is available twice a week and was really thorough every time. Beautiful view of the city and the sea. The owner was prompt and answered everything within a few minutes and solved everything. The pool was large and clean. We will definitely return to this accommodation.
Rất tốt sạch sẽ gọn gàng , view núi rât đẹp
Chị Phương hỗ trợ mình nhiệt tình, phòng được chuẩn bị kỹ trước khi mình nhận phòng, view đẹp phù hợp để ngấm hoàng hôn, sẽ quay trở lại khi ghé Vũng Tàu 🫰

There were a couple problems.
1. We booked this place for a longer stay of 20 days, and after the first night we decided to leave because of the uncleanliness. There was lots of mold in the bathroom and the kitchen vent, and it also smelled horrible. Every cabinet we opened had a different unsettling smell, as well as the entire hallway and every part of the building we passed.
2. This place is filled to the brim with children and is simply overcrowded. The pool was chaotic and loud, and the wait for the elevator was unnecessarily long. Also the people aren’t the nicest.
I’m not one to write bad reviews, but I felt that the advertisement for this place is misleading.
Host’s communication was great, and she was extremely nice and was very apologetic. I fortunately received a refund, but I will definitely never find myself in this city again.

Perfect spot to stay in Vung Tau. The room has city view with all necessary amenities, kitchennette included. Check-in instruction is clear and straight forward. Phuong is very friendly and responsive. Highly recommended!
Phòng nằm ở trên tầng cao thoáng mát với view thành phố và biển ban ngày hay đêm đều cực kỳ đẹp. Phòng sạch sẽ, gọn gàng và có đầy đủ đồ dùng cần thiết. Highly recommended!!!
clean comfortable friendly and helpful host i highly recommend!
Spacious with a beautiful view! Hopefully I comeback soon for longer stay
地理位置优越，房间干净整洁，以后还会再次入住
Kim是个优秀的房东，在住宿期间给了我很多帮助，及时回应，并允许我延迟一小时退房。房子干净整洁无异味，视野开阔。房间内如图片展示，真实无误。推荐！

말이 필요 없는 숙소입니다
임페리얼 2박후 1박하려고 예약했는데 위치며 시설이며 너무 좋아서 2박연장후 즐겁게 여행했습니다~~
다음에 꼭 다시 올 예정입니다
해변도 근처에있어 샌책하기 좋고 조용하니 편하게 쉴수 있었습니다. 근처에 롯데마트도 있어 쇼핑하기도 편했습니다
Great place, would stay again, thanks!
Kim was very responsive, the place itself was entirely worth the price
C’est probablement le plus bel appartement que j’ai eu sur AIBNB.  Je mettrais la note de 6 étoiles mais elle n’existe pas.

Host is responsive and very helpful!
Would stay here again and highly reccomend!

The apartment is very clean and  feels like home. It has good airconditioning, is well lighted and above all an amazing view. We were planned to stay just three days  in vung-tau but but we extended our stay because of this apartment and its utilities. Kim is a super host, she always replied and is very friendly. We would definitely come back again 🎉
非常好
Nice place with great pool and views
Really nice place to stay very central
Ким е прекрасен домакин и отзивчив човек. Пожелавам успехи и за в бъдеще.
Very clean and nice view
the view from the room is very beautiful at sunset. The owner of the room is very sophisticated when fully equipped with everything I need
Nơi ở rất thuận tiện di chuyển trong trung tâm thành phố, các điểm du lịch, và đi bộ 300m đến biển. Phòng sạch sẽ, có view biển rất đẹp, đồ đạc cơ bản đầy đủ. Lần tới mình sẽ ghé thăm.
Căn hộ đã mở máy lạnh đón chúng tôi khi mở cửa vào phòng , đầy đủ vật dụng cần thiết để sinh hoạt rất tiện lợi.

- Giường hơi nhỏ
- Tủ quần áo vướng sofa, khó khăn khi mở cửa
- Ổ cắm điện lỏng, sạc không ăn điện
- Máy giặt dơ
- Nên cung cấp thêm chăn cho khách nằm sofa

Kim Phuong always helpful and quick to respond.
Apartment as photos. Clean and tidy on arrival second time I have stayed there, next time I am in Vung Tau I will try to book again.
Absolutely beautiful view! Host was Shay’s quick to respond and flexible about meeting up with us (I changed the arrival time several times). Great accommodations and easy in and out.

The apartment is clean. It is fully equipped. This apartment complex is very well made. The view is spectacular. However, as much as I like it the amount of bnb guests made it quite noisy and busy. Kim is a nice host. She kept my bike at her house.
Chủ nhà nhiệt tình hướng dẫn rõ ràng, phòng sạch sẽ thoáng mát, trải nghiệm mọi thứ đều ok. Thanks
Trải nghiệm tốt, đúng với miêu tả trong hình. Chủ home thân thiện, nếu quay lại sẽ lựa chọn lần nữa

Отличный номер за свою цену!
Удобное расположение, классный вид с балкона, очень отзывчивая хозяйка, спасибо Kim Phuong!
В номере было относительно чисто, разве что пыльно на холодильнике, немного муравьев, но если спрятать еду, они не беспокоят.

Great view and good location.
The lifts up and down will require you to allow some extra time out of day.

두번째 이용입니다
모든게 완벽합니다
사람이 좀 많을때는 엘리베이터가 좀 불편하지만 문제가 되지 않아요~~
최고입니다

Kim’s place was great! Nice sized apartment with fully functioning kitchen. As well as an amazing view of Vung Tao. Lotte Mart is a 5 minute walk where you can buy groceries, clothes, and personal hygiene products which was very convenient during my stay.

全体的に良かったです。
予め到着時間を伝えていたのに、落ち合うのに30分待ちましたが、チェックインよりかなり早く入れてくれました。
部屋はシンプルで、とても眺めが良く、夕陽も綺麗。
場所もとても便利です。
ただ、トイレの洗面所に黄金虫みたいな虫がいたのと、使っていないダイニングテーブルに小さな蟻が沢山いました。
ベッドは弾力があって、快適でした。

Apartment as photos, clean and well presented. Met on arrival by Kim Phuong who took us to the apartment, she always responded to messages very quickly.
We will try to book with her again next time we visit Vung Tau.
Favorite host so far. We worked with her throughout the past few months and she's by far the most respectful host we had. We will continue to book with her in the future.

The place was wonderful and clean , convenient neighbourhood with super nice view on the balcony of the sea. You can also watch TV and relax in the comfortable sofa. Phuong was very responsive and friendly , I highly recommend this place to people visiting Vung Tau.

Mình có biết được 1 vài lời phàn nàn về dịch vụ tại The Sóng nên cũng có hơi đắn đo lúc đặt phòng nhưng có lẽ do đi vào ngày thường trong tuần nên hầu như mình không gặp khó khăn hay phải chờ đợi quá lâu khi di chuyển bằng thang máy. Chỉ có 1 điểm trừ về phía The Sóng là chỗ giữ xe có tính phí, và mức phí không rõ ràng lắm.
Khi nhận phòng thì phòng rất sạch sẽ, gọn gàng, có mùi thơm dễ chịu và bày trí giống với trên ảnh. Chủ nhà rất chu đáo khi chuẩn bị đủ các vật dụng cần thiết, bao gồm cả sữa tắm, dầu gội, nước rửa chén, nước giặt, 1 tủ khăn, chăn gối dự phòng, máy sấy, bàn là cầm tay v.v. Nhìn chung, không gian nhỏ gọn, ấm cúng, phù hợp cho cặp đôi hoặc gia đình, nhóm bạn nhỏ. Chủ nhà cũng đã rất nhiệt tình khi hỗ trợ mình checkout trễ 1 tiếng không tính phí và luôn phản hồi nhanh chóng mỗi khi mình cần trợ giúp. View phòng thực tế không quá gần biển và núi mà phần nhiều là thành phố nhưng vẫn có thể ngắm được hoàng hôn (nhưng tia nắng sẽ rất chói nhen).
덕분에 업무 잘 마치고 복귀 합니다
Very good stay , very friendly host.
Responsive host, proactive and friendly. Resolves issues rapidly. Extended our stay. Highly recommended.
Ok
너무좋았어요!!! 깔끔하고 뷰도좋고 또방문하고싶어요
Chúng tôi là người HQ. Căn hộ này sạch sẽ và im lặng nhé và có cạnh đẹp.
Chủ nhà nhiệt tình hướng dẫn. Phòng ở sạch sẽ, ngăn nắp, gọn gàng.Nơi ở hiện đại, đầy đủ tiện nghi
Chủ nhà thân thiện. Phòng ốc sạch, đồ dùng đủ. Sẽ ghé thăm lần sau.

Phòng có view biển đẹp, tiếc là bị chắn 1 chút bởi công trường phía trước
Phòng sạch sẽ
Chủ nhà thân thiện, nhiệt tình.
Bọn mình đi thứ 6 nên không gặp phải vấn đề về chờ thang máy hay hồ bơi đông.
It was a very pleasant stay at Hoa's place. The apartment was very clean with beautiful view from the balcony . Hoa was a great host. She responded quickly to my questions. Thank you again Hoa.

I had a wonderful stay. the host is very nice and responsive. The place has good view of the partial oceans' view. for the price that I pay, that was a good view. If you want to have by full view of the emotions, you have to pay additional fifty percent more. Also, the 2nd room is not sealed, it has an opening so that you can share the air conditioning from the master bedroom.  so if you talk the other person in that room can hear you.  But it is not a big deal. for the price that you pay, that's very cheap for 2 room. i would come again

Had a lovely few days and this Airbnb is perfect for exploring the area. Good facilities in the building (although the pool is closed on a Tuesday) and has everything we could want. A great stay and would recommend

A very comfortable apartment a few minutes walk to the beach. Very comfortable beds and furniture. There is a very large supermarket and department store 5 minutes walk up the street and a huge beach 5 minutes walk down the street. The area has many restaurants, both large or small local places.
The shower was hot with excellent pressure, wifi was good, kitchen was well stocked and even had some food and spices. The host responded very quickly to questions.
I would definitely return.

Hoa was a fantastically responsive host - very quick and helpful on messages and met us for check in. The flat decor and view was a little different to pictures which confused us, though the flat was comfortable for our short stay. The amenities in the complex were good - pool clean and quiet enough and lots of communal spaces within the blocks. Overall cleanliness levels of the flat were okay but could be improved- we found several small cockroaches, which the host says they will address before the next guests. Bathroom drains occasionally quite smelly, though this appeared to be a wider issue than just this flat.
Đợt tới nếu có dịp đến Vũng Tàu sẽ tiếp tục ở đây 🫶

Enjoyed my stay at this cozy spot! My host was incredibly friendly and helpful, making me feel right at home. The location was perfect, with easy access to the beach and plenty of dining options nearby.
Hoa is a great host, we had a great time staying. very comfortable bed and convenient for eatery, a shopping centre in a walking distance so is the beach.

Hoa ist eine ganz tollle Gastgeberin. Die Wohnung ist gut gelegen und sauber, sieht aus wie auf den Fotos und wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt. Sie ist in der 24.igsten Etage. Die Etage ist mit den Fahrstühlen gut erreichbar.
Hoa ist sehr flexibel, wir mussten wegen eines Notfalls früher abreisen und Hoa hat sich ganz toll gekümmert. Herzlichen Dank

We had a great stay here and the host is very nice, she replied to you quickly and listened to you and resolved the issue.The place is very good, the view is very good and the apartment is very nice and clean.

Enjoy out stay there, however getting in and out of the building can be difficult given the elevator structure and many apartments there. The place itself was clean, can have a bit more amenities such as toiletries.

Hoa is a wonderful host, friendly very responsive and extremely helpful. The apartment is clean and looks just like in the pictures. The location is great, walking distance to the beach, shopping and close to many tourist attractions.
