the host was great to deal with. the facilities was better than expected, sometime pics look much better than actual place. this one, however, exceeded our expectations. oh... it had a great view of the ocean as well.
the only downside to this place was the whole elevator situation. the elevators in B lobby was a train wreck. it took us forever to figure out how to get to the room floor and 36 floor on our first go at it by our selves. so I just learned to use the elevators near our wing, C, and all went well from that point on.
this place is a great deal for what you pay and we highly recommend it.

Đây là lần thứ 2 gia đình tôi đặt căn hộ này và hài lòng với những gì nhận được. Vy rất thân thiện và chủ động hướng dẫn quá trình nhận phòng. Vị trí căn hộ sát biển rất tiện để đi bộ. Căn hộ được vệ sinh ngăn nắp gọn gàng, các tiện nghi sinh hoạt đầy đủ. Phòng khách có view biển đẹp. Chúng tôi sẽ quay lại đây khi có dịp đến Vũng Tàu.
Căn hộ luôn là lựa chọn hàng đầu của gia đình mình khi có dịp ghé Vũng Tàu!

This is the 4th time I stayed at Giang's place and it was always a great experience. The place is now equipped with a washing machine so it was a nice plus. Probably the best apartment you can find in Vung Tau, taken into account the view and the price.
Căn hộ tiện nghi và sạch sẽ. Phù hợp gia đình nhỏ 2-4 người. Nhận phòng linh hoạt. Host hỗ trợ nhiệt tình và nhanh chóng. Tiếc là chưa có máy giặt, còn lại thì rất oke
Căn hộ vẫn luôn là lựa chọn số 1 của gia đình mình khi đi du lịch Vũng Tàu!

Chủ nhà dễ thương, phòng gọn gàng sạch sẽ như ảnh, đầy đủ tiện nghi. Tuy vậy bảo vệ khu chung cư ở chỗ hồ bơi không cho tụi mình dùng hồ bơi và yêu cầu trả tiền vé. Hồ bơi ko được sạch sẽ.
Có chút sự cố về sắp xếp phòng khi có khách khác vào lúc tụi mình đang lưu trú. Nhưng chủ nhà đã giải quyết nhanh chóng và đã xin lỗi tụi mình. Dù có chút vấn đề nhưng mình biết chủ nhà đã cố gắng hỗ trợ tụi mình hết mình. Mong là lần sau quay lại tụi mình sẽ có trải nghiệm tốt hơn.
Vẫn recommend bạn bè ở khu vực chung cư bên này hơn là The Sóng vì sự yên tĩnh và service.

Căn hộ vị trí đẹp, trang trí đẹp và đầy đủ tiện nghi, view nhìn ra hồ bơi, sạch sẽ, chủ nhà hỗ trợ tốt
Tuy nhiên hồ bơi không được miễn phí và phải trả phí 30k/bé và 50k/người lớn
Nên khắc phục vài điểm nhỏ : ga trải giường, sàn nhà cảm giác có bụi, phòng mới nhận có mùi hôi,  phòng trên cao dễ bụi mịn nên sx nvien dọn dẹp hằng ngày có khách thuê nhiều ngày.

Căn hộ sạch sẽ, tiện nghi, nội thất đẹp (mình rất thích bộ sofa và bộ bàn ăn). Tuy nhiên, không gian nhỏ hơn mình nghĩ một chút, và giường phụ bên ngoài phòng khách cũng không thoải mái nếu sử dụng cho 2 người.
Thank you for letting me stay in your place.
the 5th, good
Chỗ ở rất tốt, rất gần bãi sau của bãi biển Vũng Tàu, chủ nhà thân thiện và phản hồi nhanh.

The apartment was spacious, comfy and new. You are super close to the beach, with a very nice view outside the big balcony. The Bed was a bit hard. The towels smelled a bit, but were exchanged instantly after messaging the host!
Overall still worth the money we spent for this apartment, and we had a wonderful stay!

The place is well maintained, clean, cosy and well-equipped. The view is breathtakingly beautiful, overseeing the ocean and the city. Supermarket, pharmacy and restaurants are very close within a walkable distance. So beautiful we extended for another day!

This is the second time I've been in this place - and for good reasons. Clean and spacious place in a quiet spot of Vung Tau. Great views from the balcony, and the host is very friendly and communicative. What's not to like?

This is exactly as listed. The place is clean and has everything we needed without even asking.
The 23th floor is really amazing for the view at the beach. Definitely a recommend and we will be back again at this place soon.

The place is amazing and well worth the price. The apartment is spotless, beautifully decorated, with an ocean view and within walking distance to the beach. You can self check in and check out so it's very convenient as well. 10/10. Highly recommend

This being my third time booking with this Airbnb, I must say, it's been consistently impressive. The co-host, Vy, has been extremely responsive and incredibly helpful, making the whole process seamless.
One standout feature of my stay was undoubtedly the breathtaking ocean view from the apartment. It added a touch of serenity to each morning, setting the perfect tone for the day ahead. Plus, the quiet and private atmosphere of the location was exactly what I was looking for, offering a retreat from the hustle and bustle.
Overall, I couldn't be happier with the experience. It's a definite recommendation from me, and I'm already looking forward to the next opportunity to book and enjoy my stay.

The apt is nice and spacious with reasonable price during weekdays.

Lần đầu tiên book trên này, may mắn gặp đc chị host hỗ trợ rất nhanh. Mình nt thắc mắc là chị trả lời ngay. Phòng sạch sẽ, đầy đủ tiện nghi. Hai phòng ngăn cách nhau bằng cửa kéo, có thể thông qua nhau, phù hợp cho gđ. Mình đi giữa tuần nên ko bị tình trạng kẹt thang máy. À, còn cô H quản phòng siu dễ thương nữa, vừa mới gặp mà cô hỗ trợ xách đồ dùm gđ mình, rồi hướng dẫn các thứ trong phòng. Đến h checkout mà mưa to quá, mình báo cô sợ về phòng k kịp thì cô kêu cứ từ từ ko vội. Nói chung xứng đáng nha mn ơi.
Phòng hơi lạ vì 2 phòng thông nhau nên sẽ hơi không phù hợp với các cặp đôi có nhu cầu cách âm tốt, phù hợp nhất vẫn là couple hoặc gia đình và các con của mình, nhóm bạn.

Chị host dễ thương, mình được hướng dẫn tận tình. Phòng trống là mình được chị hỗ trợ nhận phòng ngay.
Chỉ có điều thang máy lúc nào cũng kẹt dù mình đi trong tuần. Mà cái đó là vấn đề muôn thuở của The Sóng nên mình cũng ko trách host.
Mình đã có trải nghiệm tuyệt vời ở home.

Cô chủ nhà rất nhiệt tình và thân thiện, phòng rất sạch và đầy đủ tiện nghi, view ngắm cảnh đẹp, mình hoàn toàn hài lòng về trải nghiệm đặt phòng ở chỗ cô Giang. Lần sau sẽ tiếp tục đặt tiếp nếu đi tới Vũng Tàu.

Tôi ở Canada về, và muốn dẫn ba mẹ đi nghỉ ngơi. Thật may mắn khi tôi đã chọn được một người chủ nhà thật dễ thương và một nơi nghỉ dưỡng thật tuyệt vời . Chắc chắn tôi sẽ chọn nơi này khi quay lại Vung Tau cung voi gia đình.

Căn hộ ở Tầng 10 rất tiện lên xuống, thang máy cũng rất nhanh. Nhà siêu sạch và thơm, đặc biệt là decor rất xinh và tươi mát, có đủ tất cả vật dụng cần thiết cho sinh hoạt nên mình ở rất thoải mái.

I was very satisfied with my stay. The apartment is modern, very clean, and located near the beach and a large supermarket. It also has a beautiful outdoor swimming pool and a lounge where you can relax and read books. The host was incredibly kind and responsive — always available when needed. Thanks to this place, I had a wonderful time. I hope everyone have a nice trip! Thank you!

Fantastisk vistelse på The Sóng Homestay !
Jag hade en underbar upplevelsen avlägenhet . Allt var mycket välorganiserat – rummet var rent, bekvämt och smakfullt inrett. Värdarna var otroligt vänliga och hjälpsamma under hela vistelsen. Läget var perfekt – nära till allt men ändå lugnt och avslappnat. Jag kände mig verkligen som hemma. Rekommenderas varmt till alla som söker ett mysigt och bekvämt boende. Jag kommer definitivt tillbaka !

Vị trí gần biển, các khu ăn uống, ở dưới có cửa hàng tiện lợi và siêu thị lớn chị cách 5 phút nên rất thuận tiện. Chủ nhà nhiệt tình hỗ trợ, căn hộ có đủ tiệ  ích sinh hoạt. Hướng nhà nhìn ra thành phố nên rất đẹp và yên tĩnh. Rất đáng giá với chi phí bỏ ra 1 đêm. Gia đình tôi đi 4 người.

This was a beautiful place and matched exactly the description and photos.
We checked in on Sunday when it was very busy so the elevator service took a while. It was much easier to get an elevator on Monday & Tuesday.
The complex also boasts kid’s’ lazy river on the 5th floor as well as a rooftop pool. If you are from the west you need to know that bathing suits are monitored. My friend is 66 years old and wore a bathing suit that looks like a tank top
and skirt. She was not allowed to get in the pool. This is one of those cultural differences…which adds merriment to travel.
This condo has a nice balcony overlooking the largest round about in Vietnam and the 6th largest in the world.
IFurthermore it is in walking distance to the Lotte shopping center. You can also see the Christ statue and Buddha as well as a beautiful city and Mountain View … especially at sunset.
After 6 weeks in Vietnam this is BY FAR the cleanest place I’ve stayed.

Rooms don't have windows, which can be a turn off for some, but I'm perfectly fine with it since there's no dead air smell and bath room has sufficient air ventilation. Walls are a bit thin though, so be mindful, it's not so thin that you have to whisper everytime you speak, but better not be too loud, normal volume is almost inaudible. Bathroom is a bit small, but is clean, doesnt smell, both hotncold water available, ventilation system can dry your clothes if you're desperate :/
Other than that, shared space is great, there's parking space, water, a kitchen, a big desk, plenty of plants and good air. If you ever have a party big enough, just book the entire place, that'd be such a cool hangout spot
Location is good imo, not too far from the beach, near the center of the city, and is VERY close to a SUPER popular bakery spot!
Host is nice, he calls be beforehand to confirm our checkin hour, and answered our question at around as late as 11:45 pm
9.5/10 would recommend
Lovely public space, clean room

Hai vợ chồng mình đến homestay vào buổi chiều, được cô đón tiếp cực kì nhiệt tình. Sau đấy đến tối được gặp chú. Hai cô chú nhiệt tình, vui vẻ cực kì. Sáng còn pha cafe cho tụi mình. Cô còn cho mình ăn chuối cô tự trồng tự sấy. Lúc về còn tặng mình trái đu đủ ăn ngon lắm. Hai vợ chồng mình cực kì thích ở đây, nằm trên núi nên yên tĩnh, mát mẻ. Ban công có view nhìn ra biển chill cực, đúng gu thích yên bình của hai đứa. Nếu hai vợ chồng có dịp ra Vũng Tàu sẽ ghé ở tiếp.
Cô chú chủ nhà cực kì dễ thương, thân thiện, không gian sạch sẽ, view biển cực đẹp. Sẽ tiếp tục quay lại

Ngôi nhà nằm trên ngọn núi, sát bên là bờ biển của bãi trước. Vì do kế hoạch chuyến đi được thêm 1 đêm mùng 1 tại vũng tàu nên mình book gấp 1 đêm tại nhà cô chú, đêm còn lại thì bạn con đã book sẵn một chổ khác rồi 🥹
Hai đứa con sẽ quay lại vào một dịp gần nhất, tụi con rất thích không gian của nhà mình. Một đêm nghỉ ngơi tuyệt vời không nằm trong kế hoạch, sáng dậy mở mắt thấy biển và núi, cây cối xung quanh nhà thật bình yên. Tụi con cảm ơn cô chú nha

A perfect place to get away from bustling city with an amazing sea view. You'll be surrounded by tree and you can hear the birds singing in the morning. The host is very friend and she even give us banana from her garden. Highly recommended!

오전에 에어컨이 지주 꺼지는 현상 말고는 가격대비 합리적인 곳 이었습니다.
산에 있는 에어비엔비라 조금은 가기 어렵지만 올라가기만 하면 좋은 경치가 있어요!

This is my second time back at Ton's place. The house & room is beautiful, with a panoramic sea view of Vung Tau on a cascading slope. It's a one-of-a-kind experience, I appreciate the view every morning waking up, which feels like a vacation in Southern French. The room's clean & Ton & Thanh are very kind hosts. Ton's an intellectual with great understanding and expansive knowledge of Vietnam heritage & city development. Our group really enjoys chatting with him. I will for sure come back to this Airbnb for 3rd and 4th time

Had a chill time in a clean room with seaside balcony shows beautiful picture. There were some amenities like two towels, shampoo and body soup fortunately. They might have put some im the toilet after read reviews!
I’d like to stay back again!
Quite and peaceful place to stay for a short break at the weekend. Definitely will come back in future.

Absolutely best place to stay.
Home away from home. And large rooms with beautiful view from balcony. 👍

Quite and peaceful with a wonderful view.
And the hosts are just fantastic. Really nice to talk to them.
I would like to come back and stay with them again.
호스트는 매우 친절하였고 방은 쾌적하고 깨끗했습니다. 무엇보다 오션뷰가 매우 멋진 숙소입니다.
Great place to stay, beautiful sea views. Nice break from the traffic noises.
Great place to rest & recharge. Beautiful views from the bedroom and fabulous rooftop! Would recommend for anyone keen on a soulful retreat!
Một trải nghiệm tuyệt vời cho kì nghỉ! cô chú chủ nhà rất thân thiện.
private, peaceful and beautifull place

It is a very good place to stay.  We love how it is located on the hill and away from the touristy places. It’s surrounded by quiet atmosphere and a nice sea view. The whole room and especially bathroom is very spacious, we didn’t even have to use the AC.
It was a great experience. Tôn is a very nice and kind man. It is very pleasant to talk to him. The view is amazing, and the place is quit and peaceful. Thank you so much 😊

So happy to recover at bellavista after hcmc had challenged me. I needed a break! So i took the hydrofoil for 2 hours and arrived smoothly down the mighty mekong river at vung tau. I was warmly welcomed by the hosts who did everything to make me feel at ease. And then: the view, the quiet surroundings, the breeze, the beach easy to reach with taxi, the massage in a spa and over all the feeling to be at home. Could not have chosen better! A rare gem.
View biển rất đẹp. Hai cô chú chủ nhà rất dễ thương. Nên ghé nha mọi người.

This is truly a hidden gem upon the hill with amazing sea view. It will give you an unique experience for sure when you relax at the balcony. The host is very friendly - you'll feel welcoming as if at your aunt's house. We strongly recommend for those looking for a retreat, or simply a peaceful getaway from busy city life.

Not much to add to other reviews, but we were sold a great place, and Tôn and Thanh delivered. They are extremely friendly, helpful and responsive hosts. The house is clean and beautiful, and everything you might need is closeby. We will definitely be coming back on our next trip to Vung Tau, and encourage everyone to do so as well! :)

Thank you for a great stay. I loved how easy it was to communicate with the host, they were extra friendly and very accomodated to changes from us as guests. The hill up was not easy for cabs to drive up (so mostly we prefer motorbike or walk). Walling might be far, but the scene was worth it. The view (especially from the mutual rooftop) was amazing, I loved it. Also adored the peacefil quietness there. Hope to come up in my next vacation :-)
Rất rốt. Yên tĩnh, sạch và ấm cúng. Ban công rộng, hướng ra biển rất đẹp

Ton was the ultimate host from the moment we arrived. We were picked up from the ferry and taken to the beautiful rooftop terrace for coffee and fresh fruit. The view here is absolutely breathtaking as it is from the balcony. My partner and I had a wonderful time chatting with our hosts and learning about Vietnam which helped us to plan the rest of our holiday. Highly recommended. Thank you Ton and Tan!
Phòng đẹp, sạch sẽ. View đỉnh.  Chị Thủy nhiệt tình trả lời và giúp đỡ khi có cần. Điểm yếu là đi cuối tuần hơi đông, chờ thang máy có thể lên đến 30 phút.
Nhà giống hình ảnh mẫu, view biển và thành phố rất thoáng. Nhà còn mới, sạch sẽ. Cần thêm đồ dùng bếp được chủ hỗ trợ nhanh chóng.
Chị Host rất thân thiện và chủ động hướng dẫn nhận phòng. Phòng đẹp.
Thuỷ rất nhiệt tình và hỗ trợ, gia đình mình rất yêu tâm khi ở đây

She was a great host and apartment was quite clean! Was a bit sandy on the flooring since near the beach and the check in took longer than expected since the lifts are quite slow. Other than that good place to stay in!
Chỗ ở đẹp, sạch sẽ, thuận tiện di chuyển, rất đáng đồng tiền. Chủ nhà thân thiện.
Ngoài việc chờ thang máy chung cư hơi kẹt thì mọi thứ đều rất tuyệt vời!
The host was great and so accommodating! Totally recommend!
Thanks for the nice Stay! We will come back soon!

I just stayed at this Airbnb and it was such a lovely experience. It felt private and peaceful, with a calm, healing vibe throughout. The service was exceptional for the price, and everything was thoughtful and cozy. The spa next door was a nice bonus and made it even easier to relax. The host was kind and responsive—overall, it felt like a little pocket of peace. I’m really grateful for the stay and would definitely come back.
Really beatiful and lovely place to be 🫶

Cổng ra vào chung cư ở đường Thi Sách ko phải đường Thuỳ Vân, vị trí khá thuận tiện, khu vực bên dưới không có nhiều hàng ăn uống lắm tuy nhiên chung cư gần biển lắm, checkin đơn giản dễ dàng, tuy nhiên host cần trang bị dép đi trong nhà cho khách để bảo đảm vệ sinh và an toàn.

Host rất nhiệt tình, hướng dẫn rất kỹ
Mình đến sớm, và phòng trống nên được checkin lúc 12h.
Rất tự do và thoải mái, cảm giác như đang ở chính ngôi nhà của mình. Check in và check out thuận lợi. Phòng gọn gàng và đầy đủ đồ cần thiết. Phòng cũng rất yên tĩnh và tầm nhìn hướng ra biển
Good location with access to the beach and dining nearby. The host was very responsive and helped with any questions. The apartment was clean and had everything expected.
Vị trí tương đối thuận tiện, đi bộ 5p tới lottemart. Trang thiết bị trong nhà đầy đủ. Hồ bơi chubg rộng, sạch sẽ (tốn phí riêng). Đi t7 nhưng ko bị kẹt thang máy.
Lovely view, perfect for watching sunrises. Dung was friendly and responsive, the apartment itself was nice and clean. Highly recommend the place.
Phòng và reivew rất ok

베트남 공휴일 전에 급하게 예약했습니다.
해당 아파트에는 거주민보다는 외부 여행객이 많았기때문에 시끄러웠습니다.
그리고 아파트 근처에 대형 공사를 하고 있어서 먼지가 많이 날리고 쿵쿵 소리가 크게 났습니다.
욕실 하수구에서는 냄새가 났고 바닥에는 머리카락과 모래가 많았어요.
Wonderful stay, they were extremely helpful and accommodating. The location and view was great there’s lots of construction happening, but once it’s finished this will be a prime location

Clean and well equipped apartment with sea view. Mattress was comfy!
Clear instructions and smooth check in process.
I recommend.
We enjoyed staying at this apartment. The location is great, and the apartment is comfy. Thank you! 😊

We had a wonderful stay in this beautiful apartment with a stunning sea view! The location is simply perfect – close to everything you need, and the ocean view is a highlight every morning. The apartment looked exactly like the pictures: modern, stylish, and very cozy. However, there were a few minor inconveniences, such as the lack of cutlery (there was only one knife and no forks) and unfortunately, the kitchen and bathroom were not entirely clean. Additionally, there were cockroaches in the kitchen, which was unpleasant. Despite these issues, we really enjoyed our stay and would recommend the apartment because of its great location and lovely decor. Thank you very much!
Nhà giống như hình, sạch sẽ, gọn gàng và riêng tư

Home ấm cúng, cách biển 50m rất thuận tiện đi lại. Chủ nhà phản hồi nhanh chóng và thang máy không bị đông đúc như những nơi khác rất dễ dàng ra vào, nhận phòng và trả phòng tự động và tôi rất thích điều này. Nhà gọn gàng và sạch sẽ, nhà vệ sinh rộng rãi thích hợp cho các bạn đi cặp đôi, tầm nhìn ở ban công và phòng ngủ view biển đẹp hơn hình, bạn nên trãi nghiệm 1 lần khi đến vũng tàu và tôi chắc chắn rằng không có gì để phàn nàn!
comfortable,  well equipped,  great AC, clean,  close to the beach
Great place for a family has 2 kids like me. I would like to high recommend for someone should hire Dung’s apartment when come to Vung Tau.
정말 군더더기없이 깔끔하고 오션뷰가좋습니다 깨끗하다는 느낌보다는  정말 집안에 뭐가별로없이 있어야할거만 딱 있는 느낌입니다 쉬어가기 좋았어요!! 체크인도 쉽게할수있어요~~

new construction building. however, they are building the second condo next to current. constructions starts early in the morning and keep until late.
missing some basic amenities as cutting board, garbage bags.
To use the pool, it cost money
2024년 10월. 숙소 발코니에서 정면으로 일출 보임. 에어컨, 따뜻한 물 잘나옴. 고층. 대로 하나 끼고 해변 바로 앞. 현재 구글맵으로 주소 검색하면 골프장 뒤에 있는 다른 위치가 나오는데 그랩 기준으로 주소 검색하면 됨. 깔끔하고 호텔보다 좋았습니다.
Very modern, clean, cute, and convenient. Perfect!
Pretty nice place but no ventilation in bathroom making it a bit annoying
Great place for the money, nice and clean very comfortable. The bed was comfortable as well. Had plenty of hot water.  I would rent this apartment again.

Die Wohnung sieht aus wie auf den Bildern. Nach freundlicher Nachfrage war es kein Problem auch schon 2 Stunden früher einzuchecken, ohne Zusatzkosten. Für uns war es ein schöner Aufenthalt. Das Bett war bequem und die Wohnung sehr geräumig für 2 Personen. Wir waren leider nur für 2 Nächte hier, aber es ist durchaus denkbar sich längere Zeit in dieser Wohnung zu verbringen. Der weitläufige Strand ist keine 5 Minuten zu Fuß erreichbar. Aktuell finden dort allerdings Bauarbeiten statt, wenn man aber ein wenig am Strand entlang läuft, bekommt man davon nichts mehr mit.
Great place, right near the beach. It was so easy to check in and out. Ai Quoc is quick to reply and ready to help. Thanks for letting me stay there!

Phòng to, sạch sẽ, gọn gàng. Mình check in phòng lúc 1h sáng có tí trục trặc với bảo vệ, anh chủ giải quyết nhanh gọn, hỗ trợ mình siêu nhiệt tình. Chỗ ở có đầy đủ đồ dùng như nhà.  Sau có đến chắc chắn mình sẽ book lại 🫶🏻

Nhà mình đi 4 người lớn, 2 em bé <3 tuổi.
Chủ nhà phản hồi nhanh, hướng dẫn nhiệt tình. Nhà sạch sẽ, rộng rãi, thoáng mát lắm, đầy đủ tiện nghi, giống hình ảnh và mô tả của chủ nhà. Có view biển ngắm hoàng hôn tuyệt đẹp luôn, ban công rất rộng. 2 phòng ngủ 2 giường lớn, có cả tấm nệm di động nữa nên nhà mình kéo ra phòng khách cho ông bà ngủ cho mát. Rất gần quán hải sản Gành Hào và các quán cafe view biển. Chỗ để xe oto rộng rãi, bảo vệ cũng thân thiện. Mình sẽ đặt lại cho chuyến đi tiếp theo
Căn hộ rất đầy đủ tiện nghi, anh chủ rất thân thiện, có đủ tất cả mọi thứ trong căn bếp. rất thoải mái
cám ơn chủ nhà đã tạo ra không gian ấm cúng. chúc chủ nhà sẽ luôn đắc khách và như ý nhé.
Chủ nhà thân thiện, phòng ốc thoáng, balcon rộng rãi.
Bạn tử tế và thân thiện. Hẹn gặp lại một ngày gần nhất.

A wonderful place with a nice view of the ocean on the more quiet side of Vung Tau. It’s a good place to stay if you want to be away from all the hustle and bustle of the city center, but a short drive to the popular beaches and restaurants. Thắng is an amazing host that is very considerate and accommodating.

What a way to relax and chill out having your favorite cup of coffee sitting on this large balcony watching the sea and the occasional big container ship passes by. This is exactly what Thang's apartment will offer you, large greenery (house plants) balcony with a sea view to wind down after a long day of exploring the seaside town of Vung Tau. On top of this Thang the host is also very easy going and accommodating to the guest's request. Highly recommended!
Căn hộ thoáng mát, sạch sẽ

We loved staying at the homestay. It’s very close to the beach and popular coffee shops. Our favorite restaurant, Ganh Hao 1, was just a 5-min walk away.
The homestay was comfortable and cozy, with all the necessary facilities (include hair dryer😌). The best part was the big balcony with great views of the mountain and beach. Watching the sunset was amazing.
The homestay also did a great job of keeping noise out, making our stay very peaceful.
This is totally a nice spot for beach vacation 🫶.
Warm place for family and children

Phòng đẹp, gọn gàng và sạch sẽ, view phố và 1 góc biển rất đẹp. Phòng thơm ko bị hôi, nhận phòng dễ dàng linh hoạt. Chị Hiếu hỗ trợ nhiệt tình vô cùng, mình rất hài lòng với trải nghiệm này. Chúc chị Hiếu luôn đắt khách nhé 🥰🥰🥰
Host nhiệt tình, linh động trong việc xử lý tình huống. Hỗ trợ khách chu đáo. Phản hồi nhanh chống. Chỗ ở sạch sẽ, giống như trong ảnh, đầy đủ tiện nghi như mô tả.

Great location with nice view of the little beach town. Walkable to some restaurants and grocery stores. A bit further from the beaches. It was a bit confusing trying to get to the pool because there are multiple sets of elevators and not all of them go up to that top floor.

Hieu saved us after our booking fell through and sorted us out late in the evening. The place was accurately described and in a good location. The apartment has an amazing view and Hieu is a great host who is very responsive and very friendly. The area felt more locally Vietnamese and within a 10 minute cab journey of all the bars and restaurants. Only 5 minute walk to the beach.
Vị trí đẹp, phòng sạch sẽ, có chỗ giữ xe. View thành phố

The apartment was really nice. It is close to Lotte Mart where you can get everything. We got another apartment (2 rooms) but otherwise everything was perfect. Hieu answered almost immediately and was very helpful. You have everything you need in the apartment.

The host is super nice and responds very quickly. The apartment looks just like the pictures and there are lots of opportunities to do fun things in the building such as rooftop pool or gym. Highly recommended!

Miss Hiếu is surely a great host, very enthusiastic and get to the point. She is available to ensure a seamless check in, works with us for any issue if occurred.
Highly recommended!
Phòng rất tốt. Chủ nhà dễ thương. Vị trí gần lotte nên tôi có thể dễ dàng mua sắm. Tuy nhiên buổi tối thì khu dân cư The Sóng hơi ồn, cần góp ý cho ban quản lý để cư dân ở đây trật tự hơn
C’était super beau et propre ! Le confort, la grandeur de la chambre était parfaite! La vue sur le balcon était aussi super ! Nous avons bien aimé !

Vores ophold var helt fantastisk. Vi fejrede julen 2024 her og havde nogle dejlige dage. Alt var som det skulle være og lejligheden var ren og pæn.
Tak for et dejligt ophold.☺️
Great place to stay! Hieu had great local recommendations for food and was super responsive! Place was clean and had a great shower with hot water! 10/10 reccomend
Nice service
Good services enjoy the place
Nice condo
Great place that for stay in this few days. Thanks the hosts for everything and great surroundings just walking distance can find a food and shopping cinema as well..
Great stay! The place was clean and comfortable, and Hieu was a helpful, responsive host. Highly recommend!
Hieu is the most friendy and problem solving host you Can find - I warm recommend hr as a host , only minus is the slow elevators.
the self-checkin was easy and the apartment was great. the contact was also very nice. highly recommended
teşekkür ederim.
Really enjoyed our stay plus pool and gym :)
So much value for the price, and a lovely host.
Rất tốt, sạch sẽ, chủ nhà thân thiện
Chủ nhà thân thiện, hướng dẫn nhiệt tình tận tâm, vui vẻ

Một chuyến đi bất chợt và mình lựa chọn phòng tại đây vì nó cho mình cảm giác như ở nhà. Nó có đầy đủ tiện nghi và có thể dễ dàng khiến bạn cảm thấy thoải mái với chi phí vô cùng dễ chịu. Chủ nhà nhiệt tình và trả lời rất nhanh cho mọi vấn đề.
Khu vực xung quanh cũng có nhiều tiện nghi cũng như nhà hàng để bạn có thể ghé khám phá.
Một nơi ở xứng đáng.

Căn hộ sạch sẽ, rộng, đẹp, và đầy đủ tiện nghi. Chủ nhà thân thiện, nhiệt tình và phản hồi tin nhắn rất nhanh. Căn hộ nằm ở khu vực gần biển, siêu thị, bên dưới có cửa hàng tiện lợi… Sẽ quay lại nếu có dịp ạ ❤️
Home rất sạch đẹp hợp lý với số tiền chủ nhà thân thiện sẽ quay lại
Home tuyệt, host vui tính

I really enjoyed my 2-night stay at this place. The apartment was sparkling clean and had a nice view. My kid loved the children’s swimming pool in the building. One small suggestion: it would be great to have a doormat in the bathroom and maybe some scented wax or spray to keep it fresh. Other than that, everything was almost perfect for me.

Lovely appartement with a great view, the host was super quick to respond to any questions and really helpful when checking out late, helping us with our luggage 🙏🙏 legend! 100% recommend to anyone visiting Vung Tau ❤️

Rất thuận tiện cho việc di chuyển, phòng ốc rất sạch sẽ và thoáng mát, ban công siêu rộng có cả ghế đu ngồi thoải mái, view biển sống ảo ổn, có cả gương để check-in, TV kết nối sẵn tiện ích, phòng tắm rất sạch và sáng, máy giặt tủ lạnh đầy đủ, không gian nhỏ nhưng rất thoáng, vói tầm giá này là quá ổn, thanks!!
Large room, very clean, with ocean view. Good location with conviennent stores and restaurants downstairs.

Nice and clean room with all comfortable
Great position
I extremely like this Harmonia NG
コンタクトが取りやすく、非常にフレンドリーなホストでした。部屋は清潔で思ったよりも広かったです。また利用したいです。

Eine wirklich sehr tolle Gastgeberin, antwortet sehr schnell und hilft bei jedem Problem schnellstmöglich!
Die Unterkunft ist Traumhaft, sehr sauber und modern.
Auf der Hängematte liegen und auf das Meer schauen ist unbeschreiblich
Immer wieder gerne!

Great big apartment. Very clean and with a nice view. Big balcony. On a high floor. The owner was very friendly and responded quickly. The location to all the attractions and the beach would be great. I recommend!

I was shocked how beautiful the place was.
It was a studio apartment with lots of mini shop on ground floor and parking space was also available.
The city and the beach were also stunning.
The Host was always helpful and responsive during our visit.
Would definitely recommend to anyone else who wants a Chill staycation in Vung Tau for Budget
Merci beaucoup à Hung, pour toutes les informations utiles.  L'appartement est très propre. Notre séjour s'est très bien passé.
Fantastisk Airbnb, lejligheden var fuldstændig som lovet med en smuk udsigt. Sød og responderende vært. Meget rent. Kan kun anbefales
Very nice room with a beautiful scenery to wake up to! As well as service was great, made my stay at Vung Tau memorable!
Beautiful place to visit. Unfortunately our plan changed and we had to leave one day early .
Very clean & comfy place to stay at the center of the city. Host is quick responsible and helpful. The weekday price is very good deal as well

Nice place to stay, just keep in mind that treating the place you live like home, you will find it comfortable. Easy to go around and there’s lots of things to do and to go. It’s very closed to the Lotte. Host is friendly.

The building is nice and clean, the unit is great for a couple or a small family, the host is super nice and responsible.
I stayed for two weeks and everything was great.
A very good and convenient studio near the sea.
The view from the unit is nice! willl definitely recommend 👍🏻
Really nice place, one of the best Airbnbs I've ever been, such a great stay and view!
Bạn Host thân thiện và nhiệt tình, ra tận cổng đón mình. Phòng ốc sạch sẽ và ấm cúng, thích hợp đi cùng hia đình ^^

Nơi ở rất sang trọng, sạch sẽ, có đầy đủ đội ngũ hỗ trợ, thiết bị. Mặc dù nói là khu dân cư, nhưng không khác gì ở bên khu khách sạn. Chủ nhà rất nice và giúp đỡ hành khách. Lần sau tới VT, nhà mình vẫn sẽ ở đây.
Phòng nằm ở khu Imperial residence, cùng khuôn viên khách sạn imperial, tiện ích dịch vụ như khách sạn, sẽ trở lại nếu có dịp
Căn hộ ở vị trí rất đẹp, được vận hành theo tiêu chuẩn 5* nên rất đáng để lựa chọn.
A beautiful and cozy place to stay at Vung Tau beach city. This is where you can easily enjoy the sunrise right from window. Highly recommended!

. In massive 36 floor complex with long waits in elevators and staircase was filthy . Photos of infinity pool made it attractive but pool and gym are hard work to get to .

The experience was very disappointing and distressing. The second bedroom had no air conditioning, no furniture, and large intentional holes in the connecting door, completely compromising privacy and peace. There was no hot water in the shower or washing machine, despite what was advertised. The host initially lied about gym access, claiming it was closed, and only provided it after persistent requests. Worse, the host harassed us on messages to negotiate a smaller refund and sent a staff member to pressure us into accepting a cash refund instead of settling through Airbnb. This was extremely inappropriate, especially as one guest was ill. The entire stay was unprofessional and stressful.

My recent trip from Saigon to Vung Tau, staying at Cherry's house on Airbnb, was truly wonderful. The service provided was top-notch, and I was impressed by how beautiful and well-maintained the house was. The interior design was both modern and cozy, making it feel like a home away from home. The price was also very reasonable, offering great value for the quality of the accommodation.
One of the best aspects of the location was its proximity to the beach—just a short walk away, which made it easy to enjoy the seaside whenever I wanted. The host, Cherry, was incredibly kind and accommodating. She went out of her way to ensure that my stay was comfortable and enjoyable, offering helpful tips on local attractions and dining options. Overall, I couldn't have asked for a better experience, and I highly recommend Cherry's place for anyone planning a trip to Vung Tau

우리에게는 모든 문제가 있다. 그녀와 나 사이에 문제가 있었다. 그러나 그녀의 대처는 매우 현명했고 몇가지 문제를 바로 시정했다. 훌륭한 호스트의 자세는 고객의 피드백에 관대하다는 것이다. 그녀는 매우 관대했고 친절했으며, 모든 문제를 해결할 수있는 능력있는 호스트다. 추천합니더.

숙소에서 해변까지 도보로 3분입니다. 리조트 내에 산책로 조성도 잘 되어있어서 산책하기도 좋습니다. 해변은 고운 모래가 깔려있고 아이들이 놀기에도 적합합니다. 불편한 것은 주변에 편의점같은 상점이 없다는 것이었어요. 상점은 리조트 수영장 내에 있는 작은 매점 하나뿐이었습니다. 편의점이라도 하나 있으면 좋겠습니다. 차로 10분정도 거리에 롯데마트가 있습니다. 롯데마트 앱으로 온라인 주문을 하고 배송을 받으면 되긴 한데, 미리 물건들을 가지고 리조트에 들어가야할 듯 합니다. 해변 관리도 잘 되어있는 편이라서 현지 분들도 많이 있습니다. 숙소 내에서 조리도 가능하지만 전자렌지는 없었습니다. 밥솥도 있었구요. 물은 따로 구매해서 숙소로 가는것을 추천합니다. 숙소 근처에 아직 공사중인 시설이 있습니다만 숙소의 소음차단은 훌륭했습니다. 공사는 곧 끝날듯 하더군요. 바다쪽은 공사소음은 없습니다. 바다에서 놀고 숙소에서 자는 편안함을 원하신다면 추천드립니다.

The best accommodation I have experienced this year! I was able to check in before check-in. The apartment is completely new, spacious and with a beautiful view of the sea. There was also perfect lighting and strong air conditioning, so I worked really well here. There are restaurants and a large shopping center right next door. The sea is a few minutes' walk away. A swimming pool and sauna are available for free on the roof. A very nice and helpful host - he arranged for me to print the documents I needed. Thanks a lot, see you next time! I definitely want to come back to this place! 😍

This is the nicest airbnb that we’ve stayed in  the whole of our time in Vietnam ! It’s a lot bigger than it seems in the pictures and the view is truly spectacular (we didn’t want to leave). Not very far to the beach - maybe 5 mins walking - and there are plenty of littler shops selling everything you need. Trang was an amazing host as well ❤️ the space had absolutely everything you could possibly need (including a washing machine !) and we really felt at home - Thank you so much ! Great value for money and we’ll hopefully be back ☺️

Wow! Vung Tau is beautiful. Trangs place sits just off the shore line. You can see the water and mountains from her private balcony. Trang was very helpful for this American who had never been to Vietnam. She was responsive and always eager to help when I had questions. I recommend that anyone coming to Vung tau give her place a try, you’ll be happy you did.
Good place to stay. I recommend it
Thank you for letting us stay we really enjoyed our stay

Trang was one of the best hosts I've had on Airbnb, and I didn't even meet her. She was extremely responsive, kind, and made all efforts to make sure my stay was comfortable, along with helping with local requests. The homestay was beautiful, with a nice balcony and view. The bed is comfy, the bathroom is clean and the kitchen was as functional as possible. Check-in was super easy, and it took me no time to get comfortable and let my bags down. Trang is a 10/10 host. The place I would rate an 8.5/10. The main issue I had was the noise from the construction, karaoke, and bars across the street, but this is Vietnam! It's a lively country. I got used to it, and I'm someone who has mild misophonia. There aren't any walkable convenience store locations, but it's about a 5-min grab bike to a nearby one that'll cost you 42.000 VND there and back. It's worth the ride to see the beautiful coast views on your commute. I could say much more, but this place is easily recommendable. Good vibes!
Amazing views from the balcony. Great to have a washing machine. Well equipped kitchen. Spotlessly clean. Had everything we needed for a great stay.
great value and beautiful view.
I would live here full time… surely that says enough :)
Very nice place to stay with a beautiful view. It is a very peaceful place and very quiet part of the town.

A great location in Vung Tau. During the week Vung Tau is a calm city without traffic jams and many local people swimming in the sea at dawn and sunset. During the weekend the buzz of people from Saigon is noticeable. Trang's place is in a calm neighbourhood with a lovely sea and mountain view. There is occasional karaoke from a nearby villa but everything is quiet after 10pm.
It was my 3rd time in the building and I enjoy the area a lot. Walkable good coffee from Simon's, multiple good and affordable seafood places. Vung Tau city is just a short ride away with plenty of options in entertainment and food.
Trangs place is convenient with good internet and the essential amenities. The building looks a bit older but is very convenient and quiet.
This is it. It has everything you need, foods, places to go, walking on the beach, grab is cheap
Amazing place!
Reply nice, peaceful spot with a great view. Really enjoyed our few days here.
Really lovely apartment with an amazing view. Trang was very helpful.
gotta come back, the owner is friendly, honestly and professionally

Stayed for 1 month
Pleasant stay. Clean, comfortable. Good location. Strong aircon, hot water. Solid wifi. Responsive host.
The only negatives were
1) elevator waiting times (place is super popular for people on vacation)
2) some noise late at night from people partying outside
Overall, I enjoyed my trip and would book again.

Linhs place is one of the nicer apartments in this building which is made up of privately owned units mostly occupied by large local families. It is 36 floors with 4 lifts 2 of which only go to the 16th floor, we waited almost 10 minutes for a lift from the 17th floor to ground level one day and regularly had to wait 5 minutes lifts were often full to bursting with one or 2 families often noisy and with very little consideration for private space. The infinity pool on the 36th floor has around 4 proper sun beds (one broken) one doesn’t adjust and 4 wicker beds not suitable for sunbathing on therefore it is almost impossible to bag a bed as the pool is usually full of very loud local families who seem to be oblivious of any around them. 8 beds for 36 floors ! Unbelievable. The gym is stocked with cheap non commercial bikes and treadmills most of which don’t work or are defective in some way. The beach is a 5 mile building site which is being completely rebuilt. There is constant noise

Fancy, cozy place. Extra small bedroom was very nice, where you could hide and relax. Apartment is in a shade and you don't get too much sun, while having amazing view over the airport's runway. Apartment is on 17th floor. We had very good sleep here every night. Very large balcony. Elevator waiting time is the biggest weakness - building itself is huge and during holidays you have to wait a bit extra. But you get nice coworking area, nice swimming pool and even gym (a bit crowdy and small, but you still have it, in case you don't want to go anywhere else). Shopping centre Lotte is near. Beach is near. Internet is "ok". - anyway - we had amazing stay for 1 month.

Alles im Ganzen war es ein super Apartment. Ausstattung und die zugehörigen Leistungen. Das einzige schlechte und schlimme Erfahrung war 👌der Aufzug. Man braucht ca. 10 Minuten bist man unten oder oben zu seinem Zimmer kommt.
i have enjoyed one week vacation in Vũng Tàu, i'm so excited to find the right aparment with very clean, and comfortable . I will be back definitely. Thanks Nhung

Modern, beautifully decorated spacious and clean apartment, close to the Lotte supermarket and the beach. Taxis, green transport taxis, grab cars&motorbikes conveniently park at front of the complex for all your transportation needs. The apartment buildings get crowded during weekends, resulting in longer waiting time for elevators.
Super host and her team! Communication was excellent. Highly recommend!

The apartment is very nice and comfortable. Miss Linh put her whole soul into them. The residential complex has a swimming pool and a gym, they are very convenient to visit, but there may be a lot of people on weekends. Miss Linh responded quickly to all requests and provided all the necessary things for a long stay.

We stayed at Linh’s place for a month and it was fantastic. The apartment had everything needed for a comfortable stay, including a comfortable bed and fast internet. The building’s amenities, like the rooftop pool, gym, and workspace, were excellent. Linh was a responsive and helpful host. Highly recommend!
My 3rd time staying at this place! Highly recommended!

i have had a nice stay at Linh’s place. Linh very kind host and co-host Helen responsive and communicated well throughout my stay.  Strong wifi and TV and kitchen utensils a plenty. Electric stove a bit finicky though.  I will come back!
Квартира шикарна, есть все необходимые удобства, бассейн и сауна практически всегда не многолюдны. Море близко, рядом есть и тц, и круглосуточный магазин. В целом эта одна из лучших квартир

Mình vừa có chuyến trải nghiệm tại Vũng Tàu. Nhà của Linh rất ấn tượng Decor đẹp mắt, thiết bị hiện đại lại rất chỉnh chu có cả máy massage chân, nón, túi, dép mây cho khách mượn.
Vị trí tiện lợi có thể đi bộ tắm biển và gần khu vực trung tâm ăn uống.
Một địa chỉ rất đáng để gợi ý khi đến VT.

The photo corresponds to the general condition of the apartment. rich renovation and quality appliances.
There are a lot of small cosy little things that are not usually found in rented accommodation.
The owner does not do things herself, she is assisted by the manager. the manager is responsive and will help with bike hire and booking transport to Ho Chi Minh City.
The apartments are not lucky with the housing estate - due to design errors there are problems with lifts and noise. but if you don't go outside too often it's not so noticeable.
Overall I can recommend these apartments for long term rentals
Linh said as a great host and responded to my questions throughout the day. She made the stay very welcoming and I would most definitely come again because of Linh!
Beautiful, well decorated place, extremely clean and new. The elevator situation was a bit frustrating during the public holiday, but that was expected.

We spent 1 night only at Linh’s house and everything is outstanding. Linh took care of our stay so well, and the housekeeper was also friendly and helpful. Interior and amendities were fully-equipped with great comfort and care. I felt like staying at home here. Can I ask for something else about this stay and host? - ABSOLUTELY NO. Everything went perfect to my expectation. Thanks, Linh and the housekeeper, Van Anh.
Great apartment for a weekend getaway ❤️
Nhà đẹp và sạch sẽ, đầy đủ tiện nghi.

The apartment is very comfortable and clean. Nice interior with everything you need. Convenient location. Nearby there are supermarkets and cafes, very close to the sea, BBQ area and rooftop pool. The owner is very responsive and always ready to help.

We really enjoyed our stay at Linh's place, the apartment is beautifully decorated with taste. Nothing to complain but during the high peak holiday it may cause some frustration with the elevators, when we arrived at the parking basement we had to wait 20 minutes trying to get in the elevators, but ended up taking the stair with all the luggages. Other than that this place is highly recommended!
Very nice apartment 🥰

Linh's place is a really lovely apartment space. The design is really nice and it's a very cosy place to stay. The pool and gym were a bonus. All communication with Linh was good. The apartment was spotless when we arrived. The balcony is nice to sit on. It was great to have cooking and laundry facilities at our disposal. The apartment complex has a convenience store which is very handy but there aren't really any restaurants in walking distance. The only inconvenience was waiting a long time for the lift, but I think this was only bad because we stayed on a public holiday and the building was especially busy. I would highly recommend a stay in Linh's place if you're looking for a cosy home away from home stay.
Very pretty home. Cozy. Host are easy to contact. Would recommend.
Highly recommended this place for 2 when in Vungtau

Mình là tuýp người rất thích sạch sẽ, và phải nói là mình rất hài lòng. Chủ home khá tinh tế ạ, đồ tiện ích vừa đủ, nhà ấm cúng và chị Lily cũng chịu khó trả lời các câu hỏi của mình. Trải nghiệm rất tốt 🌸🥰 Feels like second home, sẽ quay lại ạ 🪐🪐🪐

Ấn tượng đầu tiên là phòng rất sạch, thơm và đầy đủ tiện nghi
Gần những điểm đến nổi tiếng
Cô chú chủ nhà siêu thân thiện, dễ thương
Hẹn gặp lại vào một ngày sớm nhất 💕
Nhà sạch, deco đẹp
Cô chủ nhà siêu thân thiện luôn, cô nhiệt tình lắm. Không gian ở thoải mái, thơm tho, sạch sẽ.
Không gian của home thoải mái, gọn gàng lắm nè. Chủ nhà cũng rất dễ thương nữa. Mình sẽ ghé lại dịp sau ạ
I enjoyed my stay
It was a wonderful stay.
Chỗ ở rất tiện nghi, thoải mái, gọn gàng và sạch sẽ, Harmonia rất thân thiện, trả lời rất nhanh và nhiệt tình. Sẽ tiếp tục ở đây nếu có cơ hội đến Vũng Tàu

Chỗ ở đúng với mô tả. Host rất hỗ trợ khi mình không kịp check-out như quy định hay dịch vụ thuê xe thuận tiện.
Chỗ ở đủ tính riêng tư, có máy giặt, bếp. Máy lạnh công suất lớn.
View từ phòng nhìn ra quang cảnh thành phố.
There are not enough words to describe how helpful and generous Harmonia was in her accommodating our every need. On top of this, the place is great. Clean, cozy, convenient. Highly recommend!
Host rất thân thiện và hỗ trợ hết mình, căn hộ sạch sẽ và có view đẹp

Thank you so much for the wonderful stay! Your place was spotless, cozy, and had everything I needed to feel right at home. I really appreciated how clean and well-kept everything was—it’s clear you take great care in making sure your guests are comfortable. I’d definitely stay here again and would recommend it to anyone looking for a peaceful and well-maintained place to stay. Thanks again!
Chủ nhà nhiệt tình, vị trí thuận lợi, có thể đi bộ ra bãi biển. Sẽ quay lại trong thời gian tới

Wir haben unseren Aufenthalt sehr genossen. Es war alles genau wie beschrieben und die Gastgeberin hat uns vollumfänglich beraten. Sie war jederzeit erreichbar und eine sehr freundliche Ansprechpartnerin. Die Unterkunft war sauber und genau wie auf den Bildern dargestellt. Das Bett war überaus gemütlich und auch die Lage der Unterkunft ist absolut top! Wir kommen gerne wieder. ☺️
Phòng rất đẹp, chủ nhà rất nhiệt tình, phản hồi rất nhanh. Highly recommend !!!!

Absolutely wonderful stay! The place was cozy, and had everything we needed for a comfortable visit. The host was incredibly responsive and went above and beyond to ensure we had a great experience. The location was perfect, close to local attractions yet quiet at night. Highly recommend for anyone looking to enjoy a relaxing getaway!

The host was great and the location is perfect. There are 2 reasons for docking a star.
One is because I saw 2-3 beetle-like bugs every day, and I dont handle bugs well.
Second is because of the elevators. There are so many residents that just going outside feels like a journey because you have to wait so long for the elevators. Sometimes there were so many people that I had to wait for a 2nd elevator..

Phòng decor đỉnh :00
Mọi thứ đều sạch sẽ + gọn gàng

Great place great price! Everything is brand new, top class condition, super clean.... 5 star at budget price on 30 th floor!! Happily stay all year... Will definitely return! Host very responsive and easy to communicate with... 100% recommended to other guests

A very nice place, everything is near. Mall, beach etc. The room has great courtyard view. Easy to use stairs if needed, don't need to wait for the elevator. The host was super nice, punctual and friendly. The place has very nice vibe, we slept very well. Thank you.

Anh chủ cực kì có tâm và vô cùng dễ chịu thoải mái luôn nè   Nơi ở thoáng mát, sạch sẽ và rất thoải mái cho ai muốn relax luôn nha vì cực kì yên tĩnh. Lần đầu trải nghiệm với booking trên airbnb , mọi thứ đều như trên hình. Mình sẽ quay lại trong thời gian tới.
The apartment is really nice, and is just 5 minutes from the sea and the lotte mart by feet. I would recommend 100% to anyone coming to Vung Tau.

Good place that looks like the photos, great value for money and very responsive host. I’d only caveat that the beach nearby is currently undergoing construction (no fault of the host at all who is fantastic at what they do) thanks for the stay :)

Harmonia is a great communicator who is super responsive and flexible.
Her apartment was clean and spacious and in a perfect location to walk to all the local amenities and attractions. We like it so much that we extended our stay.
Recommend staying at Harmonia’s apartment!

Eine sehr schöne und gute Unterkunft.
Kann ich nur weiter empfehlen:)
Very helpful landlord. Recommend
Great place, great location
很好的房东，入住便捷，交通方便
Clean and modern apaertment room.
All great! Host helpful, good communication. Stayed for a month and can recommend in 100% 👍
Phòng ốc sạch sẽ, thoáng mát có ban công rộng rãi, anh chủ hỗ trợ nhiệt tình, vị trí gần bãi biển . Tuy nhiên gửi xe tốn phí, đặc biệt là phí qua đêm nhé m.n.

a hidden gem in the city. The host has a very heart welcome voice and she answers within 5mins for all of my texts. self checkin and checkout. 5mins walk to the beach. Everything that you look for in a airbnb home is here. Will be happy to book again
Ich hatte ein entspanntes Wochenende in Vung Tau und diese Unterkunft war die perfekte Wahl für mich. Vielen Dank für Alles

First of all, I cannot say enough about Hieo's place!!! ABSOLUTELY AMAZING!!! Hieu's help in response times was incredible. i once asked if I could have the staff. Come up and clean and within minutes they were there, not hours, minutes. the pool sauna and jim were amazing. be patient with the elevators, but that's not his fault. so many positives!!! Thank you Hieu, if I ever return to Vung Tau I will stay again!!! A+++
Tôi đi công tác thường xuyên và chỉ chọn nhà  tabo. Sạch sẽ thoải mái. Đề xuất nên chọn
Clean and comfortable. Ms Hieu so friendly and support any time. Hightlight to recommend
Chủ home rất nhiệt tình hỗ trợ, rất hài lòng về dịch vụ, hứa nhất định quay lại
best location and friendly community.
Đã nhiều lần quay lại, rất hài lòng mỗi khi đến
Modern apartment, new furniture, fresh and clean. I will definetily stay here again. Hieu is extremely nice, polite, helpfull! Best price/quality balance in Vung Tau.
Hieu was incredibly friendly and helpful, always ready to provide tips and assistance. The rooms were clean and comfortable, near to seaside.
Second time here, now for 10 days. Good value for money about 400.000 VND. Modern furniture, refreshing pool, it is worth to stay here
Thank you for your nice welcome!

Ms. Hoa is a very supportive and friendly host. She provided all we needed. The room is located at the low floors so you can take stairs and is quite clean and fully-furnished. However the second room is quite smaller than the image taken. Anw, thank you ms Hoa for a lovely place, will suitable for small group and family
Căn hộ sạch sẽ, dễ chịu. Ban công rộng. Lần sau sẽ quay lại!
căn hộ xinh xắn và sạch sẽ. view đẹp. đồ dùng đầy đủ, ngăn nắp. nếu đi lại mình sẽ tiếp tục chọn nơi này.
Hỗ trợ nhận phòng rất nhanh gọn, thân thiện

My best advice for travel advice is, “don’t pick the hotel, pick the host.” Staying with Hoa at The Song in Vung Tau is a perfect example.. Her energy and warmth surround her guests from even before check in to well after . From offering great deals on excursions and scooter rentals. there was nothing she wouldn’t do for us, help us with or improve for us.The Airbnb is in an ideal location, close to everything. It’s nice to think that if I ever come back to Vung Tau — and I want to — I’ll definitely stay at her place again .  Thank you for everything Hoa. Very Highly recommended !!

깔끔하고 필요한 건 다 준비되어 있었어요.
가격도 저렴하고 너무 만족합니다.
편의시설들도 훌륭합니다
Nhân viên thân thiện nhiệt tình
Sạch sẽ, tiện nghi. Yên tĩnh

Achtung!
Es gibt kein Frühstück. Viele andere Leistungen sind tw. absurd. "Zugang zur Skipiste" usw...
Es wird gezielt mit Dingen im Inserat geworben, welche es nicht gibt.
Es ist sehr laut im Appartement und eine Klimaanlage tropft ins Bett.
I had a wonderful night in here. The people and services, both were so professional that i want to be back next time. Thanks for all.
Chủ nhà trẻ, nhiệt tình, trả lời mình rất nhanh chóng. Phòng ốc sạch sẽ, đúng như mô tả, giá cả hợp lý so với khu vực.
Great apartment with a fully equipped kitchen. Would recommend!
L’appartement très propre! L’hôte super réactif! Pareille comme dans l’annonce! J’y retournerai
Great place, Great host. Will do it again!
Great place, great host. Will do it again.

Trân's apartment offers a tranquil haven in the heart of the city. Impeccably furnished with tasteful decor, it exudes comfort and style. The bedroom promises a restful night's sleep, while the private balcony provides a serene retreat. Its central location ensures easy access to local attractions, yet remains a peaceful oasis. Whether visiting for business or pleasure, the apartment is the perfect home away from home.
Sẽ quay lại lần nữa ❤️

My host Tran is very fast and helpful when we checked in. The place is nice and clean just like the descriptions. The location is very peaceful yet super close to the beach only take u 5 mins walking .
The place is nice and clean, the host is really friendly and helpful, would definitely stay here again
This place was so clean and neat and worth the price. Surely the best place in Vung Tau, recommend it to everyone
최고의 숙소. 추천드립니다

Sophia is a lovely host in person and was always responsive on chat. The apartment is very comfortable with an excellent view. I would have liked a top sheet on the bed with a duvet/doona, rather than just a synthetic blanket. Other than that, it was a great stay.

Sofia is an incredibly friendly, kind and generous host. She was very understanding and flexible when my arrival time drastically changed, Gave me a tour of Vung Tau so I was more comfortable with understanding the area, and was very responsive to messages. Giving me local advice when I needed it, including a very convenient limousine bus service between Ho Chi Minh City and Vung Tau, which drops you off and picks you up from the apartment building directly. Vung Tau is a very nice place to relax at, with lots to do, There's some nice restaurants and coffee shops nearby the apartment, and the rest of the peninsula is a very short Moped / Taxi ride away (which is very affordable in Vietnam). I came here for 3 weeks to focus on some important work I had to do, And the apartment was the perfect place to do it, with the rooftop pool and local amenities to relax at when I needed a break.
Sehr schöne, sehr saubere Wohnung (wie abgebildet), toller Ausblick und Supermarkt gleich nebenan. Frau Sofia war für 3 Monate eine ausgezeichnet Gastgeberin.
Fantastic place to stay with a beautiful view. Sofia was very helpful and an incredible host. Definitely recommend staying here.
Sofia er ikke bare en vert, hun er den beste Verten! Hun gjør alt for at du får det fint! Bruk henne, hun er verdt hver krone! Jeg vil komme tilbake igjen og igjen!

We feel blessed to have stayed for a month at Sofia's apartment.  It is very new and modern and clean.  Sofia is a treasure - always so helpful and responsive.  She lives a few floors lower in the same building, so she is always handy in case of need.  She is a perfect host, and this is a fine apartment for a long-term stay.   Thank you, Sofia.

Very nice view, very well cleaned apartment taken care by a careful host. Especially if you stay for a rather long time, the kitchen is good for cooking with sufficient utensils. Highly recommend!
Easy to go to places nearby but better by motorbike or car as the walk seems a bit challenging in too hot weather.

Sofia was a lovely host. She took me around the local area and showed me some of her favorite places. Her unit was nice and simple. Had what I needed with a beautiful view. Very firm bed which I'm not partial too but that's just the way it often is in Asia.
Very good apartment, very good view from the balcony, apartment is near to the beach, and really good, friendly and helpful owner 😊 Highly recommend!
Sofia is a very helpful and very hospitality host. The place is a great with amazing sea and city view.
Thank you Sofia for everything. The place felt at home.  Hopefully we will see you again.

한달동안 머무르면ㅅ 주인 송의 도움을 많이 받았다
로컬 푸드 맛집도 같이 다니고 마사지도 같이 가고 그녀의 생일파티도 해주었다 그녀는 우리집 아래층에 살면서 필요한 모든것을 해주었다~
남편이 아플때 회복음식도 만들어 주었고ᆢ그녀와의 모든시간이 행복했다~
우리는 친구가 되었다~^^
그녀의집에 머무르른것을 망설이지 마세요!!^^
Tốt

The view from the 27th-floor room is wonderful with city and sea. Facilities are in good condition. Cleanliness is amazing. Super market just 3 mins walking. Maintenance service is excellent when a down-light was broken. A little long time to await elevators, specially in weekend, but acceptable. Highly recommendation for vacation in Vung tau.

Chau was very responsive and helpful. The place was clean and I felt at home. The view is also great 😊
Please not that the library is for long term but it was okay not to have this too.
If a new chance occurs, I would want to come back again!
The apartment was very functional.
Thank you!
This was not my first stay in The Song, but the apartment was the best I had until now. Next time I will certainly ask for the same again and can recommend it to anyone planning to stay in The Song.

Châu's place was lovely, it was super clean and well-stocked with everything we needed. Check-in was smooth and Châu was very responsive via messages. The location is great and apartment is very cute. Perfect for a weekend away to Vũng Tàu. Cảm ơn Châu :)

Wonderful, beautiful stay, the host Chau was simply outstanding making everything easy and feel comfortable to be at home.
The view is gorgeous and the apartment spotless with much to explore across town.
Some people have commented on the elevators. It is true it can be a bit chaotic during check in and out hours, however if you try to avoid those hours or use alternate elevators and/or stairwells, you won't have a problem!
I will love to stay again.

Great location with a large department store across the street. The apartment itself is cute and perfect for me as a solo traveler. The host is very communicative and flexible. The only downside is the elevator—it can be slow due to the high number of residents and tourists, but I won’t hold that against the host. All you need is a little patience. I recommend this apartment.

Generally all good,but..
the place was awesome for money and quality. surely not much to do around especially if you want to go for nightlife. Vung Tao offers practically nothing. It's ok if you are a digital nomad
Sea is not very nice and the pool of the building is kinda annoying because of too many controls and security watching you as you are some sort of criminal. the gym can be annoying for the same thing. the apartment it's great. it's small. and unfortunately has a room completely useless if you are 1 or 2. the place can host 4-6 ppl but would be super uncomfortable more than 2.
Chau it's very helpful and give stuff you need as for example the bed was impossible to sleep on but I ask to add a toppers and she did. the only bad feeling with her is made by odd pricings. when I asked extension she gave me disproportionately price. that I didn't like. maybe English was the problem but I asked an extension and it was more expensive than booking new dates

Not much more I could add as others have stated, Chau is an exceptional host. It’s the little things she captures that most oversee and this makes the stay that much more pleasant.
Even having usb outlets in the electric sockets for charging, providing slippers to use for the pool or just walking around nearby. Kitchen was well equipped for making or having meals.
Very well designed and modernized.
Views are also amazing from the unit to the amazing infinity pool and gym at the 36th rooftop floor.
Highly recommend.

This is my 2nd time staying at one of Chau's apartments at The Song.
Chau is a pleasure to deal with and her apartments are always clean & tidy and well laid out. There's shops and restaurants downstairs and back beach is walking distance. Will come back again next time I'm in town.

This was a short stay but I wished I stayed longer! Great value, perfect location, and the room is just perfect. Chau was also very friendly and flexible with check-in, everything was smooth and easy. Thank you!
너무 만족했습니다. 붕따우를 다시 여

가격댸비 우수.
청결. 뷰가좋음. 다좋음

Skal du til The Song finner du ikke bedre vert! Hun er helt fantastisk. Utsikten 😍 Hun har den beste leiligheten! Hun gjør faktisk opplevelsen så bra at jeg ville betalt det dobbelte! Gleder meg å komme tilbake! Tusen takk for et nydelig opphold! Bare positivt å si fra meg!
Very nice stay our host was very helpful and accommodating the condo was very clean beautiful view of the city. Highly recommend hope to stay in the near future.

The place was great clean and how it looked on the pictures.
Chau made my stay comfortable and went the extra mile to help.
Thanks again Chau
Would love to stay again.
AMAZING! Chau is a fantastic host! Thank you so much for your patience and understanding 🧡

overall, this is a great place as it stands, especially for a longer period and if you want to get a sense of "normal life" in Vung Tau. Having said that, I do have to note that if you are looking for bars and such, I didn't find much to do at night in the area, unlike the front beach area. The area quiets down at 10pm, which, for someone who likes to walk around everywhere, it can become a little boring.
Despite that, you can find what you need in your daily life close by. A big super market, a lot of restaurants and the apartment building itself hosts various cafés a convenience store and restaurants.
one more thing to add, and this is more a personal preference, the mattress was a little too firm for my liking and the sofa is functional but I couldn't find a comfortable position to sit on it for long periods of time. again, this is personal preference and definitely not reflective of my overall satisfaction of the apartment which was amazing.
I would definitely stay here again.
Great place to stay

The host is highly responsive and courteous. The room is tidy, well-lit, and offers stunning scenery at an affordable rate, that you can enjoy beautiful sunsets from its balcony.
The only drawback is that the soundproofing is lacking, making it possible to hear loud conversations from neighboring rooms.
what a great place! calm comfortable clean!

Great room, very clean and comfortable with a stunning view. No complaints there. However, it must be noted that the building is absurdly crowded on the weekends and the elevator situation is comically bad. Be prepared to wait 30+ minutes for the elevator if you'd like to go down during a crowded time (especially around dinner), or walk 26 floors down the stairs like we did. If you can manage that, I highly recommend this room.
10 điểm không có nhưng ạ 😍😍😍

I recently had the pleasure of staying at Chau's Airbnb in Vung Tau, and it was a great experience. The apartment's location was ideal, situated in close proximity to the beach, a big grocery store, and plenty of places for food and coffee. The host was incredibly friendly and responsive, ensuring everything was in order before and throughout my stay. The Wifi and AC worked perfectly, and the apartment, being on a high-floor, provided a stunning view of Vung Tau. If I have the opportunity to return to Vung Tau, I would certainly stay here again.

남편분과 미팅하였는데 너무 친절하셨습니다.
새벽 도착인데 얼리체크인이 어려워 아쉬웠지만 짐을 이른 시간 부터 맡아주셔서 감사했습니다. 덕분에 편안하게 여행했습니다. 오토바이 렌트도 연결해주셔서 편안하게 관광할 수 있었습니다.

Definitely will choose this place again for next time🥰.

Châu was the nicest host, she came out to greet us herself when we were checking in. The room was clean, location and the view were amazing. Definitely will come back next time.

Absolutely amazing. The host met us at 22:30pm showing us around and where all amenities where located, how lifts worked ect. Once in the room was spotless and felt like home. Had an amazing view from the balcony. Room had everything you would need to buy included free of charge. Rooftop pool and gym were amazing. The host was responsive to any issues or questions straight away providing us with reliable information. If in vang tau would 100% recommend. 10/10

What an amazing place to stay, with great view and nice rooftop pool. Chau is such a lovely and helpful person. Thank you for your service and wish you many more happy customers. If i am ever back in Vung Tau i would love to stay at your place again.

I would recommend this stay to everyone honestly. Amazing views and so many amenities! Plus you have the grocery store right across the way.  it's truly perfect. The elevators can be a tad annoying since there are a lot of guests in this place but it's absolutely worth it.

Wir waren mit der Unterkunft sehr zufrieden! Die ganze Wohnung war super sauber und die Vermieterin war sehr freundlich und zuverlässig.
Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt und würden wieder hier übernachten.

We had a comfortable stay at this Airbnb. The apartment is spacious and modern, providing all the comforts needed for a great visit. The location is convenient, with a supermarket nearby for supplies, and the full kitchen amenities were perfect for cooking meals. The shower pressure and bathroom amenities were excellent, and the aircon and fan ensured a cool and comfortable environment. The host was very responsive and kind, making the experience even better. There’s a gym onsite, which, although limited, was sufficient for a workout. While the pool’s water quality seemed a bit questionable, this is not within the host’s management or control. The lifts were busy at times, but not as bad as some previous reviews suggested. The photos online accurately reflected the property, and overall, it was a pleasant and easy stay!

Vi boede her i 5 nætter. Lejligheden var præcis som på billederne og har alt hvad man skal bruge. Udsigten er virkelig smuk, specielt om aftenen når solen går ned. Wifi fungerer helt perfekt og man kan sagtens arbejde fra lejligheden.
Lejligheden ligger dog i et meget stort lejlighedskompleks, med rigtig mange mennesker. Der er konstant kø og ventetid ved alle elevatorer. Vi var der i ferieperioden, så det skyldes muligvis dette. Derudover var der folk på gangen som løb rundt og råbte og masser af musik og karaoke i ejendommen, også om natten og tidligt om morgenen.
Chau var en super vært! Meget sød og imødekommende. Hun tog imod os da vi ankom og hjalp os med finde transport da vi skulle videre.
Alt i alt, lever lejligheden op til prisen.
Everything was great, and Chau was a great Host!! I recommend this place

El departamento es muy cómoda y espaciosa. Me gustó todos.

I have a very happy time here. Chau was very gentle and quiet, took me into the house in person, and introduced various facilities in the building. The location of the house is very good. It is located on the high -rise of the apartment building and has a very wide field of vision. The cleaning of Chau's room is the cleanest room I have lived on the journey. I hope that I have the opportunity to stay here next time, thank you for your reception!

I’m traveling from the U.S. and was visiting family nearby. Staying at Chau’s was amazing! The unit is clean and had everything we needed (AC, washer/dryer, TV). It also has a balcony with a gorgeous view of Vung Tau. This has been one of the best Airbnbs I’ve stayed at across Southeast Asia in terms of value. I’d certainly stay again and will recommend it to my friends!

Mums ļoti patika uzturēšanās šajā vietā, īpaši skaistais skats no balkona - kalni, ūdens, daba un pilsēta vienlaikus. Saimniece ir atsaucīga, ņēma vērā mūsu jautājumus, risināja tos. Tā kā šī ēka ir ļoti pieprasīta, tad var nākties ilgāk gaidīt liftu, bet nebija tik traki kā domājām. Turpat 5 minūšu gājienā ir lielisks veikals Lotte. Dzīvoklī viss nepieciešamais, lai gatavotu savu ēdienu, kā arī bija arī veļasmašīna un daudz higiēnas preces. Paldies saimniecei par rūpēm!

Pros: view from above and location, host is very responsive and prompt. However, I did not understand where to meet to pick up keys. Cons: only one room key for my party of two. Very crowded building, elevators are very busy and it takes a long time most of the day (average ~10 minutes, longest 25 mins before we took stairs from the 27th floor). The room had a strong naphthalene (moth ball) smell to hide what appeared to be a vomit smell. My girlfriend mopped the living room and the smell improved somewhat. The bed linen had hair all over, we requested fresh ones and they promptly changed them. The bed blanket was also used/dirty (we changed it out). Other very basic things are lacking: there is no lamp by the bed or switch for low lights (have to get up to turn off lights, all bright or pitch black). Only two (2!) towels (bath) provided TOTAL, no bathroom mats, no hand towels, kitchen towels, etc. Walls are paper thin - get ready to hear neighbors partying loudly late at night.

We hebben een heerlijk verblijf gehad, de kamer was groter dan op de foto’s. Je hebt een prachtig uitzicht over de zee en stad. Het zwembad op het dak met de sportschool is geweldig. Ik raad het iedereen aan

Worth the pay, that's all I can say. Incredible views from the balcony, you can see the whole city. Location pretty near the beach, you can have a walk down street. The room have full of things that can make you feel at home, even a speakers which I never thought but its was there. The host also very helpful in guiding you to be self-checkin. Overall, 10/10 !!!
beside the overloading elevator, everything was very nice.

Phù hợp với gia đình và nhóm bạn , có chỗ đậu xe, sân vườn BBQ. Nằm gần từ viện khá yên tĩnh. Gần Ulala Farm và Hồ Mây tiện cho các bé nhỏ. Quản gia thân thiện và giới thiệu các điểm ăn ngon địa phương

An unforgettable stay at Valley House!
We absolutely loved our time at Valley House in Vung Tau. The home is stylish, spotless, and incredibly well-equipped – every detail felt thoughtfully curated for comfort and relaxation. The host was friendly, responsive, and made check-in a breeze. We especially appreciated the quiet location, while still being just a short ride away from the local restaurants. Highly recommend this hidden gem – we’ll definitely be coming back!

Ưu điểm: Trả lời nhanh, quản gia thân thiện, hỗ trợ nhanh gọn.
Nhược điểm: Hình ảnh thực tế quá khác so với trên bài post, dọn dẹp chưa sạch sẽ, khi tới check in vẫn còn dọn dẹp, sân và nhà còn ướt nhem. Lưu ý là nhà có muỗi, rất nhiều muỗi. Chén bát và vật dụng còn bẩn, không sạch. Hồ bơi không biết vệ sinh như nào nhưng khi tắm nước rất rất mặn gây cay mắt. Lần đầu tiên sử dụng Airbnb mà còn thu phí dọn dẹp, vệ sinh. Nói chung là trải nghiệm tệ, không vì việc trả lời nhanh gọn và quản gia thân thiện thì chắc không được đánh giá 3 sao như hiện tại.
Tuyệt vời !
The villa is very nice and exactly like the picture. I highly recommend everyone to book this place for family vacation.

Nous avons passé un excellent séjour dans cette merveilleuse villa. Elle est spacieuse avec une belle décoration et des belles couleurs bien assorties. Le jardin est très agréable aussi bien la journée que le soir car il est bien éclairé avec de nombreuses guirlandes.
Elle est située dans le plus beau quartier de Vung Tau, un endroit avec de la nature, à quelques mètres de la mer.
Je tiens à remercier chị Hồng et chị Vân qui sont très sympathiques et ont fait le maximum pour que nous passions un super séjour.
Tốt. Phù hợp với gia đình đông người.

We were satisfied to choose this Airbnb during our weekend getaway trip. The Airbnb is accessible to the city center and has all amenities we need during our stay. Additionally, all bed rooms are roomy which can accommodate a big group . The Airbnb has only ground floor which is a plus as our dad is old who cannot walk to upper floor. We also like the patio in front of the Airbnb where we enjoy the BBQ and family gatherings. We highly recommend this Airbnb to those who are looking an Airbnb for a big group .

I'd recommend the place for any guest visiting Vung Tau.

Home sạch sẽ và đầy đủ các tiện ích không khác gì ở nhà. Vị trí ở tầng 5 rất thuận tiện di chuyển lên-xuống, tuy nhiên cách âm giữa các phòng chưa tốt nên buổi tối khá ồn ào do các phòg bên cạnh ăn uống, trò chuyện rất lớn tiếng. it was so convenient to live in her place, everything in the details was accurate.

Really good stay hassle free. Good deal if off peak season.

Had a great stay! The place was super clean, comfortable, and matched the photos exactly. The host was responsive and helpful throughout our visit. Location was convenient and quiet, making it easy to relax and get around. Plenty of underground and street parking for cars and motorbikes. Would definitely stay here again and highly recommend to others.

The host is friendly, responds quickly, and is flexible with check-out times. The location is great—just a few minutes’ walk from the beach. The swimming pool is open until 9 pm and offers a beautiful view. We had a great trip and will definitely come back next time.

Phòng sạch sẽ, đầy đủ tiện nghi, đẹp và thoải mái

Good place for those wanting to stay in an appartment instead of an hotel,  Vung Tau is a quiet beach town, and roads are well maintained so hiring a bike was a the ebst option for me, then you can go to the beachfront restaurant in about 5mn. No issue parking at the condo.

여행중에 모바일 sim 사용기간이 종료되어 곤란하여 호스트님께 도움을 요청하였더니 직접 sim을 구입하여 주셨어 여행을 원활하게 마무리 할 수 있었습니다.
내가 또 붕따우를 방문하게 되면 당신과 함께 하고 싶습니다.
Harmonia NG님 감사합니다.

Harmonia sent us clear instructions with photos which made it very easy to check in and out. It was a lovely 1 bedroom apartment - clean and sunny and with a balcony, washing machine and kitchen. The infinity pool on the rooftop was breathtaking and we could see the Vung Tau Lighthouse and Vung Tau’s Statue of Jesus the King from the rooftop. We were trying to receive a package from another city and Harmonia contacted the shop and arranged for delivery. Thank you for all of your help! We felt right at home.

I have to write a review about this stay because it was simply the best! The host first of all gave me very clear instructions about entering. She was so helpful with everything, and there's a cleaner hired to work around you which is perfect as I did spend alot of time inside the apartment as i stayed here for online study . The host also always messaged me saying 'just let me know if you need anything', she was so nice and i will be staying here again! I stayed here for 3 weeks, the pool and gym is perfect, the views are nice to distract yourself whilst your working out haha! The aircon is perfect, the bed is super comfy and the wardrobe is huge!, the tv has netflix and youtube and i enjoyed my little time outs on the sofa. The balcony has a washing line so you can hang literally every bit of washing you have. The bathroom is lovely and has plenty of storage for all your toiletries. I love the balcony and I just loved everything lol! Thanks so much, I shall be back!

Clean and well maintained apartment that looked just like the photos. Apartment is on the 4th floor which makes it much easier to get to the facilities during busy times like the weekends.
Loved all the facilities in the building for children and a good common space with free WiFi for working .
The host is also extremely helpful, thank you! 😀
Chỗ ở sạch sẽ, đầy đủ tiện nghi, vị trí đẹp

Lần sau chắc chắn sẽ đặt lại , căn hộ rất sạch sẽ thoáng,  đồ dùng bếp cơ bản hầu như không thiếu thứ gì. Căn hộ 8 điểm 2 điểm cho anh chủ siêu nhiệt tình hỗ trợ khách rất tốt 10 điểm không có nhưng 😍
